Nda3tu'4un4lu3chi'4i2 un4ji'4in4 ndu2sa1a3i4xa3na1ja4chiu4un4xa14ku'1u1.
Ya1i4xa3 na2chi3ñu3chi'4i4 na2i3tu2nda1sa1a3xa'1a4 e2nda1mi4i4ta4ba4 na2ku'1u1an4ku'1u1ja'4nda2 na1an4ya1ma4ka4ni3 na2tan3ki3xa3a4 na2chi'3i3 na2tan3
sa1a3i4xa3 na2ta4ba4 na2ku'1u(1) a1an4ta1tan4chi4ka2 na1nu14u(3) a3,nda1mi4i4kwa'1an1tan3xu4xa(3) e2ku4u(4) a2ndi3xi4tan3sa1a3chi4chi3xi4tu3 na2xa'1a4 e2an4ko14o3sa1a3chi4chi3chi4ka2 na1ta1tan4xa'1a4 e2tan3
o4ra2ni1xa1a(1) e1ko3ndo(3) a2ni3i4tan3sa1a3ku4u4nda4ta'1nu1tan3sa1a3ku4u4nda4ka1ya(1) e1o4ra2nda4ka1ya(1) e1nda4a2yo1o4nda4ka1ya(1) e1chi1,tan3sa1a3nu14u3nu1ni4i4yo2chi'4i4na1ñu3u2kan4chi2.

ni14xi1xi1tin3nda3ka'3mi3tu3ku3 na(2) e2tan3

na4ja1ni1ki3xa3a(4) e4nda4ka'1nu(1) e4 e2ya1ja1i4chi1ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4xa1a1tan3,kwa'1an1xa1a1tiem4pu2ya1bi3ko4i3ta2ndi4ja1chi4chi13 a2chi4chi13kwa4an2ndi'3i3ndi3xi(4) o4mi4i4ba42i4in(4) a2kan4.
Ya'1a3bi3ko4i3ta2ya1,ya1ka4na3bi3ko4si'3i(4) o4Juquilaka4chi2 na1,an4diciembreba42ka4na3bi3ko4si'3i(4) o4Juquila,sa3kan4ndi4ja1ku4ba'1a3 e2nda3ka3ya2 e4 ya2.
Nda3ka3ya2 e4ya1kan4ndi4ya1ja1i4chi1ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4nda3ka3ya2 e4 e2sa4kwi3i(4) o4 ya2tan3sa3kan4ndi4nda3xa2a(2) e2ji'4in(4) o4be'3e3sa4ko1yo(3) e4 ya2ta3xi3kwa'4a(4) e4 e2nda3ta3an(4) e4 ya2tambo.
Ya1ku3xi(3) o4ya1xi14ko(3) e4ku3u3tan3i3kan4ndo4o13 a2ya1,ya1ko3ndo3gastuyo4o4ndi3sa3a4tiem4pu2ji'4in4se'1e(3) o4.

¿Nda4a2i3nga2nu14u3ndu3chi4i4yo2?
I4yo2ndu3chi4,ndu3chi4me4ku2ran4,ndu3chi4me4ku2an4ndu3chi4kwa'4a1ba42ndi4ya1kan4ku4u4ndu3chi4,ndu3chi4ya1bi3ta42ka1so1o4ba'1a3ka3xi(4) o4ndi3chi2ka4chi2mi3i(4) o4kan4ran4.

¿Tan3i3nga2ka1nu14u3ndu3chi4tin3?

¿Ya1tu4u24tin3nda4a2yo1o4chi'4i4 na(2) e2kan4?

¿Tan3ya1yu3mi4tin3?

¿An4sa3kan4ba3te1?

¿Sa1a3na3ni4ñu3u2 un4?

ji4tu3 na2tiem4pu2ni1ki3xi3a1chi1na1xu13xa3na1ta4u3ni2na1ja1,na1ja1ni1ja3chi4ñu3tan3
chi'13i3 na2ndu3chi4chi'13i3 na2nu1ni4chi'13i3 na2,nda1nda4a2ka1ta3ta2chi'13i3 na3.

lu14u3ña1ta3ta2chi'13i3 na2,na1xu13xa3,tiem4pu2ni1ki3xa2a2sa1bi4tiem4pu2yo1o4,mayu,yo1o4mayu
u1xi1an4i3in3u1bi1u1ni1kwa'1an1yo1o4mayuki3xa2a2sa1bi4.

"i3ta2an2ndi4na1ku'1un1ku4u(4) e4,na1ku'1un1ku4u(4) e4ja3chi4ñu(3) e4,yu'1u1ndi4ku'1u1ndi4ja1xa'13nda2 e4 ya2bi3tin3ndi4nda143ya1ko3ko3ba42,na4tu2ni14xi3in(3) a2ko3ko(3) a2un4,
i3kan4ndi4nda3ti3in(3) o4 ya2nda3chi3nde3e3i3in3xi4ña4 e2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ko3ko(3) a3,ndi4o4ra2ya1ki3xa2a2sa1bi4ndi4xa1i4yo2ba'1a3ndi'3i(3) a2,xa1i4yo2na3ni2ndi'3i(3) a3".
"Na4tu2sa3kan4ka4chi2 un4papándi4,na4tu2sa3kan4ka4chi2 un4ndi4ku'1un1ba(3) e4,

"Tan3bi3tin3ndi4o4ra2kwa'1an1,kwa'1an1tiem4pu2ki3xa2a2sa1bi4ndi4,ta3ta2i4chi1chi'3i(3) o4 ña3".

tan42i4yo(2) a2ni1chi'3i(3) o4,i3kan4i4yo2xu'14un4,i3kan4i4yo(2) a2ya1ku3ta3ku2 e4".
I3kan4i4yo2ki3ti4sa1na(1) e4ya1kan4ndi4xi14ko(3) e4 e2tan3i3kan4ja3ta(4) e4mbu4rru2ja1na(1) e4,
ja3ta(4) e4i3in3ti1xu'4u4ba3ja3ta(4) e4ji1ndi1ki4ba3,ya1kan4xi14ko(3) e4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ko3o3xu'14un(4) e4,ko3o3ki3ti4sa1na(1) e4".
Ya1kan4ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4se'1e3 ra2,ta1nda3a2tiem4pu2ni1chi'3i3 na(2) e2kan4ja143ni1ki3xa2a2sa1bi4ndi4,ta3ta2i4chi1chi'13i3 ra3.
Tiem4pu2ki13xa2a2sa1bi4ndi4ja1chi4tu4nu1ni4ñu'3u4ndi4ta1nda3a2ya1xa'1un1ki1bi4ndi4la3tun4 lu3ka4a4i3tu2.
Xi1nu3i3in3yo1o4i3tu2ndi4la3tun4kwa'1an1i3tu2ndi4nda1xa'1a1kwa'1an1i3tu2.
"La3tun4 ni42i3tu2ndu4ta1ta3ta2i4chi1",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4se'1e3 ra3.
Bi3tin3ndi4tiem4pu2yo'4o4ya1yo'4o4a3sa3kwe4nda2ndo'4o1,ya1yo'4o4a3sa3kwe4nda2 ndo4tan3ku3ta3ku2 ndo4ndi4so'3o3i13xa3na1ta4u3ni2ni1ja3chi4ñu3 na2tiem4pu2.
Tan3ya1yo'4o4ba42ni1i3xa3yu'1u1tan3bi3tin3ndi4ya1yo'4o4ba42xa'4a13yu'1u1i3chi4nu14u3 ndo4ndi4so'3o3a3sa3 ndo4,ya1yo'4o4ndi4ya1ndu3ku3xa3ba42yo'4o4.
Na4tu2ba'1a3ndi4ya1yo'4o4ni1chi'3i(3) o4an4,an4u'1un1 run4ni1chi'3i(3) o4an4i1ñu1 run4chi'13i(3) o4,
an4u1xa1 run4ni1chi'3i(3) o4,na4tu2nda'4bi2 ni42 o4ko14o3xu'14un(4) e4sa3ta(4) e4ta1tan4ba3sa3ta(4) e4abonoba3

na4tu2i4yo2tu3xu'14un4kwa'1a4ka1chi'3i(3) o4na4tu2ko14o3xu'14un4ndi4xa3ku4chi'3i(3) o4tan42,tan42ya1kwa'3a2xa1a1nde3e(4) o4.

hijo,bi3tin3ndi4ya1ka1a3ndi4lu14u3ni3i4ka3na3ka1a3ndi4na4tu2ba'1a3ni1xi1yo3i3tu2 e4ndi4ko14o(3) a2ni4ndo'3o(3) a2un4,
ka1a3ndi4lu14u3ni3i4ka3na3ka1a3,o4ra2nda3ka3ya2 e4ni3i4ndi4,ni3i4ya4ma4ko3ndo(3) a2ku1nu'1u4ji'4in(4) o4.
ti3in(3) o4i3in3ya3ka2tan3ya3ka2kan4ta3an(4) e4,ta3an(4) e4ni3i4
Na4tu2ba14sa3ndi4,na4tu2ba14sa3ko14o(3) a2ya1,ko14o(3) a2ku3xi(3) o4tan3lu3u3tan3lu3u(3) a2ke3e3sa4kwi3i4 na(2) e2sa3kan4ndi4ke3e3ndia1ma4,
ya1kan4ndi4ya1kan4ba42a3sa(3) e4tan3ku3ta3ku2 e4,ya1kan4ndi4nda13chi3i4 ra2ni3i4nda13chi3i4 ra2,ya3ka2ni1ta3an4 ra2ni3i4.
Ya'4a13i3in3nda'3a4ku4u4ya3ka2su14ku3tu4 ra2ni3i4a1chi1ni1ke3ta3ba'1a3sa4ka2 ra1ji'4in4,ji'4in4ni3i4 ra2ndi4lu14u3ni3i4ka13na3.
Ni1ke3e3,ni1ke3e3i3kin4ni1ke3e3la3tun4jo13nde3e3i3kin4xa'1a4i3tu2 ra1,la3tun4 ni42xi1yo3ndi3chi2chinaya3a3ndi3chi2cuartandi3chi2,ndi3chi2i3tu2,tia13ma3chi'13i3 ra3.

Ja143ba1xi3sa1bi4ndi4,sa1bi4ki1bi4ki13xa2a2,ki13xa2a2sa1bi4ndi4lu14u3xu'14un4ba1xi3ji'4in4ta4kan4
Lu14u3ña1ko4ndo3ya1ba'1a3ba1xi3ji'4in4ta4kan4ki1bi4ba1xi3 ra4ki13xa2a2 ra4nu14u3ñu'3u4ko1so1 ra4ña1ta3ta2
Yo4o4ba3ku4u4 na2,ya1nda'4bi2 o4ndi4ko14o3xu'14un(4) e4ba42ndi4xa3ku4chi'3i(3) o4xa3ku4ja3chi4ñu(3) e4,
an4ya1xu'14un4i4yo(2) a2sa3kan4ndi4kwa'1a4chi'3i(3) o4kwa'1a4,kwa'1a4chi'3i(3) 2ji'4in4 ndo4.
Tan3sa1a3a3sa(3) e4ndi4ya1nda'4bi2 yu1ta1nda'4bi2ndi4ko14o3xu'14un(4) 2e1ta4sa1a3ni1kwi3i3ja3chi4ñu(3) e4ndi4,ya1yo'4o4ndi4ya1ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ba42yo'4o4,

ke13ta3ba'1a3ya1ku4u4chi3ñu3ja13chi4ñu(3) e4,ke13ta3ba'1a3ya1ku3xi(3) o4,ya1yo'4o4ba42ya1,

Ndu3ku4ka1 e4,ndu3ku4ka1 e4i3nga2xi4ña4ku3tu(3) e4an4ko14o3i4yo2 na1,i4yo2ji1ndio4si2na1i4yo2ku3rra42
i3kan4ki3na'3a2 e4ku3rra42nu14u3 na2,na1cha'14bi3ku4u(4) e4 na2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku3tu(3) e4.
Ka3chi2 na1sa1a3xu'14un4ku4ni2 na1xa'1a4ku3rra42an4ko14o3an4milpesuan4ko14o3an4u1na1sien4tu2ku4ni2 na1xa'1a4,an4i3in3sien4tu2ka4chi2 na1xa'1a4i3in3kwa3ti4yu2.
An4sien4tu2sa3ba3ka4chi2 na1xa'1a4i3in3kwa3ti4yu2tan3ta1cha'14bi3ku4u(4) e4a1chi1ndi4ya1ko14o3ba42ji'4in(4) o4,ko14o3ku3rra42 e4.

Sa14na3i3ni2 ndo4nda4a(2) e2a3sa3 ndo4an4ko14o3xi3kwi'4na4 ndo4xu'14un4 na2xi3kwi'4na4 ndo4ña'1a3na1yu4bi24ndi4ba143ba'1a3sa3kan4ndi4
tu1ndo'4o(4) e4ya1kan4ba42ku3xi(3) o4tu1ndo'4o(4) e4ya1kan4ba42ja3chi4ñu3ji'4in(4) o4,ya1kan4ba42ya1la3tun4ya1kan4ku4u4ña1ba'1a3.
Ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in4se'1e3 2,tan3ya1kan4ku4u4tiem4pu2nda3ki'3in3 ndo4ku'1un1 ndo4,ya1kan4ba42a3sa3 ndo4ku3ta3ku2 ndo4.
MarioSalazarFelipe.
Na4nda3tu'4un(4) 2kwen4tu2xa'1a4yu3ba(4) e4SanJerónimoji'4in(4) un4,sa1a3ni1ku3u3tan3xa143ju13na'3a2ta1kan4ku4u4 ra2milagrundi4,
ya1kan3,i4yo2i3in3si1si'4i2reyndi4ni3ba143ki4ta(3) en4kan4ka3ka(3) en4ka4i2tan3ni3ba143ki4ta(3) en4kan4ku'1un(1) an4nda4a2ka1yu3bi2ku'1un(1) an4ku1chi(3) an4ndi4ña4i4yo2ba'1a3ban4kan4be'3e3nu14u3yu3ba(4) en4tan3
tan3i4yo2i3in3ña4ja4chiu4un4nu14u3 na2ña4,ña4ndi4ko3xi4xi3 na2tan3ya1kan4ni1ka3chi2ta1,ta1xi4ka3ka4i2ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,
"Na4kwi14i3na4,ya1kan3,ki'1bi3yu'1u1ja3chiu4un(4) 2nda'4bi3nu14u(3) un4na4i3in3u1bi1ti4yo1o4tan3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
na4,kwe4nda2na4ku3ya3tin3 lu(3) 2ña4si1si'4i2reykan4ndi4na'3a4 ni42ba42i4yo2 an4ña1a4tan3kwa'1an1xu4xa3mi3i(4) an4tan3sa14kan4ndi4ña4ña1a4ndi4ña4ku4ni2ta1a3ban4ña1a4tan3
tan3ka4a(4) e2ndo'4o(4) an4sa3kan4i4xa3yu3ba(4) en4ndi4ba143xa'4a13 ra2ki3ta(3) en4ka4i2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"An4sa3kan4ba3ndi4yu'1u1ndi4ña4ja1ku4xu4xan3tu3ku4u4yu'1u1ba3ndi4lu14u3i4yo2chi3ñu3nu14u3 na2tan3bi3tin3ndi4na4,na4tu2sa3kan4ba3ku4ni2 un4ndi4,
ya1kan3,ka'1an1 yu1xa'1a(4) on4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ki'1bi(3) un4ja3chiu4un(4) un4sa3kan4ndi4na4ja1ni1ja3chiu4un(4) un4u1bi1an4u1ni1yo1o4tan3sa3kan4ba42ndi4ja143nda3ndi3ko4tu3ku3yu'1u1ja3chiu4un(4) 2ndi4ba'1a3ndi4ja1ni1ki'1bi(3) un4ku3ya3tin(3) un4nu14u(3) an4",ka4chi2ña4ko4ndo3criadakan4so'3o3ji'4in4,ji'4in4 ra3.
"Na4tu2sa3kan4ba3ndi4a3sa(3) on4 e2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,ña4kan4ban4ku4ni2 yu1ki'1bi3 2nda3tu'4un(4) 2kwen4tu2ji'4in4".
Ja143ni1ka'1an1ba(3) en4kan4ja'1a4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ku4ni2 ra1ndi4ja3chiu4un4 ra2,ndi4ba143ka'4an2 en4na4tu2ta1a3ku4u4 ra2ndi4ña'3a4ban4kan4ni1ka3chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4reyyu3ba(4) en4kan4.
Ya1kan4na4tu2sa3kan4ba3ndi4,ya1kan3,na4ki3xi3ba(3) en4na4tu2,ya1kan3,ña4kan4ban4ki'1bi3ja3chiu4un4nu14u(3) un4tan3nda3ki3nde3e(4) on4ndi4ja1na'3a4tu3ndo'4o4tu3mi3i4ba(3) on4ji'4in4 ndu2,ya1kan3,i4xa3ma1ni(4) un4ndu'1u1",ka4chi2ba3reykan4so'3o3.
Ya1kan4ndi4kwa'1an1ba3ta1kan4ja3chiu4un4 ra2tan3su14u3cho1to1ta1kan4ni4ju3ndi3xi3 ra2ndi4cho1to1na1si'4i2ba3ju13ndi3xi3ta1kan4tan3kwa'1an1 ra1ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4tan3ja143i1xa14a3ni1ku3ya3tin3 ra2,
ña1,ki1bi4nu14u3ndi4sa1a3tan42ja'1an1nda1ka3ti4 ra2is1ta4nda'3a(4) en4tan3nda13ndi3ko4 ra2ba1xi3 ra2tan3
i3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1,ka3ma2yo'4o4tan3ka3ma2kan4i4xa3 ra2chi3ñu3,a1chi1ndi4chi3ñu3na1si'4i2ku4u4ba(3) e2kwa'1an1 ra1.
I3kan4ja143i1xa14a3tu3ku3ki1bi4tin3sa3kan4ja143ni1ndi3ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1xa1a1 ra1nu14u3tu3ku(3) an4i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4so'3o3ndi4,
"reinandi4,ya1kan3,ba'1a3 ni42ke4e(4) on4ndi4ba'1a3 ni42yu14bi4i4yo2 on4ba'1a3 ni42ka4a4i4ndu'3u(4) un4tan3
tan3ndi4ya1,nda143i3nda14 e2ya1ndo'4o(4) on4ndi4ba143kwi4i4ki3ta(3) on4ka4i2ku'1un(1) un4ya1kan4ba42ndo'4o(4) on4tan3,tan3ya1kan3,
yu'1u1ndi4xi4ka(3) 2yu14bi4ndi4ka1ndi4ku4si1i4i3ni2 yu1ndi4tan3na1kwa4chi3ta1a3yo'4o4tan3na1kwa4chi3ta1a3kan4nda4tu'4un(4) 2kwen4tu2ji'4in4ba3yu'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,yu'1u1ndi4ña4xi4ka3ndi4ka1ku4u4yu'1u1tan3yo'4o1tin3
ni3na1kwa4chi3ta1a3ba143ji4ni2bi4yo'4o1nu14u3ya1sa3kan4ka1a3ba3i4ndu'3u4ba'1a(3) on4".
"Su14u3yu'1u1ban4ku14ni2 yu1ki3ta3ka3ka3ka4i2ndi4ña4ku4ni2ku4u4ba(3) 2ku'1un(1) i1tan3yu3ba4 2ku4u4ta1xa'14a13 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,kwe'1e1 ni42 ra1ya1kan4ba42ku14ni2 ra1ki3ta3yu'1u1ka3ka(3) 2,tan3bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,

"Ya1kan3,ka3chi2 un4ji'4in4 ra2tan3sa3kan4ndi4na4kwi14i3na4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in(4) an4ña1a4,ja4chiu4un(4) e4nu14u(3) e4ña1a4na4tu2ki3xi(3) an4ku1sun(1) an4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,
ku4nda3si4 ni42 yu1ndi4ko14o(3) a2kan4ji4ni2 yu1nu14u3tan3bi3tin3ndi4ni1ki3xa2a(2) e2kan4ni1ki3xi3ka3ta3ka3a(3) e2nu14u(3) a2ka1a3ya1kan4ndi4ya1kan4ku4ni2 yu1ka3chi2 un4ji'4in4yu3ba(4) on4tan3
na4ni1ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4yu3ba(4) on4ndi4ki3xi(3) 2tan3ki3xi(3) 2ndo3ko3o4 2,ku14nu'1u4bi4 2ndi4ka1a3ki3xi(3) 2ku1sun1nda3a(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4e1ta4ñu'3u4yu'3u4is1to(3) on4ka1a3na4ka3ndu'4u(4) 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
"An4sa3kan4ba3ndi4,ya1kan3,ka'1an1ba(3) 2ji'4in4yu3ba4 2na4tu2ndi3xa3ku4u(4) un4ndi4chi4ka2i3ni2 un4ndi4ki3xi(3) un4ku1sun(1) un4mi4i4ka4ndu'3u4 2ka1a3tan3ki3xi3ba(3) on4ndi4ya1ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in4yu3ba4 2ndi4ta1kwi3in3ku4u4ba3ta1kan4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
I3kan4ndi4ja143ni1ka3na(3) en4yu3ba(4) en4tan3ja143ka'4an2 en4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"papáku4ni2 yu1ndi4ka'1an(1) on4 lu3ji'4in(4) an4ja4chiu4un4nu14u(3) e4ka1a3ndi4na4,
na4ki3xi3,na4ki3xi(3) an4ku1sun1nda3a2 en4 lu3yu'3u4is1to3ka1a3ji'4in(4) 2ndi4
ji14ni2 o4yo3o3ba42ku4ni(2) a2ni1ki3xi3ka1a3ñu3u42ndi4ka1a3ni1ki3xi3le1e4nu14u(3) 2ñu3u42tan3ya1kan4ba42ku4nda3si4 ni42 yu1ya1kan4ba42ndi4ku4ni2 yu1ndi4ki3xi(3) an4ku1sun(1) an4yu'3u4is1to3ka1a3".
Ya1kan4ni1nu3u3reyñu'3u4tan3ja143ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4ña4ja4chiu4un4nu14u3 ra2ndi4na4,
na4nu3u3,na4ku'1un(1) an4kan4ku1sun(1) an4ji'4in4si1si'4i2 ra1kwa3a4ndi4,ya1kan3,ni1xa'1an1le1e4nu14u(3) an4tan3ya1kan4ku4nda3si4 ni42 an4ku1sun1mi3tu4nda2(4) en4ya1kan4ndi4e1ta4na4ñu'3u4yu'3u4is1to3kan4na4ka3ndu'4u(4) an4ku1sun(1) an4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Ba'1a3tu3na4tu2sa3kan4ka4chi2 un4ndi4ku'1un1ba(3) 2ndi4ku14nu'1u4bi4 2ndi4i3kan4ku'1un(1) i1ku1sun(1) i1ji'4in(4) an4kan4na4tu2kan4ndi4ku4nda3si4ja1ba(3) en4ku4u(4) an4ña4lu3u3su14u3kan4ndi4
ya1kan3,ña4lu3u3ban4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,ndi4su14u3ña'3a4ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta1a3ku4u4ta1kan4tan3i3kan4ja143ni1xa1a1 ra1ña1a4ka4ndu'3u4 ra2ñu'3u4yu'3u4is1to3kan4ku1sun1 ra1ji'4in(4) an4.
O4ra2kwa'1an1ni1ku3ñu3u42tan3ja143ka4yu3yu'3u4 ra2ka4ndu'3u4 ra2ndi4ku4ni2bi1xin3 ra2i4su4ku24 ra2tio1to1ka4ndu'3u4 ra2i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,
"Nda4a(2) e2ni(3) a2ba42ku3u3bi4 2ji'4in(4) un4na4,an4ba143na4nda3a3ta'3an(2) e2ka3ndu'4u4ta'3an(2) e2lu3lu3yu'3u4is1to3ña1a4ji'4in(4) un4ndi4yu'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ku4ni2bi1xin3sa4ka(2) e2ka4ndu'3u4 2tan3yo'4o1tu3ndi4ka4ndu'3u4mi3i(4) un4tan3ba143ka4na3chi3ñu3sa3kan4ndi4ña'3a4ku4u4yo'4o1ña'3a4ku4u4yu'1u1ba3tan3
tan3ka4a(4) e2ku4u4tu3sa3kan4,ku4ni2 yu1ndi4nda3a(3) 2ji'4in(4) un4nu14u3is1to3ba3"."Na4tu2sa3kan4ba3ndi4,ya1kan3,ba'1a3nda3a(3) on4ka3ndu'4u4ba(3) on4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143ni1nda3a3 ra2ja13ndu'4u4 ra2,ndi4ba143ki'4in(4) an4cuentana4ta1a3ku4u4 ra2ndi4ña'3a4ba3ban4ka4chi2,i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,ya1kan3,
"Na4ba143ku4si1i4i4chi3i3ni2 un4ji4ni2 un4ta1a3an4ba143ta'4bi14i4chi3i3ni2 un4ji4ni2 un4na1ta1a3ji4to(3) on4ya'4a13 na2i3chi4ka1a3tan3,yu'1u1ndi4
ya'4a13 ni42ku4si1i4i3ni2 yu1ji4ni2 yu1na1ta1a3ya1sa3kan4ku4u(4) 2ña4xi4ka3ndi4ka1ndi4,ya1kan3,
nda1nda4a2ka1ti4na1kwa4chi3tan3ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in4 na2tan3ya1a3sa3 na2ba42ku4si1i4i3ni2 na1ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ya1kan4ba42la3tun4nu14u3yu'1u1xi4ka(3) 2yu14bi4ndi4ka1tan3yo'4o1ndi4ndo'4o(4) on4".
"Na4sa3kan4ba3ndi4,ya1kan3,an4su14u(3) an4ba143ka'4an2i3ni2ku4u(4) 2tu4u2 un4ña4ka'4an2i3ni2ku4u(4) 2tan3ta1a3ku4u4ta1ko14o3 ra2nu14u(3) 2ya1kan4ba42ndi4ka4a(4) e2ku4u4sa3kan4tan3sa4ka4na(3) e2ki1bi4kwa'1an1".
"Na4sa3kan4tan3ta1a3ku4u(4) un4sa3kan4ndi4ba3nda1kwi3i3ku3si4ki24 2ji'4in4ba(3) on4tan3yo'4o1ndi4,ya1kan3,ña'3a4ta'4an4ba3yu'1u1ku4u(4) un4".
"Na4tu2sa3kan4ka4chi2 un4ndi4xa'4a1(3) on4ya(1) e1ma1ni4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ku3si4ki2(4) o4tan3ku3si4ki24ba(3) e4ndi4,ya1kan3,yu'1u1ndi4
ña'3a4ku4u4ba(3) 2tan3ndi4nda4sa1a4ta'3an2i3ni2 yu1ya1sa3kan4ka'4an2 on4ji'4in(4) 2",nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4su14u3ña'3a4ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4ta1a3ku4u4ta1kan4
O4ra2ja143ni1nda3ka1a1ba3ya1nda13sa1a4 ra2ji'4in(4) an4tin3tan3ja143ni1ju3si4ki24ba3 na3.
Xa143ni1nda3ku'1un3se'1e3ba(3) en4,nda13ku'1un3se'1e(3) an4tin3tan3ba143ki4ta(3) en4ke'3e2ndi4a1su(3) an4i4yo2ba'1a3ku4u4ba(3) en4.
Nda13ku'1un3se'1e(3) an4tin3sa3kan4ku4u4ja143kwa'1an1ni1xi1nu3 a2lu3u3kan4ja143,xa143ku13ya3tin3tiem4pu2ka3ku(3) a2tin3.
I3kan4ka4chi2,ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2,"Bi3tin3ndi4nda143i3in3u1bi1yo1o4ti4ba42tan3ka3ku3se'1e3 2tan3bi3tin3ndi4nda3ndu3ku(4) un4sa1a3ko3o3tan3ki3ta(3) on4ku'1un(1) un4ndi4,ya1kan3,ka14na3chi3ñu3ku3ndi3ka2 on4ndi4
tu4u4 ni42ka4a4nu14u(3) a2ndi4se'1e3yo'4o1ba42ka3chi2yu3ba(4) 2tan3ba'1a3bi4ndi4,ya1kan3,yo'4o4na4ko3to(3) 2sa1a3ko3o(3) a3".
"Sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ndi'3i3nu14u(3) a2yo'4o4,ya1ka3ku3ku4u4ba(3) e2ka1a3tan3ndi4,ndi4ko14o(3) a2kwi3so(3) 2ndi4ya1kwi1ta1ba42",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
Ya1kan4o4ra2ja1ya3tin3tiem4pu2ka3ku(3) a2tan3i3kan4ja143i1xa14a3ni1ke3e3 na2ja'1an1 na1nu14u(3) an4ta4u3ni2sa4ka3ku3tan3
tan3ña4kan4ban4ni1ka3chi2 an4ji'4in4ndi4,"Na4tu2ni1ya'1a(3) on4ba1xi(3) un4tan3ka3chi2 un4ji'4in4yu3ba4 2ndi4ko1to1,
na4nda14a3 ra2ki3xi3 ra2ndi4ña4ke4e13tan3ndu4xan3ku4u(4) 2ka3chi2 un4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4yu3ba4 2ndi4ku4nda3si4 ni42 ra1ji4ni2 ra1ya1ke4e13 na2tan3ndu4xan3 na2tan3sa3kan4xi4ta1ni1i4 2ka3chi2 un4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4ni3ki14xi3i4chi3ka1bi4 ra2sa3kan4".
Ya1kan4ni1ka3chi2,ni1ka3chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ta4u3ni2ña4kwa'1an1sa4ka3ku3kan4ndi4,"señora,¿tan3na4chu3ba42kwa'1an(1) on4ni1nu3mi4i4i4ndu'3u4si1si'4i2 yu1?
"Kwa'1an1 yu1ndi4chi3ñu3ni1xa'1an1nu14u(3) 2ndi4na1ki3xi(3) 2ndi4ña4nde3e4 ni42ndo'4o4ban4".
"Ndi4xi4ta1ni1i(4) an4tan3ke4e1(3) an4tan3ndu4xan(3) en4ya1kan4ba42,xa'1a4 e2kan4ba42kwa'1an1 yu1tan3ku3ni2 yu1na4ku14chun3ta'3an2ndu3ba'1a3i3ni2 an4ndi4su14u(3) an4ku3u2ban4kan4ndi4ña4
ku3xa3ban4",ni1ka3chi2 an4ji'4in4yu3ba4ña4,ña4si1si'4i2reykan4.
Ya1kan4ni1nda3a(3) en4kan4kwa'1an(1) en4tan3nu4u4ba3kwa'1an(1) en4kan4tan3ja143ka13ku3ba3ta1i4ta4,i3kan4ka4chi2,ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4
ka14na3chi3ñu3ko3o3bi4ta1yo'4o4ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ta1yo'4o4ndi4ta1,nda3ndu3ku4 2mi4i4ba42ku'1un1 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ba'1a3ndi4a1chi1ba42tan3ko14o3na1ji4ni2nda4a2ba42ki13xi3 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ndi1kun1tan3ku'1un1 ra1kwi1ta1 ra1",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.Ya1kan4ta1ni1ji1ta1ku4u4yu3ba(4) e4Jerónimokan4ki1bi4ni1ji1ta1 ra1.
Ki1bi4tan3ka4chi2reyso'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Na4ko3to(3) 2yo3o3ba42kwa'1an1ji'4in(4) un4"."señornda1xi4ko1na4ko3to(3) on4ndi4ta1yo'4o4,ya1kwa'1an1ji'4in(4) 2ndi4
ni1ke1e3si1si'4i2 un4ran3,ndu13xan(3) en4ran3xi4ta1ni1i(4) an4ran3,ya1kan4lu14u3 ni42i4in(4) a2kwa'1an1ji'4in4yu'1u1ya1kan4ndi4
yo'4o4ko3to(3) on4ndi4yo'4o4ni1ka'1yu1",ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ni1sa4na'1a(1) en4 ra2mantami4i4ni1ka'1yu1tan3ni1ya'1a3ba(3) en4kwa'1an(1) en4.Tan3ña1lu3u3ndi4ba143xa4ku(3) a2kan4ndi4ni1ndu3kwa1xin3ku4tu2(4) an4yu'3u4 a2tan3nu4mi3nda3a2 en4 e2kwa'1an(1) en4.
Ni1xa1a(1) en4tan3ni1chi3ndu'4u(4) an4 e2kan4,ya1kan3,ja'1a4tio'1o3tun4xi14nda4tan3
i3kan4,i3kan4ndo13ko3o(4) an4 e2kan4tan3kwa'1an1ba(3) en4tan3ja1ta(4) en4kwa'1an(1) en4tan3ni1ki3xa2a2ba3ndi3ka'3a3,ndi3ka'3a3kwa4an2ti4be4la2ni1ndi3ki'3in3 ri4 a2.
Ya1kan3,ka4chi2 ri4so'3o3ji'4in4se'1e3 ri4ndi4i4yo2u1bi1ta'4an2se'1e3ti4kan4i4yo2tan3i3kan4ka4chi2 ri4ji'4in4se'1e3 ri4ndi4,ya1kan3,
"Ta1yo'4o4ndi4ta1ni1xi1ta1ku4u4ta1yo'4o4,ta1yo'4o4ndi4ta1a3ko3ndo3ta1yo'4o4i3ta2an2i3sa42tan3nda'4bi2 ni42ka4a4 ra2ka4ndu'3u4 ra2ka1a3ni1ji1ta1 ra1ndi4ta1yo'4o4ndi4ta1ku'1un1ji'4in(4) o4ku4u4ta1yo'4o4".
"Ya1kan4ba42ndi4ta1yo'4o4ndi4ta1ku1nu'1u4ji'4in(4) o4ku4u4 ra2bi3tin3",ka4chi2ti4ndi3ka'3a3be4la2ji'4in4se'1e3 ri4.
"Tan3a1su3ba'1a3ku'1un1ba3 ra2ji'4in(4) un4ndi4,ya1kan3,ya3ni2 ndu1ko14o3tan3ba'1a3ndi4ta1a3ku4u4ta1ka1a3tan3ta1a3ku4u4ndu'1u1ya1kan4ndi4na4ndi3kwi3so3,ndi3ki'3in3ba(3) on4 ra3".
Ya1kan4kwa'1an1ba3 ra2ji'4in4ndi3ka'3a3be4la2kan4ndi4ndo3so4ti4kan4chi13chin4 ra2tan3xa'13nu3 ra2,sa14kwa'3nu3 ri4 ra2.
Ja1nda13ji1nu3i3in3xa'1un1kwi1ya1ta1kan4tan3ni1xa'1an1na1xi4ka3ku'1u1tan3na1kan4ku4u4 na2ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ndi4,ya1kan3,
"I3in3ta1lu3u3xi4ka3ji'4in4ndi3ka'3a3ndi4se'1e3i3in3reyku4u4 ra2ndi4la3tun4 ni42 ra1,su14u3i3in3ta1lu3u3ki3ni3ka4a4ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta1lu3u3la3tun4ku4u4 ra2tan3xi4ka3 ra2ji'4in4ndi3ka'3a3".
Tan3a3ma3ndi4ji'4in4xi1i4i4chi3 ra2ja'1an1nda3tu'4un4 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,i3in3ta1lu3u3xi4ka3ji'4in4ndi3ka'3a3,"Na4tu2sa3kan4ndi4
bi3tin3ndi4na4tu2ji13ni2ba'1a3 ndo4 ra2ndi4ka3ba4kan4ba42kwa'1an1 ra1tan3na4o4ra2i3ta2an2ndi4
juntako3o3i3ta2an2tan3tan42i4yo2na1ko3o3juntandi4na1ku'1un1ko3ndo3ndi'3i3 na2sa3kan4ndi4ni'1i(4) o4ka3ku'1un3ta1kan4na4tu2ndi3xa3ndi4ka3ba4xi4ka3 ra2ji'4in4ndi3ka'3a3".
"Ndi4ka3ba4ka'4nu3kan4i4yo2 ra1ji'4in4 ri4",nda4a(2) e2kan4ndi4ni1ki4tu3tan3ja143i1xa14a3xi1ka3chi3ñu3nu14u3na1ñu3u2tan3ja143i1xa14a3kwa'1an1 na1ja1ta4ta1lu3u3.
I3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4tan3i3kan4ka4chi2ndi3ka'3a3be4la2kan4so'3o3ndi4,ya1kan3,"An4ta1ba1xi3ndi3ki'3in3 ndo4ku4u4se'1e3 2tan3ndi4,ya1kan3,
ku'1un1ba3 ra2ji'4in(4) un4i3nda14 e2ndi4,ya1kan3,ku14ni2 yu1tan3kwa'1an1se'1e3 2tan3ku3u2 ra1ndi4kwa'1an1 ra1ndi4ta1kwa'1an1
a3sa3ma1ni(4) un4ku4u4 ra2ta1kwa'1an1xi3kwe4nda2 on4ku4u4 ra2tan3ku3xa3 ra2tan3kwa'3nu3 ra3,a1chi1ndi4ni1ndo'3o3 ni42 yu1ji'4in4se'1e3 2tan3xa'13nu3 ra3".
Ka4chi2ña1,ka4chi(2) a2ndi3ka'3a3be4la2kan4so'3o3ji'4in4xi1i4 ra2,a1chi1xi1i4ba3 ra2ku4u4ta1kan4su14u3nda4a2ta1ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4xi1i4 ra2,i3kan4ka4chi2ta1kan4so'3o3ndi4,
"Yu'1u1ndi4i4yo2i3in3si1si'4i2 yu1,i4yo2i3in3si1si'4i2 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,ja1kwa'1an1xu4xa(3) en4i4ndu'3u(4) an4nu14u(3) 2tan3
ta1ka1a3ku4u4ta1ku3ndu'4u4ji'4in(4) an4ya1kan4ba42ndi4ba143ki4ta(3) en4ka4i2tan3ni3ba14sa4xi4ka(3) en4ndi4ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1ku3ndu'4u4ji'4in(4) an4",ni1ka3chi2ba3xi1i4 ra2so'3o3.
Ya1kan4nda13ki'3in3 na2,nda13ki'3in3 na2ta1kan4tan3kwa'1an1ta1kan4tan3kwa'1an1tu3ndi3ka'3a3ji'4in4ba3 ra2ndi4ku3ni2 ri4ndi4ja1bi3ko4ko3o3xa'1a4ta1kan4ji'4in4,ji'4in4si'3i4 ra3.
Su3u3nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4si'3i4 ra2ban4kan4tan3,tan3ni1ji1ta1 ra1ki1bi4ji1ta1 ra1tan3i3kan4i1xa14a3nda13ki'3in3 na2ta1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1ja143ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4ja143i1xa14a3i4yo2bi3ko4xa'1a4 ra2tin3.
Bi3ko4kan4i4yo2tin3ndi'13i3xi1yo3bi3ko4ndi'13i3tin3ja143i1xa14a3ni1ndi3ki'3in3,nda13ki'3in3na1kan4 ra2kwa'1an1nu14u3is1to3mi4i4ba42ka4ndu'3u4,i4yo2is1to3si'3i4 ra2tin3.
Nda4a(2) e2kan4ndi4nda13ndi3ko4tu3ku3ba3ta1ja4chiu4un4nu14u3 na2kan4ta1ko4ndo3yu3ba4 ra2ndi4nda13ndi3ko4ta1kan4tan3ndo13ni'3i3ti4ta1kan4yu3bi4nu14u3is1to3tan3i3kan4chi13ka2 ra1navajatan3
tan42tiem4pu2ni1xa1a1ta1i4ta4ka3ndu'4u4 ra2tan3ta'1nu1ba3navajaxa'1a4i3ki4ndi1ka3 ra2ya1kan4ni1xi'1i1ta1kan4tiem4pu2.
Xa1i4yo2u1bi1ki1bi4ba42ka4ndi3ka2ta1kan4na3ma2ndu1xin1 ra1tan3
ni1xa1a1tu3ku3,ya1kan3,ti4ndi3ka'3a3ka4chi2 ri4so'3o3ndi4,"Ya1kan3,tan3nda4a2ba42kwa'1an1se'1e3 2ndi4ko14o3 ra2i4yo2ndi4ni1xa14ni2 yu1ndi4ta1ni1xi'1i1ku4u4 ra2tu4u(2) i2ya1kan4ba1xi3 2ja1ta4 ra3".
"Ya1ndi3xa3ku4u4ba(3) e2ndi4xa13ni2ndi4nda14ku2 ni42ni1ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ta1kan4ndi4ta1ni1xi'1i1ku4u4ba3ta1kan4ki1bi4ni1xi'1i1 ra1tan3bi3tin3ndi4
xa1ki1bi4u1ni1ba42tin3"."An4sa3kan4ba3na4,na4ku'1un(1) o4tan3ku3ni2 yu1sa1a3ka4a4mi4i4kwa'1an1se'1e3 2".
Ni1xa1a1ti4ndi3ka'3a3kan4tan3ni14ju3nda3tu3 ri4ndi4ndi1kun1ni1xi14ta3 ri4yu1u4tan3sa14kwa3chi3 ri4na3ma2tan3xi14ta3 ri4cajaba1xi3 ra3.
Ji'4in(4) a2i4ya14kun2ji'4in(4) a2i4ya14kun2 ri4 ra2ku4u4sa3kan4tan3ndu13bi1xin1 ra1tan3ni1ki3xa2a2ba3ti4ndi3ka'3a3kwi4in2ba'1a3kan4tan3
ti4kan4ku4u4ti4ni1ya14kun2 ri4 ra2nda13xi3ko'4ni3 ri4 ra2ni1ya14kun2 ri4 ra2nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2yo1ko4 ri4 ra2i4ya14kun2 ri4tan3nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2yo1ko4 ri4 ra2ku4u4tan3
sa3kan4ku4u4ja143ni1ndu3ta'3an2ba3ya4a24ti4kan4ndi4ka4ndi3ka2navajata'1nu1xa'1a4i3ki4ndi1ka3 ra2i3kan4ka4chi2 ri4so'3o3ndi4,"Ta1yo'4o4ndi4
su14u3ta1ni4xi'1i1mi3i4ku4u4ta1yo'4o4ndi4ta1ja'13ni4 na2ku4u4ta1yo'4o4ndi4yo'4o4ka4ndi3ka2ya1ko4ndo3ya1ja'13ni4ña'3a4".
Ya1kan4si14ki'1bi3ndi3ka'3a3kan4chi4in24 ri4tan3ni1tu'3un3 ri4navajai3ki4ndi1ka3 ra2tan3xa'1an1nda'3a4 ri4lomu ri4tan3xi14ta3 ri4se4u2tan3ka13xa'4ni3 ri4 a2mi4i4ta'1nda1.
Tan3i3kan4ja143ni1ya14kun2 ri4 ra2ja143ni1nda3ta3ku2 ra1i3kan4ka4chi2,ka4chi2ti4ndi3ka'3a3ti4sa14kwa'3nu3ña'3a4so'3o3ndi4,ya1kan3,
"Ba'1a3ndi4ko13chun3ku3ma4ri2 yu1yo'4o4ji'4in4,ya1kan3,se'1e3 2tan3bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,ña4yo'4o4ku4u4siu'4un4ta1yo'4o4tan3ndo'4o1ndi4ji14ni2 ndo4ya1kan4ba42ndi4
bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,ta1ku'1un1ku4u4ba3se'1e3 2ji'4in(4) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,ndo'4o1ndi4ni14ku3ni2 ndo4ku3ni'3i3 ndo4se'1e3 2xo3kwe4nda2 ndo4 ra2ndi4xa'13ni4 ndo4 ra2tan3
ya1kan4ndi4ta1ku'1un1ku4u4ba3ta1yo'4o4".Ya1kan4ba42ndi4tiem4pu2ni1ndo3ni'3i3yu3ba(4) e4Jerónimokan4xa'1a4 ra2sa1ta4ndi3ka'3a3kan4tan3ni1ki4tu(3) a2yu14bi4ki1bi4ni1ki4tu(3) a2ya1kan4ndi4ni1ki3ji3ndo1o3 ra2ku4u4 ra2milagru.
Na4tu2na1kwa4chi3i4ta4ku'4u2 na1nu14u(3) e4xa4ku3 ni42 na1,
i4yo2ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1ya3tin3ka4chi2 na1an4ko14o3,ya1kan3,ya3tin3xi4ka3ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1ya1kan4ndi4xa4ku3 ni42 na1nda1ndu3bi4ba42nda1ñu3u42xa4ku3 na2tan3
i3kan4ndu3ku(4) e4i3in3kan3to4ri2ku'1un1tan3sa3kan4ndi4nda3tu2un2 ra1candelanu14u3ta1kan4ka'1an1 ra1xa'1a4na1ba4li4ndi4i3nga2xi4ña4na4ku'1un1ta3se'4e2ta1kan4ti4ko4ndo3ñu3u2nda4ku3 na2.
Sa3kan4ba42ndi4ku3xa3 ri4kwa'3nu3 ri4ka4chi2 na1a1chi1ndi4,ya1kan3,ti4kan4ku4u4ti4i4yo2ya3tin3ya1kan4ndi4xa4ku3 ni42na1i4ta4na4tu2xa143xa4ku3 na2ka4chi2na1ta4u3ni2nda4tu'4un4 na2ja'1a4ta1kan4tan3ya1kan4ku4u4ndi'3i3ka1ba(3) e2ndi4kwa'1a4 ni42 na1ndi4kun2 na1yu3ba(4) e4Jerónimo.
Kwa'1a4 ni42na1ta4u3ni2ndi4kun2 na1ta1kan4a1chi1ndi4,na4chu3ba42ndi4kun2 na1 ra1,milagru ni42ku4u4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,na1kwa4chi3xa4ku3tan3kwa'1an1candelaxa'1a4na1kan4ko3ko3 run4tan3
ki14tu3,kwa3a4 na2tan3ki14tu3 na2ndi4ja1na1ba143xa4ku3ka1ku4u4 na2ndi4ja1nda13ki'3in3 na2yu1ma'4na1ti4ja1kwa'1an1ka4xi3yo3ku4u4ba3ti4kan4,ya1kan4ku4u4historiatan3ni1ndi'3i(3) a3.
Ta1Jerónimokan4ku4u4ta1ko4ndo3patrónñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1na4ka3chi2 o4ran4.
Ta1kan4ko4ndo3patrónko4ndo3ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1ran4,ta1kan4ku4u4mi3i4ta1ji'4in4,ji'4in4cuentaa1chi1ndi4ta1kan4ku4u4ta1,
ta1ni1sa4kwa'3nu3 ri4ran4,ti4sa14kwa'3nu3bi4ku4u4 ri4 ra2ya1kan4ndi4ni1ki3ji3ndo1o3 ra2ku4u4 ra2milagruran4.
A1be3,ta1kan4ndi4kwi3i3nda3ka3ni2mi3i(4) o4kwen4tu2 e4ji'4in4ba3ta1kan4na4tu2se'1e(3) o4xa4ku(3) a2xa1a(1) e4tan3nda3tu2un(2) e4ñu'3u2nu14u3ta1kan4tan3ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4ba3ta1kan4ndi4
tan42historiaka1a3ndi4ya1i1xa14a3ni1ki3xi(3) a2sa3kan4ba42tan3sa3kan4ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4ba3ta1kan4.
Ko14o3i3in3ta1ndu3ku4bi(4) o4ka'1an(1) e4xa'1a4ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4sa3kan4ka4xi3ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4ta1kan4xa'1a4se'1e(3) o4na4se'1e(3) o4ba42a1chi1ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1xa4ku3ba42ran4,ta1kan4ku4u4milagruran4.

FernandoNiñoLeonardo.

¿Sa1a3na3ni4ñu3u2 un4?
Yoloxóchitl.
Na4nda3tu'4un(4) 2i3in3kwen4tu2xa'1a4yu3ba(4) e4SanAntoniuji'4in4 ndo4ndi4i3in3ta1nda'4bi2,nda'4bi2ku4u4 ra2tan3
kwa'1an1 ra1ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4yu3ba(4) e4SanAntoniundi4xi4kan1 ra1ya1ku3ta3ku2 ra1xi4kan1 ra1nu1ni4 ra2,xi4kan1 ra1ndu3chi4 ra2,xi4kan1 ra1ji1ndi1ki4ja1na1 ra1,xi4kan1 ra1ki3ti4ja1na1 ra1,kwa4yu2ku4u4 ri4burruku4u4 ri4xi4kan1 ra1ki3ni2ku4u4 ri4ka'4an2 ra1xa'1a4.
Tan3yu3ba(4) e4SanAntoniundi4ba143xi4in4ta1kan4ku'1un1 ra1ka'1an1ta1kan4ku'1un1yu3ba(4) e4kan4ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4yu3ba(4) e4Jesúsxa'1a4 ra2kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ja1xi4ni2ta1kan4ndi4kwe'1e1 ra1,ya1kan4ku14ni2ta1kan4.
Tan3ni1ndi'1i3i3ni2yu3ba(4) e4SanAntoniundi4i3ta2an2i3ta2an2,i3ta2an2i3ta2an2ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4tan3ya1kan4ba42ndi4ke13e3ta1kan4ja'1an1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4yu3ba(4) e4Jesús.
xa'1a4,ya1kan3,ta1nda'4bi2kan4ndi4xi4kan1 ra1ña'1a3 ra2,tan3ña'1a3kan4ndi4
ki1bi4ni1ka3chi2yu3ba(4) e4Jesúsji'4in4SanAntoniundi4,"Na4tu2ko3nde3e4i3ni2 un4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,
xi'3na3mi3i(4) un4ku'1un1sa3kan4ndi4ku3ni2 un4sa1a3a3sa3 ra2ji'4in(4) un4tan3sa3kan4ndi4
ya1kan3,sa3kan4ku3ni'3i3 ra2na1yu4bi24tan3na4tu2ba'1a3ku3ni'3i3 ra2yo'4o1un4sa3kan4ba'1a3ku3ni'3i3 ra2tan3na4tu2ba143ba'1a3ni4ju3ni'3i3 ra2yo'4o1ndi4nda1sa3kan4a3sa3 ra2ji'4in4na1yu4bi24",ni1ka3chi2yu3ba(4) e4ji'4in4 ra3.
Ya1kan4ndi4ta1ni1xi1kan1 ra(1) e1nu14u3ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4kan4ndi4nda13ndo3o3ta1kan4i3in3ta1ta4u3ni2.
Tan3ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1nu14u3ta1kan4ndi4ja1ni1i1xa14a3kwa'1an1xa4ko1o3ña'1a3 ra2ku13bi4ka3 ra2tan3
ja143ni1xa1a1 ra1nu14u3ta1kan4su3xe'1e1ba3SanAntoniuni1ti3in3 ra2tan3ki13ta'4ni3 ra(2) e2ke'3e2kan4ba3ndi4chi(2) a2ndi4na4ku3nda3tu(3) a2na4ndi'3i3ku3xi3 ra2sa3kan4ndi4ku3xi(3) a3.
Ba'1a3ta1kan4ndi4ko13nde3e4i3ni2ba3ta1kan4ndi4ju13ndi3chi2ba3ta1kan4ju13nda3tu3 ra2tan3i3kan4
ni1ndi'3i3xi13xi3 ra2sa3kan4ndi4ni1nda3ka1ya(1) e1xi13xi3 ra2kan4sa3kan4ndi4ta13xi3 ra(2) e2ku3xi3ta1kan4.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3tu3ku3 ra2ja'1an1 ra1nu14u3yu3ba(4) e4Jesúsndi4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
"Ya1kan3,mas4tru2ndi4ya1,ni1ki3ta3 ni4(2) a2ni1ka'1an(1) on4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ta1yo'4o4ndi4ta1kwe'1e1ku4u4ba3 ra2ndi4ba14sa4ni4ju3ni'3i3ba'1a3 ra2yu'1u1ndi4so'3o3i13xa3 ra2ji'4in(4) 2".A4su3a1su3 a2kan4ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ji'3na3mi3i(4) un4ku'1un1sa3kan4ndi4ku3ni2 un4ndi4sa3kan4ndi'3i3ku'1un1 ra1ji'4in4ndi3se'1e3ndi3sa1na1ki1bi4ki'3in(3) a2ku'1un1".
"Tan3ndi4,ya1kan3,bi3tin3ndi4ja1ni1xa1a1 ra(1) e1bi4ka3 ra2i4yo2ña'1a3 ra2i4yo2".
"Nda143ni3na3na1ba'1a3ta'4an4ba3 ra2ndi13kwi3so3 ra2na1kan4ku4u4na1ni4nu3ndu4ko1nde3e3ji'4in4 ra2nu14u3mesana1kan4ku4u4na1ba'1a3xi4xi3ji'4in4 ra2na1kan4ku4u4na1ba'1a3ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4tan3
na1nda'4bi2na1ko14o(3) a2ji'4in4ndi4ku14ni2ko3to3 ra2na1kan4ya1kan4ndi4
ta1nu3u3ku4u4ba3yu'1u1ki1bi4ku'1un(1) i1sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ndi4ndi'3i(3) a2nu14u3 ra2a1chi1ndi4ba143ba'1a3i3ni2 ra1na1ba'1a3ánimana1kan4ku4u4na1,
ndo1o3 a2ji'4in4tan3na1ba143ba'1a3i3ni2sa3kan4ndi4na4nda3ndi3ko4 na2xa'1a4 e2ko3ndo'3o3 na2tan42yo4o4,tan42na1nda'4bi2ta'4an(4) e4ndo'4o4 na2ndi4sa3kan4ko3ndo'3o3tu3ta1kan4ba3,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ya1kan4ndi4nda13ji1nu3ba3i3in3kwi1ya1nda13ji1nu3u1bi1kwi1ya1ndi4ja1bi4ka3 ni42 ra1ndi4lu14u3ña'1a3 ra2i4yo2ni3ba143ka4a4ndi'3i3ka(1) e1ndi4lu14u(3) a3.
I3kan4ni1ki3xi3yu3ba(4) e4Jesústan3ka4chi2 ra1xi4ka3nde'14e4 ra2be'3e3ta1kan4ndi4mi3i4,mi3i4ku3ndu'4u4 ra2ku3xi3 ra2tan3ni1xa1a1ta1kan4.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,ya1kan3,"Ndo'4o1na1ndi4ta3nda4a2ndi4ti3in3 ndo4nda'3a4ta1be4lu2ya3ta4ña1a4na4ki3ta3 ra2ku'1un1 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ko14o3chiu3un3ko3ndo3na1be4lu2ya3ta4ki3xa2a2 na1nu14u(3) 2yu'1u1ndi4na1reyba'1a3ku4u4na1nde4e4xi4xi3ji'4in(4) 2tan3ki13xa2a2tu3ta1ki3ni3ka4a4ndi4na4ku'1un1 ra1ke'3e2ña1a4".
Ña1a4ni1ti3in3 na2nda'3a4yu3ba(4) e4tan3ni1ki3ta'4ni3 na2 ra1ka4i2,ni1ki3ta'4ni3 na2 ra1ka4i2ña1a4tin3tan3i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,
"Yo'4o4ku3nda3tu(3) un4sa3kan4ndi4na4ndi'3i3ku3xi3 ra2sa3kan4ndi4,sa3kan4ndi4ya'1a(3) on4ku3xi(3) un4chi2ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4 ndu2ya1kan4ba42ndi4ya1kan4ba42i4xa3 ndu2ji'4in(4) un4".
"Ya1kan3,ba'1a3ba3ndi4,ya1kan3,na4ku3nda3tu(3) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,ndo'4o1ndi4ko14o(3) a2ji4ni2i4chi3bi4ndo'4o1na1ndo'4o4ku4u4ndo'4o1ta1ña1a4ku4u4mi3i4ta1ko4ndo3ta1a3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ndi4ta4u3ni2 lu3 ra2ka4tu3un3i3tun4i4ndu'3u4ki13ta3 ra2yu'3u4ye'14e4i4ndu'3u4 ra3.
I3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2ña4,ña4ko4ndo3ña4ja4chiu4un4nu14u3 na2ña1a4ndi4i3kan4ka4chi2 an4ndi4,"Ya1yo'4o4ba42ti'13bi4reyba1xi3ku3xi(3) un4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ya1yo'4o4ba42ni1ka'1an1 ra1xa'1a(4) on4ku3xi(3) un4",ya1kan4nda13ka3ya2 en4kan4,ndi4su14u3ya1ni4ki1ta3chi4ñu3bi4ba42kan4ndi4ya1ni1ndo1o3ndo3so4yu'3u4 na2kan4ba3ba42ni1nda3ka3ya2 en4ndi4nda13ka3ya2 en4ku3ñu2ndu3xi4ba3nda13ka3ya2 en4ku3ñu2ji1ndi1ki4ba3nda13ka3ya2 en4ku3ñu2ki3ni2ba3.
Ya1kan3,ta13xi3kwa'4a(4) en4nu14u3is1ta4tan3kwa'1an(1) e1ku3xi3ta1i4ndu'3u4ke'3e2,ya1kan4ni1xa1a1,ni1xa1a(1) en4kan4tan3i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,
"Yo'4o1ndi4ko14o(3) a2ji4ni2bi4yo'4o1ndi4,ya1kan3,ña4ja4chiu4un4nu14u3ba3 ra2ku4u4yo'4o1ta1ña1a4ku4u4ta1ko4ndo3ta1a3".
"Tan3bi3tin3ku3ni2 un4ndi4ya1yo'4o4ndi4su14u3ja14(3) e2ndi4ku4ni2ku3xi3 ni42bi4yu'1u1ba1xi3 2,ya1kan3,nu14u3 ndo4ndi4,ya1kan3,
xa'1a4se'1e3ndi3sa1na1ba3yu'1u1ni1nu3u(3) 2ba1xi3 2,ba143ba'1a3i4xa3 ra2ji'4in4 na2i4xa3ja13ni1ku3 ni42 ra1ji'4in4 na2ba'14a4ánima ra1ya1kan4ndi4xa'1a4 e2kan4ba42ni1nu3u3yu'1u1ba1xi3 2ñu'3u4yu14bi4tan3
tan3bi3tin3ndi4yo'4o4ku3ni2 un4ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1ku4u4ya1ta13xi(3) un4nda'3a4 2ndi4su14u(3) a2ku3xi(3) 2ba42ndi4ya1ku3xi3ndi3se'1e3ndi3sa1na1 yu1ba42ki1bi4ki'3in(3) a2ku'1un1na1kan4ku4u4na1ko3o3ma1ni4ji'4in(4) a2yo'4o4",ni1ka3chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ya1kan4nda13ka'1nu1ti4 ra2is1ta4kan4tan3ku1mi4chi4chi3sa14ñu'4u4 ra(2) e2tan3
ni1nda3ka1nda(1) e1kan4kwa'1an(1) e1ndi4ja1ya3kwin4ku4u4ti4kan4kwa'1an1 ri4ndi1ku1nda42,ya1kan4ni1ki'1bi(3) an4kan4kwa'1an(1) en4nda13tu'4un(4) an4ji'4in4ta1bi4ka3ndi4ji14ni2 o4yo3o3ta1ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4ya1kwa'1an1ku3xi3 ra2ndi4ni14xi3xi3 ra(2) e2ndi4
ki3ti4nda13ndo3o(3) a2tan3nda13ka1nda(1) e1kwa'1an(1) e1ka4chi2 an4,xi4nu(3) an4ja'1an(1) en4ja'1an1ka'1an(1) en4ji'4in4ta1bi4ka3.
Nda4a(2) e2kan4ndi4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Kwa'4an2 ndo4ja1ta4 ra2ndi3ki'3in3 ndo4 ra2na4ki3xi3 ra2ndi4ba3ta1kan4ku4u4mi3i4yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2tan3ni14ji3ni2 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,
nda4a2ni3na3na1si4ki4ku4u4ndi'3i3 na2ka4chi2ka'4an(4) 2tan3ta1kan4ndi4ta1ba'1a3 ni42ku4u4ta1kan4na4tu2is1ta4ba42tan3nda13ka1nda(1) e1kwa'1an(1) e1".
Ya1kan4is1ta4ko4ndo3te'1e4ja1ta4ya3kwin4ka4chi2 na1nda4tu'4un4 na2xa'1a4ta1,ta1xi'4nda24kan4.
Ya1kan4mañasa3kan4ji'4in4mañasa3kan4tan3ni1nu3u3ta1kan4ndi4ta1nda13ndi3ko4ja13chiu4un4ku4u4ta1kan4ta1nda13ndi3ko4ni1ka'1an1nda'4bi2ji'4in4na1yu4bi24ku4u4ta1kan4ki1bi4ni1nu3u3 ra3.
Ni14xa1a1ka1 ra(1) e1ko3o3 ra2ko3ndo3 ra2ta1bi4ka3ndi4ni1nu3u3 ra2ndi4ánima ra1ba143ba'1a3.
Ya1kan4ba42ndi4yu3ba(4) e4SanAntoniundi4ta1kan4ndi4
ko13nde3e4i3ni2ba3ta1kan4ndi4ko14o(3) a2ni4i3xa3bi4ta1kan4ndi4kan4ndi4,ta1ni1xi1ka3xi1kan1ku4u4mi3i4ba3ta1kan4xa'1a4ta1kan4a1chi1ndi4ta1nda'4bi2ka'4an2tu3ku4u4ta1kan4ba3ji'4in4yu3ba(4) e4tan3
mi4i4ni1ndi'1i3i3ni2yu3ba(4) e4Jesústan3ta13xi3ba3 ra(2) e2tan3ndi4,ndi4ba143ni4ju3ni'3i3ba'1a3ba3 ra2na1yu4bi24ndi4ni3na(3) e2chi1tun3ndi'3i3,a1su3mi3i4ta1kan4ni1nu3u3 ra2tan3
xa'1nu1 ra(1) e1nu14u3ta1kan4tan3i3kan4ni1ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ran4.

¿Sa1a3na3ni4ñu3u2 un4?

Kwen4tu2xa'1a4yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2sa1a3ni1ku3u3tan3ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1ñu'3u4yu14bi4ka1a3ya1kan4ba42nda3tu'4un(4) 2.
Ndi4,ya1kan3,si'3i(4) o4Maríandi4ña4kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,i1ta3ka4ndi3ka2 en4kan4tan3ni1ta3ni3i3in3i3ta2.
I3ta2is1tin4ko14chi4ka4chi2 na1ji'4in(4) a2ya1kan4ta13ni3tan3ya1kan4nda13ki'3in(3) an4kan4tan3ta'13ni(3) an4 e3.
Tan3i3ta2kan4ndi4su14u3ya1i3ta2ni4ta3ni3mi3i4ba42kan4ndi4
yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2ku4u4ta1ti'13bi4 ra2se'1e3 ra2ba1xi3 ra2kan4ñu'3u4yu14bi4ji3ndo1o3 ra2so3kwe4nda2 ra1.
Tan3ya1kan4ba42o4ra2ni1ta'3ni(3) an4kan4i3ta2tin3tan3nda13ji1nu3i3in3yo1o4nda13ji1nu3u1bi1yo1o4tin3nda13ji1nu3u1ni1yo1o4tin3nda13ji1nu3ku1mi4yo1o4tan3ni1ka1nda1ba3yu3ba(4) e4ti1xin(3) an4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ta1ku1kwen4tu2nu14u3na1na'14a1ndi4ka4chi2 na1ndi4,ya1kan3,ni1tu1u3ta1na'14a1ñu'3u4yu14bi4ndi4
ya1kan3,ya1ka4nda1ta1kan4tan3nda1ñu'3u4ni'4i13,ya1kan4ba42xa13ko1o3 a2ka4chi2 o4ndi4ta4an13ka4nda1ñu'3u4.
Tan3ki1bi4ni1ka1ku3ta1kan4ndi4bi3tin3ndi4ja1ni1ki3xa2a2ta1,ta1na'14a1ndi4ta1kan4ndi4
ni1ka3ku3 ra2kan4ndi4nde3e4 ni42ku4u4ña1yu14bi4ka4chi2na1na'14a1nda4tu'4un4 na2kwen4tu2ji'4in4ta'4an4 na3.
Tan3bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,ku'1un(1) o4ja1ta4ba3 ra2sa3kan4ndi4nda3ndu3ku(4) e4 ra3,i3kan4xi1ka3 na2nda13ka1tu'4un4 na2tan3ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ndi4si'3i(4) o4ña4Maríandi4ña4kan4ndi4
ya1kan3,na1na3ni4Maríandi4i3nda14na1na3ni4Maríaku4u4 na2ndi4so3 na2yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2ta1ko4ndo3ta1na'14a1ni1tu1u3ka4chi2 na1so'3o3,ndi4yo4o4ndi4yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2ka4chi2 o4ji'4in4 ra2tan3na1kan4ndi4ta1na'14a1ku4u4 ra2nu14u3na1kan4.
Ya1kan3,ni1ji3ndo1o3 na2ndi4tan42i4yo2na1na3ni4Maríata13xi3 na2i3in3juntatan3xa143
xa13ku'1un3na1na3ni4Maríaxi'4i1 na1,tan42i3in3 na2tan3xi'4i1 na1tan42i3in3 na2tan3xi'4i1 na1.
Ya1kan3,tan3a1su3mi3i4yu3ba(4) e4ku4u4ta1ni14xa'1a3 ra2ndi4kwa'1a4 ni42na1nda'4bi2xi'4i1tan3,ya1kan3,su14u3ndi3sa3a4bi4 na2i4yo2kwa1chi3ndi4nda'4bi3ba3 na2ku4u4 na2,na1ko4ndo3na1ka'4an2na1kan4xa'1a4.
Ya1kan4ni1ka3chi2 na1,"Bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,ko14o(3) a2nde3e4ku4u4bi4 a2ndi4,ni1ka3chi2i3in3ta1na'14a1ta1,ta1xu13xa3ndi4na4,
na4ndo3ko3o(4) e4 ya2tin3ndi4ku14u2ka1na1si'4i2ndi4bi3tin3ndi4na1kwa4chi3i4ta4se'1e3 na2na3ni4Maríana1kan4ku4u4na1ku3u2".
"Sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ndi4ki'3in(3) o4nu14u(3) a2ku'1un(1) o4ji'4in(4) a2ndi4ya1sa3kan4ka4a4ndi4ta1ndi'3i3xa'1a4ku4u4ba3ta1na'14a1",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
Xa143,xa143xa1,ta13xi3 na2juntatan3ja143i1xa14a3,i3kan4xa143nda4tu'4un4 na2kwen4tu2ndi4
bi3tin3ndi4na1kwa4chi3na1ndi4so3na1Maríandi4na1ku3u2ko3ndo3ndi'3i3 na2sa3kan4ndi4i3kan4ba42ku3ni2 o4mi4i4ka4ndi3ka2ta1na'14a1ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
Ya1kan4,xa143ndi4ya'4a13 na2ndo4ni'3i3 na2tio1to1nu14u(3) a2ba4li4tan3ki4tu'14un4tan3ki4tu'14un4su1kun4 a2ki4tu'14un4tan3ki4tu'14un4su1kun4 a2a1chi1ndi4na1ku4ni2ku3ni2ku4u4 na2mi4i4ka4ndi3ka2ta1na'14a1.
Nda4a(2) e2ba42ndi4sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ndi4chi2ba3si'3i(4) o4tan3ndi4so(3) an4ta1yu3ba(4) e4kan4tan3ja143ni1xa1a1 na1ndo13ni'3i3 na2ya1ko4ndo3rebozosa4si2nu14u3 ra2ndi4so(3) an4 ra2,
su3a3ma3ndi4su14u3,su14u3ta1a3ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4i3ta2rosaba42kan4ka4ndi3ka(2) e2nu14u3tio1to(1) an4tan3
tan3nu4mi3nda3a2 en4 e2ndi4chi2 an4ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"Yu'1u1ndi4su14u3se'1e3bi4yu'1u1ndi4so(3) 2ndi4i3ta2ba3ba42ndu13ku4yu'1u1ni'4i(4) 2ndi4i4yo2mi4i4kwa'1an1 yu1ya1kan4ndi4ndu13ku4 a2tan3ya1kan4ba42ndi4ya1yo'4o4ba42ni'4i(4) 2".
Ndi4ja1i3ta2rosanda13ndo3o3ta1kan4ka4ndi3ka2 ra1nu14u3tio1to1si'3i4 ra2,ya1kan4ndi4ni1ka1ku3ba3ta1kan4ni14xi'1i1ta1kan4.
Tan42i4yo2ba3na1ba4li4na1se'1e3Maríandi4ni1xi'1i1ndi'3i3ba3na1kan4a1chi1ndi4,ndi4ja1i3nga2Maríaku4u4na1kan4tan3ña4ko4ndo3si'3i4 ra2ndi4ni1ka1ku3tu(3) an4kan4ba3ni3ña4kan4ni14xi'1i1.
I3kan4ja143kwa'1an1ni1ku3ba'1a3 ra2xi4ka3 ra2tan3i3kan4nda4ka3ya2 ra1na1ba4li4se'1e3 a2na'14a1kan4ndi4ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in(4) a2ndi4na4,
na4sa4kwa'3a(3) e2ndi4ta1kan4ndi4ji4ni2 ra1ya1kwi3i3ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) a2tan3sa4kwa'3a(3) e3.
Ya1kan4ndi4o4ra2na4ka'4bi3 ra2siu'14un4nu14u(3) a2tan3i3nda14siu'14un4ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in(4) a2tan3
i3in3tan42ba1xi3ta1chi4ba1xi3 a2xi'4i1ndi'3i(3) a2ba4li4na'14a1ku4na3a4 e2nde4e(4) a2a1chi1ndi4ku14ni2ko3to(3) a2siu'14un4.
Ya1kan4ndi4ta1ba'14a4ku4u4ba3ta1kan4nu14u3 na2,sa3kan4ni3ku4u4,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,
ja1yo'4o4kwa'1an1tiem4pu2tan3ko14o3ndo'4o1na1kwi4i4ku3ni3 ndo4ndi4,ya1kan3,ni3na3na1i4xa3yu4u4ji1ni4ku4u4 ndo4tan3bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,
ndo1o3ba3 ndo4ji'4in(4) a2tan3sa3kan4ndi4yu'1u1ndi4ki3ta3yu'1u1ku'1un(1) i1ndi4ta1i4yo2mi4i4ku'1un1ba3ku4u4yu'1u1,i3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1tan3
ni1xa1a1 ra1nu14u3ta1xi4ka3ja4chiu4un4,ta1ja4chiu4un4kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4yo'4o1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ya1kan3,nda4a(2) e2ba42ko3o3ka1a3ja4i3ni2 un4ya1kan4ndi4ja4chiu4un(4) un4,ni1ka3chi2ba3ta1xu4xan3ndi4
yo'4o4ndi4ndo3o3yu1u4ko3o3ka1a3ndo3o3i3tun4kwi3ta3ka1a3nda143kwi4in2ti4ku'1un1nu14u3ndi3ka'3a3ko3nde3e3 ri4nda'3a4tun4ka1a3ni1ka3chi2 ra1,ta1ni1xi1kan(1) e1ba'14a4kan4ndi4ya1ba'14a4kan4ni1xa1a1ba3ta1kan4.
Tan3ta1ka4ndi3ka2ja4chiu4un4mi4i4ni1ya'1a3tu3ku3 ra2tan3ka'4an2ta1kan4ndi4,"Yo'4o4ndi4
yo'4o4ndi4ndi3sa4ku4u4nu14u(3) a2ta3ta2ko3o3yo'4o4ku4ni2 yu1ndi4ko3o3chi3ta2ko3o3,ya1kan3,ndo1o4ka3xi4 2ko3o3
ya1kan3,tun4la4xa2ko3o3yo'4o4ndi4ndi3sa4ku4u4nu14u3tun4ta3ta2chi'3i(3) 2yo'4o4ya1kan4ba42ndi4ya1kan4ba42ja4chiu4un(4) 2","an4sa3kan4ba3,ba'1a3tu3ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1kan4ba42ku4ni2 un4".
Tan3na1na'14a1ndi4na1ja1ya3tin3sa4ka2ndi4kun2ku4u4 na2ja1ta4yu3ba(4) e4ndi4sa1ta4ta1kan4kwa'1an1ti4 ra2tan3ja1ni1ndo1o3ba3tun4chi3ta2ndi4nda143ndi13kwi3ko4ti4tun4kan4chi4chi13chi3ta2.
I3kan4,ya1chi3ta2kan4ka1ba42ki4xa2a(2) e2na'14a1nu14u3ta1ja4chiu4un4kan4tan3ka'4an(2) e2ndi4na4kwi14i3na4sa4kwa'1a3 ra(2) e2ma1ni4na4,
ka3xi4 lu3 na2chi3ta2ndi4i4so3ko2 ni42 na1xi4ka3 na2ja1ta4ta1na'14a1tan3ba143kwi4i4ka3ku'1un3 ra3.
Ya1kan4,ya1kan4kwe4e2na1kan4ji'4in4la4xa2tu4nda13a2ja4xi24 na2chi3ta2ja4xi24 na2ku4u4tan3yu3ba(4) e4ndi4ta1ja1kwa'1an1 ni42ku4u4ba3ta1kan4,ni1xa1a1 ra1i3in3yu3bi2,
yu3bi2kan4i4ndu'3u4sa'3ba2,tan3i3kan4ka4chi2,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4sa'3ba2ndi4,"Yo'4o1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ya1a3sa(3) on4ya1ma1ni4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4na4ba1xi3na1ba1xi3ja1ta4 2tan3ko1to1kwa'14a1(3) on4ya'1a3nu4mi24 na2ndi4nda3ndu3ku4ta'3an2 on4mañaji'4in4 na2,
nda3ba(3) on4ka1a3a3sa3ndi4ku4nu1 ni42ka3chi2 un4ji'4in4 na2na4kwe3e2 na1tan3yu'1u1ndi4nda1bi4i4ka1kwa'1an1ka1 yu1",ni1ka3chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4sa'3ba2.
"Ba'1a3na4sa3kan4ndi4ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1ko4ndo3ya1ka'4an2 on4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ya1ko3ndo3ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4".
Ya1kan4ni3ba42ka'4an2 ra1ni1ki3ta3 ra2i3nga2yu3bi2,yu'3u4yu3bi2i3nga2ta'4bi4kwa'1an1 ra1tan3,tan3ni1ki3xa2a2ba3na1na'14a1i3kan4ka4chi2,ka4chi(2) a2sa'3ba2ji'4in4 na2ndi4,
"amigundi4,ya1kan3,ndo'4o1ndi4ba1xi3 ndo4tan3ndi4ta1kwi42yo'4o4ndi4ji14ni2 o4na4ko3chun3 ndo4ya'1a3 ndo4ndi4ku4nu1 ni42ta1kwi42yo'4o4na4ku'1un(1) i1tan3ku3ni2 ndo4ndi4,ya1kan3,ko3to3 ndo4na4ku'1un(1) i1".
Ka'4an2 e4sa3kan4tan3ka13ndi3ta3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4tan3nda13ba3 ri4ndi4,ji4ni2yo'4o1ta1kwi42si'14bi3yo1o4ndi4ya4xin4ba3ka4ndi3ka2ta4kan4tan3ti1xin3si'14bi3yo1o4kan4ni1xa'1an1 ri4,i3kan4ja143i1xa14a3ka4chi2,
ka4chi2 ri4so'3o3ki13ta3 ri4nu14u3na1na'14a1ndi4,"Ka1a3ji13ni2 ndo4tin3ndi4su14u3,ya1kan3,ta1ka'4an2ba3ta4ku4u(4) 2ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4ku4nu1 ni42".
"Ndi14xa3ndi4na1ya'1a3ku4u4ba3 ndu2ndi4,ya1kan3,ta1kwa'1an1 ndu1ja1ta4ndi4ja1ku4ya3tin3 ni42ni'1i4 ndu2 ra1tu4u2 ndu1tan3ni1kwe3e2 ndu1i4xa3yo'4o1ti4ka1bi4tu3tan3su14u(3) a2ku4nu1ba42ka1a3",ka4chi(2) a2na'14a1so'3o3.
Ka'4an2 e4sa3kan4ni1ko1yo3 a2ta1kwi42kwa'1an(1) e1,ta1kwi42ya4xin4ku4u4ba3 ra4ndi4e1ta4na4nu4u4ndi4ya1ja1ni1kwe3e2ku4u4ba(3) e2i13xa3ti4kan4.
Ya1kan4ba42sa14ñu'4u4 ra2ti4sa'3ba2kan4ndi4i4yo2san3ta3ku3ru42ji1ni4 ri4ndi4ti4chi13nde3e4ña'3a4ku4u4ti4kan4ki1bi4chi13nde3e4ña'3a4 ri4.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1tu3ku3 ra2ni1xa1a1 ra1i3in3mi4i4ya'4ma1i3chi4chi4chi3burru.
I3kan4na'4a1 ni42xa4ñu1 ra1nu14u3ñu'3u4tan3i3kan4ni1ka3chi2 ra1ji'4in4ndi3ku4ku2ndi4,
"Ndo'4o1ndi4a3sa3 ndo4 a2ba'1a3ndi4ka3ka3 ndo4nu14u3ñu'3u4ka1a3sa4nda3nu'3u3 ndo4xa'1a4 2,an4ni1ki3xa2a2na1ka'4an2ji'4in4 ndo4tan3
yu1u4ba4li4nde4e4ka1a3ba3xa4xi24 2yu1u4ba4li4ka1a3ba42nda4chi3i4 2ku3ta3ku2 yu1ndi4ya1ka1a3ba42ka3xi4ba3yu'1u1tan3ko3o(3) 2yu14bi4ka3chi2 ndo4so'3o3ji'4in(4) a2kan4tan3
tan3ko3to3nde'14e4 ndo4na4nda3chi3i4 a2tan3ku3ni2 ndo4ndi4ya1yo'4o4xa4xi24 2,tan3ya1kan4ba42ji13ndo1o3ndi3ku4ku2ndi4
ya1kan3,ni1xi1ka3 ri4nu14u3ñu'3u4ya'4ma1kan4sa14nda3nu'3u3 ri4xa'1a4yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2tan3
ki13xa3a4 ri4tu4te'4e4 ri4yu1u4tu4te'4e4 ri4yu1u4kan4xi4ka3 ri4tan3,ya1kan3,
i13xa3ki'4bi3 ri4 a2na'14a1tan3ndi4ta3ba3,ndi4ta3ba(3) e2ndi4,ya1kan3,xa1ya3tin3ba3ni'1i4 na2 ra1tan3ndi4ba143ko4chun3 na2a1chi1ndi4ta1kan4ndi4ta1ba'1a3ku4u4ta1kan4.
In3ka4ni24tan3ni1ya'1a3ta1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1tin3tan3ni1xa1a1tu3ku3 ra2i3nga2xi4ña4i3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,
"Ya1kan3,yu'1u1ndi4ta1ba1xi3ku4u(4) 2ndi4ta1ba1xi3na'1a1ku4u(4) 2,ya1kan3,
na1kwi3i3ku4ni2sa4kwa'3a3tan3sa4kwa'3a3 na2na1ku14ni2tan3i3kan4tu3ndi4,ya1kan3,yu'1u1ndi4ta1,ta1xi4ka3ndi4ka1ku4u4yu'1u1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"An4sa3kan4ba3ndi4,ya1kan3,sa4kwa'3a3ba3 ndu3".Ki13xa3a4 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,nda13ka3ya2 ra1 na1na1kwa4chi3sa4kwa'3a3i4yo2tu'1un3.
Nda4a(2) e2ba42xi4in4na1kwa4chi3sa4kwa'3a3 na2ndi4mi3i4ba3 na2sa4a24 na2mi3i4 na2xi4kwe'1e1ba3ji'4in4,ji'4in4ta1,ta1ko4ndo3yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2.
Ya1kan3,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Na4chu3ba42ndi4,ya1kan3,ku14ni2 ndo4ku3ni3 ndo4ndi4consejuyu3ba4 ndo4ba43,
bi3tin3ndi4nda3kwi3in3 ndo4na4ka'1an1 yu1i3nda14siu'14un4ji'4in4 ndo4na4ka'1an(1) e1i3nda14i3in3kwen4tu2ji'4in4 ndo4".
O4ra2ni1ka'1an1 ra1i3in3padrenuestroji'4in(4) a2kan4tan3ya1nda3kwi3in3ba42kan4su3,su14u(3) a2ni4nda3kwi3in3ba42ndi4ya1kwa'1an1ñu'3u4ku4u4ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ba4li4kan4ku13na3a4 e2a1chi1ndi4,ya1kan3,ta1kan4ndi4ya1ba'1a3ba3ka'4an2ta1kan4ji'4in4 na3.
I3kan4ja143ni14xi3ni3 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,na1sa4a24ku4u4ba3 na2ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ba143ba'1a3ndi4ta1,
i3in3kwen4tu2ka'4an2 ra1tan3ndi1kun1ku4na3a4 na2ndi4yo3o3ku4u4 ni42ta1ku4u4 ra2su14u3ta1yu4bi24ba'1a3ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta1na'14a1ku4u4 ra2ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
Ya1kan3,i3kan4ja143ni1ndi3ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1ni1xa1a1 ra1,ni1xa1a1 ra1i3in3ñu3u2mi4i4ba42kwa'1an1 ra1kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Yo'4o4ba42ku1sun1 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,sa4ta3tu2u2 lu3 ndo4yu'1u1be'3e3ku1sun1 yu1".
I3kan4ka4chi2ta1i4ndu'3u4kan4ndi4,"Na4chu3ba42ndi4chi3ka2 yu1be'3e3nda'3a4ta1xu4xan3xi4ka3mi3i4ta1ka1a3ndi4,ya1kan3,ko14o3i3in3sa1a3ku3ni2bi4 2ta1ka1a3ndi4ta3xi(3) 2be'3e3nda'3a4 ra3".
"Tan3na4chu3ba42ndi4i4xa(3) on4sa3kan4tan3,ya1kan3,ya1yo'4o4ndi4yu'1u1ndi4ta1ka'4an2ba'1a3ku4u(4) 2ji'4in(4) un4".
"Ku4ni2 yu1ndi4ta1ku1sun1ku4u(4) 2tan3ki14tu3tan3kwa'1an1ba(3) 2ta1ya'4a13kwa'1an1ba3ku4u(4) 2".
"Sa3kan4ba3tan3ndi4ni3kwi14i3,ni3kwi14i3ku1sun(1) un4a1chi1ndi4,ya1kan3,yu'1u1ndi4ji14ni2 yu1yo3o3ku4u4ta1xu4xan3xi4ka3yu'1u1ndi4ta1yu4bi24ba3ku4ni2 yu1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Ndi4,ya1kan3,ta1yu4bi24ba'1a3ku4ni2 yu1tan3yo'4o1ndi4ji14ni2 o4yo3o3ta1ku4u4bi4yo'4o1xi4ka(3) on4".
"Sa3kan4tu3yu'1u1,ndi4ta1yu4bi24tu3ku4u4yu'1u1ba3tan3ta1kwa'1an1sa3kan4ku4u4ba3yu'1u1ndi4ta1kwa'1an1nda4ka3ya2
ka'4an2ji'4in4na1yu4bi24ku4u4yu'1u1na4ku4ni2 na1ku3ni3 na2na4ku14ni2tu3 na2ndi4ko14o3kwa1chi3ji'4in(4) a2,ya1kan4ba42ndi4ya'4a13yu'1u1kwa'1an1ba3yu'1u1".
butandi4nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4su14u3kan4ndi4ni14ki1xin1 ra1kan4ndi4ni1ya'1a3 ra2xa'1an1ku1sun1 ra1nu14u3ku'1u1.
Su14u3nu14u3ku'1u1ba42ni4ndu3ta'3an2ta1kan4ka4ndu'3u4 ra2ndi4i3in3be'3e3ba'1a3sa4ka2ba42ni1ki1xin1ta1kan4tan3nda13ko1o3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,tan3be'3e3mi4i4ni1ki1xin1 ra1kan4ndi4
na1ku4u4na1ji'4in4be'3e(3) a2kan4ndi4na1ni1ji3ndo1o3ba'1a3ku4u4na1kan4ndi4ta1kan4ndi4ya1sa14ñu'4u4ta1kan4ba42tan3ni1ya'1a3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,ni1ji3ndo1o3ba'1a3 na2ku13bi4ka3 na2tin3.
O4ra2ja143ni1ki3ta3 ra2,ni1ki3ta3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1tin3i3kan4ja143nda13ki'3in3 ra2ta1na3ni4Pedru.
Ta1kan4ndi4,ta1kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ka3ma2 ni42i3ni2ta1kan4ndi4kwe'1e1 ni42 ra1,ya1kan4ba42ndi4,ya1kan3,
ni1ki'3in3 ra2ta1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1,tu3ku3i3nga2 ra1nda13ki'3in3 ra2ta1na3ni4Ximúnda13ki'3in3 ra3.
Ña1a4ja1xi1nu3u1bi1 na1sa3kan4ku4u4ndi4ja1xi1nu3u1ni1 na1ja143xi1nu3ku1mi4 na3.
u1xi1u1ni1jo13ndo3na1kan4tan3ni1xi1nu3 na2ki1bi4xi1nu3 na2tan3
i3in3ta1u1xi1u1ni1kan4ni1ki3ta3i3nda14 ra2ni1xi14ko3yu3ba(4) e4nu14u3na1na'14a1ki1bi4ni1xi14ko3 na2 ra1tan3nda13ki'3in3 na2 ra1i13xa3ja13ni1ku3 na2ji'4in4 ra2ki1bi4ni1ka3ni3 na2 ra1.
Ndi4,ya1kan3,ka4chi2Pedruso'3o3ji'4in4,ya1kan3,Santiaundi4,
ya1kan3,Santiaundi4bi3tin3ndi4na4ku'1un(1) o4sa1ta4mas4tru2ndi4ya14tin3ka4a(4) e2ndo'4o4 ra2ndi4
i3kan4ka4ni3 ni42na1,na1ba'14a4 ra2ya1kan4ndi4ku'1un(1) o4ku4ni2 yu1,tan3ndi4,ya1kan3,kwa4yu2kan4ndi4sa1na1ba3Santiauku4u4ti4kan4tan3
tan3Pedrundi4su3ti4ta13tu2u2ti4ba3ta1kan4ku4u4 ri4nu14u3ta1kan4i4yo2tu'1un3.I3kan4ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ndi4,
"I4yo2ba3 ri4tan3ndi4xa14ku'1u1ka4ndi3ka2 ri4tan3na4tu2ku'1un(1) un4ja1ta4 ri4ndi4yo3so4yo'4o4ka4ndi3ka2 ri4".
Ke13e3Pedruja'1an1 ra1i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,ka4chi2,ya1kan3Santiauji'4in4 ra2ndi4
"Pedrutan3na4chu3ba42ndi4,ya1kan3,ku4u(4) un4milagruni1ji3ndo1o(3) on4ndi4ndi4kun2 e4mas4tru2tan3a4su3ndi4ya1ka'4an2mas4tru2ji'4in(4) o4ndi4ya1chi3ka2so'1o(3) e4ba43".
"su3u3ku4u4 ri4ka4ndu'3u4ba3mi4i4ya'1a(3) on4kan4ja1ni1ya'1a(3) on4nu14u3 ri4tan3ji14ni2 un4ka4ndu'3u4 ri4,i3kan4tu3ndi4ti4ji13ni2ba(3) on4ku4u4 ri4".
"Bi3tin3ndi4kwa'4an2 on4nda3ka3ya2 on4i3ki4 ri4kan4tan3sa3kan4ndi4sa4ki3ta'4an(4) on4 e2tan3chi3ka2 on4kwa13ku2su1kun4 ri4tan3chi3ka2 on4po3sa42yu'3u4 ri4".
"Na4nda3ko1o3ti4ti4kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ti4kan4ndi4ka3xi4 ri4yo'4o1a1chi1ndi4ti4kwe'1e1ku4u4 ri4tan3
ja1ta13xi3na3ni2ba'1a(3) on4yo'3o4yu'3u4 ri4ya1kan4ndi4ba143xi4ka3i3ni2 un4o4ra2ndu3ndi3chi2 ri4tan3ku1mi4chi4chi3sa4ñu'4u(4) un4 ri4tan3ti4nda3ta3ku2ku4u4ba3ti4kan4sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un(1) o4ja1ta4mas4tru2na4tu2ku4ni2 un4ku'1un(1) o4".
"Na1ku'1un1ku4u(4) e4ku4ni2 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,ba143ka4na3chi3ñu3ka4a4sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ndo'4o4 ni42ta1kan4,i3kan4ba42ku3ni2 o4yo3o3ku4u4na1ni1xi14ko3ña'3a4".
Ndi4,ya1kan3,na1ku'1un1ku4u4ba3yo4o4,nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4ni1ke3e3 na2xa1a1 na1,ni1xa1a1 na1i3kan4su3nda143yu'1ma1ba3ku4u4ñu4u4 na2yu3ba(4) e4xi4ka3 ra2ka4ni3 na2 ra1i4xa3ja13ni1ku3 na2ji'4in4 ra2tan3
i3kan4ja143i1xa14a3ni1si3ka4na3ta1kan4kwa4yu2ja'1an1 ri4,i3in3xa'1an1 ri4ndi13ko4 ri4ta'13bi4sa3ba3ba3 ri4 a2na'14a1xa'13ni4 ri4 a2,ndi4ta1kan4ndi4ta1kwe'1e1ku4u4mi3i4ba3ta1kan4.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4ka14na3chi3ñu3ndi4ku3u2ndi'3i3na1ka1a3ndi4ya1ji'4in4yu'1u1ndi4
ni3ba'1a3a3sa3 na2ni3ba'14a4a3sa3 na2ji'4in(4) 2ndi4yu'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,yu'1u1ndi4ja1ko13nde3e4i3ni2 yu1na1ka1a3ndi4ndi1kun1xi'4i1ba'1a3 na2tan3ndi'4i4xa'1a4 na2tan3ni3ka14na3chi3ñu3ko3o3sa3kan4ndi4
ta'1bi4sa3ba3kwe4nda2na1ka1a3tan3ta'1bi4sa3ba3kwe4nda2yu'1u1ya1ki'3in(3) a2ki1bi4ki'3in(3) a2ku'1un1ya1kan4ba42ndi4
ta'4bi14sa3ba3ndi3kwi3so3 ndu2ya1yu14bi4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ya1kan4ba42ni1ji3ndo1o3yo4o4bi3tin3ndi4i4yo2sa3ba3na1ta'4an4yo4o4xi'4i1ja13ni1ku3xi'4i1 na1ji'4in4tu1xi42ba3ta'4nda1ba3 na3.
I4yo2sa3ba3ta'4an4yo4o4ndi4xi'4i1 na1kwe'1e1ndio4si2ka4chi2mi3i(4) o4kan4.
Xi'4i1 na1nda'3a4na1ta4u3ni2nde4e4ji'4in4ba3 na2be'3e3 na2na1kan4ku4u4na1xi'4i1ni4nu3na1kan4ku4u4 na2ndi4kwi3so3yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2tan3na1xi'4i1ja13ni1ku3ndi4ja1kwe4nda(2) e2na'14a1ku4u4na1kan4,chi2.
Ka4chi2 na1i4yo2historiaxa'1a4yu3ba(4) e4tan3ndi4,ka4ni24ba(3) e2na4sa3kan4tan3ya1ji4ni2ndi'3i(3) o4 e2tan3ndi4nda4ndo4so24 ni42 yu(1) a1.

Ya1yo'4o4ku4u4kwen4tu2ya3ta4xa'1a4ta1ni1xi1kan1ya1bi4ka3nu14u3,nu14u3SanAntoniu.
Ya1kan4ndi4so'3o3i4yo(2) a2kan4,ya1kan3,ta1kan4ndi4ta1nda'4bi2ku4u4 ra2ndi4
ko14o3,ni3xu'14un4 ra2ko14o3ni3be'3e3 ra2ko14o3ni3ña'1a3,nda1i3in3ña'1a3 ra2ko14o3.
Ja1i3in3ku3ndu'4u4 ra2ku3xi3 ra2tan3a1su3SanAntoniuka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4ba3a1su3SanAntoniunda4tu1un1ñu'3u2nu14u3.
O4ra2in3ka4ni24tu3ku3tin3tan3tu3ku3sa3kan4ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4SanAntoniu.
I3kan4ni1ndi'1i3ba3i3ni2SanAntoniundi4
ba143xi4in4yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2ta3xi3 ra2ya1bi4ka3nda'3a4ta1kan4a1chi1ndi4ta1ba143ba'1a3i3ni2ku4u4 ra3,na4ni1ni'1i4 ra(2) e2bi4ka3tan3nda3ndo4so24 ra2xa'1a4yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2.
Ya1kan4ndi4ba143xi4in4yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2tan3ta1kan4,tan3SanAntoniundi4ta1ka'4an2xa'1a4ba3 ra2ku4u4ta1kan4,ta1ko4ndo3,
ta1xi4kan1tu3ku4u4ta1kan4ba3nu14u3yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2kwe4nda2ta1nda'4bi2.
Tan3ka'4an2ba3yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ji'4in4SanAntoniundi4
"Kwi14i3a1chi1ndi4ta1ba143ba'1a3i3ni2ku4u4 ra2,a1chi1ndi4ndi'3i3tan3nda3ndo4so24 ra2ya1ku4u4ya1ma1ni4",chi1ka4chi2yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2so'3o3ji'4in4SanAntoniu.
"Na4tu2sa3kan4ndi4,tan3ndi4nda'4bi2 ni42ka'4an2 ra1padrendi4,ya1kan3,
a3sa(3) on4 a2ma1ni4ji'4in4ti3kwa'4a2 ra1na4,na4sa4ni'1i(4) un4 ra2ya1bi4ka3kan4na4,
ndu3ba'1a3nu3na'3a2tu4ni1ku3ndu'4u4 ra2ku4u4 ra2ta1nda'4bi2".
"Na4tu2yo'4o1ka'4an2 on4sa3kan4tan3ta3xi3ba(3) e2nda'3a4 ra2i3nda14 e2ndi4
ni3yo'4o1ka'14an4ka1 ra1tan3ni3yu'1u1ka'14an4ka1 ra1".
"Nda1sa3kan4ku3ni2 un4sa1a3ki3xi(3) a2",ka4chi2,ka4chi2yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2ji'4in4SanAntoniu.
I3kan4,ni1ki3xa2a2ba3ja143,ta1ka'4an2ku4u4ba3 ra2ji'4in4SanAntoniundi4chi2 ra1tan3
ni1ku3ñu3u42tan3ni1ki1xin1 ra1xa14ni2 ra1i13xa3SanAntoniundi4,
"Bi3tin3ndi4na4tu2ndi3xa3ndi4ku4ni2 un4ji4ni2 un4ya1bi4ka3tan3
kwa'4an2ka3ta(3) on4xa'1a4tun4,i3tun4mi3tu4nda24tun4,tun4,ya1kan3,tia14ba4ndi4chi2ma'14ñu3mi4i4nda1a1kan4xa'1a4yu3ku4kan4i3kan4ka4ndi3ka2ki1si3xu'14un4".
"Ña1a4ndi3ki'3in(3) un4 a2tan3ya1ña1a4so3kwe4nda2 on4 a2na4tu2ku4ni2 un4,tan3su14u3nu4nu3i3ta2an2i3sa42tan3nda3ndo4so24i3ni2 un4xa'1a4 2ndi4,
na4nda13ndo4so24i3ni2 un4xa'1a4 2ndi4i3kan4ti4ndi'13i3ba(3) e2ya1ko4ndo3ya1bi4ka3",ka4chi2,ka4chi2SanAntoniuji'4in4 ra2ndi1ku1nda42,ni1ka'1an1nda14ku2ba3ta1kan4i1nda43.
I3kan4ja143ni1ndi'3i3tan3,utaku4ni2ka(1) e1tu13u3tan3ndi13ki'3in3 ra2picundi13ki'3in3 ra2ña'1a3tan3sa14nda3a3 ra2ta3yu2mbu4rru2ya3ta4ja1na1 ra1tan3xa1a1 ra1kan4.
Su3ya3tin3chi'4i2ti4ba3ka4ndi3ka2ki1si3,ki1si3ñu'4u4xu'14un4.
I3kan4ja13ta3 ra2ndi13ki'3in3 ra(2) e2kan4i3kan4ka4chi2
I3kan4ke13e3 ra2ja'1an1 ra1ja'1an1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4su1tu1i1nda43,"¿Sa1a3ba'1a3a3sa(3) 2ji'4in(4) a2ndi4ya1yo'4o4ya1yo'4o4ni1ka'1an(1) e1xa'1a4tan3

ndu3yo4ko(1) a1ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2ta1ña1a4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.

I3kan4ndi4chi13ka2 ra1mañatan3nda13a3 ra2kwa'1an1ba3 ra2i1nda43.

I3kan4ja143xi1yo3,ja143ni1jo3ndo3ba(3) e2ku4ni2 na1.

ja143i1xa14a3ta1nda3a2ka13ku3ba(3) e2,ran4.
Ja143ni1ja'1an1ka'1an1,ja'1an1ndu3ku4 na2ña4sa4ka3ku3.
Ta1nda1nu14u3ku'1u1kan4i4yo2 an4ña4,i3nda1(4) en4sa4ka3ku3ba'1a3 ni42.
I3kan4ja143i1xa14a3ja'1an1ki'1in3 na2 ña4sa3ba3ñu3u42ki13xa2a(2) en4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ki3xa2a(2) en4tan3ka13ku(3) a2lu3u3.
Ni1ka3ku(3) a2tan3ndu13su4ku24 a2lu3u3tio1to1tan3chi13ndu'4u(4) an4 e2kan4.
"Bi3tin3ndi4a3sa3 lu3 un4 a2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2ndi4
"Ku'1un(1) a1lu3u3yo'4o4ji'4in(4) un4sa3ka4na(3) on4ndi4,nda1nu14u3ku'1u1,ku'1u1i1tun4kan4ku'1un1sa3ka4na(3) on4 a3".
"Ka3xi4ki3ti4 a2ku3u(2) a2a1chi1ndi4na4na4kwa'1a3yu3ba(4) en4cuentandi4
ka'3ni4 ra2yu'1u1,ka'3ni4 ra2mi3i(4) an4".
"Ya1kan4ndi4kwe4nda2nda3si2yu'3u(4) un4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ya1kan3,so'3o3ku4u4xu'14un4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4",ta13xi3 na2kwa'1a4xu'14un4kwa'1an1ku3ta3ku2 an4ta4u3ni2kan4.
Ni1ki'3in3ba(3) en4ta4u3ni2tio1to1ya3a3tan3ni1ti3su4ku2(4) an4sábanatan3
ni1chi3ku'3ni2 an4 e2chi1ki'1in1ka'3a(4) en4tan3ku4u(4) an4ña4ndi4xi3ka4ni24tan3
nda143ndi4ka1nda143ndi4ka1xa4ñu1 an4ta4u3ni2kwa'1an(1) en4tan3
sa3kan4ku4u4tan3i3ni2na1ba4li4ku4u4ba(3) e2ndi4
Sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ka'4an2na1guardiande4ta3ye'14e4ndi4,
ya1kan3,reinandi4ña4ka13ku3se'1e3ban4.
Yo3o3ku4u4ta1ni1ke3ba'1a3 ni42ndi4reinandi4ña4i4yo2se'1e3ban4.
Ni1ka3chi2ba3guardiaya1i4ta4ba42xa4ku3kwa'1an1.
Ya1kwa'1an1ka3ta2 na1ba42
I3kan4ja143,kwa'1an1ba(3) e2lu3u3kan4i1nda43.
Ki'13in(3) an4ta4u3ni2kan4 e2sa13ka4na(3) en4 ya2ma'14ñu3ku'1u1i1tun4nu14u3ku'1u1nda1kan4.
Nda4a2xi4ka3ndi3ka'3a3nda'4bi2,ndi3ka'3a3tie4tan24,i4yo2se'1e3i4ta4 ri4.
Ndi13ki'3in3ti4kan4 e2i1nda43,ti4kan4ndi13ki'3in3 ri4ya1lu3u3kan4sa14kwa'3nu3 ri4 ya3,sa14kwa'3nu3 ri4 a2tan3
i3kan4ni1nda3xa2a2 ri4,ni1nda3xa2a2 ri4ka'4an2 ri4ji'4in4se'1e3 ri4ti4ba4li4ndi4,
"Ndo'4o1ndi4ndo1o3,ja1ndo1o3na'3a2ndo'4o1,ndu1nda3a2na'3a2ndo'4o1ndo3so4ndi4
ya3ni2 ndo4ta1i4ta4yo'4o4ta1ka1a3ku4u4ta1nda3chi3chin4".
"Ta1ka1a3ku4u4ta1ku4ma1ni4kwa'1a4 e2kwa'3nu3".
"Ta1ka1a3ndi4ta1yu4bi24ba'1a3ku4u4ta1ka1a3".
"Ta1ka3ni'3i3cuentaji'4in4ndo'4o1ku4u4ta1ka1a3nu4nu3i3ta2an2i3sa42".
"Na4yu'1u1nda4a(2) e2ni1ndo'3o(3) 2ndi4nda13na1ma3tu3mi4i4kwa'1an1 yu1ndi4
ka14na3chi3ñu3ka3ka3i3in3xi4ña4 ni42 o4ka4chi2,ka4chi2ti4tie4tan24so'3o3i1nda43.
I3kan4ja143ja143nda13chi3chin4ta1i4ta4ja143ba'1a3ku4ni2 ra1nda13chi3chin4 ra2ja143xa'13nu3 ra3.
Ya1kan3,ja143,ki1bi4ja143xa'13nu3 ra2ko3ndo3 ra2ta1a3tin3.
"Bi3tin3ndi4ja1ni1xa'3nu3ya3ni2 ndo4bi3tin3ndi4
ja1ba'1a3xa4xi24ja1ba'1a3xi4xi3ku4u4ta1ka1a3".
"Bi3tin3ndi4ndo1o3 ndo4ji'4in4ya3ni2 ndo4ndi4a3sa3kwe4nda2 ni42 ndo4ya3ni2 ndo4,nda4a(2) e2ko3ndo'3o3 ra3".
"Ko1to1ka14xi4 ndo4ña'1a3na1yu4bi24ña1ta3ta2na1yu4bi24ndi4
ya1yu3ku4ndu3ku4 ndo4ka3xi4 ndo4,ya1yu3ku4sa14na'1a(1) e1ndo'4o1ka3xi4 ndo4tan3ya1kan4a3sa3,ta3xi3 ndo4yu'3u4ya3ni2 ndo4ka3xi4 ra2ji'4in4 ndo4.Ku'14un1nda'3a4 ndo4mi4i4i4yo2ña'1a3na1yu4bi24a1chi1ndi4ndu3kwa4ñu3 ndo4,i1yo3ka'3ni4 na2ndo'4o1".
Tan3ta1ya3ni2 ndo4ka1a3ndi4so3kwe4nda2 ni42 ndo4 ra3".
I3kan4nda13na1ma3ti4tie4tan24kwa'1an1 ri4i3nga2xia4an4ko3o3 ri4i3kan4ni1ndo1o3ti4kwa4chi3ña1a4.
Nda4a2xi4ka3bi4ta1xi4ka3ku'1u1,tan3ya1kan3,ndo13ko3to3 ra2ndi4
nda1ji1ni4ka3ba4ni1nu3kan4i4nde4e4u1bi1ndi3ka'3a3tan3i3in3ndi3ka'3a3xi3in4 ra2ta4ta'4bi4tan3i4ndu'3u4 ra2ma'14ñu3 ri4,cha4la4kwa'4a1 ra1i4ndu'3u4 ra3.
Ndi4ta1ja1xi1nu3ku4u4 ra2i3xi4yu'3u4 ra2i3xi4,i4yo2ndi'3i3ba(3) e2i1nda43.
I3kan4ja143ni1ka'1an1 na1ji'4in4reyndi4
"Sa1a3ba'1a3ko3o3señorreyndi4i3kan4xi4ka3i3nda14ta1xa3ku4ji'4in4u1bi1ndi3ka'3a3tan3
ma'14ñu3ndi3ka'3a3kan4i4yo2 ra1,nda1ji1ni4ka3ba4kan4i4yo2 ra1ji'4in4ndi3ka'3a3,i3kan4ji13ni2 yu1 ra1".
"Ta1yu4bi24ba'1a3ku3u3 ra2su4kun1 ra1,i3xi4nu14u3 ra2,i3nda14 e2ndi4tio1to1ti3kwa'4a2ko14o3",ka4chi2
ta1ko4ndo3ta1ji13ni2ña'3a4kan4.
"Nda3ka3si2na'3a2 ndo4ta1ba3ta4ka1a3tan3ku'1un1 ndo4ku'1un1ko1to1 ndo4tan3ku3ni2 o4na4tu2ndi3xa3ba42,na4tu2su14u(3) a2ndi3xa3ba42tan3,ya1kan3,
ndo1o3na'3a2 ra1ka1a3ba3",ka4chi2,ka4chi2ta1ko4ndo3reyso'3o3i1nda43.
I3kan4ja143i1xa14a3ni1xa1a1 ra1tan3nda13si2 ra1.
I3kan4ndi13ki'3in3na1ko4ndo3guardiaña'1a3ta1bi4ka3ña1a4xa1a1 na1mi4i4ka4chi2 na1i4yo2ta1ta1a3ña1a4ji'4in4ndi3ka'3a3.
I3kan4ni1xa1a1ja3 na2i3kan4i4ndu'3u4ja3ba3,ja3ba3 ra2ji'4in4 ri4i1nda43.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"Sa14ta'3an4 ndo4ndu'1u1ndi4ba143ja4xi24 2ña1ta3ta2kwe4nda2is1to'3o2 ndo4ndi4
ña1yu3ku4ba3ja4xi24 ndu3,ña1yu3ku4sa14na'1a1si'3i4 ndu2ndu'1u1ka3xi4 ndu2ya1kan4ndi4ya1yu3ku4ba3ta4ku1 ndu1,ka4chi2,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4 na2i1nda43.
I3kan4nda13ndi3ko4tu3ku3 na2kwa'1an1 na1.
"Ta1yu4bi24ba'1a3ku4u4 ra2ta1yu4bi24,la3tun4ki3ni3ta1a3tan3ndi4
tio1to1 ra1ko14o3patrón,ya1kan4ndi4sa3kwe4nda2 ni42 un4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ta1ba'1a3ku4u4ta1kan4tu4u2 yu1",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
"Kwa'4an2 ndo4sa3kan4ndi4ka'1an1 ndo4ji'4in4 ra2ka1kan1 ndo4ya1ma1ni4nu14u3 ra2na4ndi3xi3 ra2be'3e3".
"Ko14o(3) a2ku3ma1ni4 a2ji'4in4 ra2ni3na1ta'4an4 ra2ña1a4ni3ko14o(3) a2ku3ma1ni4 a2ka3xi4na1ña1a4ña'1a3".
"Nda4a(2) e2ba42ku4ni2 na1tan3tu13u(3) a2ka3xi4 na3".
"Tan3ndi4ja1ba'1a3 ni42i4yo2mi3i4 ra2xa14ku'1u1kan4ka4chi2 ra1".
"Ndi14xa3ndi4ku'1un1 ndo4tan3ki3xi3 ra3".
I3kan4ja'1an1 na1xu13xa3,na1ku4mi3i4ka1kwen4tu2,i3kan4ja'1an1 na1ni1xa1a1 na1ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4 ra3.
"Ku'1un(1) o4ji'4in4 ndu2ndi4ta1ko4ndo3reyku4u4ta1ka'4an2,ta'1nda1chi3ñu3ba1xi3 ndu3".
"Ndu'1u1ku4u4 na2ko4ndo3 na2xu13xa3i4nde4e4xi3in4 ra2kan4,ya1kan4ndi4ka'4nu3ko3o3i3ni2 un4ndi4ku'1un(1) o4ji'4in4 ndu3".
"Kwa'4an2 ndo4tan3ba1xi3 ndo4tu3ku3chi4chi3sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un(1) o4a1chi1ndi4bi3tin3ndi4ta'14an2nda3tu'4un4na3ni2 yu1ji'4in4na1ko4ndo3ya3ni2 yu1".
"Tan3na4tu2na4tu2kwi3i3ku1nu'1u4 2ji'4in4 ndo4a1chi1ndi4
tan42yu'1u1nda4a2na1ka1a3yu'1u1tan3tan42yu'1u1nda4a2 yu1na1ka1a3tan3
i3in3,i3in3ku4u(4) a2ya1,ña1nda14yu3,ni1nda14yu3si'3i4 ndu2ndu'1u1tan3ni1ndo1o3 ndu2ki1bi4kwa'1an1 ndu1,kwa'1an(1) en4kan4".
"Ya1kan4ba42ni'4i4 ndu2cuentaji'4in4ba3,ko14nde3e4i3ni2 ndu1xa'1a4ta'4an4 ndu2ndo1o3 ndu3".
"Nda3ñu'4u4i3in3ta'4an4 ndu3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,i3kan4ja143ni1ndo1o3 ra3,kwa1nu'1u4tu3ku3 na3.
Ni1ndo1o3 ra2tan3ja143nda4tu'4un4 ra2ndi4,ji'4in4 na2,nda13tu'4un4 ra2ji'4in4na1ta'4an4ba3 ra2na1ko4ndo3ndi3ka'3a3ña1a4ran4.
Ndi4sa3kan4ka4a(4) e2i4yo2ndi4,ku'1un1ba3 ra2ndi4ba143ndu4ta'3an2ja3ba3 ra2ku3ndi3ka2 ra1ma'14ñu3ki3ti4ndi4ta1yu4bi24ba3ku4u4ta1kan4tan3ti4kan4ndi4ki3ti4ku4u4 ri4,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143i1xa14a3ndi13ki'3in3,ja143tu3ku3ki1bi4ja143ni1xa1a1tu3ku3na1ko4ndo3na1na'4nu3,na1,
na1i4nde4e4xi3in4reykan4.
I3kan4ka4chi2 na1,ka'4an2tu3ku3 na2ji'4in4 ra2ka4nda2a2 na1ndio4si2ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ni1xi1nu1i3ni2 ra1,"I3nda14 e2ndi4ku'1un1ba3ya3ni2 ndu1ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4
na4nda4a(2) e2ni1ndo'3o3 ra2ndi4ya1kan3,a1su3ndu'1u1ku4u4 na2ji4ni2sa1a3ti4ko3o3 ndo4na4tu2nda4a(2) e2ni1ndo'3o3 ra3".
Ka4chi2ba3ndi3ka'3a3i1nda43.
I3kan4ja143ba1xi3 ra2ji'4in4 na3,xa1a1 na1nu14u3rey.
Xa1a1 ra1tan3i3kan4xa14ku'1u1kan4bi4ndu13ndi3xi3 ra2tio1to1 ra1tan3
nda13xa2a2 ra1nu14u3reytan3,ta'1nda1chi3ñu3kwa'1an1 ra1ke3e3ji1ni4 ra2nda1ke3e3i3xi4yu'3u4 ra2ke3e3.
Tan3ta1ja1ta3nda'3a4ku4u4 ra2i1nda43.
Su3a3ma3ndi4si'3i4ba3 ra2ban4ña4,ña4mi4i4nda13xa2a2 ra1ña1a4tan3ña4ña1a4ta3nda'3a4 ra2ji'4in4.
La3tun4ki3ni(3) an4ku4u(4) an4ña4lu3u3i4yo2ba'1a3nu14u3 na3.
Si'3i4 ra2ban4tan3ji'4in(4) an4kan4ta3nda'3a4 ra3.
Ya1kan4ndi4ba143ba'1a3i4yo(2) a2kan4ndi4,tu4u2yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2ndi4si'3i4ba3 ra2ban4.
Ya1kan4ndi4i4yo2i3in3ta1ku4ni2ji4ni2tu3ña4ña1a4ba3.
Ta1ja4chiu4un4nu14u3 na3.
Ta1kan4ni1chi3ka2 ra1ta1tan4ji'4in4,su14ku3chi3 ra2ta1tan4ti4ku2tan3
tan3ni1chi3ni3 ra(2) e2nu14u3is1to3mi4i4ka4ndu'3u4ta1kan4.
Ya1kan4ndi4ja1ndio4si2ku4u4ta1ji4ni2ji'4in(4) a2ndi4si'3i4 ra2ban4tan3ko3to3 ra2 ña4.
Ya1kan4ba143ba'1a3i4yo2,ya1kan4ndi4ni1ka3ku3nu3tu3ku3i3nga2ya1ko4ndo3kwe'1e1ña1a4tan3
ña1ña1a4ba42xa'13ni4 a2 ra1ran4.
I3kan4ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ja'1an1nda1ka(3) en4 ra2mi4i4ku1sun1 ra1nu14u3is1to3.
"Yo'4o4ka3ndu'4u4na'3a2 on4na4ku'1un1sa4sa1a4 2chi3ko4la2ko'3o(3) e4sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ki3xa2a2 yu1".
sa3kan4ku1sun(1) o4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143,ña4kan4ni1xa1a1ka13ndo3so4chi3ko4la2sa1a4ko'3o3 na3.
O4ra2ja1ba'1a3 ra4tan3ndi13ki'3in(3) an4 ra4ni1xa1a(1) en4.
Ni1xa1a(1) en4ndi4nda1,ta1a3nda4a2tiem4pu2ku13i3tun4i4ndu'3u4,ni1xi'1i1ba3 ra2i1nda43.
Ja143ni1nda'1yu(1) an4xa4ku(3) an4ndi4,xa4ku(3) an4ji14ni2 an4nda4a(2) e2ku4u4,ku4u4ka1i3ni2 an4.
I3kan4ja143,ta'1nda1chi3ñu3nu14u3na1ko4ndo3guardiandi4na4ki3xi3,na4nda3ndu3ku4 na2yo3o3ku4u4ta1xa'13ni4.
Ko14o3,ko14o3señai4yo2ndi4,ko14o(3) a2sa3kan4ti4ka4a4.
Nda4a(2) e2ba42i4yo2tan3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ku3ni2 na1yo3o3ku4u4ja'13ni4.
Ja143i1xa14a3a1su3 a2ka'4an2na1ya3ni2 ra1tan3a1su3 a2kan4ka4a(4) e2ni1ku3u3.
Kwa'1an1na1kan4tan3ni1ndo1o3 ra2ndi4,ja1ta4 na2kwa'1an1ti4ba3 na2ba42tan3ni1ndo1o3 ra2ni1ndo'3o3 ra2sa3kan4.
Ti1xin3 a2ku1mi4ki1bi4ki13xa2a2 na1ndi4ja1ñu'3u4ba3ka4ndi3ka2 ra1.
Ni14ki3xa2a2na1kan4,ja1ji4ni2ba3na1kan4ndi4na1,na1nda4ku3tu3ku4u4na1kan4ba3,ki13xa2a2 na1tan3nda1mi4i4ka4ndu'3u(4) an4ki4xin1 an4palacioni1nu3nda1kan4.
Nda13ba3nda3a2ndi3ka'3a3tan3ki'1bi3 ri4ma14a3.
Ja143xa4ku3ba(3) en4ka'4an2 en4ji'4in4,ji'4in4na1ndi3ka'3a3ndi4
"Ji13ni2 yu1nda4a2ki13xi(3) a2ndo'13o3ya3ni2 ndo4tan3ni1xi'1i1 ra1".
"Xi'1i1nu4mi24i4chi3 ra2,a1su3ja1ta4ndo'4o1kwa'1an1 ndo4tan3ke13ta3 ra2nda13ka3ndu'4u4 ra2nu14u3is1to3ti4tan3
a1su3ya1kan4ti4jo13ndo(3) a2tan3,o4ra2ja1ba'1a3chi3ko4la2ko'3o3,ko'3o3 ra2ji'4in(4) 2tan3
xa1a(1) e1ndi4ta1a3nda4a2tiem4pu2ku13i3tun4ka4ndu'3u4".
"¿Tan3nda4a2ka4ndi3ka2,ndu1xin1 ra1?".
"Ni1ndu1xin1ba'1a3ba3 ra2,ni1kwa'3a3na3ma2 ra1ni1kwa'3a3",ka4chi2 an4.
"Na4ku'1un(1) o4ji'4in4 ndu2ndi1ku1nda42ji4ni2 un4nda4a2ba42tan3na4ku'1un(1) o4".
"Na4ku'1un1 yu1ja4ndo3to(3) 2yu3ba4 2sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1 ra1ji'4in(4) o4".
"Su14u3yu3ba(4) on4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4ndi4,ya1kan3,yo4o4ku'1un1ku4u(4) e4nu4mi24ku'1un(1) o4a1chi1ndi4
ba'1a3bi3tin3xa'4a13ka(1) e1tiem4pu2na4ku3chun3",ka4chi2,ka4chi2ndi3ka'3a3so'3o3i1nda43.
i3kan4ni1xa1a1ndi3ka'3a3kan4nda1pa3san4tu2mi4i4ni1ndu1xin1 ra1kan4.
I3kan4ja143i1xa14a3,ta'13bi4 ri4ka'3a4na3ma2xi14ta3 ri4xa1tun4ba1xi3,ba1xi(3) a3.
Nda13ku3na4 na2,ba'1a3i4chi3ba3ta1kan4ndi4,ta'14an2,ya1ku4u4 ra2ta1ba'1a3ran4,santuku4u4ta1kan4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ji14ta3 na2nda13ku3na4 na2xa1tun4ki13ta'4ni3 na2ndi3i2tan3ja143
ja143nda13ti'3bi3nda3a2 ri4,nda13ti'3bi3nda3a2 ri4,nda13ti'3bi3nda3a2 ri4,nda13ti'3bi3nda3a2 ri4,i4ya14kun2 ri4tan3nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2 ri4i4ya14kun2 ri4tan3nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2 ri4.
Nda4ndu3ku4 ri4yo3o3ba42yo3o3ba42ni1ka3ni3,yo3o3ba42,nda4a(2) e2ba42ni1ndo'3o3 ra2ni1xi'1i1 ra1.
Ba143ko4nde3e4ka1 ri4ndi4,tan3tu3ku3 ri4ki'4bi13tan3tu3ku3 ri4ndi4ki3nde3e4tan3,ti4kwa'1an1ki'1bi3ti4ke4e4ku4u4.
Sa3kan4ku4u4nda1ndi3ka'3a3ya'4a1ni1ki'1bi3.
Nda13ti'3bi3nda3a2 ri4,ti'13bi3 ri4,ti'13bi3 ri4ti'13bi3 ri4ti'13bi3na3ni2 ri4i3ki4ku3ñu2 ra1.
Nda1ti4kan4ni1ka3chi'3i3ya4a24 ri4yo3o2ti4ku2ndi4,mi3i4i3ni2 ra1yo'4o4ni4ni3yo3o2ti4ku2.
I3kan4"Nu4mi24 ni42 ndo4ndi4,ja1,ja1ndu13bi3ta42ta'3an2 ra1i4ya4kun2 e4 ra2tan3
ja1nda4ta3ku2i3ki4ku3ñu2 ra1ran4".
I3kan4ja143i1xa14a3,"Nu4mi24 ndo4ndi4yo'4o4ka4ndi3ka(2) e2ko4ndo3kwe'1e1ja'13ni4ya3ni2 o4",ka4chi2ndi3ka'3a3ya'4a1.
"Ka3ma2 ni42ko3o3 ndo4ndi4na4ti'3bi(3) 2tan3sa3kan4ndi4,tan3kwa1xin3 2tan3xi14ta(3) 2tan3
na4ke13ta3so'3o3,nda13tu1u3 a2ke13ta(3) e2ba1xi3 a2tan3nda3ba3 ndo4tan3
ji14ta3 ndo4se4u2ja1ta4 2lomu yu1tan3
sa3kan4ndi4se4u2kan4chi3ka2 ndo4yu'3u4 a2
"Ndi4ka3ma2 ni42ko3o3 ndo4",ka4chi2ndi3ka'3a3ya'4a1so'3o3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ri4.
Ja143ni1nu1na4yu'3u4 a2tan3ja1nda13ba3nda3a2ti4ka1a3xi14ta3 ri4se4u2lomuti4i3nga2kan4,
tan3kwa'1an1yu'3u4 a2ndi1ku1nda42.
Nda13si(2) a2tan3ja143nda13ti'3bi3nda3a2 na1tan3nda13ti'3bi3nda3a2 na1.
Ja143ti'4bi3 ri4tan3,tan3i4ya14kun2 ri4tan3i4ya14kun2 ri4nda'3a4 ri4ndi4
sa3kan4ku4u4nda13ta3ku2 ra1i1nda43,nda13xa2a2 ra1i13xa3 na2chi1.
Ni1ya14kun2 ri4,ya14kun2 ri4,ya14kun2 ri4.
"¿An4nu14u3is1to3 2ka4ndu'3u4 2?,"ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3nda13ka'1an1 ra1i1nda43.

yeguakan4ku4u4ti4ndo13xo4ko1o3 ri4tan3ni1ka3ni3 ri4ti1xin3ta1ta4u3ni2kan4tan3ja'13ni4 ri4 ra2ka4chi2 na1nda4tu'4un4 na2ja'1a4 ra2,ya1i1yo3ba'1a3ba42ji'4in4ki3ti4tan3yo4o4ndi4
xi4ka3nde3nu'3u3i3ni2ba(3) e4a1chi1ndi4ko14o3chiu3un3i4xa(3) e4ji'4in4na1yu4bi24ka4chi2 o4tan3ndi4na1yu4bi24chi1tun3ndi4ti4in4 na(2) e2ki'4bi3mi4i4ti4in4 na(3) e3.
Sa3kan4ni1ku3u3tan3ni1xi'1i1ta1ta4u3ni2kan4ka4chi2 na1nda4tu'4un4 na2xa'1a4 ra2.
Nda4tu'4un4na1xu13xa3ba3xa'1a4 ra2ndi4sa3kan4i4yo2ko4ndo3historiaxa'1a4ta1kan4ndi4ba143ba'1a3ni4ndo'3o3 ra2ndi4ki3ti4ja'13ni4ña'3a4ka4chi2 na1.
Ya1kan4ba42ndi4na1ku3u2ku4u(4) e4a3sa3ki3ti4na4nda13ti'3bi3nda3a2na1yu4bi24yo4o4ndi4na1yu4bi24chi1tun3ndi4a3sa3 na(2) e2chi1tun3ji'4in4ba3tu(3) e4ndi4chi3ñu3kan4sa14kwa'3a3ba3na1kan4.
Tan3na1nda'4bi2ndo4ni'3i3yo4o4ndi4na1kan4ndi4ja1i3in3ku4u4ba3na1kan4.
Ya1ku4u(4) a2ndu3kwa4ñu3ba(3) e4ba42nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2na1ña1a4.
A1be3ran4,ya1kwe4nda2tan3nu4mi24tan3tu1xu'4u2 e4tan3
Kwi3i3ko3ndo'3o(3) e4i3in(3) a2kwa4ñu3ba3kwi3i3,kwi3i3ta1bi1carruyo4o4ba3kwi3i3.
A1be3,kwi3i3ta1bi1carruyo4o4kwi3i3,ya1kan3,kwa'1an(1) e4sa3kan4tan3su1kun(1) e4ka'1nu1xu4mi4ba(3) e4tin3ja1kwe'1e1ba42kan4ji'4in4ba(3) e4ja1ki13xa3a4 e2ni1ndo1o3 a2xa4xi24 a2yo4o4ba3xa143,
ya1kan3,xa4ku(3) e4ji'4in4ba(3) e2ndi4ya1u'1bi1ba42,tan42ku4u4na4ni1ta'1nu1ba42tin3a4lu3u3ka'4un13ya1ña1a4.
An4ta1ndu13kwa4ñu3ku4u(4) e4ja'13nda2xu4mi4tu(3) e4tin3a4lu3u3ka'4un13mi4i4ta'4nda1,a1chi1ndi4su14u3si3ki2ba42ndi4ya1kan4ndi4ya1ka'4an2ba'1a3 ra2ji'4in4ba42tin3,i3kan4ba42ndo4ko3o4 na(2) e2ku4u4ña1ba'14a4ji'4in(4) o4.
Tan3ti1xin3 a2ku14ni2 o4ku3u2 e4tin3nda'4bi2ku4u(4) e4ndu4ku(4) e4na1yu4bi24na4a3sa3 na(2) e2ma1ni4ji'4in(4) o4tan3nda'3a2ba(3) e4tin3tan3ya1kan4ba42ba'14a4ndo4o13se'1e3ndio4si2na1,na1i4xa(3) e2ma1ni4ji'4in(4) o4nda4kwa3tu3xa'1a(4) e4kan4ndi4ja1i3in3ka'3ni4ba42kan4ba3.
Tan3na1ti'4bi3nda3a2tu3ku3tin3ja1i3nga2ku4u4na1kan4.
Xa1i3nga2ku4u4ta1nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2ndi4,ya1kan3,ta1kan4ndi4ta1nda'4bi2ku4u4ku4u4ta1kan4tan3ndi1ko3na1ku'4u2ran4.
Ndi1ko3na1ku'4u2,ya1kan4ba42ku14ni2 o4ya1nda4a(2) e2ko3ndo'3o(3) a2an4se'1e(3) o4ba42ku'4u(2) a2tan3
ndu3ku(4) e4na1kan4a3sa3 na(2) e2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) o4nda3ti'3bi3nda3a2 na1se'1e(3) o4na4ndi1ko3 a2ko14o(3) a2ko3ndo'3o(3) a2an4ko14o3ya1xa4ku3ba42an4ko14o3ya1ku'4u2ba42an4ko14o3,
tan3ki3xa3a4 na2ka'3mi3 na2so1o4xa'1a4 e2tin3ndu13ba'1a3i3ni(2) a2kan4tin3tan3sa3kan4bi4ndu3ku(4) e4ya1kwa'3a3xa'1a4 e2kan4i3kan4ndo4o13 a2ndu3ba'1a3i3ni(2) a2ran4.
I3kan4ba42ndu3ku3xi(3) a2ran4,sa3ña4 e2ya1ku4u(4) a2ya1xa4ku3ba3an4ko14o3ña1ba143xi4xi3ba42an4ko14o3
ta1kwi42ba143xi'4i(4) a2an4ko14o3tan3,nda1i3kan4ba42nda3ko'3o(3) a2ta1kwi42i3kan4ba42ndu3ku3xi(3) a2ndi4ya1kan4ba42nda'4bi2ku4u(4) e4ji'4in4 na2tan3kwa'3nu3 na2ka4chi2 o4ran4.
Ya1kan4ba42i4xa3 na2,na1nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2tu3kan4tan3ndi4na1nda4sa3ba'1a3i3ni2 na1ku4u4na1kan4.
Tan3na1ku4u4 na2na1nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2ti4tan3xa143xi4ta(1) e1kwa'1an(1) e1tan3ka3ni(3) a2na1yu4bi24ndi4ja1i3nga2ku4u4na1kan4na1kan4ndi4na1ku4ni2ka'3ni4ku4u4na1kan4ran4,a1be3na1kan4ku4u4na1ba'14a4ka4chi2 o4ndi4na1kan4ku4u4na1ku4ni2ka'3ni4ran4.
¿Tan3na1ti'4bi3i3in4tu3ku(3) e4tan3kwi3i3ta3ba4 na2ta1si1tu3ku3tin3?
Ndi4na1kan4ndi4ja1tu3ku3ku4u4na1kan4ndi4a1su3tan42ka3chi2 o4ndi4,
ya1kan3,na1nda'4bi2kan4ndi4na1nda'4bi2ku4u4ku4u4na1kan4ji'4in(4) o4na4tu2,na4nda'3a(4) e4ba42an4ko14o3ko1ndo(1) e4ba42an4ko14o3ti1xin(3) o4ba42an4ko14o3,
te'1e4nu14u(3) e4ba42an4ko14o3nda4a2ka1ba42tan3ka4ndi3ka(2) e2xa4xi24 a2ndi4xa4xi24 a2ndi4ni3ba143sa4ña4 e2kan4ndi4ya1xa4xi24sa3kan4ba42kan4tan3
ya1kan4ba42ndi4ndu3ku(4) e4i3in3na1nda'4bi2a3sa(3) e2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) o4tan3ti'3bi3 na2nda'3a(4) e4tan3ta3ba4 na2,su3ndi4ki3ta3ti1ndo4o24ba3su3ndi4ki3ta3yu1u4ba3
su3ndi4ki3ta3ti1su'3ma2ba3su3ndi4ki3ta3ñu1ñu4ba3su3ndi4ki3ta3,ya1kan3,yu1u4ya3a3ba3nda'3a(4) e4mi4i4ba42ñu'4u4ta1si1ka4chi2 na1,ta1si1ba3ba42kan4ran4.
Ta1si1xi4ta1i3chi4ba42kan4ka4chi2 na1ndi4a1chi1ndi4ya1kan4ba42ko4ndo3ya1na4mi4i4ni1xi1ta1ta1si1kan4tan3ni1xa1a(1) e4tan3ju13ndi3chi2 o4tan3
ja1ña1a4tan3ndu13ndi3kun2ba(3) e2kan4yo4o4tan42i4yo2ya1xi4kun1i4yo(2) a2kan4ndi4xi1kun(1) a1kan4su3u(3) a2nda3nde1ta3 e2nu14u3xa'1a(4) e4su3u(3) a2nda3nde1ta3 e2nu14u3nda'3a(4) e4su3u(3) a2nda3nde1ta3 e2si'1in3ba(3) e4su3u(3) a2,

tan3ndu3su4ku24 a2tu3tu2tan3ku'1un1mi3i4na1kan4ka3ta2 na(1) e1ndi4nda1mi4i4ko14o3xi4ka3nda1mi4i4ko14o3xi4to3i3kan4kwi1ta(1) e1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ka3ti4ndi4kwa'1a4 ni42na1yu4bi24ka4ti1in3ndi4ki3nde3e4na4na1kwa'1an1xa'1a4ku4u4 na2ka4chi2 na1ya1kan4ndi4i3in3mi4i4ko14o3xa'4an1i3kan4kwi1ta(1) e1ya1kan4ba42ndi4na4ja1ni1ke3e3ta'3an(2) e2kan4kwa'1an(1) e1tan3kwa'1an(1) e1ndi4
ni3su14u3ja14(3) e2ndi4ni1ke3e(3) a2kan4tan3nu4mi24sa4ka2 ni42bi4,ya1kan3,ndi1kun1ndi1ko(3) e4ndi4ya1ku'4u2sa3kan4ku4u4ba(3) e2mi4i4ku'4u2tan3kwe4e2ku4u4
i3in3tan42ni3ji14ni2 o4tan3kwa'1an1ni1nu3u3ba3mi4i4ku'4u2ndi4ya1ja1kwa'1an1ku4u4ba3kwe'1e1ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1kan4ba42ka4chi2 na1nda'4bi2ku4u4 na2ti'4bi3 na2,na1ti'4bi3ku4u4na1kan4ran4.
Na1kan4ku4u4na1ka4chi2 o4na1ti'4bi4nda14ku2ndi4ya1ta4ba4na1kan4ba42an4yu1u4ba42an4ti1su'3ma2ku4u4 ri4an4ko14o3ti1ndo4o24ku4u4 ri4ndi4i3in3ti4kan4ku4u4ti4ta3ba4 na2ran4.
Tan3sa3kan4ba42ndi4nu3u3kwi3ñu3mi4i4ka4ndi3ka(2) e2ndi4kwi3ñu3jo4ndo13 a2kan4.

A1be3,a4su3ndi4ya1kan4ndi4na4tu2ya1nda'3a4yo4o4ka4ndi3ka(2) e2an4ko14o3xa'1a(4) e4ka4ndi3ka(2) e2tan3
ndi13ki'3in3mas4tru2tan3ja'1an1ko'1ni3 ra(2) e2na4,na4ka3ti4ba42tan3chi13nde3e3 ra(2) e2ka3ti4tan3i3nga2bi4na1ta'4an(4) e4na1xa1a1tin3na1kan4ku4u4na1ndi3kwi1kun1tu3ku(3) a2kan4ndi4ya1kan4ku4u4kwe'1e1xi4kun1ran4.
A1be3,kwe'1e1xi4kun1ba42ndi4ya1ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4ba42kan4,a1be3ya1kan4ba42ka4chi2 na1ndi4
i4yo2ta1ti'4bi3ndi4ta1ti'4bi3kan4ndi4ja1i3in3nu14u3ti'4bi3mi3i4ba3ta1kan4ndi4ni3na4ti1xin(3) o4ba42ku'4u(2) a2tan3ti'3bi3ta1kan4tan3tu'3un3ba3ta1kan4ki3ti4ti4ka4ndi3ka2ti4ja4xi24,
an4yu1u4ba42an4,ya1kan3,ndu1u4ba42an4ko14o3,ya1kan3,ti1ndo4o24ku4u4 ri4an4ko14o3ti1su'3ma2ku4u4 ri4i3in3ti4kan4ku4u4 ri4tu'3un3 ra2mi4i4xa4xi24 a2kan4tan3i3kan4kwe4e2sa3kan4tan3xi4nu3kwe'1e1kwa'1an(1) e1.
Ya1kan4ba42ka4chi2 na1ti'4bi3 na2ndi4na1ti'4bi4nda14ku2ku4u4na1kan4,tan3ta1,ta1nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2tu3ku3kan4ndi4ja1tu3ku3ku4u4ta1kan4,ta1kan4ndi4ta1ja1ku4ni2ka'3ni4ku4u4ta1kan4.
Ta1nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2tu3ku3tan3ndi1ko3tu3ku(3) e4ndi4xa1tu3ku3ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4ta1kan4ndi4ta1ku14ni2ku4u4ta1kan4ku3u2 e4ndi4chi4ka2 ra1nde3e4ji'4in(4) o4tan3nda'3a2 e4ya1kan4ba42ya1ji'4in4tu3ku3i3nga2 ra1kan4.
¿Tan3an4ki3ti4ta4ku1bi4ke4e4mi4i4ti'4bi3 na2kan4?
Ti4ke4e4ku4u4 ri4ka4chi2 o4ran4,ti4ke4e4ta4ku1ku4u4 ri4a1chi1ndi4ya1,ta1kan4ndi4ta1nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2,na4tu2ya1yo'4o4tan3nda3a3kwi3ñu3ka1a3kwa'3nu(3) a2ko3ndo(3) a2i3in3ta1si1tan3
ka1a3ku3ndu'4u4yu'3u4ta1kan4ti'3bi3 ra2,su3u3 ra2ndi4ki3ta'4ni3 ra2ti1su'3ma2ton4,su3u3 ra2ki3ta'4ni3 ra2ti1ndo4o24ton4,su3u3 ra2ki3ta'4ni3 ra2yu1u4ya3a3ko3to(3) on4,
su3u3 ra2ki3ta'4ni3 ra2ndu1u4,ba1xi3ndi4ndu1u4ti1ndi'4i4ka1chi4ka4chi2mi3i(4) o4kan4ya1kan4ba42ka4ndi3ka2tan3tu'3un3 ra(2) e2ton4.
I3in3tan42ni3ku14ni2 o4tan3nu3u3mi3i4ba3nda'3a(4) e4tan42nda'3a(4) e4so'3o3na4tu2ja1ya1kan4ni1na3ñu(3) a2tan3nu3u3mi3i4ba(3) e2kan4.
A1chi1ta1kan4ndi4ta1nda'4bi2ku4u4ku4u4ta1kan4ti'4bi3 ra(2) e2tan3ki3ta3ya1ko4ndo3kwe'1e1.
Tan3ni3su14u3ta1ka'3mi3so1o4ku4u4ta1kan4be'3e3xi1i4xa'1a(4) e4ndi4ta1kan4ndi4i3in3nu14u3ti'3bi3ta1kan4tan3ndi13kwi3so3 ra(2) e2chi13nde3e3 ra(2) e2nu14u3tu3tu2tin3,tu3ku3xia4an4an4ko14o3,
na4tu2ka1a3ku4u4tu3ku(3) a2tan3ti'3bi3tu3ku3 ra(2) e2tu3ku3sa3kan4i3nga(2) e2ki3ta'4ni3 ra2ti'13bi3 ra2tu3ku3sa3kan4i3nga(2) e2,an4u1ni(1) a1tu'13un3 ra2ka1a3tin3i3nga2xia4an4mi4i4ku'4u2tu3ku3tin3a1chi1ndi4tan3yo'4o4tan3kan4ba3ku'4u2na4ja1ku'4u2tin3tu3ku3kan4ti'3bi3 ra2tin3,
na4i3kan4tu'3un3 ra2ti4ti1ndo4o24an4i3kan4tu'3un3 ra2ti1su'3ma2tin3ya1kan4ku4u4ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ji'4in4ta1kan4.

Yoloxóchitl.
Yo'4o4ta3ba4 2i3nga2kwen4tu2xa'1a4ta1sa1bi4,ndi4ya1kan3,
ta1sa1bi4ndi4ta1kan4ndi4ta1ja4chiu4un4ku4u4ta1kan4tiem4pu2ja4chiu4un4 ra2ndi4xa'4nda2 ra1ku'1u1tan3
ka14sa3 ra2ndi4ta1xu4xan3ku4u4ta1kan4ku14ni2ta1kan4ja3chiu4un4 ra3,be'3e3i3ta2an2i3ta2an2i4yo2 ra1.
Tan3ndi4,ya1kan3,ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4bi3tin3ndi4na4ku'1un(1) o4ndi4i3kan4
ka'3nda2 e4ndi4i3kan4ku'1un1 ndu1xa1xa1ku'1u1tan3ku'1u1kan4ndi4kwa'1a4 ni42ba42tan3i3kan4ka'3nda2 on4ji'4in4 ndu3.
"Ba'1a3ku'1un1ba3yo4o4ndi4,ya1kan3,ta1ku4ni2ka'3nda2ku4u4ba(3) 2",ka4chi2,ka4chi2ta1xi1i4so'3o3.
Ji'4in4si1so3 ra2i3kan4ndi13ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1 na1xa1a1 na1kan4ndi4ka'4nu3 lu3ku'1u1ka4ndu'3u4ka'3nda2 na1.
Ni1ya14kun2ta1,ta1sa1bi4kan4i3tun4ndi4,yo'4o4ji3ndi3ko4yo'4o1tan3yu'1u1ndi4yo'4o4ka3ta1bi1 yu1ku'1un(1) i1yo'4o4ka'3nda2 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1kwa'1a4chi'3i(3) o4ku4ni2 yu1.
"Ba'1a3na4sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,yo'4o4ndo1o3yu'1u1".
Ja143ni1xa1a1ta1xi1i4tan3ta1kan4ndi4ni1chi3ndu'4u4ti4ta1kan4ku3tu2tan3nda13ka3ndu'4u4ta1kan4ki4xin1ba3ta1kan4su14u3ta1ndi4ni2ka'3nda2ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4ta1ki4xin1ku4u4ta1kan4.
A1su3ku3tu2chi13ndu'4u4 ra2ya1nu14u3xa1a1 ra1kan4ya1kan4ba42i4ndu'3u4tan3ni1ta1nda3a2ja143ka4chi2na1kan4so'3o3ndi4,ja1ki13xa3a4na1sa1bi4kan4su4ku4 na2i3tun4nu14u3nda1xin1kan4.
I3kan4ka4chi2 na1,"Bi3tin3ndi4ja1tiem4pu2ko3ko3ba42tin3tan3na1ku'1un1ka'3mi3ku4u(4) e4ki1bi4i3ta2an2ndi4ya1ko3ko3ba43".
"Tan3na1ku'1un1ku4u(4) e4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ta1xi1i4a1chi1ndi4ka14sa3 ra2ku4u4ta1kan4.
"Ba'1a3ku'1un1ba(3) e4ndi4,ya1kan3,ta1ku4ni2ka'3mi3 ni42ku4u4ba(3) 2ndi4ja1i4ndu'3u4ba3nda1xin1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Tan3na1kan4ndi4lu3chi'4i2ja4chiu4un(4) a2chi1tun3ji'4in4ba3 na2ndi4ji4ni2ka4xi3 na2ndi4ni14ja3chiu4un4 ra2tan3ka'4an2 ra1ndi4ta1ku4ni2ka'3mi3 ni42ku4u4 ra3.
I3kan4nda13ka3ka3 na2 ra1kwa'1an1 ra1ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4,i3kan4xa143,ya1kan3,
xa14a3 na2ni1nda3ka3ka3ta1chi4ja143chi13ndu'4u4ba3na1sa1bi4ñu'3u2,ta'3an2ba3ta1xi1i4chi13ndu'4u4ñu'3u2.
Chi13ndu'4u4 ra2ñu'3u2tan3ja143mi'14i4lu3lu3i4ndu'3u4kan4ndi4ya1kan4jo13ndo(3) a2kwa'1a4ndi4,i3tun4ku4u4 run4
ya1kan3,xi4xi1 run4tan3kwa'1an1 run4ñu'3u4tan3nda4ka3ti1in1 run4,xa'13mi3 ra2ndi4i3in3ya3a3ya3a3ka4a4ya1a4ta'3an2ba3ta1kan4ni1kwa3a4 ra3.
Ba1xi3 ra2ji'4in4,ji'4in4si1so3 ra2,i3kan4ja143nda13xa2a2 na1ka4chi2 na1ndi4,"Yo3o3ku4u4 ni42ta1ka1a3ndi4
ni3lu3lu3ni14ji3tu3 ra2tan3,tan3ya1kan3,ba'1a3 ni42ni1xi1xi1nda1xin1 ra1,ndu'1u1ndi4ni14xi3in(3) a2ko3ko(3) a2ji'4in4 ndu2ndi4
i'3nu3yo'4o4i'3nu3kan4ni1ki'1bi3ñu'3u2xi1ka3 e2tan3ni1nda'1ba1tan3ni1nda'1ba1ba(3) e2,ya1kan4ji14ni2 o4yo3o3ku4u(4) a2kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1bi4xi1ka4a4ba42",ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4so'3o3ji'4in4ña4si'4i2 ra1.
"Tan3ndi4ya1sa3kan4ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ji14ni2 o4yo3o3ku4u4na1yu4bi24ndi4
ya1kan3,na1yu4bi24ndi4ba3su3u3 na2ku4u4 na2na1ba'1a3ba3tan3yo4o4ndi4ji14ni2 o4tan3
ya1chi1tun3ndi4ba143nda'4bi3bi4 a2kan4a3sa(3) e4ji'4in4se'1e(3) o4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
"Tan3ndi4sa4a24i3ni2 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,ta1xu4xan3ku4u4 ra2tan3ni1ki'3in3se'1e(3) o4 ra2tan3bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,
yo'4o4ki3xi3 na2sa4ndi'1i3ba3 na2ya1sa3kan4su14u3ta1chi'3i3bi4ku4u4ta1ka1a3tan3ku'1un1nu1ni4ji'4in4 ra2tan3ndi4
su14u3nu1ni4nda'4bi3chi'3i3 ra2ya1kan4ku'1un1ndi4nu1ni4ti1su'4un4ka1a3ba3ku'1un1ji'4in4ta1ka1a3",ka4chi2 ra1.
"Ndi4ña1a4ko3to(3) on4sa1a3a3sa(3) on4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4ba'1a3ndi4ja1ka14sa3ba(3) e4ku4u4 ra2ja1ba'1a3tu3ndi4chi13ka2 ra1nde3e4ndi4,ya1kan3,xa'13nda2 ra1xa'13mi3 ra2tin3ko14o(3) a2ku4ni2ka(1) e1".
"Ndi4,ya1kan3,yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ko3to(3) on4sa1a3ko3o3ji'4in4ba3 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ta3xi(3) un4nu1ni4ba'1a3nda'3a4ba3 ra3".
Nda4a(2) e2ba42ta3xi3ta1sa1bi4nu1ni4ba'1a3nda'3a4ta1kan4,ta1kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,nu1ni4ti1su'4un4ba3ba42,ya1kan4ba3ta13xi3 ra2nda'3a4ka14sa3 ra2kwa'1an1.
ndu13ku4ta1,ta1xi1i4na1,na1ta4tu2kwa'1an1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,i3in3ki1bi4chi'3i3ta'3an2 ra1nu14u3ñu'3u4ku4ni2 ra1,ndi4nu1ni4ti1su'4un4ba3ba43.

O4ra2ndu1ta1i3tu2 yu1ndi4i3tu2ba'1a3ko3ndo(3) a2tan3ta1yo'4o4ndi4ya1yo'4o4ndu3ta'3an2 ra1.
"An4,na4tu2sa3kan4ba3ndi4ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4na3ni2ka'4an2 on4ji'4in4 ndu2ndi4ndu'1u1ndi4chi3nde3e4 ndu2yo'4o1".
"Ba1xi3ka1ba(3) e2ko3ndo'3o(3) on4tan3ndi4a1su3 a2kan4ndi4i4yo2 ndu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ndu'1u1ku4u4na1chi3nde3e4yo'4o1",ni1ka3chi2ba3ti4ti1ka4ka3ji'4in4 ra2,sa3kan4ka'4an2i3i2sa3kan4ka'4an2ti1ma'4a2sa3kan4ka'4an2tio1ko4kwa'4a1,

ba'1a3na4a14sa3ya3kwa4 ra2ji'4in(4) o4a1chi1ndi4i3tu2 ra1ndi4ni1i1xa3 na2ndi'3i3i3tu2 ra1ka4chi2 na1ki4xa2a2kwen4tu2nu14u(3) 2yo'4o4",ka4chi2ña'3a4ta4u3ni2si1so3 ra3.
"Ni1i1chi1ba(3) e2ndi4ya1kan4ku4si1i4i3ni2mi3i4ba3 ra2ya1kan4ndi4ni1i1chi(1) a1".
Nu14u3,nu14u3i3tu2ti1su'4un2kan4ba3ku4un4 ra4tan3i3tu2 ra1ndi4ndi4ki3ta'4an4i4chi(3) a2tan3ndi4ko14o3mi3i4bi4 a2ya1ki4xa2a2ya3tin3sa1bi4nu14u(3) a2ndi4ni1xi'1i1ba(3) e3.

"Nda4a(2) e2ba42ni1ke3ba'1a(3) on4ji'4in4chi'1yo4ku3xi(3) un4ndi4ta3xi3nde3e(3) on4 a2tan3ja1ta4 e2kan4ka3ndi3chi2 un4ki1si3tan3ya1chi'1yo4ku4u4ba(3) e2ku3xi(3) un4".
"Ndi4ko1to1sa14na3i3ni2 un4ta3xi(3) un4 a2ku'1un1nda'3a4na1yu3ba(4) on4ndi4na4ko3o3 na2sa3kan4".

ba1xi3,ya1kan3,Xio14Ñu'3u4Kwa'4a1kan4tan3ko4yo13 ra4kwa'1an1 ra4ni1nu1,ya1kan4ndi4ya1i4yo2ku4u4ba(3) e2i3kan4ran4,ya1i4yo2ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4.
Ta'4bi4Tu14xa4Na3a4tu3tin3,¿an4ki3ni3 ni42ka4a4kan4?

Ta1chi4ti4ba3ba42ran4.

¿Sa1a3na3ni4ñu3u2 un4?
Yo'4o4nda3tu'4un(4) 2kwen4tu2xa'1a4ña4ndi3kun2si1i4ji'4in4ta1ndi3kun2si1i4tan3ku3ni2 ndo4sa1a3i4yo2ya1ko4ndo3historiandi4
ña4ndi3kun2si1i4kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,i3in3ta1se'1e3ta1ndi3kun2ku4u4tu3ta1,ta1lu3u3kan4ba3tin3tan3i3kan4

Ña1nu14u3ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ni14nda3kwi3in(3) an4yu'3u4 ra2ya1u1bi1ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ni1xo14kwi1in(1) an4ji4to(3) an4nu14u3 ra2ña1u1ni1kan4ba42ndi4ju13ndi3chi2 an4ni1ka'1an(1) en4ji'4in4 ra2i3kan4ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3:

tan3ya1kan4ndi4su14u(3) a2nde3e4ku4u4bi4 a2kan4ndi4ya1kwi3i3ku3na3ni2ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4na4tu2ndi3xa3ku4u(4) un4ndi4ku4si1i4i3ni2 un4,
nda143i3nda14 e2ndi4na4ku3nde3e4i3ni2 un4tan3ya1kan4ti4ku4u4ndi'3i3ba(3) e2tan3na4ba143ka4a4ku3nde3e4i3ni2 un4tu4u2 un4tan3a1su3ni3kwi14i3bi4ndi4yu'1u1ndi4ka4xi3ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4ndi4
ni3su14u3ya1ko4ndo3i3ki4ku3ñu2bi4yu'1u1sa4na'1a(1) e1nu14u(3) un4tan3ni3su14u3ya1ko4ndo3ya1i3ki4ku3ñu2bi4yo'4o1ku3ni2 yu1ndi4
nda'3a4tan3nda'3a4ti4ba(3) e4ba42tan3sa3kan4ndi4ko3o3se'1e(3) o4na4na1ko3o3ku4u4 na2",ni1ka3chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4,ji'4in4ta1ndi3kun2lu3u3se'1e3ta1ndi3kun2che4e13kan4.

¿Tan3ti4xa14xan4tin3?

¿Tan3sa1a3,sa1a3xa4ku3ti4kan4?

¿Tan3ti4ta1su'4u4ko14o2tin3an4,an4i'4na4ti4kan4?

¿Tan3sa1a3nda'4yu1 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4o4ra2ndi4so3 ri4ndi3i2kan4?

¿Tan3ku3kun42tu3ku3tin3?

i3kan4ba3ni1xa1a1ta1kan4ni1ka3ni3 ra2nda'3a4 ra2tan3ji4to3ta1kan4sa3kan4nda13ñu'4u4tu3ku3ba3i3ni2 ra1.
O4ra2ni1ka3ni3 ra2nda'3a4 ra2nu1na4ba3ye'14e4ndi4la3tun4 lu3ka4a4ti1jin3be'3e3chi2,i4yo2ndi3sa4ku4u4nu14u3ña'1a3ti1jin3be'3e3ña1a4.
Ni1xa1a1 ra1ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,"Amiguna4ni1ki'1bi(3) o4kwa'1an(1) e4tan3ni1xa1a(1) e4nu14u3mesami4i4ka4ndu'3u4yu3ba4 2ndi4kwa14yu'3bi2 un4ku3ni2 un4 ra2yu3ba4 2ku4u4ta1kan4".
I3kan4ni1ki'1bi3 na2xa1a1 na1ña1a4,ka4ndu'3u4ndi3ka3chi3ndi4yo'4o4che4e13ndi3ka3chi3ka4ndu'3u4nda1ni1ku3un3ndu1u4ka'3a4 ri4yu'3u4mesa.ka4ndu'3u4 ri4chi2.
Nda143ya1a1ya1a1ba3ndo13ni'3i(3) a2ña1a4ji1ni4 a2ji13ni(2) a2ndi4ba1xi3ta1ña1a4,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1ña1a4,"Papándi4amiguba3yu'1u1ku4u4ta1yo'4o4"."An3ba'1a3na4tu2sa3kan4"."Nda13ka3ndu'4u4tu3ku3ba(3) e2kan4ka4ndu'3u4 a3.
I3kan4ja143ta'4nda1chi3ñu3ndi4,su3u3i4nde4e4,i4nde4e4na1ñu3u2 e4ka1a3na1ni1xi'1i1a1chi1na1kan4i4nde4e4be'3e(3) a2chi1,i4ndu'3u4ta1ta4u3ni2JoséMaríachi1.
I4ndu'3u4ta1ta4u3ni2Tanchuchi1,ni3,ni3yu'1u1ni14ji3ni2 yu1na1kan4,i4ndu'3u4,ya1kan3,ta1ta4u3ni2,ya1kan3,sa1a3na3ni4ta1ta4u3ni2ni1xi'1i1Yu1u4Ka4ya3kan4.
Nda14ka'3an4tu(3) 2sa1a3na3ni4ta1ta4u3ni2ni1xi'1i1yu1u4ka4ya3,ta1kan4tin3i4ndu'3u4i3kan4chi2.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,ka4chi2ta1ta4u3ni2JoséMaríandi4ta1kan4ndi4ta1ta4ku1ku4u4ta1ta4u3ni2kan4ka4chi2ta1ña1a4,ta1ta4ku1ku4u4ta1kan4chi2,i4yo2 ra1tan3i3kan4i4ndu'3u4 ra2chi1.
O4ra2ni1xa1a1 ra1ku3ndu'4u4 ra2ku3xi3 ra2ji'4in4ta1kan4ka4chi2ta1ta4u3ni2kan4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Ta1lu3bi3hombreku14xi(3) un4ji'4in4ta1sa'4an4ña1a4ndi4
ta1ni1xi3xi3ti4ku4u(4) 2ji'4in4ta1sa'4an4yo'4o4tan3ni1ndo1o3 2i4ndu'3u4 2yo'4o4bi3tin3,tan3na4tu2xi13xi(3) un4ji'4in4 ra2ta1ndo1o3ku4u(4) un4na4tu2xi13xi(3) un4ji'4in4 ra3,nda3ndi3ko(4) on4ku'1un(1) un4ndi4
nda143ji1na'1ñu(1) un4ndi3ko4ku'1un1tan3mi3i(4) un4ndi4yo'4o4ndo4o1(3) on4".Ya1kan4ni14xi3in3 ra2ku3xi3 ra2ji'4in4ta1kan4chi2,ju13nde3ta3ya1ku3xi3 na2ju13ndi3ta3ndi4
ni14xi3in3 ra2ku3xi3 ra2ndi4ndi4so3ta'3an2mi3i4 ra2is1ta4ba3 ra3,ja143ka'4an2ta1kan4ji'4in4 ra2,

ja1ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ji1ndi1ki4ja1na(1) e1nda4ndu3ku4 2tan3ka4chi2 un4ndi4i4yo2 ri4ka4chi2 un4ji'4in(4) 2ya1kan4ba1xi3 2"."I4yo2ba3ti4kan4ndi'14i13i3ni2 un4ja'1a4 ri4,ndi4amiguko3ndo(3) e4ku4ni2 yu1".
Ndi'4i13i3ni2 ra1ndi4ji14ni2 ra1nda4a2o4ra2ba42i4ndu'3u4 ra2ti1jin3be'3e3kan4.

xa1ko14o3ka(1) e1ndi4ya1ja1,na1yo'4o4ndi4na1ja1,na1ja1ja4i3ni2ba'1a3ku4u4 na2ndi4na1nda4ti3in3ki1bi4,na1,ya1ko3ndo3ku4u4ba(3) e2ji'4in(4) un4.
Ko3so3kwe4nda2 ni42 na1yo4o4,nda1mi3i(4) o4tan3i4yu'4bi2 o4na4tu2na4ya1,sa4yu'3bi2 na1yo4o4.
Ya1ji'4in4ti4i'4na4kan4.Ko1o4kwi4i24ndi4lu3chi'4i2ka1 lu3ndi4,ya1kan3,kwi1ya1nda4ka(3) e2kan4.
Kwe14nu4ti4i'4na4tu3ku4u4ti4kan4ba3ndi4kwi1ya1tu3nda4ka3ti4kan4ba3ka4chi2 na1,ko1o4ka1ta1ñu'1u3,ko1o4ka1ta1ñu'1u3ndi4ti4kan4ndi4ti4su3tun4so'3o3ku4u4ti4kan4tan3
i3in3kwa'1an1ya1,ya1nda4a4nda4a4i4in4kwa'1an1ya1kwa4an2kwa4an2i4in4,i3in3i4su4ku24i4su4ku24 a2tan3su3tu'4un4su3tu'4un4tan3,tan3ñu'4u4i'3nu3ndi'3i(3) a2ya1ba13lu2ba13lu2ji'4in4ti4kan4,ti4kan4ku4u4ko1o4ka1ta1ñu'1u3.
¿Nda4a(2) e2ji4ni2 ri4?
Ti4kan4ndi4a1su3ni3ji4ni2 ri4kwe'1e1tan3ji4ni2 ri4kwa1chi3ko3ndo'3o(3) e4,ti4ko4ndo3,ya1kan3,ti4ko1o4ka1ta1ñu'1u3.
¿Ko1o4kwi4i24tin3?
Ko1o4kwi4i24a1su3ni3ji4ni2 ri4kwe'1e1tan3ji4ni2 ri4,ya1kan3,ya1kwa1chi3ko3ndo'3o(3) e4.
An4kwa1chi3nda3ba(3) e4ji'4in4an4kwa1chi3ndu14ta'3an2i3ni2 o4tan3chi3ndu'4u4mi3i(4) o4kwa1chi3ndi4kwa1chi3xa1a(1) e4ji'4in4ko3ndo'3o(3) e4ya1kan4ndi4ya1,tan42i4yo2ya1ji4ni2tu3ti4kan4ba3.
¿Kwe14nu4tin3?
Ti4,ti4kwe14nu4ndi4,ya1kan3,na4tu2ja'13ni(4) o4ti4kan4tan3ndi4chi2 o4ji4to(3) e4 ri4tan3

ti4kan4ndi4kwe'1e1,kwe'1e1i4chi1kwe'1e1ya1ku3u2,ku3u2yo4o4na'3a4 ni42ko3ndo'3o3yo4o4sa3kan4ndi4ku3u2 e4nda1,nda1le4ke2 o4sa3kan4ndi4ku3u2 e4na4tu2ni1jo3ndo3ti4kan4ti4ni1xi3i2ndi'3i3 ri4ka4chi2na1ta4u3ni2nda4tu'4un4 na2xa'1a4 ri4ti4,ti4ji4ni2 na1.
Kwe'1e1ta'4a1.

"Ti4nda4tu'4un4ba3ta4ti4ku4u4 ri4ndi4,ya1kan3,i3nga2bi4na1ta'4an4 ndo4ku4u4na1yo'4o4,ndi4na1ta'4an4 ndo4ku4u4 na2tan3na1,na1ba'14a4ku3ni2 ndo4ja'1a4 na2ndi4i4yo(2) a2ko3ndo'3o3 na3",ka4chi2ba3na1ji4to3.

Su14u(3) a2ba143xi4yo13ndi4ya1xi4yo13ba42kan4,ya1kan4ndi4sa3kan4i4yo2ji'4in4ki3ti4kan4,ndi4ti4u1ni1u1ni1nu14u3kan4ku4u4mi3i4ti4,ti4ta'14nu1i'4na4na4tu2ji13ni2 o4 ri4ndi4ba'14a4i4chi3ti4kan4.

¿An4ba'1a3ka'4an2bi4 ri4mi4i4nde4e4na1ku'4u2ku4ni2ku3u2chi1?

¿Ña1ña4tio4ko4tin3an4i'4na4ti4kan4cho4?
Ña1ña4tio4ko4ndi4,ya1kan3,ko14o(3) a2ji4ni2ba'1a3ti4kan4tu4u(2) i2ndi4,ya1kan3,ni1ju3ta'3an2 ni42ba3yu'1u1ti4kan4ja'13ni4 ni42ba3i3na2 ri4ndi4ya1kwe'1e1ba3ti4kan4ndi4ka14ku13i3na2ji'4in4 ri4.

nda1si'14bi3ta3ba4 ri4ka'3a4 e2tan3kwa'1an(1) e1kan4ndi1kun1,tu3ku3 ri4nda3ba3tu3ku3ti3in3,so'3o3ti4a3sa3 ri4,so'3o3 lu3ndu'3u4nda'3a4.
Chi4in24ya1ma'14ñu3ndi4so'3o3so'3o3 lu(3) a3,si4ki'1bi3 ri4si1ki4 a2ya1nu3mi3ti4 ri4 a2tan3ke4e4si'14bi3ka'3a4 e2tan3kwa'1an(1) e4kan4,chi3ñu3kan4ji4ni2ti4kan4.

¿Tan3ba143i'4na4 ri4?
