¿Tan3nda4a(2) e2ba42a3sa3i'4na4ji'4in(4) o4na4tu2i3in3na1be'3e(3) o4ku3u2nda4a(2) e2ba42kwi3i3ku3u3be'3e(3) o4na4tu2,na4tu2,na4tu2i3in3na1be'3e(3) o4ku3u2an4na1nde4e4ya3tin3ji'4in(4) o4ku3u2?
Ya1na4i3in3na1nde4e4ya3tin3ji'4in(4) o4ku3u2ba3,tan3¿nda4a(2) e2,nda4a(2) e2a3sa3ba(3) e4?
¿Nda4a(2) e2ba42ku4u4be'3e3an4nda4a(2) e2ba42,ya1kan3,kwi3i3a3sa3i'4na4ji'4in(4) o4ti1xin3be'3e3ran4?
A1be3,a1su3 a2kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,na4tu2i3in3ndi4ki3ta'4an4be'3e(3) o4ji'4in4 na2tan3mis4tun2ndi4xa4ku3 ri4tan3xi4ndu3ndu2 ri4xa4ku3 ri4tan3xi4ndu3ndu2 ri4be'3e3 na2.
I3kan4ndi4nda1u1bi1ta'4bi4ji14ni2 o4yo3o3ku4u4na1ji4ni(2) a2tan3ji14ni2 o4yo3o3ji4ni(2) a2so'3o3i3kan4ko3to3 na2yo3o3ku4u4mi3i4na1ji4ni(2) a2ran4.
Tan3na4tu2nde3e4,nde3e4ka4a4xa'1a4 na2tan3ka3chi2 na1ji'4in(4) o4na1ji4ni2nda3kwa3tu3ndi4ya'1a3 e2ji'4in4 na2na4,na4nda3kwa3tu3 na2tan3
sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,nu4mi24ndu3ku(4) e4na1,na1ko3to3ka1i3nga2xia4an4tan3na3tu2ba143ba'1a3ka4a4xa'1a4 na2tan3nda3ndu3ku4 na2nda4a2be'3e3yu3ku4ba42ran4nda4a2be'3e3na3mi4ba42ran4nda4a2santuba42kwi3i3,ya1kan3,ki'3in3 na2ki1bi4nda3kwa3tu3 na2xa'1a4na1kan4.
Ya'4a1(3) e3.
Ya'4a1(3) e3,a1chi1ndi4sa3kan4ni1ndo'3o3mi3i4 2ji'4in4se'1e3 2tan3nu4mi24ni1i3xa(3) 2ya1ni4ni2nu4mi24nu4mi24tan3
ni1xa1a1ba(3) e2,ya1kan3,ko3ndo'3o3 ra(2) e2ya1kwa4ñu3chi4chi3nu4tan3ti1xin3 a2ja1ni1xi1yo3 a2ni4ni2kan4ndi4
nda143ni1sa4yu'3bi2ti4 na2 ra1tan3,tan3ni1ka'1an1 na1ji'4in4 ra2nda3ka1tu'4un4 na2 ra1sa1a3na3ni4 ra2tan3i3kan4ni1ka'1an1 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3,i4yo2ba3ki1bi4 ra2tan3ni'4i4 ra2credencialta'4bi4yu3ku4yo'4o4xa'1an1 ra1.
Ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,"Nda3ka'3an(4) on4ndio4si2ndi4ba'1a3ndi4ni1ka'1an1 ndu1ji'4in(4) un4na4ni14ka'1an1ti4 ndu2ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ta1,ta1ja1ni1ndi'3i3ku4u(4) un4nu4u4",ni1ka3chi2 na1ji'4in4 ra3.
Ti1xin3 a2ja1ni1nda3na1ma3 ra2be'3e3yu3ku4ton4,ti1xin3 a2xi1yo3 a2ni4ni2xa'1a4 ra2tan3nda13ndi3ko4tu3ku3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
Tan3ya1ko3ndo'3o3 ra2ku4u4ba(3) e2nu4u4ndi4ta13ku2 ra1ta1ña1a4ni'4i4 na2ba1xi3 na2u1bi1ba1xi3na1ya3kwa4ba1xi3,ba1xi3nda14ku2ni1ke3e3ndi4nda1ta'4bi4kan4ki13xi3 na2tan3ba1xi3 na2nda1ñu3u2ka1a3ju13ta'3an2 na1 ra1i4ndu'3u4 ra2mi4i4ke4e4carru.
Sa3kan4chi4chi3ka4a4 ra2ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ra2chi1,"Na4sa3kan4tan3ko14o3credencialti(4) un4tan3,tan3ta1ji'4in4ñu3u2yo'4o4ku4u(4) un4ndi4
ta1ja1,ta1ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ku4u(4) un4nda'3a4 ndu2nu4u4,bi3tin3ndi4su14u(3) un4ndi4,ya1kan3,kwa4nu'1u(4) un4",ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ni1ni'1i4nde3e4 ra2tan3i3kan4ni1nda'1yu1 ra1nu14u3 na2ndi4,"Nda3ka1tu'4un4 ndo4na1,na1yu4bi24tan3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ka3ni3 ndo4 na2a1chi1ndi4,ka14ni3 ndo4 na2ya1ti1xin3 a2ya1ji14ni2 na1ndi4,ya1kan3,
tan42ku4u4yu'1u1tan3ni4xi14ta3 ndo4yu'1u1ndi4ta1ji14ni2chi4chi3ku4u(4) 2nda4a2xa'1a4ba42tan3,tan3ku3u2 yu1a3sa3 ndo4tan3,ba'1a3ndi4ni1ka'1an1ba3 ndo4ji'4in(4) 2.
Chi13ka2 na1ndia3kwa3so'3o3tan3chi13ka2 na1ndia3kwa3ki13xa2a2 ra1ndi4i3in3 ra2nu14u3 ra2tan3i3in3 ra2ja1ta4 ra2nda1ja1nda143ndi4ta3ba'1a3ti4 na2tan3sa3kan4ni1ka'1an1 na1ji'4in4 ra3.

I4xa14ni2 ra1.

Nda143i3in3sa3kan4ti4ni1ndo'3o3 ra2ton4,na4sa3kan4tan3ko14o(3) a2ni4xi1yo3ndi4ta1ka'3ni4 na2ku4u4ba3 ra2nu4,ka'14an1 na1ji'4in4 ra2tan3ka'3ni4nda14ku2 na1 ra1.
Ko14o3i3in3xa'1a4i4chi3tan42ku3u2,tan42ku3u2ta1,ta1ja1i4yo2ka'3ni4ti4ku3u2 ra1nu4u4,

ja1mismomi3i4 na2tan3xu'14un(4) e4tan3,butaan4ko14o3ni14ke3ba'1a3 na2ji'4in4xu'14un4tu3ku3tan3nda3xo4kwi1in1 na1ku3chia'4an4i3ni2 na1ji'4in(4) o4sa3kan4i3ni2na1ñu3u2 e4ya1ji'4in(4) a2ya1ji4ni2 na1.
I3in3na1ta4yu4,"A3sa(3) on4 a2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2nda3kwa3tu(3) un4xa'1a4 2,yo'4o4i4yo2xu'14un4ña1a4ndu3ku4mi3i(4) un4ña'1a3ja3chi4ñu3ji'4in(4) un4,ña1a4ndo4o13 a2ko'3o(3) on4ta1kwi42bi1xi1ba3!".

¿Tan3nda4a(2) e2ndo'4o4 ndo4ya1o4ra2ji4to3 ndo4xa'1a4 ra2ndi4i4ndu'3u4xa'1a4ndi3ka'3a3,nda4a(2) e2i4xa3,nda4a(2) e2i4xa(3) e2kan4ji'4in4 ndo4?

I3kan4ndi4,ta1ta1xi1i4tan3
ku4u4 ra2ta1nda'4bi2i4yo2yu3ba4 ra2i4yo2si'3i4 ra2i3kan4ni1ji3to3nda3a2 ra1si1si'4i2ta1sa1bi4
ku4u4 ra2ta1nda'4bi2tan3ka4chi2 ra1,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4si'3i4 ra2ndi4ni1xi'1i1yu3ba4 ra2tan3ni1ndo1o3 ra2ku4u4 ra2ta1nda'4bi2
ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4si'3i4 ra2ndi4,"Mamándi4yu'1u1ndi4se'1e3na1kan4ku4ni2 yu1,se'1e3na1kan4ni1chi3ka2nu14u(3) 2ndi4ña4si'4i2 yu1ko3ndo(3) an4".
Tan3na1kan4ndi4ji14ni2bi4na1kan4na4tu2ta1ba'1a3ku4u4 ra2ndi4ba143xa'4a13 na2cuentana4tu2ta1ba'1a3ku4u4xi1i4ndi4
ba3i3in3ta1ba143ba'1a3i4chi3ku4u4 ra2ka4chi2ka'4an4 na3,i3kan4ka4chi2,i3kan4nda13kwi3in3ba3,ni1ti'3bi4 ra2si'3i4 ra2xa'1an(1) en4ka'4an2 en4ji'4in4ta1,ta1sa1bi4ndi4si1si'4i2na1kan4ka'4an2 ra1xa'1a4.
I3kan4ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4ji'4in4si1si'4i2 ra1ndi4,"Hijandi4na1yo'4o4ka'4an2xa'1a(4) on4ndi4ndu4ku4ba'1a3 na2yo'4o1ku3ndu'4u(4) un4,ku3ndu'4u(4) un4ji'4in4se'1e(3) an4".
"Tan3nda4a(2) e2ka4chi2yo'4o1ndi4yo'4o1ban4ka'1an1tu'1un3yo'4o1ko3ndo(3) a2sa3kan4ndi4,ja4ta3nda'3a4 2yo'4o1",ka4chi2yu3ba(4) en4so'3o3.
"Yu'1u1ndi4ko14o(3) a2ko14o(3) a2ka3chi2 yu1,ka3chi2 yu1nda4a(2) e2ba42ka3chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4papándi4yu'1u1ndi4,yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ka'3nda2chi3ñu3".
"I3kan4na4tu2ka4chi2 un4ndi4tu'1un(3) un4ba42tan3ta3nda'3a(4) on4tan3
tan3sa3kan4ndi4nda3tu'4un(4) e4,nda3tu'4un4ba(3) e4kwen4tu2ta3xi3na3ni2 yu1kwen4tu2ji'4in4 na2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku3ni2 o4sa1a3ko3o3ji'4in(4) a3".
I3kan4ja143ni1ndu3ku(4) an4ña4si'3i4 ra2ta1ta4u3ni2xi4kan1ta1ta4u3ni2ndi4chi2nu14u3tu1ndi4ni2.

I3kan4ka4chi2si'3i4 ra2ndi4,"Hombrendo'4o1na1ta4u3ni2ndo'4o1ndi4na1ni1sa4kwa'3nu3ku4u4ndo'4o1,

"Ya1kan4ni1ka'1an1se'1e3 2ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ndu13ku4 2ta1ta4u3ni2ka1a3ba1xi3 ra2ji'4in(4) 2tan3ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1ndi4chi2ka'4an2,ka'4an2xa'1a4yu'1u1ndi4
ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1ka'1an1ji'4in4 ndo4ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1nda3tu'4un4kwen4tu2ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4se'1e3 ndo4ni1ka'1an1se'1e3 2xa'1a4".
"Ndi4ya1ña1a4ndi4ko14o3ya1ku4u4bi4 a2ña1a4ndi4nda3kwi3in3ba3 ndu2yu'3u4 ndo4ndi4ta3nda'3a4ba3se'1e3 2".
"Ni1ka'1an1tu3yu'1u1ji'4in4si1si'4i2ba(3) 2ndi4tu'1un(3) an4ba43",i3kan4ja143,
ya1ka'4an2 e4sa3kan4tan3ni1xa'1a3 na2ya1ma1ni4ndi4ta3nda'3a4si1si'4i2 na1.
Ya1ka'4an2 e4sa3kan4xa'1an1ki'1in3 ra2,xa'1an1ki'1in3 ra2ya1ko'3o3na1ña1a4,xa'1an1ki'1in(3) an4ña1,ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4se'1e(3) an4ndi4,"Hijokwa'4an2 on4".
kwa'4an2 on4ku'1un1ndu3ku(4) un4 a2ya1ko'3o3na1yo'4o4ndi4ndu3ku(4) un4cigarrundu3ku(4) un4lu3te'4ni4ndu3ku(4) un4ki3xi3ji'4in(4) un4".
"Xa1ji4ni2ba(3) on4ndi4,ja1ji4ni2ba(3) on4ndi4ni1ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in(4) 2tan3ni14ka3chi2 yu1kwi14i3ka3chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4

Ta13xi3 ra2nda'3a4ta1ña1a4,"Señorka'4nu3 ni42ko3o3i3ni2 un4ti3in(3) un4 a2yo'4o4a1chi1ndi4
ya1yo'4o4ba42ju4ma1ni4ña4ji'4in4se'1e3yo'4o1ku3ta4tan(4) on4señor,ja3ta4tan(4) on4a1chi1ndi4
na1kwa4chi3ndi4kwa'14nu3mi3i4na1kwa4chi3ndi4ndo'4o4 ni42 o4ji'4in4se'1e(3) o4tan3kwa'3nu3 na3,ka4chi2ta1ta4u3ni2kan4so'3o3ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4ta1sa1bi4".
"Ba'1a3señorba'1a3ndi4tan3nda13i3so3 ra2xi'13i3 ra2ndi1kun1.
"Su14u3i3nda14mi3i4ti4 2ko'3o3ndi4ta1ko'3o3tu3ku4u4yo'4o1ji'4in4ba(3) 2",tan3nda13i3so3 ra2ni1xi'3i3tu3ta1ta4u3ni2ta1,ta1ka'4an2ndi4chi2ka'4an2xa'1a4 ra2kan4.
"Tan3ña4si'4i2 un4tin3,na4ki3xi(3) an4ña4si'4i2 un4tan3,e1ta4na4i3in3tragoka3ni(3) an4tan3ndi4nda3tu'4un(4) e4kwen4tu2".
"Sa1a3,sa1a3ku'1un(1) o4ku'1un1ndi3ko(4) e4ji'4in(4) a2tan3
"Ya1ja4i3ni2 yu1ka'4an2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4,yo'4o1ta1ta4u3ni2ta1ndi4chi2nu14u3tu1ndi4ni2xi'4in4ña4ji'4in4se'1e3ta1a3ndi4
ya1ja4i3ni2 yu1ndi4mi3i4yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ka'1an1bi3ko4xa'1a4ka14sa(3) 2",ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4.
"Tan3nda4a(2) e2ba42ka3chi2yo'4o1,nda4a(2) e2ba42ka3chi2yo'4o1ndi4so'3o3ka'4an2ta1,ta1ta4u3ni2ta1ji'4in4si1si'4i2ndi4
nda3kwa'1a(3) on4se'1e(3) on4nda'3a4 ra2tan3mi3i4 ra2ka'1an1bi3ko4xa'1a4se'1e(3) on4".
"Na4ka'1an1nda14ku2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4señorandi4nda'4bi2 un4ko14o3xu'14un(4) un4".
"Tan3ni1ka'1an(1) on4,ni1ka'1an(1) on4,ni1ka'1an1se'1e(3) on4xa'1a4se'1e3 2ndi4mi3i4 2ku4u4ta1ja4ta3nda'3a4yu'1u1ka14sa(3) 2ji'4in4se'1e3 2".
Ndi3sa3a4 e2tan3ni1xa'1a3i3ni2ba(3) en4kan4ndi4ña4nda'4bi2ban4ko14o3xu'14un(4) an4,ña4nda'4bi2ban4ndi4ji14ni2 an4yo3o3ku4u(4) a2xi14ko(3) an4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ta3xi3na3ni2 an4tu1ndi4ni2ji'4in4se'1e(3) an4.
Ja143ni1nda3kwa'1a3ba3 ra2si1si'4i2 ra1nda'3a4ta1ña1a4,ya1ka'4an2 e4sa3kan4tan3ta1ja1ni1ndo1o3ku4u4ba3 ra2be'3e3 na3.
"Bi3tin3ndi4sa1a3ba'1a3a3sa(3) e4tin3,nda4a2ke3e3xu'14un4yo'4o1ña4ta4u3ni2ji'4in4tu1ndi4ni2".
Ka4chi2ta1ta4u3ni2ta1ndu13ku(4) an4ndi4chi2nu14u3tu1ndi4ni2ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4tu1ndi4ni2yo'4o4ndi4ya1yo'4o4ndi4,
ba143ba'1a3i4yo(2) a2ndi4ni1ndo1o3,ni1ndo1o3se'1e(3) on4nu14u3ta1yo'4o4tan3,ba143ba'1a3i4yo(2) a2,nda4a(2) e2ba42ka4chi2 un4".
"Kwa'1a4na1yu4bi24tan3ba14ja4ndo4o13,ndo4o13ta1a3be'3e3,be'3e3,be'3e3si1so3 na2ndi4
na1si'4i2ku4u4 na2ke4e4 na2kwa'1an1 na1ji'4in4ta1a3tan3bi3tin3ndi4ni1ndo1o3se'1e(3) on4be'3e3,be'3e3si1so3 ra2tin3ndi4
"Ko14o(3) a2a3sa(3) e2ndi4yu'1u1ndi4ña4nda'4bi2ku4u4yu'1u1,ña4nda'4bi2ku4u(4) 2ndi4ko14o(3) a2a3sa(3) e3".
Ja14ta3nda'3a4 ra2ta1kan4tan3,ba'1a3ba3ta1,ta1sa1bi4ndi4i4yo2xu'14un4na1kan4i4yo2,i4yo2ki3ti4sa1na1na1kan4xa'13ni4 ra2ji1ndi1ki4ni1xa'3ni4 ra2ni1ta3nda'3a4ba3ta1kan4ji'4in4si1si'4i2 ra1.
Ja143ni3xa14ku'1u1ku14ni2 ra1ku'1un1 ra1,be'3e3tan3be'3e3i4yo2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4,be'3e3tan3be'3e3i4yo2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4
I3kan4ka4chi2,ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4ndi4,ndi4,"I3ta2an2ndi4
lu14u3na1ku'1un1ki'3in3ku'1u1ku3tu3i3ta2an2,lu14u3na1ku'1un1ki'3in3ku'1u1ku3tu3i3ta2an2ndi4
ndi4su14u3ta1ndo1o3be'3e3ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta1ku'1un1ku4u4 ra2ji'4in(4) 2",ka4chi2si1so3 ra2so'3o3.
Ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4si1si'4i2 ra1ndi4,"Hijabi3tin3ndi4a1chi1ndo3ko2o(2) on4i3ta2an2chi3ndu'4u(4) un4is1ta4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1ji'4in4se'1e3 2".
"Kwa'1an1 ra1tan3ja1ku3tu3ku4u4 ra2kan4",ka4chi2si1so3 ra2so'3o3,ka4chi2yu3ba(4) en4ka'4an2 ra1.
I3kan4a1chi1ndo13ko2o(2) an4ni1ki4tu3chi13ndu'4u(4) an4is1ta4tan3ni1ya'1a3na1kwa'1an1ndi4na1kwa'1an1ki'3in3ku'1u1ku3tu3ku4u4na1kan4.
Ni1xa1a1 na1ndi4kwa'1a4 lu3ku'1u1,i3in3ku4kun3ku'1u1kan4ndi4yo'4o4ndo3o3i3tun4nde4ta3.
Ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ka14sa3 ra2ndi4,"Hijo,ku'1u1ka1a3ku'1u1ka1a3ka'3nda2yo'4o1ya1yo'4o4ba42ka'3nda2yo'4o1".
"Tan3na1ba1xi3ndi4ta'4bi4kan4ya'1a3na1kan4ku'1un1 na1,nu14u3ku'1u1ta'4bi4kan4ku3chi3tu4na1ba1xi3ka1a3".
"Yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ko4ndo3ka14sa(3) 2ndi4yo'4o4,yo'4o4ndo1o3yo'4o1ka'3nda2 on4",ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4ji'4in4,ji'4in4ka14sa3 ra3.
"Ko14o(3) a2a3sa(3) e2ndi4ta1ka'3nda2ku4u4ba(3) 2",ka4chi2ta'3an2 ra1,ka4chi2ta'3an2 ra1ji'4in4xi1i4.
Ni3ji14ni2,ni3ta1kan4ji14ni2 ra1na4ta1ba'1a3ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4tan42i3in3tan42i3in3 na2ndi4ji14ni2 na1na4tu2na1ba'1a3ku4u4 na3.
Ni1ki'3in3ta1kan4ku'1u1tan3ja1xi4tu3 ni42ba3na1kan4xi4tu3 ni42ba3na1ni1ki'3in3ku'1u1,xa'4nda2 na1ku'1u1.
Tan3xi1i4kan4ndi4ba143ndi4ni2bi4ta1ña1a4ndi4nda13ku3na4 ra2xa'1a4i3tun4i4ndu'3u4ba3 ra2,i4ndu'3u4 ra2ni1kwa3a4tu3ku3tu3ku3 na2kwa1nu'1u4.
"Na4ku'1un(1) o4",ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ra3."Na4ku'1un(1) o4na4ku'1un(1) o4,ña1a4nda3xa2a2 yu1bi3tin3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ja143tu3ku3ki1bi4tu3ku3ni1ki4tu3tan3ju13ndu'4u4is1ta4tan3kwa'1an1tu3ku3ba3 ra3,ja143,
I3kan4ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4ku'14un1 yu1,ni3ku'14un1 yu1xa14ku'1u1ndi4be'3e3ba3ku3ndu'4u4yu'1u1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,"Be'3e3ba3ku3ndu'4u4yu'1u1".
I4ndu'3u4 ra2,i4ndu'3u4 ra2ndi4,"Ka'14an1 ndo4ji'4in(4) 2na4ta1ku3tu3ku4u(4) 2ndi4ka'14an1 ndo4ji'4in(4) 2,ni3yo'4o1tan3ka'14an1 on4ji'4in(4) 2,ni3ka'14an1 on4ji'4in(4) 2",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4si'4i2 ra1.
Ja143i4ndu'3u4ba3 ra2,tan3na1ni1ki'3in3ku'1u1kan4ndi4xa'4nda2 ni42na1kan4ku'1u1.
Na1ndi'4i13ba'1a3i3ni2ku4u4na1kan4ndi4xa'4nda2 ni42 na1ku'1u1,i3kan4ka4chi2si1so3 ra2ndi4,ka4chi2ta1si1so3 ra2ndi4:
"na4chu3ba42ndi4ni1ki'3in3 ra2ku'1u1tan3i4ndu'3u4 ra2be'3e3,na4ku'1un1 ra1ku3tu3 ra2ndi4na4ji4ni2 yu1ndi4sa3kan4ka4a4 ra2ndi4ni3ta14xi3bi4 2yo'4o1nda'3a4 ra2",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4si1si'4i2 ra1.
"Na4ji4ni2 yu1ndi4ta1xu4xan3ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta14xi3bi4 2yo'4o1nda'3a4 ra2",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4si1si'4i2 ra1.
"Ndi4yu'1u1ndi4ko14o(3) a2ji4ni2 yu1,ko14o(3) a2ji4ni2 yu1papándi4yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ja'13nda2chi3ñu3,tan3an4ji4ni2 un4ndi4sa3kan4ka4a4 ra2tan3,ji14ni2 o4sa1a3i4in4na1yu4bi24i4yo2 na1tan3,ba'1a3 ni42na1yu4bi24ka4chi2ka'4an4yo4o4".
"Ko14o(3) a2a3sa(3) e2ndi4,ko14o(3) a2a3sa(3) e2ndi4ña4ja1i4ndu'3u4ku4u(4) 2ji'4in4 ra3",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
"Na4tu2nda4a(2) e2ka'4an2yu3ba(4) e4ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ndi'14i13i3ni2yo'4o1ña4ku3xi3ku4u4ba3yo'4o1",ka4chi2 ra1.
I4ndu'3u4 ra2be'3e3i4ndu'3u4 ra2be'3e3ja143ka4chi2 ra1,"¿Nda4a(2) e2ka4chi2yu3ba(4) e4ji'4in(4) un4?"."Ka4chi2yu3ba(4) e4ndi4ta1ku'1un1ku3tu3ku4u(4) un4chi2".
"Na4,ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4 ra3,na4ndi'14i13i3ni2 ra1ku3ni2 ra1yu'1u1ndi4ku'1u1kan4ndi4ya1ta'1nda1ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.I3kan4xa143ndi4
ni1ta1nda3a2ba3tiem4pu2ña1,ña1ko3ko3ku'1u1kan4tan3sa3kan4ka4a4ba3ku'1u1kan4i4ndu'3u4 a3.
I4ndu'3u4ni4i4i4chi3nda1xin1,i4ndu'3u4ni4i4i4chi3ku'1u1ndi4ta'14an2ta'1nda(1) e1,i3kan4ka4chi2,ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4
"nda4a2o4ra2ba42ku3tu(3) un4na4ta1ku3tu3ku4u(4) un4",ka4chi2ña4si'4i2 ra1ji'4in4 ra3."Na4tu2ji4ni2 un4ndi4ke14ta(3) on4ku3tu(3) un4tan3ba'1a3na4ndo1o3mi3i4 a2ku3ndu'4u4 a3,yu3ba4 2ndi4ta1xi4kwe'1e1 ni42ku4u4 ra3".
Ka4chi2 an4,ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra3."Ndi'14i13i3ni2 ra1ku3ni2 ra1 yu1,i3in3ki1bi4ti4ba3ka'3nda2 yu(1) a1kan4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Tan3na1,na1ñu'4u4ya3tin3sa3kan4ndi4sa14ndi'3i3na1kan4ku'1u1xa'13nda2 na1ja1xa'13mi3na1kan4tan3
ni14xi3in3nda1xin1na1kan4ko3ko3ba'1a3 e2ndi4yo'4o4tan3kan4ni1ki'1bi3ñu'3u2ma'14ñu3nda1xin1ni1ndo1o3ndi'3i3i3tun4ku4u4 run4ndo1o3ndi'3i3ndu3ku2ku4u4 run4,ni14xi3in(3) a2ko3ko(3) a3.
Ni14xi3in3nda1xin1na1kan4ko3ko(3) a2ndi4i3kan4ka4chi2,ka4chi2tu3ku3ta1sa1bi4ji'4in4si1si'4i2 ra1ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4
hijaan4ta1ku3tu3ku4u4 ra2an4ta1ku14tu3ku4u4 ra3,bi3tin3ndi4ja1ya'4a13 ni42tiem4pu2ba42ndi4su14u3yo1o4ta'1nda1ku'1u1ba42tin3ndi4ja1yo1o4chi'3i3 na2ba42tin3",ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4.
Ka'4an2tu3ku(3) an4ji'4in4ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"So'3o3so'3o3ka'4an2yu3ba4 2ji'4in(4) 2ndi4na4tu2,na4tu2ka'14nda2 on4ku'1u1kan4tan3na4ndo1o3mi3i4 a2ku3ndu'4u4 a3",ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4.
"Ndi'14i13i3ni2 un4i3ta2an2sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un(1) i1ka'3nda2 yu(1) a1",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4.Ni1ki4tu3tan3nda13chi3ka2 ra1machititan3kwa'1an1 ra1.
Kwa'1an1 ra1ni1xa1a1 ra1mi4i4ba42i4ndu'3u4nda1xin1,mi4i4i4ndu'3u4ku'1u1kan4ndi4,ba14sa4ka4a4ko3ko(3) a2ka3chi2 o4ndi4
ja143nda13ka3ya2nda13ka3ya2 ra1mi'14i4tan3ja143tan3ni1ta3ba4 ra2ñu'3u2tan3ni1si3ka4na3 ra2ka'3a4mi'14i4kan4tan3nde3e4ju13ndi3chi2ñu'3u2ni1nu3ndi4
ndi4nda1ku'1u1nda1i3tun4xi4xi1,ndi4si4so1kwa'1an1 run4ñu'3u4tan3si4so1kwa'1an1 run4ñu'3u4ndi4ndu4ndi3chi2ti1ka1chi1ndi4nda143si4so1ti4ku4u4.
Ndi4nda'4yu1sa1bi4ñu'3u2ndi4,ndi4lu14u3xi4xi1ku'1u1,ndi4,ni1ke3ta3 ra2ndi4chi2 ra1nda1kan4ndi4chi2 ra1.
Ya1i3in3o4ra2ndi4,i3in3o4ra2tan3u1bi1o4ra2ndi4ni1ku3ta4xin24,ni1ndi'3i3ba3ku'1u1xa'13mi3 ra3.
Ndi4ba'1a3 lu3xi1xi1nda1xin1 ra1,ndi4nda1,ku'1u1i'4i3ba42tan3i3tun4tun4i'4i3ku4u4 run4tan3ni1xa'3mi3 ra2 run4xi1xi1ndi'3i3 run4.
Ndi4la3tun4 lu3ka4a4nu14u3nda1xin1 ra1,i3kan4ni1ke3e3ta1sa1bi4ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1,ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1nda1xin1 ra1.
na4ku'1un1 ra1,na4ku'1un1nu14u3 ra2ndo3ko3to3 ra2ndi4,mi4i4ba42i4ndu'3u4ku'1u1ka'3nda2ta1xi1i4ndi4ko14o3ka1ku'1u1.
Ya1ja1ni1xi1xi1ba3ba42kan4ndi4nda143ya3a3ti4ka4a4nde4e4,nde4e4ya1a4,i3kan4ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4ndi4:
"bi3tin3ndi4tan42ta1yo'4o4ndi4ni1i3xa3 ra(2) e2chi1tun3ji'4in(4) o4tan3bi3tin3ndi4nda3ndu3ku4tu3yo4o4mañaji'4in4ba3 ra2ndi4
bi3tin3ndi4ta1yo'4o4ndi4ba'1a3 ni42xa'13mi3 ra2nda1xin1 ra1tan3bi3tin3ndi4,tan3yo4o4ndi4ni14xi1xi1ba'1a3nda1xin(1) o4",ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4so'3o3.
"Bi3tin3ndi4nda4a2ba42ji4ni2 ra1ku'1un1 ra1,a1su3yo'4o4i4yo2ba3 ra2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4.
O4ra2ta1nda3a2tiem4pu2,ja1ta1nda3a2tiem4pu2ya1chi'3i3 ra2tan3,ni1chi'3i3ndi'3i3ba3ta1sa1bi4.
Chi'13i3ndi'3i3ta1ña1a4nu1ni4ba42ti1kin4ba42ndu3chi4ke3ke3re3ke42ba42ya1ndu3chi4i3tu2ba42,ti1kin4,
ti1kin4ka4chi2 o4ti1kin4chi4nga14ba2,ti1kin4ti1kin4chi4nga14ba2kan4ndi4ti1kin4kwe4nda2na1sa1bi4ba42kan4.
I3kan4ja1ni1ndi'3i3ni1chi'3i3 na2kan4tan3i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4si'4i2 ra1ndi4
i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4si'4i2 ra1ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4kwa'4an2 on4,kwa'4an2 on4tan3ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4yu3ba(4) e4ndi4tu4u2 yu1ndi4ni1ndo1o3ta3ta2ni1chi'3i3 ra3,
ni1ndo1o3ta3ta2ni1chi'3i3 ra2tan3ya1kan4ndi4na4tu2ni1ndo1o3 a2tan3ya1kan4na4ta3xi3 na2nda'3a(4) on4tan3sa3kan4ndi4chi'3i(3) a2",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4si'4i2 ra1.
"Ni1ndo1o3ba3ta3ta2ndi4,na4tu2ku4ni2 ra1ta3ta2ndi4i4yo2ba3ta3ta2",ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4.
Ni1ndu3ku4,ndu13ku4ba3ña4si'4i2ta1sa1bi4ndu3chi4,ndu3chi4yu3ku4ba3,
ni3na3ya1ba'14a4ta3ta2ba'14a4ta13xi3 ra2nda'3a4si1si'4i2 ra1,nu1ni4,nu1ni4,nu1ni4kan4ndi4su14u3nu1ni4ba'1a3ba42ndi4nu1ni4yu3ku4ba42kan4.
Ndi4ti1kin4ba42ndi4ti1kin4chi4nga14ba2ta13xi3 ra2kwa'1an1,"Ya1yo'4o4ba42ni1ndo1o3ni1chi'3i3yu3ba4 ndo4,ya1yo'4o4ba42ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4"ka4chi2,ka4chi2si'3i(4) an4so'3o3.
"Ba'1a3ba3,na4tu2ya1yo'4o4ni1chi'3i3 ndo4tan3ya1yo'4o4ba42ku'1un1ji'4in4ba(3) 2",ka4chi2so'3o3,ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4si'3i(4) an4.
I3kan4ni1ki4tu3tan3ju13ndu'4u4is1ta4tan3kwa'1an1 ra1,kwa'1an1 ra1chi'3i3 ra2,ja143xi4ka3 ra2chi'4i4 ra2chi'4i4 ra2,chi'4i4 ra2tan3mi4i4kwa'1an1ti1kin4mi4i4kwa'1an1ndu3chi4i3tu2mi4i4kwa'1an1,
lu14u3xi1ka3 ra2chi'13i3 ra2tan3chi'13i3ndi'3i3 ra3,o4ra2ta1nda3a2tiem4pu2ki3xa2a2sa1bi4yo1o4abrilki3xa2a2sa1bi4,
mi3i4xa'1a4yo1o4mayutan3nda'1yu1sa1bi4ta'4bi4kiu'4un4,nda13nda'1yu1sa1bi4ta'4bi4la3ma42.
Ndi4ku4si1i4i3ni2 ra1ndi4ku4si1i4i3ni2 ra1ndi4chi'13i3ndi'3i3 ra2ti1kin4chi'13i3 ra2ndu3chi4chi'13i3 ra2.
Ndi4ña1ba'1a3ba42ni1chi'3i3 ra2ka4chi2mi3i4 ra2ran4,tan3su14u(3) a2ba'1a3ba42ni4chi'3i3 ra2ndi4ni3na3ta3ta2yu3ku4ba3chi'13i3 ra3.
I3kan4ka4chi2,ta1nda3a2o4ra2ku3un3sa1bi4ña1a4ndi4in3ka4chi1ni1ku3un3sa1bi4ña1a4ndi4,la3tun4ndu1ta1i3tu2ta1sa1bi4ndi4
ni3na3i3tu2ba'1a3ku4u4ndi'3i(3) a2ndu1ta1nu14u3nda1xin1ta1kan4,i3kan4ni1ke3e3 ra2ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1,ta1xi1i4ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1nu14u3mi4i4ni1chi'3i3 ra2ndi4
ni3na3,ni3na3i3tu2ba143ba'1a3ni1ndu1ta1,ni3na3ta3ta2ba143ba'1a3ku4u4ndi'3i(3) a2ndu1ta1mi4i4chi'13i3 ra2.
"Ya1yo'4o4ndi4sa1a3a3sa(3) e4ji'4in(4) a2yo'4o4ka4a(4) e2sa3kan4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,"Ya1yo'4o4ndi4i4yo2mañaji'4in(4) a2yo'4o4nda3ndu3ku(4) e4sa1a3ko3o(3) a3".
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4,ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1ni1kwa3a4nda4tu'4un4 ra2ji'4in(4) an4si'4i2 ra1ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4
na4tu2nda4a(2) e2ba42ni1ke3ta(3) e2,ni1ke3ta3kwen4tu2ndi4ni1ke3ta(3) e2ba143ba'1a3ndi4ji'3na3mi3i4yu3ba(4) e4ni1chi'3i3 ra2ya1ba143ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2,
ya1ba'1a3ta13xi3 ra2nda'3a(4) on4ya1kan4ka3xi(4) un4,tan3ya1ba143ba'1a3ta13xi3 ra2nda'3a(4) on4ndi4a1su3mi3i4 ra2ka3xi4ba(3) e3",ka4chi2,ka4chi2ta1xi1i4.
I3kan4i3kan4tu3ku3ni1kwa3a4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4ndo1o(3) on4,ndo1o(3) on4ka3ndu'4u(4) un4ku1sun(1) un4".
"Ndi4yu'1u1ndi4ku'1un1 yu1,ku'1un1 yu1sa3kan4nda3ndu3ku4 2sa1a3ko3o3ji'4in(4) a3".
Ni1xa1a1 ra1ma'14ñu3nda1xin1,ma'14ñu3nda1xin1mi4i4ba42i4yo2i3tu2mi4i4ni1chi'3i3 ra2kan4.
Ni1nda3ta3an4 ra2is1ta4,is1ta4i4chi1ti1nda1a4tan3kwa'1an1ji'4in4 ra3.
Xa1a1 ra1mi3i4ma'14ñu3ma'14ñu3nda1xin1kan4ju13ndu'4u4 ra2mi4i4i4yo2i3tu2 ra1kan4i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ti1ma'4a2tan3i3i2,
ti4ti1kwe4ku3,tio1ko4,ti4ti1su'4u4,tan42i4yo2 ri4ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4.
Tan42i4yo2 ri4ni1nda3ka3na3 ra2ki3xa2a2 ri4nu14u3 ra3,ndi4sa1na1 ra1ku4u4ti4ña1a4,ta1xi1i4.
Ni1ki3xa2a2ti4,ti4ti1ma'4a2ti4nde3e4ku4u4ti4kan4,ki13xa2a2i3i2kan4ti4nde3e4ku4u4ti4kan4.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ri4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Hombre,¿na4chu3ba42ndi4ka13na(3) on4ndu'1u1?,¿nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o(4) on4ya1kan4ndi4ka13na(3) on4ndu'1u1bi3tin3?,ka4chi2,ka4chi2 ri4ji'4in4 ra3.
"An4ji4ni2ndo'4o1nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o4yu'1u1ndi4,ya1yo'4o4ya1yo'4o4ba42ku4ni2 yu1a3sa3 ndo4 a2ma1ni4ji'4in(4) 2".
"Bi3tin3ndi4chi3nde3e4 ndo4yu'1u1,ya1i3in3ñu3u42bi3tin3chi3nde3e4 ndo4yu'1u1".
"Yo'4o1ndi4ku'1un(1) un4ta3ba(4) on4ya1ta3ba4ndi'3i(3) un4ta3ta2ya1ni1chi'3i3ta1sa1bi4,
ta3ba4 ndo4 a2tan3chi3nde3e3chi3nde3e3chi3nde3e3yu3kun2yu3kun2chi3nde3e3 ndo4 a2kan4".
"Tan3,tan3ku'1un1 ndo4ta3ba4 ndo4,ta3ba4 ndo4ya1ni1chi'3i3yu'1u1tan3bi3ko4 ndo4 a2tan3ku'1un1 ndo4nda3ta3an4 ndo4 a2nu14u3ña'1a3ta1sa1bi4".
"Tan3ya1ni1ta3ba4 ndo4nu14u3ña'1a3ta1sa1bi4ndi4ku'1un1 ndo4bi3ko4 ndo4 a2tan3ku'1un1 ndo4nda3ta3an4 ndo4 a2nu14u3,mi4i4ni1chi'3i3yu'1u1".
Ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ti4ki3ti4yu3ku4,ti4nde3e4kan4kwa'1an1 ri4ta4ba4 ri4 a2tan3ti1su'4u4tan3ti1kwe4ku3ti4ña1a4xi4ko4 ri4 a3.

¿Sa1a3na3ni4ñu3u2 un4?
Nda3tu'4un(4) un4ji'4in4 ndu2xa'1a4ya1ko4ndo3,ya1ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4ku4u4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1ñu3u2kan4yo3o3ku4u(4) a2kan4tan3
ya1kan3,yo3o3ku4u4ta1,ya1ko4ndo3ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1kan4chi2.

Ndi4su14u3i3in3nu14u3ku4u4ndi3ka'3a3ndi4kwa'1a4nu14u3ku4u4ndi3ka'3a3,i4yo2ndi3ka'3a3kwi4in2tan3kwa4an2 ri4tan3i4yo2ndi3ka'3a3kwi4in2ya3a3tan3i4yo2ti4ndi3ka'3a3kwa4chi3tu3ku3i4yo2.
I4yo2 na1ndi4ña1ña4kwi4in2tu3ku3ku4u4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1chi1,i4yo2 na1ndi4ti1ku'4un4chi2,i4yo2 na1ndi4yu1ngui32ku4u4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1chi1,i4yo2 na1ndi4ko1o4ku4u4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1chi1.
I4yo2 na1ndi4kwa14ku3ku4u4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1chi1,kwa'1a4 ni42nu14u3ku4u4ñu3u2is1to'3o2na1yu4bi24,ji14ni2 o4nda4a2ti4ku4u4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 e4,i4yo2 na1ndi4ki3ti4nda4chi4chi2.
Ti4,ya1kan3,ka4chi2 o4ku4u4ta1su'4u4kan4ba3,ji4ni2 o4nda4a2ti4ku4u4 ni42ti4ki3ti4ndi4ti4nda4chi4ku4u4ñu3u2is1to'3o2sa3ba3 na2chi1ka4chi2 na1.

i4yo2ti4,ti4yu3ku4tan3i4yo2tu3ti4ta3ta2ba3ndi4,ji14ni2 o4sa1a3xi13kwa'4a4ndio4si2 ya1.

¿An4ji4ni2 na1nda4a2ti4ku4u4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1cho4?
Ji14ni2 na1.I4yo2 na1ndi4ja1i4yo2 na1ku3u2 na1tan3kwa'1an1 ri4nda4ti'3bi3nda3a2yo1ko4 ri4 na2chi1,ti4ndi3ka'3a3ku4u4ti4kan4chi2.

Tan3¿nda4a(2) e2ko3ndo'3o(3) e4na4ni1xi'1i1 ri4tin3?

¿An4ba'1a3nda4ta3ba4 na2 ri4tan3ka'3ni4 na2 ri4?

Ji4ni2 yu(1) a1,ji4ni2 yu1kwen4tu2xa'1a4ma1xi1kwi4lu3.
Ya1mi4i4ni1ki3xa3a4 e2kwen4tu2xa'1a4ma1xi1kwi4lu3kan4ndi4

Tan3ka4chi2 na1so'3o3,ni1ki3xa2a2tu3un4kan4nda4ka1tu'4un4 ra2nda4a2ba42i4yo2ta1na3ni4ma1xi1kwi4lu3.
Sa3kan4ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ndi4nda1kan4ba42i4ndu'3u4ta1kan4ta1na3ni4ma1xi1kwi4lu3kan4ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
Ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1mi4i4ka'4an2 na1i3kan4,i3kan4ka4chi2,ni1ki3xa2a2nda14ku2 ra1nu14u3ta1ma1xi1kwi4lu3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,"¿An4yo'4o1ku4u4ma1xi1kwi4lu3?"
"Ta1ba1xi3ku4u(4) 2ndi4ta1a3nde3e4 ni42i3ni2ku4u(4) un4ka4chi2 na1ndi4ta1nde3e4i3ni2ku4ni2 yu1ku3si4ki24 2ji'4in4",ka4chi2tu3un4Huehuetánni1ki3xa2a2 ra1.
I3kan4ka4chi2ta1ma1xi1kwi4lu3kan4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Ni3su14u3bi4yu'1u1ndi4nda1kan4ka1ba42i4yo2ta1kan4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.

Nda4a2ba42i4yo2ta1na3ni4sa3kan4,ni1xa1a1 ra1i3kan4nda4ka1tu'4un4 ra2i3nga2ta1ta4u3ni2ka4chi2ta1kan4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"a1su3ku4u4ta1ka'4an2 on4ji'4in4mi4i4ni1ya'1a(3) on4ña1a4ba3ma1xi1kwi4lu3ku4u4ta1ña1a4ba3",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.

Ndi4ba143ka4a4tu4ni1chi4chi3ma1xi1kwi4lu3ndi4ni1ku3xa'1a1mbo3ta3i4chi3 ra2nda143ta'4yu1ta'4yu1ti4ka4a4 ra2ki3ni3 lu3ka4a4 ra2i3in3ni4i4ku4u4nu14u3 ra2ndi4nda143ndi'1i3ti4ndi'1i3mbo3ta3i4chi3 ra3.

"A1su3yo'4o1ku4u4ma1xi1kwi4lu3ba3chi2ka4chi2 na1ji'4in(4) 2,nda4ka1tu'4un(4) 2ja'1an1 yu1nda1kan4tan3ba143ni4xi3in3 na2ku'1un1ka1 yu1ndi4a1su3yo'4o1ku4u4ba3 ra2chi1".

¿Mm,tan3na4ni1xa14ni2 o4ndi4pa3san4tu2xi4ka(3) e4tin3?

Ti4,ya1kan3,sa3a2ti1lan3chi4tin3,¿an4i'4na4ti4kan4?

¿Ko1o4kwa'4a1tin3?¿an4i'4na4ti4kan4?

Ko1o4torotin3¿an4i'4na4 ri4cho4?

¿Ko1o4ta'4nu1tin3?

Ti3in4tin3¿an4i'4na4ti3in4cho4?

¿Ti1ka1chi1tin3?

Ndi4ya1i4yo(2) a2kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ta1,na1nda'4bi2ku4u4na1kan4,ya1kan3,
i4yo2 na1ji'4in4si'3i4 na2tan3,tan3yu3ba4 na2ndi4ni14ku3ni2ko3to3 ra2 na1.
Ya1kan4ndi4,ku4u4 na2na1nda'4bi2,tan3i3kan4ka4chi2
Ni1xi'1i1ba3yu3ba4 na3,na4ka3chi2 o4ji'4in(4) a2ndi4yu3ba4 na2ndi4ni1xi'1i1ba3ta1kan4nda143si'3i4 na2ku4u4ña4ta4ku1tan3
tan3ndi13ki'3in(3) an4i3nga2ta1a3tan3ta1kan4ndi4ku14ni2 ra1ko3to3 ra2na1kan4ndi4na1cuateku4u4 na3,ku14ni2ko3to3 ra2 na1ndi4
na4ya1kan3,ka'3ni(4) an4 na2sa3kan4ndi4ndi3ki'3in3 ra2 ña4ku3ndu'4u(4) an4ji'4in4 ra2ka4chi2 ra1,tan3sa1a3ko3o3ku3u2 na1.
"Ta1kwi42,ya1kan3,ka3ndi3chi2 un4ta1kwi42tan3ta3an(4) on4 na2ti1xin3ki1si3tan3
na4nda3ka'3mi3ba'1a(3) on4ñu'3u2ka'3a4 e2na4ko3ko3ñu'3u2ka'3a4 e2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku3u2 na1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ya1kan4nda13ka'3mi3 lu(3) an4ñu'3u2ka'3a4ki1si3kan4,
tan3i3kan4ñu'4u4na1kwa4chi3kan4ti1xin3ta1kwi42,ni1ta3an(4) en4ta1kwi42ti1xin3ki1si3kan4tan3i3kan4ni1ta3an(4) en4na1kwa4chi3kan4ñu'4u4 na2ti1xin3 ra4.
Ndo13ko3ko3ñu'3u2ka'3a4ki1si3ndi4nda143chi14,chi14,chi14,chi14ti4nda'4yu(1) a1xi4xi1 lu3ñu'3u2ka'3a4ki1si3.
ndi4chi2ki1si3kan4tan3,xi4xi1 lu3ñu'3u2ka'3a4 e3.
Tan3na1kwa4chi3kan4ndi4ta4xin24ñu'4u4ba3na1kan4ka'3a4 ra4ba143ndi'4i13i3ni2bi4na1kan4bi1xin3i4chi3ta1kwi42ñu'4u4na1kan4nu14u3ti4ba3ta1kwi42kan4si4so1nda143pe1le1,pe1le1ti4ku4u4.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4:
"bi3tin3ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3tin3,ka3ta2 on4 na2ñu'3u4ña1a4na4,na4kwi1ta1 na1ñu'3u4ña1a4ta3ji3nde3e(3) on4ki1si3ñu'3u4ña1a4na4
na4ya1kan3,ke3e3 na2a1chi1ndi4ja1ni1xi'1i1ba3na1ña1a4ndu'1be4bi4ta'3an2ba42chio'4o14ta1kwi42ña1a4ja1ni1xi'1i1ba3na1ña1a4nda4a(2) e2nde3e4na3kwi42tu3i3ni2na1ña1a4ja1ni1xi'1i1ba3na1ña1a4!,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ndi4ni1ki'3in(3) an4ki1si3tan3kwe4e2,kwe4e2ni1xa3ni2 an4ñu'3u2ka'3a4 e2tan3
"Xi'1i1ba3na1ña1a4nda1xi4ko1ndi4na1ja1ni1xi'1i1ku4u4ba3na1ña1a4ndu'1be4 ni42ba42ndi4chi2ki1si3ña1a4xi4xi1ñu'3u2ka'3a4 e3,na1ja1ni1xi'1i1ku4u4ba3na1ña1a4".
Ja143ni1ki'3in(3) an4,ya1kan3,ki1si3kan4tan3ta13ji3nde3e(3) an4 e3.
I3in3ta'4bi4xi13nu3ta1kwi42ni'3ni4kwa'1an1 ra4tan3i3in3ta'4bi4xi13nu3ta1kwi42bi1xin3kwa'1an1 ra4,mi4i4xi13nu3ta1kwi42bi1xin3kan4ba3ndi4kun2na1ña1a4kwa'1an1 na1,na1ta4ku1ba3ku4u4na1ña1a4su14u3na1ni1xi'1i1ku4u4na1ña1a4ndi4na1ta4ku1i4chi3ku4u4na1ña1a4.
Ja143ni1ke3e3na1kwa4chi3kan4ndi4xa4ku3 lu3 na2ni1ke3e3 na2nu14u3ta1kwi42kan4.
"Nda4a2ka1bi4ba42ju13chi3tu4na3kwi42na1ka1a3ndi4xi1xi1sa4ka2ñu'3u2ka'3a4 e2tan3na1ta4ku1i4chi3ku4u4 na2ni1ke3e3 na2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
"Bi3tin3ndi4ya1kan4,ndi3kwi3so(3) e4 na2tan3sa3kan4ndi4
o4ra2ke3e3yu3bi2ku3un3sa1bi4tan3o4ra2ke4e4,ke4e4yu3bi2tan3i3kan4ku'1un1ko'1ni3 2 na1".
"Tan3sa3kan4ndi'3i3xa'1a4 na2ba'1a3ka1ta1kwi42na4kwi1ta1 na1ndi4ba143xi'4i1 na1ji'4in4ñu'3u2",ka4chi2 ra1.
I3kan4ndi4ni1ki3xa3a4sa1bi4ku4un4 ra4tan3ku4un4 lu3sa1bi4ni1ki3xa3a4,ya1kan3,ke4e4yu3bi2,
ke4e4 lu3yu3bi2ndi4nda143ka4nde3ta3,ka4nde3ta3ti4nu14u3ta1kwi42ta1ñu'4u4kwa'1an1 ra4tan3
ni1nu1ma1ba3sa1bi4kan4ya1nde3e4ku4un4 ra4tan3i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4na4ku'1un1ko'1ni3 2na1kwa4chi3yu3bi2tan3sa3kan4ki3xa2a2 yu1".
Ni1ndi3kwi3so3 ra(2) e2pa4li4kan4ta13an4 ra(2) e2ti1nda1a4,u1bi(1) a1sa3kan4ta13an4 ra2ti1nda1a4kwa'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) a2yu3bi2,ja143ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4tan3
ke4e4 lu3yu3bi2tan3ni14xa'1an1 ra1nda1nu14u3 ra4kan4bi4ku3ndi3chi2 ra1ndi4ya3tin3yu'3u4 ra4kan4ju13ndi3chi2 ra1tan3kwe4e2,kwe4e2ki'13in3 ra(2) e2ba4li4ko'13ni3 ra2kan4.
Ni1ko1yo3ya1ba4li4nu14u3ta1kwi42ndi4nda143ka4nde3ta3,ka4nde3ta3,ka4nde3ta3ti4 a2tan3kwa'1an(1) e1,kwa'1an1ba(3) e2ji'4in4 ra4nde3e4 lu3ta1kwi42i3kan4kwa'1an(1) e1.
Tan3ni14ja'1an1xi4ka3bi4 a2kan4ndi4ya3tin3ti4i4ta'3nu3kwi1yo'1o4nu14u3ta1kwi42kan4tan3ña1a4i4ta3ni3kwi1yo'1o4ko'4o1.
Nda143nu14u3kwi1yo'1o4ña1a4ni1ti1in3ti3kwa'4a2ña1a4nde4e(4) a2,ña1a4nde4e(4) a2pa4li4ña1a4u1bi(1) a1sa3kan4nda13ti1in3nu14u3kwi1yo'1o4ña1a4.
Nda4a2xi4ka3bi4be4la2ñu'1u3,ya1kan3,nda4chi3i(4) an4ndi4ma4ku3xi(3) an4si4ki'1bi3si4ki'1bi(3) an4xi1kun1xi4ka(3) en4.
Nda1u1bi1ba(3) e2pa4li4ndo13ko'3ni3nu14u3xi1kun(1) an4,ku4si1i4i3ni2 an4ta4u3ni2ndi4ku4si1i4 lu3i3ni2 an4ndi4nda3si4ku4si1i4i3ni2 an4ndi4ka13ku3se'1e(3) an4ka4chi2 an4.
Nda1u1bi1na1pa4li4,su14u3sa3kan4ka'4an2 en4na4na1nda13kwi3so3nda'4bi2 an4ku4u4na1kan4ndi4na1ni1ka3ku3ku4u4 na2se'1e(3) an4ku4u4 na2ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 na3.
Ja143ni1ke3e(3) an4tan3ja'1an1ndu3ku(4) an4i3ta2ya3yu3ni1xi14nda2 en4nu14u(3) an4ni1xi14nda2 en4nda'3a(4) en4ni1xi14nda2 en4si'1in(3) an4ndi4
nda143kwa'4a1ti4ka4a(4) en4ji'4in4i3ta2ya3yu3,ni1xi14nda2 en4 e2ya1kwe4nda2ki'3in3na1yu4bi24cuentandi4ña4ka13ku3se'1e3ban4.
Ja143ndi13kwi3so(3) an4na1ba4li4kan4tan3kwa1nu'1u4 na2ji'4in(4) an4nda13xa2a2 en4be'3e3tin3ti13in(3) an4nu4tio4o4na1kan4,ka'4nu3ba'1a3nu4tio4o4ni1ti3in(3) an4i3in3xi4ña4ñu'4u4nda1u1bi(1) a1pa4li4.

is1ta1an1ka1ka4a4tan3ndi13ki'3in3ni3tu3ku3ba(3) en4kwa'1an(1) en4,kwa'1an1ndu3ku(4) an4ndi4ma4ku3xi(3) a2yu3bi2.
Ñu3u42ku4u(4) un4sa1bi4tan3in4ki14tu3kwa'1an(1) en4yu3bi2nda4chi3i(4) an4ndi4ma4ku3xi(3) a2,xi4xi(3) an4tan3nda4ku'1un3lechin.

Ndi4ndi3sa3a4ki1bi4kwa'1an(1) en4is1ta1an1,is1ta1an1kwa'1an(1) en4ja143nda4chi1i4ndi4ma4ku3xi(3) an4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ko3o3lechinko'3o(3) a2pa4li4.
Sa3kan4ndi'3i3sa3kan4ndi'3i3xi4ka(3) en4,sa3kan4ku4u4ndi4ta1nda1ja1ku4ba'1a3ba3na1kwa4chi3kan4,tan3
i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4ji'4in4ta'4an4 na2so'3o3ndi4,bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,ya3ni2ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4,xi'4in4,ya1kan3,sa3a2tu1ni4i2na4ku3ndu'4u4 ri4i3chi4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ya1kan4
tan3ke3e(3) o4ku3si4ki2(4) o4ndi4ta1ja1ku4ni2ku3si4ki24ba3ku4u4yu'1u1",ka4chi2ta1i3nda14ja1nde1e4kan4so'3o3,"Na4tu2ku3si4ki2(4) un4tan3ku3si4ki24ba(3) e4ya3ni2ta1ja1ku4ni2ku3si4ki24ta'3an2ku4u4yu'1u1ba3",ka4chi2ta1kan4.
Ya1kan4ndi4,ja1ku4ba'1a3 na3,ndi13ki'3in3ba(3) e2ta4u3ni2kwa'1an(1) e1yu3bi2kwa'1an1ndu3ku4 a2,ya1kan3,ndi4ma4ku3xi(3) a3,
tan3na1kwa4chi3kan4ndi4ni1ke3e3 na2ki'13in3 na2,ni1ka'1an1 na1ji'4in4sa3a2tu1ni4i2tan3ju13ndu'4u4 ri4i3chi4,
ji4to3 ri4,"Na4tu2ba1xi3ña4ta4u3ni2ji4to(3) on4ndi4ba1xi(3) an4ta4u3ni2nda'1yu1ti(4) un4i3nda14u1bi1ta'4an2ti4nda'1yu(1) un4tan3ja1nda3nde1e3ba3 ndu2nu4tio4o4ndi4
ja1ba1xi(3) an4tan3i3kan4ku14si4ki24ka1bi4 ndu2",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in(4) a2sa3a2ki'13in3 na(2) e2chi13ndu'4u4 na(2) e2i3chi4.Ya1kan4ndi4o4ra2
ja143ni1ki'3in(3) an4ta4u3ni2kwa'1an(1) en4tan3ja143ni1ke3e3ba3 na2ji'4in4yu'1ba1,ta1ja4si4ki24yu'1ba1ta1ja4si4ki24ka1chi4ndi4nda143ya3a3ti4ka4a4nu14u3ndu3ku2ja13ta2 na1yu'1ba1.
Xi1ka3 na2ji'4in4ka1chi4xi1ka3 na2ji'4in4yu'1ba1ndi4nda143ya3a3ti4ka4a4nu14u3,nu14u3ndu3ku2.
Sa3kan4ku4u4 na2ja4si4ki24 lu3 na2chi4tu4 na2ndi4xi4ka3 lu3yu'1ba1nu14u3ndu3ku2i4xa3ta1ja1nde1e4kan4tan3ta1i4xa3xa3ku4kan4nda13ki'3in3ka1chi4ndi4xi4ka3 lu3 na2ji'4in(4) a3.
Xi4ka3 lu3 na2ji'4in4ka1chi4tan3,tan3ni1nda'1yu1ba3sa3a2tu1ni4i2,"Ka3ma2 ni42ko3o(3) on4ya3ni2ndi4nda'1yu1ya3ni2 o4ta1tu1ni4i2na4ku'1un(1) o4nda3nde1e(3) o4nu4tio4o4a1chi1ndi4ba1xi(3) an4ta4u3ni2".
Xi4nu3 na2ni1ke3e3 na2nda13nde1e3 na2nu4tio4o4,
ña1tan3ni1ki3xa2a(2) en4ta4u3ni2ndi4na1ja1xa4ku3sa4ka2ku4u4 na2ko14o3ni14ni2 na1ndi4xa4ku3 lu3 na3.
Xa4ku3sa4ka2 na1ñu'4u4 na2nu4tio4o4tan3ni1ki3xa2a(2) en4ta4u3ni2ndi4sa4a2(4) en4ndi4sa4a24sa4ka2 en4.
"Yo3o3ku4u4yo3o3xi4nu13na1i13xa3 ni42ja13ni1ku3ji'4in4be'3e(3) o4xe3nda'4bi2ndo'4o1ndi4tia'14an2ba'1a3 ndo4ko3nda2a2 ndo4be'3e(3) o4ndi4na1i4ta4ku4u4 ndo4".
"Na1pa4li4ku4u4 ndo4ni1ki'1bi3na1yu4bi24be'3e(3) o4i13xa3 ni42 na1ja13ni1ku3,lu14u3yu'1ba1 yu1lu14u3,ya1kan3,
ka1chi4lu14u3ja13si4ki24 na2ji'4in4sa14ti1in3ndi'3i3 na(2) e2nu14u3ndu3ku2,ni1ti1in3ndi'3i(3) a2nu14u3ndu3ku2ka1a3i13xa3 na2tan3bi3tin3ndi4
ndo'4o1ndi4nde4e4i4chi3 ndo4tan3ni14ji3ni2 ndo4yo3o3ku4u4na1ni1ki'1bi3ka4chi2 an4ta4u3ni2ki13xa2a(2) en4ka'4an2sa4ka2 en4ji'4in4na1kwa4chi3,xa4ku3sa4ka2ba3na1ña1a4ba143ni4ni2na1ña1a4ku4u4bi(4) an4sa4a24ndi4xa4ku3sa4ka2ba3na1ña1a4.
Xa4ku3 lu3na1pa4li4kan4ñu'4u4 na2nu4tio4o4,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 na2ndi4:
"ba'1a3sa4ka2na4na1ja1ba'1a3ku4u4 ndo4xe3nda'4bi2ko3to3kwe4nda2 ndo4be'3e(3) o4,
ndo'4o1ndi4na1i4ta4ku4u4ndo'4o1kwa'1an1ki'1bi3na1yu4bi24i4xa3 na2ja13ni1ku3ji'4in(4) o4be'3e(3) o4".
"Lu14u3i4xa3 na2ji'4in(4) 2ja4ta2ndi'3i3 na2ti1ndu1u4yu'1ba1 yu1ja4ta2 na1ka1chi4ja4ta2 na1,ja4si4ki24 na2ji'4in(4) a3".
"Tan3ndo'4o1ndi4na1i4ta4ku4u4ndo'4o1ko14o3cuentaxa'4a13 ndo4ji'4in4na1yu4bi24kwa'1an1ki'1bi3 na2ku4u4 ndo4na1pa4li4ñu'4u4 ndo4tan3kwa'1an1ki'1bi3 na2i4xa3 na2ja13ni1ku3ji'4in4be'3e(3) o4",ka4chi(2) a2ta4u3ni2.
I3kan4,ba14ja4nda4kwi3in3bi4na1kwa4chi3ndi4na1xa4ku3 ni42ku4u4ba3na1ña1a4,ja143ndi13kwi3so(3) an4 na2tan3ja14ndi1ko(3) an4i3ni2 na1ndi4
nda143pe'3la4ka4a4ka'3a4 e2ke13e3tia14xa2,i3kan4
ni1ta3kwa'4ni(3) an4tio1to1bi3xa4kan4ni1ki'3in(3) an4tio1to1i4chi1nda13chi3ka2 en4ka'3a4 e2ja14nda3i3chi2 an4ka'3a4 e2,nda13ku'1un3ta4xin24 a2ñu'4u(4) a3.
I3kan4tian42bi3tin3ba42kan4tian42i3ta2an2tin3,ni1ke3ta3ni3tu3ku(3) an4kwa'1an(1) en4.
Ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ndi4,"Ndo1o3 ndo4ko3to3kwe4nda2 ndo4be'3e(3) o4na4ku'1un1 yu1xe3nda'4bi2,ku'1un1ko1to1 yu1nda4a2ka3na(3) e2ka3xi4 2tan3sa3kan4ndi4nda3ko1o3lechinchi3chin4 ndo4".
"Nda'4bi2 ndo4na1ku4ni(2) a2kwa'3nu3ku4u4ndo'4o1",ka4chi2 an4,ndo13ko3o(4) an4 e2pa4li4tan3kwa'1an1tu3ku3ba(3) en4.
A1su3ni3yu3bi2kwa'1an(1) en4ndu3ku(4) an4ndi4ma4ku3xi(3) an4,yu3bi2kan4ndi4ka2 en4tan3i3kan4ni1ke3ta3ti(4) an4kwa'1an(1) en4tan3ja143ka4chi2ba3ta1i3nda14ja1nde1e4kan4ndi4:
"ya3ni2,yo'4o1ku4u4ta1a3sa(3) on4 a2ba'1a3ki3xi(3) un4ku3ndu'4u(4) un4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ya1kan4
na4ke3e3 ndu2ku3si4ki24 ndu2na1ku4ni2ku3si4ki24ku4u4 ndu2tan3ba14ja4kwi4i4ke3e3 ndu2ndi4sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ki3xa2a(2) en4ta4u3ni2
ji14ni2 ndu1nda4a2o4ra2ba42ki3xa2a(2) en4tan3ba'1a3na4ja1i4ndu'3u4yo'4o1xi4to3kwe4nda2 on4na4ba1xi3ti(4) an4tan3nda'1yu(1) un4tan3nda3nde1e3 ndu2nu4tio4o4".
Ki'13in3 na2sa3a2ba1xi3ku14chu2chi13ndu'4u4 na2i3chi4nda4a2 ri4ña4ta4u3ni2mi4i4ki3xi(3) an4.
Ja143ni1ji14ta3ba3 na2yu'1ba1ta1ni1ji14ta3yu'1ba1ta1ni1ji14ta3ka1chi4ndi4xi4ka3 lu3 na2ji'4in(4) a2ja4si4ki24 na3.
Ja4si4ki24sa4ka2ba3na1kan4ñu'4u4 na2tan3ni1nda'1yu1ba(3) e2ndi4ba1xi3ku14chu2pi4yu2ba1xi3ku14chu2pi4yu2.
Ja1ba1xi3ku14chu2chi1ya3ni2ka4chi2 na1so'3o3,nda13ko'1ni3 na2nu4tio4o4ndi1ku1nda42.
Xa4ku3 lu3 na2ñu'4u4 na2nu4tio4o4ni1ki3xa2a(2) en4ta4u3ni2ndi4
ja1ja13si4ki24sa4ka2ba3 na2ji'4in4yu'1ba1nda143ya3a3ti4ka4a4nde4e4ka1chi4nde4e4yu'1ba1nde4e4nu14u3ndu3ku2kan4.
Ki13xa2a(2) en4ta4u3ni2ja143ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"Kwa1chi3sa4ka2na1yu4bi24ji'4in(4) o4xe3nda'4bi2,
i4nde4e4i4chi3 ndo4tan3kwa'1an1ki'1bi3 na2i4xa3 na2ja13ni1ku3ji'4in4be'3e(3) o4".
"Ya1kan3,xa4ta2ndi'3i3 na2yu'1ba1ja4ta2 na1ka1chi4ja4ta2 na1i4xa3sa4ka2 na1ja13ni1ku3ji'4in(4) 2,ji'4in4be'3e(3) o4tan3
ndo'4o1ndi4ko14o3cuentaxa'4a13bi4ndo'4o1ndi4na1pa4li4ku4u4 ndo4,ya1kan4ndi4i4xa3 na2ja13ni1ku3ji'4in(4) o4"
"An4na1ja1ba'1a3ku4u4 ndo4sa3kan4ndi4ko3to3kwe4nda2 ndo4be'3e(3) o4tan3na1ba4li4ba3ku4u4ndo'4o1",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
Ndi4xi4kwe'1e1 lu(3) an4ta4u3ni2tan3ja143ndi4kwi3so(3) an4na1kwa4chi3kan4ja4nda3i3chi2 an4ka'3a4 na2ndi4nda143bi3xa4ka4a4ka'3a4 e2ñu'4u(4) a2kan4.
Xa4ku3ki3ni3ba(3) e2ña1a4ke4e4tia14xa2ka'3a4 e2,ja4nda3i3chi2 an4ka'3a4 e2tin3,
sa3kan4ndi4nda3i3chi2tin3tan3sa3kan4ni1ku3ta4xin24yu'3u4 a2ña1a4.
I3kan4tin3tan3ndi13ki'3in(3) an4kwa'1an(1) en4,ndi13ki'3in(3) an4,ndu13ku3ndu'4u(4) an4i4ndu'3u(4) an4,i3kan4ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 na2ndi4
"i3ta2an2ndi4ña4ku'1un1ku4u4tu3ku(3) 2xe3nda'4bi2ndo1o3tu3ku3 ndo4ko3to3kwe4nda2 ndo4be'3e(3) o4na4ku'1un1 yu1".
"Ndi4ta'14an2ba'1a3bi4 ndo4ko3to3kwe4nda2 ndo4be'3e(3) o4tan3ndi4nde4e4ba3 ndo4tan3kwa'1an1ki'1bi3ni1bi4i4xa3 na2ja13ni1ku3,ña4ku'1un1ku4u4tu3ku3ba(3) 2i3ta2an2".
I3kan4ndi13ki'3in(3) an4kwa'1an(1) en4tu3ku3ki1bi4tan3ndi13ki'3in(3) an4kwa'1an(1) en4,kwa'1an(1) en4kwa'1an1,
kwa'1an1nda3chi3i(4) an4ndi4ma4ka3xi(4) an4,bi3tin3ndi4:ya3ni2 o4,
ku'1un(1) o4ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4ya3ni2 o4ta1pa3xa4kwa2sa3kan4ndi4ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ku3ndu'4u4ko3nda2a2i3chi4tan3sa3kan4ndi4
ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ko3to3kwe4nda2i3chi4na4ba1xi(3) an4ta4u3ni2tan3,tan3sa3kan4ndi4nda'1yu1ti4 ra2tan3nda3nde1e(3) o4nu4tio4o4".
Ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1."Ba'1a3ya3ni2".
Ja143ni1ke3e3 ra2ja'1an1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) a2pa3xa4kwa2,nda4a(2) e2ki'4bi3tu3pa3xa4kwa2ndi4i3in3nde3e4ka4nde3ta3 ri4su4kun1 lu3kwa'1an1 ri4tan3kwa1nu3u3 ri4ndu4ku3ndu'4u4 ri4ñu'3u4.
I3in3nde3e4ka4nde3ta3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4ni1nu3ndu4ku1ndu'4u4 ri4ñu'3u4.
Ko14o(3) an4ba1xi3tan3i4ndu'3u4ba3ti4ña1a4,tu3ku3i3in3nde3e4tan3ka4nde3ta3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4nda1ni1nu3tan3ndu4ku1ndu'4u4tu3ku3 ri4ñu'3u4ta4xin24i4ndu'3u4 ri4kan4.
Ja4si4ki24 na2ndi4ja4si4ki24nde3nu'3u3i3ni2 lu3 na2chi4tu4 na2ndi4i4ndu'3u4ti4nda4a2bi4chi2,nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4
sa3kan4ka4a(4) e2pa3xa4kwa2kan4i4ndu'3u4 a2ñu'3u4tan3ni1ya'1a3ba(3) en4ta4u3ni2tan3ni1xa1ñu1ba(3) en4ja1ta4 e2,ni1ku3cha'1mba4ndi'3i(3) a2nu14u3ñu'3u4.
Ni1xa1a(1) en4be'3e3ndi4na1kwa4chi3ba3ja4si4ki24sa4ka2ji'4in4yu'1ba1.
Ja4si4ki24 lu3 ra2ji'4in4yu'1ba1ka1chi4tin3Lu14u3i4xa3 na2nda143ya3a3ti4ka4a4chi4kwi3in3 na2ka1chi4nu14u3ndu3ku2kan4.
Ni1ki3xa2a(2) en4ta4u3ni2nu14u3 na2ndi4,"¡Híjole!su14u3na1yu4bi24ba1xi3bi4i4xa3ja13ni1ku3ji'4in(4) o4xe3nda'4bi2
mismomi3i4ba3yo4o4be'3e(3) o4i4xa3 ndo4ja13ni1ku3ji'4in(4) o4".
"Ja4si4ki24 ni42 ndo4ji'4in4ti1ndi'4i4yu'1ba1 yu1ja4si4ki24 ndo4ji'4in4ka1chi4 2lu14u3i13xa3 ndo4ji'4in(4) 2".
"Bi3tin3ndi4kwa'3a3ndu3ba4,ti3in(3) o4,ya1kan3,ndu3ba4tan3ti3in(3) o4ku13xi2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1 ndo4ka'3ni4 ndo4ki3ti4ku3xi(3) o4ndi4na1ja1ba'1a3 ni42ba3ku4u4 ndo4tan3
ñu'4u4 ndo4be'3e3ja4si4ki24 ndo4,ba'1a3ku'1un1 ndo4ku'1u1ndu3ku4 ndo4ya1ku3xi3ba(3) e4ndo'4o4 ni42 yu1ji'4in4 ndo4ba'1a3ndi4
ja1ku4ba'1a3 ndo4tan3ku'1un1 ndo4ku'1un1ndu3ku4 ndo4ya1ku3xi(3) o4a1chi1ndi4
ni1ndo'3o3 ni42ta'3an2 yu1ji'4in4 ndo4ja1xa'13nu3 ndo4tin3tan3ku'1un1 ndo4ndu3ku4 ndo4ya1ku3xi(3) o4",ka4chi2 an4ta4u3ni2.
Tan3ti13in(3) an4,ya1kan3,ku13xi2tan3ni1chi3ndi3kun2 an4,ya1kan3,
nda3kwa2nu14u3 run4,chi13ndi3kun2 an4nda3kwa2nu14u3ku13xi2ña1a4ku'13ni2 an4 run4ba'1a3i13xa3ku4tu2(4) an4 run4.
Ni1ti3in(3) an4ndu3ba4,tu13xi(4) an4tu1chi3ka2chi13kun2 an4nu14u3ndu3ba4kan4,sa14ti1in(3) an4yu1ma4xa'1a4ndu3ba4kan4".
"Bi3tin3ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3 run4,ku'1un1 ndo4ku'1u1xe3nda'4bi2ndu3ku4 ndo4ya1ku3xi(3) o4",ka4chi2 an4.
Ke4e4 na2kwa'1an1 na1ku'1u1ki3xa2a2 na1ndi4ba1xi3ku3ni4jo2ba3ba1xi3i3su2ba3ba1xi3ji'4in4 na2ku3xi(3) an4ta4u3ni2chio'4o14 ri4xi4xi3 na3.
Tan3,ni3ji14ni2bi4na1kan4ndi4na1xi4ka3sa3kan4ku4u4ba3na1kan4ku'1u1ndu4ku4 na2ya1ku3xi(3) an4ta4u3ni2i4ndu'3u(4) an4.
Xi4ka3 na2sa3kan4ku'1u1ndu4ku4 na(2) e2ku3xi(3) an4ta4u3ni2i4ndu'3u(4) an4tan3i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 na2ndi4
ja1ni1ku3na'3a4ba3xi4ka3 na2ku'1u1xa'4ni24 na2ti1chi4xa'4ni24 na2ndi3kwa4ñu3ja'4ni24 na2ndi3sa4ku4u4nu14u3ki3ti4kwa'1an1ji'4in4 na2xi4xi(3) an4.
Ni3ji14ni2bi4na1kan4ndi4na1xi4ka3nu3u3ku4u4ba3 na3,sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1ku3na'3a4ba3xi4ka3 na2tan3ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 na2ndi4:
"i3nda14ku4u4ku'1u1i4ndu'3u4ku'1u1kwi4i24i4ndu'3u4ta'3bi4,ma'14ñu3ta'3bi4ndi4ku'14un1 ndo4i3kan4xe3nda'4bi2".
"Ko3to3ka3xi4ki3ti4ndo'4o1ndi4ku'1u1kwi4i24kan4ndi4i4yo2ki3ti4xa1tu1i3kan4ka3xi4 ri4ndo'4o1".
"Ya1kan4ndi4ku'14un1 ndo4i3kan4i4nda14yu3 ni42 yu1ndo'4o1ndi4ku'14un1 ndo4i3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,i4yo2ki3ti4xa1tu1ka3xi4 ri4ndo'4o1".
"Ku14ni2 yu1nda4a(2) e2ko3ndo'3o3 ndo4ndi4ba'1a3 ni42xi4ka3 ndo4ku'1u1ndu4ku4 ndo4ya1ku3xi(3) o4tan3
ka3xi4ki3ti4ndo'4o1ndi4,ku'1u1kwi4i24i4ndu'3u4kan4ndi4i4yo2ki3ti4kan4ka3xi4 ri4ndo'4o1",ka4chi2 an4.
"¿Tan3nda4a2i4ndu'3u4ku'1u1kan4?"."Ku'1u1i4ndu'3u4ya3tin3ka1a3ba3ku4u(4) a2ku'1u1kwi4i24ta'3bi4ba42tan3
i4ndu'3u4i3in3sa3ta4ku'1u1kwi4i24sa4ka2,ko1to1ku'14un1 ndo4i3kan4ndi4ko3to3ka3xi4ki3ti4ndo'4o1",ka4chi2 an4.
"Ya3ni2,a4chu3ba42ka'4an2tu(3) an4ta4u3ni2ka1a3ndi4ku'14un1tu(3) e4i3kan4yo4o4ku'1un1ku4u4ba3yo4o4,ko14o(3) a2a3sa3bi4ki3ti4kan4ji'4in(4) o4ndi4
ti4ka'3ni(4) o4ku4u4ba3ti4kan4na4ku3ni2 o4 ri4".
"Ni3ba'1a3sa1a3ka1xi4nu3ki3ti4ni3ba'1a3sa1a3ka1nda4chi4 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4ti4ku3u2ku4u4ba3 ri4a3sa(3) e4".
"Na4ku'1un1ba(3) e4ku'1u1ka'4an2 en4ta4u3ni2ka1a3ku3ni2 o4nda4a2ti4ku4u4 ri4i4yo2nda4a2ti4ku4u4 ri4xa1tu1i4yo2ti4ka'3ni(4) o4ku4u4ba3 ri4".
Ka4chi2ta1ja1nde1e4so'3o3,ta1ja1nde1e4kan4nda13ka3ka3 ra2ta1i4xa3xa3ku4kan4tan3kwa'1an1ba3 na3.
"Kwa'1an1 na1ni1xa1a1 na1ku'1u1kan4,kwe4e2sa3kan4kwe4e2sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1xa1a1 na1xa14ku'1u1kan4.
"Ndi4cuenta lu3ku'1un(1) un4ya3ni2,i3in3yo'4o1ku'1un1yu'3u4,yu'3u4yu3bi2i3nga2ta'4bi4kan4tan3yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ku'1un1yu'3u4yu3bi2ta'4bi4yo'4o4tan3
ko3to3kwe4nda2sa4ka2 on4nda4a2ni1tu1u3ti4ji1na'1ñu(1) a1i4ndu'3u4 a2tan3ku14nda3tu(3) un4ji'4in4nda'3a(4) on4ndi1ku1nda42chi3ka2 on4ndu3ba4ka'3ni(4) un4 a2ndi4ka3ma2 ni42ko3o(3) on4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ta'4an4 ra3.
Ni1nda14yu3ta'4an4 lu3 na2tan3ni1ke1yu4 na2kwa'1an1 na1yu3bi2tan3kwe4e2sa3kan4kwe4e2sa3kan4kwe4e2sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1.
I3in3ba'1a3ti4ndo13ko3to3 na2ndi4yo'4o4,yo'4o4ka1ka4a(4) e2i4ndu'3u4,
i4ndu'3u4ta3ka2tan3nu14u3ta3ka2kan4i4ndu'3u4 a2ndi4yo'4o4yo'4o4 lu3ka4a4mbo3la3i4ndu'3u4ndi4ka(2) e2ti1xin3ta1kwi42,tan3ju13ndi3chi2 ra1ni1ka3ni3 ra2ji'4in4ndu3ba4.
Tan3tu3ku3 run4tan3tu3ku3 run4,tan3ba1xi3ba(3) e2ku3kun42ñu'3u4.
Ke13e(3) a2ku3kun42nu14u3ta3ka2ni1nu3nda13ba(3) e2ñu'3u4,"Ya3ni2,
yo4o4kwa4chi3ku4u(4) e4tan3ndo'4o1ndi4na1kwa4chi3ku4u4 ndo4sa3kan4yu'1u1ndi4ta1xa3ku4ku4u4yu'1u1tan3in3ka4chi1 o4tan3
a3sa3 ni42 ndo4 a2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2ndi4tu'3un3 lu3 ndo4ndu3ba4ka'3a4 2tan3sa3kan4ndi4nda3tu'4un4,i4yo2i3in3kwen4tu2nda3tu'4un(4) 2ji'4in4 ndo4".
"Ko1to1ka'14ni4 ndo4yu'1u1nda'4bi2 yu1",ka4chi(2) a2ku3kun42so'3o3."Ba'1a3ba3ya3ni2".
Tan3ndi3xa3,ndi3xa3ku4u(4) un4ndi4ka14xi(4) un4ndu'1u1tan3tu'3un3 ndu2ndu3ba4ka'1an(1) on4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) a2,ta1ja1nde1e4.
"Tu'3un3,ka14xi4bi4yu'1u1ndo'4o1ndi4ba143ja4xi24 2ni1bi4yu'1u1ndi4ko14o3ni1bi4ja4xi24bi4yu'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ta1i4ndu'3u4ku4u4mi3i4ba3yu'1u1nu14u3chi'1yo1 yu1ndi4chi'1yo1ba3yu'1u1i4ndu'3u4 2nu14u3".
"A3sa3 ndo4 a2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2tu'3un3 lu3 ndo4ndu3ba4ka'3a4 2sa3kan4nda3tu'4un(4) 2ji'4in4 ndo4".
"Sa1a3i4yo2ji'4in4ña4ta4u3ni2mi4i4i4yo2 ndo4ña1a4".Ba'1a3ba3",ka4chi2 na1.
Tu'13un3ti4 ra2ndu3ba4ka'3a4 e2tan3ki'13in3 ra2ta1kwi42si4i24 ra2tan3sa13ka4 ra2ka'3a4 e2nda'13a2ba(3) e2mi4i4ni1ke1ta3tun4ndu3ba4kan4.
Tu3ku3i3nga2 run4tu'13un3 ra2ka'3a4 e2tan3xi14ta3 ra2ta1kwi42si4i24 ra2sa13ka4 ra2,ni1ndu3ba'1a3ka'3a4 e3.
Tu3ku3tu3ku3ti4ndu3ba4kan4ni1tu'3un3 ra2tan3sa13ka4tan3sa13ka4 ra2ta1kwi42si4i24 ra2mi4i4ni1ke3e3ndu3ba4kan4.
Ni1nda'3a2tan3ni1nda'3a2ba3ka'3a4 e2,nda'13a2ba'1a3i4chi3ka'3a4 e2tan3i3kan4ja143ndu13ku3ndu'4u(4) a2nda4tu'4un(4) a2kwen4tu2ji'4in4 na3.
"Ndo'4o1ndi4na1pa4li4ku4u4ndo'4o1ji14ni2 ndo4nda4a2ya1ku4u(4) a2yu14bi4i4yo2bi4ndo'4o1ndi4na1ba4li4ku4u4 ndo4".
"Yu'1u1ndi4ji4ni2ba3yu'1u1sa1a3ka4a4chi3ñu3i4xa(3) en4ta4u3ni2kan4ndi4,ndo'4o1kwa'1an1 ndo4ku'1u1xa'4ni24 ndo4i3su2,
xa'4ni24 ndo4ku3ni4jo2xa'4ni24 ndo4,ya1kan3,ti1chi4
kwa'1a4nu14u3ki3ti4ja'4ni24 ndo4tan3ki4xa2a2 ri4tan3sa4chio'1o(4) an4ta4u3ni2kan4 ri4tan3
su3u3 ri4xi4xi(3) an4tan3su3u3 ri4xi4xi3ndo'4o1tan3ndi'4i4tan3chi4ka2 en4i3in3ki1si3ja1so'3o3ka4a4nda3yu4tan3
kwa'1an1nda1ka(3) en4ku3xi3mu4sa2 en4ni1nu3ka1a3ka4ndi3ka2mu4sa2 en4i3su2ku4u4mu4sa2 en4".
"Tan3ndo'4o1ndi4su14u3i3su2ku4u4yu3ba4ndo'4o1ndi4
ta1a3ba3ku4u4yu3ba4ndo'4o1ña'3a4ba3ku4u4si'3i4ndo'4o1tan3ndi13kwi3so(3) an4ta4u3ni2kan4ndo'4o1".
"Tan3bi3tin3ndi4i4xa3 ni42 an4ja13ni1ku3ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4i3su2kan4ba3i4xa3ma1ni(4) an4kan4tan3ndo'4o1ndo'4o4xi4ka3ndu4ku4i3su2ndu4ku4 ndo4nda4a2ka(1) e1ndu4ku4 ndo4".
"I3su2mu4sa2 en4ndi4i3su2na'14a1ku4u4ti4kan4sa3kan4tu(3) an4kan4ba3ndi4ña4ta4u3ni2kan4ndi4ña4na'14a1ban4kan4su14u(3) an4ba'1a3bi4ban4nda14(3) e2ma1ni4ndi4ba143ni4ja3xi(4) an4ndo'4o1sa14kwa'3nu(3) an4ndo'4o1".
"Tan3bi3tin3ndi4ku3ni2 ndo4ndi4,ya1kan3,i3su2kan4ndi4ti4na'14a1ku4u4 ri4".
"Tan3ku'1un1 ndo4sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ka'3ni4 ndo4 ri4tan3sa3kan4ndi'3i3xa'1a4 ri4",ka4chi2,ka4chi(2) a2ya1ku3kun42kan4so'3o3ji'4in4 na3.
"¿Tan3sa1a3ka3chi2 ndu1ji'4in4 ri4tan3ki3xi3 ri4?"."Na'3a2ku3xi3xa'4ñu3xi1kwa32",ka3chi2 ndo4so'3o3.
"Ba1xi3ba3ti4kan4xa'1a4ndu3ku2kan4i4yo2 ri4ya3tin3ka1a3ti4i4yo2 ri4",ka4chi2ba3,ya1kan3,ya1,ya1ku3kun42kan4ji'4in4 na3.
Ja143ndi13ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1 na1xa1a1 na1kan4,su3nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4ku13ya4nda3i4chi3mi4i4xa4a1 en4ta4u3ni2kan4ta4xi(3) an4is1ta4xi4xi3ti4i3su2kan4.
I3kan4xi4xi3ba3 ri4ya4nda3i4chi3ka4a4yu'3u4ta'3bi4,ni1nda3tu'4un4nda14ku2ku3kun42kan4ji'4in4 na2sa1a3ko3o3ka'1an1 na1xa1a1 na1kan4.
Xa1a1 ra1kan4mi4i4ya4nda3ña1a4tan3ja143ju13ndi3chi2ba3 ra2nda'4yu1 ra1,na'3a2ku3xi3xa'4ñu3xi1kwa32ka4chi2 ra1,ni1ka'3ma3ba1xi3i3su2ndi4nda143ko4yo13,ko4yo13ti4ñu'3u4xa'1a4 ri4ba1xi3 lu3 ri4.
"Ka3ma2 ni42ko3o(3) on4ya3ni2",ka4chi2 ra1,tan3ni1tu1u3 a2ja1ku4ya3tin3ku4ya3tin(3) a2ba1xi3 a2tan3tu3ku3tan3tu3ku3 na2ka13ni3 na(2) e2ji'4in4ndu3ba4.
Ndu13ba2i3su2ba1xi3 ri4ndi4nda13xi1nu1 ri4nda1mi4i4nde4ta3 na2ña1a4ndi4ku4u(4) a2mi4i4ta4ka3a3.
Nda1ña1a4nda13xi1nu1 ri4,ndi13ki'3in3 na2i3su2,"Tan3bi3tin3ndi4ya1ko3o3a3sa(3) e4ji'4in4 ri4tin3ndi4ya3ni2,
ti4ka1a3ndi4ni3kwi14i2(4) o4 ri4tan3kwa3chi3i3in4 ri4ndi4ta3ba4ti4kwi1ta1i4chi(3) o4i3in4 ri4".
"Nda14ku2yu'3u4 ri4ka1a3ki'3in(3) o4tan3i3nda14ti13ku2ko3ndo(3) a2si'1in3 ri4ta4ta'4bi4ti4tan3nda'3a4 ri4ka1a3ti4tan3
ya1kan3,ka'3nda2 e4 ri4sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ku3ñu2ti4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) o4tan3i3in4ndi4ndo3ko3o(4) e4 e2",ka4chi2ta1ja1nde1e4so'3o3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1."Ba'1a3ba3",ka4chi2ta1kan4.
Ja143nda13kwi3so3ndi'3i3 na2ku3ñu2 ri4tan3nda13ta4 na2 ri4tan3
ndi'13i3tan3ta1kwi42si4i24ta1kwi42si4i24ti4 ra2xi1ka3 ra2ji'4in4mi4i4nda13ta4 ra2kan4tan3nda13ndo3o3i3in3i3in4kan4tan3
tan3nda13ndo3o3i3in(3) a2ka1a3,nda13sa3i3in3ndi'3i3 ra(2) e2ti1xin3 ri4ka1a3tan3,nda143lu3u3ti4i4yo2mi4i4nda13ta4 ra2nda'3a4 ri4yo'4o4tan3ja143nda13ka3na3ba3 ra2yo3ko2chi1.
Nda13ka3na3 ra2yo3ko2nda13ka3na3 ra2ti1mi3i4nda4a2ti4ku4u4nda4a2ti4xi4nu13ti4xa1tu1tan3kwa'1an1 ri4tan3kwa'1an1 ri4ti1xin3i3in4ña1a4nda13nde1e3ndi'3i3 ri4ti1xin3i3in4ña1a4chi13tu4xa'1a4 e2.
Chi13tu4ndi'3i3ka1a3mi4i4ko4ndo3te'1e4ji1ni4 a2nda13nde1e3ndi'3i3 ri4.
Ndo13ko3o4,ya1ndo13ko3o4ni4i4 na2ku4u4i3in4i1nda43,ta13ba4 na2ku3ñu2nda143i3in4ni3na3ti4ndo13ko3o4 na2tan3i4yo2tio4ko(1) a1tan3
nda13ta3a3ndi'3i3 ra2ji'4in4ta1kwi42si4i24 ra2mi4i4nda13ta4mi4i4nda13ta4 ra2tan3nda13ku'1un3ti4kan4ti1xin3 a2tan3,i3kan4bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,ya3ni2
"ja1i4yo2ba'1a3 e2ka1a3ja1ñu'4u4yo3ko2ti1xin3 a2tan3ndi3ki'3in(3) un4 a2tan3ku'1un1nda1ka(3) on4 a2nda1ndi1ka3yu3ku4i3tun2kan4ka3ndi3chi2 un4 a3".
"Tan3ku'1un(1) o4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ndi3kwi3so(3) e4ku3ñu2yo'4o4tan3ku'1un(1) o4",ka4chi2ta1ja1nde1e4kan4so'3o3."Ba'1a3ba3".
Ndu13nu3mi3nda3a2 ra1i3in4tan3kwa'1an1ba3 ra2ji'4in(4) a2ndi4chi4tu4 a2ji'4in4yo3ko2chi1,ti1mi3i4chi2,nda4a2i4in4nda4ku4u4ka1ti4xa1tu1nda13nde1e3ti1xin3 a2ndi4lu14u3 ri4ñu'4u4ti1xin3 a2chi13tu4ba(3) e2kan4.
Ndu13nu3mi3nda3a2ta1i4xa3lu3u3kan4 e2ja'1an1nda1ka3 ra(2) e2nda1ndi1ka3yu3ku4nda1i3tun2ja'1an1nda1ka3 ra(2) e3.
Ki'13in3 ra(2) e2ja13ndi3chi2 ra1kan4tan3,"So'3o3ni1nu1ta3xi(3) un4nu14u(3) a2na4ko3to(3) a2tan3sa3kan4ndi4,tan3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ki3xi(3) un4",ka4chi2 ra1.
Lu3chi'4i2ti4xa1nda1a(1) e1nda1ndi1ka3yu3ku4i3tun2i3kan4ja13ndi3chi2 ra(1) e1tan3xi4to(3) a2so'3o3ni1nu1ndi4chi(2) a2.
I3kan4ndi13ki'3in3,ndi13kwi3so3 na2ku3ñu2kan4tan3kwa'1an(1) e1ji'4in4 na2nda13xa2a2 na1be'3e3ja143ka4chi2 na1ji'4in(4) an4ta4u3ni2ndi4,"Sa4chio'1o(4) on4 a2yo'4o4ku3xi(3) o4si'3i4 2sa4chio'1o(4) on4 a2yo'4o4ku3xi(3) o4ndi4ni1ke3ba'1a3 ni42 ndu1ji'4in4ku3ñu2".
"Sa4chio'1o(4) on4 a2yo'4o4ku3xi(3) o4".Ni1ka3ndi3chi2ba(3) en4ta4u3ni2ku3ñu2tan3ja143ja4chio'1o(4) an4 e2,chi'4yo14chi'4yo14 a2tan3ja143ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ndi4:
"Kwa1chi3sa4ka2ndo'4o1ndi4xa'13ni4ba3ndo'4o1yu3ba4 ndo4ka4chi2 an4so'3o3,sa1a3chi4chi3ki4xa2a2 ndo4ndi4
ki4xa2a2ba3,ya1kan3,i3in4 ri4ji'4in4 ndo4tan3bi3tin3ndi4ko14o(3) a2ni4ki3xa2a2ji'4in4 ndo4nde3nu'3u3ku3ñu2ki13xa2a2ji'4in4 ndo4xa'13ni4ba3ndo'4o1yu3ba4 ndo4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3chi2.
"A3ma3tu3yu3ba4 ndu2ko3ndo3i3su2,ta1a3ba3ku4u4yu3ba4 ndu2ña'3a4ba3ku4u4si'3i4ndu'1u1,su14u3yu3ba4 ndu2ku4u4i3su2ndi4ta1a3ba3ku4u4yu3ba4ndu'1u1",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
"Kwa1chi3sa4ka2 ndo4xe3nda'4bi2xa'13ni4ba3ndo'4o1yu3ba4 ndo4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
"Ndi4su14u3i3su2ku4u4yu3ba4 ndu2ndi4ta1a3ba3ku4u4yu3ba4ndu'1u1,ña'3a4ba3ku4u4si'3i4ndu'1u1,yo'4o1ndi4
ña4ki'4bi3ba3ku4u4yo'4o1ka'4an2 on4ndi4yu3ba4 ndu2ku4u4i3su2su14u3yu3ba4 ndu2ku4u4i3su2ndi4ña'3a4ba3ku4u4si'3i4 ndu2sa3kan4yu3ba4 ndu2ta1a3ku4u4ta1kan4".
"Kwa1chi3sa4ka2 ndo4xi3nda'4bi2",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3chi2.Ni1sa4chio'1o(4) an4 e2ni1kwa3a4ba42kan4xi13xi3 na2tin3tan3
i3kan4is1ta1an1chi'4i2ti4tan3ka13ndi3chi2ni3tu3ku(3) an4 e2chi'1yo4 a2,chi'4yo14 a2ku3xi3 na3.
Chio'4o14 lu3ku3ñu2ku3xi3 na2tan3ni1ya'1a3ba3ki3ti4ka'4an2 ri4,sa3a2ka'4an2 ri4ndi4,"Ki3ni3,ki3ni3ku4ni2 yu1xi4xi(3) 2nda3yu4i3i4 2",ka4chi(2) a2sa3a2.
Ni1ya'1a3 e2ji1ni4be'3e3mi4i4i4ndu'3u(4) an4ta4u3ni2,"A4su3ka'4an2ba'1a3 2ji'4in4 ndo4xe3nda'4bi2yu3ba4ba3 ndo4xa'13ni4 ndo4ki3ni3,ki3ni3ku4ni2 yu1xi4xi(3) 2nda3yu4i3i4 2ka4chi2ti4ka1a3ni1ya'1a3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4".
Ka4chi2 an4so'3o3,ti4nda4tu'4un4ba3ta4ku4u4sa3a2kan4ji'4in(4) an4ndi4i3i(4) an4xi4xi(3) an4,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ndi4:
"ndo1o3 ndo4ku3xi3 ndo4xe3nda'4bi2na4ku'1un1ko1to(1) e1ku3ni2 o4na4ni14ja'3ni4 ndo4yu3ba4 ndo4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
Nu4mi2(4) an4su14ku3tu(4) an4i3in3ki1si3so'3o3ji'4in4ta1kwi42nda3yu4i3su2tan3ni1ta3an(4) en4ku3ñu2ta3an(4) en4nda3yu4,ndi13ki'3in(3) an4kwa'1an1ba(3) en4ja1ta4i3su2.
Ni1ndo1o3 na2,"Ku3xi3ba3ndo'4o1na4ku'1un(1) i1sa3kan4ki3xa2a2 yu1sa3kan4ku3xi(3) 2xe3nda'4bi2na4ku'1un1ko1to(1) e1yu3ba4 ndo4",ki3xa2a2 yu1ka4chi2 an4.
Tan3ki'13in(3) an4,ya1kan3,ki1si3so'3o3ka4a4su14ku3tu(4) an4ji'4in4nda3yu4.Ti13in(3) an4is1ta4to4to2is1ta4ti13in(3) an4chi13ka2 en4kwa'1an1ba(3) en4.
Ni1xa1a(1) en4yu3bi2kan4tan3ja143,mi4i4ja'13ni4 na2ti4kan4,i3kan4ja143nda'4yu1 an4ndi4chi2 an4.:
"na'3a2ku3xi3xa'4ñu3xi1kwa32",ka4chi2 an4.Tin3,tin3ka4ni3i3su2nda'3a4 ri4ndi4chi2 ri4,nda'3a4ti4 ri4ka4ni3 ri4ñu'3u4.
Tu3ku3ni3nda'4yu1 an4ji4to(3) an4ndi4chi2 ri4tan3nda'4yu1ni3tu3ku(3) an4,a1su3nda'3a4ti4 ri4ka4ni3 ri4ñu'3u4tan3ndi4chi2ba3 ri4.
Ba143xi4in4 ri4ku'1un1ndi1kun1 ri4 ña4i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ndi4:
"bi3tin3sa3kan4ku3ni2 un4na4tu2na4su14u3ta1ku4ni2ki3xi3ku4u(4) un4ña4ba1xi3ku4u(4) 2ki3xi3nda3ka(3) 2is1ta4ku3xi(3) un4tan3ku14ni2 un4ku3xi(3) un4ndi4nda1bi3tin3sa3kan4ku3ni2 o4".
Xa'1an1ka'1nu1ba(3) en4ndu3ku2su3tun4so'3o3ndu3ku2xa'1nu(1) an4tan3nda13ba3ba(3) en4kwa'1an(1) en4.
Xa'1an(1) en4tan3ni1su3ku4tan3ni1su3ku(4) an4ndu3ku2ja1ta4i3su2,"Na4ku14xi(3) un4bi3tin3sa3kan4ku3ni2 o4",ka4chi2 an4.
Tan3ndo13ko3yo3ba3,nda13ta1ni1ba3ti13ku2i3in4mi4i4ñu'4u4yo3ko2kan4ti1mi3i4kan4ka13ni3 ri4 a2be4la2ndi4:
"u14tu1tu1u14tu1tu1",ka4chi(2) a2be4la2tu4u24 a2sa3kan4nda1ta'3bi4nda13xi1nu(1) a1.
Nda143ka'4an2mi3i4ka'4an2i3in(3) a2ndu13ndi3chi(2) a2ka4ndu'3u4 a2ta'3bi4kan4ndi4ka13ni3 lu3 ri4 a2chi1,lu14u3i13xa3 ri4ji'4in(4) a3.
Nda1nda3yu4nda1ndi4ka2nda'3a4 e2kwa'1an(1) e1kwa'1an1ko1to(1) a1mi4i4ndi4chi2ti4kan4ba143xi4in4 ri4ki3xi3 ri4i3kan4ku3xi3 ri4su3nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4ni1tu3u4 a2ni1xa3ta2ndi'3i(3) a2nda3yu4xi1ta1ku3ñu2xi1ta1.
Nda13xi1nu(1) a1ta'3bi4nda143ta3ka2ti4ka4a(4) e2,ni1ki'3in(3) a2kwa1nu'1u4 a2ndi4ni3ko14o3ya1ni4xi3xi3bi4ti4kan4ndi4ya1kan4ni1ndo'3o(3) a2ndi13ki'3in(3) a2kwa1nu'1u4 a3.
Nda13xa2a2 e2be'3e3i3kan4ka4chi(2) a2ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"Kwa1chi3sa4ka2 ndo4ji'4in(4) 2xe3nda'4bi2xa'13ni4ba3 ndo4yu3ba4 ndo4".
"Ko14o3yu3ba4 ndo4ni4ji3ni2 yu1ndi4xi'1i1ba3 ra3,ba143ba'1a3ni4i3xa3 ndo4ndi4xa'13ni4 ndo4yu3ba4 ndo4".
"Nda4a2tu3yu3ba4 ndu2ko3ndo3tu3i3su2tu3ndu'1u1,su14u3yu3ba4 ndu2ku4u4i3su2ndi4ta1a3ku4u4yu3ba4ndu'1u1,ña'3a4ba3ku4u4si'3i4 ndu3".
"Ni3yo'4o1tan3su14u3si'3i4 ndu2ku4u(4) un4ndi4ña'3a4ba3ku4u4si'3i4 ndu2",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
"Na4tu2na4ji4ni2 ndo4ndi4su14u3se'1e3yu'1u1ku4u4 ndo4tan3ko3to3 ndo4mi4i4ku'1un1 ndo4ko3to3 ndo4mi4i4ku'1un1 ndo4na4tu2na4kan4ndi4
yu'1u1ndi4ña4bi4ka3ku4u4yu'1u1be'3e3ya3a3be'3e3mantabe'3e3ba'1a3ku4u4be'3e3yu'1u1tan3
ndo'4o1ndi4nda143lu3u3so'3o3be'3e3ti1mi3i4be'3e3ti1nda1ka1ti3in3ndo'4o1ko3nde3e3 ndo4na4na1ke3e3ku'1un1ku4u4 ndo4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 na3.
"Tan3a1su3tan3na4sa3kan4ko3o3ba(3) e2tan3ndi4na1ko3nde3e3ku4u4 ndu2ti1xin3 a2a1chi1ndi4na1nda'4bi2ku4u4 ndu3".
"Ni3ji14ni2 ndu1mi4i4kwa'1an1yu3ba4 ndu2ji14ni2 ndu1mi4i4kwa'1an1si'3i4 ndu2na1nda'4bi2ku4u4 ndu2tan3nda143yo'4o1i13xa(3) on4 e2ma1ni4sa14kwa'3nu3lu3chi'4i2 un4ndu'1u1tan3
tan3ndi4su14u3si'3i4bi4 ndu2ku4u4yo'4o1ndi4ña4i13xa(3) e2ba'1a3sa14kwa'3nu3ndu'1u1ti4ba3ku4u4yo'4o1",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ta4u3ni2.
"Ndi4nda3ndu3ku4 ndo4mi4i4ku'1un1 ndo4tan3nu4na14be'3e3ku3ndu'4u(4) 2a1chi1ndi4,na1i4xa3ja13ni1ku3ku4u4 ndo4ji'4in(4) 2".
"Xi1ka3 ndo4ndi4xa'13ni4 ndo4i3i4 2xa'13ni4 ndo4yu3ba4 ndo4tan3na1xi4kwe'1e1ba3ku4u4 ndo4ji'4in(4) 2".ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
Ni1ki4tu3tu3ku3ki1bi4ni1ji3ni3na'14a1 na1tan42bi3tin3tan42i3ta2an2tan3ja143ka4chi2ta1,ta1ja1nde1e4ndi4:
"ku'1un(1) o4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ndu3ku(4) e4mi4i4ba42kwa'3a3be'3e(3) o4ya3ni2".
"Ndi4ji'3na3nda1ba32ku'1un1ta3ba4yo4o4ta3ba(4) e4nda1ba32ta3ba(4) e4tun4si'1in1ta3ba(4) e4yo'3o4ta3ba(4) e4i3ta2ta3ba(4) e4na4ja1i4yo(2) a2kan4ta3ba(4) e4tan3
tan3,ya1kan3,na4ni1xa1a(1) e4mi4i4ta3ba(4) e4 e2kan4ni1ndi'3i(3) a2kan4ni1ta3ba(4) e4tan3ja1i4yo2ndi'3i(3) a2ki3xi(3) o4ndi4o4ra2ndi3xi(3) o4ndi4ko1to1ko14to(3) on4ja1ta(4) on4ndi4
i3in3tu3un3sa3kan4kwa'1an(1) e4tan3i3in3tu3un3sa3kan4nda3ndi3ko(4) e4ki3xa2a(2) e4be'3e3ko1to1ko14to(3) on4ja1ta(4) on4"ka4chi2 ra1,ka4chi2ya3ni2 ra1ji'4in4 ra2,ta1ja1nde1e4.
Ja143ndi13ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1 na1.Xa1a1 na1xa'13nda2 na1,ya1kan3,tun4si'1in1,
xa'13nda2 na1tun4ka4so24,xa'13nda2 na1tun4nda1ba32.
ja1po3ndo42ja1po3ndo42nde4e4 run4ja1i4yo2ndi'3i3 run4ka3ja3chiu4un4ji'4in(4) a2tan3i3kan4ja143ta13ba4 na2kwi1yo'1o4yu3ku4.
Ta13ba4 na2,ya1kan3,i3ta2,a1chi1ndi4be'3e3i3ta2ba42ti3in3 na3.
Be'3e3i3ta2ba42ti3in3 na3.
Ya1kan4ndi4ndi13kwi3so3ndi'3i3 na2,ndi13ki'3in3 na2,ndi'13i3 a2kan4ja14xi1nu3 na2tu'13un3 na2i3ta2tu'13un3 na2i4yo2kwi1yo'1o4yu3ku4i4yo2,nde4e4po3ndo42ndi'3i(3) a3.
"Bi3tin3ndi4na4ku'1un(1) o4tin3xa1i4yo2ba'1a3,ko1to1ko14to(3) on4ja1ta(4) on4na4ku'1un(1) o4ya3ni2ndi4yo4o4kwa'1an1ku4u(4) e4tan3nda3xa2a2 e4be'3e(3) o4ndi4
ko1to1ko14to(3) on4ja1ta(4) on4ndi4tan42i4yo(2) a2ni1ta3ba(4) e4ka1a3ndi4ya1ku1nu'1u4ku4u4mi3i4 a2ka1a3tan3ko1yo3 a2mi4i4ti3in(3) o4be'3e3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
"Ba'1a3ba3".I3kan4ni1ndi3ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1 na1,"¿A4chu3tu3ba42ka'4an2tu3ya3ni2 o4ndi4ko14to3tu(3) e4ja1ta(4) e4?",ka4chi2ka'4an4ta1i3nda14kan4.
Xo14ko1o3ba3 ra2xi4to3 ra2ja1ta4 ra2chi1,an4ndo3ko3to3ba3 ra2ndi4nda143ki'4in4yu3kun2nda1ba32nda143ki'4in4yu3kun2tun4si'1in1kwa1nda3a3 run4ni1nu3tan3ko1yo3 run4mi4i4ba42kwa'3a3be'3e3.
Nda13ndi3ko4ndi'3i3 run4ki1bi4ji13ni2 ra1ndi4tun4kwa1nda3a3ku4u4 run4,cha1ra1ka4chi2kwa'1an1ndi'3i3 run4ñu'3u4ña1a4ndu13ko3nde3e3xi4ña4 run4nde4e4 run4.
Ja143ka4chi2ta1ya3ni2 ra1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Na4chu3ba42ndi4ji13to3tu(3) un4ja1ta(4) on4a4su3ja1ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ko14to(3) on4ja1ta(4) on4".

"nda13chi4ba3be'3e(3) an4ta4u3ni2tin3su14u(3) a2ku4chun3ba42kan4ba'1a3ka1ba3be'3e3yo4o4".

"Ku4ni2bi1xin3sa4ka2 en4i4ndu'3u(4) an4ndi4nda13chi4ba3be'3e(3) an4chi2".
