Ja4xi24 a2ndo3ko4sa3kan4tan3ni1ta1bi1ba3,ya1ku4u(4) a2kan4ndo3ko4ki4xin1ni1xa3xi4 a2tan3ndi13ki'3in(3) a2yu1ma'4na1ndi4ki4xin1 lu(3) a2i4ndu'3u4 a2ndi4ndu13kwi3ko4su1kun4 a2i4ndu'3u4nda3a(2) e2.
I3kan4ni1nu3u3ta1i3nda14kan4ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in(4) a2ndi4:
nu3u3,"Nda3ka3ndu'4u4ba'1a(3) on4ku1sun(1) un4na4na2,ku1sun(1) un4na4tu2na4ku4ni2ku1sun1 ni42 un4ndi4ka3ndu'4u4ba'1a(3) on4ku1sun(1) un4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ndu'1u1ndi4xa1ba'1a3nde4e4ba3 ndu2yo'4o4ka3ndu'4u4ba'1a(3) on4ku1sun(1) un4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ndi4nda13ka3ndu'4u(4) a2tan3nda13ka3ndu'4u4ba'1a3 e2ñu'3u4kan4kwe4e2,kwe4e2ni1xi14ta(3) e2xi3yo2cha13ka3ndu'4u(4) a2ñu'3u4kan4nda13ka3ndu'4u(4) a2ki4xin1 lu(3) a2ka4ndu'3u4 a3.
Ja143ka4chi2ta1,ta1ja1nde1e4kan4ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,"Ya3ni2,
yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ndo3ko2o(2) on4ko3to(3) on4sa1a3ko3o(3) an4ta4u3ni2ka1a3tan3ku'1un(1) o4ndi4su14u3yo'4o4ko3nde3e(3) o4ndi4yo4o4ku'1un1ku4u(4) e4,yo4o4ku'1un1ku4u4yo4o4tan3,tan3nde4e(4) o4yo'4o4".
"Ko3to(3) on4sa1a3ko3o(3) an4sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un(1) o4,nu3u(3) un4ñu'3u4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ko3to(3) on4sa1a3ko3o(3) an4tan3ku'1un(1) o4".
Ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ta1,ta1i4xa3lu3u3.
I3kan4kwe4e2kwe4e2nu13u3ta1ja4lu3u3tan3,nu13u3ta1ja4lu3u3kan4tan3,tan3ya1kan3,
ndo13ni'3i3ba3 ra2xi3yo2ti1xin3 a2ta4u3ni2tan3,i1xa14a3ti13in3ba3 ra(2) e2.
Nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4ki1bi4nda13nde1ta3 ra2nda13ndi3so3 ra2xi3yo2ndo13ko3to3 ra2ndi4nda1ya3a3ndi4ka2nu'1u3ka'3a4 e2chi1,i4yo2 lu3nu'1u3ka'3a4 e2.
Nda1ya3a3ka4a4nu'1u3ka'3a4 e2tan3i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,"Ya3ni2kwi14i3bi4,ya1kan3,ti3in(3) 2ña4ta4u3ni2ka1a3ndi4lu14u3nu'1u3ka4a4ka'3a(4) en4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ta1kan4".
"A4su3ta1a3ku4u(4) un4ya1kan4ndi4ji14ni2 un4sa1a3ko3o(3) a3,ya1ña1a4ndi4machitita'4bi4ndu3ku(4) un4ka'3mi(3) un4 a2tan3
tan3tu3xi(4) un4tan3tu3xi(4) un4 a2na4,na4ko1yo3ndi'3i(3) a2ña1a4sa3kan4ndi4
ji4to(3) on4ndi4tu4nda13a(2) e2tan3ko3to(3) on4na4tu2na4ba143ndi3ko4ka1nu14u(3) a2tan3yo'4o1ku4u4ta1a3sa3ba'1a(3) on4ña4ta4u3ni2ña1a4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Ndi4yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ki3xi3ndo1o3na1ma3ka1ndi4yo'4o1ko3ndo3ta1ko3ndo3ta1yo1o4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ta1kan4."Ba'1a3ba3",ka4chi2 ra1.
Ja143ndu13ku4ba3 ra2machitita'4bi4xa'13mi3 ra(2) e2ba1ba'1a3tan3chi4ndu'4u4 ra2xa'1a4nu'1u3tan3tu4xi14 a2tan3tu4xi14 a3.
Tu3ku3tu3ku3,tu3ku3nu'1u3xa'1nu1ndi'3i3 ra2nu'1u3 a2,nu'1u3ka'3a4 e2ta4u3ni2.
Ndi4ja14kwa3chi3ndi'3i3 ra2nu'1u(3) an4tan3xi4ka3ndu3ku2nda'3a4 ra2ndi4ba143kwi3in4ka1ndi4ta'4nu1ba'1a3ba(3) e3,nda1xa'1a4 e2nda1xa'1a4 e2ta13ba4 ra2,ta13ba4ndi'3i3 ra2nu'1u3.
"Bi3tin3ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3tin3ya3ni2ndi'13i(3) a2ki13nda2a(2) e2"."Ña1a4ko3to(3) on4sa1a3a3sa(3) on4ji'4in(4) an4tan3ku'1un(1) o4ndi4yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ku3ni'3i3cuentaji'4in(4) a2ña1a4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ju13ndu'4u4ba3 ra2ti13in3 ra(2) e2ta4u3ni2,ki4xin1 lu(3) a2ni14xa'1a3i4chi(3) a2cuentani1ta'1nu1nu'1u3ka'3a4 e2ni14xa'1a3i4chi(3) a2cuentati13in3 ra(2) e2.
Tan3ya1kan4ku4ni(2) a2ndi4ya1ki'3in3ya1yu14bi4ba42kan4ndi4ya1kan4ko3ndo(3) a2ka3ni'3i3cuentaji'4in4na1yu4bi24tan42i4yo2ya1yu14bi4ku4ni(2) a2kan4.
Ya1ku3ndu'4u4ka'3nda2chi3ñu3ba42kan4ni1nu3tan42yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2ku4ni(2) a2su3u3,
ni14ka3na3chi3ñu3ndi4na1kan4ku4u4na1ni1ndo1o3xa'4nda2chi3ñu3.
I3kan4tan3,ni1ndi'3i3ni1i3xa3 na(2) e2,ni1i3xa3ta1i3nda14kan4 e2ya1ji'4in(4) a2ti13in3 ra(2) e2ba1ba'1a3tin3tan3
bi3tin3ndi4nu3u(3) un4tan3ku'1un(1) o4ya3ni2ja1i4yo2ba'1a3.Ba'1a3ba3.I3kan4nu13u3ta1kan4escaleratan3:
"Ko14o(3) a2ku'1un1bi4ji'4in(4) o4ndi4so'3o3ko3o3ti4ba(3) e4ku'1un(1) o4,na4ku'1un(1) o4".
Ka'4an2 e4sa3kan4tan3nda13ka3ka3ta'4an4 na2ni1ki'3in3 na2i3chi4,kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4.
Ni1ku3kwa'1a4 lu3kwa'1an1 na1ya14tin3kwa'1an1 na1tan3ndo13ko3to3ba3 na2ndi4
ye'4e1ndi4ye'4e1ndi4nda143tian42ka4a4ndu3bi4ti4ka4a4ndi4la3tun4 lu3ye'4e1kwi4i24nda143i4ta4,i4ta4ti4ka1ka4a4kwa'1an1 na1.
Xa1a1 na1ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Ya3ni2,¿tan3yo3o3ku4u(4) a2ye'4e1 ni42nu14u3ka4ndu'3u4kan4?"
"Yo4o4kwa'1an1ku4u(4) e4tan3yo4o4xa1a1ku4u(4) e4mi4i4ka4ndu'3u4 a2bi3tin3ba3ku3ni2 o4yo3o3ku4u(4) a2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,ka4chi2ta1ja1nde1e4kan4.
"Ko14o(3) a2a3sa(3) e2kan4ji'4in(4) o4ndi4ya1ku3ni2 o4yo3o3ku4u4ku4u4ba(3) e2bi3tin3ba3",ka4chi2 ra1,la3tun4 lu3ye'4e1nu14u3,
nu14u3ko1o4kan4ndi4ko1o4ku4u4ti4ka4ndu'3u4kan4chi2,ndu3chi4nu14u3ba3ti4kan4ba42ye'4e1sa4ka2chi1.
Ko1o4kan4ndi4,ko1o4yu3ku4ku4u4ti4kan4ni1ke3ta3 ri4ka4ndu'3u4 ri4kan4tan3ti4kan4ku4u4ti4kwa'1an1 na1xa1a1 na1nu14u3.
Che4e13 lu3ko1o4ka4ndu'3u4,xa1a1 na1nu14u3 ri4ndi4la3tun4 lu3ye'4e1ñu'3u2nu14u3 ri4.
"¿Sa1a3a3sa(3) e4ndi4ti4ka'3ni(4) o4ku4u4ti4ka1a3ya3ni2?",ta4xin24ka4ndu'3u4ba3 ri4ni3ko14o(3) a2ni4i3xa3 ri4ji'4in4 na2ni3ba143ni4ja3xi4 ri4 na2ndi4ka4ndu'3u4ya1a1mi3i4 ri4kan4ba3,ku13ya3tin3 na2nu14u3 ri4i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4
"¿Sa1a3a3sa(3) e4ji'4in4 ri4tan3ku3u2 ri4tin3ya3ni2?,ti4ka'3ni(4) o4ku4u4 ri4"ka4chi2ta1ja1nde1e4kan4,"¿Sa1a3a3sa(3) e4ji'4in4 ri4?".
"¿Sa1a3a3sa(3) e4ji'4in4 ri4ran4?,ni3yu'1u1ji14ni2 yu1sa1a3ko3o3 ri4tan3ku3u2 ri4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ya1kan4ni3nda4tu'4un4na3ni2 na1tan3ja143ni1ki3xi3ba3sa3a2i3kan4tan3ni1ya'1a3 ri4ka'4an2 ri4ndi4,"Chi1nda4,chi1nda4",ka4chi2sa3a2so'3o3.
"Chi1nda4chi2ya3ni2",tan3yu1u4ndi4ja1xa'13mi3 na(2) e2ta3an4 na2yu'3u4 ri4tan3ya1ja1xi1xi1ba3ku4u4yu1u4tan3ji14ni2 na1sa1a3ko3o3ti3in3 na(2) e2ta3an4 na2yu'3u4 ri4.
Chi1nda4chi2ya3ni2,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,xi4nu3ba3 ra2ja'1an1ka'3nda2 ra1i3tun4nda13ta4 ra2yu'3u4 run4.
Ti'13nu3 ra2yu1u4tan3tu3ku(3) a2tan3tu3ku(3) a2kwa'1an1yu'3u4 ri4.
Yu1u4ni'3ni4kan4ti'4nu3 na2ji'4in4tun4nda1ta4yu'3u4tan3kwa'1an(1) e1yu'3u4 ri4tan3kwa'1an(1) e1yu'3u4 ri4.
Ndi4sa3a2ku4u4ti4ni1ka'1an1ji'4in4 na2ndi4chi1nda4ko3ndo(3) a2ya1ta3an4 na2yu1u4yu'3u4 ri4,chi1nda4kan4ti'4nu3 ra2yu1u4tan3kwa'1an(1) e1yu'3u4 ri4tan3kwa'1an(1) e1yu'3u4 ri4.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2ya3ni2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Ya3ni2,¿tan3sa1a3a3sa(3) e4ku3ni2 o4na4tu2ni1xi'1i1ti4ka1a3ndi4ba143nda'4ba1ñu'3u2nu14u3 ri4ndi4ya1ye'4e1ku4u4ba(3) e2?",ka4chi2ta1i3nda14kan4so'3o3.
"Bi3tin3sa3kan4ku3ni2 o4,ji14ni2yo'4o1ndi4yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ji4ni2ba3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143kwa'1an1yu1u4tan3kwa'1an1yu1u4yu'3u4 ri4,"Ndi4ja1ni1xi'1i1ba3 ri4ya3ni2lu14u3yu1u4ba42ta4an2(4) e4yu'3u4 ri4"."Bi3tin3sa3kan4ndi4ku3ni2 o4sa1a3ko3o3".
Ja143nda13ka3na3ba3 ra2,ya1kan3,ndia3ma2chi1,"Ya3ni2 o4ta1ti3ki'4ñu3na'3a2 on4yo'4o4i4yo2chi3ñu3ku4ni2 yu1yo'4o1",ka4chi2 ra1.
Tu3ku3ni3nda'4yu1 ra1,"Ya3ni2 o4ta1ti3ki'4ñu3na'3a2 on4yo'4o4i4yo2chi3ñu3ku4ni2 ndu1yo'4o1".
Nda4a2xi4ka3bi4ndia3ma2ji13ni3so'1o3 ri4ndi4ti4ka4na3 ra2ku4u4 ri4nda1chu4un4ka4chi2ni1ki3xa2a2ba3ndia3ma2nu14u3 ra3.
"Ya3ni2ku4ni2 yu1ndi4ki'1bi(3) un4yu'3u4 a2ka1a3tan3ke3ta(3) on4ka'3a4 e2tan3ka'3a4 e2ki'1bi(3) un4ke3ta(3) on4yu'3u4 a2ku3ni2 yu1na4tu2na4ya1ni1xi'1i1ba43".
"Tan3ta14ta4nda3a2 on4ta'4bi4,ta'4bi4i4tin3ndi4ta'4bi4kwa'4a4ta3ta4nda3a2 on4,ta3ta4nda3a2 on4ti1xin3 a2ku4ni2 ndu1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ndia3ma2tan3,
ni1ki'1bi3ba3ti4kan4yu'3u4ni1ke3ta3 ri4ka'3a4,bi3tin3ndi4ña1a4ni1ke3ta(3) on4tan3ki'1bi(3) un4ka'3a4ña1a4tan3ke3ta(3) on4yu'3u4tan3ku3ni2 yu1na4tu2ni1xi'1i(1) a1.
"Xi'1i1ba(3) e2ya3ni2ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) a3"."Ndi4ki'1bi(3) un4ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4",i3kan4tan3ni1ki'1bi3tu3ku3ba3ndia3ma2ni1ke3ta3 ri4yu'3u4.
"Bi3tin3ndi4kwa'4an2 on4ki'1bi(3) un4yu'3u4tan3ke3ta(3) on4ka'3a4tan3ta3ta4nda3a2 on4ndi4
ta'4bi4kwa'4a4ta3ta4nda3a2 on4ko1to1ta14ta4nda3a2 on4ta'4bi4i4tin3ndi4ta'4bi4kwa'4a4ta3ta4nda3a2 on4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 ri4,ni1ki'1bi3ba3 ri4yu'3u4 a2tan3ni1ke3ta3 ri4ka'3a4 e2tan3
"bi3tin3ndi4,an4ja1ta13ta4nda3a2 on4"."Ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ya3ni2ta13ta4nda3a2 yu1",ni1ki'1bi3tu3ku3ba3 ri4ka'3a4 e2ki13ta3 ri4yu'3u4 a2tan3
"Bi3tin3ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3tin3kwa'4an2 on4tin3",chiu3un3ka4chi2nda13chi4ndia3ma2kwa'1an1tu3ku3ba3 ri4,kwa'1an1ba3ti4kan4.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4ki3ta'4ni(3) o4ndu3chi4nu14u3ti4ka1a3ya3ni2,ndu3chi4nu14u3 ri4ta3ba(4) e4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) o4la3tun4na3kwi4(2) a2,ya1ka1a3ku'1un1ji'4in(4) o4".
Ni1tu3u3 ra2chi4lu2ja'1a4ndu3chi4nu14u3ju13ndu3ndu2 ra1ni1ka3an2kwi4ta1 ra1mi4i4ti4in13xa'1a4 e2kan4ja'13nda2ndi'3i3 ra2cueruxa'1a4ndu3chi4nu14u3 ri4tan3
ki13ta'4ni3 ra(2) e2tin3,"Bi3tin3ndi4tio1to1ti3su4ku2(4) e4",xi14ta3 ra2camisa ra1tan3ti13su4ku24 ra2ndu3chi4nu14u3 ri4tan3,"Ya1yo'4o4ba42ku'1un1ji'4in4yo'4o1ya3ni2".
"Ya1yo'4o4ba42ya1,ya1ki4xi3ndo1o3ji'4in4yo'4o1,ya1yo'4o4ndi4ta'4bi4i4tin3ba42yo'4o4".
"Tan3ya1yo'4o4ta'4bi4kwa'4a4yo'4o4ba42ndu4ta'3an2yu'1u1a1chi1ndi4ko14o(3) a2chi3ñu3i4xa3yu'1u1ndi4ta1i4yo2ba'1a3ku4u4yu'1u1".
"Yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ni1ku3ma1ni4chi3ñu3i13xa(3) on4ji'4in(4) an4ta4u3ni2ndi4ta'4bi4i4tin3yo'4o4ndu4ta'3an2yo'4o1tan3ta'4bi4kwa'4a4ba42ndu4ta'3an2yu'1u1"."Ba'1a3ba3"ka4chi2 ra1.
I3kan4tan3,ki13ta'4ni3ba3 ra2i3in3ta'4bi4ndu3chi4nu14u3i4tin3nda13kwa'1a3 ra2nda'3a4ya3ni2 ra1tan3tu3ku3ndu3chi4nu14u3kwa'4a4kan4ki13ta'4ni3 ra2,ki13ta'4ni3 ra2camisa ra1ti13su4ku24 ra(2) e2tan3:
"bi3tin3ndi4,ni'4i4ba(3) e4ti1nda1a4ya3ni2,ti1xin3ti1nda1a4ka1a3ta3an4 e2tan3ka3ni'3i(3) un4 a2ku'1un(1) o4"."Ba'1a3ba3".
Ti1xin3ti1nda1a4ta13an4 na2ndi3sa4u1bi1ndu3chi4nu14u3 ri4tan3ti13su4ku24 na(2) e2tio1to1ko3to3ndi'3i3nde3e4 a2tu4un1 ni4(2) a2.
Ta13an4 na(2) e2ti1xin3ti1nda1a4tan3kwa'1an1ba3 na3,ni1ki'3in3 na2i3chi4tan3kwa'1an1ba3 na3,kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4.
ni1ku3kwa'1a4sa4ka2kwa'1an1 na1i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4:
"ya3ni2,¿an4ba'14a4na4ta3ba(4) e4ya1ni1ndi3kwi3so(3) e4ndu'1be4tan3ku3ni2 o4yo3o3ku4u(4) a2la3tun4ka1?,
tan3yo3o3ku4u(4) a2ba143la3tun4ka1",ka4chi2 ra1."Ba'1a3ba3",ka4chi2ta1kan4.
"Ta3ka'4ni3ji'3na3yo'4o1kwe4nda2 on4tan3ku3ni2 o4".Ta13ka'4ni3ba3ta1,ta1,ya1kan3,ta1yo1o4ndu3chi4nu14u3ya1ndu13ta'3an2 ra1ko3ndo3kwe4nda2 ra1.
I4su4ku24 a2camisa ra1ta13ka'4ni3 ra(3) e3.Ndu13ku3na4 ra(2) e2la3tun4nda13ye'3e2ya1yu14bi4ndi4nda143kwa4an2i4ta4,i4ta4ti4ka4a4ndu13to'3ni3ya1yu14bi4.
"Ndi1ku1nda42nda3ka3si2 un4 a2ya3ni2ndi'4i4 ni42nde3e4 a2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,ndi1ku1nda42tan3ti13su4ku24 ra(2) e2camisachi13ka2ba'1a3 ra(3) e3.
"Bi3tin3ndi4kwe4nda2yu'1u1tu3ku3ko3to(3) e4tin3",ke'13e4 ra2ta13ka'4ni3 ra2i3nga(2) e2kan4.
Ja143ni1ndu3ku3na4 ra2nu14u(3) a2ndi4xi'1i1i4chi3ka4a4nda143nda'4bi2,nda'4bi2ti4ka4a4ki1bi4ni1ki3ta'4ni3 ra(2) e2kan4ti1xin3camisa ra1,"I4i4su14u3kwe4nda2 yu1ku4u(4) a2yo'4o4ya3ni2".
"Kwe4nda2yo'4o1ko3ndo(3) a2yo'4o4ya1xi'1i1 ni42ka4a4nu14u3yo'4o4ndi4kwe4nda2yo'4o1ba42yo'4o4tan3ya1la3tun4,la3tun4ña1a4ku4u4kwe4nda2yu'1u1",ka4chi2ta1ja1nde1e4so'3o3.
"Tan3sa1a3a3sa(3) on4ji'4in(4) 2ran4ya3ni2ja1kwe4nda2 yu1ndu13ta'3an(2) e2ka1a3kwe4nda2 yu1ko3ndo(3) a3"."Tan3ndi4yo'4o1ndi4ta1ni1ku3ma1ni4chi3ñu3ni1i3xa3ku4u4yo'4o1".
yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ko3ndo3ta1yo1o4tan3yu'1u1ndi4ta1ñu'1u3ko3ndo3yu'1u1tan3,tan3ya1nda'4bi3ka4a4nu14u3yo'4o4ba3nda3ki'3in3yo'4o1".
"A1chi1ndi4ta1yo1o4ku4u4yo'4o1,tan3ya1nde3e4ji4to3ña1a4ya1ña1a4ba42ndi3ki'3in3yu'1u1a1chi1ndi4ta1ñu'1u3ku4u4yu'1u1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Nda14kwa'1a3 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4ya3ni2,nda14kwa'1a3 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4ndi4ja1kwe4nda2ba3yu'1u1ba43"."Na4ku'1un(1) o4na4tu2sa3kan4na4nda14kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2na4ku'1un(1) o4".Ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1.
Ja1ji4ni2ka4xi3ba3ta1kan4ndi4ya1sa4ndo'3o3 ra2ba43,sa4ndo'3o3 ra2ba42ni1ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1 na1ña1a4.I3in3xi1ki4ka'4nu3 lu3ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1ndi4ka4ni24 lu3xi1ki4i14ni3i4chi3kwa'1an1 na1.
Kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4tan3ja143ni1i1chi(1) a1ta1kwi42ndi4i4chi1 lu(3) a2ta1kwi42,i3kan4ka4chi(2) a2ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Ya3ni2nda4a2ba42ke3e3ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2ndi4i4chi1sa4ka(2) e2ta1kwi42".
"Na4tu2na4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2ya1la3tun4,la3tun4ña1a4nda'3a4 2sa3kan4ndi4ta3ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4".I3in3bastónso'3o3ka4a4ni'4i4 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
bastónkan4sa4ka3ka3 ra2nu14u3ñu'3u4tan3ke3e3ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) a2kan4.
Ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) a2ndi4,"Na4tu2nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2ya1la3tun4,la3tun4ña1a4nda'3a4 2un4,sa3kan4ndi4ta3ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4".
"Tan3ya1ña1a4ni14nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 ya2nda'3a4 2un4ko14o3ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4."Nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2ya3ni2nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2sa3kan4ke3e3ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4".
"Ni3nda14kwa'1a3 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4ya3ni2nda14kwa'1a3 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4"."Tan3sa3kan4ko3o(3) on4ko'14o(3) on4ta1kwi42ku'1un(1) o4a1chi1ndi4ku14ni2 un4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2".
"Na4tu2ba143i4chi1 un4ta1kwi42tan3nda14kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2tan3kwa'1an1ba3yo4o4",ka4chi2 ra1.
"Na4tu2ku'1un(1) o4tan3ku'1un1ba(3) e4",ku4nde3e4i3ni2 ra1kwa'1an1 ra1,lu3chi'4i2ti4ka1ja'1an1 ra1tan3ka4chi2tu3ku3ba3 ra2ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4:
"ya3ni2a3sa(3) on4 a2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2ta3ba(4) on4lu3u3ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2ndi3ki'3in3ba(3) on4 e2nda3kwa'1a3 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4ndi4ba143ko4nde3e4ka1 yu1ndi4i4chi3ku4ni2ka3sun2i4chi3ánima e2i4chi1sa4ka(2) e2ta1kwi42".
"I4chi1 ni42 yu1ta1kwi42,nda3kwa'1a3 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3."Na4tu2nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2tan3ta3ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4".
Ke13ta3ba3ta1ja1nde1e4ña1a4ti13in3 ra2bastónxi14nda2 ra1nu14u3yu14ti3ña1a4,i14ni3i4chi3te'4e4i4chi3kan4lu3chi'4i2ti4ñu'3u4i4ndu'3u4xi'14ni3 ra2 run4,xi1ñu1 lu3ta1kwi42nda13ku'1un3.
Xi'13i3ta1kan4ba1ba'1a3,ndi'13i3xi'13i3 ra2ta1kwi42kan4tan3ja143ka4chi2 ra1ndi4,"Nda14kwa'1a3 (2) e2nda'3a(4) on4ya3ni2,ja1i4yo2ba'1a3i3ni2 yu1ndi4xi'13i3ba3yu'1u1ta1kwi42",ka4chi2 ra1.
"Na4tu2nda14kwa'1a3tu(3) un4 a2nda'3a4 2tan3i3nga2i4chi3i4chi1 un4ta1kwi42ndi4su14u3in3ka4ni24ba42ndi4i4yo2kwa'1a4ku'1un(1) o4xi1ki4yo'4o4".
"Nda14kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2tan3sa3kan4tu3yu'1u1ba3ndi4ta14ba4ka(1) e1ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4",ka4chi2 ra1.
"Na4tu2ku'1un(1) o4tan3ku'1un1ba3yo4o4"."Na4ku'1un(1) o4".Nda13ka3ka3ta'4an4 na2tan3kwa'1an1ba3 na3,kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4
Ni1ku3kwa'1a4 lu3ndi4ka2 ra1xi1ki4kwa'1an1 ra1ndi4i14ni3ka'4nu3kwa'1an1 na1ndi4,i4chi1 lu3 ra2ta1kwi42.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,"Ya3ni2,ka3ni3ma1ni4lu3u(3) un4yu'1u1ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2ndi4i4chi1sa4ka(2) e2ta1kwi42".
"Ba143ku4nde3e4ka1i3ni2 yu1,ka14ka3i3ni2 un4ndi4ya1ndi3ki'3in(3) un4ku4u4ba(3) e2yo'4o4nda'3a4 2nda3kwa'1a3 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4a1chi1ndi4ta1kwi42ku4u4ta4ba143ku4nde3e4ka1i3ni2 yu1i4chi1sa4ka(2) e2 ra4".
"A4su3ja1ndu'1be4ni1ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ta3ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ta13ba4 2ta1kwi42xi'13i(3) un4ni14nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2tan3bi3tin3ndi4ja1ya1u1bi1ba42tin3".
"Na4ni14nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2ndi4i3nga2ndi4ta14xi3ka(1) e1ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ta1kan4."Ka14ni3ni2 un4ya3ni2nda3kwa'1a3ba(3) e2nda'3a(4) on4",ka4chi2 ra1.
Ja143ni1xi14nda2 ra1bastónkan4nu14u3ñu'3u4ñu'4u4ta1kwi42i3kan4ni1xi'3i(3) a2kan4ba1ba'1a3.
Ja143,"Nda14kwa'1a3 e2nda'3a(4) on4ya3ni2,ni1ku3nde3e4i3ni2 yu1ndi4nda14kwa'1a3 e2nda'3a(4) on4,ni3nda14kwa'1a3 e2nda'3a(4) on4ndi4ja1ni1ku3nde3e4i3ni2 yu1tin3xi'13i(3) 2ta1kwi42ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3".
"I3nga2i4chi3ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in(4) 2i4chi1 un4ta1kwi42ndi4ta14ba4ka(1) e1 ra4ko'3o(3) on4ndi4ña1a4ko3to(3) on4sa1a3a3sa(3) on4ndi4ni3na4ku4ni2ku3u2 un4ni3ndi4ta14ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4mañana3kwi42 un4ndi4
ja1ndi'3i3u1bi1ba3ba42i4xa3maña on4yu'1u1,ka'4an2 on4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2tan3ba14ja4kwi4i4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2".
"Tan3na4ko3o3sa3kan4na4tu2na4ku14ni2 un4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2ndi4ni3yu'1u1tan3ta14ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3."Ba'1a3ba3".Ndi13ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1 na1.
Kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4,i1xa14a3i4chi(1) a1ta1kwi42ndi4i4chi1 lu(3) a2ta1kwi42.
Ja143ka4chi(2) a2so'3o3ndi4,"Ya3ni2ta3ba(4) on4lu3u3ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2sa3kan4ndi4nda3kwa'1a3 2ya1ka'4an2 on4xa'1a4ji'4in(4) 2nda3kwa'1a3 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4".
"Ja4nda3kwa'1a3 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4a1chi1ndi4i4chi1na3kwi42 yu1ta1kwi42,ba143ko4nde3e4ka1i3ni2 yu1ndi4i4chi1sa4ka(2) e2ta1kwi42",ka4chi(2) a2so'3o3.
"Sa3kan4ko3o(3) on4ya3ni2,i1chi(1) un4ta1kwi42tan3ku3ni2 un4ndi4
ko3ndo'3o(3) on4sa3kan4ku3ni2 un4ndi4ku14ni2 un4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4ña1a4nda'3a4 2ka'4an2ba'1a3 2ji'4in(4) un4ndu'1be4ja1ndi'3i3u1bi1bi4ba42i4xa3maña yu1,i4xa3maña on4yu'1u1ta4ba4 2ta1kwi42xi'4i(4) un4tan3ba14ja4kwi4i4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 ya1nda'3a4 2
"Ña1a4ko3to3mi3i(4) un4sa1a3a3sa(3) on4ndi4ba143i4yo2ka1 yu1ta3ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4a1chi1ndi4yo'4o1ndi4ta1nde3e4i3ni2ku4u(4) un4sa3kan4tu3yu'1u1ba3ndi4ta14ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4ba143i4chi1 yu1ta1kwi42ndi4ba'1a3kwa'1an1ba3yu'1u1",ka4chi2ta1kan4so'3o3.
Ya1yo1o4ndi4i4chi1 lu(3) a2ta1kwi42chi1,ta1kwi42i4chi1sa4ka(2) e2kan4,cabróntan3ka4chi(2) a2so'3o3ndi4:
"ta3ba(4) on4ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2ya3ni2,ta3ba(4) on4ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2nda3kwa'1a3 e2nda'3a(4) on4"."Ña1a4ko3to(3) on4sa1a3a3sa(3) on4ndi4ja1ndu'1be4ni1ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in(4) un4ja1u1bi1i4xa3maña on4yu'1u1".
"Tan3na4tu2ndi3xa3,ndi3xa3nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2un4,sa3kan4ba42ndi4ta3ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4tan3ja4i3ni2 un4ndi4nda14kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2ta14ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4a1chi1ndi4ja1ndu'1be4i13xa3maña on4yu'1u1".
"Ndi4ta1kwi42ku4ni2ko'3o(3) on4ka4chi2 un4ta13ba4 2 ra4xi'13i(3) un4tan3bi3tin3ndi4
ni14nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2tan3tu3ku3ni3bi3tin3i4chi1 un4ta1kwi42tan3ta14ba4 2 ra4ko'3o(3) on4ndi4ta1ndi13ki'3in3nde3e4i3ni2ku4u(4) un4xi'13i(3) un4ta1kwi42ndu'1be4tan3ña1a4ko3to3mi3i(4) un4sa1a3a3sa(3) on4ndi4nda14kwa'1a3,ta14xi(3) 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4".
"Na4tu2nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2ya1,ya1ka'4an(2) e2xa'1a4ji'4in(4) un4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2un4sa3kan4ndi4ta3ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4tan3tu4u2 un4ndi4nda14kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2ba'1a3,ña1a4ko3to3mi3i(4) un4sa1a3a3sa(3) on4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ja143ndi13ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1tu3ku3ba3 na3,lu3chi'4i2ti4kwa'1an1 ra1tan3,"Ta3ba(4) on4ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2ya3ni2i4chi1sa4ka2 yu1ba143ko4nde3e4ka1i3ni2 yu1ta1kwi42ndi4i4chi1sa4ka2 yu1".
"I4chi1 ni42ndi4ta1kwi42ku4u4ta4ku4ni2ko'3o3 ni42 yu1nda4i3chi2i4chi3ánima e2tu4u(2) i2"."Ta14ba4 2 ra4ko'3o(3) on4ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ña1a4ko3to(3) on4sa1a3a3sa(3) on4".
"Ta3ba(4) on4 ra4ko'3o(3) 2ya3ni2ba143i4yo2ba'1a3ka1i3ni2 yu1ndi4ta1ku4ni2ku3u2bi4ku4u(4) 2"."Tan3nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2ña1a4nda'3a4 2sa3kan4ndi4ta3xi(3) 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4,ji'3na(3) e2ña1a4ja4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4nda'3a4 2sa3kan4ndi4ta3xi(3) 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4".
"A1chi1ndi4ji'3na3ta1kwi42ta4ba4 2xi'4i(4) un4tan3ba143nda4kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2ndi4i4xa(3) on4mañaji'4in(4) 2tan3ba'1a3na4nda3kwa'1a3ji'3na(3) on4 e2nda'3a4 2sa3kan4ndi4ta3ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4".
"Nda14kwa'1a3 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4ya3ni2,ji'3na3ta3ba(4) on4ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2sa3kan4ndi4ndi3ki'3in(3) un4 a2",ka4chi2 ra1.
"Ji'3na3ta3ba(4) on4ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2"."U'4un3ndi4ta1i4xa3mañaku4u4yo'4o4,nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2sa3kan4ndi4ta3ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4tan3ni14nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2ndi4ta14ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4".
"Na4chu3ba42nda3kwa'1a3bi4 a2nda'3a(4) on4ya3ni2nda14kwa'1a3 e2nda'3a(4) on4"."Tan3ña1a4ko3to(3) on4ku14ni2 un4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2tan3ña1a4ku3nde3e4i3ni2 un4so3ko2ta1kwi42tu4u2 un4ya1kan4ndi4ku14ni2 un4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2".
"An4ku'1un(1) o4",ka4chi2 ra1.Nda13ka3ka3ta'4an4 na2kwa'1an1tu3ku3ba3 na3.Lu3chi'4i2ti4kwa'1an1 ra1tan3i1xa14a3sa4ndi'3i3tu3ku3ba3 ra2ya3ni2 ra1ndi4:
"ta3ba(4) on4ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2ya3ni2,ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4nda3kwa'1a3ba(3) 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4"."Tan3ta3xi3ji'3na(3) on4 e2nda'3a4 2sa3kan4ndi4ta3ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4".
"U'4un3ya3ni2,ji'3na3ta3ba(4) on4ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2sa3kan4ndi4nda3kwa'1a3 e2nda'3a(4) on4"."Ta1i4xa3mañaku4u(4) un4ji'4in(4) 2".
"Ji'3na3ja4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ko'3o(3) on4ta1kwi42ta4i4yo2ku4u4ba3ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4ndi4sa3kan4".
"Na4tu2ku14ni2 un4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2ndi4ni3yo'4o1tan3ko'14o(3) on4ta1kwi42ndi4ko3o3sa3kan4ba3na4tu2na4ku14ni2 un4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4i.n4ya3ni2 ra1
Ndi13ki'3in3tu3ku3ba3 na2kwa'1an1 na1,xa3ku4ti4kwa'1an1 na1tan3tu3ku3ba3ka'4an2 ra1ndi4,"An4nda3kwa'1a3 e2nda'3a(4) on4ya3ni2i4chi1sa4ka(2) e2ta1kwi42ta3ba(4) on4lu3u3 ra4ko'3o(3) 2,ta3ba(4) on4 ra4ko'3o(3) 2ndi4i4chi1sa4ka(2) e2ta1kwi42".
"nda14kwa'1a3 e2nda'3a(4) on4"."Na4tu2na4nda14kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2tan3ko3o3sa3kan4ba3ran4ko'14o(3) on4ta1kwi42a1chi1ndi4
yu'1u1ndi4ta1kwi42ndi4ta4ta3ba4 2ku4u4ba3 ra4ko'3o(3) on4na4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2tan3ku14ni2tu(3) un4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2sa3kan4tu3yu'1u1ba3ndi4ta14ba4yu'1u1ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4".
"Ko3o(3) on4sa3kan4ba3a1chi1ndi4ku14ni2 un4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2.Sa4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a4 2ya3ni2tan3sa3kan4ta3ba4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) on4",ka4chi2 ra1.
"Nda'4bi2mi3i4ba(3) on4i4chi1 ni42 un4ta1kwi42ni3ba143i4chi1 yu1ta1kwi42yu'1u1ba'1a3kwa'1an1ba3yu'1u1",ka4chi2 ra1.
Sa3kan4ku4u4ndi13ki'3in3tu3ku3 na2kwa'1an1 na1,"Na4ku'1un(1) o4na4tu2sa3kan4,na4tu2ba143i4chi1 un4ta1kwi42na4ku'1un(1) o4",nda13ka3ka3ta'4an4tu3ku3 na2kwa'1an1 na1.
Xa3ku4ti4kwa'1an1 na1tan3tu3ku3ba3i1xa14a3ka'4an2 ra1chi1,"Bi3tin3ndi3xa3ndi4ba143i4yo2ba'1a3ka1i3ni2 yu1ya3ni2ndi3ki'3in(3) un4 a3,xa'1a4 e2ka1a3ti4sa4ndo'3o3sa4ka2 on4yu'1u1ndi3ki'3in(3) un4 a2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ya1kan4,
ko'3o(3) 2ta1kwi42a1chi1ndi4ba143ko4nde3e4ka(1) e1i4chi1sa4ka(2) e2ta1kwi42".
"I4chi1 ni42 yu1ta1kwi42ndi4nda3kwa'1a(3) on4 a2,na4nda3kwa'1a3 2 ya1nda'3a(4) on4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ta3ba(4) on4ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2"."Ba'1a3ba3,ta3xi(3) un4 a2nda'3a4 2".I3kan4ni1nda3kwa'1a3ta1kan4 e2nda'3a4 ra3.
Ndi13ki'3in3ti4 ra(2) e2kan4tan3ni1ku3ya4nda3nu14u3ñu'3u4tan3ni1ti3in3 ra2bastónxi'14ni3 ra2 run4so'3o3xi14nda2 ra1 run4so'3o3ti4.
Xi1ñu1 lu3ta1kwi42ñu'4u4i14ni3te'4e4i4chi3,xi1ñu1sa4ka2ta1kwi42ñu'4u4ndi4bastónta4ba4 ra2ta1kwi42ji'4in4.
Ta1ko3ndo3ta1,ta1ñu'1u3,tan3ta1yo1o4ku4u4ta1sa4i1chi1 ni42 ra1ta1kwi42kan4.
I3kan4tan3ni1xi'3i(3) a2kan4ta1kwi42tin3ndi13ki'3in3 ra(2) e2kan4,"Bi3tin3ndi4
bi3tin3ba42ndi4nda13ko1o(3) e4ya1ma1ni4ya3ni2,yo4o4nda13ko1o3ya1ma1ni4ku4u(4) e4bi3tin3ndi4
ndi13ki'3in3yu'1u1ya1ku4u4ya1ku4ni2 yu1ndi3ki'3in(3) 2tan3sa3kan4tu3yo'4o1ba3ndi4ya1ja1ji4ni2ba(3) on4ndi4yo'4o1ku4u4ta1
ni1i3xa(3) on4ya1ki3ni3ka4a4ji'4in(4) an4ta4u3ni2kan4tan3ni1ke3e(3) o4ba1xi(3) o4tan3bi3tin3ndi4,ya1ko4ndo3
ndi13ki'3in(3) 2ka1a3ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) a3,tan3bi3tin3ndi4
ya1kan3,yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ki3xi3ndo1o3ko3ndo3ta1yo1o4,tan3yu'1u1ndi4ta1ñu'1u3ko3ndo3yu'1u1,ta1ñu'1u3ko3ndo3yu'1u1tan3yo'4o1ndi4ta1yo1o4ko3ndo3yo'4o1".
"Bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,ndi13ki'3in(3) un4 a2ña1a4tan3ya1ku4u4chi3ñu3i13xa(3) on4ji'4in(4) an4ta4u3ni2ndi4ya1kan4ba42ki3xi3ndo1o(3) on4nda1a3ma3ka1".
"Ba'1a3ka1ba3ni1ke3e3yo'4o1a1chi1ndi4,nda1sa1a3ku4u4ya1yu14bi4ko3ndo3kwe4nda2 on4,yu'1u1ndi4
ndo'4o4ba3yu'1u1a1chi1ndi4ko14o3ya1yu14bi4ko3ndo3kwe4nda2bi4 2ndi4ndo'4o4ba3yu'1u1,yo'4o1ndi4ya1yu14bi4ko3ndo3kwe4nda2yo'4o1".
"Na1si'4i2ba4li4ku4u4 na2na1si'4i2xu13xa3ku4u4 na2a1su3yo'4o1nda3ya'1a3ndi'3i3 na2nda'3a4a1chi1ndi4yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ki3xi3ndo1o3ji'4in(4) a2yu14bi4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4,ya1yu14bi4ki4xi3ndo1o3yo'4o1ji'4in4".
"Ya1yu14bi4ki3xi3ndo1o(3) on4ji'4in4tan3yu'1u1ndi4ta1,ta1ñu'1u3ko3ndo3yu'1u1tan3yo'4o1ndi4ta1yo1o4ko3ndo3yo'4o1".
"Yo'4o1ndi4ndi3sa4ku4u4ya1yu14bi4ku4u(4) a2ku3ni'3i3yo'4o1cuentaji'4in4ko3ndo(3) on4,ko3ndo3kwe4nda2 on4".
"Tan3yu'1u1ndi4,yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ka3ka3ñu3u42tan3yu'1u1ndi4ndu3bi4ka3ka3yu'1u1"."Ba'1a3ba3ya3ni2ba'1a3ba3".
"Bi3tin3ndi4ku'1un(1) o4tan3sa3kan4ndi4yo'4o1ndi4ya3tin3ki3xi3ndo1o3yo'4o1
ya1kan4ndi4nda3ye'3e2nu14u3ñu'3u4a3sa(3) on4tan3yu'1u1ndi4su4kun1ka1ku3ndu'4u4yu'1u1a1chi1ndi4ni'3ni4 ni42ka1nu14u(3) a2ni'4i4yu'1u1ya1kan4ndi4su4kun1ka1ku3ndu'4u4yu'1u1",ka4chi2 ra1,ka4chi2ta1ñu'1u3so'3o3.
Ja143ni1nda3a3ta1ñu'1u3kwa'1an1 ra1ndi4su4kun1ka1ba3i4ndu'3u4ñu'1u3ka1a3chi2,tan3ta1yo1o4ndi4ya3tin3ba3ni1ki3xi3ndo1o3ta1kan4chi2.
Ya1kan4ndi4xi'1i1 ni42ka4a4nu14u(3) a2kan4ya1kan4ndi4ya3tin3 ni42ni1ndo1o3 a2chi1,ya3tin3ti4ni1ndo1o3 a2tan3
tan3ta1ñu'1u3ndi4su4kun1ka1ni1nda3a3ta1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1tan3ta1yo1o4ndi4ma'14ñu3,ma'14ñu3ti4ni1ndo1o3ta1kan4,ya1kan4ndi4o4ra2nda4ye'3e2nu14u(3) a2kan4ñu3u42ndi4ba4a24ya3a3,ya3a3ka4a4nu14u(3) a2a1chi1ndi4
ya3tin3i4ndu'3u4 a2tan3i3nga(2) e2ndi4xi'1i1 ni42ka4a4nu14u(3) a2chi1,tan3ta1ñu'1u3ndi4su4kun1 ni42ka1i4ndu'3u4ta1kan4tan3ni'3ni4nu14u3ta1kan4ya1kan4ndi4nda4ye'3e2 ni42ka(1) e1.
Na4ya3tin3ni4ju3ndu'4u4ñu'1u3ndi4ku14chun(3) e4ko3o(3) e4yu14bi4ndi4ku3u2 e4ya1ni'3ni4chi2.
Ni'3ni4ja13ni1ku3 ni42ko3ko3ya1yu14bi4a3sa(3) e2na4ya3tin3ni4ju3ndu'4u(4) a2,tan3su4kun1 ni42ka1i4ndu'3u4 a2kan4ya1ni'3ni4nu14u(3) a2ya1kan4ndi4ko14o(3) a2ndo'4o4ba'1a3 e2ndi4nda143xa3ku4ti4ni'3ni4nu14u(3) a2chi1.
Ni'3ni4sa13ni1ku3sa4ka2 ni42nu14u(3) a2ya1ñu'1u3tan3yo1o4ndi4bi1xin3nu14u3ta1kan4ya1kan4ndi4ya3tin3ni1ndo1o3ta1kan4i4ndu'3u4 ra2chi1.
Ya3tin3ti4ni1ndo1o3ta1kan4tan3i3kan4ti4ku4u4ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ran4.
MaximinuMeza.U1ni1xi3ko3u'1un1.Yoloxóchitl.
Kwen4tu2ya3ta4ja'1a4ta1,ta1xi1i4ji'4in4ta1sa1bi4ba42ka1a3.
I3in3tiem4pu2ndi4,na1,ta1xi1i4ndi4ni1ta3nda'3a4 ra2ji'4in(4) an4si1si'4i2na1sa1bi4.
Tan3na1sa1bi4ndi4,ta3nda'3a4ba3ta1ña1a4tan3ndi4ba143ndi'4i13i3ni2bi4ta1xi1i4a1chi1ndi4ta1i4yo2be'3e3i3ta2an2,i3ta2an2ku4u4ta1kan4,ya1,
ña'1a3ba3chi'4yo14i4xa3ta1kan4i4ndu'3u4 ra2
Na1sa1bi4ndi4i1xa14a3,i1xa14a3ba3ki'13in3kwi1ya1tan3,chi4ñu3kwi1ya1xa14a3tan3
na1ja1xa'4nda2ku'1u1ku4u4na1ña1a4,ta1nda3a2ki1bi4ko3ko3ndi4na1ja1,ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ku4u4na1kan4ja'13nda2 na1i3tun4nu14u3nda1xin1ja'13nda2 na1.
Tan3ta1kan4ndi4kwa'1an1chi3ñu3nu14u3 ra2i4xa3 na2na1sa1bi4ña1a4ndi4nda4a2tiem4pu2ba42ka'3nda2 ra1ku'1u1.
A1chi1ndi4,ja1ku4ya3tin3 ni42tan3sa3kan4ka4a4ba3ku'1u1ta13xi3 na2nda'3a4 ra2ka'3nda2 ra1i4ndu'3u4 a3.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1,ka4chi2ña4i4ndu'3u4ji'4in4 ra2ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,
"ka'4an2 ni42na1yu3ba(4) e4ndi4,ya1kan3,nda4a2tiem4pu2ba42ka'3nda2 on4,ku'1u1ta13xi3 na2nda'3a(4) on4chi2".
"Ya1kan4bi4ndi'4i13i3ni2na1kan4na4ku14ndi'1i3i3ni2 na1ku3ni2 na1yu'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,
na4ku3tu3ba3na1kan4ndi4na1,na1ja1xi4tu3ku4u4na1kan4yu'1u1ndi4
yo'4o4ka'3nda2 yu1tan3yo'4o4ko3ko3a3sa3yu'1u1",ka4chi2,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3i1nda43.
Ya1kan4ndi4ka'4an2,ja143ka'4an2tu3ku3 na2ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,na4ta1ka'3nda2ku4u4 ra2ku'1u1na4ta1ka'14nda2ku4u4 ra2ku'1u1a1chi1ndi4,ja1kwa'1an1 ni42ki1bi4.
I3kan4ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4na1yu3ba(4) en4ndi4:
"ka4chi2ta1kan4ndi4,ko14o3nda4a2xa'1a4na4ku3ni3ni2 ni42 ndo4ku3ni2 ndo4ta1kan4ndi4,ta1ku3tu3ku4u4ba3ta1kan4yo'4o4ta'1nda(1) e1tan3yo'4o4ko3ko3ba(3) e2kan4,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) 2,tan3ta1chi'3i3ku4u4ba3ta1kan4".
"Jun3,ta1,ta1ki'4bi3ba3ku4u4ta1ña1a4."
"A1chi1ta'4nda1ku'1u1sa3kan4ndi4i4chi(1) a1sa3kan4ndi4,tu4ni1ka4a4,
ya1chi'3i3ta1a3ya1ta3ta2ka3xi4 ra2,ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4so'3o3ji'4in4ña4si1si'4i2 ra1."
"Na4tu2sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,sa3kan4ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in4 ra3."
"Ndi'14i13i3ni2,ndi'14i13i3ni2na1kan4ku3ni2 na1yu'1u1,ta1ku3tu3ku4u4ba3yu'1u1ka3chi2 un4ji'4in4 na3".
Sa3kan4ku4u4tan3,ni1ta1nda3a2ba3ki1bi4ko3ko3tan3
tan3na1ña1a4ndi4,na1ja1ka'4an2ku4u4 na2ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Na1ja1ka'3mi3ku4u4 ndu2i3ta2an2an4ja1ndu13ku3na(4) on4nu14u3nda1xin1",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
Kwen4tu2ja1xa3a3ku4u4ba(3) e2ka'4an2 na1.
A1chi1na1kan4ndi4na1ja4chiu4un4ku4u4na1kan4tan3ta1kan4ndi4ta1i4yo2be'3e3ti4ba3ku4u4ta1kan4i1nda43.
Ba14ja4ke4ta3ta1kan4.Ja1o4ra2ko3ko3kan4xa1a1 ra1chi13ndu'4u4 ra2ñu'3u2ka'3a4ku'1u1.
i'4i(3) a2tan3i'4i3ta4ku(1) a1tan3chi13ndu'4u4 ra2ñu'3u2ka'3a4 e2tan3ni1ki'3in3ñu'3u(2) a2ya1xi4xi1ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4.
Yo'4o4ndo3o3 run4ki'4in4ñu'3u2 run4tan3ka'4ma3ñu'3u4tan3kwa'1an1 run4,nda143xi4ka3,xi4ka3ti4ñu'3u2,ya4a24ñu'3u2.
ku'1u1,tan42i4yo2ku'1u1ta13xi3 na2nda'3a4 ra2ndi4
ja'1an1ndi'3i(3) a2xi1xi1ndi'3i(3) a2ndi4ba'1a3 lu3ni1xi1xi1ndi4nda1tan42ya1ni1ta'1nda1i1nda43.
Ba'1a3ka1ba3ka4a4nda1xin1ta1kan4tan3,tan3ya1kan3,tan3ya1ko4ndo3nda1xin1mi3i4 na2ndi4
i3kan4chi13ka2 ra(1) e1chi1tun3tu3ku3ba3ji'4in4 na2ndi4,ya1chi1tun3ki13xa3a4 na2ji'4in4i1nda43.
I3kan4ndi4,ki'1bi3ñu'3u2ndi4,chi13ndu'4u4 na2ñu'3u2tan3yo'4o4tan3kan4xi4ka3 na2chi4ndu'4u4 na2ñu'3u2ndi4
su3ti1xin3,ti1xin3nda1ba1kwa'1an1ñu'3u2ndi4,nda143ki3ni3ka4a4ti4nda143ti1kwi1ta1yo'4o4ti1kwi1ta1kan4ti4xi1xi1nda1xin1 na1.
Chi13ka2 ra(1) e1ki'4bi3ji'4in4 na2ndi4ni14xa'3mi3 ra2nda1xin1 na1i1nda43
I3kan4ja143ni1kwa3a4ki13xa2a2 na1,na1sa4a24ku4u4ba3 na2ki13xa2a2 na1i1nda43,i3kan4ka4chi2,
ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in4 na2,ji'4in4,ta1sa1bi4ji'4in(4) an4i4ndu'3u4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,
"la3tun4 ni42ka4a4chi3ñu3i13xa3ka14sa(3) on4,ni14xi1xi1i4chi3nda1xin1ndu'1u1tan3nda1xin1ta1kan4ndi4
tan3sa3kan4ka4a4i'4i3chi13ndu'4u4 ra2ñu'3u2nde4ta3 run4tan3chi13ndu'4u4 ra2ñu'3u2ndi4
ba'1a3 lu3xi1xi1nda1xin1ta1kan4tan3ndu'1u1ndi4chi13ka2 ra(1) e1ko14o3nu14u3ji'4in4ndu'1u1".
"Lu14u3i4yo2nda3ti3in3 ndu2nda1xin1,i4yo2nda3ti3in3 ndu2nda1ba1",ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4so'3o3i1nda43.
Ya1ni14xi3in(3) a2ko3ko(3) a2ndi4nda1ja143i1xa14a3 na2,
ni1ndi'3i3i3nga2ki1bi4tan3ki13xa3a4 na2nda4ti3in3 na2nda1ba1ndi4ki3ni3 lu3ka4a4i1nda43ni14xi1xi1tu4ni1i4chi(3) a2ndi4
sa1a3tan42yu1ku1ya4xin4yu1ku1ya4xin4ti4ni1xi1xi1tan3ni1ndi'3i3ba3ke13ta(3) e2tan3
nda13ti3in3ndi'3i3bi4 na(2) e2sa3kan4ndi4ndu13ba'1a3nu14u(3) a2sa3kan4ndi4,sa3kan4ni1chi'3i3 na3.
Ni1ta1nda3a2chi'3i3 na2u1xi1kwa'1an1mayutan3ta1kwa'1an1chi'3i3tu3ku4u4ta1ña1a4ba3ndi4
i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4,ji'4in4ña4i4ndu'3u4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Kwa'4an2ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4na1yu3ba(4) e4na4ta3xi3 na2nu1ni4ta3ta2chi'3i(3) o4,ta3xi3 na2ta3ta2chi'3i(3) o4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4i4ndu'3u4ji'4in4 ra3.
Ke13e3 ra2ja'1an1 ra1nu14u3ña4,nu14u3na1si1so3,na1yu3ba(4) en4.
I3kan4ka4chi2ña4ji'4in4na1yu3ba(4) en4ndi4,
"nu1ni4ta3ta2ku4ni2ta1kan4ku'1un1ji'4in4 ra2chi'3i3 ra2ran3,ka4chi2 an4so'3o3,ta3xi3 ndo4ta3ta2ku'1un1ji'4in4 ra2chi'3i3 ra3".
"An3ba'1a3ba3",ka4chi2na1ta4u3ni2,ta1sa1bi4so'3o3i1nda43.
I3kan4,ke'13e4 ra2,su14ku3tu4 ra2ña1kwa'1an1ji'4in(4) an4,ña4si1si'4i2 ra1.
Ti1kin4,ti1kin4i3kin4,utasu14u3ti1kin4i3kin4ba'1a3kwa'1an1ndi4ti1kin4chi4nga14ba2ba3kwa'1an1chi'3i3 ra3.
Tan3i3kan4,nu1ni4kwa'1an1chi'3i3 ra2ndi4ti1su'4un4ba3ba42kwa'1an1chi'3i3 ra3.
I3kan4ja143utaan4ya1,ja143ndu13ku3na4 ra2nu14u3ta3ta2,"Utaan4,
an4i4yo2ka4xi3 ni42i3ni2na1yu3ba4si'3i(4) un4ndi4,ya1kan3,ña1yo'4o4,ña1yo'4o4ta13xi3 na2ki'1bi3ja14(3) e2ndi4,ya1kan3,
ba3ya1ka1a3ka3xi(4) un4ya1kan4ndi4ya1ka1a3ta13xi3 na2chi'3i(3) 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ja'1an1ke'3e4 ra2nu14u(3) a2ndi4ti1su'4un4ba43,"Sa3kan4ko3o(3) a2chi'3i3ba3yu'1u1".
Tan3ta1kan4ndi4ja1ku4mi3i4 ra2ya1ma1ni4ji'4in4ti1su'4u4ba3ti1ma'4a2ba3i3i2ba3tio1ko4ba3.
Sa3kan4ndi4ni1xi1ka3,chi'13i3ba3 ra2ndu3bi4sa3kan4chi'13i3 ra3.
Ja14xi1nu3 ra2ni1chi'3i3 ra2nda1xin1,ndi'13i3chi'13i3 ra3.
Ja143ni1ka3na3 ra2ki3ti4tio1ko4ba3ti1su'4u4ba3,nda1ndi'4i4nu14u3tio1ko4ka13na3 ra3.
Ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4ti1ma'4a2ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4i3i2ba3,ni1ka3na3 ra2 ri4tan3ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4 ri4ndi4
"bi3tin3ndi4ndo1o3 ndo4in3ka4ni24tan3a3sa3 ndo4 a2ba'1a3ndi4
ya1ñu'4u4kan4sa4ya'1a3 ndo4ka1a3tan3ya1ñu'4u4ka1a3sa4ya'1a3 ndo4ku'1un1i3kan4,sa3kan4ku3ni2 na1
a1chi1ndi4ya1chi1tun3chi13ka2 na1ji'4in(4) 2,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ki3ti4i1nda43.
Su14u3ya1ba'1a3ni4ta3xi3 na2chi'3i(3) 2ndi4ti1su'4un4ba3ta13xi3 na3,ya1ko14o(3) a2ba'1a3kwa'1a3ña'1a3bi4ta13xi3 na2nda'3a4 2.
Ka4chi2,ka4chi2ta'3an2ta1xi1i4so'3o3i1nda43,i3kan4ja143
ni1ke3e3ba3ki3ti4kan4ni1ku3na1ni1ja143i1xa14a3ba3ti4kan4
xi4ko14nu1ni4ba'1a3ta3ta2tan3kwa'1an(1) e1ka1a3tan3ya1ti1su'4un4ñu'4u4ka1a3kwa'1an1i3kan4sa3kan4ndi'3i3ku4u4 ri4ndi4
sa3kan4ku4u4 ri4tan3niu3ñu3u42tan3ni1ki4tu3ndi4
o4ra2ni1ndu1ta(1) e1ndi4i3tu2tan3te'1e1
te'1e1ba42ni1ndu1ta1ba3,ba'1a3,te'1e1i3kin4ba42ni1ndu1ta1i1nda43,tan3ji'4in4na1sa1bi4ndi4
ndu1ta(1) e1ndi4ti1su'4un4ba3ni1ndu1ta1ji'4in4na1kan4,ta3ta2ta13xi3 na2chi'3i3ta1kan4ba3ndu1ta1kan4.
Tan3ta3ta2ni1chi'3i3 na2ndi4nda13ya'1a3ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ndu1ta1ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ji'4in4 na2,ji'4in4ta1xi1i4i1nda43.
I3kan4ndi4ji'4in4tu1ndo'4o4ndi'3i3i1xa14a3 na2chi13ka2 na(1) e1chi1tun3ji'4in4ta'4an4 na2ndi4
ta1sa1bi4ku14ni2ko3to3 ra2ta1xi1i4,ta1xi1i4ku14ni2ko3to3 ra2ta1sa1bi4sa3kan4ndi'3i3kwa'1an1 na1ji'4in(4) a3.
Ja143i1xa14a3ni1ndu1ta1i3tu2ndi4,ku4u(4) un4sa4ka2ba3sa1bi4nu14u3ña'1a3mi3i4 na3.
Ndi4ja1ja1tu3ku3nda13chi'3i3 na2ba42kan4i1nda43,o4ra2ki1bi4ndu1ta(1) e1kan4ndi4ta13ba4ndi'3i3 na(2) e2kan4tan3
ja143ni1nda3chi'3i3 na2ta3ta2,i3kan4ja143
I1xa14a3 na2ndi4ku4xi'4nda24 na2sa1bi4ku3un3nu14u3,nu14u3ña'1a3ta1xi1i4.
Sa1bi4ya4a4,sa1bi4ya4a4,ba4li4ba4li4bi4ko4yo13nu14u3,nu14u3i3tu2ta1,ta1xi1i4.Tan3mi3i4 na2ndi4xu13xa3ku4u(4) un4sa1bi4ndi4
i3in3nda1a1nda1a1ka4ndi3ka2nu14u3i3tu2 na1,i3kan4ja143
xi1ka3,xi1ka3 ra2ndi4sa3kan4,sa3kan4ti4nda4a(2) e2ba42kwa'3nu(3) a2kan4ba143ni4xa'3nu(3) a2ndi4ko14o3ña'1a3nda'3a4 e2ndi4ko14o3sa1bi4nu14u(3) a2ran4.
I3kan4xa143chi13ka2 ra(1) e1chi1tun3ji'4in4 na2ndi4,ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4ña4i4ndu'3u4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"ba'1a3 ni42ndi4,ba'1a3 ni42i3ni2na1yu3ba(4) on4,nda4a2ba42ke3e(3) a2ta3an(4) on4yu'3u(4) un4tu4u2 un4ya1kan4ndi4,ya1kan4i4xa3 na(2) e2chi1tun3ji'4in(4) 2nda1ya'4a13ka1ni3
nda1sa1bi4ka1ku4xi'4nda24 na2ku3un3nu14u3i3tu2 yu1,ba143ba'1a3ta'3an2sa3kan4".
I3kan4ja143,"Bi3tin3ndi4ndo1o(3) on4ndi4ku'1un1ba3yu'1u1".
"Na4tu2ja1i4so3ko2 on4tan3ya1kan4ndi4yo'4o4ndo1o3i3in3ta'4bi4ndi1xan4 2ji'4in(4) un4tan3
ndi1xan4ka1a3chi3ka2 on4ka'3a4xi1yo4tan3ya3tan(3) e2ku3xi(3) un4".
"Ndi1xan4ka1a3chi3ka2 on4,ka'3a4ki1si3tan3
chi'1yo4,ya1kan3,ku3ndo3so4xa'4a2an4ko14o3nda4a2ka(1) e1ka3xi(4) un4ku3xi(3) un4ndo1o(3) on4.Na4ku'1un1 yu1,
tan3ndi4,ya1kan3,ko1to1ku'14un1 un4
na4tu2nda4ka1tu'4un4 na2yo'4o1tan3,ka'14an1 on4ji'4in4 na2sa1a3ku4u4xi4xi(3) un4ndi4ña4ndo'4o4tu3ku4u4yo'4o1ba3ka3chi2 un4ji'4in4 na3.
A1chi1ndi4ni3ta1kwi42ko'3o3ti4 ra2ko14o3i1nda43.
Ya1kan4ndi4,nda143a1su(3) an4ban4ku4nda'4bi2 an4ji4ni2 an4ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4a1chi1ndi4ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4ku4u4 ra3.
Tan3ji4ni2ba(3) en4kan4mi4i4,mi4i4ba42i4yo2ta1kwi42ko'3o3,
ko'3o3,ko'3o3 na2ya1kan4ndi4,ya1kan4ndi4mi4i4i4yo2yo'3o4na4ma4,yo'3o4tu14un3,
i3kan4kwa'1an1,kwa'1an1 na1tan3ja1i3kan4i4ta3ni(3) a2kan4
i3kan4xa'4an1 en4ji'4in4 ra2tan3xi'4i4 ra2ta1kwi42sa3kan4ndi'3i3ku4u4.
Ja143ji13ni2 ra1ndi4sa3kan4ba'1a3,sa3kan4i4xa3 na2xi'4i4 na2ta1kwi42.
Nu14u3kwi1yo'1o4kan4ti4ba3i4yo2ta1kwi42xi'4i4na1kan4,tan3ya1kan4ndi4,tan3ta1i4yo2ku4u4ba3ta1kan4tan3mi3i4 na2ndi4
xu13xa3 ni42chi4ka2,chi4ka2 na(1) e1chi1tun3ji'4in4 ra3,ya1kan4ndi4xi1ka3xi4nu3 ra2i1nda43,ke13e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
Ja143ndo13ko3to3 na2ndi4i3in3i3xi4,i3in3i3xi4yu'1ma1ka4na3nda1ji1ni4yu3ku4nda1kan4.
Kwa'1an1tu3ku3 na2ti'4bi4 na2na1kwa'1an1ja1ta4 ra2nda4ndu3ku4ña'3a4 na2,ko14o3ka1 ra1ndi4ja1i3nga2ta'4bi4ba3.
Ja1i3nga2xi4ña4ja1ta4yu1u4ka3ba4nda1kan4i4ndu'3u4 ra3,i3in3i3xi4,i3in3i3xi4yu'1ma1ka4na3.
Ta1i4yo2ku4u4ba3 ra2ndi4ta1xi4ka3xi4nu3ku4u4ba3 ra2nu14u3 na2i1nda43.
Tan3ña4si'4i2 ra1ndi4ña4xi4xi3ku4u4ba(3) en4,ya1ya4tan3xi4xi3ku4u4ba(3) en4ña1chi'4yo14ja4xi24ba(3) en4kan4.
Tan3i4xa3,tan3mi3i4na1yu3ba4si'3i(4) an4ndi4,ja1ba14ja4kwi4i4ka1chi'1yo4 a2ndi4ko14o3,ko14o3ñu'3u2chi'1yo4 a2i1nda43.
Ko14o3ñu'3u2chi'1yo4 a2ya1kan4ndi4ndo'4o4 ni42 na1ndi4ja1,ja143i1xa14a3ndi'4i13i3ni2ba3 na2ndi4
ko14o(3) a2kwi4i4chi'1yo4ka3xi4 na2ja1,ja1ya1i'4i3ba3ja4xi24 na2i1nda43.
Ja1ya1i'4i3ba3ja4xi24 na2tan3,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2,ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4si1si'4i2 na1ndi4,"¿Tan3sa1a3i4xa3yo'4o1xi4xi(3) un4si'3i4 2ndi4
ndu'1u1tan3ndo'4o4 ni42 ndu1ndi4,ko14o3ñu'3u2,ya1kan3,nda3sa1a4is1ta4ku3xi3 ndu2ni3ya1ya3tan(3) e2ku3xi3 ndu2kwi14i3".

ti4kan4chi4tu2",tan3yo'4o4tan3kan4xi4ka3ti4kan4ka4ni3 ri4ja1ta4i3tun4.

Ta1chi4na'14a1ba42ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4.Tan3

¿an4ji4ni2ka1 on4i3nga(2) e2i4xa3ti4kwa14ku3kan4?,¿nda4a(2) e2ba42kwi3i3a3sa3ka1 ri4an4kwi3i3ku3ndi3chi2ti1ka1chi1nu14u3ndo'1yo3an4ko3o3?,¿a4chu3sa4xa14ni2 ri4na1yu4bi24?,¿nda4a(2) e2ku4u(4) a2i4yo2sa4xa14ni2 ri4 na2?
Mi3i4,mi3i4 ri4ji4ni2,mi3i4 ri4ta4ba4kwe'1e1ya1kan4ndi4i4xa14ni2 na1ran4.
Mi3i4 ri4ta4ba4kwe'1e1tan3ya1kwi14i3nda3ku3ni2na1kan4mi4i4ba42ndo'4o(4) a2ji'4in4 na2an4ko14o3mi3i4 na2an4ko14o3se'1e3 na2an4ko14o3tan3

Tan3ndi4ji14ni2 o4na4tu2ndi3xa3bi4a1chi1ko14o3yo4o4ni4xa'1an(1) e4kan4nde4ta(3) e4kan4tan3ji13ni2 o4sa3kan4ni1xi'1i1 ri4tan3na1kan4ni1xi'1i1ndi1ku1nda42ka3chi2 o4so'3o3ndi4
ni3na3ya1ko4ndo3sa3kan4ja4i3ni2ba3na1ta4u3ni2,sa3kan4ndo'4o4na1ta'4an(4) e4nda4ñu'4u4 na2xi'4i1 na1ya1kan4sa3kan4ni'4i4na1kan4cuentaji'4in(4) a2ndi4
ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1ni1xi'1i1ya1kan4ndi4ndo'13o3 na2sa3kan4ni1xi'1i1 na1.Tan42ku4u4na1,na1ba'1a3kwa1nda3a3nu14u3is1to3tan3in4ki14tu3ndi3i2nde4e4 na2xi'1i1 na1ndi4
ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1ni1xi'1i1ya1kan4ndi4ni1xi'1i1na1kan4chi2,tan3na1sa'4an4ndi4ba3ji14ni2na1kan4sa3kan4na1kan4ndi4
ja1i3nga2kwe'1e1ba3ba42ndo'13o3na1kan4xi'1i1 na1ka4chi2na1sa'4an4,tan3yo4o4na1i4sa1bi4ndi4
ka4ndi4xa3 ni42 o4 e2kan4ndi4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 e4ni1ndo'3o3sa3kan4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 e4ni1tu1xu'4u2.
Na4tu2nde4e(4) o4sa3kan4tan3ja143ku'4u2xa'1a(4) e4ko14o(3) a2ndo'4o(4) e4ko14o(3) a2tan3,ñu3u2is1to'3o2 e4ni1tu1xu'4u2ya1kan4ndi4ku'4u2 e4chi2.
Ka4chi2ba3na1ta4u3ni2ba42tan3ndi4ko14o3na1ji4ni2 na1na4ndi3xa3ba42ndi4sa3kan4ni1ndo'3o3bi4ti4kan4ndi4ni3na3,sa3kan4xa4i3ni2ba3 na3.
Tan3ndi4na4kwa4ñu3ya1xa4i3ni2 na1kan4ndi4ba3ya1ndi3xa3ba42an4ko14o3an4ndi14xa3tu3ndi4,na4chu3tu3ba42ku4kwi4i24tu(3) a2kan4na4tu2
ko14o(3) a2ndo'4o4tu(3) a2tan3ku4kwi4i24tu(3) a3,yo3o3ba42kan4na4nda3ka3ni3ni2 o4sa3kan4ndi4ku4kwi4i24 a3,na4kwa4ñu3ya1
ka4ndi4xa(3) e4 e2kan4tan3xa4a1ja3ba(3) e2kan4a1chi1ndi4
na4kwa4ñu3ndi3xa3ba42ndi4i4yo2ñu3u2is1to'3o2 e4ka4chi2ka'4an(4) e4tan3i3kan4ki4xa3a4na1ba4li4ki4xa3a4ja4i3ni2 na1ndi4,ñu3u2is1to'3o(2) e2tu1xu'4u2ya1kan4ndi4ku'4u2 ni42ji4ni2 yu1.
Ka4chi2 na1tan3ndi4ji14ni2 o4na4ndi3xa3ku4u4bi4 a2na4ki3ti4ku4u4bi4 ri4an4ko14o3yo3o3ku4u(4) a2ndi4
kwa'1a4 ni42ñu3u2is1to'3o2na1yu4bi24ka4chi2 na1.
Sa3a2ku4u4 ri4na4i4xa14ni2 ni42 o4nda4chi(4) o4tan3sa1a3ni3tan3nda4chi(4) o4kwa'1an(1) e4ndi4ti4nda4chi4ku4u4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 e4chi2.
Tan3yo3o3ku4u4 na2ji4ni2 na1yo3o3ku4u4ti4nda4chi4kan4,xi14ni2 o4yo3o3ku4u4ti4nda4chi4kan4na4tu2i4xa14ni2 o4ndi4nda4chi(4) o4kwa'1an1yo4o4,ñu3u2is1to'3o2 e4nda4chi4chi2.
Tan3ndi4,xi14ni2 o4na4ya1ndi3xa3 ni42ku4u4bi4 a2nda4tu'4un4 na2xa'1a4ya1ko4ndo3ñu3u2is1to'3o2 e4yu3ba4 2.
¿An4ba143ta4ku1kwen4tu2ñu3u2kan4na4ja1i4yo2i3in3na1yu4bi24xi'4i1ñu3u2is1to'3o2 na1tan3xi'4i1 na1?
Buenondi4nda4tu'4un4ba3 na2i4yo2na1,xi'4i1ba3na1nda'4bi2,ta1kum3pa4ri2 yu1
CianuNacletuka4chi2 o4kan4ni1xi'1i1ta1nda'4bi2ndi4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 ra1ni1xi'1i1.

an4ki1bi4u1bi1ba42tan3ni1xi'1i1ta1ta4u3ni2kan4ndi4ñu3u2is1to'3o2 ra1xa'13ni4 na2chi1.
Ka4chi2ba3 na2tan3ndi4ji14ni2 o4na4tu2ndi3xa3ba42kan4a1chi1ndi4a3ma3ji4ni2 o4na4tu2ki3ti4kan4ku4u4ñu3u2is1to'3o2ta1yu4bi24.

Ta1sa1bi4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ni1ja'1an1ka'1an1ña4si'4i2 ra1ji'4in4,ji'4in4se'1e3 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ku'1un1 na1,ya1kan3,ka3ja3chiu4un4 na2chi1,tan3
kwa'1an1tan3kwa'1an1ba(3) en4nu14u3 ra2ka'4an2 en4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4na4ku'1un1 ra1ja3chiu4un4 ra2tan3ba143xi4in4 ra2ku'1un1 ra1ndi4ta1ku4xu4xan3i3ni2ku4u4 ra2ja3chiu4un4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4si1si'4i2 ra1ndi4,"Kwa'4an2 on4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4se'1e(3) o4na4ja4nu1mi4 ra2ndi4ta1ja1ki3xa3a4ku3tu3ku4u4yu'1u1".
I3kan4,ba143xi4in4 ra2ja3chiu4un4 ra2chi1,ba143xi4in4 ra2ja3chiu4un4 ra2ndi4i4ndu'3u4ba3 ra3.
Sa3kan4ku4u4xa'13nda2ba3ta1sa1bi4nda1xin1ndi4ka'4nu3 lu3nda1xin1ja'13nda2ta1sa1bi4.
Xa1i4yo2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) a2kan4,i3kan4ja'13nda2 ra(1) e1,ja1o4ra2ya1chi'3i3 ra2tan3i1ja14a3
ba143ni4xi3in(3) a2ko3ko(3) a2chi1,ni14xi3in(3) a2ko3ko(3) a2ndi4ki13xa13a4 ra2xi4ka3 ra2nda4ka'3mi3 ra2lu14u3nda13ka'3mi3 ra2ni14ko3nde3e4 ra2ndi'3i(3) a2nda3ka'3mi3 ra2ndi4
ni1ndo1o3ka1ba(3) e2,cha'13bi3sa4ka2 ra1na1ta4tu2nda13ka'3mi(3) a2ni14xi1xi(1) a1,i3kan4tan3ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"Ko3o3mi3i4 a2sa3kan4ba3a1chi1ndi4ba143ni4xi3in(3) a2ko3ko(3) a2".
I3kan4nda143sa1a3mi4i4ni1xi1xi1kan4ni1chi'3i3 ra3,chi'13i3 ra2xi1ka3 ra2,i3kan4ni1ndi'3i3kan4tin3ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4se'1e3 ra2ndi4:
"ja4nu1mi4 ndo4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku3tu3 ra2na4ta1ku3tu3ku4u4 ra2na4ku14tu3tu3 ra2tan3ndo4o13 a2ko3o(3) a2sa3kan4ba3",ka4chi2 ra1.
Ndi4ya1nu14u3ndi4ji'3na3carrilni1ja'1an1ta1,ta1xi1i4chi13ka2 ra1chi1,ta1sa1bi4ji'4in4ta1xi1i4ndi4carrilchi13ka2 ra1,chi13ka2 ra1carril.
Tan3ndi1ku1nda42ndi4ka1carrilchi13ka2 ra1ya1kan4ndi4chi13nda'3a4 ra2ku'1u1kan4tan3ya1ja1ndo1o3ko3ko3ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4ndo13ko3o4 ra(2) e2,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4

"ku'1un(1) un4tan3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ka'3nda2 on4ku'1u1a1chi1ndi4ja1ni1ta3xi(3) 2señami4i4ba42ka'3nda2 on4",ka4chi2ta1,ta1sa1bi4ji'4in4 ra3.
"Mm,ndi4ndi'14i13i3ni2 un4ku4u(4) a2kan4ndi4ta1ka'3nda2ku4u4ba3yu'1u1,na3ni2ja1ta13xi(3) un4 a2nda'3a4 2ndi4ya1ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ji'4in4ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4,ya1ku3tu(3) 2ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4".
Ya1kan4ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) a3,ya1ta'1nda1ku4u4ba(3) e3",sa3kan4ku4u4,ja1ni1sa4ndi'3i3ba3ta1,sa1bi4ji13tu3 ra2tan3
ja14ndi'3i3ta1sa1bi4ji13tu3 ra2tan3nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4sa3kan4ka4a4ba3ku'1u1i4ndu'3u4 a2chi1,xa1o4ra2o4ra2tan3ja143i1xa14a3ni1xa1a1ta1xi1i4tan3ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4:
"ya1ku3tu(3) 2ku4u4ba(3) e2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,ni1xa1a1ta1xi1i4tan3ja143ni1nda3ti'3bi4ndi3i4 ra2nu14u(3) a2mi4i4ni1ja'3nda2 ra1carrilkan4,ndi3i4,ndi3i4nda13ti'3bi4 ra2,
tan3ba4li4,ba4li4chi13ndu'4u4 ra2ñu'3u2ja143ni1ki'3in3ñu'3u2,tan3ya1nu14u3ndi4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4
ya1kan3,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ta1,ta1sa1bi4ndi4,ya1kan3,a3sa(3) on4 a2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2ndi4,ta1,ta1sa1bi4ndi4nda13ka3ya2 ra1ni3i4tan3nde4e(4) a2xa14ku'1u1.
Lu14u3ni3i4ndi4nde4e4ni3i4nde4e4i3kin4nde4e4ndi3chi2nde4e4ya1ma4 ra2tan3ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,"Ku'1un(1) un4tan3sa3kan4nda3ta3ba4 ndo4 a2a1chi1ndi4ta1ka'3mi3ku4u4yu'1u1,ja1ki1bi4ko3ko3ba43".
"Nda4a(2) e2ko3ko3tu(3) a2kan4nda1xin1ka1ba42ja'13nda2 yu1tan3ni14xi1xi(1) a1ndi4,ya1kan3,nda13ti3in3sa4ka2 yu(1) a1lu14u3 na2xi1ka3ji'4in(4) 2nda13ti3in3 ndu(2) a2tan3ni14xi1xi(1) a1".
"Ya1ña1a4ndi4ku'1u1ba42ña1a4,nda4a2ka'4an(4) on4ko3ko3tu(3) a2ña1a4ku'1u1ba42"ka4chi2 ra1,"Ku'1u1ba42ña1a4ko14ko(3) a2ña1a4",ka4chi2 ra1.
"Ndi4ji14ni2ku4u4mi3i(4) un4ndi4ka'4an2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4a3sa(3) on4 a2ba'1a3nda3ta3ba(4) on4i3kin4na4nda3nde3e(3) a2ku'1un(1) a1i3nga2xi4ña4a1chi1ndi4ya1ko3ko3ba42",ka4chi2 ra1,"Ya1ko3ko3ba42ka1a3".
Ta1,ta1sa1bi4ndi4ba14ja4ndi'4i13i3ni2ta1kan4ku4u4i3kin4ku4u4ndi3chi2ku4u4ni3i4ku4u4ndi4ba143ndi'4i13i3ni2 ra1ndi4,"Na4ko3nde3e3mi3i4 a2ku'14un1ñu'3u2ndi4ya1kan4ku'1u1ba42ña1a4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Nda3ta3ba(4) on4 a2",ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4,chi13ka2ni3tu3ku3 ra2si1si'4i2 ra1si1si'4i2ta1sa1bi4kan4kwa'1an(1) en4ka'4an2 en4ji'4in4yu3ba(4) en4ndi4,"Kwa'4an2 on4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4yu3ba(4) on4na4nda3ta3ba4 ra2i3kin4na4nda3ta3ba4 ra2ndi3chi2,
ya1,nda3ta3ba4ndi'3i3 ra(2) e2kan4kwa'1an1i3nga2xi4ña4ko3nde3e(3) a2a1chi1ndi4ya1ko3ko3ba42",ka4chi2 ra1.
Ba143xi4ni3so'1o3ta1sa1bi4ndi4,"Na4ko3ko3mi3i4 a2ko3ko3ba(3) e2nda4a(2) e2ba42ku'1un1ñu'3u2tu3ka'3a4ku'1u1tu3ku'14un(1) a1kan4".
"Ba'1a3ba3na4tu2sa3kan4ndi4ka'3mi3ba3yu'1u1",ka4chi2 ra1,chi13ndu'4u4ba3 ra2ñu'3u2.
Ja143ni1ja'1an1 ra1ndi'1i1,ndi'1i1ja'1an1 ra1chi13ndu'4u4 ra2ñu'3u2tan3ja143ni1ki'3in3ñu'3u2ndi4yo'4o4ndo3o3i3tun4ka4a4nda1xa'1a4 run4nda1nu14u3 run4ndi4kun2ñu'3u2ndi4xi4xi1 lu3 run4i1nda43,pa'3a3tan3pa'3a3ku4u4kwa'1an1 run4ñu'3u4.
Xi1xi1ndi'3i3tun4kan4ni1ya'1a3ba(3) e2mi4i4ba42nde4e4ni3i4chi2,xi1xi1ni3i4xi1xi1i3kin4xi1xi1ndi3chi2xi1xi1.
Nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4ni1xi1xi1ba(3) e2kan4chi2,ni1xi1xi(1) a1ndi4ni1xi1xi1ndi'3i3,ya1kan3,i3kin4xi1xi1ndi3chi2xi1xi1.
ni3i4xi1xi1,ni1ya'1a3ba3ñu'3u2kwa'1an(1) e1,xa'13mi3 lu3 ra2ya1ma4.

ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4si'4i2 ra1ndi4kwa'4an2 on4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4yu3ba(4) on4na4a3sa3 ra(2) e2ba'1a3ta3xi3 ra2,ya1kan3,nu1ni4chi'3i(3) o4ta3xi3 ra2ti1kin4i3kin4,
ta3xi3 ra2ndu3chi4nda'3a(4) e4chi'3i(3) o4a1chi1ndi4ya1ku4ma1ni4 a2ba42ji'4in(4) o4chi'3i(3) o4",ka4chi2 ra1,ko14o(3) a2ji'4in4ta1,ta1xi1i4chi2.
I3kan4ja'1an1 ra1ti'13bi4 ra2ña4si'4i2 ra1ja'1an(1) en4nu14u3ta1sa1bi4ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4,xa'1an(1) en4nu14u3yu3ba(4) en4,nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4
nda13ka3ya2ba3,"Kwa'4an2ki'1in(3) un4,ya1kan3,bolsandi4kun2ña1a4ta3xi(3) un4nda'3a4 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ña4si'4i2 ra1,ni1ke3e(3) an4ja'1an1ki'1in(3) an4bolsa.
I3tin4so'3o3bi4nu1ni4ti1sun1,ti1su'4un2kan4ta13xi(3) an4nda'3a4se'1e(3) an4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) an4,"Ya1ña1a4ta3xi(3) un4nda'3a4se'1e(3) o4na4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) an4",ja143ta13xi3 na2bolsanu1ni4ti1sun1.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Nda4a(2) e2ba42ku4ni2ka(1) e1","Ti1kin4i3kin4ku4ni(2) a2","Kwa'4an2ki'1in(3) un4,ya1kan3,bolsandi4kun2ña1a4".
Mbo3la3so'3o3ti1kin4chi4nga14ba2,ya1kan4ta13xi(3) an4nda'3a4se'1e(3) an4,"Ya1yo'4o4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4chi'3i3 ra3".
"Ya1kan3,ndu3chi4tu3ku3ku4ni2 ra1chi'3i3 ra2",chi1ka4chi2 an4.Ni1ke3e(3) an4ja'1an1ki'1in(3) an4i3in3mbo3la3so'3o3ndu3chi4,ndu3chi4che3nge3.I3kan4i3tin4 a2kan4ta13xi(3) an4nda'3a(4) en4.
"Ya1yo'4o4ko3ndo(3) a2ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4,ya1ña1a4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4na4chi'3i3 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1kan4ku4ni2 ra1ndi4xa'13mi3 ra2,ya1kan3,ni3i4",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
Na1i4xa3chi1tun3ku4u4ba3 na2ran4,xa'13mi3 ra2ni3i4kan4.
Ni1xi1xi1ni3i4kan4tin3tan3xa'1a4 e2kan4ba42ku4chi4i3ni2 na1ndi4nda143ya1ba'14a4ta13xi3 na2nda'3a4se'1e3 na3.
I3kan4ta13xi(3) an4,ya1kan3,ndu3chi4kan4tin3nu1ni4tin3
ti1kin4tin3ni3na(3) e2ba'14a4ba3ndi4ko14o(3) a2ba'1a3bi4ndi4,ya1kan3,ti1kin4chi4nga14ba2ba3ya1kan4ta13xi(3) an4nda'3a4 na3.
I3kan4ndi13ki'3in(3) an4kwa'1an1ba(3) en4ndi13kwi3so(3) an4 e2kan4tan3kwa'1an1ba(3) en4a1chi1ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1kwa1nu'1u4ji'4in(4) an4ba42,nda13xa2a2 en4,"Ya1yo'4o4ba42ta13xi3yu3ba4 2nda'3a(4) on4chi'3i(3) un4chi2".
"Ba'1a3ba3",ka4chi2 ra1,ko14o(3) a2nde3e4nu14u3bi4ta1ña1a4ya1ba'1a3ku4u4ndi'3i3ba(3) e3,ndi13kwi3so3 ra(2) e2kan4i3kan4ni1ke3e3 ra2ja'1an1chi'1i3 ra(3) e3.
Chi'13i3ba3 ra2,ya1kan3,nu1ni4,ya1kan3,nu1ni4ti1su'4un2,chi'13i3ndi'3i3 ra(2) e2kan4,i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4:
"chi'3i3tu(3) 2ti1kin4i3kin4ka1a3ba3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,ti1kin4chi4nga14ba2ba42kan4ya1kan4ni1chi'3i3 ra(2) e2,chi'13i3 ra2ti1kin4chi4nga14ba2kan4chi'13i3 ra3.
Ndi13kwi3so3tu3 ra2ndu3chi4kan4chi'13i3tu3 ra(2) e2kan4ba3,chi'13i3 ra(2) e2kan4tan3ja1i4yo2ba'1a3chi'13i3ndi'3i3 ra2tan3yu3ba(4) en4ndi4
xa1ka4a4 ni42ba3i3tu2ta1kan4ndi4ja1so'3o3i4in4i3tu2pa4li4,pa4li4i4in4i3tu2ka4a4,tan3ni1chi'3i3 ra3,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4
nda13ka3ya2 ra1ti4,ti4i3i2chi1,ti1ma'4a2chi1,tan42i4yo2ti4,ti4yu3ku4nda13ka3ya2 ra1tan3
kwa'1an1 ri4,"Kwa'4an2 ndo4tan3ndi3kwi3so3 ndo4 a2ya1ni1chi'3i3yu3ba4 2tan3sa3kan4ndi4nda3ta3an4 ndo4 a2nu14u3ña'1a3yu'1u1tan3ya1ni1chi'3i3yu'1u1ya1kan4nda3ta3an4 ndo4nu14u3ña'1a3 ra3".
Ya1kan4ndi13kwi3so3ba3,ni1ja'1an1ba3ti4kan4nda13ta3ba4ndi'3i3 ri4nda1i3tu2pa4li4ja143i1xa14a3ka4ni'1i3 a2ndi4ja143i1xa14a3ba1xi3ndu4ta(1) e1ka4ni'1i3 a2ndi4ja1ba'1a3sa3kan4i4in(4) a2nda13ta3an4 ri4 a2,ya1kan3,mi4i4chi'13i3 ra3.
Tan3ya1ni1chi'3i3 ra2kan4ndi13kwi3so3ndi'3i3 ri4kwa'1an1,ya1kan3,nu14u3ña'1a3ta1si1so3 ra2chi1.
Nda13chi'3i3ndi'3i3 ri4 a2ji'4in4ta1si1so3 ra2ndi4ni3na(3) e2ba'14a4ta13xi3 na2ya1kan4ba3nda13ya'1a3kwa'1an1ji'4in4mi3i4 na2chi1.
O4ra2ja143ni1ndu1ta(1) e1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4ku13un3sa1bi4tan3ni1ndu1ta(1) e1ndi4la3tun4kwa'1an1i3tu2ndi4la3tun4 lu3ndu1ta1i3tu2chi1,ya1ku4u(4) a2nda1xin1ndi4la3tun4sa4ka2i3tu2.
Ndu1ta1i3tu2ndi4la3tun4 lu(3) a2tan3ta1sa1bi4ndi4ki1bi4ni1ke3e3 ra2ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1nu14u3i3tu2 ra1ndi4ni3na3i3tu2ti1su'4un2ba3.
Ti1kin4chi4nga14ba2ba3,ya1kan3,ndu3chi4che3nge3ba3ya1kan4ya1ba'14a4kan4ku4u4ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ndu1ta1ji'4in4 ra3.
ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Ko14o(3) a2ba'1a3ni4i3xa3se'1e(3) o4ndi4ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4ki3ti4yu3ku4tan3ja'1an1nda3ta3ba4ndi'3i3 ri4 a2kwe4nda2 ra1tan3nda13ta3an4 ri4 a2ji'4in4yo4o4ya1kan4ndi4ya1ba'14a4ku4u4ndi'3i(3) a2ni1ndu1ta1ji'4in4yo4o4".
"Tan3bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,ndu3kwi3so(3) e4 e2tan3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
tu'3un3ndi'3i(3) a2ya1tu'3un(3) 2ko3ndo(3) a2sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,sa3kan4cha'3bi(3) 2na1ta4tu2chi'3i3xa14a3 na(2) e2a1chi1ndi4ba14ja4tu4ni1ka4a4ji'4in(4) o4",ka4chi2 ra1.
Ja143ni1cha'3bi3 ra2na1ta4tu2tu'13un3ndi'3i3 na(2) e2kan4xa13ta2 na(1) e1.
I3kan4ja143cha'13bi3 ra2na1ta4tu2ni1chi'3i3xa14a3tu3ku3 na(3) e3,nda13chi'3i3i1xa14a3 na2i3kan4ndi4
chi'13i3ndi'3i3 na2ba'1a3 lu3ka4a4nda13chi'3i3 na2,chi'13i3ndi'3i3 na(2) e2kan4tin3
o4ra2ja143ni1ki3xa3a4sa1bi4ku4un4ni3tu3ku3 ra4ndi4ndu1ta(1) e1ndi4tan42ka4a4ka4a4tu3ku3ba3ji'4in4 ra2ndi4ni3na(3) e2ba'1a3ndu1ta1chi1.
Ti1kin4i3kin4ni1chi'3i3 ra2ti1kin4,ya1kan3,ndu3chi4ba'1a3ni1chi'3i3 ra2,tan42i4yo(2) a2ya1chi'13i3 ra2ndi4ya1ba'1a3ku4u4ndi'3i(3) a2ndu1ta1ndi'3i(3) a2kan4.
Tan42i4yo(2) a2kan4ndu1ta1tin3tan3,ndi4mi3i4 ra2ko4so(1) a1,ta1sa1bi4kan4ku4u4ta1ko4so1tan3
mi3i4ta1kan4ko4so(1) a1tin3tan3ya1ba'1a3ku4u4ndi'3i(3) a2ni1chi'3i3 ra2tan3ko4so1 ra(1) e1.
Ja1la3tun4 lu3kwa'1an1i3tu2 ra1tan3yo'4o4ti4nde4ta3i3tu2ta1,ta1ya1kan3,ta1sa1bi4tan3
ta'4bi4ka1a3ndi4ba'1a3sa4ka2i3tu2ta'4bi4yo'4o4ndi4xi4i2 lu3i3tu2ta1xi1i4,i4xa3 ra(2) e2chi1tun3ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4ndi13kwi3so3ta1kan4ña'1a3 ra3.
Xi4i2 lu3i3tu2ta1xi1i4ndi4nda143ke13e3ta1xi1i4ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1ndi4ja143so'3o3so'3o3i4in4i3tu2 ra1ndi4xi4i2pe'1la1i4chi(3) a2ba143i4in4tu4ni(1) a1.
Xi4i2sa4ka(2) e2,ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4se'1e3 ra2ndi4
ko14o(3) a2ba'1a3i4yo2ndi4,ka4chi2,ni1ja'1an1ta1kan4ta1xi1i4ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1i3tu2tan3ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ña4si'4i2 ra1ndi4,"Ko14o(3) a2ba'1a3i4yo2ndi4xi4i2 ni42i3tu2 e4".
"Bi3tin3ndi4ndo1o(3) on4ndi4ta1ku'1un1ba3ku4u4yu'1u1ndi4ko14o(3) a2ba'1a3i4yo2ndi4,ya1kan3,ba14ja4xi4in4yu3ba(4) e4ko1so1 ra2i3tu2 e4ndi4xi4i2 ni4(2) a2".
"I3tu2mi3i4 ra2ndi4la3tun4 ni4(2) a2kan4tan3i3tu2yo4o4ndi4xi4i2le'3mba4 ni4(2) a2,ndo1o3 a2tan3ku'1un1ba3yu'1u1a1chi1ndi4sa3kan4ku4u4i1chi(1) a1tan3yu'1u1ndi4ya1ko4nde3e4i3ni2 yu1ba42tan3
tan3ku4ni2i1chi(1) a1ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ña4si'4i2 ra1,bi3tin3ndi4ndo3ko3o4ba3yu'1u(1) a1tan3ku'1un1ba3yu'1u1ndi4
na4ko3to3mi3i4yu3ba(4) e4sa1a3a3sa3 ra2tan3ku3ta3ku2 ra1ndi4ta1ku'1un1tu3ku4u4yu'1u1ba3tan42ta1kan4ndi4ta4yu4ta1kan4a1chi1ndi4kwi4i4,ya1kan3,ko4so1 ra(1) e1tan3sa3kan4tu3yu'1u1ba3ndi4ta1ta4yu4tu3ku4u4yu'1u1ba3",ka4chi2 ra1.
I3kan4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"I3nda14ndi1xan4 2yo'4o4ndo3ko3o4 2ji'4in(4) un4,ndi1xan4ka1a3ndo1o3ji'4in(4) un4o4ra2ku4ma1ni4 a2,ya1kan3,
ya3tan3is1ta4ku3xi(3) un4tan3i3nda14ndi1xan4yu'1u1ka1a3ki'3in(3) un4chi3ka2 on4nu'3u2tan3ndo3ko3ko3ñu'3u2,ya1kan3,chi3ndu'4u(4) un4is1ta4ku3xi(3) un4".
Tan3ku3ta3ku2ba3yo'4o1ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4,ndi4ko1to1ta14xi(3) un4 a2ku3xi3yu3ba4yo4o4a1chi1ndi4ta1ta4yu4ku4u4ta1kan4",ka4chi2 ra1.
Ni3si'3i(4) o4ta14xi(3) un4 a2ku3xi3 na2na4ko3o3mi3i4 na2sa3kan4na1ta4yu4 ni42ku4u4 na2,ya1kan3,sa1a3mi3i4ti(4) un4ku3xi3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4chi2.
"Ndi1xan4yu'1u1ka1a3chi3ka2 on4nu'3u2tan3ya3tan3is1ta4ku3xi(3) un4na4ku'1un1 yu1ndi4ta1kwa'1an1ku4u(4) 2",ndo13ko3o4 ra2ndi1xan4ya3ta4ka'3a4is1to3 ra2sa3kan4tan3
tan3ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1ba3 ra2,kwa'1an1ba3ta1,ta1xi1i4ndi4nda'1ba1ñu'3u2ñu3u2ndi4ko14o3ñu'3u2.
Ko14o3mi3i4bi4ñu'3u2ñu3u2ndi4ni1nda'1ba(1) e1,kwa'1an1ba3ta1ña1a4ni1ku3na'3a4kwa'1an1 ra1tan3ja143ndi'4i13i3ni2ta1,ta1sa1bi4ndi4
ti'13bi4 ra2ña4si'4i2 ra1ja'1an1ko1to(1) an4,"Kwa'4an2ko1to(1) on4sa1a3i4xa3se'1e(3) o4ta4ku1 an4ndi4ko14o3ñu'3u2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ke13e3ña4si'4i2 ra1ja'1an1ko1to(1) an4,ña4si'4i2ta1sa1bi4ja'1an1ko1to(1) an4nu14u3se'1e(3) an4.
"Si'3i4 2sa1a3i4xa3yo'4o1ta4ku1 un4ndi4ko14o3ñu'3u2tan3ndu'1u1ndi4i4so3ko2sa4ka2 ndu1",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
"Is1ta4ya13tan3ki1bi4kwa'1an1bi4 ra2ba42yo'4o4tan3ya1yo'4o4xi4xi3ba3yu'1u1",ka4chi2 an4kan4so'3o3,lu3chi'4i2ti4is1ta4ni1ki'3in(3) an4ta13xi(3) an4nda'3a4si'3i(4) an4,"Ya1yo'4o4ku3xi(3) un4".
Ni14xi3xi3si'3i(4) an4 e2ndi4ndi13ki'3in(3) an4 e2tan3ni1chi3ka2 en4nu14u3xi1kun(1) an4kwa'1an1ba(3) e2ku3xi3ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ba143ku4nde3e4i3ni2 ra1i4so3ko2sa4ka2 ra1.
Ko14o3ñu'3u2ya3tan3ña'1a3ka3xi4 na2i1nda43,i4yo2ba(3) e2su14u3ko14o(3) a2ndi4ta1sa1bi4ku4u4 ra2lu14u3nu1ni4lu14u3,
i3kin4lu14u3nde4e4ndi4ya1chi'1yo4 a2tan3ya1ya3tan(3) e2ba143kwi4i4,ko14o3ñu'3u2.
Ba14ja4kwi4i4ya3tan(3) e2ndi4nde4e4mi3i4 a2kan4ba3ni3 a2chi'1yo4 a2ba14ja4kwi4i4.
Nde4e4ndi'3i(3) a2i3kan4ba3ni3ni3 a2ba14ja4kwi4i4chi'1yo4,ni3 a2ya3tan(3) e2ba14ja4kwi4i4ndi4ko14o3ñu'3u2,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2,ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4,ya1kan3,si'3i(4) an4ndi4:
"ji14ni2 o4na4ki3xa2a2bi4 ra2ndi4ta1ni1ku3chi4i3ni2ku4u4ta1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1ndi4i13xa3yu3ba4 2ya1chi1tun3ji'4in4 ra2ndi4ba143ko4so1ta1kan4i3tu2 ra1".
"Ya1xi4i2ku4u4i3tu2 ra1ndi4ni1ku3chi4i3ni2 ra1kwa'1an1ba3ta1kan4ji14ni2 o4na4ki3xa2a2a1chi1bi4 ra2ka4chi2 an4,ta1kwa'1an1ku4u4ta1kan4".
Ta1xi1i4kwa'1an1 ra1tan3nda1ñu'3u2ni1nda'1ba1ndi'3i3,nda'1ba1ndi'3i3ñu'3u2ko14o3ñu'3u2.
Ta4xin24ka4a4i4chi3nde4e4 na2ndi4ko14o3ñu'3u2,i4yo2ba(3) e2ku3xi3 na2i4yo2ba(3) e2ka3xi4ba3 na2tan3ndi4ya1chi'1yo4 a2tan3ya1ya3tan(3) e2ba14ja4kwi4i4,nde4e4ba3 na2ta4xin24nde4e4 na3,i3kan4ja143
ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4si'3i(4) an4ndi4,"Na4ba'1a3bi4na4ki3xa2a2a1chi1 ra1na4tu2ni14ki3xa2a2a1chi1 ra1ndi4ya1kan4ba42ndi4,ta1kwa'1an1ku4u4 ra3".
"Ba'1a3ba3",ka4chi2si'3i(4) an4,i3kan4ndi13ki'3in(3) an4kwa'1an(1) en4,su3ku4nu3is1ta4ni1ta3xi3se'1e(3) an4nda'3a(4) en4ya1kan4ni'4i(4) an4ni1chi3ka2 en4nu14u3xi1kun1kwa'1an1ku3xi3ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4,ta1sa1bi4.
Xa1a(1) en4tan3ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"¿Nda4a(2) e2ka4a4ja'1an(1) on4nu14u3se'1e(3) o4?".
"Se'1e(3) o4ndi4ña4xi4xi3ku4u4ba(3) en4kan4tan3yo4o4ndi4i4so3ko2 ni42 o4,su3ku4nu3ti4 a2ta13xi(3) an4nda'3a4 2ku3xi(3) un4".
A3ma3ndi4su14u(3) a2ni4ta3xi(3) an4kan4ku3xi3yu3ba(4) en4ba42ndi4ya1ta13xi(3) an4ku3xi3si'3i(4) an4ba42a1chi1ndi4ku4nda'3bi2i3ni2 an4ji4ni2 an4si'3i(4) an4,ya1kan4ta13xi(3) an4 e2nda'3a4si'3i(4) an4.
Ndi13ki'3in(3) an4i3in3ku4nu(3) a2kwa'1an1ji'4in(4) an4ku3xi3ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4.
Tan3ta1,tan3ña4kan4ta13xi(3) an4 e2nda'3a4 ra2tin3i3kan4xi13xi3 ra2lu3lu(3) a2kan4tan3,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"¿Tan3sa1a3ko3o3tan3sa3kan4nda3ndi3ko4se'1e(3) o4nda3xa2a2 ra1?".
"Yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ni1ku3ma1ni4chi3ñu3ni1i3xa(3) on4a1chi1ndi4ba143ko4so1 on4i3tu2se'1e(3) o4ya1kan4ndi4xi13nu3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1ta1ni1ku3chi4i3ni2ku4u4ta1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1,ndi4xi4i2 ni42i3tu2 ra1ya1kan4ndi4kwa'1an1 ra1".
"Xi13nu3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1ndi4i3tu2ba42ya1ba143ko4nde3e4i3ni2 ra1xa'1a4xi4i2 ni4(2) a2,ya1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1".
"Na4tu2sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ko1so1 yu(1) a1,ko1so1 yu(1) a1sa3kan4ndi4nda3ndu3ku(4) e4sa1a3ko3o3sa3kan4nda3xa2a2 ra1a1chi1ndi4
na4sa3kan4ko3o3ndi4ki14xa2a2 ra1tan3yu'1u1ndi4ta1i4so3ko2 ni42ba3ku4u4yu'1u1ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4,i3kan4tan3
ni1ki3xa3a4ba3 ra2ko4so1 ra1i3tu2chi1,ko4so1 ra1i3tu2ko4so1 ra1i3tu2,la3tun4kwa1nda3a3i3tu2ndi4la3tun4 lu3i3tu2.
Ya1xi4i2 ni42kan4ndi4nda13ndo3o3i3in3ba(3) e2ji'4in4i3tu2 ra1ndi4i3in3kwi4i24,kwi4i24ndi4ka2i3tu2,la3tun4ndi4ka2i3tu2ndia42ko4chun3,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ndi4:
"bi3tin3ndi4ku'1un(1) o4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4se'1e(3) o4tan3ji4ni2ba(3) en4kan4mi4i4kwa'1an1 ra1,kwa'4an2 on4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4se'1e(3) o4".
"na4a3sa(3) en4 e2ba'1a3nda3ndu3ku(4) an4ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4tan3na4nda3xa2a2 ra1a1chi1ndi4ja1i3tu2 ra1ndi4ja1nda13ta3ku2ndi'3i(3) a2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"kwi4i24 ni4(2) a2ja1ndu13ka4chi1ba(3) e2ji'4in4i3tu2 e4ndi4la3tun4 ni4(2) a2","Na4tu2na4sa3kan4tan3ku'1un1 yu1sa3kan4ndi4ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in4se'1e(3) o4".
Ja143ni1ke3e(3) an4ña4si'4i2ta1sa1bi4kan4tan3ja'1an1ka'1an(1) en4ji'4in4se'1e(3) an4
"ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4se'1e3 ndu2na4nda3xa2a2 ra1ndi4xa1ko4so1ba3yu3ba(4) on4i3tu2 ra1chi1,ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) a2ndi4ja1ndu13kwi4i24ndi'3i(3) a2,ko4so1 ni42 ra(1) e1",ka4chi2 an4ji'4in(4) an4kan4,ji'4in4si1si'4i2 an4.
Nda4a(2) e2ba42ni4ni2tu(3) an4kan4ka'1an(1) en4ji'4in4ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4ndi4sa3kan4ka4a4ba3.
I3kan4,"Ka'1an1ba(3) 2ji'4in4 ra3,ña4ka'1an1ku4u4ba(3) 2ji'4in4 ra2ku3ni2 o4na4nda3ndi3ko4bi4 ra2ndi4ji14ni2 o4nda3a2ba42kwa'1an1 ra1ndi4ni3yu'1u1ni3ba143ni4ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) 2mi4i4kwa'1an1 ra1",ka4chi2 an4.
Ndi13ki'3in3si'3i(4) an4kwa1nu'1u(4) an4tan3nda13xa2a2 en4nda13tu'4un(4) an4ji'4in4ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4,"Ji14ni2 an4mi4i4kwa'1an1 ra1","Ndi4bi3tin3sa3kan4ku3ni2 o4".
"Ndi4xa1i4yo2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) a2ya1ku4u4i3tu2 ra1ndi4ba14ja4xi4i2ka(1) e1ndi4ja1la3tun4sa4ka(2) e2,bi3tin3ndi4
ku'1un1ti4,ya1kan3,ti4pa3che4ku2nda3ndu3ku4ña'3a4 ri4,pa3che4ku2tan3ku'1un1ti4sa3a2ba1xi3ku14chu2tin3,
ku'1un1,ya1kan3,sa3a2tu1ni4i2,ku3ni2 o4nda4a2ti4ku4u4ti4nda3ku3ni2ña'3a4",ka4chi2 ra1,ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4so'3o3.
"Ndi4na1ba4li4ti'3bi4 2ku'1un1na1kan4ku4u4na1ku'1un1sa3kan4ndi4nda3ndu3ku4 na2 ra1".
Ni1ki3xa3a4ba3pa3che4ku2ndi4ja143ni1ki'1bi3ba3pa3che4ku2tan3yo'4o4tan3kan4mi4i4nde4e4mi'14i4tan3yo'4o4tan3kan4nda4ñu3u(3) a2xi4ka(3) e2nda4a2ni3ka4na3yu'1ma1,ko14o3yu'1ma1.
Ke13ta3ti4sa3a2ba1xi3ku14chu2ni1ki'1bi3 ri4tan3yo'4o4tan3kan4xi4ka3 ri4,chi4tu2tin3.
Nda13ka'1ni3ba3ti4sa3a2kan4xi4ka3 ri4nda4ndu3ku4 ri4ta1xi1i4xa14ku'1u1,xu13xa3 lu3ku'1u1ndi4i3kan4ni1ki'1bi3 ri4xi4ka3 ri4.
Ni1nda3a3ba3chi4tu2ni1ja'1an1 ri4ndi4chi2i3in3i3tun4ka'4nu3ba'1a3,lu3chi'4i2ni1i1xa3 na2na3ma4 run4.
Nda1ni1nu3kan4ni1nda3a3chi4tu2xi4ka3 ri4nda4ndu3ku4 ri4 ra2ka13ni3ba3 ri4te'1e4yu'3u4 ri4,i3xi4,i3xi4yu'1ma1ni1ka3na3nu14u3tun4kan4.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3 ri4xa1a1 ri4ka'4an2 ri4ji'4in4 ra2,"An4yo'4o4ba3ndi4ka2yo'4o1ya3ni2".
"Yu3ba4yo4o4ndi4i4so3ko2 ni42 ra1,ka'4an2 ni42 ra1xa'1a(4) on4ndi4ku1nu'1u(4) un4sa3kan4ndi4nda3ko1o3ñu'3u2tan3chi'1yo4ña'1a3ka3xi4 ra2ndi4
ya1ku3xi3 ra2tan3ya1ka3xi4 ra2ba14ja4kwi4i4ndi4ndo'4o4 ni42 ra1ya1sa3kan4ko14o3yo'4o1i4yo2ñu3u2,
nda'1ba1ndi'3i3ya1ko4ndo3ñu3u2,ñu'3u2ñu3u2ya1kan4ndi4nda4ndu3ku4 ni42 na1yo'4o1".
"Ku'1un(1) un4tan3sa3kan4ndi4nda3ko1o3ñu'3u2ñu3u2a1chi1ndi4ndi14i2 ni42ka4a4ko14o(3) on4i4yo2",ka4chi2 na1,ka4chi2ta1chi4tu2kan4ji'4in(4) a2xi1i4.
"Na4ko3o3mi3i4 na2sa3kan4na1kan4ndi4na1ta4yu4 ni42ku4u4na1kan4ndi4ya1ni1i1chi1i3tu2ya1kan4ndi4xa'1a4i3tu2 yu1ba42ni1ku3chi4i3ni2 yu1ba1xi3 2",ka4chi2 ra1.
"Kwa'4an2 on4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4 na2ndi4na4ko3o3 na2sa3kan4na1ta4yu4ku4u4na1kan4".
ka14na3chi3ñu3ko3o(3) a2sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un(1) un4ya3ni2ku'1un(1) un4sa3kan4nda3ta3ku2ñu3u2a1chi1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ndi14i2 ni42ka4a4ba14ja4kwi4i4nda3ta3ku2ñu3u2ya1sa3kan4ko14o3yo'4o1i4yo2ndi4nda'1ba1ñu'3u2tan3ba143kwi4i4ya3tan3ña'1a3ka3xi4 na2ba143kwi4i4ku3xi3 na2ba143kwi4i4".
"Ya1kan4yo'4o1ku4u4ta1nda4ndu3ku4 na3,nda4ndu3ku4,ya1kan3,yu3ba4yo4o4",ka4chi2ya1sa3a2kan4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2,ji'4in4ta1xi1i4.
"Ndi4,na4tu2na4ku'1un1 yu1ndi4na4ki3xi3mi3i4 ra2ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) 2sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1 yu1",ka4chi2ta1,ta1ya1kan3,ta1xi1i4so'3o3,"Na4ki3xi3 ra2ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) 2sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1 yu1".
"Tan3sa1a3a3sa3 ra2ki3xi3 ra2ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) un4tan3xa14ku'1u1ba42ka1a3,nu14u3i3tun4ka1a3ya14tin3su4kun1ba42ndi4ka2 on4tan3ba'1a3yu'1u1ndi4i4yo2ndi1xin4 2ya1kan4ndi4ni1ki3xa2a2 yu1mi4i4ndi4ka2 on4".
"Kwa'4an2 on4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4 ra2ba'1a3kwa'4an2 on4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4 ra2na4,na4ya1kan3,ta3xi3na3ni2 ra1".
"Ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4na1chi4ñu3ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4na1músicana4sa4ku3ni3 ra2na1kan4ki3xi3 na2sa3kan4ndi4ki3xi3na1chi4ñu3ki3xi3na1músicaki3xi3na1ta4u3ni2".
"Tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku1nu'1u4yu'1u1na4ta1ku1nu'1u4ku4u(4) 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Ndi4yo'4o4i4ndu'3u(4) un4sa3kan4ndi4ki3xa2a2 yu1ji'4in4yu3ba4yo4o4ndi4ta1ndi'4i13ba'1a3i3ni2ku4u4 ra2",ka4chi2sa3a2kan4so'3o3,yu3ba4ti4chi4tu2kan4ku4u4ta1sa1bi4.
"Ba'1a3na4tu2sa3kan4,yo'4o4ndi4ka2ba(3) 2kwa'4an2 on4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ki3xi(3) un4ndi4,ki3xi3,na4ki3xi3 na2sa3kan4ndi4ku1nu'1u4 2ndi4ta1ku1nu'1u4ku4u4ba(3) 2",ka4chi2 ra1.
I3kan4ndi13ki'3in(3) a2sa3a2kan4kwa'1an(1) e1ni1xa1a(1) e1ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4ta1sa1bi4,ka4chi(2) a2ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3:
"ku'1un(1) un4be'3e3chi4ñu3su4ku3ni(3) un4ta1chi4ñu3tan3sa3kan4ndi4na4nda3ka3ya2 ra1na1ta4u3ni2na1nda3ka3ya2 ra1na1músicasa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1 na1sa3kan4ndi3xi3ta1xi1i4a1chi1ndi4
ndi14xi3mi3i4ta1kan4sa3kan4ti4ndi4na1músicana1,na1ta4u3ni2tan3na1chi4ñu3ku'1un1sa3kan4ndi3xi3 ra3".
"Ta1ndi3xi3ku4u4ba3 ra2ndi4sa3kan4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1,ka4chi2chi4tu2kan4ji'4in4ta1sa1bi4.
I3kan4ni1ndi3ki'3in3ba3,ya1kan3,ta1,ta1ya1kan3,ta1,ta1sa1bi4kwa'1an1 ra1be'3e3chi4ñu3,su14ku3ni3 ra2na1kan4.
"Bi3tin3ndi4ku4ni2 yu1ndi4a3sa3 ndo4 a2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2ndi4i4yo2 ndo4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un(1) o4ndi3ki'3in(3) o4ta1xi1i4ndi4i3kan4ja'1an1ju13ta'3an2 na1 ra1ndi4ka2 ra1".
"Ni1ndu3ta'3an2ta1,chi4tu2 ra1ndi4ka2 ra1ya1kan4ndi4bi3tin3ndi4ku'1un(1) o4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ndi3xi3 ra2ku4ni2 yu1",ka4chi2 ra1.
"Nda'4bi2 ni42ka4a4ñu3u2ndi4ndi14i2 ni42ka4a4ke13ta3i'3nu3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1tan3ba'1a3ka1na4ku'1un(1) o4sa3kan4ndi3xi3 ra2"."Na4tu2sa3kan4tan3ku'1un1ba3yo4o4",ka4chi2 na1.
I3kan4sa14ku3ni3ta1chi4ñu3na1ta4u3ni2tin3na1músicatin3kwa'1an1ba3 na2ja1ta4ta1xi1i4ndi4ka2 ra1xa14ku'1u1.
Ni1xa1a1 na1i3kan4,nda4a2ki3xi3ta1xi1i4ndi4ko14o3ka1 ra1i4yo2nu14u3i3tun4kan4ndi4
ni1xa1a1ba3ta1,xa1a1chi4tu2xa1ñu1 ri4ndi4ba14sa3ka1,tu4te'4e4 ri4ndi1ka3i3tun4ni3ko14o3yu'1ma1ka4na3ka1ni3ko14o3,nda'1ba1ñu'3u2.
Nda'1ba1ñu'3u2nu14u3i3tun4kan4ndi4ko14o3,ko14o3ta1xi1i4i4yo2chi1.
Tan3ni1ki3xa3a4 ri4ndi13kwi1ta1i'3nu3ni3tu3ku3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4tan3yo'4o4tan3kan4xi4ka3 ri4ti4pa3che4ku2tin3ti4,
sa3a2tu1ni4i2tin3,tan3yo'4o4tan3kan4nda13ka'1ni3 ri4xi4ka3 ri4nda4ndu3ku4 ri4ta1xi1i4ndi4ko14o3 ra2i4yo2,ke13ta3i'3nu3ba3 ra2mi4i4ndi4ka2 ra1kan4ndi4kwa'1an1ba3 ra3,tu3ku3xi4ña4kwa'1an1 ra1.
Nda4a(2) e2ka'4an4bi4 a2pa3che4ku2ni1ja'1an1ko1to(1) a1i3in3mbo3la3so'3o3ta3ka2ndi4ka2ta3ñu3i3ñu4ka3ra3ba4tu2,
ma'14ñu3i3ñu4kan4i3kan4ndi4ka2lu3chi'4i2so'3o3i3ta2ka1tin32,i3kan4ba3ndi4ka2ta1xi1i4,i3xi4,i3xi4yu'1ma1ka4na3.
I3kan4ka4chi2,ni1ke3e3 ri4tan3ja'1an1ka'1an1 ri4ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"Yo'4o4ba3ndi4ka2 ra1","An4ba'1a3na4tu2sa3kan4".
"Kwa'4an2 ndo4sa3kan4ndi4na4ki3xi3 ra2yo'4o4ndi4yo'4o4ki3xi3 ra2ku4ni2 ndu1".I3kan4ni1ke3e3ti4pa3che4ku2kan4ja'1an1ndi1ki'1in3 ri4ta1xi1i4.
Ti4kan4nda13ku3ni2ña'3a4,pa3che4ku2ku4u4ti4nda13ku3ni2ña'3a4ni1xa1a1 ri4tan3ndi13ki'3in3 ri4ta1xi1i4tan3kwa'1an1 ri4xa1a1 ri4kan4:
"¿nda4a(2) e2ku4ni2 ndo4ka4na3 ndo4yu'1u1?".
"Ko14o(3) a2ku4ni2bi4 ndu2ndi4,ya1kan3,yo4o4ku1nu'1u4ku4u(4) e4a1chi1ndi4ja1,
mi3i(4) un4ni1ka'1an1ndi4na4ndu3ku4 ndu2na1músicatan3na1ta4u3ni2na1chi4ñu3su4ku3ni3 ndu2tan3ki3xi3 ndu2sa3kan4ndi4ku1nu'1u(4) un4ka4chi2 un4so'3o3ya1kan4ndi4
ya1kan4ba1xi3 ndu2tan3ta1ku1nu'1u4ku4u(4) un4ji'4in4 ndu2ku4ni2 ndu1,ba14xi13 ndu2tan3ndo1o(3) on4ndi4ta1ku1nu'1u4ku4u(4) un4".
"Yo4o4ku1nu'1u4ku4u4ba3yo4o4,i3nda14 e2ndi4
yo'4o1ku4u4ta1mi3i4yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ki3xi(3) un4yo'4o4yu3ba4 2yo'4o4ki3xi(3) un4sa3kan4nda3tu'4un4na3ni2 o4sa1a3ko3o3tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku1nu'1u4 2ndi4ta1ku1nu'1u4ku4u4ba(3) 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"An4ba'1a3na4tu2sa3kan4",ja143ku13ya3tin3ta1sa1bi4.
"Ko14o(3) a2kwa'1a4ku4ni2 yu1ndi4,ya1ku4ni2 yu1bi3tin3ndi4
na4tu2ta1ku4ni2ku4u(4) un4ku1nu'1u4 2ndi4ku3nde3e4i3ni2 un4ndi4
ndi3xi4,ndi3xi4ya1ndo3o3,ndo3o3kan4ya1ndo3o3ya1nu14u3ni1xa3kwi3in3nda'3a4 run4ya1kan4ka3xi4yu'1u1".
"Ndi4yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ji'3na3ka3xi4 a2sa3kan4ndi4ku3ndi3kun2yo'4o1ka3xi(4) un4 a3".
"Sa4chi'1yo(4) on4ndi3xi4kan4tan3sa4chi'1yo(4) on4i3kin4sa4chi'1yo(4) on4ndi3chi2,sa4chi'1yo(4) on4arró,
ya1ja4chi'1yo4 ndo4ko3ndo(3) a2kan4tan3sa3kan4ndi4,tan3ku3nde3ta(3) e2ndi1ko(3) a3,na4ja1ndi4ko13 a2xa1a1 yu1sa3kan4ndi4ka3xi4 a2".
"Ta1ku1nu'1u4ku4u4ba(3) 2ndi4na4tu2ku3nde3e4i3ni2 un4ya1,ya1ka3xi4 a2kan4tan3,tan3ya1kan3,
ta'4bi4mi4i4ba1xi3ta1chi4,mi4i4ba1xi3ta1chi4so'3o3ku3ndu'4u4yu'1u1tan3mi4i4xi4nu3ta1chi4kan4ku3ndu'4u4yo'4o1ki'3in(3) un4xi3ko2xa'4an2bi1xi1ka'3a4 e3".
"Tan3ku3nde3e4i3ni2 un4ku1nu'1u4ba(3) 2ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2,"Ba'1a3ba3ku3nde3e4i3ni2ba3yu'1u1a1chi1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ta1ku4ni2ku4u(4) 2ndi4ku1nu'1u(4) un4ji'4in(4) 2",ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4so'3o3."Ba'1a3na4tu2sa3kan4".
"Ndi4sa3kan4ko3o3na4tu2sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1ba(3) e4na4tu2sa3kan4",ja143ni1ndi3ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1 na1,nda13xa2a2 ra1ñu3u2,
nda13ta3ku2ñu3u2ki1bi4nda13xa2a2ta1xi1i4ndi4nda13ko1o3ñu'3u2nda13ko1o3,la3tun4ka4a4nda13xa2a2 ra1,i4yo2ña'1a3ka3xi4 na2i4yo2ndi4
ya1nda13xa2a2ta1kan4ja143chi'4yo14ba3ña'1a3ndi4ja1i4yo2sa4ka2ba3ndi3xi4tan3ba143kwi4i4chi'1yo4 a2i4yo2i3kin4i4yo2ndi3chi2i4yo2ba143kwi4i4chi'1yo4 a2i1nda43,ki1bi4nda13xa2a2ta1kan4nda1ja1i4yo(2) a2kan4sa3kan4nda13xa2a2 ra1.
I3kan4ja143ja'1an1kwi1so3ba3ta1sa1bi4,ya1kan3,ndi3xi4,ya1ndo3o3ya1ndo3o3ka13ya2 ra1.
I3kin4ka'4nu3 lu3ya1nu14u3ju13ndu'4u4ya1kan4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1chi'1yo4ka3xi4ta1,ta1xi1i4.
Ja143nda13xa2a2 ra1ji'4in(4) a2kan4cha13chi(3) a2i13xa3ña4si'4i2 ra1,ni1ka3ya2 ra1,ya1kan3,ndi3chi2ni1ka3ya2 ra1.
I3kin4kan4tin3ndi3chi2tin3,ya1kan3,ndi3xi4tin3.
U1ni1nu14u(3) a2ka13ya2 ra1tan3kwa1nu'1u4 ra2ji'4in(4) a2nda13xa2a2 ra1ja'13nda2 ra1chi3ñu3nu14u3ña4si'4i2 ra1ña4sa1bi4sa14chi'1yo(4) an4 e3.
Ndi4ja143ki13xa3a4ti4ndi3xi4chi'4yo14 a2tan3i1xa14a3nda4ki'3in3 ra2xi3ko2xa'4an2bi1xi1ka'3a4 e2chi'4yo14 a2ndi4ku4ni2ka3xi4ndi1ku1nda42 ra1,ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ña4si'4i2 ra1ndi4:
"ta3kwa'4ni(3) un4lu3u3i3nda14 e2na4ka3xi4 2"."Ta4xin24ko3o3yu'3u(4) un4a1chi1ndi4
se'1e(3) o4ndi4ta1ji4ni3so'1o3ku4u4ta1ka1a3ndi4su14u3nda4a2bi4ndi4ka1a3ka4ndi3ka2 ra1",ka4chi2 an4.
"Ji4ni3so'1o3ku4u4ta1ka1a3ja4chi'1yo4 ra(2) e2tan3yo'4o1tu3ndi4ya1ku4ni2ka3xi4ndi1ku1nda42tu(3) un4ba43".
"Ku3nda3tu3na'3a2 on4ndi4na4chi'1yo4 a2tan3ka3xi4ta1ka1a3 e2,na3ni2ba3ka3xi4yo'4o1 ya1",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4ta1,ta1,ya1kan3,ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4ta1sa1bi4.
Ja143ni1ndi'3i3ni1chi'1yo4 a2tin3ta13ba(4) en4 e2tin3,ta13ba(4) en4,ya1kan3,ndi3xi4kan4ndi4i3in3xi4ko'3o4jo13ndo3ndi3xi4.
Ta13ba(4) en4i3kin4i3in3xi4ko'3o4jo13ndo(3) a2kan4,ta13ba4tu3ku(3) an4ndi3chi2i3in3xi4ko'3o4jo13ndo(3) a2kan4.
"Na4ku3nde3ta3na'3a(2) e2ndi4na4ndi1ko3 a2sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1chi3ñu3nu14u3se'1e(3) o4tan3ki3xi3 ra2sa3kan4ka3xi4 ra(2) e2ndi4ka4xi3sa3kan4ni1ki3xi3ndo1o3 ra2ji'4in(4) 2ndi4na4ndi1ko3 a2,sa3kan4ki3xi3 ra2ka3xi4 ra(3) e3".
"Ba'1a3ba3",ka4chi2 an4,i3kan4ta13ba4ta13ba(4) en4 e2tan3ja13nde3ta(3) en4xi4ko'3o4kan4yu3kun2nde4ta3xi4ko'3o4ni1chi'1yo4 a2tan3nde4ta(3) e2ndi4ko13 a2ka3xi4ta1xi1i4ki3xa2a2 ra1.
I3kan4ni1ndi'3i3tan3,ja1ndi4ko13 ni4(2) a2tu4u2 na1tan3,"Kwa'4an2 on4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4se'1e(3) o4na4ki3xi3 ra2ka3xi4 ra(2) e2ndi4xa1i4yo2ba'1a3".
Tan3ni1ke3e(3) an4ni1ja'1an(1) en4nu14u3se'1e(3) an4tan3,"Ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ndi4ku'1un(1) un4sa3kan4ndi4ka3xi(4) un4 a2ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3".
"Bi3tin3ndi4ja1ji4ni2ba(3) on4sa1a3nda13tu'4un(4) e4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ta1sa1bi4.Ni1ke3e3 ra2ja'1an1ju13ndu'4u4 ra2sa3kan4mi4i4ba42ba1xi3ta1chi4tan3ta1sa1bi4i4ndu'3u4mi4i4ba42xi4nu3ta1chi4kwa'1an(1) e1.
Ndi4ku4ni2ka3xi4ndi1ku1nda42ta1sa1bi4ndi4xa'4an2bi1xi1 lu3ja4xi24ta1kan4 e2ndi4ya1ku4u(4) a2ya1ja143ni1chi'1yo4nu14u3ni1chi'1yo4ndi4xa'4an2bi1xi1sa4ka2chi1.
Ndi4ku4ni2ka3xi4 lu3 ra2ba143ko4nde3e4i3ni2 ra1ka3xi4 ra2a1chi1ndi4ja1ta1kan4nda13tu'4un4 na2ndi4sa3kan4ko3o3ta1kan4ba3ja4xi24 a2chi1.
Ja13xi4ta1kan4 e2ndi'13i(3) a2ja13xi4 ra2tin3,ndi'13i3i3kin4ja13xi4 ra2tin3tan3ji'3na3,ji'3na3i3kin4ja13xi4 ra2chi1,i3kan4ja143nda13ba3nda3a2 ra1ndi3xi4chi2.
Ndi'13i(3) a2kan4ja13xi4 ra2tan3ja143nda13ba3nda3a2 ra1ndi3chi2ndi'13i(3) a2kan4ndi3sa3a4u1ni1xi4ko'3o4sa3kan4sa14ndi'3i3 ra2ja13xi4 ra2.
"Bi3tin3ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3tin3,yo'4o4ni1ki3xi3ndo1o3 2ndi4ku'14un1ka1 yu1",ka4chi2 ra1,"Ta1ja1ni1ki3xi3ndo1o3ba'1a3ku4u4ba(3) 2ñu3u2ndi4ku'14un1ka1 yu1".
"Ba'1a3ba3",ka4chi2ta1sa1bi4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2,i3kan4ndo13ni'3i3 na(2) e2kan4tin3tan3,ndo13ni'3i3 na2,ya1kan3,xi4ko'3o4kan4nda13chi3nde3e3ba'1a3 na(3) e3.
Ndi'13i(3) a2ja13xi4ba3ta1xi1i4ndi4ko14o(3) a2ni4ndo3ko3o4 ra2ka3xi4 na3,ja13xi4ndi'3i3 ra(3) e3,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2ña4si'4i2ta1sa1bi4so'3o3ndi4:
"su14u(3) a2ko14o3ba42i4xa3yo4o4ya1kan4ndi4nda'4bi2 ni42ku4u(4) un4nu14u(3) a2ndi4ya1i4yo2kwa'1a4ba42ji'4in4yo4o4i3ta2an2sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un(1) un4"."Nde4e4ka1ba3i3kin4ndo3o3kan4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"I3ta2an2sa3kan4ndi4ki3xi(3) a2ya1ka'4nu3,ka'4nu3kan4ki3xi3ji'4in(4) un4nda1tan42ja13xi4se'1e(3) o4ta1xi1i4sa3kan4ka3xi4tu3yo4o4ba3",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
Ya1kan4ndi4ke13e3 ra2ja'1an1kwi1so3 ra2ndi3xi4,ya1ndo3o3ya1ndo3o3ka13ya2ta1sa1bi4tan3ndi13ki'3in3 ra2i3kin4ka'4nu3tan3ndi13kwi3so3 ra2ndi3chi2si13so3 ra3.
Nda1sa3kan4bi4ba42ndi4ji'3na3ba3ta1xi1i4ja13xi4sa3kan4ndi4kun2ta1sa1bi4ja13xi4 ra2chi1.
Sa14chi'1yo4 na(2) e2,ndi4ja1nda13ko1o3ñu'3u2chi'1yo4 a2tin3sa3kan4bi4ja13xi4ta1,ta1sa1bi4 ya1.
Ndi4ni1ya'1a3 ni42tiem4pu2ni1ndo'3o3 na2ji'4in(4) a2,ko14o3ñu'3u2.
Nda1ki1bi4nda13ko1o3ñu'3u2sa3kan4ndi4ja143nda13ko1o3 na2yu14bi4ba'1a3ja143chi'4yo14i3kin4,chi'4yo14ndi3chi2,chi'4yo14ka3xi4 na2,i4yo2sa4ka2ba(3) e2ka3xi4 na2tan3ñu'3u2ba42ko14o3ba143kwi4i4chi'1yo4 a3.
Ya1kan4ki1bi4nda13ko1o3ñu'3u2bi4ba42ja143ni1ki3xa3a4 e2kan4chi'4yo14 a2xa4xi24 na3.
Sa3kan4ba42nda13ko1o3 na2yu14bi4ba'1a3ja4xi24 na2ya1,ya1chi'4yo14,tan3ko14o3ndi4ko14o3ya1ko14o3ñu'3u2ndi4ba143kwi4i4chi'1yo4 a2chi1.
Ba143kwi4i4chi'1yo4 a2nde4e4ba3 na2i4yo2sa4ka2ba3i3kin4ba3i4yo2ndi3chi2ba3i4yo2ndi3xi4ba3i4yo2ndi4ya1chi'1yo4 a2ba143kwi4i4ko14o3ñu'3u2.
MaximinoMeza,MaximinoMezaTeodoro.
U1ni1xi3ko3,u1ni1xi3ko3,ya1kan3,u1ni1xi3ko3u'1un1,u1ni1xi3ko3u'1un1kwi1ya1 yu1.
Yoloxóchitl.
Nda3tu'4un4lu3chi'4i2 un4ji'4in4 ndu2xa'1a4na1yu4bi24na1ni1xi1yo3a1chi1ka4chi2 na1ko4ndo3na1ma1xi1kwi4lu3na1nda4ku3kan4ta4ta2.
Mm.Na1kan4ndi4i3nda14ta1ta4u3ni2ku4u4ta1nda13ka'3an4 ra2sa1a3ko3o3chi2,
xi4ka3ndi4ka1 na1tian42ki3ti4yu3ku4ba3ko14o3i3in3ñu3u2ko3nde3e3 na2ko14o3i3in3xia4an4mi4i4nde4e4 na2ndi4i4yo2ndi4ka1 na1.
Nda4ndu3ku4ji1ni4 ra2sa1a3ko3o3tan3ba143kwi4i4nda3ni'1i4 ra2sa1a3ko3o3ji'4in(4) a3.I3kan4ndu13ku4 ra2i3nga2u1bi1compañerondi4na1nda3ke3ta'4an4ji'4in4 ra2,nda3tu'4un4 na2,
i3kan4ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4na1kan4ndi4,"Sa1a3ko3o3ndi4yo4o4ndi4i4yo2ndi4ka1yo4o4nda4a2ba42ko3nde3e(3) o4nda4a2ba42,sa1a3ko3o3tan3ndu3na'3a2tu4ni1mi4i4ko3nde3e(3) o4yo'4o4".
I3kan4ndu13ko3nde3e3 na2i3in3ja1ta4yu1u4mi4i4ka4a4ndi4ka1ba3i4nde4e4 na2nda4tu'4un4 na2ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4nda3ndu3ku(4) e4i3in3lugarmi4i4ko3nde3e(3) o4a1chi1,
ndi3xa3ja3ku4u4ba(3) e2ndi4ko14o3i3in3be'3e(3) o4ndi4i4yo2,i4yo2yu3ku4ba3yo4o4".
I3kan4xi1ka3 na2nda13ndu3ku4 na2,ni1xa1a1 na1i3in3xi1ki4mi4i4i4yo2ta1chi4i3kan4ni1xa1a1 na1.
"Yo'4o4ko3o3yo4o4a1chi1yo'4o4ba'1a3 ni42ka4a4".I3kan4ka4chi2i3nga2 ra1ndi4,"Kwi14i3ko3o3yo4o4yo'4o4ndi4ko14o3ta1kwi42yo'4o4ndi4ta1kwi42ku4ni(2) a2ji'4in(4) o4".
"Mi4i4ba'1a3ka4a4nda3ndu3ku(4) e4mi4i4i4yo2ta1kwi42nda3ndu3ku(4) e4".I3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2 na1mi4i4ba42ndo13ko3o4 na(2) e2ku4u(4) a2ñu3u2ya3ta4ña1a4.
Ndi4,i3kan4ndu13ta'3an2 na1,i3kan4i4yo2ta1kwi42i3kan4i4yo2mi4i4ba'1a3ku3chi3 na2i4yo2,i3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2 na1ña1a4.
I3kan4ja143,i4yo2tiem4pu2ba42i4nde4e4 na2ña1a4tan3ja143ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ndi4:
"ndu4xa24ndi4ko3o3i3in3ta1ka'3nda2chi3ñu3nu14u3yo4o4a1chi1,i4yo2mi3i(4) o4ko14o3na1ja'4nda2chi3ñu3ndi4na1ja'4nda2chi3ñu3ku4u4ndi'3i(3) o4,i4yo2i3in3ta1ka'3nda2chi3ñu3nu14u3yo4o4".
"¿Tan3nda4a2,sa1a3ko3o3ta1kan4ka'3nda2 ra1chi3ñu3nu14u(3) e4,sa1a3a3sa3ta1kan4ka'3nda2 ra1chi3ñu3nu14u(3) e4?"."Ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ka'1an1ji'4in(4) o4nda4a2chiu3un3a3sa3yo4o4".
"Ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ka'1an1ji'4in(4) o4sa1a3ko3o3tan3ja3chi4ñu3yo4o4",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
I3kan4nda13ndu3ku4 na2ta1kan4,ji14ni2 na1ta1ku4u4ta1,ta1ka'3nda2chi3ñu3.
Tan3ta1ko4ndo3ta1ma1xi1kwi4lu3ña1a4ndi4,ta1ña1a4ndi4ta1ja1xa'4a13señaba3ku4u4ta1ña1a4tan3xi14ni2 na1.
Ndi4ta1ja1nda4ndo3o3ba3ku4u4ta1kan4,ndi4ta1lu3u3ba3ku4u4ta1kan4ki1bi4ni1ki3xa3a4 ra2ji'4in(4) a2ña1a4.
Tan3xa143na1xu13xa3ba3ka'4an2na1kan4ji'4in4ndi4,"Na1yo'4o4ko3ndo3na1ka'3nda2chi3ñu3nu14u3yo4o4".
Ba143xa'4a13,ba143kwi4i4ka'3nda2na1kan4chi3ñu3a1chi1ndi4,ji14ni2 na1sa1a3ko3o3tan3ku3ta3ku2 na1,ba143ja4chiu4un4 na2ndi4na1i4yo2mi3i4sa3kan4ku4u4 na3.
I3kan4,sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1ta1nda3a2yo1o4junio.
Ja143nda13xa2a2sa1bi4tan3xa143ni1xa'1a3ba3ta1ña1a4señanu14u3 na2ndi4ni1ka3ndi3chi2 ra1i3in3arcokwa'1an1 ra1.
Ki1bi4ni1xa'1a3 ra2señanu14u3 na2tan3nda13ndu3ku4 na(2) e2kan4nda4a2ba42ni1ka3na3nu3señaña1a4,yo3o3ku4u4ta1ni1xa'1a3señakan4ka4a(4) e2sa3kan4.
Ko14o3na1ni4xa'1a3cuentaa1chi1ndi4su14u3ta1ni4i3xa3tu4u4ku4u4ta1kan4 e2ndi4ta1ni1i3xa3se'14e2ku4u4ta1kan4 e3.
I3kan4xa143nda13ndu3ku4 na2ka'4an2 na1,"¿An4ji14ni2 ndo4nda4a2ba42ka13na3nu3señani1xa'1an1yo'4o4?"."Ji14ni2 ndu1",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
I3kan4ni1xa'1a3i3nga2 ra1cuentandi4,"Ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1ja'1an1i3kan4tan3i3kan4ka13na3nu3señakan4".
I3kan4ni1ja'1an1 na1ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4 ra3,"¿Sa1a3i13xa(3) on4tan3ni1ta3xi(3) un4señakan4?".
"Ji14ni2 yu1ndi4ko14o3señani4ta3xi3yu'1u1"."ndi14xa3ndi4yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ta13xi(3) a3".Ba143ni4xi3in3 ra2nda3tu'4un4 ra2ji'4in4 na3.
I3kan4ja143nda13ta3ka2 na1kwa'1a4 na2ka'4an2 na1xi4kan1 na(1) e1ma1ni4nu14u3 ra2ndi4na4ka'1an1 ra1.
Ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 na2ndi4na4tu2ji4ni2 ndo4ndi4yu'1u1ka'1an1ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4,ndi4ndi3xa3ndi4yu'1u1ka'1an1ji'4in4 ndo4tan3na4tu2yu'1u1ka'1an1ji'4in4 ndo4ku4ni2 ndo4,na4tu2ku14ni2 ndo4ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4
ba'1a3ndi4ja1i4yo2ta1ja'4nda2chi3ñu3nu14u3 ndo4ta1kan4na4ka'3nda2chi3ñu3"."Ndi14xa3ndi4ba143nda4ni'1i4 ndu2sa1a3ko3o3ji'4in(4) a3".
"Ba1xa1a1ba(3) 2i4ndu'3u4 2ji4ni3so'1o3 2nda4tu'4un4 ndo4,su3u3ku4u4ba(3) e2nda4tu'4un4 ndo4ndi4ya1mi3i4 a2ndi4ji14ni2 ndo4sa1a3ko3o3ji'4in(4) a2",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 na3.
"¿Tan3sa1a3ba42ko3o3ji'4in(4) a3?"."Yo4o4ndi4ji14ni2 o4sa1a3ko3o3ku3ta3ku2yo4o4,tan3yu'1u1ndi4ji4ni2 yu1sa1a3ko3o3tan3ku3ta3ku2 e4na4tu2ku4ni2 ndo4ndi4yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ko3ndo3ta1ka'3nda2chi3ñu3nu14u3 ndo4".
"Tan3yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ku'1un1ko1to(1) e1se'1e3 ndo4mi4i4ni1ka3ku(3) a2na4tu2,sa1a3i4yo(2) a2ni1ka3ku(3) a2,yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ku'1un1ko1to(1) a1"."Ba'1a3na4tu2kan4".
I3kan4ja143ni1ki'3in3 na2cuentandi4,"Ku3ni3 ndo4tan42i4yo2 ndo4ndi4ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1ka'3nda2chi3ñu3nu14u(3) e4ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1ka3ndi4xa(3) e4tan3
I3kan4xa143ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ko3ndo3ta1ku4nu24ji'4in4 na2ndi4,ndi4su14u3ta1ka4a4tu4ni1bi4ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta1ki3ni3ka4a4ba3ku4u4 ra2su14u3ta1ka4a4tu4ni1ku4u4 ra3.
I3in3kwa'1an1ndi4nda4ndo3o3 ra2ta1ba'1a3ba3i3in3kwa'1an1nda4ndo3o3 ra2ta1ki3ni3ka4a4ba3,i3kan4ni1xa'1a3 na2cuentaji'4in4 ra2ndi4
ndi3xa3ndi4ta1,ta1nda4ku3ba3ku4u4 ra2su14u3ta1kan4ndi4ta1nda4ku3ku4u4 ra2,ka4chi2na1ta4u3ni2ndi4
ta1ka1a3ndi4su14u3ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ka1a3ndi4ta1ba'1a3nda4ndo3o3ba3ku4u4ta1yo'4o4,i3kan4ja'1an1 yu1ndu'1be4ndi4
ndi3ka'3a3ba3ku4u4ta1ka1a3ndi4chi2 ra1ja1ta4yu1u4kan4ja'1an1 yu1,o4ra2ni1ke3ta3 ra2ba1xi3 ra2ba1xi3ndi3xi3 ra2ndi4ni1bi4ku4u4 ra2,ya1kan4ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1ka'3nda2chi3ñu3nu14u(3) e4".
I3kan4xa143ka'3an4 na2 ra1,sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1ka3ku3i3in3se'1e3na1yu4bi24i4nde4e4ya3tin3sa3kan4.
Ja143,ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Yo'4o1ta4ta2ta4u3ni2ndi4ku'1un1ko1to(1) on4ndi4ka13ku3se'1e3ña4si'4i2 yu1tan3ku'1un1ko1to(1) on4"."Ba'1a3ndi4ña1a4xa1a1 yu1bi3tin3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ta1yu4bi24ba'1a3ku4u4ba3 ra2ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4,ji4to3 ra2nu14u(3) a2ka4ndu'3u4 a2ka13ku(3) a2,in3ka4ni24ndi4chi2 ra1ji4to3 ra2xa1ko1o4ba3ba42i4ta4ka4ndu'3u4 a2chi1.
"Ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ndi4ja1ji13ni2 ndo4na4chu3a3sa(3) e2ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3",kwa'1an1ba3 ra2,ja143
I1xa14a3ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"¿Sa1a3ko3o3ku3xi(3) o4sa1a3ko3o3ka3xi(4) o4?".
"An4ya1kan4ndi'4i13i3ni2 ndo4yo'4o4ndi4ko14o(3) a2yo'4o4,i3nga2xia4an4ndi4ya1i4yo2ba42kan4,yo'4o4,yo'4o4nda3ndu3ku4 2sa1a3ko3o3tan3ku'1un(1) o4ndi4yo4o4ku'1un1ku4u(4) e4sa3kan4ndi4ki3xa2a(2) e2kan4".
I3kan4ka13ndi3chi2 ra1to3so3ndi4ba14ngi4ka4chi2 o4ña1a4,nda1,nda1Juchitánba3ni1xa1a1 ra1ji'4in(4) a2ña1a4.
Ña1a4ni1ko1yo3 na2ja1ta4to3so2ba3ni1ja'1an1na1ña1a4ni1ko1yo3 na3.
Ndi4na1ja1nda13ndo3o3,ja1na1nda13ndo3o3ndi3ka'3a3nda13ndo3o3yu1ngui32ba3ku4u4 na2,i3na2ba3ku4u4 na2ni1xa1a1 na1,ndi3ka'3a3ba3ku4u4 ra2xa1a1 ra1kan4.
Ja143xa13ku'1un3ki3ni2,xa13ku'1un3ti1xu'4u4xa13ku'1un3ba1xi3 ri4ja1ta4to13so2ni1ko1yo3 ri4nda1Ñu3u2Ya3ta4.
Tan3sa3kan4ñu'3u2sa1bi4ndi4xi4ka3 ni42ñu'3u2sa1bi4ya1kwe4nda2ndi4ke14e4na1kan4ke'3e2.
Ja'1an1 na1ja'1an1kwi1so3 na2ña'1a3ndi4ni1ki3xa2a(2) e2ji'4in4 na2ndi4i4yo2ki3ni3ya1ku3xi3 na2i4yo2ki3ni3nda13ta3ka2 na1ndi4i4yo2ya1ku3xi3 na3.
Tan3ba143,tia'14an2ndo3ko3o4 na2ki1bi4ñu3u2ndi4,sa1a3ku3na3ni(4) a3,i3kan4ka4chi2 na1ndi4:
"ja1i4yo2ba3yo4o4ja1ndu13ti'4bi(3) o4nde4e(4) o4tan3ndi4ki1bi4ñu3u2 e4sa1a3ku3na3ni4 a2tan3
"A4su3ndi4ja1ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4ba3sa3kan4ndi4ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) o4sa1a3ku3na3ni4 a2ka1a3".
Ja143ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Sa1a3ku3na3ni4ñu3u2 e4tin3,ñu3u2 e4ku4ni2 o4sa1a3ku3na3ni4 a3".
"Ya1ka1a3ndi4Ti14chi3ku3na3ni4 a2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,"Ti14chi3ku3na3ni4 a2yo'4o4".Ya1kan4ndo13ko3o4 na2ki1bi4 a2ndi4ku4u(4) a2Ti14chi3,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 na3.
Ki1bi4ja143ya1kan3,ndo1o3ki1bi4 a2kan4tan3,ja143kwa'1a4ba3 na2ka4ndi4xa3 na2 ra1ndi4ta1ko4chun3ku4u4 ra2chi1.
I3kan4tu3ku3ni3kwa'1an1tu3ku3ba3 ra2ndi4ni1ndi'3i(3) a2xi4xi3 na2kwa'1an1tu3ku3ba3 ra3.Nda1Huehuetánxa1a1tu3ku3 ra2ji'4in4,ji'4in4to13so2kan4.
A1su3ni1ko1yo3 na2tan3ba1xi3ndi'3i3,ba1xi3,i3kan4ndi4nda1nu1ni4nda1ba1xi3ji'4in4 na2ndi4ja1i3tu2ba3ni1ko1yo3 na2nu14u3i3kan4.
Ta1chi4ba3ba42ni1xa1a1i3kan4su14u3kan4ndi4ta1chi4ba3ni1xa1a1kan4,ba1xi3ni3i4ba1xi3ji'4in4 na3,ba1xi3tu3ña1,ki3ti4ba3ba1xi3ji'4in4 na3.
Ya1kan4ku4u4ba3 na2su14u3na1ja4chiu4un4ku4u4 na2kan4ndi4ya1kwi'4na4ba3xi4ka3 na2ji'4in4ndi4na1kwi'4na4ba3ku4u4 na3.
Sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1xa'1a3ba3tu3un4cuentandi4i4yo2,ni1ni'1i4 ra2chi3ñu3ndi4i4yo2ta1na3ni4ma1xi1kwi4lu3,ya1kan3,Ti14chi3.
Tan3tu3un4kan4ndi4ta1ja1nda4ku3ta'3an2ku4u4ta'3an2ta1kan4ndi4ba'1a3nda4ndo3o3ta'3an2 ra1palomaba3ba'1a3nda4ndo3o3 ra2sa3a2ba3ba'1a3.
Ta1ja1nda4ku3ku4u4ta1kan4chi2.Ya1kan4ndi'3i3ku4u4ba3ji'4in4 na2ndi4na1ke4e4sa3kan4kwa'1an1ku4u4ba3 na2ndu4ku4 na2ya1ku3ta3ku2 na1.
Ja143ni1ki3xa2a2ba3,ba1xi3ba3ta1kan4ndi4ka4chi2 ra1ndi4na4ku'1un(1) o4tan3ku3ni2 o4sa1a3ba3ka4a4ta1nda4ku3ba1xi3ndi4
sa1a3ba3ka4a4ta1ko4ndo3ma1xi1kwi4lu3ndi4ma1xi1kwi4lu3na3ni4 ra2ka4chi2 na1so'3o3,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ba1xi3ta1kan4chi2,ndi4ta1ba1xi3xa'1a4ku4u4ta1kan4su14u3to13so2ba1xi3ta1kan4ndi4ta1ni1ki3xi3xa'1a4ba3ta1kan4.Ba1xi3 ra2sa3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1yu3ku4ndio'3o3kan4.
Ja1i3kan4ba3i4ndu'3u4ta1kan4su14u3ta1kan4ku4u4 ra2ndi4ja1i3kan4ba3i4ndu'3u4ta1kan4ta1lu3u3ba3ku4u4 ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra2xa'1a4yu3ku4ndio'3o3kan4ni1xa1a1ta1kan4,i3kan4ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4:
"¿nda4a2ba42i4yo2ta1ko4ndo3ma1xi1kwi4lu3yo'4o4ndi4amigu ni42 yu1ku4u4 ra2tan3ta1kan4ba1xi3 2ja1ta4?".
"Ji14ni2 o4nda4a2i4yo2 ra1ndi4i4yo2ka'4an4 ra2ñu3u2kan4ndi4i4yo2ka'4an4 ra2i3kan4ba3".
Ya'1a3tu3un4kwa'1an1 ra1xa1a1 ra1,nu4mi24ba3xa1a1ta1ña1a4nda13xa2a2 ra1be'3e3 ra3,ja1ta1xu13xa3ku4u4 ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra2ni1xa1a1tu3ku3ta1ña1a4.
"señornda4a2ba42i4yo2ta1na3ni4ma1xi1kwi4lu3ndi4ta1kan4ku4ni2ku3ni2 yu1ba1xi3 2amigu yu1ku4u4 ra3".
"¿An4amigu un4ku4u4 ra3?""amigu yu1ku4u4 ra3"."Kwa'4an2 on4ndi4nda1be'3e3ndi4chi2ndi'4i4kan4nda1i3kan4i4ndu'3u4ta1kan4,nda1i3kan4ku3ni2 un4 ra3".
I3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4nda4ka1tu'4un4 ra2ta1ña1a4,"¿An4yo'4o1ku4u4amigu yu1ma1xi1kwi4lu3?"."Yu'1u1ku4u4ba3 ra3,¿An4i4yo2ya1ndi4ni2 un4ba1xi(3) un4?".
"Ba1xi3 2ndi4yo4o4nda3tu'4un4kwen4tu2ku4u(4) e4ku4ni2 yu1ndi4ja1i4yo2 ni42tiem4pu2ba42ku4ni2 yu1a3sa3amigu i2yo'4o1tan3
ba1xi3 2ndi4nda3tu'4un(4) e4kwen4tu2ku4ni2 yu1"."¿An4sa3kan4ba3?".
"Kwi14i3nda3tu'4un(4) e4kwen4tu2yo'4o4ndi4na4tu2ku4ni2 un4nda3tu'4un(4) e4kwen4tu2ndi4nda1ja'1a4tun4tia14ba4ndi4chi2i3tun2kan4ku'1un(1) o4nda3tu'4un(4) e4kwen4tu2".
"Mi4i4i4yo2ta1chi4mi4i4ba'1a3ka4a4ku3nde3e(3) o4nda3tu'4un(4) e4ndi4na'3a4ba3ko3nde3e(3) o4nda3tu'4un(4) e4kwen4tu2",ka4chi2ta1kan4ji'4in4 ra2chi1,i3kan4ni1ke3e3 na2xa'1an1 na1ña1a4.
Ku13xi'3na3ba3ma1xi1kwi4lu3kwa'1an1 ra1,ta1ni14ji3ni2bi4ku4u4ta1kan4ni1ya'1a3ma1xi1kwi4lu3ndi4ku13xi'3na3ba3ta1kan4ni1xa1a1ba3ta1ña1a4tan3ndu13ku3ndu'4u4 ra2ja'1a4i3tun4
ndi4chi2kan4ndi4ja1ndi3ki'4ndi4ba3ku4u4 ra2ndu13ku3ndu'4u4 ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra2nda'3a4i3tun4ña1a4,ña1a4ni1xa1a1ta1tu3un4ña1a4ndu13ku3ndu'4u4 ra2xa'1a4i3tun4ña1a4i4ndu'3u4 ra3,
ji4to3 ra2yo'4o4ji4to3 ra2kan4,ni1ya'1a3o4ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra2ko14o3ma1xi1kwi4lu3ki4xa2a2,ka4chi2ka'4an4 ra2so'3o3,"¿Nda4a2o4ra2ba42ki3xa2a2ta1yo'4o4tan3ko14o3 ra2ki4xa2a2?".
"Ba'1a3 ni42ndi4ka4xi3yo3yo'4o4ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) o4tan3yo'4o4ka3ni3ta'4an(4) e4ji'4in4ba3 ra2",ka4chi2ka'4an4ta1kan4so'3o3.
Ya1kan4ni3ja4i3ni2 ra1tan3ni1ke3ta3ba3ndi3ki'4ndi4tan3ba1xi3 a2ji1ni4ba3 ra2,cha13chi3ndi'3i3ndi3ki'4ndi4ji1ni4 ra3.
Ta1ja1sa13na3i3ni2ku4u4ba3 ra2i13xa3ta1ña1a4su14u3ta1ki3xi3ka1ku4u4ta1ña1a4ka3ni3ta'4an4 ra2ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,ta1ja1sa13na3i3ni2ku4u4ba3 ra2i13xa3ta1ña1a4.
Ni1ji1ta1ndi3ki'4ndi4kwa'1an(1) e1ñu'3u4ña1a4,ni1ke3ta3ba3palomaja143nda4chi3i4ba3 ri4ndi3ki'4ndi4kan4ndi4,ta1kan4ku4u4 ra2i1nda43.
i3ni2 ra1sa3kan4tan3nda13ndo3o3ba3 ra2ta1su'4u4tan3
ba1xi3 ra2ja1ta4ta1ña1a4ndi1ku1nda42,ki1bi4ji13ni2palomandi4ta1su'4u4ku4u4ta1ña1a4tan3ka13ndi3ta3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,ja143ta13xi4ndi1kun1ta'4an4 na2kwa'1an1 na1.
Na'3a4xi1ka3ndi3kun2ta'4an4 na2,ni14ku3chun3ta'3an2 ra1ti3in3 ra2ta1kan4ndi4ja143kwa1nu'1u4ba3ta1kan4mi4i4ni1ki3xi3 ra3.
Ni1ndo1o3ba3ta1ña1a4,ja143nda13xa2a2ta1kan4ñu3u2 ra1ka4chi2 ra1ndi4
"nda1xi4ko1ndi4ku14chun(3) e4ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4ya'4a13 ni42mañata1kan4,ja'1an1 yu1tan3ndi4ni14ku3chun(3) 2ku3si4ki24 2ji'4in4 ra2ndi4ta13xi4 ra2yu'1u1ba1xi3 2".
"Ka4chi2ka1bi4 a2na4na1ñu3u2nda3kwi1ta3ki3xi3ja1ta4yo4o4ndi4ku14chun(3) e4ji'4in4 na2ndi4i3nda14ji1ni4ba3ku4u4 ra2tan3sa14yu'3bi2 ra1yu'1u1".
I3kan4ni1yu'14bi2ba3tu3un4,ja143kwa'1an1tan3kwa'1an1ba3 na2a1chi1ndi4mi4i4ta4ku1 na1ba42ndi4i3kan4i4yo(2) a2ta4ku1 na1.
Ja4chiu4un4na1kan4i4yo(2) a2xi4xi3 na2i4yo2ki3ti4ja1na1 na1i4yo2,kwa'1an1tu3ku3ba3 na2kwa'1an1kwi1so3 na2ki3ti4.
Ja143ndu13ndi3chi2ta1tu3un4kan4ji'4in4,ji'4in4ñu'3u2sa1bi4i4yo2tu'1un3ja1ta4ta1ña1a4.
Ba143ni4xa1a1i3ni2ta1kan4a1chi1ndi4ta1ko4chun3ka1ku4u4mi3i4ba3ma1xi1kwi4lu3,ja143ndu13ndi3chi2 ra1ji'4in4ñu'3u2sa1bi4.
Ka13ni3ba3 ra2tu3un4kan4i1nda43,ki1bi4ka13ni3 ra2ta1kan4tan3i3kan4ni14ni'1i4ka1bi4ñu3u2kan4nde3e4a1chi1ndi4
ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ko4ndo3nde3e4na1kan4i4yo2tu'1un3ni14ni'1i4ka1bi4na1kan4nde3e4a1chi1ndi4xa'13ni4ba3ñu'3u2sa1bi4ta1ña1a4,ja143nda13ndi3ko4 na2ki13xa2a2 na1.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Ja1i3in3amiguni1ki3xi3ja1ta4 2yo'4o4tan3,tan3ndo'4o1ndi4ni14xa'1a3 ndo4cuenta".
"Su14u3na1nda4a2yu'1u1ku4u4ndo'4o1ndi4,ba'1a3yu'1u1ko3nda2a(2) e2ndo'4o1tan3ndo'4o1ndi4ba143nda4a2 ndo4yu'1u1".

Tan3ndi4su14u3ndi3sa3a4bi4 na2ku4u4na1nda4ku3ndi4i3nda14u1bi1ta'4an2ba3ku4u4 na2,na1nda4ku3ndi4ba143ku4chun3 na2tian42mi3i4ta1ku4nu24ndi4ba143ku4chun3 na2chi1.
