Na4ji13ni2 o4 na2ba'1a3ka1na4ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4 na2i1nda43,"¿A4chu3i4xa3 ndo4nde4e4 ndo4yo'4o4?,i3nga2xia4an4ku'1un1 ndo4".
I3kan4ti4ba42ji13ni2na1kan4ndi4ji13ni2 o4 na2tin3i3kan4ni1ndi'3i3ba3ji'4in(4) a2kan4ta'4nu(1) a1kan4.Ta'4nu(1) a1.I3kan4ta'4nu(1) a1kan4,tan3na4ni14ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4 na2ndi4ya1i4yo2ba42ji'4in(4) o4ran4.
Ji'4in4mi3i(4) o4nda4kwi1in(1) a1.
Ndo4o13 a2,ndo4o13 a2ji'4in(4) o4ran4,tan3ba'1a3na4ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4 na2ndi4,ya'1a(3) e4nu14u3 na2na4ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4 na2tin3.
Ta'4nu(1) a1.
"Ku14ka'3an3nu14u3 ndo4ndi4sa1a3ku4u4ba3na1yu4bi24i4xa(3) e2ndi4i3nga2xia4an4ku'1un1 ndo4",ka3chi2 o4ji'4in4 na3,i3kan4ta'4nu1ba(3) e2kan4.Mi3i4 na2ndo4o13 a2ji'4in4.
Tan3an4ndi3xa3ba42ndi4na4tu2kwa'1an(1) e4i3in3i3chi4kwa'1an(1) e4i3in3chi3ñu3tan3ndu13ku3ta'4an(4) e4ji'4in4i3in3na1nda'4bi2i3in3na1ñu3u2tan3
xa'1an(1) e4tan3nda13ndi3ko(4) e4tan3tu3ku3kan4nda13ku3ta'4an4tu3ku(3) e4ji'4in4 na2kwa'1an1 na1,so'3o3kwa'1an1 na1mi4i4ni1ki3xi(3) o4tin3,¿an4i'4na4 e2kan4chi2?

"ko14chun(3) un4xa1a(1) on4mi4i4ba42i4yo2 ra1kan4ndi4ya14tin3 ni42i4yo2 ra1".
I3kan4,"Ndi4ta1kwa'1an1ku4u(4) 2tan3xa1a1 yu1",yo4so24 ra2mulaja1na1 ra1,i4yo2mulaka'4nu3ba'1a3yo4so24 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
"amigu,na4chu3ku'1un(1) un4i3kan4tan3,na4chu3kwa'1an(1) on4i3kan4ndi4
i3kan4ndi4ko14o3na1xa'4an1mi4i4ba42,mi4i4ba42i4yo2 ra1nda1kan4ndi4ko14o3na1xa'4an1".
"Nda1ba'1a3ka1ndi4nda3ndi3ko(4) on4a1chi1ndi4ya14tin3 ni42ba42i4yo2ta1ku4u4ma1xi1kwi4lu3".
I3kan4ndi4,"Ta1kwa'1an1ku4u(4) 2ndi4ta1kwa'1an1tan3xa1a1ku4u(4) 2",ka4chi2 ra1,yo4so24 ra2mulaja1na1 ra1tan3kwa'1an1 ra1.
I3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1ni1xa1a1 ra1i3in3ñu3u2,Ñu3u2Ya3ta4ka4chi2 na1,Ñu3u2Ya3ta4.
I3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1nda4ka1tu'4un4 ra2,nda4ka1tu'4un4 ra2na1nde4e4kan4ndi4
nda4a2ba42i4yo2ta1ku4u4ma1xi1kwi4lu3,kwa'4an2 ndo4ta1nda1i3kan4,nda1kan4i4yo2 ra1,nda1kan4i4yo2ta1ku4u4ma1xi1kwi4lu3ndi4
"nda1nu14u3ku'1u1nda1kan4i4yo2 ra1","Hombre,na4ku'1un1 yu1tan3ku3ni2 o4",ja143ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4.
Ni1xa1a1 ra1be'3e3ma1xi1kwi4lu3ndi4,¿An4yo'4o4ku4u4be'3e(3) on4yo'4o1ma1xi1kwi4lu3?"."Yo'4o4i4yo2 yu1,¿na4chu3ku4ni2 un4ba1xi(3) un4?".
"¿Na4chu3ku4ni2 un4ba1xi(3) un4nda4ka1tu'4un(4) un4xa'1a4yu'1u1?Yu'1u1ndi4ko14o3na1ba1xi3 na2nda4ka1tu'4un4 na2mi4i4i4yo2 yu1".
Ka4chi2ma1xi1kwi4lu3,"¿Tan3nda4a(2) e2ba42ku4ni2 un4ba1xi(3) un4?".
"Yu'1u1ndi4ta1ba1xi3ta1ba1xi3ko1to1ti4ku4u(4) 2mi4i4i4yo2 on4ndi4ta1ba1xi3ku3ni3ku4u(4) 2mi4i4ba42i4yo2 on4",ka4chi2tu3un4ni1xa1a1 ra1.
"Hombreamigundi4yu'1u1ndi4,na4tu2i4yo(2) a2ndi4ni2 un4ba1xi(3) un4,i4yo(2) a2ya1chi3ñu3ba1xi(3) un4ndi4ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in(4) 2na4chu3ba1xi(3) un4".
"Ta1ba1xi3ko1to1ti4ba3ku4u(4) 2mi4i4ba42i4yo2 on4tan3sa3kan4ndi4,sa3kan4ndi4ba1xi3 2i3nga2ki1bi4,i3nga2ki1bi4ki3xi3tu3ku(3) 2".
Ni1nda3a3 ra2ba1xi3 ra2yu3ku4so'3o3,yu3ku4ndio'3o3,yu3ku4ndio'3o3nda13a3 ra2ba1xi3 ra2ji'4in4mulaja1na1 ra1.
Ba1xi3 ra2,ña1a4ba1xi3 ra2tan3nda13ndo3o3ta1ma1xi1kwi4lu3ña1a4ndi3ka'3a3ndi4che4e13ndi3ka'3a3ndi4che4e13ndi3ka'3a3ndi4nu4mi3 ri4 ra2ju13ndu'4u4 ri4ka'3a4,ka'3a4mulaja1na1 ra1.
Nu4mi3ndi3ka'3a3 ra2ndi4,tan3chi4ka2 ri4ya4a24 ri4yu'3u4 ra2,chi4ka2 ri4ya4a24 ri4yu'3u4 ra3.
Ndi4ji4ni2bi1xin3 ra2ndi4ji4ni2bi1xin3 ra2ndi4ni3ji14ni2ka1 ra1nda4a(2) e2ko3o3i3ni2 ra1.
Ndi4,a1su3ma1xi1kwi4lu3ku4u4ta1ko4ndo3ndi3ka'3a3ña1a4,ma1xi1kwi4lu3ku4u4ndi3ka'3a3
"Na4chu3ba42ndi4hijo,na1ki'4bi3i4chi3ku4u(4) e4ni1ki3xi(3) o4ko1to(1) e4yo'4o4bi3tin3ndi4ka3xi4ti4yo'4o4yo4o4,ka3xi4ndi3ka'3a3ka1a3yo4o4".
Ja143ba1xi3 ra2ba1xi3 ra2sa3kan4nda1yu3ku4ndio'3o3ka1a3,yu3ku4ndio'3o3ka1a3ba1xi3 na2tan3nda1tian42nda13ñu'4u4ndi3ka'3a3ndi4ko14o3ndi3ka'3a3.
Ko14o3ndi3ka'3a3i4ndu'3u4 ri4ka'3a4mulandi4ko14o3ndi3ka'3a3,i3kan4ja143ba1xi3ba3tu3un4kan4nda13xa2a2 ra1ñu3u2 ra1.
Nda4tu'4un4 ra2ji'4in4na1ñu3u2 ra1ndi4,"Hombreamigundi4,ni1xa'1an1 yu1mi4i4i4yo2ma1xi1kwi4lu3ndi4ko4chun3 ni42ma1xi1kwi4lu3".
"Ko4chun3 ni42ta1kan4ndi4,ndi4u1xi1u1ni1ñu'3u2sa1bi4ji4ni2 ra1,
u1xi1u1ni1ñu'3u2sa1bi4ji4ni2 ra1tan3,tan3nda4ndo3o3 ra2ndi3ka'3a3,nda4ndo3o3 ra2tio1ko4,
nda4ndo3o3 ra2ndu3xi4che4e13,ndi4ko4chun3 ni42ma1xi1kwi4lu3",ka4chi2 ra1nda4tu'4un4 ra2ji'4in4 na2mi4i4na1ñu3u2 ra1.
"hombreamigundi4nda1xi4ko1na4ku'1un(1) o4mi4i4i4yo2 ra1kan4ndi4ko4chun3 ni42ta1kan4,ko4chun3 ni42ma1xi1kwi4lu3".
"Ndi4ku'1un(1) o4,ku'1un(1) o4sa3kan4ndi4,nda4a(2) e2a3sa3tu3ma1xi1kwi4lu3tu3yo4o4ndi4na1ko4chun3ku4u4yo4o4",ka4chi2tu3un4ndi4,ka4chi2tu3un4ndi4,"Na1ko4chun3tu3ku4u4yo4o4ba3".
Nda13ndo3o3 na2sa1bi4nda13ndo3o3 na2kwa'1an1 na1,ni1xa1a1 na1mi4i4i4yo2ma1xi1kwi4lu3.
Ja143chi4ka2 na1ñu'3u2tan3ka'4ndi2,ku4un4sa1bi4tan3ka'4ndi2,ba1xi3ta1chi4ndi4i1yo3 lu3ku4u4ba1xi3ta1chi4.
an4ko4chun3 ni42ta'3an2ba3na1yo'4o4ndi4an4su14u3ta1ko4chun3ku4u4yo4o4ba3ka4chi2ma1xi1kwi4lu3.
Ni1ki3xa3a4ma1xi1kwi4lu3ndi4ndu13ndi3chi2 ra1ndi4
ni1chi3ka2 ra1ta1chi4ndi4,ta1chi4tan3ñu'3u2,ñu'3u2sa1bi4ndi4nda4ye'3e2tan3ka'4ndi2nda4ye'3e2tan3ka'4ndi2.
Ta13xi4ba3 ra2na1tu3un4ña1a4ji'4in4,na1tu3un4ña1a4ji'4in4ñu'3u2sa1bi4,nda4ye'3e2ñu'3u2sa1bi4tan3ka'4ndi2nda4ye'3e2ñu'3u2sa1bi4tan3ka'4ndi2,ko4chun3 ni42ma1xi1kwi4lu3.
Sa3kan4ni3ku4u4 ra2ji'4in4 na2ta13xi3 ra2 na1tan3ba1xi3ba3 na2nda13xa2a2 na1ñu3u2 na1,nda13xa2a2 na1ñu3u2 na1,Ko4chun3 ni42ma1xi1kwi4lu3"
"Ko4chun3 ni42 ra1,híjoleja1ko4chun3ta'3an2ba3yo4o4tan3ndi4,ndi4ni14ko3chun(3) e4".
O4ra2ja143ka4chi2ma1xi1kwi4lu3ndi4,"Bi3tin3sa3kan4ku3ni2 na1ndi4ku'1un1tu3yo4o4ba3ñu3u2 na1,ku'1un1tu3yo4o4ñu3u2 na1ndi4ni1xa1a1 ra1ñu3u2tu3un4tan3
ja143ni1nda3a3ba3 ra2ranchumi4i4i4yo2,mi4i4ñu'4u4ji1ndi1ki4,mi4i4ñu'4u4ji1ndi1ki4mi4i4ñu'4u4ki3ni2
tu3ku3ki3ni2tan3tu3ku3ki3ni2xa4ku'1un3 ri4,kwa'1an1 ri4ja1ta4to13so2,
kwa'1an1torokwa'1an1,kwa'1an1ki3ni2na4ñu3ji'4in4 ra2,kwa'1an1 ri4ja1ta4to13so2,xi4ko14 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4ñu3u2 ra1.
Ja143ju4ndi3chi2ñu'3u2sa1bi4tan3ka'4ndi2ju4ndi3chi2ñu'3u2sa1bi4tan3ka'4ndi2ndi4,ndi4ko4chun3 ni42ma1xi1kwi4lu3,ko4chun3 ni42ma1xi1kwi4lu3ndi4
ko14o3na1nda4ni'1i4 na2ya1ko4chun3ta1kan4ndi4ya1,ta1ji4ni2 ni42ku4u4 ra2ran4,ta1ko4chun3 ni42ku4u4 ra3.
I3kan4ndi4na1,tan42ku4u4sa1bi4ndi4,ko4chun3 ni42 ra1ndi4sa4ku3un3 ra2sa1bi4.
Sa4ku3un3 ra2sa1bi4tan3,tan3chi4ka2 ra1ñu'3u2sa1bi4tan3nda4ye'3e2tan3nda4ndo3o3 ra2ki3ti4,nda4ndo3o3 ra2ndi3ka'3a3.
Nda4ndo3o3 ra2ndu3xi4che4e13,nda4ndo3o3 ra2ndi3ki'4ndi4i4ndu'3u4 ra2ndi1ka3i3tun4.
Nda4ndo3o3 ra2tio1ko4ñu'4u4,nda4ndo3o3 ra2ti1kwe4ku3.
Nda4ndo3o3 ra2ko1o4,ko4chun3 ni42ma1xi1kwi4lu3,
"Na4chu3ba42ndi4ni1xa'1an(1) e4mi4i4ba42i4yo2ta1ma1xi1kwi4lu3tan3ko4chun3 ni42 ra1,ko4chun3 ni42ta1yo'4o4".
"Bi3tin3ndi4,bi3tin3ndi4ni1xa'1an1yo4o4tan3ji13ni2 o4ndi4ta1ko4chun3 ni42ku4u4 ra3,bi3tin3ndi4
ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1ñu3u2 e4tan3ndi4,ni1xa'1an1 ra1,ni1ki3xi3 ra2ñu3u2 e4tan3,tan3ni1ji3ni2 o4ndi4ta1ko4chun3ku4u4 ra3,tan3yo4o4ndi4su14u3na1ko4chun3ku4u4yo4o4",
ka4chi2 na1nda4tu'4un4 na2kwen4tu2,ya,ma1xi1kwi4lu3,ya.

Yoloxóchitl.
Cincuentaytresaños.
Ya1ku4ni2 yu1nda3ka1tu'4un(4) 2yo'4o1ndi4kan4ta1ta4u3ni2ya1xa'1a4,kwen4tu2xa'1a4ta1kwo1on4tan3yo3o3ku4u4ta1kwo1on4tan3na4chu3ku4u4 ra2ta1kwo1on4tan3nda4a2i4yo2 ra1tan3nda4a(2) e2ba42i4xa3 ra3.
Ta1kwa1on4kan4ndi4ta1ñu'1u3yu3ku4ku4u4ta1kan4tan3i4yo2 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3,yu3ku4i4yo2 ra1.
Nda4a2 ra1i3su2nda4a2 ra1ti1chi4nda4a2 ra1ya3kwin4ndi3sa4ku4u4nu14u3ki3ti4kan4ku4u4ja1na1 ra1ti4i4yo2 ra1nda4a2 ra1,yu3ku4i4yo2 ra1.
Tan3ta1kwa1on4kan4ndi4su14u3ta1ka'4nu3bi4ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4ta1lu3u3so'3o3ti4ba3ku4u4ta1kan4na4ko3o3ndi4ta1xu13xa3ku4u4 ra3.
I4yo2yu'3u4xi1ni4 ra2te'4e4te'4e4yu'3u4xi1ni4 ra2ka4a4so'3o3ti4ka4a4yu'3u4xi1ni4 ra2i4ndu'3u4 a2ji1ni4 ra2ndi4chi2 ra1ndi4a1su3yu1u4xa'1a1i4yo2 ra1.
Ba143i4yo2ta1kan4nda4a2ka1ja13ni1ku3ndi4yu1u4xa'1a1i4yo2ta1kan4.
Tan3ta1kwa1on4kan4ndi4i4yo2kwen4tu2ya3ta4xa'1a4 ra2ji4ni2 yu1ndi4
i3in3ta1nda'4bi2ni1ke3ta3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1ndu3ku4 ra2i3su2.
I3ta2an2i3ta2an2xi4ka3 ra2tan3ti4ke4ba'1a3 ra2ji'4in4ku4u4 ri4tan3ti4ke4ba'1a3 ra2ji'4in4ku4u4 ri4,i3kan4nda4xa2a2 ra1tan3ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4si'4i2 ra1ndi4:
"ya1kan3,chi3nde3e(4) on4yu'1u1na4kwi3i(4) o4 ri4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,chi4nde3e(4) an4si'4i2 ra1 ra1kwi4i24 ra2 ri4kia'4bi13ku3ñu2.
Nda4kwa'1a3xu'14un4i4xa3 na2,i4xi4ko3 na2ku3ñu2ti4kan4tan3ta4xi3kwa'4a4 na2xu'14un4.
Sa3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4 ra2xi4ka3 ra2tan3sa3kan4ku4u4ja143ndu13ndi3kun2i3in3ta1ndu13ndi3kun2ña'3a4ka4chi2ta1kan4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"ya3ni2,¿an4ku14ni2 un4na4kwi3i4yu'1u1i3su2ji'4in(4) un4?",ka4chi2 ra1,"Ya1kwi3i3ku4u4ba(3) e2ndi4kwa'1a4 ni42 ri4ja'4ni24 2",ka4ni'1i3ndi4u1ni1 ri4ka4ni'1i3ku1mi4 ri4ki4xa2a2ji'4in4 ra3.
Ndi3sa3a4ki1bi4xi'4i1 ri4xi4ka3 ra2ku'1u1,i3kan4ka4chi2ta1kan4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Ba'1a3ba3na4tu2na4i4xa(3) on4 a2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2tan3kwi3i(4) un4 lu3 ri4".
"Yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ndo1o(3) on4kwi3i(4) un4 ri4tan3yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ku'1un1ka'3ni4ka(1) e1 ri4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,ya1kan4ndo4ko3o4chi4ñu3 ra2ta1kan4kwi3i4ta1kan4 ri4.
Sa3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ja143ni1ki'1bi3ba3ta1kan4ji'4in(4) an4si'4i2 ra1chi1,i4yo2ta1kan4ji'4in(4) an4si'4i2 ra1ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ña4ku4ni2 ra1ji4ni2 ra1ban4.
"Ya1kwi3i3ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4a1chi1ndi4ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ba143ndi'4i13ka1i3ni2 ra1ku4u(4) 2ndi4su3u3tan3su3u3i3su2xi4ka3 ra2ja1ta4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
Ba143kwa'1an1nda'3a4ka1 ra1 ña4ndi4ña4si'4i2ti4 ra2ku4u4ba(3) en4ndi4ki3xa2a2ti4 ra2ñu3u42ke4ta3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1ñu3u42ki4xa2a2 ra1ji'4in4i3su2kan4ti4kan4ba3ndi4ni2 ra1kwi3i4 ra2tin3.
Tan3ndi4ni2 ra1ndi4ti4ka'3ni4ka1 ra1ku4u4 ri4tan3kwa'1an1tu3ku3ba3 ra2,ya1kan4ya1kan4ku4u4 ra2xi4ka3 ra2tan3ba143kwa'1an1nda'3a4 ra2ña4si'4i2 ra1.
Tan3ta1ni1xa1a1kan4ndi4nde3e4 lu3ndo'4o4ta1kan4ji4ni2 ra1 ña4ndi4kwa'1an1nda'3a4ba3ta1kan4 ña4.
Sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1ki'3in(3) an4mañaji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4ta1kan4ba3nde3e4ndi4kun2 an4tan3ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ja1ku4ni2ndo3ko3o4ba(3) en4ta1kan4a1chi1ndi4ba143kwa'1an1nda'3a4 ra2 ña4.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2,ka4chi2ña4ta4u3ni2i4ndu'3u4ya3tin3ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3:
"yu3ba4 2ko3to3kwe4nda2 on4ndi4ba143ba'1a3ni1ki3xa2a2ta1xi4ka3ña1a4ndi4,ya1kan3,ña4si'4i2 un4ndi4i4yo2 an4ji'4in4 ra2tu4u2 yu1",ka4chi2 an4ta4u3ni2ji'4in4 ra3.
Tan3nda4a(2) e2ba42i13xa3ta1,ta1ko4ndo3ta1xi4ka3ku'1u1ja'4ni24i3su2kan4ki1bi4ni1xa'1a3 ra2cuentandi4
ni1ki'1bi(3) an4ña4si'4i2 ra1ji'4in4,ji'4in4i3nga2ta1a3ta1chi4nde3e4ña'3a4kwi4i24i3su2tin3.
Ki1bi4ni1ki'1bi3ña4si'4i2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4tan3,tan3nda1ta1kwa1on4ka'4an2ji'4in4 ra2chi1,ka4chi2ta1kwa1on4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"ba143ba'1a3i4yo2 on4ndi4ña4si'4i2 un4ndi4ta1ndo4ko3o(4) on4be'3e3kwi4i24i3su2ndi4,ya1kan3,ba143ba'1a3i4xa3 ra2ndi4
ku3ñu2si'1in3 ri4ku3ñu2lomu ri4ja4xi24ta1kan4i4xa3ña4si'4i2 ra1tan3,i4xa3ña4si'4i2 un4tan3
ba14ja4ba'1a3ndi4ta'4yu1 ni42 ri4ndi4lu14u3 ni42 ri4ta'4yu1ñu'4u4ka1a3,mi4i4xa4xi24ta1,ta1mu4sa2 en4i4ndu'3u4ñu3u2ndi4lu14u3 ni42 ri4ta'4yu1i4ndu'3u4ka1a3tan3ku4ni2 yu1ndi4
ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in(4) an4tan3ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4ta1kan4na4ki3xi3 ra3,tan3na4ki3xi3 na2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ko3ndo'3o3 na2ji'4in4i3su2ka1a3a1chi1ndi4,ya1kan3,ndo'4o4 ni42 yu1ji'4in4 ri4",ka4chi2ta1kwa1on4so'3o3.
Ju13ta'3an2 ra1ta1kan4ndi4chi2ta1kan4pa4chi'4i2so'3o3ti4ta1kan4ndi4chi2 ra1ja1ta4yu1u4,ta1ja1ya'4a13kwa'1an1ku4u4 ra2tan3tu4tu24 a2ku4u4ya1kan4xo14kwi1in1 ra1xi4to3 ra3,
su3ña1a4ba3ndi4chi2ta1kwa1on4chi1,"¿Nda4a(2) e2ku4ni2 un4ya1kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,tu4tu24tu(3) un4nu14u(3) 2?",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Yo'4o4ki3xi(3) un4sa3kan4ndi4ka'1an1 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4i4yo2lu3chi'4i(2) a2ka'1an1 yu1ji"'4in(4) un4ndi4
yo'4o1ndi4xa'4ni2(4) un4 ri4,sa3kan4ku4u4xa'4ni24ka1 ra1 ri4sa3kan4ku4u4ndi4ba14ja4xi4in4ka1 ri4ku3u2 ri4ndi4nda143ki'4in4ti4 ri4ka3a2tan3xi4nu3 ri4kwa'1an1ba3 ri4.
Nda143ki'4in4ti4 ri4ka3a2tan3xi4nu3 ri4kwa'1an1ba3 ri4ko14o3ka1 ri4xa'4ni24 ra2,tan3ña4si'4i2 ra1ndi4ña4ja1ni1ki'1bi3ba'1a3ku4u4ba(3) en4kan4ji'4in4ta1i4yo2ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4xi4ka3xi4ka3 ra2tan3i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Ya1kan3,ki'4in4ti4 ri4ka3a2tan3kwa'1an1ba3 ri4ba14ja4xi4in4ka1 ri4ku3u2 ri4"ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Tan3nda4a(2) e2,nda4a(2) e2i13xa3 ra2ki1bi4ni1ka'1an1ta1kwo1on4ji'4in4 ra2tin3,an4ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ña4ku4u4ña4i4ndu'3u4ji'4in4 ra2tan3
tan3nda13a3ka3 ra2 ña4tan3kwa'1an(1) en4ji'4in4ta1kwi4i24 ri4kan4tan3ja'1an1nda1ka3 ra2 na1jo13nda2a2 na1 ri4,ni1ndo'3o3 na2ji'4in4ti4tu1xu'4u2.
Ya1kan4i13xa3ba3 na3,ndi4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4ku4ni2 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ki3xi3i3in3ba'1yu1ji'4in(4) un4tan3ki3xi3i3in3te'1e4,ya1kan3,xa'4nu3ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2ta1kwa1on4kan4ji'4in4 ra2chi1.
"Tan3ki3xi3u1bi(1) a1ni4i4lu3te'4ni4ji'4in(4) un4,tan3ki3xi3candelaji'4in(4) un4ki3xi3i3ta2ji'4in(4) un4ku4ni2 yu1",ka4chi2ta1kan4ji'4in4 ra3.
Ya1kan4ndi4tan42i13xa3ta1nda13kwa3tu3i13xa3 ra2ndi4,"Tan3sa3kan4ndi4ka'4an(4) on4ndi4nda3ko1o(3) on4ya1yu14bi4ba'1a3tan3,
tan3ya1,na1ka'4an2 yu1xa'1a4ji'4in(4) un4ndi4su14u3na1ndo1o3ku4u4na1kan4ndi4na1ki3xi3ku4u4na1kan4ki3xi3nda3ka(3) on4 na3.
"Tan3ya1ku4u4ya1ka'4an2 yu1xa'1a4ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ya1ta3xi3na3ni2 un4ko3ndo(3) a2kan4ki3xi(3) a2ji'4in(4) un4tan3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,nda3ko1o(3) on4ya1yu14bi4ba'1a3".
"Ña4si'4i2 un4ndi4ko3nde3e4i3ni2 un4xa'1a(4) en4kan4na4ki3xi(3) an4ko3ndo'3o(3) an4ji'4in4ti4ka1a3a1chi1ndi4lu14u3 ni42 ri4ta'4yu1,tan3ya1ku4u4ya1ka'4an(2) e2xa'1a4ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ya1ki3xi3ba42kan4ji'4in(4) un4".
"Tan3xu'14un4ña1ka'3ni4tu3ku(3) un4 ri4ti4ki3xa3a4ka'3ni4xa14a(3) on4ndi4i4yo2 ni42ba3 ri4su14u3ti4ko14o3ku4u4 ri4i4yo2 ni42 ri4yo'4o4ndo3o3 ri4ñu'4u4ka1a3ba3,
tan3ndi4ba143xa'4a13yu'1u1ka'3ni(4) un4 ri4a1chi1ndi4ta'4yu1 ni42 ri4i4xa3ña4si'4i2 un4,ya1kan4ndi4ki'4in4ti4 ri4ka3a2tan3ba1xi3 ri4ba143xi'4i1ka1 ri4a1chi1ndi4sa3kan4i4xa(3) en4kan4ndi4i4ndu'3u(4) an4be'3e3tan3,
tan3ta1mu4sa2 en4ndi4sa4ka3xi(4) an4kan4 ra2mi4i4ba'1a3mi4i4ba'1a3ja4xi24 ra2tan3mi4i4ja13xi4 ra2lomu ri4ndi4ti4ta'4yu1lomuba3ti4ta'4yu1si'1in3ba3.
ti4ta'4yu1chi1yo4ba3,nda1nda4a2ka1xa13xi4ta1mu4sa2 en4kan4ta'4yu1sa4ka2 ri4chi2,ya1kan4ndi4sa3kan4ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4.
"Ku3nde3e4i3ni2 un4xa'1a4ña4si'4i2 un4e1ta4nda1ku4i3ni2sa4ka2 on4ji4ni2 un4 ña4ku4i3ni2sa4ka2 en4ji4ni2 an4yo'4o1,ku4i3ni2 lu(3) an4ji4ni2 an4 ra2chi1,ba143ku4nda3si(4) an4ji4ni2 an4 ra2su14u3e1ta4 e2ndi4i4yo2 an4ji'4in4i3nga2ta1a3tan3ku4nda3si(4) an4ji4ni2 an4 ra2ndi4nda3si4ba'1a3ku4i3ni2 an4 ra2ndi4
ku4i3ni2 lu(3) an4 ra2ya1sa3kan4ku4u4 ra2ta1ja'4ni24i3su2,ku4i3ni2sa4ka2 en4 ra2tan3,i3kan4ka4chi2 an4ta4u3ni2i4ndu'3u4ya3tin3sa3kan4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"ku3nde3e4i3ni2 un4xa'1a(4) en4na4ku'1un1ba(3) en4ji'4in4ta1ña1a4ta1mu4sa2 en4ña1a4na4tu2na4ka'4an2ta1kwa1on4ndi4na4ku'1un(1) an4ji'4in(4) un4,na4ku'1un1ba(3) en4ji'4in(4) un4".
"Na1si'4i2ndi4i4yo2ba3na1kan4",ka4chi2 an4ta4u3ni2ji'4in4 ra2chi1,xa'4a1(3) en4kan4nde3e4ji'4in4 ra3."na4tu2na4sa3kan4tan3ku'1un1ba(3) en4ji'4in(4) 2".
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1mu4sa2 en4kan4ndi4,"Ku'1un1 ndo4tan3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ki'1bi3 ndo4ku'1u1",
"u1bi1ta'4an2 ndo4ki'1bi3ku'1u1tan3yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ku3ndu'4u4nu14u3yu3ku4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku3ni2 o4na4ke14e4 ri4ka'3ni4 2ndi4ja1ya'4a13 ni42xi4ka(3) 2tan3ko14o3 ri4kwi4i4ka'3ni4 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
Ya1kan4ndi4tu'1un3ta1kwa1on4ba42ndi4na4ku'1un(1) an4tan3ndi3ki'3in3ta1kan4 ña4ko3nda2a(2) en4ti4ta'4yu1ndi4lu14u3 ni42ti4ta'4yu1i4xa3 na2ja4xi24 na2 ri4.
Ya1kan4ndi4kwa'1an(1) en4ji'4in4 ra3,nda13ka3ka3 ra2ña4si'4i2 ra1nda13ka3ka3 ra2ta1i4yo2ji'4in(4) an4nda13ka3ka3 ra2tan3kwa'1an1ba3 na3.
Xa1a1 na1kan4ndi4ka2i3in3ku'1u1kwi4i24,"Ta'3bi4ka1a3ta3an(4) on4 na2ni1nu1ka1a3ta3an(4) on4 na2tan3ki3xi(3) un4ku3ndu'4u(4) un4nda1i3tun2yo'4o4".
Ja143na1kan4kwa'1an1tan3nda'4yu1nda'4yu1 na1kwa'1an1 na1ku13ta4xin24tan3i3kan4ja143ndi4,"Ku'1un(1) un4lu3lu3ña1a4ti4ña1a4ku3ta'3an2 on4ti4ka'3ni(4) un4tan3ku1nu'1u4ba3yo'4o1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ta1kan4".
Ya1kan4ndi4ni1ki'1bi3na1kan4ka'3a4ku'1u1ni1nu1ndi4kwa4a4 lu3 na2,ta1mu4sa2 en4tan3ña4si'4i2 ra1ndi4kwa4a4 lu3 na2ba1xi3 na2,kwa4a4 na2sa3kan4kwa4a4 na2sa3kan4tan3ku13ta4xin24ba3chi2.
Ku13ta4xin24xa143xi4in1ba3na1kan4ñu'4u4 na2ta'3bi4kan4ba3na1kan4,ta1kan4ndi4i4ndu'3u4ba3 ra2nu14u3yu3ku4.
Ni1ku3ta4xin24tan3ni1ku3ta4xin24na'3a4ndi4na'3a4nda1ko14o3nda4ka'3an4sa3kan4xa143kwa4a4tu3ku3 na3.
A3ma3ndi4na1i13xa3ki3ni3ba3ku4u4 na2ji'4in4ta'4an4 na2ta1kan4ndi4ji14ni2bi4ta1kan4ndi4nu14u3ku'1u1ba3i4ndu'3u4ta1kan4.
I1xa14a3kwa4a4 na2ku4u4ba1xi3 na2tan3ta4xin24i4ndu'3u4 ra2ko14o3 ri4ni4ke3e3,ni1ku3ta4xin24ba3.
Kwa4a4kwa4a4ka1 na1sa3kan4ku4u4ku13ta4xin24ba3i3kan4ja143ni1ke3e3 ra2ja'1an1 ra1mi4i4ka'4an2ta1kan4ji'4in4 ra2ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1ko1to1 ra1ka4nda2a2ña1a4,ña1a4ndi4chi2i3su2ndi4ka'4nu3 lu3 ri4.
Ka'13ndi2tan3kwa'1an1ti4kan4ñu'3u4ti4kan4,ndi13ki'3in3 ra2 ri4tan3kwa'1an1 ri4ji'4in4ba3 ra3,"I3nda14 ri4sa3kan4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4be1e3 ni42 ri4",ka4chi2ta1kan4ji'4in4 ra3,ta1kwa1on4ji'4in4 ra3,nda14yu3ba'1a3ta1kan4 ra2ndi4,"Ti4ka'4nu3ka'4nu3ki3ta'4ni(3) 2ka'3ni(4) un4".
"Ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4na4tu2na4nda13kwa'1a(3) on4 na2nda'3a4 2",ya1kan4ndi4ti4ka'4nu3ka'4nu3nda13kwa'1a3ta1kwa1on4nda'3a4ta1kan4ndi4ka'4nu3 lu3i3su2.
Xa1a1ti4 ra2mi4i4ka'4an2ta1kan4ji'4in4 ra2tan3ña1a4ni1ki3ta3ba3ti4ña1a4ndi4nda143nda4ba3nda4ba3ti4 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4,ni3ba143nde3e4ndi4kwe4e2ti4ke13ta3ti4ña1a4kwa'1an1 ri4tan3ju13ndi3chi2 ra1ka'13ndi2kwa'1an1ti4kan4ñu'3u4.
Xa1a1 ra1tan3ni1ku'3ni2 ra1ti4ña1a4tan3kwa'1an1 ri4ji'4in4ba3 ra3,nda13xa2a2 ra1be'3e3ni1kwa3a4i13xa3ba'1a3 ra2ti4ña1a4i13xa3yo'3o4 ra2 ri4.
Chi13kwi3in3 ra2ku3ñu2nda143kwa'4a1ti4i4in4ku3ñu2ni1ki4tu3is1ta1an1ni1xa1a1ba(3) en4ta4u3ni2i4ndu'3u4ya3tin3kan4ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"¿an4ko14o3ña4si'4i2 un4ni4ki3xa2a2bi4ji'4in(4) un4yu3ba4 2?",ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra3."Ko14o(3) an4ni4ki3xa2a2ji'4in(4) 2na4na2".
"Ko14o(3) an4ni4ki3xa2a2ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ku'1u1kwa'1an1 na1tan3,ba143ni4xi3in3 ra2nda3tu'4un4 ra2xa'1a(4) en4,ku'1u1kan4ni1ta3an4 2 na1kwa'1an1 na1,ya1kan3,ta3ba4 na2i3su2tan3ko14o3ka1 na1ni4ke3e3nu14u(3) 2".
"Ndi4ni3ko14o3mi4i4ji4ni2 o4mi4i4ba42kwa'1an1 na1ndi4ba3ndi13kwi3so3ta'4an4 na2kwa'1an1ba3 na2tu4u2 yu1ndi4ba3ni3,ko14o(3) a2ni4i3xa(3) 2ji'4in4 na2ndi4na1kwa'1an1ku'1u1ku4u4 na2ji'4in(4) 2ka4chi2 ra1,tan3ko14o3 na2ni4ji3ni2ka1 yu1".
Sa3kan4ka4chi2 an4ta4u3ni2kan4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Na1kan4ndi4ndi13kwi3so3ta'4an4na1kan4tan3kwa'1an1ba3na1kan4yu3ba4 2,kwa'1an1ba3na1kan4".
"Mu4sa2ba(3) en4kan4ku4u4ta1kan4su14u3nda4a2ta1ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4ta1i4yo2ku4tu24ji'4in4ba(3) en4ku4u4ta1kan4ji14ni2yo'4o1ndi4ndu3bi4ñu3u42ndu3bi4ñu3u42xi4ka(3) on4ku'1u1tan3
ndo4o13ta1kan4ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ndu3bi4nde4e4 na2ki4xin1ba3 na2,yo'4o1ndi4nda4a2o4ra2ku4u4bi4 a2ja1ku4xa'1a1ki4xa2a(2) on4,na1ki4xin1ndu3bi4ba3ku4u4na1ña1a4nde4e4 na2ji'4in4ta'4an4 na2",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3chi2.
"Ñu'3u2ja'1an1ki'1in3 2be'3e(3) on4tan3ja'1an1ko1to(1) e4ndi4nde3e4 ni42i4yo2chi3ñu3ni1xa'1an1 yu1",ka4chi2 an4ta4u3ni2ji'4in4 ra3.
"Ba'1a3ndi4kwa'1an1ba3 ra2ji'4in(4) an4yu3ba4 2na4ku'1un1mi3i4 ra2ji'4in(4) an4,i4yo2i3in3sia14ni3yu'1u1ña'3a4ja1xi4nu13ban4kan4".
"Ña4kan4nda3kwa'1a3 2nda'3a(4) on4ku3ndu'4u(4) an4ji'4in(4) un4a3sa3ma1ni(4) an4yo'4o1,ña4kan4ndi4a3sa3ma1ni4ba(3) en4kan4yo'4o1ndi4ko14o(3) a2,ko14o3mañata'4an2ku3ni2 an4kan4".
"Tan3ko1to1ndu14ku4ka1 on4ta1a3,ya1kan3,kwi3i4i3su2ji'4in(4) un4na4tu2ni1ki3xa2a2 ri4ndi4a3sa3ba'1a3mi3i4ba(3) e4ti4kan4",ka4chi2 an4ta4u3ni2ji'4in4 ra2chi1.
Tan3¿an4nda13ki'3in3 ra2se'1e(3) an4ta4u3ni2i4yo2ya3tin3,sia14ni(3) an4ta4u3ni2i4yo2ya3tin3ji'4in4 ra2?
A1be3,sia14ni(3) an4kan4ja14nda3kwa'1a(3) en4nda'3a4 ra2chi1,sia14ni(3) an4ta4u3ni2i4yo2ya3tin3ji'4in4 ra2kan4nda13kwa'1a(3) en4nda'3a4 ra3.
Ni1ki4tu3ni1ki3xa2a(2) en4kan4ja'1an1ki'1in(3) an4ñu'3u2be'3e3 ra2tan3nda'4bi2sa4ka2ka4a4i4ndu'3u4 ra2ndi4ko14o3i4yo2ni3ko14o3ta4xin24ka4a4.
Ta4xin24ka4a4,ya1kan4ndi4ni1ke3e3ba3ña4kan4tan3ja'1an1ndi1ki'1in(3) an4sia14ni(3) an4tan3nda13kwa'1a(3) en4nda'3a4 ra3.
Nda1sa3kan4nda13ta3ku2be'3e3 ra2ña1a4nda13ko1o3ba(3) en4ta4u3ni2kan4ji'4in4 na3,nda4a2 en4sia14ni(3) an4ji'4in4 ra2,nde4e4 na3.
"Ka14ka3i3ni2 un4yu3ba4 2na4kwa'1an(1) on4ku'1u1tan3yo'4o4ndo1o3ba3yu'1u1ji'4in4sia14ni(3) 2ko3to3kwe4nda(2) e2 ña4,kwa'4an2ba3yo'4o1nde3nu'3u3i3ni2 un4ku'1un(1) un4ndi4ko14o(3) a2i4yo2bi4ndi4sia14ni(3) 2ndi4ña4lu3u3ban4ka1a3",ka4chi2 an4.
I3kan4nda13kwa'1a(3) en4sia14ni(3) an4nda'3a4 ra3,i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ña4ta4u3ni2kan4ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,ku4ni2 yu1na4na2a3sa3na3ni2 un4 lu3sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,
nu14u3ta1xa'4a13i3su2nda'3a4 2ka1a3ku'1un1 yu1nda3ku3ta'4an(4) 2ji'4in4 ra2tan3ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) 2ndi4na4ndu3ku4 2i3in3ba'1yu1ku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2tan3ndu3ku4 2,ya1kan3,
lu3te'4ni4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2tan3ndu3ku4 2i3in3te'1e4ndi1ku1nu4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2tan3ndu3ku4 2u'1un1cajacigarruku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2,
ndu3ku4 2i3in3u'1un1candelaku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2,tun4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) 2".
"Tan3ndu3ku4 2u1bi1i3ta2yo'3o4a3sa3ba'1a3 2ku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2ku3nde3e3i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) 2ya1kan4ndi4
ta3xi3na3ni2 un4 lu3tan3ku'1un1 yu1"ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ta4u3ni2."Ba'1a3ba3",ka4chi2 an4.I3kan4ndu13ku(4) an4tiu1un4,ndu13ku(4) an4,ya1kan3,candela,ndu13ku(4) an4lu3te'4ni4,
ni1ti3in(3) an4i3ta2yo'3o4ni1ti3in(3) an4,tan3kwa'1an1ba3 ra2i1nda43,nda143ta3ka2ti4ka4a4 ra2ndi13kwi3so3 ra2lu3te'4ni4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2te'1e4ndi1ku1nu4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2.
cigarruka1ni1ja3ta4 na2kwa'1an1ji'4in4 ra2,ya1kan3,tiu1un4tin3nu13mi3nda3a2 ra1tan3kwa'1an1ba3 ra2chi1,ni1xa1a1 ra1mi4i4ba42ndi4chi2ta1nda4tu3ña'3a4kan4.
Ni1xa1a1 ra1ji4to3 ra2yo'4o4ji4to3 ra2kan4ni3ko14o3i4yo2chi1,na4ku'1un1nu14u3 ra2ndo3ko3to3 ra2ndi4i3nga2ta'4bi4kan4ba3ndi4chi2ta1kan4.
"Nda4a2,nda4a2xi4ka(3) on4amigunda4a2xi4ka(3) on4yo'4o4ki3xi(3) un4yo'4o4i4ndu'3u4yu'1u1",ka4chi2 ra1,ja143ka13na3 ra2ta1kan4.
Nda143ta3ka2ti4ka4a4 ra2ndi4so3 ra2ki13xa2a2 ra1ndi4yo'4o4ka4a4te'1e4ndi1ku1nu4ni'4i4 ra3,tiu1un4che4e13ka'4nu3 lu3nu4mi3nda3a2 ra1kwa'1an1 ra1.
Lu3te'4ni4ndi4i3in(3) a2,i3in(3) a2ya1kan3,i3in3bote lu3ndi4so3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,kwa'1an1ya1kan3,candelakwa'1an1
candelakwa4chi3kwa'1an1candelando3o3kwa'1an1,nda143tan42ka4a4ta1kwa'1an1nu14u3sa1bi4ti4ka4a4 ra2ndi4so3 lu3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
Ni1xa1a1 ra1ña1a4su3ña1a4ndi4chi2ta1ña1a4i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,¿nda4a(2) e2ka4a4tin3,an4ni1ke3ba'1a(3) on4?
"Ni1ki'3in(3) 2ña'3a4ndi4ña4kan4ndi4ña4a3sa3ma1ni4yu'1u1ban4ka4chi2 an4ta4u3ni2"."An3ba'1a3ndi4ndi13ki'3in(3) un4 ña4,a1su3yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ja'1an1sa14ka'1an1i3ni2ba(3) en4ta4u3ni2kan4ndi4nda3kwa'1a(3) en4ña4kan4nda'3a(4) on4",ka4chi2 ra1,ka4chi2ta1kwa1on4ji'4in4 ra2,chi1.
"Tan3bi3tin3ndi4,¿an4ba1xi3 a2nda4tu'4un(4) e4xa'1a4ji'4in(4) un4?"."Ba1xi3ba(3) e2ji'4in(4) 2",ka4chi2 ra1,"Su3u3ba42yo'4o4ba3".Nda143ta3ka2ka4a4 ra2ndi4so3 ra2tiu1un4ndi4so3 ra2te'1e4ndi4so3 ra2,
lu3te'4ni4ndi4so3 ra2ka3nde4la2ndi4so3 ra2i3ta2ndi4so3 ra2ni1xa1a1 ra1nu14u3ta1kan4."Ya1kan3,yo'4o4chi3nde3e(3) on4 a3,ña1a4chi3nde3e(3) on4 a2bi3tin3sa3kan4ko3to(3) 2sa1a3ko3o(3) a2",ka4chi2 ra1.
¿Tan3nda4a(2) e2i13xa3ta1ko4ndo3ta1kwo1on4kan4ji'4in4ya1ku4u4ya1ña'1a3ndu13ku4 ra2kwa'1an1ji'4in4 ra2kan4?
ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4i3kan4na4ko3nde3e(3) a2ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4tan3,tan3ya1ja13xi4ta1kan4ba42chi1.
I3kan4ki'13in3 ra(2) e2chi13nde3e3 ra2kan4tan3i1xa14a3,"Bi3tin3ndi4ku4nu24ku4nu24ba'1yu1yo'4o4ka3xi4 2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku3ndi3kun2nda1tan42i4yo(2) a2",ka4chi2 ra1.
I3kan4ni1ji14ta3ba3 ra2tiu1un4ja13xi4 ra2 ri4,ji4to3ji'4in4nu14u3ta1kan4,"Kwa14yu'3bi2 un4ndi4ti4ka3xi4yu'1u1ku4u4 ri4ndi4ti4yo'4o4ku4u4ti4ni1ka'1an(1) e1xa'1a4ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ya1kan4ndi4ja13xi4ba3ta1kwa1on4kan4ya1tiu1un4kan4,ja13xi4ndi'3i3 ra(2) e2,ji4to3ji'4in4nu14u3ta1kan4i4ndu'3u4 ra2ndi'13i(3) a2ja13xi4 ra2,ni1ki'3in3 ra2lu3te'4ni4kan4nda13i3so3 ra2xi'13i3 ra2ba'1a3,ki'13in3 ra2ja13ndi3chi2 ra1kan4.
Tu3ku3sa3kan4nda13i3so3 ra2xi'13i3 ra2ja14ndi'3i3ba3 ra(2) e2kan4,ji14ta3ba3 ra2te'1e4ndi1ku1nu4tan3xa143ba3ndi4cha4chi3ndi1ku1nu4tan3kwa'1an1ba(3) e3,tan3kwa'1an1ba(3) e3,xa13xi4 ra2ndi1ku1nu4.
Ni1ji14ta3 ra2candelatan3xa'1nu1 ra1 run4tan3ja143xa4xi24ba3 ra3,tan42ta1xa13xi4,ya1kan3,ya'3mi2ti4ndi4
sa14kwa3chi3sa14kwa3chi3 ra2candelatan3ja13xi4ndi'3i3 ra2chi1,i3ta2yo'3o4kan4ndi4sa3kan4ka4a4mbo3ta3ki'13in3 ra2ka13xa'4ni3 ra2yu'3u4ja13xi4 ra(2) e2kan4chi2.
Su14u(3) a2ni4ju3ku'1un3su1kun4 ra2su14u(3) a2ni4ta'3ni3 ra2ba42ndi4ya1xa13xi4 ra2ku4u4ndi'3i(3) a2chi1,ndi1ku1nu4ba42,
candelaku4u4 run4tiu1un4ndi4ji'3na3bi4ti4kan4ja13xi4 ra2tan3xi'13i3 ra2lu3te'4ni4i3kan4ja143ni1ta1bi1 ra1ja13xi4ndi'3i3ba3 ra(2) e2ndi'13i3ndo3o(3) a2ja13xi4 ra2,"Bi3tin3ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3tin3".
"Kwa'4an2 on4ndi4nda1nda4a2ka(1) e1ku4ni2 un4ndi4i4yo2ndi'3i(3) a2",ka4chi2 ra1,"Bi3tin3ndi4ni1ki3xi3ndo1o(3) e4nda1tian42ki1bi4ji'3na3,ba143ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4nda4a(2) e2ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4ndi4
ba'1a3ndi4ja1ka1a3ndi4ka2ña4si'4i2 un4na4ku4ni2ku3ni2 un4nu14u(3) an4i3kan4ndi4ka2 en4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2,"Ndi4ku14ya3tin(3) un4 ña4ndi4ko3to3ndi4kwa3ku(3) an4nu14u(3) un4"ka4chi2 ra1.
Ni1ja'1an1 ra1ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1chi1.
¿Tan3an4ni1ja'1an1 ra1ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1mi4i4ndi4ka2 en4ña4si'4i2 ra1ndo'4o(4) an4ji'4in4ti4,ti4tu4xu'14u2?
Ni1xa'1an1 ra1ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1chi1.Ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,"Ku'1un1ko1to(1) on4ku3ni2 un4sa1a3ka4a4ndo'4o4 na2ndi4
ndo'4o4 ni42na1kan4chi4tu4 na2i3kan4ndi4su14u3kwa1chi3yo'4o1ba42ndi4kwa1chi3mi3i4ba3 na2ba42",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
Ke13e3 ra2ni1xa'1an1ko1to1 ra1i3in3pozopozoka4a4ndi4tan42ka4a4chiqueruka4a(4) e2ñu'4u4i3su2ndi4lu14u3 ri4i1nda43,i3in3ku4nu3ku4nu3kwa'1an1ji1ni4ti4ta'4yu1.
"Ti4ta'4yu1ku4u4ndi'3i3ti4ka1a3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2,"Ti4ka1a3ku4u4ti4xa'13ni(4) un4tan3bi3tin3ndi4ta'4yu1 ni42 ri4".
"Ya1kan4ndi4ku3ni2 un4ndi4ya1ka1a3ku4u4chiu3un3i13xa(3) en4yo'4o4tan3ya1ka1a3ba42ndo'4o(4) an4bi3tin3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
Ni14ku3ya3tin3 ra2ña4si'4i2 ra1chi1,i4ta'3nu3ba'1a3ndi4chi2 ra1tan3ji4to3ti4 ra2xi4ka(3) en4tan3xi4to3ti4 ra2xi4ka3ta1ndi4ki3ta'4an4ji'4in(4) an4ndi4
ña1a4xi4ka3 na2xa4ku'1un3i3su2kan4tan3,tan3ja4ta4tan4 na2 ri4chi2,ti4ju4ta4tan4ku4u4ti4ña1a4ñu'4u4 na2ña1a4.
Ya1kan4ba42xi1kan1ta'1bi4i3ni2 an4kan4ndi4ndo'4o4sa4ka2 en4ji'4in4i3su2ta'4yu1.
Ña1a4ni1ji3ni2ti4 ra2ndi4ña1a4chi4tu4 na2,"Bi3tin3ndi4ja1ba'1a3ndi4ji13ni2 un4ndi4ka1a3ñu'4u4 na3,tan3na4ku'1un(1) o4".
I3kan4nda13ka3ka3 ra2 na1,nda13ka3ka3 ra2ta1kan4tan3kwa'1an1ba3 na3,ja'1an1ko1to1ti4 ra2nu14u3na1kan4ndi4i3kan4chi4tu4 na2tan3kwa'1an1ba3 ra3.
Ni1xa1a1 ra1i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,"Bi3tin3tin3,nda4a(2) e2ku4ni2 un4tin3,an4ti1chi4ku4ni2 un4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4,an4ya1kan3,i3su2ku4ni2 un4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4".
"An4ñu1ñu4ku4ni2 un4ta'3bi(4) un4ndi4ka1a3ndi4chi2ñu1ñu4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4,"Ka1a3nde4ta3,ñu1ñu4ku4u4ndi'3i3ti4chi4tu4yo'4o4",ka4chi2 ra1.
"Tan3ka1a3tu3ku3ñu'4u4ti1chi4yu1u4xa'1a1i4ndu'3u4ka1a3ndi4ti1chi4ku4u4ndi'3i3 ri4ñu'4u4ka1a3,i3kan4tu3ku3ndi4ja1i3su2ba'1a3ku4u4ti4chi4tu4kan4ba143ta'4yu1ti4kan4ti4ba'1a3ku4u4ti4kan4,yo'4o4ti4ba3ñu'4u4ti4ta'4yu1ndo'4o4na1yo'4o4ji'4in4".
"Ndi4ja1kwa'1a4 ri4sa4nda'3a2 na1tan3ke4e4 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4tan3nda143ti4ta'4yu1 ni42ka1ku4u4ti4ñu'4u4 na2ji'4in4ka1a3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2,"Ja1sa4nda'3a2 ni42 na1 ri4",ka4chi2ta1kwa1on4so'3o3.
"An3ba'1a3na4tu2sa3kan4,ya1kan3,ti4ku4ni2 yu1ku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2ndi4i3su2ku4u4ti4ku4ni2 yu1ku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2".
"Kwa'4an2 on4i3tun2ña1a4,ña1a4ndi4ka2i3nda14ti4ka'4nu3ka'3ni(4) un4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4,ko1to1ka'14ni(4) un4ti4ba4li4ndi4na4ndo1o3ti4kan4ti4ka'4nu3ti4kan4ka'3ni(4) un4ndi4ti4kan4ku4u4ti4xu13xa3".
Ke13ta3ti4 ra2i3tun2ña1a4ña1a4ndi4chi2ba(3) e2i3su2,ka'13ndi2tan3kwa'1an(1) e1ñu'3u4.
Nu4chi'4i2ti4tan3ni1ke3ba'1a3 ra2ndi1ku1nda42chi1su14u3ki1bi4ndi4ta1ji'4in4ja1na1 ri4nda4kwa'1a3,nda4kwa'1a3 ra2ti4kan4nda'3a4ta1kan4.
Ke4ba'1a3sa4ka2 ra1ndi4ta1ji'4in4ja1na1 ri4ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4,i1xa14a3ni1xa3xi4ta1kan4tiu1un4ndi4ta1ba'1a3sa4ka2ku4ni2ba3ku4u4ta1ña1a4ndi4ke13ba'1a3sa4ka2 ra1chi1.
"Nda4a2ki1bi4ku4ni2 un4ki3xi(3) un4ndi4ya1i4yo2ku4u4ba(3) e2nu14u3yo'4o1ya1ku4ni2 un4ku3xi(3) un4,ti1chi4ku4u4 ri4ku4ni2 un4,ñu1ñu4ku4ni2 un4,
i3su2ku4ni2 un4ndi4i4yo2ndi'3i(3) a2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2,"Ya3kwin4tu3ku4ni2 un4ndi4ka1a3i4yo2mi4i4ñu'4u4ya3kwin4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2,na'4a1nda'3a4 ra2,"I3kan4ñu'4u4ya3kwin4ka1a3ñu'4u4ti4ti1chi4,i3kan4tu3ku3ndi4ni3na3ñu1ñu4ku4u4ti4nde4ta3nu14u3ku'1u1kan4",ka4chi2 ra1.
"A1su3na4tu2ku4ni2 un4 ri4tan3ka1a3ti4ki3xi(3) un4ndi4i4yo2 ni42ba(3) e3".
Sa3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4 ra2xi4ka3 ra2tan3sa3kan4ku4u4ja143ka4chi2ta1,ta1kwo1on4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Ki3xi3ya4cha2ji'4in(4) un4,
ki3xi3ya4cha2ji'4in(4) un4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ta'3bi4 lu(3) 2ñu1ñu4ko'3o(3) 2ndi4ku4ni2ko'3o3sa4ka2 yu1ñu1ñu4tan3ba14ja4kwi4i4ko'3o(3) 2 ya1ndi4ko14o3ya4cha2 yu1",ka4chi2ta1kan4ji'4in4 ra3."Na4tu2sa3kan4tan3ki3xi(3) a2ji'4in(4) 2".
I13xa3amiguba'1a3ba3 na2ji'4in4ta1,ji'4in4ta1kwo1on4i1nda43,i3kan4ja143ni1ja1nu'1u4 ra2tan3nda13xa2a2 ra1nda13kin2 ra1ya4cha2nda13kin2 ra1ya4cha2tan3ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,
kwa'1an1i3in3tia'3a2xa3ku4ji'4in4 ra3,ku'3un3ñu1ñu4ku'1un1ji'4in4 ra2ko'3o3ña4,ña4i4ndu'3u4ji'4in4 ra3.
Ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4i3kan4ja143ka4chi2ta1,ta1kwo1on4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Si4ki3na'3a2 on4 lu3ya4cha2na4ka'3nda(2) e2tun4ka1a3,ya1kan3,ko'3o3 lu(3) 2ñu1ñu4ndi'3i3sa3kan4ku'1un(1) a1ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4."Ba'1a3ba3".
¿An4mi3i4ba3ta1,ta1kwo1on4ku4u4ta1ta'13bi4ñu1ñu4ni1xi'3i3 ra2an4ko14o3,ya1kan3,
ta1ku4u4ta1ko4ndo3ta1xi4ka3ku'1u1kan4ku4u4ta1ta'13bi4ñu1ñu4tan3i3kan4ni1xi'3i3ta1,ta1kwo1on4?
Mi3i4ta1kwo1on4ku4u4ta1ta'13bi4ñu1ñu4ya1nu14u3,mi3i4ta1kwo1on4ku4u4ta1ta'13bi4ñu1ñu4ba143ni4ta'3bi4ta1kan4 e2ndi4ta1kwo1on4ku4u4ta1ta'13bi4 a3.
"Si4ki3na'3a2 on4 lu3ya4cha2na4ta'3bi4 lu(3) 2ñu1ñu4ko'3o(3) 2tan3ndi'3i3sa3kan4ndi4ku1nu'1u4 a2ji'4in(4) un4a1chi1ndi4ku4ni2ko'3o3na3kwi42 yu(1) a1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ya1kan4ndi4xi1ka3ba3ta1,ta1ya1kan3,xi4ka3ku'1u1kan4ta13xi3 ra2ya4cha2nda'3a4ta1kwa1on4.
Ti13in3ba3ta1kwa1on4ya4cha2ka13ni3 ra2xa'1a4i3tun4ka13ndi3ta3ti4 a2chi2,ti13in3 ra(2) e2tan3ka13ni3ndi3chi2 ra1yu'3u4 a2nu14u3yu1u4,kwa1chi3sa4ka2ta1ka1a3ji'4in(4) o4ndi4ta'4bi4ndi'3i3 ra2yu'3u4ya4cha2yo4o4ka'4an4ta1kan4.
A3ma3ndi4su14u(3) a2ni4ta'1bi4yu'3u4ba42ndi4ya1nda13sa3ndi3ko4ba3ta1kan4ba42,ka13ni3 ra2xa'1a4 run4,ka13ni3 ra2ni1nu3ka13ni3 ra2ni1nu1nda1kan4ka13nde3ta3i3in3mbo3la3tiu1ba32kwa'1an(1) e1.
I3nga2u1bi(1) a1sa3kan4si1ki4 run4,u1bi1ti4 a2ti1xin3 run4u1bi(1) a1si1ki4 run4nde3e4 lu3nda'3a4ta1kwa1on4chi2,tan3su14u3ta1ka'4nu3ku4u4 ra2ndi4so'3o3ti4ka4a4 ra2chi1,nde3e4 lu3nda'3a4 ra2ndi4u1bi1ti4 a2ti1xin3 run4tan3
u1bi(1) a1si1ki4 run4ni1si1so1kwa'1an1 run4ñu'3u4ndi4nda143ni4ni3xi4ki4ti4ñu1ñu4ja1ta4 run4i4yo2 lu3ñu1ñu4i1nda43,ba143ta1ma4ñu1ñu4ndi4ti4nda4a2ta1kan4ku4u4 ri4chi2.
Ja1ji4ni2ba3ta1kan4nda4a2ti4ku4u4ti4chi4chi13ndi4ni1nda1ta4 run4kwa'1an1 run4ñu'3u4ndi4ye'4e1ye'4e1ti4nda4ka3a4ñu1ñu4ja1ta4 run4.
Xa1a1ta1kwo1on4tan3ni1ka3ni3 ra2ya4cha2mi4i4i4yo2yu'3u4ti13ku2 run4ña1a4nda13ndu1ba1 run4ndi4lu14u3ñu1ñu4i1nda43,ñu'4u4ti4ko4ndi'3i(3) a3.
Xa'1an1nda'3a4ta1kwo1on4xi14ta3 ra2tan3ja143xi'4i4 ra(3) e3,ni1xi'3i3 ra2ñu1ñu4kan4,ni1xi'3i3 ra2ñu1ñu4ni1xi'3i3 ra2ñu1ñu4sa14ndi'3i3ba3 ra2ñu1ñu4kan4xi'13i3 ra2chi1.
Nda4a2tu3ba42ke3e3tu(3) a2ku1nu'1u4ji'4in(4) o4ndi4ndi'13i3ba(3) e2xi'13i3ta1ka1a3ka'4an4ta1kwa'1an1ku'1u1kan4.
Ni'4i4 ra2tia'3a2ndi4tia'3a2bi4chi4ba42i4ndu'3u4,sa14ndi'3i3ba3ta1kan4 e2ndi4nda13kwe'3e2ndi'3i3 ra2ti1xin3i3tun4ña1a4ndi4ba'1a3 lu3xi'4i4ta1kwo1on4ñu1ñu4.
"I4chi1 ni42i3ni2 yu1amigundi'4i13i3ni2yo'4o1ku4u4yu'1u1ndi4ka1a3nde4ta3 ni4(2) a2ya1ke3e3ba42ko'3o(3) on4bi3tin3ba3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Mi3tu4nda24mi3i4 ra2xi'13i3ndi'3i3 ra2ñu1ñu4ndi4so'3o3so'3o3 lu3ka4a4ti1ko4o24ndi4ka2ti1xin3 run4ndi4i3in3nda13ndu3ba2ti4 ra2tan3ni1ja'1an1nda'3a4 ra2xi14ta3 ra2,
mbo3la3so'3o3ñu1ñu4ja'1an1nda'3a4 ra2cho'13ma4 ra2yu'3u4 ra2ni1xi'3i3ndi'3i3 ra(2) e2,ni1xi'3i3ndi'3i3 ra2ñu1ñu4kan4ni3ko14o3ka1ñu1ñu4i4yo2nda143i3tun4ni3na3ka4ndu'3u4ñu'3u4.
"Bi3tin3ndi4i3nga2tun4ndi4chi2kan4ka'3nda2 yu1tan3tun4kan4ko3ndo3 run4ku1nu'1u4 a2ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2 ra1.
Ke13ta3ba3 ra2xa'1an1 ra1ji'4in4ya4cha2u1bi(1) a1ti1xin3 run4u1bi(1) a1si1ki4 run4si1so1kwa'1an1tun4ña1a4ñu'3u4ndi4yo'4o4yo'4o4 lu3ka4a4ti1ko4o24ñu1ñu4nda143xa'1a1xa'1a1ti4ka4a4ja1ta4ñu1ñu4ndi4ka(2) e2ti1xin3 run4.
Ni1nda1ta4mi3i4 run4chi2,ka4ndu'3u4ti1ko4o24ndi'3i(3) a2ti1xin3 run4,nda143ña1a4ti4ki4tu'4un4 ra2ji'4in4ya4cha2tan3,tan3cho'4ma4 ra2yu'3u4 ra2chi1.
Nda143i3in3su3tun4so'3o3ti4tan3sa4ndi'3i3tu3ku3ba3 ra(2) e2ko'3o3 ra2tan3ni1xi14ta3 ra2i3in3mbo3la3tan3xa1xin3 ra2yu'3u4tia'3a2.
U1bi1mbo3la3kan4tin3xa1xin3 ra2tan3nda1i3in3ta'4nu1ja'1an1ndi3ko4 a2tu3ku3i3nga2ji14ta3 ra2xa1xin3 ra2chi13tu4ba3tia'3a2.
Chi13tu4tia'3a2,"Ko'3o(3) on4ñu1ñu4amiguko'3o(3) on4ndi4kwe4nda2 on4ku4u4ndi'3i(3) a2ka1a3tin3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,nda143i3in3so'3o3ba3ndi4ka2ñu1ñu4ti1xin3 run4.
Pa4chi'4i2bi4 a2ni1ki3nda2a2ta1kan4xi'13i3 ra2tan3ja1ku4ndu14xi2i3ni2 ra1kwa'1an1 ra1,ni1xi14ta3tu3ku3ba3ta1kwo1on4tan3cho'13ma4 ra2yu'3u4 ra2ndi4nda3si4ba'1a3xi'4i4 ra2i1nda43.
Xi'4i4 lu3 ra2ñu1ñu4ya1sa3kan4ba14ja4ta'4bi4 ra(2) e2ndi4nda4a2ti4 ra(2) e2chi1.
Sa1a3nda4a2ti4 ra(2) e2ba14ja4kwi4i4ta'1bi4 a2ndi4ko14o3ya4cha2chi1.
Sa1a3nda4a2ti4 ra(3) e2ba143kwi4i4ta'3bi4 ra(2) e2ko'3o3 ra3.
Ki1bi4ni1xa1a1ya4cha2ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4xi'13i3 lu3 ra2ñu1ñu4chi2.
Xi'13i3ndi'3i3 ra2ñu1ñu4ba143u'1bi1xi'4i4ta1ña1a4ñu1ñu4ndi4butaxi'13i3ndi'3i3 ra(2) e2ti1xin3i3nda14 run4kan4tu3ku3ba3 run4kan4ni1xi'3i3 ra(2) e2nda143lu3lu(3) a2ndo13ko3o4 ra2ndi13kwi3so3ta1kan4.
U1bi1ta'4an2mbo3la3xa1xin3 ra2yu'3u4tia'3a2chi13tu4ba3tia'3a2,lu14u3ñu1ñu4i1nda43,ba143ta1ma4ñu1ñu4ndi4i4yo2sa4ka(2) e2chi4chi13 lu3 ri4chi2.
Si13so3 na2ñu1ñu4tan3i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Na4ku4ni2 un4tan3ku'1un1,ya1kan3,ti1chi4ku4ni2 un4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4an4ya3kwin4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ja1i3su2ndi4ja1ku4ki3ni3i3ni2 un4xi4xi3 ni42 un4ti4kan4tu4u2 yu1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
"An4ti1chi4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4an4ya3kwin4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ka1a3ti4i4yo2sa4ka2 ri4,yu1u4xa'1a1ña1a4ku'1un1ko1to(1) on4na4ti1chi4ku4ni2 un4"."Ti1chi4ba3ku'1un1u1bi1 ri4ji'4in(4) 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3."Ba'1a3ba3".Ndi4ya1ka'4an2mi3i4ti4 ra2jo4ndo3chi2.
"Kwa'4an2 on4yu1u4xa'1a1ña1a4ña1a4ñu'4u4ti1chi4",ni1xa1a1 ra1yu1u4xa'1a1ndi4i3in3capandi4ka2ni1nu1so'3o3ndi4i3in3ni1ku3u3su'1ma4 ri4ndi4i4in4li4ngo4su'1ma4ti1chi4yu'3u4yu1u4chi2.
Tu3ku3capani1nu3so'3o3ndi4i4in4li4ngo4su'1ma4ti1chi4ndi4so'3o3so'3o3 lu3i4in4ti1chi4i1nda43,ndo3o3 lu3ti1chi4chi2,nda143güeru,güeruti4si1ki4 ri4i4in4.
Tu4mi3i4ñu'4u4 ri4i3in3ta'4nu1ta'4nu1so'3o3ti4 ri4ñu'4u4ti1xin3yu1u4tan3i3in3ta'4nu1 ri4nde4e4ndi4ka1i4chi3,ni1xa1a1 ra1ña1a4ja1na1ta1kan4ku4u4 ri4chi2.
Ta13ba4 ra2ti4kan4ja143ni1ta3ba4 ra2ti1chi4ta13ba4 ra2,u1bi1 ri4ja1ba'1a3ba'1a3so'3o3ti13in3 ra3.
Ja143ka4chi2ta1kan4ji'4in4 ra2,"Ko1to1ti14in(3) un4ti4ba4li4ndi4ti4xu13xa3ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4i4yo2 ni42 ri4ndi4kwa4chi3 ni42ka1 ri4ti4xu13xa3ñu'4u4ni1nu3kwi3so(3) on4tan3ti4ñu'4u4ni1nu1ndi4kwa4chi3 ni42ti4kan4".
I3in3ta'4nu1ta'4nu1so'3o3ti4 a2ti1chi4ñu'4u4ti1xin3yu1u4ndi4i4in4li4ngo4ndi'3i(3) a2ndi1ka3yu1u4kan4ba143ta1ma4ti1chi4i1nda43,i4yo2 lu3 ri4chi2.
Ti13in3 ra2ti4kan4tan3ta13ba4 ra2tu1chi32 ri4ta13an4 ra2ti1nda1a4tan3,"Na3ni2ti4ka1a3ba3ku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2ndi4be1e3na3kwi42 ri4",u1ni1ta'4an2ti1chi4ti13in3 ra3,ti1chi4 lu3chi2.
U1ni1 ri4kan4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1ba3 ra3,ndi13ki'3in3 ra2tia'3a2ñu1ñu4ka13ta3ni3 ra2xe'1e1 ra1tan3kwa'1an1ba3 ra3,tu1xi42ka13ta3ni3 ra2xe'1e1 ra1,ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
"An4ya3kwin4ku4ni2 un4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4ki3xi(3) un4ndi4ka1a3ti4i4yo2sa4ka2 ri4,yo'4o4xi4ka3ba3yu'1u1na4ni1ki3xa2a(2) on4ndi4yo'4o4xi4ka3ba3yu'1u1tan3sa3kan4ndi4ndu3ku3ta'4an4tu3ku(3) e4ka4chi2 ra1.
"Ba'1a3ba3ka4chi2ta1kan4",ndi13ki'3in3 ra2tu1xi42ndi13ki'3in3 ra2ti1chi4tan3kwa1nu'1u4ba3 ra2nda13xa2a2 ra1tan3ja143ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in(4) a2ta4u3ni2kan4ndi4,"Yo'4o4ki13xa2a2ti1chi4ji'4in(4) 2".
Ba143i4xa3ba'1a3sia14ni(3) an4kan4 ri4ndi4ña4ki4xin1ji'4in4ti4ba3 ra2ban4kan4chi2.
Mi3i4ba(3) en4ta4u3ni2i4xa3ba'1a3 ri4,mi3i(4) an4i4xa3ba'1a3i3su2mi3i(4) an4i4xa3ba'1a3ti1chi4ni1ki3xa2a2 ri4ji'4in4 ra3,xi13xi3 na2ti1chi4kan4.
Mi3i4ba(3) en4ta4u3ni2i4xa3ba'1a3 ri4.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1,ka4chi2ta1kwo1on4kan4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4ki3xa3a4xa14a(3) on4ka'3ni(4) un4 ri4ndi4
ko14o3ti4tu1xu'4u2ni3ko14o3ndi4ti4ku3u2ba'1a3ku4u4ndi'3i3 ri4tin3ndi4ja1ni1ke3e3ba3na1ka1a3ba1xi3 na2nda4a2 na1ti4ta'4yu1ka4chi2 ra1,ya1kan4ndi4ni3ba143tu4xu'14u2ka1 ri4ndi4ki'4in4 ri4ka3a2tan3xi'4i1ba3 ri4chi2,
"Tan3xu'14un4,ya1kan3,ña1,ya1ke3ta3ka'3a4ku3ñu2 ri4ya1,
ya1na4,ya1kan3,ya1xi14ko(3) on4ku4u4ku3ñu2 ri4ndi4ko1to1ka14xi4ja13ni1ku3 ndo4 a2ndi4ta3xi3kwa'4a4 ndo4 a2lu3u(3) a2ja3chiu4un4ji'4in(4) un4nda4a2ku4ma1ni4 a2ya'3a4ku4ma1ni4 a2i1in4ku4ma1ni4 a2nda4a(2) e2ba4li4so'3o3ku4ma1ni4 a2ji'4in(4) un4ndi4
na4ni1ndo1o3ka(1) e1ndi4ta3xi3kwa'4a(4) on4 a2",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4,ya1kan4ndi4ya1ndo4o13ka1tan3ta4xi3kwa'4a4ba3ta1kan4 e2,ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ta4u3ni2ta4xi3kwa'4a(4) en4 e2ndi4lu14u3xu'14un4,i4yo2 lu3xu'14un4 na2.
Ni1si4kwi1na1 na1xu'14un4ndi4lu14u3xu'14un4ndi4i4yo2sa4ka2xu'14un4 na3,ya1kan3,"Na4nda4a(2) e2i4yo2ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ja1i4yo2xu'14un4chi3nde3e4 a2yo'4o1ko3to(3) on4ndi4sa3ta(4) on4nda4a2ka(1) e1kwi3i3nda3xi4ko(3) on4".
"Sa3ta(4) on4,ya1kan3,ya'3a4ba3sa3ta(4) on4ti1na3na4ba3ja3ta(4) on4ti1ku3mi3an4nda4a2ka(1) e1i4yo2kwi3i3nda3xi4ko(3) on4sa3ta(4) on4 a2tan3
o4ra2nda3xi4ko(3) on4ndi4nu4u4ti4ko1yo3 na2ja3ta4ndi'3i3 na(2) e2ndi4yu'1u1ku4u4ta1sa4ka'1an1i3ni2 na1",ka4chi2ta1kwa1on4so'3o3chi2.Ta1ba'1a3sa4ka2ku4u4ta1kwo1on4chi2ta1.
Ya1kan4ndi4ta1kan4ku4u4ta1kwa'1an1nda4xi4ta3na1yu4bi24mi4i4ñu'4u4 na2tan3sa4ta24 na2nu14u3ta1kan4,lu14u3ña'1a3ja13ta4 ra2ba4a24so'3o3ti4ndi'4i(4) a3.

¿Tan3ti4ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4ko4ndo3ti3in4kan4tin3?

Tan3¿an4ko14o(3) a2ji4ni2ti1chi4na4ki'1bi3 ri4be'3e3?

A1be3.

"ka'14an1ka1 e4ji'4in4,ya1kan3,ma1xi1kwi4lu3tan3,tan3ku'1un(1) o4ndi4ku'1un1si4in4mi3i4ba3yo4o4",ka4chi2 na1na1kwa4chi3so'3o3ji'4in4ta'4an4 na3.
"Na4ka4chi2 ndo4ndi4ku'1un(1) o4tan3ku'1un(1) o4ya3ni2ndi4,ya1kan3,ku'1un(1) o4ta4tu2,ba'1a3ku'1un(1) o4".
Tan3su14u3na1ku'1un1ta4tu2ku4u4 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,ja1ji13ni2ba3 na2,ya1kan3,yo3o3ku4u4ta1ku4mi3i4ki3ni2.
I4yo2kwa'1a4ki3ni2i4xa3tan3ya1kan4ndi4ki3ni2ku'1un1xi3kwi'4na4 na2,ya1kan3,ki3xa2a2ku3xi3 na2ji'4in4,ji'4in4na1be'3e3mi3i4 na3.

"I3nda14 e2ka4na(3) 2yo'4o1señor,ka4na(3) 2yo'4o1yu3ba4 2ba1xi(3) un4ndi4,an4ko14nde3e4i3ni2 un4a3sa(3) on4 a2ndio4si2ji'4in(4) 2,
ku'1un(1) un4ku'1un1ndu3ku(4) un4pi3lo4kwa'3a3xa'1a4 2ndi4ta1ku'4u2ku4u(4) 2,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1ta4u3ni2CiriloGuadalupekan4.

i3in3 ra2,i3in3 ra2ji13ni2 yu1mi4i4ja'1an1 ndu1kan4ndi4che4e13 ra2tan3su4kun1 ra1",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4.
"¿Tan3yo3o3ku4u4ta1ni1xa'1an1ji'4in(4) un4?"."Ta1kan4ndi4,ta1kan4ndi4ka'4an2ba3 ra2sa1a3na3ni4ta1ta4u3ni2kan4.
Sa1a3tu3na3ni4ta1ta4u3ni2xa'1an1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Ndi4ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1ni1xa'1an1ji'4in(4) 2tan3,tan3ji13ni2,ji13ni2ta1kan4ta1kan4tan3,ta1kan4ni1xi3ni2ña'3a4tan3yu'1u1ndi4ni14ji3ni2 yu1 ra1".
"Yo'4o1ndi4ya1,ya1nde3e4i3ni2 un4ya1kan4ndi4ni1ndo'3o(3) on4sa3kan4,ni1ki'3in3 ra2i3ni2 un4,tan3bi3tin3ndi4,bi3tin3ndi4ti4yo'4o4ku4u4ti4kwa'3a3xa'1a(4) on4".

Tan3ya1ku1sun1 na1ba42ndi4a1su3,ya1kan4ba42ka4chi2na1ba1xi3ta'4bi4kan4ku4u4la'3mba4chi14cha2ran4.
¿An4sa3kan4ba3?

Ya1bi3ta4(2) e2ku4u(4) a2la'3mba4.

Ni1ki'3in(3) 2i3in3sien4tu2ta13xi(3) 2nda'3a4 ra3,ba'1a3 lu3ku4ni2ta1chi4ñu3,o4ra2ni1xi1yo3juntachi1ka4chi2 na1nda4tu'4un4 na2ji'4in(4) 2,ji14ni2bi4yu'1u1ya1kan4ni1ku3u3tan3ba1xi3ba3yu'1u1.

i3kan4tan3ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4 na2ka3chi2 o4ji'4in4 na2ndi4na4tu2kan4ndi4ndu3ku4 ndo4nu1ni4kwa4an2kan4ndi4ya1kan4ndi4ya1sa4i1chi1ba'1a3 ndo4ku4u4nu1ni4ta3ta2kwa4chi3kwa4an2,

"o4ra2xa1a1 yu1i3kan4ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3 e2xa1a1 yu1",ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4 na3,"Xa1a1 yu1tan3ndi3ko3na1si'4i2 ya1tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku3ni2 yu1sa1a3ko3o(3) a2",ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4 na3.
I3kan4tan3ndu4ku4ba3ti3kwa'4a2na1ma3to4mu2kan4 ya2tan3o4ra2ni1xa1a1 yu1kan4tan3ja1ñu'4u(4) a2xi4ko'3o4nde4ta(3) e3,sa1a3ko3o3ji'4in(4) a2yo'4o4ka4chi2 na1ji'4in(4) 2,
I3kan4ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4 na2ndi4so'3o3ndi3ko3 na(2) e4ndi4so'3o3,i3kan4ja143ndi4ko(3) 2 ya1tan3
ya1yo'4o4ko3ndo3prebasa4na'1a(1) e1ndo'4o1ndi3ko3 ndo4 a2ya1kan4ndi4na4ja1kan4ndi4so'3o3so'3o3ndi'3i3ta1bi1 ndo4 a2ndi14ko3ndi'1i1 ni42 ndo4 a2ndi4
ba4a24ba4a24ba4a24ti4sa4ya'1a3 ndo4 a2nu14u3yo14so3ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4 na3.
"Ya1ta'4bi14tan3kwa'1an(1) e1ndu4u4kwa'1an(1) e1ta'4bi14",ji'4in(4) a2ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4 na3,"Na4tu2sa3kan4ndi4sa3kan4ndi3ko3 ndu(2) a2ka4chi2 na1ji'4in(4) 2",i3kan4ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4 na2ndi4
I3kan4sa4na'1a(1) e1na1si'4i2kan4ndi3ko3 na(2) e2kan4tin3,i3kan4tan3ka4chi2so'3o3tu3 na2ndi4,ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4ta1,ta1ni1ja'1an1ndu3ku4yu'1u1kan4ndi4:
u'1un1ko3ndo3 run4ta1xin1ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3,u'1un1 run4ta1xin1ndi4maquilakan4ba42ta1xin1nda3ñu'4u4xa'1a4nu1ni4xe'1e1tan3,
tan3u1ni1 run4kan4ba42chi3ka2 e4ki1si3ndi4i3in3kwa3ti4yu2sa3ba3i3in3kwa3ti4yu2sa3ba3chi3ka2 e4ki1si3".
Ya1kan4ndi4ko3ndo3 run4u1ni1tan3i4yo2a3ma3ndi4nda4ñu'4u4 ni4(2) a2ndi4nda1maquilanu1ni4xe'1e1ka4na3ya1xe'1e1yu3chi4ya1kan4ndi4ya1kan4ndi4ya1ta3ba4si4in(4) o4ko3ndo(3) a2ya1xe'1e1ña1a4

nda3ta'3bi(4) o4 ya2tan3nda3ta3an(4) e4 e2nu14u3ta4ka1a3nda3ka3ta(3) e4 ya2ke3e3ta1kwi42tu1mi1ka'3a4 e2tan3sa3kan4ndi4
ta1kwi42kan4ndi4ja1ju13ndi3chi2ba3ta4kan4i13xa(3) e4ja1nda13ka3ta(3) e4ki1si3kan4nda13ka3ta(3) e4tan3ta13xi3na3ni2 o4ya3bi2ñu'3u4so'3o3ka3ta(3) e4ya3bi2ñu'3u4tan3
i3kan4tan3ndo3o3ki1si3kan4tan3ja143ku3ndi3chi(2) a2ya3bi2ñu'3u4tan3,i3kan4tan3ka'4an2 e4ji'4in4na1ma3to4mu2ndi4ta3an4 ndo4ta1kwi42ti1xin3 a2ndi4i3in3ta'4nu1ku3ndi3ka2ta1kwi42yu3bi2ti1xin3 a2ka3chi2 o4ji'4in4 na3.
I3kan4tan3ta3an4na1kan4ta1kwi42ku3ñu'3u3 ra4ti1xin3 a2chi3ka2 na(1) e1ya3bi2ñu'3u4tin3i3kan4tan3ja143ka3chi2 o4ji'4in4 na2ndi4

Ti1xin3ki1si3.

tan3ti4yo3ko2ndia'14na3kan4ndi4i4yo2si'4i2tan3i4yo2che4e13ji'4in4ti4kan4ndi4che4e13kan4ndi4ti4kwa'4a1yu'3u4ku4u4ti4kan4tan3si'4i2ndi4ti4,ti4ya'4a1tu14un3ndi3xa3ku4u4ti4kan4.

chi3ka2 e4ti4kan4nu14u3lu3te'4ni4tan3sa3kan4ndi4na4tu2na1be'3e(3) o4ku4u4 na2xi4to(3) e4sa1a3ka4a4chiu3un3i4xa3na1si'4i2ji'4in4 na2tan3ba14sa4kwe'1e1 na1ndi4
ti3in(3) o4ti4yo3ko2kan4tan3,tan3sa3kan4ndi4chi3ka2 e4 ri4nu14u3lu3te'4ni4i3kan4ku'1un1ki'1in(3) o4i3nga2ti4yo3ko2ndi13xi2.
Tan3sa3kan4ndi4chi3ka2 e4 ri4nu14u3lu3te'4ni4tan3ku'1un1ki'1in(3) o4yo3ko2ndi1xan4ku'1un1ki'1in(3) o4yo3ko2,yo3ko2ndu1xa'4a2,ku'1un1ki'1in(3) o4yo3ko2lu3tu3
ti4kan4ku4u4ti4ku'1un1nda3sa3i3in(3) o4tan3ta3an(4) e4 ri4nu14u3lu3te'4ni4tan3sa3kan4ndi4
ko'3o3na1be'3e(3) o4na4tu2ji4to(3) e4ndi4bi1xin3 ni42xi4ka(3) e2ji'4in4tu1ni4ni2ya1ji'4in(4) a2be'3e(3) a2ji'4in4ña4si'4i(2) a2.
Ta'4nda1chi3ñu3nu14u(3) a3.
A1be3,na4tu2i4ndu'3u4ti4 ra2tan3ki3xa2a2tu3mu4sa2 en4kan4tin3tan3ya1ba'1a3ni3ku4u4ba(3) e2ndi4ta1kan4ndi4ta1ja1sa14nu3u(3) an4ku4u4 ra2tan3sa14kan4ndi4,
Ta1ju13ta4tan4ku4u4 ra3.
nda3ndu3ku(4) e4mañaji'4in4 ra2ndi4ku3ta4tan4 ra2sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,nda3sa1a4 ra2tan3sa3kan4ba42ndi4ku3ni2 an4ndi4ta1i4yo2nda'3a4ku4u4 ra2,
ya1kan4ba42ba'1a3ti4yo3ko2ndia'14na3kan4ndi4i4yo2i3in3ta1tan4 ri4ya1kwi3i3a3sa3 ri4ji'4in4na1yu4bi24na1,na1ma4su2 ni42ba143kwe'1e1.
Na1ni1ju3ta4tan4ku4u4 na2ndi4,na1ni1ku3ma'3a4i3ni2ku4u4 na2ran4.
Na1ku13ma'3a4i3ni2ku4u4 na2ya1kan4ba42ndi4ti4kan4ku4u4ti4ko'3o3 na2ta1kwi42ka'3a4tan3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,nda3sa1a4 na2ji'4in4ti4yo3ko2ndia'14na3.
A1chi1ndi4yu'1u1ndi4nda13tu'4un4i3in3ta1ta4u3ni2kwen4tu2xa'1a4 ri4ndi4i3in3ta1a3ndi4ni1ti14bi3 ra2ndi4i4ndu'3u4 ra2tan3ki4xa2a2mu4sa2ña4si'4i2 ra1tan3
tan3ki1bi4ni1nda3ka3ya2 na1ti4yo3ko2ña1a4ji'4in4ti4yo3ko2ndia'14na3,ndi4ti4yo3ko2ndia'14na3ku4u4mi3i4ti4nu14u3nu14u3ja14nda3ba3 na2kwa'1an1tan3i3kan4ju13ndi3kun2ti4kwa4chi3kan4tan3
nda4a(2) e2ba42kan4ndi4sa3kan4ni3ku4u4 ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra2tan3ni1ki3xa2a2ba3ta1mu4sa2 en4kan4tan3ni14ki3xa2a2 ra1tan42ji'3na3ka1ndi4
ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1ndi4ja1i3tun4ba3su13ku4ña'3a4ta1kan4tan3ta13xi4ña'3a4ta1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1.
I3kan4ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ndi4nda4a2ba42ja'1an1ndi1ki'1in3 ra2i3ni2 ra1ya1kan4ndi4nda4sa1a4 ra2tan3ta1kan4ndi4ta1ja1ni1i3xa3ma4su2 an4ku4u4 ra2ka4chi2 an4so'3o3

tu3ku3mi3i(4) an4ni1ka3ni3 ra2tan3ni14xi3nu(3) an4ndi4ni1xa'1a3i3ni2 an4ju13ndu'4u(4) an4.

i3kan4ku3ta'3an2 e4 ri4nda4a2ka1ya3bi2ya3kwin4ba3nda4a2ka1ni1ta'1yu1i3tun4ba3tan3ni1ndo1o3ya3bi2 run4tan3i3kan4ñu'4u(4) a2ñu1ñu4,ñu1ñu4ñu'3u4kan4.

tan3ñu1ñu4ñu'3u4kan4ji'4in4ñu1ñu4pi3lo4kan4ndi4lu3chi'4i2ba4a24 lu3ba4ba4a24i3ya4ku4mi3i4 a2kan4.Ya1ñu1ñu4ti4pi3lo4ji'4in4ti4ñu1ñu4ñu'3u4kan4.
¿An4ta'4bi4 na2ñu1ñu4ñu'3u4kan4?
Ta'4bi4 na(2) e2tan3xa4ta3 na(2) e2mi4i4ti4ba42i4yo(2) a2tan3ndi4ko14o(3) a2kwa'1a4bi4ta4an24ti4kan4ndi4tan42ta4an24ti4ñu1ñu4ndu3chi4kan4ti4ba3ta4an24ti4kan4ya1ko4ndo3ñu1ñu4 ri4.
Tan3ni3ba14sa4kwe'1e1bi4 ri4ndi4ni3na4ta'3bi(4) o4 ri4tan3ni3ka14xi4 ri4yo4o4an4ko14o3,
ku3un3ndi'3i3 ri4xa'1a4i3xi4ji1ni(4) o4tan42ñu1ñu4ya'4a1bi4ndi4,tan3ñu1ñu4ya'4a1ndi4ya1kan4ndi4ya1kwe'1e1ba42kan4xa4xi24 a2tan3nda1xa'1a4i3xi4ji1ni(4) o4kwa1nde3e(3) a2kan4.

Yo4o4ke3e3ku'1un1be4ndo3ko3o(4) e4be'3e(3) o4ndo3ko3o(4) e4,kwi'1nu3xi1ndu'1ba1ti1xin3 a2,
ya1ku3ndi14i2ba42ku3ta4xin24ba42ran4,ya1kan4ba42ji4ni2 ri4na4tu2ni1ki'1bi3 ri4ti1xin3be'3e(3) o4ka4chi2 na1,na4tu2ñu3u2ba42tan3ni1ki'1bi3 ri4ti1xin3be'3e(3) o4ka4chi2 na1ndi4ti4i'4na4ku4u4 ri4chi2.
Ya1kan4ba42nda4tu'4un4 na2xa'1a4ti4,ti4ti1kwe4ku3,ti1kwe4ku3ndi4ti4ba'14a4ku4u4ti4kan4,ti4xa1tu1ku4u4 ri4ti4,ti4kwe'1e1ku4u4 ri4.
Tan3ti4i'4na4ku4u4 ri4na4tu2ni1ki'1bi3 ri4ti1xin3be'3e(3) o4,ba'1a3na4xa14ku'1u1ju13ta'3an2 e4 ri4ndi4ji4ni2ba(3) e4ndi4xa14ku'1u1ba42kan4,ndi4xa14ku'1u1ba42i4yo2ba3 ri4ran4,
a1chi1ndi4mi4i4i4yo2mi3i4 ri4ba42ran4,tan3ndi4na4tu2ni1ki'1bi3 ri4ti1xin3be'3e(3) o4ñu3u2ndi4ni3ba'14a4 ri4ka4chi2 na1.
Ndi4ka4chi2 ri4,nda4tu'4un4 ri4ji'4in(4) o4ndi4yo4o4ke3e3be4an4problemaku3mi3i(4) o4an4ko3o3nda4a(2) e2ba42ku3u3tan3ndi4,
ndi4ya1ndo3ko3o(4) e4ko3ndo3be'3e(3) o4tan3ke3e(3) o4tan3ku'1un(1) o4i1nda43,a1be3,ya1kan4ba42ji4ni2 na1,ya1kan4ba42ji4ni2 ri4chi2,ya1kan4ba42ndi4,
ya1kan4ku4u4kwen4tu2nda4tu'4un4 na2xa'1a4ti4ti1kwe4ku3ndi4ba'14a4 ri4na4tu2ni1ki'1bi3 ri4be'3e(3) o4ñu3u2chi1,ya1kan4ba42nda4tu'4un4 na2xa'1a4 ri4.
¿Sa1a3nu14u3 ri4i4yo2?
Tu4u2 yu1ndi4u1bi1nu14u3 ri4i4yo2tu4u2 yu1,i4yo2ti1kwe4ku3tu14un3tan3i4yo2ti1kwe4ku3kwa'4a1,u1bi1nu14u3ku4u4 ri4i4yo2tu4u2 yu1.
Ya1kan4ndi4ji14ni2 o4na4tu2ti4tu14un3na4ti4kwa'4a1ku4u4 ri4nda4tu'4un4 na2xa'1a4ti4,na4ni1ki'1bi3 ri4be'3e(3) o4ndi4ba3tu4u(2) i2ndi4ba3ndi3sa4u1bi1ba3 ri4tu4u2 yu1ndi4
a1chi1ndi4ti4,ti4kwe'1e1,in3ka4chi1kwe'1e1ba3 ri4ka4chi2 o4ran4,in3ka4chi1kwe'1e1ba3 ri4ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4na4ni1ki'1bi3 ri4ya1,ya1ki'1bi3 ri4ka'3a4mi'14i4kwa'1an1 ri4ndi4

Ki1bi4 2ndi4ConstantinoTeodorona3ni4 2.Cincuentaycincokwi1ya1 yu1.Ta1Yoloxóchitlku4u(4) 2.
Ya1na3ni4yu'1u1ndi4EstebanCastilloGarcía.I4yo2o1ko1u1xi1u1ni1kwi1ya1 yu1.Ni1ka3ku3yu'1u1Yoloxóchitl.
Bi3tin3ndi4nda3tu'4un(4) un4ji'4in4 ndu2xa'1a4ti4ko4ndo3sa3a2tu1ni4i2,

¿An4ba143ja4xi24na1kwa4chi3 ri4?
Ba'1a3 ri4chi2,ya1kan4ka'4an2ja3 na2ndi4ya1kan4ko4ndo3i3nga2ta1tan4ba'1a3 ri4ndi4kan4chi2.
Ka4chi2 na1ndi4an4ndi3xa3ba42ndi14xa3ba42ndi4,kwa4ñu3ndi3xa3ba3tu4u2 yu1ndi4i4yo2i3in3casosa3kan4
ya1kwi3i3nda3tu'4un(4) e4ndi4,i4yo2i3in3,ya1ko4ndo3ta1tan4ti4kan4ndi4kan4chi2,
ti4ba'1a3ji'4in4na1ta1tan1ku4u4 ri4chi2,ti4ba'1a3ji'4in4na1ta1tan1ba143kwi4i4ka'1an1ndi4ndo'4o4 na2ja1ka'1an1 na1ka'14an1 na1ku4u4tan3
ya1kan4ba'1a3 ri4kan4ya3tan3 ri4ka3xi4na1kan4ka4chi2na1ndi3xa3ku4u4 na3,tan3kwa4ñu3ndi3xa3ka4chi2 yu1tian42ka4chi2 yu1mi3tiu'4un4ndi4
i4yo2i3in3casondi4ya1,i3nda14ña'3a4,ña4xa3ku4ban4tiem4pu2kan4ndi4
ndo'4o4i3ni2 an4ba14sa4kwi4i4ka'1an(1) en4ndi4ku4u4ta1tan1yu'3u4ban4ba143kwi4i4ka'1an(1) en4,
tan3i4yo2i3in3ta1ni1xi3ko4pa1chi3ki3i3,ni1xi3ko4 ra2pa1chi3ki3i3ni1xa3xi(4) an4tan3,
tan3ni'4i14 ra2bolika3xi4 ra2tan3ta1kan4ndi4nda4ka3ya2 ra1pa1chi3ki3i3tan3ja4si4ki24ba3 ra2tan3ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:

na4chu3ba42ku4ni2na1kan4 ri4tan3,ta1kan4ndi4ti4in4 ra2 ri4tan3kwa'1an1nda1ka3 ra2 ri4nda'3a4 na3,ba143i4xi4ko3bi4 ra2 ri4na4ka3chi2 o4ndi4
ndi4ka4ni3ma1ni4ba3 na2 ra1 ri4,ka4ni3ma1ni4ba3 ra2,ba3 ra2 ri4 na2tan3
a1chi1ndi4ko14o3ya'1bi3bi4 ri4ndi4a1su3 a2ka3ka(3) e4nda3ka3ya2ba(3) e4 ri4nda'3a4i3tun4mi4i4ba42jo4nde1e3 ri4tan3,ndi4ka3ma2 ni42 ri4na4tu2
ni14ku3ka3ma2 e4ndi4nda13chi4 ri4kwa'1an1ba3 ri4,nda143tia14xa2ka'3a4 ri4ko'4ni3 ri4nu14u(3) e4tan3kwa'1an1ba3 ri4.

ti4,ya1kan3,xi4ka3,i4yo2a3ma3ndi4xi4ka3 ri4nu14u3ñu'3u4ba3chi3ñu3 ni42 ri4ka3ka3 ri4nda3ka3ya2 ri4yu1u4ba4li4,ti4nda4ka3ya2yu1u4ku4u4 ri4ndi3ku4ku2ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ri4.
Ti4kan4nda3tu'4un4lu3chi'4i2 un4kwen4tu2ji'4in4 ndu2xa'1a4chi2.
Ba'1a3ba3.Ya1nda4tu'4un(4) e4kwen4tu2xa'1a4ti4ka4chi2 o4ko4ndo3ndi3ku4ku2kan4ndi4ndi3xa3ku4u4ba(3) e2ndi4i4yo2 ri4xa14ku'1u1tan3i4yo2 ri4ñu3u2ba3,
ñu3u2ndi4a1su3tian42ku4u4nu14u3ye'14e(4) o4an4ko3o3nda4a2ba42mi4i4ya4nda3chi3ñu3 ni42 ri4ko1yo3 ri4.
An4yu1u4nda4ka3ya2 ri4an4ndi3kin4nda4a2ka1ndi3kin4ku'1u1kan4nda4ka3ya2 ri4ndi3kin4i3ta2ba42nda4ka3ya2 ri4ndi4
a1su3nu14u3ñu'3u4ku3ni2ba(3) e4 ri4,an4ya'1a3tu3 na2kwa'1an1 na1an4ko3o3na4tu2i3chi4nde4e4 ri4tan3ya'1a(3) e4kwa'1an(1) e4tan3
tan3ji13ni2 ri4ndi4ku4ya3tin(3) o4kwa'1an(1) e4nda13chi4 ri4,nda13chi4 ri4ndu13ko3nde3e3 ri4nu14u3i3tun4ya3tin3sa3kan4,ni1ya'1a(3) e4ku13xi4ka(3) e4kwa'1an(1) e4tu3ku3ba1xi3tu3ku3 ri4nu14u3ñu'3u4tu3ku3ba3,
ja1tu3ku3ja4xi24tu3ku3nda4ka3ya2tu3kwa3 ri4yu1u4ba42nda4a(2) e2ba42nda4ka3ya2 ri4ñu'3u4,ya1kan4ku4u4ya1ko4ndo3ti4ndi3ku4ku2kan4.

ti4kwa1nde3e3tu3ku4u4ti4kan4ba3,mi4i4i4yo2ta1kwi42an4na1kwa'1an1nda3kin2ku4u(4) e4tan3yu1ku1ka14ta4ka4chi2 o4kan4ñu'4u(4) a2,i4yo2pozotan3nda4kin2 o4tiem4pu2ya1ja4chi4ñu(3) e4ndi4
ji4ni2 un4ndi4yu3kun2nde4e4 ri4yu'3u4yu1ku1ka14ta4sa3kan4tan3,tan3xi'4i4 ri4ta1kwi42.
Ti4ba1xa1a1ku4u4ti4kan4ko'3o3 ri4ta1kwi42mi4i4ja4chi4ñu3yo4o4,a1chi1tan42ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndu'1be4nda4tu'4un(4) e4ndi4
ndi3sa4ku4u4tio1ko4ndi4ti4ku4si1i4i3ni2ku4u4ti4kan4ki1bi4ñu'4u4 ra2ti1xin3si'3i4 ra2ku4u4 ra2ta1a3tan3ka3ku3 ra2ndi4ta1a3sa3ma1ni4ku4u4 ra2ti4kan4chi2.
I4yo2kwen4tu2ya3ta4xa'1a4ti4kan4tan3ndi4,an4na1nda3tu'4un4ku4u(4) e4kwen4tu2ya3ta4xa'1a4ti4kan4ji'4in4i3nga2ki3ti4ndi4
ña'3a4ku4u(4) an4ñu'4u(4) an4ti1xin3si'3i(4) an4ndi4i4yo2ti4ku4si1i4i3ni2ñu'4u(4) an4kan4chi2,tan3i4yo2ki3ti4ndi4ba143ku4si1i4i3ni2 ri4ñu'4u4ta1a3a1chi1ndi4ta1a3kan4ndi4ta1ka'3ni4ña'3a4ku4u4ta1kan4chi2.
Ya1kan4ndi4xa'4ni24 ra2ko1o4xa'4ni24 ra2sa3a2xa'4ni24 ra2tan3,tan3ki4xa2a2ba(3) e2tio1ko4kan4xa4xi24 a2a1chi1ndi4
ta1a3ku4u4ta1i4xa3ma1ni4 ra2ti4kan4ya1kan4ndi4ku4si1i4i3ni2 ri4ji4ni2 ri4ta1a3chi2,ndi3sa4ku4u4tio1ko4ndi4
ya1kan4i4xa3ta1a3ya1kan4ndi4i4xa3ma1ni4 ra2ki3ti4ti4ko4ndo3tio1ko4nda1ndi'4i4tio1ko4.

Ya1kan4ba42ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4 ri4ko4ndo3 ri4tia14ba4tu4u2 yu1ndi4ta13ku2 ri4ba42ya1chi4ndu'4u4ki1bi4 ri4ndi4,ndi4ki3ti4ku4u4 ri4ndi4pa4li4ya'4a13 ni42 ri4.

Ko14o3ta'3an2 ri4i3in3ni4i4tiem4pu2bi4ta'3an2tu4u(2) i2,i4yo2tu3 ri4i3in3ni4i4tiem4pu2ba3tan3ndi4ko14o3 ri4kwa'1a4tian42,tian42sa4bi4bi4ndi4,o4ra2ja1sa4bi4ba42i4yo2 ni42 ri4ran4,i4yo2ya'4a13 ni42 ri4na4ja1sa4bi4.
Tan3,ya1i4xa3 ri4ndi4na4kwa'1an(1) e4xa14ku'1u1tan3i1xa14a3kwa1nda3a3 ri4ja1ta4pantalónyo4o4kwa1nda3a3 ri4an4ko3o3ndi4ka13nda3ba3 ri4xa'1a(4) e4tan3

Su14u3ti4ndo3o3bi4ku4u4 ri4pa4li4chi'4i2ki1lin42 ri4tan3ndi4sa4ndi'1i3 ni42 ri4ka4ta4 ni42mi4i4ti4in13 ri4tan3na4ñu3mi4i4ti4in13 ri4ja143,
tan3ya1ku4u4 ri4ti4pa4li4tin3o4ra2ja1na4ñu3tan3ja143nda4ñu'4u4ba3 ri4nda143ba4a24ti4tu4u4ndi4ka2 ri4ma14a3ja4xi24 ri4tan3ndi4u'1bi1 ni42ja4xi24 ri4ka4ta4ya'4a13 ni42ja4xi24 ri4.

An4mi4i4ndi4chi2tu3ta1kwi42xi'4i(4) o4sa3kan4tan3ni14nda3ka'3an(4) e4ta3ka3si2 o4yu'3u4yo3o2ba42an4ko14o3tia'3a2ba42ndi4i3kan4kwa1nda3a3 ri4tan3nda1nda4a4jo4nde1e3 ri4yu'3u4tia'3a2xi'4i(4) o4ta1kwi42,ti4xi'4i4ta1kwi42ku4u4ti4kan4.
Ya1kan4ndi4ku4si1i4 ni42i3ni2ti4kan4na4ta1a3ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta1a3sa3ma1ni4ña'3a4ku4u4ta1kan4.Ka4chi2 na1nda4tu'4un4 na2xa'1a4ti4tio1ko4tun4nda1ba32.
Ni3su14u3tio1ko4kwe'1e1ke4e4ka3chi2 o4kwa1nu3u3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4i3nga2xia4an4bi4a3sa3i'4na4bi4tu3ti4nda'4bi2kan4ndi4
ya1kan4ku4u4chiu3un3i4xa3ti4kan4i4yo2 ri4nda'3a4i3tun4,tun4nda1ba32,tan3ko14o3ya1ka3chi2 o4kwa1nu3u3 ri4tan3
tan3ja1na4ma13i3nga2xia4an4,na4ni1ta'1nda1 run4ni1ja'3nda2 e4 run4tan3kwa'1an1 run4ñu'3u4i3kan4ba42ndi4xi4nu3ti4nda'4bi2kan4nda4ko1o3 ri4i3nga2nda'3a4i3tun4tun4kwi4i24.
Eso.
Nda4na1ma3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4.Tan3ndi4,ba'1a3tu3ndi4na4ka3chi2 o4ndi4ba'1a3ndi4,ya1kan3,nda4tu'4un(4) e4tan3
ka1a3ba42ndo4o13 a2na1ma3ku'1un1tiem4pu2ya1ko4ndo3ya1nda4tu'4un(4) e4ka1a3ndi4,
ya1kan3,tan42ku4u4sa3ba3na1kwa4chi3ndi4ji14ni2 na1sa1a3i4yo2ji'4in4 ri4tan3ba'1a3tu3yo4o4na1ja1xa'4a13lu3chi'4i2cuentaji'4in4 ri4ndi4nda4ki'3in3ji1ni4yo4o4sa1a3i4yo2tan3ta4ku1 ri4tan3
tan3sa3ba3na1ta'4an(4) e4ndi4ni3ji14ni2 na1sa1a3i4yo2ji'4in4 ri4i3in3nu14u3xi4ka3mi3i4 na2sa3kan4tan3ndi4ba'1a3ndi4yo'4o4ndo3ko3o(4) e4 e2na1ma3ku'1un1tiem4pu2ta3xi3kwa'4a(4) e4 ya3.
Ya1ti4i3nga2yo3ko2ti4ba'1a3xi4xi3 na2ndi4ti4yo3ko2ndo'1o4.
Ti4yo3ko2ndo'1o4kan4ku4u4ti4ba'1a3xi4xi3 na2ndi4ya1,ya1ka4a4ji'4in4 ri4tu3ku3 ri4ndi4i'4na4 ni42 ri4ka4chi2 na1ran4.¿An4ji4ni2yo'4o1sa1a3tu3ba42ji4ni2 ri4?
Ti4i'4na4ku4u4ba3 ri4na4ko3o(3) a2ndi4na4tu2i4ta4yo1o4ndi4ki4nda2a2 na1 ri4ndi4xi4xi3 na2 ri4a1chi1ndi4,ba3xa'4mi3 na2 ri4ji'4in4ñu'3u2tan3sa3kan4ja143i1xa14a3ki4nda2a2 na1 ri4ndi4
ya1kan3,kwa'1a4 ni42se'1e3ti4kan4ndi4kwi3so3 na2ya1sa3kan4yu3tu2ndo3o3 ni42ba42mi4i4i4yo2 ri4.
Ya1kan4ti4xi4xi3ba3 na2ku4u4ti4kan4tan3ndi4,ya1kan3,ba'1a3na4tu2ndi4so3 na2ñu'3u2tan3xa'4mi3 na2 ri4ndi4ndi4kwi3so3 na(2) e2ndi4ta1xin1 ri4ku3xi3 na2tan3
tan3na4tu2i4ta4yo1o4ba42ya1i4ta4se'1e3ti4kan4tan3kwa'1an1xu13xa3yo1o4ndi4ti4xu13xa3ku4u4ndi'3i3ba3ti4kan4ko14o3na1ta4nda13a2bi4nu14u3 ri4ndi4ti4kwe'1e1ba3ku4u4 ri4tan3ndi4ti4xi4xi3 na2ku4u4 ri4ya1kan4,ya1kan4ba42ji'4in4ti4yo3ko2ndo'1o4kan4.
Tan3sa1a3i4in4 ri4a1chi1ndi4yu'1u1ndi4ni3ji14ni2 yu1 ri4tia'14an2ku3ni2 yu1 ri4.
yo3ko2ndo'1o4kan4,yo3ko2ndo'1o4kan4ndi4

Ya1kan4ba42ji'4in4ti4yo3ko2ndo'1o4.

Ba'1a3.¿Sa1a3na3ni(4) un4?

¿Sa1a3na3ni4ñu3u2 un4?
Yoloxóchitlna3ni4ñu3u2 yu1.

¿Ki4xi3ni1bi4ja4ta24 e3?

ja1i1xa14a3ka4an2ba3 ri4 a2tan3ja143i4xa3 ri4kwe'1e1ba3na4ka3chi2 o4a1chi1ndi4yo4o4na1nda'4bi2ndi4chi'4i(4) o4 ya2tan3ndu3ku3xa(3) e3.
Ndi3sa4ku4u(4) a2ndu3ku3xa3ku4ni2yo4o4tan3ti4kan4ndi4ji'3na3,tan42ku4u4ji'3na3i3tu2nu14u3ka4na3yo3ko4kan4an4ko3o3i3tu2nda'4bi2
tian42ku4u4mi4i4ni1ko1yo3ni3i4ko1yo3nu1ni4nda'3a(4) e4tan3,ki1bi4nda13ka3ya2 e4ni3i4tan3
lu3chi'4i2ni1nda3a3ñu'3u4si1ki4 a2tan3ko14o3ni4ji3ni2ko14o3ni3,ki3ti4ni4ji3ni2nde4e(4) a2tan3
sa1bi4nu14u3ka13na3tan3ja1ni1ka3na3ba(3) e2kan4ji'3na3ka(1) e1kan4ka3na3yo3ko4ji'3na3ka(1) e1kan4tan3ka3na3li3sa4ji'3na3ka1kan4tan3
ya1kan4ndi4ya1kan4ndi4ya1ja4xi24ko14ni4ti4ba42kan4a1chi1ndi4ko14o(3) a2ka3xi4 ri4nda'4bi2ku4u4 ri4tan3
ji'3na3ka1ba(3) e2kan4ka4an2 ri4ran4,ya1kan4su14u3ti4ba'1a3bi4ku4u4 ri4ndi4ja1kwe'1e1ba3ko4ndo3 ri4ji'4in(4) o4na4ja1,na4ja1kan4a1chi1ndi4
ja1su14u(3) a2ba'1a3ka1ba42ku4u4 ri4ndi4ja4xi24 ri4 a2ya1ndi3xi4tia'14an2xi1nu3kan4tan3
na4ja1ni1ka3an2 ri4 a2kan4tan3ba14sa4ndu4ba'1a3ka1bi4 a2ndi4nda143ti1so'3o4ba(3) e2nda143,nda143chia'4an4i4in4ba3ti3kwa'4a2kan4
ndu4ku3xa3ba3tu(3) a2na4i4yo2a3ma3tan3ndi4a1su3ba14sa4ba'1a3ka(1) e1nda143,nda143ti1ko'3ndo3i4in(4) a2nda143
ya1kan4ba42ba143ba'1a3i4xa3 ri4ran4,ya1kan4ko4ndo3ti4ko14ni4ndi4
i4yo2historiaxa'1a4 ri4ndi4sa14ñu'4u4ndio4si2 ri4tan3ni1ndo3ko3o4 ra2ndi3ki4 ri4ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
Ya1kan4ndi4ti4ba'1a3ku4u4ti4kan4ti4,ti4la3tun4ba3ku4u4ti4kan4a1chi1tan3ya1ba3ta4 ri4kan4ya1kan4ndi4sa14ñu'4u4 ra2 ri4tan3ni1ndo1o3 ri4
Ba3ta4 ni42 ri4.
Ndo1o3ndi3ki4 ri4ka4chi2 na1tan3ndi4su14u3ndi3ki4ndi3xa3bi4ba42ndi4tu1mi32ka4ni24ba42ndi4chi2te'1e4nu14u3 ri4tan3,tan3ya1kan4ba42ndi4kan4,ya1kan4ko4ndo3kwen4tu2xa'1a4ko14ni4.
¿An4ba'1a3 ri4ya3tan3 ri4ka3xi(4) o4?
A1su3ba'1a3ba3 ri4na4tu2ba143ku4nda3si(4) o4a1chi1ndi4ya1ka3chi2 o4a3ma3,o4ra2i4ta4tu(3) a2se'1e3 ri4ndi4
ke4e4 ri4xi4ka3 ri4ji'4in(4) a2mbo3ta3 ri4xi4ka3 ri4kwa4a4 ri4ka'3a4 e2kan4mi4i4kwa'1an(1) e1an4ko3o3yu'4bi2,kwa4a4 ri4ya1sa3kan4yu'4bi2 ri4
ko3to3ki3xa2a2ta1su'4u4an4ko3o3nda4a2ti4ki3xa2a2tan3nda3ti3in3 ri4 a2kan4tia'14an2ba'1a3 e2nda3chi4 a2tan3
ya1kan4ku4mbo3ta3 ri4xi4ka3 ri4kwa4a4 ri4kwa4a4 ri4xi4ka3 ri4tan3,tan3i3nda14 e2ndi4ya1na4tu2ju13ta'3an2 e4 ri4ya1pa4li4kan4tan3,
sa3ba3 na2ndi4xa'4ni24 na(2) e2tan3ñu'4u4ti1ku4xi4ka'3a4 e2ran4,ñu'4u4ti1ku4xi4ka'3a4,ti1xin3i3in4 a2an4ti1xin3tu1mi3(2) a2kan4
ya1xa'1a4tu1mi3(2) a2kan4ñu'4u4ti1ku4xi4tan3,tan3ya1kan4ba42ndi4sa3ba3 na2ndi4ku4nda3si4 na2ka3xi4 na2 ri4.
Tan3ndi4sa3ba3 na2ndi4ja4xi24ba3 na2 ri4,ba'1a3na4tu2ti4xu13xa3ja'13ni4 na2ndi4ko14o3,ko14o3ti1ku4xi4ko14o3ka'3a4ti4kan4ndi4
lu3u3tia14ba4ba3lu3u3i4in4,nda1kwa4an2i4in4tia14ba4xa'1a4si'1in3 ri4tan3ya1kan4ba42ya1,nda14(3) e2kan4ko4ndo3plagaji'4in4 ri4tan3ndi4,ya1ko4ndo3parásitoka'3a4 ri4tan3ndi4,
tan3ndi4ba'1a3ba3 ri4xa4xi24sa3ba3 na2 ri4,xa4xi24ba3 na2 ri4sa3kan4tu3cha4na2ba3ndi4xa4xi24 na2cha4na2ba3ka4chi2 na1ndi4tu3un4ndi4
xa'4ni24cha4na2,ta1tu3un4cha4na2tan3ta4bi3 ra2 ri4nda143na4ni24i3ki4si'1in3 ri4kan4ka4ba1ka4ba1yu'3u4 ra2xi4ka3 ra2ka4chi2 na1,
Tan3sa3kan4tu3na1ka1a3ba3ndi4xa'4ni24 na2ti4,ti4ko14ni4kan4tan3sa3ba3 na2xa4xi24 na2 ri4ka4chi2 na1sa3ba3 na3.
Tan3ndi4ba'1a3ba3ti4xu13xa3ndi4ko14o3ka1ti1ku4xi4ka'3a4ti4kan4tan3,tan3ti4i4ta4ndi4na'3a4ñu'4u4 ri4ta3ka2ndi4
xi4na1ti1ku4xi4ka'3a4 ri4ka4chi2 na1,ya1kan4ba42ndi4sa3ba3 na2ndi4ba143ja4xi24 na2 ri4.
¿An4kwe'1e1ta'3an2 ri4?
Kwe'1e1 ri4,an4ni1ka3ni(3) o4yu1u4 ri4tan3ta'1nu1ndi1xin4 ri4tan3
ni14xi'1i1 ri4ndi4sa1a3tian42ndi1xin4 ri4ta'1nu1tan3kwa'1an(1) e4ndi3ki'3in(3) o4 ri4ndi4na4ni14ku3ka3ma2 e4tan3kwa'1an1nda'3a(4) e4nde3nu'3u3i3ni2 o4ti3in(3) o4 ri4ka4chi2ka'4an(4) e4tan3
ti'3nu3 ri4nda'3a(4) e4ba1ba'1a3ndi4u'1bi1ta'3an2ja4xi24 ri4,u'1bi1ta'3an2ja4xi24 ri4ti'4nu3 ri4ndi4
nda1i4yo2i4yo2sierrate'1e4yu'3u4 ri4ka3chi2 o4tan3,ti'4nu3ba'1a3 ri4,ti'4nu3ba'1a3 ri4ya1kan4ndi4ti4kwe'1e1ku4u4 ri4.
Ti4kwe'1e1ku4u4 ri4ti4kwe'1e1ku4u4ta'3an2ba3 ri4,ya1kan4ba42i4yo2i4yo2ti4ka4chi2 o4ko4ndo3,ti4ka4chi2 o4ko4ndo3ko14ni4ka4chi2 o4kan4.
ndi4ti4ja1ndo3o3ku4u4 ri4ndo3o3ka1 ri4tan3cha4na2ba3,na4ni1ka3ni3ba'1a(3) e4yu1u4 ri4tan3ba1xi3 ri4ñu'3u4ndi4nda1ka'4ma3ko4yo13 ri4ñu'3u4ba3.
Ya1kan4ndi4ja4xi24sa3ba3 na2 ri4a1chi1ndi4ti4,ti4ba'1a3,ti4ja1ku3ñu2ba'1a3ku4u4 ri4ka4chi2 o4ran4,ti4ja1ku3ñu2ba'1a3ku4u4 ri4,ti4kan4ku4u4ko14ni4.

¿Sa1a3na3ni4ñu3u2 un4?
Yoloxóchitl.
Bi3tin3ndi4nda3tu'4un4lu3chi'4i2 un4ji'4in4 ndu2xa'1a4ti4,i3nga2sa3a2
ti4ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4ko4ndo3ti1lan3chi4kwa4an2an4ti1lan3chi4,
ti1lan3chi4ti4ku4u4 ri4an4ko3o3ti1lan3chi4kwa4an2ku4u4 ri4an4ti1lan3chi4kwa4chi3ku4u4 ri4a1chi1ndi4ba3u1bi1ka1a3nu14u3ku4u4 ri4i4yo2tu4u2 yu1.
Ti4kan4nda3tu'4un(4) un4ji'4in4 ndu2chi1,ndi3sa4ku4u(4) a2ji4ni2 un4nda3tu'4un(4) un4xa'1a4 ri4.
Ba'1a3ba3.Ti4ka4chi2 o4ko4ndo3ti1lan3chi4ka4chi2 o4kan4ndi4
sa3a2nda4a4tan3kwa'1an1ya1kwa4an2ji'4in4ku4u4ti4kan4,ta'3ni3 ri4,ta'3ni3 ri4kwa4an2tan3ndi1xin4 ri4nda4a4tu4u2 yu1ndi4
sa3a2la3tun4ba'1a3ku4u4 ri4,sa3a2la3tun4ba'1a3ku4u4 ri4tan3ti4ja1ndo3o3ku4u4ti4ti1lan3chi4ka4chi2 o4,ti1lan3chi4nu14u3i3tun4su4kun1kan4ndi4,
ndi4nda'3a4tun4chi14kun3ba3chi3ñu3 ni42 ri4ka3ka3 ri4o4ra2ja1chi4chi13chi14kun3kan4ndi4
ji'3na3ka1 ri4nda3ka3ya2tu3chi14kun3chi4chi13kan4ba3,chi14kun3nu14u3nu14u3chi4chi13an4ko3o3
chi14kun3i4in4na3ma4 run4mi4i4xa14a1nda'3a(4) e4ki13nda2a(2) e4 ya2kan4an4ko3o3,ndi4a1su3kwe4nda2 ri4ku4u4ndi'3i3ba(3) e2kan4.
Tan3ya1ka4chi2 na1ji4ni2 yu1xa'1a4ti4ti1lan3chi4kan4ndi4,ti4kan4ndi4
i'4na4 ri4na4tu2kwa4ñu3a1su3sa3kan4i4xa3ti4chi4tu2kan4i4xa3 ri4ndi4xa1a1 ri4ka4ni3,tu4te'4e4 ri4i3tun4tu4te'4e4 ri4ndi4a1su3ba143ndu13su2 ni42bi4ndi4
tian42i4xa3ti4,ndi4a1su3tan42i4xa3chi4tu2i4xa3ta'3an2ba3 ri4,nda4tu'4un4 na2xa'1a4 ri4ndi4chi3ñu3 ni42 ri4na4ni1xa1a1 ri4kwa4a4 ri4kwa4a4 ri4kwa4a4 ri4yu'3u4ye'14e(4) o4ndi4
ya1kan4ndi4ti4i'4na4ku4u4ta'3an2ba3 ri4ka4chi2 na1.Tan3ya1ji4ni2tu3ku(3) 2ndi4ti1lan3chi4kan4ndi4
i4yo2i3in3tiem4pu2,i4yo2i3in3tiem4pu2nda14(3) e2kan4ba143nda4ka'3an4ta'3an(2) e2nda4a2tiem4pu2ba42ndi4i4yo2i3in3tiem4pu2ndi4
ni3su14u3kwe4nda2i3nda14 ri4su14u3kwe4nda2u1bi1 ri4xi4ka3ndi4kwe4nda2kwa'1a4kwe4nda2ti'3bi3 ri4xi4ka3,lu14u3 ri4xi4ka3.
Ya1kwa'1an1ni1kwa3a4ni1xa1a1 ri4ku1sun1 ri4ndi4kwa4a4 ri4kwa4a4 ri4kwa4a4 ri4,kwa'1an1ni1ku3na3a4sa3kan4ku3ta4xin24yu'3u4 ri4.
Ya1kan4ndi4ji14ni2 o4an4ti4xi4in1ku4u4 ri4ji14ni2 o4nda4a(2) e2ba42i4xa3 ri4ndi4,ndi4lu14u3 ni42 ri4xi4ka3na4ja1xi4ka3 ri4.
Nda14(3) e2kan4ba143nda4ka'3an4ba1ba'1a3yu'1u1nda4a2tiem4pu2ba42ya1xi4ka3ti'3bi3 ri4ndi4kwa'1a4 ri4xi4ka3na4ja1xi4ka3 ri4,
ti4kan4ku4u4ti1lan3chi4ndo3o3na4ka3chi2 o4ti1lan3chi4na'4nu3ka4chi2 o4ji'4in4ti4kan4.
I4yo2i3nga2tu3ku3ti4ti1lan3chi4kwa4an2ka4chi2tu3ku(3) e4ti4ti1lan3chi4kwa4chi3ka4chi2 o4ji'4in4 ri4,ti4kan4ndi4
kwe4nda2i3nda14 ri4kwe4nda2u1bi1ta'4an2ba3ti4kan4xi4ka3.i4yo2che4e13i4yo2si'4i2i3nda14 e2kan4ji14ni2 yu1nda4a2ti4ku4u4che4e13,
nda4a2ti4ku4u4si'4i2ndi4i3in3 ri4ndi4ta13ku2kwa4an2ku4u4ba3 ri4tan3ndi1xin4 ri4i4yo2ta13ku2nda4a4kwa'1an1tu(3) a2kwa4an2i4yo2tu(3) a2kwa4an2ndi1xin4 ri4tan3ndi4,
ta13ku2ba4a24kwa4an2ku4u4ti4kan4tan3i3nga2ti4ko4ndo3ta'4an4 ri4kan4ndi4ta13ku2kwa4an2la3tun4 ni42ka1ku4u4ti4kan4,
kwa4an2,kwa4an2ya'3a4ku4u4ta'3ni3 ri4tan3sa3kan4tu3ndi1xin4 ri4ndi4kwa'1an(1) e1,i4yo2tu1mi32,tu1mi32nda4a4tan3i4yo2tu1mi32kwa4an2ndi1xin4 ri4tan3
ndi4la3tun4 ni42ka1ta13ku2ti4kan4i3nda14 e2ndi4ji14ni2 yu1nda4a2ti4ku4u4che4e13ji14ni2 yu1nda4a2ti4ku4u4si'4i2ndi4,tan3,ndi4u1bi1 ri4xi4ka3.

ti4xi'4i1ndi4tio1ko4ñu'4u4ku4u4ti4xa'4mi(3) 2na4tu2ndu4ta'3an2i4yo2 ri4be'3e3ndi4

na4ndu13ta'3an2mi4i4ndi4ko3tu3na1si'4i2a1su3ti4nda4i3ka4ka'3ni(4) o4ku4u4ba3ti4kan4ndi4ba'1a3ndi4tio1ko4ñu'4u4ku4u4ti4kan4tan3tio1ko4be'3e3ka4chi2 o4ka1a3ndi4ti4ka1a3ndi4ti4ma4su2ku4u4ti4ka1a3
I3in3nu14u3na4tu2ji13ni2 o4ndi4nde4e4 ri4nu14u3is1ta4tin3kwe4e2nda13ka3tu(4) e4is1ta4ni1ko1yo3ti3kwa'4a2kwa'1an1 ri4ñu'3u4a1chi1ndi4su14u3ti4ja4xi24ku4u4 ri4ndi4ni3ka14xi4 ri4nda'3a(4) e4ndi4a1su3
na4ja1ndi'13i3nda13ka3tu(4) e4is1ta4kan4ni1ko1yo3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4ñu'3u4tan3ja1ti4,ja1i3kan4kwa'1an1ba3 ri4ndi4ti4ja1sa4ka1ku3ku4u4 ri4ánima ri4sa3kan4ba3.
Tan3ti4ko4ndo3tio1ko4ñu'4u4ka4chi2 o4ña1a4ndi4ba143ba'1a3bi4ti4kan4ndi4ti4ka4ni3ku4u4ti4kan4ti4ja4xi24ku4u4ti4kan4,ya1kan4ba42ndi4xi4kwe'1e1i3ni2 o4ya1kan4ndi4xa'4ni2(4) o4ti4kan4a1chi1ndi4,ya1kan3,ti4kwe'1e1ku4u4 ri4.
Tio1ko4,tio1ko4i4yo2be'3e3ka1a3ndi4ni3ka'14ni4bi(4) o4 e2nda'4bi2ndi4ko14o3chiu3un3i4xa3bi4 a2ka1a3ndi4xi4ka3mi3i4ba(3) e2,
ni3ba143ka4ni(3) a2ni3ba143kwe'1e(1) a1ni3ba143xa4xi24 a2ni3ndi4,a1su3ku4u4ndi'3i(3) a2xi4ka(3) e2sa3kan4ba3ndi4ko14o(3) a2ya1i3nga2ka1chiu3un3i4xa3bi4 a2an4ko14o3,
ya1ba'1a3xa4xi24ba42an4ko14o3,sa3kan4ndi'3i3xa'4an1bi4ba42an4ko14o3ko4yo13 a2nu14u3ña'1a3bi4ndi4ya1tio1ko4nda'4bi2sa3kan4ti4ku4u4ba(3) e3.Ya1kan4ba42ji4ni2yo'4o1ya3ni2.
Ya1kan4ba42ji4ni2 yu1.

An4nda3tu'4un4tu3ku(3) e4i3nga2xa'1a4ti4tio1ko4ka4ya24ka4chi2 o4kan4.

ki3xa3a4 ri4ndi4xi4ko4 ri4se'1e3 ri4,xi4ko4 ri4 a2ko4ndo3ya1pa4li4ñu'4u4ba'1a3kan4tan3
kwa'1an1 ri4nda4na3ma3 ri4 a2i3nga2xia4an4ndi4ya1ji4ni2ti4kan4ndi4sa1bi4ku3un3chi2.
Ya1kan4ndi4nda4ta3ba4 ri4se'1e3 ri4tan3xi4ko4 ri4 a2,ku3ni2 o4 ri4na4kwa'1an1 ri4ndi4yu3kun2kwa'1an1 ri4ti4kwa'1an1ti4ba1xi3ti4kwa'1an1 ri4ti4ba1xi3ku4u4xi4ka3 ri4xi4ko4 ri4 a2se'1e3 ri4
nda3na3ma3,nda4na3ma3 ri4 a2i3nga2xia4an4ko3o(3) a2ndi4sa1bi4ku3un3ji4ni2 ri4chi2ka4chi2na1nda4tu'4un4.
kwen4tu2xa'1a4ti4tio1ko4ti4tio1ko4ka4ya24kan4ya3ni2.
¿Na4sa3kan4ba3?
Ya1kan4ndi4sa3kan4i4yo2,ji4ni(2) a2ko4ndo3kwen4tu2xa'1a4ti4tio1ko4ka4ya24.
Yo'4o4nda3tu'4un(4) e4i3nga2kwen4tu2xa'1a4ti4,ti4tio1ko4,tio1ko4ku4u4ba3 ri4a1chi1tio1ko4ti1kwe4ku3ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ri4.
Nda4a(2) e2ba42i4xa3ti4ti1kwe4ku3kan4nda4a2i4yo2 ri4nda4a(2) e2ba42ji4ni2 ri4nda4a(2) e2ba42i4xa3 ri4nda4a(2) e2ba42,an4ti4kwe'1e1ku4u4 ri4an4ti4ba143kwe'1e1ku4u4 ri4,
sa1a3i4xa3ti4kan4ji4ni2yo'4o1,nda3tu'4un(4) un4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku3ni2 o4nda4a(2) e2ba42ji4ni2yo'4o1nda3tu'4un(4) un4ya1i4xa3 ri4tan3ya1ji14ni2tu(3) un4tan3ku3ni(3) un4tan3
nda3tu'4un4tu3ku(3) un4 a2ji'4in4nda4a2ka1 na1tan3ku3ni2 na1nda4a(2) e2i4xa3 ri4nda4a(2) e2ba42ba'1a3 ri4nda4a(2) e2ba42ji4ni2 ri4nda4a(2) e2ku4u(4) a2,
ya1kan4ti4ba3ku4u(4) a2nda3tu'4un(4) e4xa'1a4ti4ka1a3tan3,tan3sa3kan4tu3ti4,ti4ka4chi2 ra1ku4u4ji1ndo1ko4kan4ndi4ti4kan4ndi4ti4ba'1a3xi4xi3ba(3) e4ku4u4ti4kan4
ti1sun1kan4ba'14a4tan3ndi4ka'4an(4) e2ndi4i4yo2,tan42i3in3tan42i3in3 ri4ndi4ti4ja4chi4ñu3ku4u4ti4kan4tan3i4yo2 ri4
tan3ndi4na4chu3ba42i4xa3ti4,sa1a3na3ni4 ri4ti4ti1kwe4ku3ka1a3,ya1kan4nda3tu'4un(4) un4tan3ku3ni2 o4nda4a(2) e2ba42i4yo2.

nda3tu'4un(4) un4ji'4in4 ndu2sa1a3ku4u4 ri4i4yo2,sa1a3nu14u3 ri4i4yo2tan3nda4a2nda'3a4i3tun4i4yo2 ri4tan3
sa1a3i4in4 ri4tan3nda4a(2) e2i4xa3 ri4an4kwe'1e1 ri4an4ba143kwe'1e1 ri4ndi3sa4ku4u(4) a2kan4nda3tu'4un(4) un4ji'4in4 ndu2chi1.
Ya1ti4ko4ndo3tio1ko4tiu4ba2ka4chi2 o4kan4ndi4
ya1,i3in3nu14u3u1bi1nu14u3ka1a3ku4u4 ri4,nda1u1ni1nu14u3ka1a3ku4u4 ri4a1chi1ndi4
i4yo2ti4tio1ko4tiu4ba2tu14un3ka4chi2 o4kan4,ti4kan4ndi4kwa4chi3ba3ti4kan4
tan3i4yo2 ri4nda'3a4tun4tiu4ba2.
Ni3tun4tiu4ba2kan4su14u3i3in3nu14u3ku4u4 run4ndi4i4yo2tun4tiu4ba2kwa'4a1tan3i4yo2tun4tiu4ba2ya3a3tan3,
ya1kan4ndi4u1bi1nu14u3ku4u4tun4kan4tan3ndi4
i4yo2 ri4nda'3a4ndi3sa4u1bi1ba3 run4.

kwi3i3ko3o3 ri4nda'3a4tun4tio1ko4tiu4ba2ya3a3ka4chi2 o4ña1a4.
Tan3i3kan4tan3i3nga2 ri4ndi4i3nga2ti4tio1ko4tiu4ba2ña1a4ndi4ti4tio1ko4tiu4ba2kwa'4a1ka4chi2 o4ji'4in4ti4ña1a4,ti4ña1a4ndi4ti4ja1ndo3o3ku4u4ti4ña1a4.

tan3ndi4tu4u4i4in4 ri4tan3ti4ja1ndo3o3ka1ku4u4 ri4na4ni24ka1 ri4tan3ndi3sa4u1bi1 ri4sa3kan4ndi4kwe'1e1 ni42 ri4ndi4na4ni1xa1a(1) e4ka'3nda2 e4i3tun4,tun4tiu4ba2ña1a4an4ko3o3an4ku'1u1ja'4nda2 e4an4ko3o3,
nda4a2ka1ya'4a1(3) e4kwa'1an(1) e4tan3ni1ka3chi'3i(3) o4tun4tiu4ba2kwa4chi3nde4ta3 run4tan3,tan3ja1ndi13kwe1ta3 ri4tan3
ba'1a3na4ji'3na(3) e4kwa'1an1ran4,an4u1bi1u1ni(1) o4kwa'1an1tan3an4ji'3na(3) e4kwa'1an1ndi4ni1ya'1a(3) e4tan3sa14ka1nda(1) e4 run4tan3na1ndi4kun2ja1ta(4) e4ndi4
ja1ña1a4ja1ndi13kwe1ta3 ri4ndi4ja143ya'1a3na1kan4ka3chi'3i3tu3ku3 na2 run4tin3ja143nda3a3 ri4cho1to1 na1tin3
ja143in3ka4ni24ja143ka4ni3 ri4na1ña1a4ja143ndi4ki3si3 na2tio1to1 na1ku4u4xi4ka3 na3,ti4kan4ku4u4tio1ko4tiu4ba2.
Tio1ko4tiu4ba2kwa'4a1an4tio1ko4tiu4ba2nda4a4ndi4ti4kan4ku4u4 ri4kwe'1e1 ni42 ri4,u'1bi1 ni42ka4ni3 ri4.

ti4kan4ndi4ko14o3 ri4nda'3a4tun4,nda'3a4tun4tiu4ba2bi4ti4ña1a4ndi4ba3nda1nda4a2ka1i3tun4ba3i4yo2 ri4nda'3a4an4ko3o3ndi4ti1xin3ya1,
ti1xin3ya1ko4ndo3nda'3a4i4chi1tun4,tun4tiu13ma2ndi3chi2si'14bi3ka'3a4mis4tun2ka4chi2 o4kan4.
I3kan4ba3i4yo2 ri4ji4ni2 yu1ndi4na4ji13ni2 o4tun4ña1a4i4chi1 run4tan3ka'1nu(1) e4nda'3a4 run4tan3i4yo2ya3bi2ti1xin3 run4tan3i3kan4ba3ke4e4 ri4i4yo2a3ma3.

te'1e4te'1e4ja1ta4 ri4i4in4tan3ndi4ni3kwa1xin3nda'3a(4) e4 ri4so'3o3tan3ba143cho'4ma14 ri4ndi4ti4te'4e4ku4u4ti4kan4ndi4a1su3nda'3a4tun4tiu4ba2tu3i4yo2ti4kan4ba3.

ndi4ti4kan4ndi4tan42ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4mi3tiu'4un4ndi4ko14o3be'3e3bi4 ri4i3in3i3tun4tiu4ba2i4yo2nde3nu'3u3 ri4nda'3a4bi4ndi4

Tan3,an4,¿an4sa3kan4ti4ku4u4 ri4?
Sa3kan4ku4u4 ri4tu4u2 yu1ran4a1chi1ndi4i3in3,i3in3ka4chi2 o4,u1bi1ku4u4tio1ko4tiu4ba2tu14un3ka4chi2 o4kan4i3in3ti4,ti4bi3ta42ti4,
ti4kan4tan3i3in3 ri4xa'1mba4ti4te'4e4ka4chi2 o4kan4tan3i3nga2ti4kwa'4a1tan3na'4nu3ña1a4tan3,

chi3ñu3 ni42 ri4ka3ka3 ri4ke3e3 ri4nda3chi4 ri4ndi4tio1ko4tiu4ba2kwa'4a1ku4u4ti4ji4ni2 yu1,
i3in3ba'1a3tan3nde4e(4) o4sa3kan4tan3ba1xi3 ri4ki3xa2a2 ri4ko3nde3e3 ri4yu'3u4pantalónba3an4ko3o3ndi4ko3nde3e3 ri4mi4i4ba42nde4e(4) o4tan3
an4ni1ku3ka3ma2 e4ka'3ni(4) o4 ri4an4ko3o3ni14ku3ka3ma2 e4tan3ni1nda3chi4tu3ku3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4,ndi4ti4ba'1a3nda4chi4ku4u4ti4kan4ndi4su14u3i3in3ni4i4tiem4pu2ndi4
yo1o4marzoabrilka1a3ba3ba42ya1nda4chi4 ri4ji4ni2 yu1ran4,ya1kan4ndi4ji14ni2 o4an4ti4reinaji'4in4 ri4ti4ku4nu24ji'4in4 ri4ku4u4ti4kan4ndi4
tan3kwa'1an1 ri4ndu4ku4 ri4i3nga2i3tun4a3sa3colonizar ri4an4ko3o3i3nga2i3tun4mi4i4ka3ko1o3
mi4i4ko14o3 ri4tun4i3tun4xa14a3mi4i4ko14o3 ri4kan4nda3ko1o3tu3ku3 ri4yo3o3ku4u(4) a2ndi4,ndi4ti4nda4chi4ku4u4ti4tiu4ba2kwa'4a1kan4ji4ni2 yu1ran4.

i4yo2i3in3,i3in3tiem4pu2ti4ba42mi4i4ba42ke4e4 ri4nda4chi4 ri4xi4ka3 ri4,ya1kan4ba42ji4ni2 yu1ji'4in4tio1ko4tiu4ba2kan4.
¿An4ko14o3i3nga2tio1ko4tiu4ba2ndo3o3ka1?,ti4ndo3o3ndo3o3ka1ti4ndo3o3ti4,ti4kan4ndi4

a1su3i4yo2a3ma3ndi4ku3ta'3an2 e4nde3nu'3u3,ya1tun4tiu4ba2ña1a4ndi4nde3nu'3u3mi3i4ti4kan4ti4kwa'4a1kan4i4yo2.
Tan3kwi14i3kwi14i3ku3ta'3an2 e4ti4tio1ko4tiu4ba2nda4a4tan3tio1ko4tiu4ba2kwa'4a1ku3ta'3an2 e4 ri4i3nda14i3tun4tiu4ba2ndi4ja1i3in3ja1i3in3 run4i4yo2 ri4.

Bi3tin3ndi4nda3tu'4un(4) un4ji'4in4 ndu2xa'1a4sa3a2ka4chi2 na1ko4ndo3sa3a2ti1lan3chi4kan4.
Nda4a(2) e2i4xa3 ri4nda4a2i4yo2 ri4nda4a2ti4in4 ri4ta3ka2nda4a2,an4ji4ni2 ri4a3sa3i'4na4 ri4an4ko3o3nda4a(2) e2ba42ji4ni2 ri4.
An4ba'1a3 ri4ka3xi4ba3tu3na1nda'4bi2sa3ba3ja'4ni24 na2 ri4.
An4ba'1a3 ri4an4ko3o3nda4a(2) e2ba42ji4ni2 ri4ndi3sa4ku4u(4) a2ji4ni2 un4xa'1a4 ri4tan3nda3tu'4un4ba3yo'4o1chi1.
Ya1,ya1nda3tu'4un(4) 2xa'1a4ti4ti1lan3chi4,
ti1lan3chi4ka4chi2 yu1ti4ji4ni2 yu1ku4u4ti4ti1lan3chi4tan3sa3ba3 na2ka'4an2 na1ndi4sa3a2kwa4an2ti4chi3ñu3 ni42ko3o3nda'3a4tun4ta1kwi4i24
ti4kan4ku4u4ti4ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4ku4u4ti1lan3chi4sa3ba3 na2tan3,tan3yu'1u1ya1ji4ni2 yu1ti4ti1lan3chi4kan4ndi4
ti4ti1lan3chi4kan4ndi4na4tiem4pu2ka4ni(3) a2sa1bi4nda4a2ka1nde4ta3tun4kwi4i24tun4ti1xi4nda4chi3ñu3 ni42 ri4ko3o3 ri4nda'3a4,la3tun4xi4ta3 ri4ndi4

¿An4ko14o3ka1i3nga2nu14u3 ri4?

¿Nda4a2ta13ku2ku4u4ti4kan4?

Ya1ko4ndo3ti4nda3tu'4un(4) e4xa'1a4tin3ndi4ti4yo3ko2tejón.
Yo3ko2tejónkan4ndi4sa3ba3 na2ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4 ri4ko4ndo3 ri4yo3ko2ku3ñu2tian42ka4chi2 o4mi3tiu'4un4ndi4
ya1ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4 ri4ko4ndo3 ri4yo3ko2ku3ñu2kan4ndi4tan42ku4u4mi4i4ni1xi'1i1ki3ti4mi4i4nde4e4ku3ñu2nda4i3chi(2) a2sa3kan4tan3ki3xa2a2 ri4tan3ja1i1xa14a3ja'4nda2 ri4mbo3la3tan3kwa'1an1ba3 ri4.
A1chi1ndi4ya1xi4ko4 ri4ba42ran4.
Ya1xi4ko4 ri4ba42ka3xi4se'1e3 ri4tan3ya1kan4ka'4an2sa3ba3 na2ji'4in4 ri4ku4u4tu3 ri4yo3ko2ku3ñu2tan3ndi4ya1ki1bi4nda14ku2 ri4ndi4yo3ko2tejónku4u4ki1bi4ba'1a3 ri4,tan3ti4kan4ndi4¿an4xi4xi3 na2 ri4?
Ba143xi4xi3 na2 ri4ndi4,ya1kan3,ni3ta14nda13a2bi4na1yu4bi24nu14u3ti4kan4,ti4kan4ndi4ti4kwe'1e1ku4u4ti4kan4.
Ko14o3na1ta4nda13a2nu14u3yo3ko2tejónndi4ti4kan4ndi4ti4kwe'1e1ndi3xa3ku4u4ti4kan4a1chi1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ti4kan4na4ni3ji14ni2 o4mi4i4ba42ndi4kun2 ri4tan3ya'1a(3) e4ya1ya'1a3ti(4) o4mi4i4ba42i4yo2i3chi4ti4kan4ya1xi4nu3 ri4tan3ko4yo13 ri4be'3e3 ri4ndi4ndi1kun1ti4ja1ka4ni3ku4u4ba3ti4kan4a1chi1ndi4ko14o3na1ta4nda13a2nu14u3 ri4.
Ya1kan4ndi4su14u3ti4i4yo2ka4xi3i3ni2ku4u4yo3ko2tejónndi4ti4sa4na3ku4u4ti4kan4,kwe'1e1 ni42 ri4,ya1kan4ba42ndi4ko14o3na1xi4xi3 na2ti4kan4tan3i3nga(2) e2ndi4

¿An4ba143yu'3u4 ri4ji'4in4ya1ta3ta2?

ja4kwi1in3ti4kan4xi'4i4 ri4ni1i4yo4o4ku4u4 ri4tia14ba4nda'3a4tun4café.
Tan3ndi4nda1nda4a2ka1mi4i4ka3ti4ndi4i3kan4i4yo2ti4tia14ba4,tia14ba4kwa'4a1ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ri4.
Xa4xi24 ri4ku3ñu2na1nda'4bi2tan3ndi4,ta1nda43kwa'4a1ti4ka4a4i3in(4) o4na4tu2mi4i4,ta1ta4ku1i3in4ku4u(4) e4an4na1si'4i2ku4u4 na2tan3

Ya1kan4ba42nda13tu'4un(4) 2xa'1a4ti4tia14ba4kan4tan3

Sa1a3ni1ku3u3xa'13nu3 ndo4kwa4chi3 ndo4nda4a(2) e2ba42xa13xi4 ndo4xa'13nu3 ndo4nda4a(2) e2ba42ni1ju3ta3ku2 ndo4kwa4chi3 ndo4sa1a3i13xa3 ndo4xi1yo3kwa4chi3 ndo4ku4u4 ndo4na1nda'4bi2.
Ko14o(3) a2ni4i3xa3bi4 ndu2ndi4xi1yo3si'3i4 ndu2,

ndu3chi4 ra2ka4na3,ba143ki'4in(4) an4cuentaji'4in(4) a2ya1i4yo2be'3e3ndi4ya1ti4in4 ni42mi3i(4) an4ndi4ki1si3ba42ti4in4 ni42mi3i(4) an4i4xi4ko(3) an4ka3xi4mi3i4 ndu2ña'1a3nde4e4 ndu2be'3e3.
Ya'1a3tu3chi3ta2ya'1a3tu3tin3ja13ta4si'3i4 ndu(2) a2ku3xi3 ndu2an4ko3o3ndi4ya'1a3panya'1a3tin3ja1ni1ki'3in(3) an4 e2ku3xi3 ndu2ji'4in4ba(3) en4ndi4ña4ti4in4ki1si3ku4u4mi3i4ba3si'3i4 ndu3.

sa3kan4ku4u4ndi4ja1mi3i4ba(3) 2ki13xa3a4ti4in(4) 2ki1si3ba3,ti4in(4) 2ki1si3ta'3an(2) e2i4xi4ko3ki1si3ba3,ta'3an(2) e2ja4ta24ña'1a3ka3xi4mi3i4ba(3) 2ndi4ja1ña4i4xi4ko3ki1si3ku4u4mi3i4ba(3) 2.
