Sa1a3ba'1a3ndi4bi3ta42 ni42ji1ni(4) un4ndi4,ya1kan3,ji13ni2 un4,ji13ni2 un4ti4in(4) un4 a2tan3yu'1u1ndi4ba143ko4chun3yu'1u1ti3in(3) 2ki1si3,ba'1a3xi1yo4ka1a3ndi4ka4tu4yu'1u(1) a1ndi4xi1yo4ba42ka1a3tan3ki1si3ndi4ya1bi4xi1ji'4in4ba42kan4.
Sa3kan4ba3xa'13nu3ndu'1u1.
Lu3lu3bi4yu'1u1tan3ki13xa3a4 2ti4in(4) 2ki1si3,ji'4in(4) a2kan4xa'13nu3ba3yu'1u1ji'4in(4) a2kan4,sa3kan4ku4u4kwa'1an1xu4xa(3) 2tin3xa1i4ndu'3u4 2ji'4in4yu3ba4 ndo4tin3ka4chi2 na1ndi4:
t"a4ta2,an4ku14nde3e4i3ni2 un4a3sa(3) on4 a2ba'1a3ji'4in4 ndu2si4ki3na'3a2 on4ña4ta4u3ni2 ndu1ku'1un(1) an4ku'1un1ko1to(1) an4yo14so3 ndu2",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
"An4ko3chun(3) an4ka1a3ko3to(3) an4yo14so3ba3,ji14ni2 yu1na4ji4to(3) an4yo14so3tan3,tan3ba1xi3 ndo4ja1ta(4) en4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 na3.
I3kan4ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2nda13kwi3in(3) 2ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"A1su3ko3to3ba(3) e2na4tu2ku'1un1 yu1ndi4nda'4bi2 na1ba1xi3 na2nu14u(3) e4,
i3ta2an2i3sa42ndi4an4yo'4o1ni1xi'1i1an4yu'1u1ni1xi'1i1tan3ya1ku4ni(2) a2ba42ji'4in(4) o4e1ta4i3nda14i3ta2e1ta4i3nda14candela
ni'4i4ti3kwa'4a2ki3xi3nda3ka3 na2na4ni1xi'1i(1) o4sa3kan4ya1ku4ni(2) a2ba42ji'4in(4) o4na4ni1xi'1i(1) o4ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
Ba'1a3ku'1un(1) un4ko3to(3) on4yo14so3 na2na4tu2ko3chun(3) un4ran4,ji14ni2 yu1na4xi4ka3yo'4o1sa3kan4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) 2.
"Ku'1un1ba3yu'1u1",ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2i3kan4ja143ni1ke3ta(3) 2tan3kwa'1an1ba(3) 2.Ya1nu14u3kwa'1an1 yu1,
ja1ni1ki'3in3ku'3ba2ji1ni4 2sa1a3ko3ndo3xa'4a2ya1ke1ta(3) e3,nu14u3ka'4nu3,ya1kwa'3a3tia'1ba4ka4chi2 na1kan4ja1ni1ki'3in3ji1ni4ba(3) 2sa1a3ko3ndo(3) a2kan4ya1kwa'3a3tia'1ba4ka4chi2 na1,
ki14tu3tu3ku3tin3ke1ta3tu3xa'4a2kan4tu3ku3tin3ja1ji13ni2ba(3) 2sa1a3ko3o(3) a2ya1ja3chiu4un4ki14tu3ki1bi4ka3na3bi3ko4ka'4nu3ki14tu3ndi4ña4ja1ji4ni2ba3ku4u(4) 2.
Sa1a3i1ka4ndo3o3sa1a3,ja1ji4ni2 yu1,ya1kan4ka4chi2 na1ndi4,"¿Na4chu3tan42ndi4i4xa3 ni42 an4ta4u3ni2ka1a3sa3kan4ndi4ba143ndo4o13chi4chi3yu3xan(4) en4ta4u3ni2".
"I4yo2is1ta(4) en4ta4u3ni2tan3yu3xan4ndi4ndi'4i4nda1a1chi4chi3yu3xan4o4ra2ndi'4i4ndi4ko(3) e4ba1xi3kwa4a24",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
"Sa3kan4a1chi1ndi4i4yo2sa1a3i4xa3ba(3) en4ta4u3ni2ka1a3ji1ni(4) an4ka1a3ba'1a3ya1kan4ndi4ka4a(4) e2ku4u(4) an4sa3kan4,sa1a3a3sa(3) e4ji4ni2 o4sa1a3ko3ndo3xa'4a2ta1xin1".
"Tan3sa1a3a3sa(3) e4ji4ni2 o4sa1a3ko3ndo3ya1ku4u4ya1ja3chiu4un4ti1xin3tia'1ba4ka'4nu3",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
"Ku'1un1ko1to(1) on4 lu3ki1si3nda3yu4na4na2,ku'1un(1) un4 lu3ko1to(1) on4 a2,an4kwi14i3ku'1un1ko1to(1) on4 a2sa1a3i4yo(2) a2ya1ku4u4ya1tan3ku3na3ni(2) a2ji'4in4 ndu2",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
I3kan4ke4ta3tu3ku(3) 2kwa'1an(1) e1ja'1a4ki1si3nda3yu4tu3ku3,so'3o3ko3ndo3ya1ku4u4ya1kwe4nda2i1ka4ja3chiu4un4ji'4in4 ndo4si'3i4 2,an4u1bi1i1ka4ja3chiu4un4ji'4in4 ndo4,
ya1i3in3ka3a2i3in3ka3a2ka1a3tin3tan3,i3in3ka3a2yo4so24i3in3ta'4nu1u1bi1i1ka4yo4so24i3in3ta'4nu1tin3tan3ya1kan4ndi4na3ni2 ni42ba(3) e2ña1a4ku3xi3na1kwa'1a4ki3xa2a2 na1,a1chi1ndi4na1xi4ko14tio1to1ku4u4 na2.
"Ba'1a3ba3a1chi1ndi4si4in4ba3i4xa3na1ya3ta4ndi4ko14o3tio1to1 na1xi4ko14sa3kan4tan3bi3tin3ndi4i4yo2yu3ba4ñu'4u4 na2i4yo2tan3xi4ko14tio1to1xi4ko14i4xa(3) e4bi3tin3",ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in4 na3.
"Ndi3xa3ja3ku4u4ba(3) e2na4na2,¿an4ku3na3ni(2) a2ya1u1bi1ka3a2ka1a3cho41?""Ku3na3ni2ba(3) e2ña1a4ku3xi3 na2ki3xa2a2 na1".
Ki3xa2a2 na1ya1kwa1nu'1u4tu3ba42be'3e3na1,na1ji'4in4se1ñu'4u4ba3na1ji'4in4si1si'4i2ba3.
Na1ko4ndo3yu3ba4ñu'4u4ba4li4ba4li4ka1i4yo2yu3ba4ñu'4u4 na2tin3,su4ku3tu4tia'1ba4na1ku4si4ti24tin3na1kwa1nu'1u4ku4u4ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ji'4in4na1kan4.
Ku3xi3ba3 na2,ran4.
Ya1ña1a4ndi4na3ni2ba(3) e2ña1a4ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in4 na3,i3kan4ja143ji13ni2ba3 na2ndi4sa3kan4ndi4
utaki13xa3a4 na2kwa'1an1 na1nda1be'3e3kan4kwa'1an1 na1ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4yu3ba(4) on4ka4chi2 na1ndi4:
"¿sa1a3i13xa3 ni42 an4ta4u3ni2cho41ta4ta2,sa1a3i13xa(3) en4ta4u3ni2cho41?"
"ji4ni2sa4ka2 en4ka1a3sa1a3ko3o3nda3yu4chi'1yo4 a2ji4ni2sa4ka2 en4sa1a3ko3o3yo14so3ji4ni2sa4ka2 en4sa1a3i13xa3 ni42 an4ka1a3sa14kwa'3a3tu(3) an4sa3kan4tu3tan3,
¿an4i4yo2na1ni1sa4na'1a1ña'3a4tan42?""Ko14o3na1ni4sa4na'1a1bi4 na2ña4ka1a3xi4ka3mi3i4ba(3) en4ka1a3".
Ya1bi4xi1ji'4in4ku4u4ndi'3i(3) a2.
Ya1ña1a4ya1ña1a4ni1ku3u3tin3xa143kwa'1an1ba(3) e2,ran4.
Ya1bi4xi1ji'4in4ba42a3sa(3) e4 ya2,xo3kwe4nda2 ni42 o4ku4ni(2) a2.
A3sa3kwe4nda2 e4sa1a3ko3o3ji'4in4tu1ni4ni2ya1kan4ba42ndi4ka'4an(4) e4ndi4ba'1a3ke3ta(3) e4,ka'1an1mi3i4ni1bi4ja1ta4ba(3) e4ran4.
Tan3na4ni14xo3kwe4nda2 on4tin3ka'1an1ba3ni1bi4ka3chi2 na1ndi4,"Ba'14a4i4chi(3) an4ta4u3ni2kan4ki13xi(3) an4so'3o3bi4ni1i3xa(3) en4kan4",ka3chi2ba3 na3,ka'1an1 na1.
Ya1kan4ni1ku3u3tin3,ba'1a3yu3ba4 2ndi4ta1ja13chiu4un4chi3ñu3ku'1u1ba3ku4u4ta1kan4,ja13chiu4un4ndu3chi4ja13chiu4un4nu1ni4ba3ku4u4yu3ba4 2.
Ki3xa2a2yu3ba4 2ba1xi3kwa4a24tin3,"Ya1yo'4o4ja13ta4 2tu4un2,ya1yo'4o4ni1xi14ko(3) 2ki1si3tan3ni1ki'3in(3) a2",ba143ka'4an2bi4 ra2ndi4,"U3un2",ku4u4 ra2so'3o3ba3.
"Ba143ni4xi14ko3bi4yu'1u1nu1ni4yu'1u1,ka'4an2 on4ji'4in(4) 2xi14ko(3) 2nu1ni4ku14ni2 yu1xi14ko(3) a2a1chi1ndi4na4ko3o3mi3i4 a2sa3kan4ku3tu4 a2nda4a2ka1chiu3un3a3sa(3) e4 e2".
"I4yo2 ni42se'1e(3) o4i4yo2 ni42,ku4ma1ni4 a2ji'4in4se'1e(3) o4",ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra3."Ba'1a3na4sa3kan4ni1i3xa(3) on4ran4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4,ña4chi4nde3e4ña'3a4ban4.
An4ko14o3tu3ndi4ke13ta3tu3 ra2kwa'1an1tu3 ra2tin3kwa'1an1,ku4ni2 ra1ndi4ku'1un1na1ta4tu2ji'4in4 ra2ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,
"yu'1u1chi3ndu'4u4u1bi1 na1ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4i3ta2an2",ba143ya'3bi3na1ta4tu2sa3kan4,nu4u4chi4chi3ya'1bi3na1ta4tu2.
"Yu'1u1chi3ndu'4u4u1bi1 na1ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4i3ta2an2nda1i3sa42ba42chi3ndu'4u(4) un4na1ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4na4tu2ku4ni2 un4a1chi1ndi4
xu'14un4ba42ndo'4o4xa'1a4tan3ndi4ba'1a3ba3yu'1u1ndi4ni1xa'1an(1) e1ji'4in4si'3i4 2ni1xi14ko(3) 2ki1si3ji'4in(4) an4Ni1ko4yu4tan3ni1kia'3bi13 ni42ba3ki1si3ndu'1u1",ka4chi2si'3i4 2ji'4in4 ra3.
"Ya1kan4ndi4u1bi1ko3ndo3na1ta4tu2cha'14bi(3) 2ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4i3ta2an2"."Je1e3",cha'14bi(3) an4 na2tin3kwa'1an1ba3 na2ji'4in4 ra3.
Ja1mi3i4tu3ku3 ra2cha'14bi3i3sa42tu3ku3,nda'4bi2nda'4bi2sa3kan4ni1ku3u3tin3ja13chiu4un4ba3yu3ba4 2,ni1xi1yo3ba3nu1ni4 ra2xi1yo3ndu3chi4 ra2ni1xi1yo3.
Ki1bi4ni1ka3ni3kwe'1e1 ña4ba42
utaba'1a3ni1ke3ta3ba3ta1ña1a4,ba14ja4ni4ndo'3o3bi4tu3ku3 ndu2,ki1bi4ka13ni3kwe'1e1si'3i4 2ba42ba143ni4ko3chun3yu3ba4 2ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,nda'4bi2 ni42ba3ni1ku3u3 ra2tan3ndi4ni14ko3chun3 ra2ji'4in4si'3i4 2ndi4kwe'1e1ni1xi'1i(1) an4ji'4in4.
Ki1bi4ni1xi1yo3kwa4chi3 ndu2xa'13nu3 ndu2ku4u4 ndu2na1kwa4chi3nu14u3 ndo4ndi4
Nda1ndi'4i(4) a2ndi4i4yo2 ni42ba(3) e3.
ya1kan3,ba4li4 ndu2xa'13nu3 ndu2nu14u3yu3ba4 ndu2ndi4ni1ndo'3o3 ni42 ndu1ku4u4 ndu2na1si'4i2ko14o3ta1a3se'1e3 ra2ndi4nda3si4ni1ndo'3o3 ndu2kwa4chi3 ndu2,
ya1kan3,ka4chi2yu3ba4 2ji'4in4 ndu2ndi4,"Su14u3na1ko3nde3e3ku4u4 ndo4ndi4na1si'4i2ku4u4ba3 ndo4ndi4ja1nde3e4ku4u4 ndo4kwa'1an1 ndo4ji'4in(4) 2xa14ku'1u1,ya1kan3,ku'1un1 ndo4ji'4in(4) 2".
"Sa4kwa'3a3 ndo4chi3ñu3ku3ni2 ndo4ku3tu3mi3i4ba3 ndo4ja'1a4i3tu2,i3ta2an2i3sa42ni1ki'3in3 ndo4ta1nda'4bi2ko3nde3e3 ra2ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4
ja1ji4ni2 ndo4chi3ñu3ja3chiu4un4 ndo4na4ku4nda'4bi2i3ni2 ndo4ji4ni2 ndo4ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in4 ndo4kwa'1an1 ndo4ja3chiu4un4 ndo4ji'4in4 ra2xa14ku'1u1ndi4ja1ji4ni2 ndo4sa1a3ko3o3ku4u4 ndo4na1nda'4bi2".
Ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 ndu2kwa4chi3 ndu2kwa'1an1 ndu1ku3rra42ji'4in4 ra2ka'4an2 ni42 ra1ji'4in4 ndu2kwa'1an1 ndu1ji4tu3 ndu2ji'4in4 ra3.
"Ndi3i4ndi3i4sa4kwa'3a3 ndo4ku3tu3 ndo4xa'1a4i3tu2si'3i4 2ku3tu3 ndo4ji'4in4ya1ta4,sa4kwa'3a3 ndo4ka'3ni4 ndo4ku1ndu'1u4xa'1a4 e2sa3kan4a3sa3 ndo4,ya1kan3,ku3xa3 ndo4".
"Ji4ni2 ndo4chi3ñu3,sa3ba3na1si'4i2ndi4ji14ni2 na1chi3ñu3i3tun4ku3rra42kwi14i3ta3an4 na2in3,in3tu3tun4kwi14i3ku'1un1kwi1so3 na2in3,ndi3xa3ndi3xa3 lu3i4nde4e4 na2".
"I3i4 na2ni1xi'1i1ndi4nde4e4ba3na1si'4i2ni3ba143ni4ni2 na1ni(3) a2ku3xi3ti3kwa'4a2an4ji4ni2 ndo4chi3ñu3an4ni1ka'1an1 na1
ya1kan3,ku'1un1 ndo4ku3tu3 ndo4ja'1a4yu3ba2ndi4ja1ji4ni2 ndo4ku3ta3ku2 ndo4i3ta2an2i3sa42ku4u4 ndo4na1nda'4bi2".
"Ji14ni2 o4na4ka4ni24 ni42bi4ki1bi4 2ko3o(3) 2yu14bi4ji'4in4 ndo4,ya1kan3,ba'1a(3) e4ka4chi2 o4bi3tin3tan3ba'1a(3) e4ka4chi2 o4i3ta2an2tan3
ji14ni2 o4sa1a3ka4chi2kwe'1e1xa'1a(4) e4tan3sa4kwa'3nu3ba'1a3 ni42 yu1ndo'4o1,kwe4e2sa3kan4ka3ka3 ndo4ku3tu3 ndo4kwe4e2sa3kan4ka3ka3 ndo4ku3ni2 ndo4,
ku3ni2 ndo4chi3ñu3su14u3ka4chi(2) a2na1ta1a3bi4tu3ku4u4na1ti3in3machititi3in3ya1ta4ndi4ba'1a3ku3tu3tu3ndo'4o1na1si'4i2ba3nda'4bi2ku3u3 ndo4ku3ta3ku2 ndo4i3ta2an2i3sa42ji4ni2 ndo4chi3ñu3ji4ni2 ndo4".
"Ndo'4o1na1si'4i2ndi4ba143nda4ñu'4u4ndo'4o1na4ni1ndo1o3nda'4bi2 ndo4ndi4
ndo'4o1ndi4,ya1kan3,i4yo2 ni4(2) a2,mi4i4ba42ki13ta3 ndo4nde'14e4ndi4ko3na1si'4i2tin3ka3ma2 ndo4tin3ja1ni1ta1nda3a2 ndo4ndi3ko3 ndo4ja1ku3xi3 ndo4sa3kan4ba3ja1ko'3o3 ndo4sa3kan4ba3na4ka3ma2 ndo4".
"Ya1xu4xan(3) e4ndi4ko14o3na1yu4bi24ta3an4 na2ña'1a3yu'3u(4) e4ndi4nda1ki3ni3ku4ni2na1yu4bi24ta3xi3 na2ña'1a3ku3xi(3) o4ta3xi3 na2ña'1a3ka3xi(4) o4ndi4
"na4ko3o(3) an4sa3kan4ña4ka1a3ndi4ña4xu4xan3ban4ka1a3ji4to3ji'4in4nu14u(3) an4i4xa(3) e4chi3ñu3tan3ba14ja4ji4ni2 an4a3sa(3) en4chi3ñu3ji'4in(4) o4ndi4i4ndu'3u4ba(3) en4",ka3chi2 na1so'3o3,ka3chi2 na1ji'4in4 ndo4.
"Ya1kan4ndi4a14sa3ndo'4o1sa3kan4ndi4ya1yo'4o4ba42sa4na'1a(1) e1ndo'4o1ku3ta3ku2 ndo4i3ta2an2i3sa42".
"Nda4a2na1ni1ka'1an1ji'4in4 ndo4ku'1un1 ndo4ku1tu1 ndo4ja'1a4yu3ba2ji'4in4 na2ba'1a3ndi4i4yo2 ni42na1ku4ni2 na1ku3tu3 na2ja'1a4yu3ba2bi3tin3".
"Kwa'1an1 ndo4ku1tu3 ndo4ja'1a4yu3ba2ji'4in4 na2kwa'1an1 ndo4,kwa'1an1ki1bi4,ya1kan3,ka4a4nu4na4 ndo4tin3kwa'1an1 ndo4,kwa'1an1 ndo4ji'4in4ni1bi4ku3tu3 ndo4ja'1a4yu3ba2ji'4in4 na2tin3".
"Ki1bi4,ya1kan3,i4yo2chi3ñu3nu14u3tu(3) 2yo'4o4tin3kwa'1an1tu3mi3i4ba(3) e4na4ni1chi'3i(3) 2yu3ba2ni1chi'3i(3) 2tin3kwa'1an1tu3mi3i4ba(3) e4tin3ku3tu3 ndo4xa'1a4 e2kan4ji'4in(4) o4".
"Sa3kan4sa3kan4a3sa(3) e4ku4u(4) e4na1nda'4bi2ji14ni2 o4sa1a3a3sa(3) e4,ba14ja4sa4na'1a(1) e1ndo'4o1mañakwi'4na4bi4tu3".
ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4ya1yo'4o4a3sa3ndo'4o1ya1yo'4o4ba'1a3 ni42ya1yo'4o4a3sa3 ndo4ya1yo'4o4ku3u3 ndo4a1chi1ndi4ba'1a3 ni4(2) a2yo'4o4ka3chi2 yu1ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4ku14ni2 yu1ka'1an(1) e1sa3kan4ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4
yo'4o4ba42ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4 ndo4a3sa3 ndo4chi3ñu3nda'4bi2,nda'4bi2ku3u3 ndo4,ki1ku3 ndo4ki'3in3 ndo4xu'14un4ki'3in3 ndo4".
"Ya1kan3,to1to1kan4nda3ndo3o3 ri4ndu3xi4nda3ndo3o3 ri4tin3,butaja1ni1xi14ko3 ndo4ti4kan4tin3ja1ni1ja3ta4tu3ku3 ndo4tio1to1tin3ja1si4in4ja1si4in4a3sa3 ndo4ji'4in(4) a2".
"I3ta2an2i3sa42ku3xa3 ndo4su14u3sa3kan4ko3o3 ndo4ndi4na1kwa'1an1ku3xa3ku4u4 ndo4ko3o3se'1e3 ndo4ko3o(3) a2,ku4ni(2) a2xu'14un4ku4ni(2) a2ji'4in4 ndo4".
"Ya1ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4 ndo4yo'4o4ya1kan4ka'1an1 ndo4ji'4in4se'1e3 ndo4i3ta2an2i3sa42ko3o(3) a2ndi4ka'1an1 ndo4ji'4in(4) a2,su14u3,nda4a(2) e2ka'1an1 ndo4ji'4in(4) a2ndi4
nda1tan42ni1sa4kwa'3nu(3) 2ndo'4o1nda1tan42i13xa(3) 2ji'4in4 ndo4sa3kan4a3sa3 ndo4ji'4in4se'1e3 ndo4ka4chi2yu3ba4 2ji'4in4 ndu2ta4ku1 ra1",bi4ka1ndi4xa4xa'4an2i3in4 ndu2i4xa3yu3ba4 ndu2ka4ni3 ra2 ndu1ki'4in4 ndu2ya'1bi3 ndu2i4xa3yu3ba4 ndu2tan3
su14u3ja14(3) e2kan4tan3butabi3tin3ndi4ba'1a3ka1na4ku'1un1na'14a(1) e1a1chi1ndi4yu3ba(4) e4ndi4ka4ni3 ni42 ra1i4xa3 ni42 ra1ja13ni1ku3ji'4in(4) o4ka3chi2 ndu1ndi4ba14ja4ni4ka'1an1 ndu1sa3kan4.
"Su14u3ja14(3) e2ndi4ka4ni(3) 2ndo'4o1i4xa3ja13ni1ku3 2ji'4in4 ndo4su14u3ja'1a4ña'1a3ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4 ndo4ka3xi4 ndo4ku3xi3 ndo4ndi4

"Ya1xi1ni4 ndo4ya1kan4ndi4ka4ni(3) 2ndo'4o1",ka4chi2yu3ba4 2so'3o3ji'4in4 ndu2kwa4chi3 ndu2kwa'1an1 ndu1xa14ku'1u1ji'4in4 ra3,ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4 ndu3,"Bi3tin3tan3i3ta2an2i3sa42ndi4ya1nda3ka'3an4 ndo4ku4u4,ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4 ndo4ka1a3".
"Su14u3kan4ndi4bi3tin3ba3ta4ku1 yu1ya1kan4ndi4ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4 ndo4i3ta2an2i3sa42ndi4ta1ku3u2ba3ku4u4yu'1u1su14u3sa3kan4ndi'3i3bi4i4yo2 yu1yu14bi4ji'4in4 ndo4ya1kan4ndi4,kan4ndi4i3ta2an2i3sa42ta1ku3u2ba3ku4u4yu'1u1",ka4chi2yu3ba4 2so'3o3
Sa14kwa'3nu3 ra2ndu'1u1kwa4chi3 ndu2kwa'1an1 ndu1xa14ku'1u1ji'4in4 ra2nda4tu'4un4 ra2ji'4in4 ndu2ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4 ndu3.
Nda1ndi'4i4bi4 a2ni1ka'1an1yu3ba4 2nda1ndi'4i4bi4 a2kan4ndi4nda4ka'3an4 2xa'1a4 e3,ba14ja4nda4ndo4so24 2kwen4tu2ni1ka'1an1yu3ba4 2ndi4ñu'4u(4) a2kan4i3ni2 yu1.
Ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) 2,i3ta2an2i3sa42ni1ndo1o(3) on4ku4u(4) un4ña4nda'4bi2ji'4in4si'3i(4) un4ni1ndo1o(3) on4,ko1to1ndu14ku(4) un4tu1ni4ni2ndu14ku(4) un4ña1ko3ndo'3o(3) on4ndu14ku(4) un4,
mi4i4xi4ka3i3i4na1yu4bi24ko3to3nda3a2 on4 ra2mi4i4xi4ka3 ra2,
an4ba'1a3ta1kan4na4nda3ka(3) e4 ra2ba'1a3ta1kan4ka3xi(4) o4xu'14un4 ra2ka3chi2 un4ndi4ko14to(3) on4ya1kan4ndi4
nda'3a(4) on4ya1kan4ku3ta3ku2 un4ji'4in4,ya1kan4ki1ku(3) un4nda'4bi2ku3u(3) un4ki1ku(3) un4tio1to1sa4kwa'3a(3) on4ki1ku(3) un4tio1to1,ya1kan4ndi4sa13ta4 2máquina on4".
"Mi4i4sa4kwa'3a(3) on4ki1ku(3) un4tio1to1,nda4a2ka1na1nda'4bi2ni1ki3xa2a2 na1ku4ni2 na1kwa'3a3xi3yo2 na1ku4ni2 na1kwa'3a3xi1kun1 na1ni1ki3xa2a(2) on4ki1ku(3) un4ta4xin24ku3ndu'4u(4) un4ki1ku(3) un4".
"Su14u3,ya1kan3,ke3ta(3) on4ka3ka3nde'14e(4) on4ke3ta(3) on4ka3ka(3) on4pa3sia42ba3,ko14o3cuentakwa'1an1ji'4in(4) un4sa3kan4ndi4
ya1kan3,ki3xa2a(2) on4tin3,ki3xa2a(2) on4kwa'1an1nde'14e(4) on4tin3ña'1a3ka3xi(4) un4tin3ko14o(3) a2i4yo2ka3xi(4) un4ki3xa2a(2) on4,tan3,ya1kan3,tan42ka4a4nu14u(3) un4kwa'1an(1) on4ka4a4nu14u(3) un4ki3xa2a(2) on4ko14o(3) a2ka3nda2a2chi4chi(3) un4ji'4in(4) a2ka3ka(3) on4kan4kwa'1an(1) on4tin3kwa'3a3kwen4tu2yu'3u(4) un4tin3ya1ki'4bi3ba42kan4".
"Nda1ba'1a3ka1ta4xin24ku3ndu'4u(4) un4ki1ku(3) un4,i3kan4xi14ko(3) on4tio1to1xi14ko(3) on4tin3i4yo(2) a2ka3xi(4) un4i4yo(2) a2ka3xi(4) un4i4yo2ku4u(4) un4ña4nda'4bi2i4ndu'3u(4) un4i3ta2an2i3sa42na4,yu'1u1ndi4ta1ku3u2ba3ku4u4yu'1u1i3ta2an2i3sa42".
ndio4si2ku4ni(2) a2,ya1kan3,nda13ta3ku2 un4ki'13in(3) un4ta1a3ku3ndu'4u4 ra2ji'4in(4) un4ta1kan4ku4u4ta1su3kwe4nda2 ra1yo'4o1ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ki'3in3 ra2cuentaji'4in(4) un4".
"Tan3ya1i4yo2mi3i(4) un4tin3nda4a2ba42ji4ni2 yu1,an4tu2i4yo2tu(3) un4ji'4in4ku'1ba(3) on4ba'1a3tu3ku'1ba(3) on4na4tu2ku4i3ni2tu3ta1ka1a3yo'4o1tin3i4yo2ba(3) on4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ba143ji4ni2 ra1ku'1un1nda1ka3 ra2yo'4o1ndi4ku'1ba(3) on4ku4u4 ra3,yo'4o1ban4ndo'4o(4) on4ji'4in4se'1e3 ra3,ndo'4o(4) on4ji'4in4yu'1u1".

"Ya1kan3,ji4to3kwe4nda2 on4ndu'1u1tin3nda4ka3ta(3) on4tio1to1 ndu1nda4ka3ta(3) on4tin3nda4a(2) e2ji4ni2 yu1a3sa(3) 2ji'4in(4) un4se'1e3 2ku4u(4) un4ko14o(3) a2ji4ni2 yu1a3sa(3) 2ji'4in(4) un4ni3kwi14i3xa3xa4 2yo'4o1ni3kwi14i3ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in4na1yu4bi24,
bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,ku4ni2 ni42 yu1ndi4ta3nda'3a4se'1e3 2ku3ndu'4u4 ndo4ji'4in4se'1e3 2ka3chi2 yu1ndi4kwi14i3xa3xa4 2yo'4o1si'3i4 2bi4xi1ka4a(4) e2kan4,ta4xin24ku3ndu'4u4ba3yo'4o1".
"Ke3ta3mi3i4ba3na1yu4bi24ka'1an1 na1xa'1a(4) on4na4tu2ku4ni2 na1ji4ni2 na1yo'4o1kwi14i3xa3xa4 2yo'4o1su14u3i3na2ku4u(4) un4na4xa3xa4 2yo'4o1",ka4chi2yu3ba4 ndu2ta4ku1 ra1".
"Ndu14ku(4) un4tu1ni4ni2ko3ndo'3o(3) 2ndu14ku(4) un4ndi4ta4xin24ku3ndu'4u(4) un4kwa'1a3i3ni2 un4ku3ndu'4u(4) un4".
"Ya1ña1a4ba42ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4,ji'4in(4) un4tin3ku14ni2 yu1ji4ni2 yu1ti1tu'4un4ku14ni2 yu1,su14u3ta1sa'4an4ku4u4yu'1u1ndu3ku4 ndo4kwa1chi3ndu3ku4 ndo4ko3ndo'3o3yu'1u1ndi4ta1nda'4bi2ba3ku4u4yu'1u1".
"Su14u3tu1ndi4ni2ku4ni2 yu1ya1kan4ndi4sa4kwa'3nu(3) 2ndo'4o1ndi4na1ku3i3ni2 yu1ku4u4 ndo4na1a3sa3ma1ni4yu'1u1ku4u4 ndo4ku4ni2 yu1ya1kan4sa4kwa'3nu(3) 2ndo'4o1,tan3ya1kan4ndi4
ya1kan4ba42ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ya1kan4chi3ka2i3ni2 un4i3ta2an2i3sa42na4nda4a(2) e2ni1ndo'3o(3) 2ni1xi'1i1 yu1ndi4a14sa(3) on4ya1ki'4bi3ku3u(3) un4ta4xin24ku3ndu'4u(4) un4".
Ya1kan4ba42chi13ka2 yu1ji1ni4yu'1u1ki1bi4ni1xi'1i1yu3ba4 2ba14sa3ji4ni2 o4ku4u(4) e4na1nda'4bi2i4nde4e(4) o4,

nda4a2ba42ji4ni2 ni42 o4ka3na3xu'14un4ku'1ba3 2ndi4ku14nde3e4ta1ka1a3a3sa3ma1ni4 ra2yo4o4ta1ka1a3ndi4ta1i4yo2ña4si'4i2ku4u4ta1ka1a3i4yo2se'1e3ta1ka1a3i4yo2,ku14nde3e4ta1ka1a3a3sa3ma1ni4 ra2yo4o4,mi4i4ba42ka3na(3) e2ku3ta3ku2yo4o4,

na4ku'1un(1) o4ku'1un1ko1to(1) e4a4chu3ba42kwa4a4 ni42i3na2tan3nda143ti4in4ti4in4ti4 ri4tan3i4ji4ta3 ri4ku4u4tu4u2 e4tan3i4na'14a1 ni42 ri4,

Ni1ke3ta3ti4si'3i4 2tan42i3in3su3tun4ba1ba'1a3ti4ni1ja'1an1si'3i4 2tan3ni1ke1nu3u(3) an4ni1nu1ja'1an(1) en4,
na4ndo3ko3to(3) an4ndi4ña1a4ba3ka4ndi3ka2 ra1yu'3u4i3na2chi1.

"¿Nda4a(2) e2,nda4a(2) e2ba42i4yo2ran3?"."An4ji14ni2 un4ndi4i3kan4kwa'1an1sa4ka2 na1mi3tiu'4un4nda4ndu3ku4 na2 ra1tan3ko14o3 ra2ni'4i14 na2".

I3na2ja1na1ta1ta4u3ni2LeónNiñua4lu3u3ndo3o3i3na2ka4ya2ta1ta4u3ni2xi4ka3 ra2ñu'3u4na1tu3un4.
Xi4ka3 ra2i4ja3tu'1ba3 ra2tan3ba1xi3i3na2ji'4in4 ra3,ti4ña1a4ba3ni1ka1ti3in3 ri4ja13xi4ndi'3i3 ri4ji3to2 ndu1Vaciu.
I3kan4ja143ni1ki3xa2a2ba3chi3ñu3be'3e3tin3,
"¿na4ndi3xa3 ni42ku4u(4) un4ndi4ji13ni2 un4ran4si'3i4 2?",ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4si'3i4 2."Ndi3xa3ku4u4ba(3) e2ndi4ji3to2 ndu1ku4u4ba3ta1ka4ndu'3u4i3kan4,i3kan4ka4ndu'3u4 ra3,kwa'4an2 ndo4ku'1un1ko1to1 ndo4tan3ku3ni2 ndo4",
ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 na3.Ja143ni1ku3yu3kun2ba3 na2ja143nda13ka3na3ba3 na2ta'4an4 na2mi4i4kwa'1an1na1kan4nda4ndu3ku4 na2na1kan4,ba'1a3bi3tin3i4yo2ka3a2ka'4an2 e4ji'4in4bi3tin3sa3kan4ndi4ko14o3ka3a2sa3kan4.
I3kan4,ja143nda13ka3na3ba3 na2na1kan4tin3,"Na4ku'1un(1) o4ku'1un1ko1to(1) e4ndi4yo'4o4ba3ka4ndu'3u4 ra2ji13ni2 an4yo'4o4tan3ji13ni2 o4na4su3u3 ra2chi1ka4chi2 an4".
"Na4ku'1un(1) o4ku'1un1ko1to(1) e4tan3ku3ni2 o4".Ja143ndu13ko3yo3 na2kwa'1an1 na1lu14u3 na2kwa'1an1 na1ña1a4kwa'1an1ko1to1 na1.

I3kan4ja143tu3ku3i3chi4ni1ke3ta3 ra2nda1ye'14e4ja'1an1 ra1ji'4in4machitixi4ni13 ra2ja'1an1 ra1.
I3kan4ja'1an1tu3ku(3) 2ni1ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in4yu3ba4 2ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in4yu3ba4 2,"Yu3ba4 2so'3o3so'3o3i13xa3tu3ku3 ra2ji'4in(4) 2ni1xi'3i3 ra2",ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in4yu3ba4 2.
Tan3ko14o3ta1kan4i4yo2ndi4ta1kwa'1an1yu3ku4ku4u4ta1kan4xi4ka3ti3kwa'4a2kan4i4xi4ko3ba3ta1kan4a1chi1ta1ndi4ni2ku4u4ta1kan4ka'1an1 ra1bi3ko4ja'1a4se'1e3 ra2ya1kan4ndi4ndi4ni2 ra1tan3ta1yo'4o4ndi4ja1i3nga(2) e2ku4u4ta1yo'4o4xi4ka3 ra2.
"An4yu'1u1tu3xa'13ni4 2se'1e3ta1kan4yu3ba4 2ni14ja'3ni4 2se'1e3ta1kan4ji4to3mi3i4yu3ba(4) e4ndio4si2ta1kwa'1an1ka1a3ndi4ni14ja'3ni4yu'1u1se'1e3 na2yu'1u1xi4ka3mi3i4ba3yu'1u1ña4nda'4bi2ba3ku4u4yu'1u1",
"Ku14ni2 yu1ka3na3yo'4o1yu'1u1tan3ka3si3kwe'3e2 on4ji'4in(4) 2xa'1a4tu1ni4ni2kan4na4tu2nda4a(2) e2ku4u(4) a2i4yo2ni1ta1ku1kwen4tu2xa'1a4yu'1u1ndi4,
i4xa(3) e2ki'4bi3ji'4in4na1kan4ndu13ku4 2na1yu4bi24ba3ndu13ku4 2ku4sa4ka1ji'4in4na1kan4ndi4ku14ni2 yu1sa3kan4ndi4ko14o3xu'14un4yu3ba4 2".
"Tan3na1yo'4o4ndi4chi4ndu'4u4 na2kwen4tu2ki'4bi3ja1ta4 2",ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in4 ra3."Ba14sa3si'3i4 2ba14sa3nda1na4ka3ku'1un3 ra2ku'1un1 ra1be'3e3ka3a2sa3kan4ku3ni2 o4sa1a3ti4ko3o3 ra3".
"Ña4ndi4chi2tu3ku4u4yu'1u1ba3ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2 an4ña4i4ndu'3u4ji'4in4yu3ba4 2ji'4in(4) 2,i4ndu'3u(4) an4,i4yo2 an4bi3tin3ba(3) en4ndi4ña4ku'4u2ban4nda'4bi2nde3e4 ni42ndo'4o(4) an4tin3.
"Ndi4chi2tu3yu'1u1ba3ji'4in(4) un4tan3ku3ni2 o4sa1a3ti4ko3o(3) a2",ka4chi2 an4ji'4in(4) 2."Ba'1a3ba3",ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4,"A3sa3 ndo4 a2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2ran4",
"Bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,Sebiu,ko14o(3) a2kwa'1a4 ni42bi4ku4ni(2) a2bi3tin3ndi4ti'3bi(4) un4na4nda'3a4xa'1a(4) on4na4ku'1un1 na1ku'1un1nda1ki'1in3 na2ta1ku4u4ta1ni1ja'1an1ji'4in4machitiyu'3u4ye'14e4,
bi3tin3ndi4ja1ni1ya'1a3ba42nda4tu'4un(4) an4yo'4o4ji'4in(4) o4ba1xi3tan3ba1xi(3) an4nda4tu'4un(4) an4ji'4in(4) o4tan3na4chu3ba42ndi4ya'1a3 ni42ku'3ba2ji'4in(4) a2,
ba'1a3ka1bi3tin3na4ku3na3ni(2) a2tan3ku3ni2 o4sa1a3ki3xi3ndo1o3 a2a1chi1ndi4tian42ku4u4ta1kan4tin3ki3xa2a2 ra1kwa'1an1 ra1yu3ku4tin3
tan3nda3tu'4un4ba(3) en4ka1a3ji'4in4 ra2ndi4sa3kan4ni1ndo'3o(3) an4tin3ba'1a3na4kan4tan3i4ta4 ni42 an4ndi4ña4ja143ka13ku3se'1e3ti4ban4tan3ba1xi(3) an4nu14u(3) e4".
"An4u'1bi1na4a3sa3ka'4bi13 a2ji'4in(4) a2ka1a3a1chi1ndi4se'1e3i4ta4i4chi(3) an4ni1ka3ku3tan3ndo'4o(4) an4sa3kan4".
"An4ta1kan4ni1ki'1bi3 ra2be'3e3tin3ka'3ni4 ra2ña4ka1a3tin3,tan3nda4a2ba42ji4ni2 ni42 o4a3sa(3) e4ji'4in4ta1kan4na4ki13xa2a2 ra1tin3".
"¿Na4chu3ku4u(4) a2ndi4ni14ka3na3 ndo4yu'1u1a4chu3ku4u(4) a2?",an4ya1i4yo2ba42ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4bi3tin3,ba'1a3 ni42ya1yu14bi4bi3tin3ndi4i4yo(2) a2ya1ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4bi3tin3,
ni1ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4 na2nda4a2ndi'3i3ñu'4u4 na2tan3ba1xi3ba3 na3,nda4a(2) e2ba42ji4ni2 o4ka3chi2 o4ja1ni1ndo'3o3ba(3) e4ja1ni1ndi'3i3ba3sa3kan4ki3xa2a2 na1mi4i4kwa'1an1 na1.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4yu3ba4 2ni1ka3na3 ra2yu3ba4 2ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,"Ya1yo'4o4ya1yo'4o4ni1ndo'3o3se'1e3 2ni1ndo'3o(3) an4tan3ki13xi(3) an4nda13tu'4un(4) an4ji'4in(4) 2ya1kan4ndi4
bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,yo'4o1Venciu,kwa1chi3ko3ndo(3) a2yo'4o4bi3tin3,chi3ndu'4u(4) 2kwa1chi3tan3ku'1un1 na1,ku'1un1 na1ku'1un1nda1ki'1in3 na2 ra1kwa3a4tan3sa3kan4ndi4i4yo2 on4ji'4in(4) an4ka1a3tan3sa3kan4ku3na3ni2kwa1chi3ndi4ya1ji4ni2 un4xa'1a4ku4u4tu1ni4ni2ya1ndo'4o(4) an4".
"Bi3tin3ndi4i4yo2 on4ji'4in(4) a2bi3tin3",ka4chi2yu3ba4 2ji'4in4,ji'4in4tu3ku3ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) 2tin3."Ba'1a3ba3ko14o(3) a2i4yo2,ko14o(3) a2ji4ni2 o4ka3chi2 o4ji'4in(4) a2yu3ba4 2".
Sa3kan4ndi'3i3ku4u4ba3 na2sa3kan4ndi'3i3i4xa3ba3 na2ni3ba143yu'4bi2 yu1ji4ni2 yu1 na1yu'1u1ndi4nda4a(2) e2ndo'4o4yu'1u1yu'4bi2 yu1ji4ni2 yu1na1ña1a4yu'1u1.
"Nda'3a4ta1ña1a4tan3nda'3a4tu3yu'1u1ba3a1chi1ta1i4yo2nda'3a4tu3,a4ko14o3ma3chi4ti2nda'3a4yu'1u1ta1i4yo2nda'3a4tu3ku4u4yu'1u1ba3".
"Tan3,an4ya1kan4ku4ni2 ra1a3sa3 ra2ji'4in(4) an4ka1a3tan3a3sa3nda'4bi2tu3 ra2yu'1u1ka4chi2ka'4an4 ra2ndi4ba143xa'1a4 e2kan4ndi4nda1na4i13xa3tu3 ra2sa3kan4ki3xi3tu1ni4ni2ya1a3sa3tu3yu'1u1ba3a1chi1ndi4,
nda1ndi'4i(4) o4na1yu4bi24ndi4na1nda3sa1a4ku4u4ba3yo4o4na4nda4a(2) e2i4yo2",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4yu3ba4 2."Sa3kan4ti4na4ku'1un1ndi3ko4 a2yu3ba4 2sa3kan4ti4na4ku'1un1ndi3ko4 a2ndi4ka'14an1 ni42ka1 on4ndi4ja1ba'1a3ba3".
"Kwa3a4sa3kan4ku3ni2 o4sa1a3ko3o3ji'4in(4) a2,nda1xi4ko1ndi4ku14na3ni(2) a2kwa3a4ndi4ta1nda1ki14tu3yo4o4i3ta2an2ku3na3ni(2) a2ndi4sa1a3tan42ka3ku'1un3ti4 ra2ku'1un1 ra1be'3e3ka3a2",ka4chi2yu3ba4 2ji'4in4ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) 2tin3.
Ni1xa3ku'1un3ja3ba3ta1ña1a4kwa'1an1 ra1be'3e3ka3a2tin3,i3kan4ja143ni1ki4tu3ja143ju13na3ni(2) a2ña1a4tin3,xa143ni1xa1a1ba(3) en4ña1a4tin3xa1a1ba3yu3ba4 2ni1xa1a1tin3,
i3kan4ja143nda4ka1tu'4un4ta1chi4ñu3ndi4kun2 ra1,ni14ka'1an1yu3ba4 2ndi4i3kan4ba3ki13ta3yu3ba4 2i4ndu'3u4 ra2tan3ta1chi4ñu3ndi4kun2ku4u4ta1ta13xi3na3ni(2) a2.
"¿Sa1a3i4yo2ya1kan4i13xa(3) on4ji'4in(4) an4ka1a3ya1kan4ndi4i13xa(3) on4ja'1an(1) on4be'3e(3) an4ji'4in4machititan3ji4to3tu(3) un4ndi4ta1ko14o3tu3ku4u4ta1ka1a3i4yo2tan3ni1ja'1an(1) on4ji'4in4machitibe'3e3?".
"Na4ña4ka1a3ni4i3xa(3) on4ya1ko14o3nu14u3ji'4in(4) an4ni4ja'3ni(4) un4ña4ka1a3ndi4,¿nda4a2ba42ku'1un1tu3yo'4o1tu3,nda4a2ba42ji4ni2tu3yo'4o1ku'1un(1) un4ya1kan4ndi4i4xa(3) on4sa3kan4ji'4in4ña4si'4i2ya3ni2 un4?".
"Tan3ta1ka1a3ndi4ki13xa2a2ta1ka1a3tin3,¿an4ja4ndi1ko3ta1ka1a3tu1ni4ni2ya1sa3kan4ni1i3xa(3) on4tu4u2 un4?,ja14ndi1ko3ta1ka1a3 e2ji'4in(4) un4".
"Nda1ba'1a3ka1ndi4yo'4o4ki3tu'4un(4) un4 ya2be'3e3chi4ñu3yo'4o4,yo'4o4nda3ka3ni3ni2tu3mi3i4ba(3) on4ndi4ba14sa4ba'1a3ke4ta(3) e2ji'4in(4) un4ka4a(4) e2chiu3un3i4xa(3) on4sa3kan4".
"Tan3su14u3se'1e3 2ku4u4ña4ni4i3xa3sa3kan4ni4i3ja3nda'4bi2 an4yo'4o1ja'13ni(4) an4se'1e(3) on4ndi4ba143ni4ja'3ni(4) an4ka1a3se'1e(3) on4chi2ka4chi2 an4ji'4in(4) 2".
"Tan3ka4a(4) e2ku4u(4) un4sa3kan4ni1i3xa(3) on4sa3kan4ji'4in4se'1e3 2sa4yu'3bi2 un4 na2nde4e4 na2be'3e3".
"Ta1ka1a3ndi4sa3kan4xi4ka3ba3ta1ka1a3,su14u3ta1xi4ka3xi4kwi'4na4ku4u4ti3kwa'4a2ndi4ni1kwa'3a3ni1kwa'3a3tio1to1kwa'1an1mi3i4ba3ta1ka1a3yu3ku4ki3xa2a2 ra1".
"ta1ndi4ni2ku4u4ta1ka1a3xi4ka3 ra2nda'4bi2ku4u4 ra2xi4ka3 ra2tan3yo'4o1tu3tin3,
i4xa3tu(3) un4i4ndu'3u(4) un4 a2,i4xa(3) on4 a2ko14o3nu14u3ji'4in4tu3 na2,tan3yo3o3ku4u4ta1ka1a3tan3yo3o3tu3ku4u4yo'4o1ya3ni2 ndo4tan3i4xa3 ndo4sa3kan4",ka4chi2yu3ba4 2ji'4in4 ra2,ju13na3ni2ba3kwa1chi3ña1a4tin3.
Ni14kwi3i3ku3na3ni2ba'1a3 e2ni14nda3kwi3in3 ra2sa1a3ti4ko3o3ji'4in(4) a2ña1a4ku3na3ni(2) a2tin3,¡kwa'4an2nda1ka3 ndo4 ra2be'3e3ka3a2!
"Be'3e3ka3a2tu3kwa3nda3ndi3ko4ta1ka1a3ku4ni(2) a2nda1kwa'3a2ke3e3yu'3u4 ra2ka'1an1 ra1ndi4na4ko14o(3) a2a3sa3 ra2sa3kan4ndi4ke3ta3 ra2",ka4chi2tu3kwa3ta1chi4ñu3ndi4kun2tin3.Kwa'1an1tu3kwa3 ra2be'3e3ka3a2ba3ran4.
A1chi1ko14o(3) a2ni4ku3na3ni2,nda1ki14tu3bi4sa3kan4ba42ndi4ni1ju3na3ni(2) a2i13xa3yu3ba4 ndu2ndi4yu3ba4 ndu2ku4u4ta1nda13ki'3in(3) a2,si1so3 2ku4u4ta1ni1nda3ki'3in3nu14u(3) a2kwa'1an1 ra1ji'4in(4) a2tan3,
i3kan4ba42nda13tu'4un4 na2sa1a3ti4ko3o3ji'4in(4) a3."Sa3kan4a3sa(3) e2ji'4in(4) un4ya1kan4ndi4ka'4an2 ni42 yu1,sa3kan4a3sa(3) e2ya1kan4ndi4ka'4an2 ni42 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4
ku14ndi3kun2 un4ña4ka1a3ka3ka(3) on4ji'4in4machitiji'4in(4) an4ka3ni3ni2 un4ya1ki'4bi3ji'4in(4) an4ka1a3a1chi1ndi4ja1ji4ni2 un4ndi4su14u3ña4ka1a3ku4u4ña4ni4i3xa3sa3kan4ji'4in4se'1e(3) on4ndi4i3nga2ni1bi4ku4u4bi4na1kan4,
i4xa3 na2sa3kan4tan3bi3tin3ndi4si4kwi3so3kwa1chi(3) un4na1ka1a3,nda1mi3i(4) an4nda1ya3ni2 un4si4kwi3so3kwa1chi(3) un4ba'14a4i4xa(3) on4sa3kan4".
"Ba143ba'1a3ke4ta(3) e2kan4ka4a(4) e2ku4u4sa3kan4a1chi1ndi4se'1e3yu'1u1ku4u4 ndo4tan3i4xa3 ndo4sa3kan4ji'4in4ta'4an4 ndo4",ni1ka3chi2yu3ba4 ndu2ji'4in4 ra2be'3e3chi4ñu3.
Ña1a4tan3ju13na3ni2ba(3) e2ran4yu3ba4 2,ju13na3ni(2) a2tan3ke13ta3 ra2be'3e3ka3a2kwa1nu'1u4ba3 ra2ran4.
Ju13na3ni(2) a2.
Ya1kan4ba42ka'4an2 ni42 yu1ji'4in4se'1e3 2bi3tin3ba3,nda143i3nda14ta1lu3u3kan4i4yo2ka1 ra1ji'4in(4) 2ka'4an2 ni42 yu1ji'4in4 ra2:
"a14sa(3) on4sa3kan4yu3ba4 2,a14sa(3) on4sa3kan4ku14ni2 yu1ko'3o(3) on4ku14ni2 yu1ke3ta(3) on4ma14ñu2ka3ni3ta'4an4na1yu4bi24ji'4in(4) un4ka3ni3ta'4an(4) on4ji'4in4 na3".
"Ka3ka3nu3ya1ko4ndo3kwa1chi3ji'4in(4) o4tu1ni4ni2ji'4in(4) o4ndi4
su14u(3) a2ba'1a3ku4u4tu1ndi4ni2na4ja1ni1ke3e3kan4ni1ja4nda3xa14a2 ndo4nu14u(3) a2ndi4
ba143ba'1a3ke4ta(3) e2kan4sa3kan4,ya1nda4ka3be'3e3ka3a2ba42kan4,an4ku4ni2yo'4o1mi4i4ndi4ka2 on4xi'4i(4) un4tan3ko1yo3na1nda4chi4ñu3ko1yo3na1comisiónja1ta(4) on4,
an4ni1nu1kan4nda3kwa'1a3 na(2) e2xa'1a(4) on4tin3ni1ke3ta(3) on4kwa'1an(1) on4be'3e3ka3a2tin3an4ña'3a4,an4ta1a3ku4u4yu'1u1ya1kan4ndi4ka3ka3yu'1u1ja1ta4yo'4o1mi4i4kwa'1an(1) on4ña'3a4ba3ku4u4yu'1u1ji14ni2 yu1nda4a(2) e2a3sa(3) 2ji'4in4yo'4o1kwa'1an(1) on4be'3e3ka3a2yu'1u1".
"Na4ku'1un1 ra1ta1xi1ni4 ni42ku4u4 ra3,ka'4an2 ni42 yu1ji'4in4 ra2tan3ko14o3so'1o3 ra2ka3chi2ba3yu'1u1i4ndu'3u4 2ran3".
"Ko14o(3) a2ba'1a3yu'1u1ña'3a4ba3ku4u4yu'1u1".ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in4 ra3.I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) 2ndi4,"¿an4sa3kan4cho41si'3i4 2?"."Sa3kan4ran4,sa3kan4a1chi1ndi4
nda4tu'4un4 ni42na1ta4u3ni2nda4tu'4un4 na2ndi4ko14o3i3in3ki1bi4ba'1a3ke3ta(3) e4ma14ñu2ka3ni3ta'4an(4) e4ji'4in4na1yu4bi24chi2,ba'1a3 ni42ba3ka3ni3ta'4an(4) e4ji'4in4na1kan4ba'1a3 ni42ba3na4ko14o(3) a2ji4ni2 na1ran4.
Tan3na4tu2i4yo(2) a2ji4ni2na1kan4tin3tan3i3kan4ba42i1yo3ku3sa4ka1 na1ji'4in(4) o4,ba143ba'1a3sa3kan4,i4yo2se'1e(3) o4i4yo2kwa'3nu3se'1e(3) o4kwa'3nu3.
"A1su3 a2ka'4an2 e4ya1kan4nda3tu'4un4ba(3) on4ji'4in4se'1e(3) on4i3ta2an2i3sa42na4ni1xu3xa(3) on4tin3tan3i4yo2se'1e(3) on4tin3",
"ke3ta3na1kwa4chi3ndi4i4yo2ka4xi3i3ni2 na1ke3ta3 na2nda3tu'4un4 na2kwen4tu2ji'4in(4) o4".
"ba'1a3ka'4an2 on4yu3ba4 2ba'1a3ka'4an2 on4ji'4in4 ndu2ka3chi2ba3na1kwa4chi3ji'4in(4) un4i3ta2an2i3sa42tin3,ña1a4ba42nda3ki'3in(3) un4ya1ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4ran4",ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in4 ra3.
"Sa3kan4ba3ran4si'3i4 2ku4u4 ra2so'3o3ji'4in(4) 2tin3,sa3kan4ba3ndi4ko14o(3) a2i4yo2bi4ta'3an2xi4ka(3) 2,xi4ka3mi3i4ba3yu'1u1",ka4chi2 ra1.
"Ba'1a3 ni42ku4ni2 yu1ndi4kwa'1a4 ni42na1yu4bi24ku4u4na1ku4mi3i4 na(2) e2ma1ni4ji'4in(4) un4yu3ba4 2,ba'1a3 ni42ka1ba3sa3kan4tu4u2 yu1a1chi1ndi4
na4nda4a(2) e2ndo'4o(4) on4nda4a(2) e2ku4u(4) un4ndi4i3kan4ke3ta3na1kan4sa4ya'1a3 na2chi3ñu3nu14u(3) 2na4nda4a(2) e2ndo'4o(4) on4ran4".
"ku'1un(1) un4ko1to(1) on4ña4ta4u3ni2i3kan4ka4ni3 ni42 na1se'1e(3) on4ka3chi2 na1ji'4in(4) 2kwa'1a4 ni42amigu un4i4yo2ji4to3yu'1u1",ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in4 ra3,
An3,¿an4ba'1a3 ni42ku4ni2yo'4o1i4yo2amigu yu1si'3i4 2?
"Ba'1a3ku4ni2 yu1a1chi1ndi4na1nda3tu'4un4ji'4in(4) 2ku4u4na1kan4na4nda4a(2) e2ndo'4o(4) on4na4nda4a(2) e2ku4u4ran4",ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in4 ra3,xa4ku1se'1e3 2ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4 ra3.
"ya1nda3ka'3an(4) on4ba42ña1a4i3ta2an2i3sa42bi3tin3ba3ka'4an2 yu1bi3tin3ba3,e1ta4 e2ndi4nde3e4tu'1un3yu'1u1nde3e4ta1chi4ba3yu'1u1ya1kan4ndi4ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4".
"I3ta2an2i3sa42yo3o3ku4u4na1ka'1an1ka1sa3kan4ji'4in(4) un4ran3,ko14o3ni1bi4ka'1an1ta4ta2na1ko3to3nde'14e4yo4o4ku4u4na1yu4bi24",ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in4 ra2ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4 ra3.
Sa1a3ko3o3ka1bi4ka'1an(1) e4ji'4in4na1kwa4chi3ran4yu3ba4 2ka'4an2ba3yo4o4ni3na4ña'3a4ka1a3ban4,
ni1ndo'3o3 ni42ja3ba3yu'1u1ki1bi4ni1ndo1o3 2tan3ni1xi'1i1ta1ya3ni2 un4ña1a4ndi4
nda4a2ba42ji4ni2 o4ka3chi2 o4na1ku4u4na1ku4nde3e4i3ni2 o4tin3ni1xi'1i1ba3na1ña1a4tin3ni1ndo1o(3) an4ka1a3ji'4in(4) 2tin3,
ni14kwi3i3ka3chi2tu(3) 2ji'4in(4) an4ko14o3,na1ja1u1ni1bi4ku4u4ta1Calixtruka1a3ke13ta3 ra2ndu13ku4 ra2ña4ka1a3,u1bi1na1ta1a3kwa4chi3ni1ndu3ku4 na2 ña4.
Tan3ko14o3bi4 a2ni1ka'1an1 na1ya1nu14u3nu14u3ni1ki3xa2a2 na1ndi4,ta1xi4kan1ku4u4ba3 na2ndi4,ya1kan4,
yo'4o4tan3nda3xa2a2 ra1be'3e3ba3 ndo4ti3in3 ndu2 lu(3) a2tan3nda3xa2a2 ra1be'3e3ba3 ndo4ku4ni2 ndu1,ya1kan4ni1ka3chi2ta1i4ndu'3u4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4:

"Ya1kan3,ja1sa4ña4 e2ji'4in4 ra2ndi4ko14o(3) a2ndo'4o4 ra3,i3ku3ba42nde3e4 ni42ndo'4o4 ra3".
"Na1yu'4bi2sa4ka2ku4u4 ndu3,ya1kan4ta1ta13ba4se'14e2 ndu1ku4u4 ra2ndi4ku3ñu2ya3kwin4sa14ka3xi4 ndu2 ra1ndi4ya1ba'1a3 ni42ba42ka4chi2ni1bi4ya1kan4sa14ka3xi4 ndu2 ra1tan3,tan3ba'1a3ndi4ko14o(3) a2ndo'4o4ka1 ra1".
"butaan4sa3kan4ba3i13xa3 ndo4ji'4in4 ra2ya1kan4ba42ndi4lu14u3ka4ta4su1kun4 ra2ya1ni1kwa3a4i3ku3tan3ya1tan3nda13ki'3in(3) 2ba1xi3 2ni1ki4tu3ndi4
ko14o3ka1sa3yu2ndo'4o4 ra2ndi4ja1ta4xin24ba3ka4ndu'3u4 ra2ni1ki3xa2a2 yu1ni1ki4tu3"."Ku3ñu2ya3kwin4sa14ka3xi4 ndu2 ra1,ya1kan3sa3yu2ka3a2ndo'4o4 ra3".
bu4ta1su3ya1ni1kwa3a4ka1tan3ni1ki4tu3ndi4ni14ka3ta4ka1su1kun4 ra2ji'4in(4) a2ton4,ya1kan4ndi4ka4ta4su1kun4 na2ndi4kwa'1an1i4chi3ta1chi4 na2ji'4in(4) a3.
Ku4ni2ki'3in3i4chi(3) a2ta1chi4 na2ran4,nda143xi4ka3xi4ka3xi4ka3ti4nda'3a4 na2ndi4nda143ndi4ka1nda4ndi1ka1nda4ndi1ka1ti4yu'3u4 na2ndi4ba143kwi4i4ki3xa2a2ta1chi4 na3,nde3e4sa4ka2i4xa(3) e3.

¿Nda4a2ka1i3nga2ki3ti4ko4ndo3ta1tan4ji4ni2 un4?

Ti1chi4tin3¿an4ba143ko4ndo3 ri4ta1tan4?

na4tu2ti4bi2 o4 ya2tan3nda'4yu(1) a1ndi4kwi3i3ki3xi3ko1o4sa4yu'3bi2 ri4yo4o4ka4chi2 na1tan3ji14ni2 o4na4ndi3xa3bi4ba42ndi4sa3kan4ka'4an2ti4ba3 na2.
Yu3bi2ba3i4yo(2) a2kan4ndi4su14u3sa1a3ku4u4xi4ña4bi4tu3ndi4tan42ku4u4mi4i4bi3xa4i4yo2ndo'1yo3ba3i3kan4ba3i4yo(2) a2kan4.

Ni3ko14o3i3nga2ya1ba'1a3bi4 a2ndi4ya1yu1ku1kan4ndi4a1su3na1ba4li4ku4u4na1chi3ñu3 ni42ti3bi(2) a2a1chi1
na4kwa'1an1 na1yu3bi2tiem4pu2yu3mi4ka1a3i4yo2tio1o4nda4tu1u3tio1o4nu14u3 na2yu3bi2.
ki4nda2a2 na(1) e1nda'3a4i3tun4tan3a1su3nda'3a4i3tun4kwa1nda3a3ba(3) e2ja1ta4i3tun4kan4ndi4kun2ba(3) e2kwa'1an(1) e1tan3ndi4

Nda3tu'4un(4) e4i3nga2xa'1a4yu1ku1i3ta2
xa'4an1 ni42ji'4in4 na2ya1be'3e3Ta13ni3santuya1Igualapaka4chi2 o4kan4.

yu1ku1ka'14a4yu3ku4kan4nda4sa3ka4 na2ji'4in4i3ta2kwa1on4i4xa3 na2,chi4nde3e3 na2i3in3so'1o3ya1i3ta2yu1ku1ku14tu3ka4chi2 o4kan4ji'4in(4) a2ndi4ki'3in(3) a2xi3ko(2) a2.

Ki1bi4ni1jo3nda2a2chi4ñu3yu'1u1ji13ni2 yu1mi4i4i4yo(2) a2ndi4kwa'1an1ta'4bi4yu3ku4kwa'1an1ta'4bi4TresMariaska4chi2 na1ya1kwa'1an1yu3ku4kiu'4un4ñu3u2na1i4wa1a3ka1a3.

I3kan4ke4e4ndi3kin4.
I3kan4ke4e4ndi3kin4tu3ku3ndu4ta1 run4,ndi3kin4,ya1so'3o3so'3o3ti4ba3ba4li4ndi3kin4 a2ya1i4yo2na4ni24ku4u4ndi3kin4 a3.
Ya1kan4sa3kan4ku4u4tan3xi4ta1i'3nu3ndi3kin4.
Mm,ba'1a3ba3,tan3ya1kan3

¿Sa1a3na3ni(4) un4?
Raúlna3ni4 2.
¿Sa1a3kwi1ya(1) on4?
Cuarentayseiskwi1ya(1) e1.
¿Sa1a3na3ni4ñu3u2 un4?
Yoloxóchitl.

Carpintero.
Na1carpinteroka3chi2 o4,na1kan4ku4u4na1,na1ti4in4tun4kan4tan3nda4sa3ba'1a3 na2 run4na4ka3chi2 o4ndi4i4xi4ko3 na2 run4.

Tun4ti1ya4kwa'4a1.

¿Nda4a2ku3rra42?

¿An4i3kan4i4yo(2) a2?

Tan3¿an4ka4ya2 na(1) e1?

¿An4a1su3ta'3bi4i4yo(2) a2?

¿An4xa'4an2bi1xi(1) a1?

¿An4sa3kan4ba3?

Ka4si4in4xi4ña4ni3ko14o3 lu(3) a2kwa'1an1 na1ndi4ki3si3 na2xa'1a4 na2ko14o3 lu(3) a2kwa'1an1 na1,xa1i4yo2xa1i4yo2ya3a2ya1ko4ndo3ya3a2na'14a1kan4,na1kan4ndi4
ni1ndi'3i3ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1ndi1xin3ndi1xin3ni1xa'1an1 na1chi13nda'3a4 na2na1ba4li4kan4tan3
ja143kwa'1an1 na1nde4ta3 na2nda143kwe4nda2u1bi1kwe4nda2u1bi1
sa1a3i4yo2mi3i4ya3a2sa3ba3 ra2ndi4nde4e4 ra2ti4in4 ra2nda'3a4ta'4an4 ra2i4xa3 ra2so'3o3i4xa3 ra2tan3
sa3ba3 ra2ndi4ndo4ni'3i3 ra2i3in3ta'4bi4xa'1a4,xa1i4yo2xa1i4yo2ya3a2,ya1kan4ndi4la3tun4ka1i4yo(2) a2ka1a3.
Tan3i3nga2xia4an4ndi4ba143la3tun4i4yo(2) a2,ya1kan4ndi4
ya3a2ndi4i4yo2 ni42ba3ya3a2,ndi4ya1kan4ba42ko4ndo3ya1,ya1ki13xi(3) 2ji'4in4tiem4pu2,mm.
A1be3,ran4.
Sa3kan4a3sa(3) e3,ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4se'1e3 2ndi4na4ku4si1i4i3ni2 ndo4tan3ja3ta(4) e4tun4xa14a3.
Ku4si1i4i3ni2ba3ka'4an4 na2ndi4ba143ku4chun3nda'3a4 na2ran4,ba143ku4chun3nda'3a4 na2bi4xi1na3kwi42.
Su14u3ndi1ku1nda42ke3e3bi4 a2ka1a3ndi4kwe4e2ba3,kwe4e2ba3nda4a2ya3a2ku4ni2 ndo4tan3kwe4e2ta3ba4 ndo4 ya2kwe4e2ta3ba4 ndo4 a2,
tan3ya1ka3chi2 ndo4nu4mi24ndi1kun1ke3e(3) a2ke14e4bi4 a2ka1a3sa3kan4,kwe4nda2kwe4e2kwe4nda2kwe4e2ti4,
na4ja1ji13ni2nda'3a(4) e4ndi4kwe4e2sa3kan4ku4u4nda3ndu3ku4 a2tin3sa3kan4bi4ba42ke3e(3) a2tan3ya1nu4mi24nu4mi24ku4ni2 ndo4ndi4ke14e(4) a2ka1a3.
Ndi4ndi1kun1tan3nu4mi24ku4ni2 na1,ku14tu'1ba3 na2sa3kan4,kwe4e2 ni42ku4ni(2) a2.
A1be3,na4ja1ni1ndi'1i3i3ni2 o4ndo3ko3o(4) e4tan3in3ka4ni24tu3ku3sa3kan4sa3kan4ndi4ka'4an(4) e4ku3tu'1ba(3) e4,bi4xi1ba43.
A1be3,in3ka4ni24tan3in3ka4ni24,ku3tu'1ba(3) e4sa3kan4,a1su3 a2sa14ndi'3i(3) o4tan3ndi3ki'3in3ba(3) e4,na4ba14sa4i4yo2ba'1a(3) e3.
Sa4ndi'3i(3) o4tan3tu3tu(4) e4 ya2sa1a3mi3i4 a2i4yo(2) a2,ya1ku13ma1ni4 a2tu13tu(4) e4ña1a4sa3kan4bi4ba42ndi13ki'3in(3) o4 run4kwa'1an1tu3ku(3) e4.ji'4in(4) a3
Ndi4ko14o(3) a2ku3ma1ni4ndi4tian42i4yo(2) a2tu4tu(4) e4sa3kan4ko3o(3) a2ya1kan4ndi4ke4ta3ba'1a(3) e3.
Tan3na4i3in3sa3kan4sa4ya'1a3nda14ku2 e4 ya2an4ko14o3ndo13ko3o(4) e4i3in3bi4xin4ndo13ko3o(4) e4ndi4ke14ta3ba'1a3tu3ku3ba(3) e3.
Ya1bi4xi1ba43,ju1jun3,a1be3,ya1kan4ba42yu3ba4 2.
AlbertuPriscilianuFederico.Setentayuno.Yoloxóchitl.
I3nda14ta1a3xu4xan3ndi4xu4xan3 ra2ndi4,ni3xa14ku'1u1ku'1un1 ra1ni3,i3ta2an2,i3ta2an2ndi4a1su3be'3e3i4yo2ba3 ra2,
a1su3be'3e3i4yo2ba3 ra2i3kan4ja143,
na1ya3ni2 ra1ndi4na1ja1kwa'1an1ka3ja3chiu4un4ku4u4na1kan4kwa'1an1ndu3ku4 na2ya1ku3ta3ku2yu3ba4si'3i4 na2tan3
ta1xu4xan3ni1ndo1o3 ra2be'3e3ndi4ku14ni2 ra1ku'1un1 ra1ndi4
i3kan4ja143ndi'4i13i3ni2si'3i4 ra2ji4ni2 an4 ra2ndi4,"Ku'1un1ta'3an2 on4hijoku'1un(1) un4ndu3ku(4) un4chi3ñu3,
ka3ja3chi4ñu(3) un4tan3sa3kan4,tan3sa3kan4ndu3ku(4) un4xu'14un4ku3ta3ku2 e4".
"Sa1a3tu3na1ya3ni2 un4kwa'1an1na1kan4ndi4na1kwa'1an1ka3ja3chi4ñu3ku4u4na1kan4tan3ku3ta3ku2 e4tan3yo'4o1ndi4ku14ni2 un4ku'1un(1) un4".
"I3ta2an2i3ta2an2i4yo2 on4be'3e3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1
Ni1ndi'1i3i3ni2ta'3an2 ra1ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4na4ta3xi(3) an4ya1kan3,u1ni1pesunda'3a4 ra2sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1 ra1.
Ya1kan4ta13kwa'4ni3si'3i4 ra2u1ni1pesuta13xi(3) an4nda'3a4 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,i3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4,
i3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1i3in3nu14u3ñu3u2,
i3kan4ja143ji13ni3so'1o3 ra2mi4i4ba42xa4ku3 na2ka4ndu'3u4 a2ni1xi'1i1.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2,ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,ni1xa1a1 ra1ña1a4,
xi4ka3ña'3a4xa4ku3 ni42 an4ndi4,ya1kan3,ko14o3ya1ko3ndo3gastuta1ni1xi'1i1ndi4ni3
ya1ko'3o3 na2ko14o3ni3ya'1bi3xa1tun4 ra2ko14o3.
Ndi4,ya1kan3,ña4nda'4bi2ban4ji14ni2 an4mi4i4ka3na3nu3ya1ko3ndo3gastuta1ni1xi'1i1,
ka4chi2 an4xa4ku3 ni42 an4i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Kwa14ku(3) un4ndi4,yu'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,
chi3nde3e4 2yo'4o1",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4,tan3i3kan4ta13kwa'4ni3 ra2xu'14un4ni1xa'1a3 ra2nda'3a(4) en4nda13ndu3ku4 na2
ya1ko'3o3na1nde4e4ji'4in4ta1kan4,i3kan4
ta13xi3 ra2xu'14un4nda'3a(4) en4ni1ja'1an1cha'14bi3 na2ya'1bi3cajaya1ndu1xin1ta1ni1xi'1i1.
Tan3i3kan4ja143ndi'13i3ni1ndu1xin1ta1kan4tan3
i3kan4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1ba3 ra3,kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4
i3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4,
i3kan4nda13tu1u3i3nda14ta1xi4ni13ba1xi3 ra2ndi4,xi4ni13 ra2ndi4
nda143ndu'4u14nda3a2ti4 a2ndi4,ni3su14u3ta1ya3a3ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4nda143nda'1yu1,nda'1yu1ti4ka4a4tio1to1 ra1ndi4,nda143mi4i4ki3ni3ka4a4 ra2ba1xi3 ra2ndi4
xi4ni13 lu3 ra2ba1xi3 ra2,i3kan4ja143,ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1xu4xan3ña1a4ndi4,"Amigu,¿nda4a2ba42kwa'1an(1) on4?".
"Yu'1u1ndi4ta1kwa'1an1ndu3ku4trabajoku4u(4) 2ndi4,ta1kwa'1an1ndu3ku4chi3ñu3ku4u(4) 2tan3ndi4
ku14ni2 yu1ka3ja3chiu4un(4) 2ndi4ya1ku4ni2 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,xa1a1 yu1tan3
ke3ba'1a3 2mi4i4ja3chi4ñu(3) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,yu3nu4xa'4nu13ti4ku3ndi3ka2 yu1tan3
tan3si1si'4i2reyña4kan4ban4ku3ndi3chi2si4kwi3ko(4) an4pañunu14u(3) 2,o4ra2ta1nda3a2ku3xi(3) 2ndi4ya1xi4xi3reyya1kan4ku3xi(3) 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
I3kan4ja143,"Ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4ya1ku4ni2 un4ndi4ya1kan4ndi4ya1ko3ndo3ku4u4ba(3) e2kan4".
"Tan3na3ni2yo'4o1ni1i3xa(3) on4 a2ma1ni4ji'4in(4) 2,yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ni1i3xa(3) on4 a2ma1ni4ji'4in4,
ni3ko14o3ya1ko3ndo3gastu yu1tan3ni3ko14o3ya1ko3ndo3ya'1bi3xa1tun4 2tan3yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ni1i3xa(3) on4 a2ma1ni4ji'4in(4) 2".
"Ya1ma1ni4i13xa(3) on4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ko14o(3) a2ka'4an(4) on4nda3ñu'4u4xa'1a4 e2ndi4,yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ji4ni2nda4a(2) e2ba42kwi3i3chi3nde3e4 2yo'4o1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ta1kan4.
"Kwa'4an2 on4ndi4ta1,ta1xa1a1ku4u4ba(3) on4ya1ku4ni2 un4ku4si1i4i3ni2 un4ndi4

ya1ku4ni2 un4ndi4ya1xa1a(1) on4ko3ndo3ba(3) e2",ka4chi2ta1ta1xi4ni13kan4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4kwa'1an1 ra1kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4.
Ni1xa1a1tu3ku3 ra2,i3kan4,ni1xa1a1 ra1ya3tin3,ya3tin3nu14u3ñu3u2i3kan4ja143,ya1kan3,
i3kan4ja143ya1kan3,ja143ndu13ku3ta'4an4,ja1i3kan4ndi4chi2tu3ku3ba3ta1xi4ni13ña1a4.
A1su3ta1xi'4i4ku4u4ba3ta1ña1a4ndi4,su14u3ta1i4yo2ba'1a3i3ni2ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta1xi4ni13ku4u4ba3ta1ña1a4ja143
ka4chi2tu3ku3 ra2ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4,bi3tin3ndi4,"Ya1kan3,

Ni1nu3ju13ndi3ka2ta1xi4ni13chi13chi3 ra2tan3ta1xu4xan3ña1a4ndi4ni1nu1ju13ndi3ka2 ra1chi13chi3 ra2ja143
ni1chi3chi3 ra2ta1kwi42ya3kwa2ka'3a4ta1xi4ni13,i3kan4ndi'13i3tan3ja143
ndi13ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1 na1,kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4ja143ka4chi2 na1,ja1ku4ya3tin3 na2nu14u3ñu3u2,ja143
ka4chi2ta1xi4ni13kan4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Yo'4o1ndi4:yo'4o1ku4u4ta1xa3nda4tan3,tan3yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ya1kan3,ta1,
ta1ka3ta3",ka4chi2 ra1tan3.Ya1kan4ndi4ta1xu4xan3ña1a4ndi4ta1ña1a4ku4u4ta1xa4nda4tan3
