nda1i3in3na1yu4bi24ba143ji4ta3sa3kan4,ni1ta'1nda1ni1ndi'1i3i3ni2ta1chi4ñu3ndi4
ya1kan3,ya'4a13 ni42ka4a(4) e2ku4u4na1kan4,i3kan4ni1ta'1nda1chi3ñu3,"Kwa'4an2ndi1kwi1so3 ndo4 na2,na1ko14o3yu1ma'4na1nu14u3kan4ku1sun1 na1".
"Na4ku'1un1 na1be'3e3ka3a2",ka4chi2 ra1,i3kan4ndi4ja'1an1nda1ka3 na2,ja'1an1chi3ñu3ja'1an1ndi1kwi1so3comisión na1tan3kwa'1an1 na1be'3e3ka3a2.
A1su3sa3kan4ni3ka4a4ba3ndi4,ni1kwa3a4tan3tu3ku3ba3ki13xa3a4ya1kan3,xi4ta3 na2ndi4la3tun4xi4ta3na1ña1a4ndi4
ya'4a13ka1 ra1ta1ndi3kun2ndi4ya'4a13 ni42la3tun4xi4ta3 ra2.
Tan3ña4si1si'4i2reyndi4,ka4ndu'3u(4) an4palaciondi4ni3ba143kwi4i4ku1sun(1) an4ndi4tu3ku3ta'4bi4tu3ku3ta'4bi4xa4ka4ba1(3) en4ka4ndu'3u(4) an4ndi4
la3tun4 ni42ji4ta3 na2,i3kan4ja143ni1ka3chi2 an4ji'4in4yu3ba(4) en4ndi4,"Apándi4
ya1kan3,ta1ji4ta3kan4ndi4ku4si1i4 ni42i3ni2 yu1ji4ni2 yu1 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ku3ndu'4u4ji'4in(4) 2"ka4chi2 an4so'3o3chi2,i3kan4ja143:
"cha'14bi(3) un4na4ti'3bi(4) un4na1ku'1un1ko1to1sa1a3bi4xu'14un4ku4ni2 na1tan3
ke3ta3ta1xi4ta3kan4be'3e3ka3a2".
I3kan4ja143ni1ke3e3 na2i4xa3chiu4un4nu14u3ta1reyña1a4ni1ja'1an1ko1to1 na1
ku4ni2ku3ni2 na1sa1a3ya'1bi3,sa1a3ko4ndo3multata1,na1ñu'4u4be'3e3ka3a2,i3kan4ja143,ya1kan3,
ya1kan3,i3kan4ja'1an1ba3na1kan4ni1cha'14bi3 na2tan3ni1ke3e3ba3na1ña1a4be'3e3ka3a2ndi4
ta1xi4ni13yu3ba4 ra2ña1a4ndi4,ya1kan3,yu3ba4 ra2ku4u4ta1kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3tan3,ji'4in4reyi3kan4,
ni1ki3xa2a2na1ña1a4tan3ja143
ta1xi4ni13kan4ndi4ni1ke3e3tio1to1ba3ku4u4ta1kan4ndu13ndi3xi3 ra2i3nga2tio1to1tan3i3nga2ta1xu4xan3ña1a4ndi4ta1
ja'1an1 na1i4xa3chiu4un4nu14u3reyji'4in4ta1kan4ni1chi3chi3 ra2ba1ba'1a3i3kan4ni1ke3e3ji1ni4 ra2ba1ba'1a3
i3kan4ja143ni1ki3xa3a4ba3bi3ko4ta13nda'3a4 ra2ji'4in(4) an4o4ra2ni1ndi'3i3bi3ko4kan4ndi4
i3kan4reyña1a4ndi4bi4ka3 ni42 ra1ndi4i4yo2be'3e3ba'1a3 ra2i4yo2tienda ra1i4yo2ranchu ra1i4yo2
i3kan4ja143nda13kwa'1a3 ra2be'3e3si1si'4i2 ra1ndi4i3kan4ko3o(3) an4ji'4in4i3i(4) an4,i3kan4ja143
ndi13ki'3in3 na2,ndi13ki'3in(3) an4 ra2tan3kwa1nu'1u4 ra2ji'4in(4) an4i3kan4
i3kan4ta1,tan3ta1xi4ni13kan4ndi4i3kan4ni1ji3ni2 ra1ndi4i3kan4ni1ndo1o3ta1kan4tan3ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1tu3ku3ba3ta1ña1a4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ndo1o3ta1kan4ni1kwa3a4tan3ja143,ndi4ka2ta'3an2ta1ta1xu4xan3ña1a4yu3nu4,
xi4ko4 ni42pañunu14u3 ra2chi1,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4kan4ndi4,ya1kan3:
"¿nda4a2bi4ba42tu4un1 ni42ñu'3u2kan4?".
Ka4chi2,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4,"Ya1kan4ndi4haciendakan4ndi4
u1xa1haciendakan4ndi4kwe4nda2xi3to2 yu1ba42kan4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2.
I3kan4,i3kan4"i3ta2an2ndi4,ya1kan3,a1chi1 ni42ndo3ko2o(2) on4,
ya1kan3,ta3xi3na3ni2 un4ya1ku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2ku3xi(3) 2ndi4ta1ku'1un1ndu3ku4chi3ñu3ku4u(4) 2ndi4ka3ja3chi4ñu(3) 2".
"I4yo2ba(3) e2yo'4o4ndi4ya1bi4ka3ba3ndo'4o1ba42tan3yu'1u1ndi4
ka3ja3chi4ñu3ta'3an(2) e2ku4ni2 yu1sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1ko3ndo3,ya1ko3ndo3kwe4nda2mi3i4 2ya1kan4ku4ni2ta'3an2 yu1,ta1ka'3nda2chi3ñu3ko3ndo(3) 2".
"Reyko3ndo3ta'3an2ba3yu'1u1ku4ni2 yu1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
I3kan4ja143,"Na4chu3a3sa(3) on4ku'1un(1) un4ndu3ku(4) un4chi3ñu3ja3chi4ñu(3) un4a1su3 a2ku14ni2yu3ba4 2ka3ja3chi4ñu(3) un4ya1kan4ndi4nda13kwa'1a3 ra2tienda,nda13kwa'1a3 ra2ranchunda'3a(4) e4nda13kwa'1a3 ra2,
nda4a(2) e2ba42ku4ni(2) a2",ka4chi2ta'3an2ña4ko4ndo3si1si'4i2reykan4ji'4in4 ra3.
"Tan3ndi4ta1ku'1un1ku4u4ba3yu'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,ta1ku4ni2ka3ja3chi4ñu3ku4u(4) 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.I3kan4ja143,
ni1ki4tu3tan3i3kan4ta13xi3na3ni2 an4 e2ku'1un1ji'4in4 ra2ku3xi3 ra2,kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4,
mi4i4ba42i4yo2haciendakwe4nda2ji3to2 an4i3kan4xa1a1 ra1ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4reykan4ndi4ta1ku4ni2ka3ja3chiu4un4ku4u4 ra3.
An4ko14o3trabajoja3chiu4un4 ra2ka4chi2 ra1.
I3kan4ka4chi2ta1kan4bi4ka3kan4ji'4in4 ra2,i4yo2ba3trabajondi4nda143i3nda14 e2ndi4na4ko3nde3e4i3ni2 un4ja3chiu4un(4) un4ka4chi2 ra1,
i3kan4ja143i13xa3a4 na2ja4chiu4un4 na2,i3kan4o4ra2ku3xi3reyndi4ta'3an2ta1xu4xan3ña1a4ta1nda3a2,
ku3xi3ba3ji'4in4rey,o4ra2xa'4mi3reyndi4ta'3an2 ra1,cigarruxa'4mi3reyya1kan4,ta'3an2ta1ña1a4ba3xa'4mi3 a3.
I3kan4ja143sa4a24ba3 na2,tian42na1ja1,na1ja1ñu'4u4ya3ta4ja4chiu4un4ña1a4ndi4:
"yo3o3 ni42ku4u4ta1xu4xan3ña1a4ndi4,ta1ja143ni1ki3xa2a2ti4tu3ku4u4 ra2tan3
o4ra2ku3xi3reyndi4ta'3an2 ra1ta4nda13a2ku3xi3ji'4in4reytu3,
o4ra2kan4xa'4mi3reyi4ndu'3u4 ra2ku4tiu'4un4ndi4ta'3an2 ra1xa'4mi3cigarruya1xa'4mi3reytu3,
yo4o4tu3tan3ja1na'3a4ñu'4u(4) e4ja4chiu4un(4) e4tan3,ni3ba14ja4ka'4an2 ra1ja'1a(4) e4ku3xi(3) o4ji'4in4 ra2tan3ba143ka'4an2 ra1ka'3mi(3) o4i3nda14cigarruji'4in4 ra2,
o4ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra2ka'3mi3 ra2,yo3o3tu3ku4u4cabrónka1a3ya1kan4ndi4ya'4a13 ni42ka4a(4) e2ku4u4 ra2",ka4chi2 na1sa4a24 na3.
I3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4ja143ka4chi2ta'3an2 ra1,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,ya1kan3:
"yu'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,o4ra2,o4ra2ku3ndu'4u(4) un4ku3xi(3) un4ndi4
ka1a3ki3xa2a2mesatan3ki3xa2a2reyji'4in4si1si'4i2 ra1tan3
tan42i4yo(2) a2xi4xi3reyndi4yo'4o4ku3ndi3chi2mesatan3kwe3ta(3) e2,
ku3xi(3) 2ji'4in4,ji'4in4rey",ka4chi2,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
"¿Tan3an4ndi3xa3ku4u(4) un4?",ka4chi2reykan4ji'4in4 ra2."Ya1ndi3xa3ba42",ka4chi2
"Tan3na4ni14ke3ta3ya1ku4u4ya1ni1ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in(4) 2tan3ni14ki3xa2a2 na1o4ra2ya1o4ra2ku3ndu'4u(4) 2ku3xi(3) 2kan4tan3
tan3ku3ndu'4u4yo'4o1ku3xi(3) un4ku3ndi3chi2mesaku3ndu'4u(4) un4ji'4in4si1so(3) on4ku3xi(3) un4nda1si1si'4i2reyki3xa2a2ndi4
ya1kan3,ña'1a(3) on4ku4u4u1xa1balazu",ka4chi2,ka4chi2ba3reyi3nga2kan4ji'4in4 ra3.
Ya1kan4ndi4,sa1a3i13xa3ña4si1si'4i2reyni1xa14ni2 an4ndi4,ya1kan3:
"bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,so'3o3,i4yo2ya1kwen4tu2ndi4ni1xa14ni2 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ni1ka3chi2ta1i4ndu'3u4 2ji'4in4,ji'4in4ji3to(2) e2ndi4o4ra2ku3xi3 ra2ndi4
i3kan4xa1a(1) on4ji'4in4mesatan3ndi4so3mulaña'1a3tan3tan42i4yo2ña1xi4xi(3) un4ndi4
nu14u3mesakwe3ta3ya1tan42i4yo(2) a2kan4tan3ku3ndu'4u4 ra2ku3xi3 ra2tan3ta1nda3a2
ji3to(2) e2ku3xi3 ra2ji'4in(4) o4ni1ka3chi2,ka4chi2 ra1tu4u(2) i2ni1xa14ni2 yu1",ka4chi2 an4.
"Na4tu2sa3kan4hijandi4,a1chi1ndo3ko2o(2) on4ta3xi3na3ni2 un4sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un(1) o4ndi4
ku4ma1ni4ka(1) e1o4ra2ya1xa1a1,ka4chi2ji3to2 on4kan4tan3ja1i3kan4i4yo2 e4ka4chi2 ra1,
ndu'1u1 na1reyndi4,ya1kan3,i3nda14ba3tu'1un3ka'4an2 ndu1,na4ni14xa1a(1) e4ya1o4ra2kan4ndi4
ta1ka'3ni4 na2ku4u4ba3i3i(4) un4,ndu'1u1ndi4ko14o3kwa'1a4tu'1un3ka'4an2 ndu1na1ko4ndo3rey",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
I3kan4ja143,i3kan4ndi4
sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ja143,tan42ja1ku4ya3tin3o4ra2kan4tan3ni1xa1a1ba3reyi3nga2kan4ji'4in4
u1bi1mulandi4so3 ri4mesandi4so3 ri4,ni1xa1a1ko'1o4
ya1ku3xi3 na2ni1xa1a1,nda143ka4xan4ti4ku4u4ni1xa1a1na1ña1a4ja143ni1jwe3ta3ba'1a3mesani1jwe3ta3ko'1o4jwe13ta3.
Ja143ta13xi3na3ni2 na1jwe13ta3ta3yu2jwe13ta3,
ja143nda'4yu1 ra1ka4na3 ra2patrón ra1ndi4,"Patrónndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ndi4,ya1kan3,
ja1i4yo(2) a2,¡Na'3a2 on4na4ku3xi(3) o4!",ka4chi2 ra1.I3kan4ni1ta1nda3a2patrón ra1ko3nde3e3na1kan4ku3xi3 na2ndi4ta1nda1si1so3 ra2tin3,ña4si'4i2 ra1tin3.
Jo13nde3e3 na2xi13xi3 na2ba1ba'1a3tin3,o4ra2ndi'13i3xi13xi3 na2i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ndi4:
"bi3tin3ndi4,ko14o(3) a2ji4ni2 o4a3sa(3) e4ji'4in(4) a2ndi4tu'1un3ni1ka'1an1 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4
ya1kan3,ya1ko3nda2a2ya'4bi3ba42ndu'1u1na1reyndi4ba143nda4ndi3ko4ja1ta4 ndu2ji'4in4tu'1un3ka'4an2 ndu1ndi4i3nda14ba3tu'1un3ka'4an2 ndu1,
ya1kan4ndi4ya1tu'1un3ni1ka'1an1 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4,ya1u1xa1haciendakan4ndi4kwe4nda2 on4ku4u4ndi'3i3ba(3) e2kan4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1xu4xan3.
O4ra2ni1ndi'3i3xi13xi3 na2tan3ja143ni1ki3xa3a4ta1bi4ka3ña1a4nda13kwa'1a3 ra2haciendaña1a4nda13kwa'1a3 ra2,
nda'3a4ta1kan4ndi4,in3ka4ni24ndi4ta1ja1ni1ke3ta3ke'3e2ku4u4ba3reykwa'1an1 ra1ndi4ko14o3i3in3ta1ku4u4 ra2ndi4
i3kan4ja143ni1ndo1o3ba3na1kan4,tan3ja1reyku4u4 ra2ndi1ku1nda42ndi4mi3i4 ra2ku4u4ta1ja'4nda2chi3ñu3ba3i3nda14.
I3kan4ni1ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ran4.
CarlosRómuloSantiago.U1ni1xi3ko3u1bi1.Yoloxóchitl.
Na4nda3tu'4un(4) 2kwen4tu2ya3ta4ja'1a4i3in3ñu3u2ndi4,ya1kan3,
ni1ndu3kwa4ñu3ta1a3ni1cho'3ma4 ra2ka3a2tan3
i3kan4ni1ja'3nda2ta1chi4ñu3be'3e3ka3a2,ya1kan3,chi3ñu3nu14u3 na2,
na1comisiónndi4na4chi3ka2 na1 ra1be'3e3ka3a2tan3
ya1kan4ndi4ja'1an1 ra1be'3e3ka3a2tan3ni1ki4tu3,ni1ke3ta3 ra2ju13na3ni2kwa1chi3ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ka4chi2 na1
ta1chi4ñu3ndi4na4ku'1un1 ra1nda3ja3ta4 ra2nda'3a4nda'3a4ña1chi4ñu3ya1ta'13bi4 ra2kan4.
Ya1kan4ndi4ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,nda13xa2a2 ra1be'3e3 ra2tan3ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4si'4i2 ra1ndi4,"I3ta2an2ndi4a1chi1ndo3ko2o(2) on4,
chi3ndu'4u(4) un4ti1ka3sun2sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1 yu1ndi4,ku'1un1 yu1ndi4an4i3in3kwi1ya1an4u1bi1kwi1ya1ku'1un1 yu1nda1ku'3ba2ndi4
ja3ta4 2nda'3a4chi4ñu3sa3kan4ndi4nda3kwa'1a3 e2nda'3a4 na2sa3kan4ndi4ndi'3i3kwa1chi3ji'4in(4) 2".
"Ndu13kwa4ñu(3) 2ndi4ni1cho'1ma4ka3a2 na1tan3bi3tin3ndi4kwa1chi3ndo'4o(4) 2ya1kan4ndi4na4ku'1un1 yu1".
"Ku3nde3e4i3ni2 un4na4nda1nda3ndi3ko4 2sa3kan4ndi4a3sa3ma1ni4 2yo'4o1",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ña4si'4i2 ra1chi1.
Ya1kan4ndi4a1chi1ndo13ko2o(2) an4kan4ni1ndi3ko(3) an4tan3ja143ta13nde3e(3) an4ti1ka3sun2i3kan4nda13nde1e3 a2yu3nu4ndi4so3ja1ta4 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
Kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4,ki13xa2a2 ra1ka13ndi3ko1o3 ra2ji1ni4yu3ku4.
I3kan4ndi4ki3ta'4an4i3in3i3chi4,i3kan4nda13ka'3mi3 ra2ñu'3u2ku1sun1 ra1ndi4
i3kan4ki4xin1 na1,sa1a3ku4u4ba3na1kwa'1an1viajendi4i3kan4ndo4o13 na2ki4xin1 na1.
i3kan4nda13ka'3mi3 ra2ñu'3u2tan3i3kan4ni1ndo1o3 ra2ku1sun1 ra1.
Sa3kan4ku4u4ja14nda3sa1a4 ra2is1ta4xi13xi3 ra2ni1kwa3a4nda13ka3ndu'4u4 ra2ku1sun1 ra1.
Xa'1a1ka4a4ndo13ko2o2 ra1,i4ndu'3u4 ra3,i3kan4ja143
tan3ni1nda'1yu1ba3na1ba1xi3ji'4in4ki3ti4ndi4,ya1kan3,lu14u3ki3ti4nda'4yu1 na1nu14u3ba1xi3 na2tan3,nda4ka3ka3 na2 ri4ba1xi3 na2,
sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1ki3xa2a2ba3 na2mi4i4i4ndu'3u4 ra2kan4.
Ja143ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,"¿Nda4a2chi3ñu3i4xa3yo'4o1i4ndu'3u(4) un4amigu?".
"Ko14o3chiu3un3i4xa3bi4 2ndi4ta1kwa'1an1i3in3ta4tu2ku4u(4) 2ndi4ñu3u2 yu1ndi4ndu13kwa4ñu(3) 2ji'4in4ka3a2na1ti4bi2tan3
ya1kan4chi13ka2 na1 yu1be'3e3ka3a2tan3bi3tin3ndi4ta1kwa'1an1ku4u(4) 2ka3ja3chi4ñu(3) 2sa3kan4ndi4sa3ta4 2nda'3a4chi4ñu3",ka4chi2 ra1.
Ja143nda13kwi3in3ta1ko4ndo3patrónkwa'1an1ji'4in4na1ta4tu2kan4ndi4:
"Ya1kan3,ka14ni3ni2 un4na4ku'1un(1) o4ji'4in4 ndu2,su14u(3) a2ku4chun3ba42i3nda14ji1ni4ña1a4ndi4,i3in3bandasa3kan4ndi4ki3xi3ji'4in(4) un4na4ku'1un(1) o4xa1a(1) e4i3kan4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143,ña1a4nda3ka3ka(3) on4ki3ti4na4ku'1un(1) o4ji'4in4 ndu2".
I3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4,ni1ki4tu3,ndu3bi4ba3ndi13ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1 na1.
Ni1ku3ñu3u42tu3ku3ni1ke3e3,ni1xa1a1 na1,nu14u3ñu3u2,i3kan4ja143ndo13ko3o4 na2ki3ti4.
Ta'1bi4sa3ba3na3a4ñu3u42tan3ni1ki'1bi3ba3 na2ñu3u2ka'4nu3mi4i4ba42kwa'1an1 na1ndi4
ya1kan3,i1ta3ndio'3o3ba42kwa'1an1 na1.
I3kan4kwa'1an1 na1,i3kan4,i3kan4kwa'1an1 na1ta3ba4 na2ña'1a3ndi4su14u3na1kwa'1an1sa3ta4ku4u4na1kan4ndi4ña'1a3kwa'1an1kwi1so3 na2ndi4na1kwa'1an1xi3kwi'4na4ku4u4na1kan4.
I3kan4ja143ni1xa1a1 na1kan4i3kan4ja143,ndi4chi2ta1ta1bi4ka3kwa'1an1ji'4in4 na2kan4ye'14e4tan3
ki'1bi3 na2ta4ba4 na2ña'1a3,ña1ña1xi4ko4 na2nda1nu14u3ñu3u2nda1nu14u3ñu3u2i3kan4
xi4ko14 a2kan4tan3o4ra2xi1nu3cargakwi3so3ti4kan4tan3ja143,"Bi3tin3ndi4,bi3tin3ba42ke3e(3) a2ku'1un1ji'4in4yo'4o1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143ta13ba4ba3 na2tamboraba42,ka3a2che4e13ba42trombónba42,
pestónku4u4 run4ka3a2nda4kwi3in3ba42,ndi3sa4ku4u4ba(3) e2nda'3a4chi4ñu3músicani1ta3ba4 na2.
O4ra2ni1ke3e(3) a2kan4tan3ni1ki3xa2a2 na1nu14u3ñu3u2ja143si13so3 ri4,si13so3 ri4tan3ja143
ja1i3in3ja1i3in3ka3a2kan4nda13ko3nde3e3ma'14ñu3ki3ti4kan4,ba1xi3 ri4ji'4in4 na2.
I3kan4ja143ba1xi3 na2sa3kan4ba1xi3 na2sa3kan4,
ja143ni1ku3kwa'1a4ba1xi3 na2ja143ka4chi2ta1bi4ka3kan4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Nda3xa2a(2) on4ñu3u2,
nda3xa2a(2) on4ya3tin3nu14u3ñu3u2tan3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ti'3bi(4) un4na1nda4a2i3in3na1ya'4a13kwa'1an1tan3ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4 na2ndi4na4ku'1un1ka'1an1 na1ji'4in4ta1chi4ñu3ndi4na4
ta3xi3 ra2juntatan3nda3ka3ya2 ra1na1ñu3u2sa3kan4ndi4,xa1a1 na1sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1ndi1ki'1in3 na2yo'4o1ji'4in4nda'3a4chi4ñu3ndi4ja1ni1ki3xa2a2nda'3a4chi4ñu3ka4chi2.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ndi4,"Amigundi4sa1a3a3sa3yu'1u1ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4
ko14o3ya1kwi3i3nda3cha'4bi(3) 2ndo'4o1,nda4a2ji4ni2 yu1ku'1un1ki'1in3 2ya1nda3cha'4bi(3) 2ndo'4o1,ta1nda'4bi2ku4u(4) 2tan3ni1ndu3kwa1chi3 2ji'4in4nda'3a4chi4ñu3",
"Ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4o4ra2ya1kan3,o4ra2ko3o3bi3ko4tan3i3kan4ba42ku'1un1 ndu1sa3kan4ndi4i3kan4ba42nda3ko1o3ya'1bi3 ndu2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143ni1ku3ya3tin3 ra2nu14u3ñu3u2i3kan4ni1jo3nde3e3ka3a2nde4e4pondóka3a2nde4e(4) a2.
I3kan4ni1ya'1a3ta1xi4ka3ku'1u1ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1kan4ndi4:
"kwa'4an2 on4tan3ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4ta1chi4ñu3ndi4na4a3sa3 ra(2) e2ba'1a3nda3ka3ya2 ra1na1ta4u3ni2,
nda3ka3ya2 ra1na1ñu3u2tan3sa3kan4ndi4,tan3sa3kan4ba42ndi4ki3xi3 na2sa3kan4ba42nda3kwi3so3 na2nda'3a4chi4ñu3ndi4ja1ni1ki3xa2a2nda'3a4chi4ñu3ka3chi2 un4ji'4in4 na2".
Ya1kan4nda13xa2a2ta1ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4kan4i3kan4ni1xa'1an1 ra1be'3e3chi4ñu3.
Ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1chi4ñu3ndi4,"Ba1xi3 2ndi4,ya1kan3,sa4ku3ni(3) 2yo'4o1ndi4ka'1an(1) on4,na4ku'1un1mayóna4ku'1un1efenu14u3na1ñu3u2,
nda3ka3ya2 ra1na1ta4u3ni2sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1 ndo4ku'1un1ndi1ki'1in3 ndo4ta1ni1ki3xa2a2ji'4in4ka3a2tin3,
ja1ni1ki3xa2a2nda'3a4chi4ñu3na1ti4bi2".
I3kan4nda13kwi3in3 na2,nda13kwi3in3ta1chi4ñu3ka4chi2 ra1ndi4,"Ndi3ki'3in3 ndo4ta1ba3ta4ka1a3chi3ka2 ndo4 ra2be'3e3ka3a2,nda4a2tu3ba42ji4ni2tu3ta1kan4ku'1un1ki'1in3tu3 ra2,
sa3ta4tu3 ra2nda'3a4chi4ñu3na1ti4bi2tan3ya1kan3,ta1nda'4bi2ku4u4 ra2".
"Ta1kan4ndi4kwi1ya1kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4ndi4ja3ta4 ra2i3nda14ji1ni4ka3a2tan3ka3ndi4xa3tu(3) e4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ja1nda'3a4chi4ñu3na1músicatu3ni1ki3xa2a2ji'4in4tu3 ra2,ya1ba3ta4ba42kan4",ka4chi2
I3kan4tu3ku3in3ka4ni24tan3tu3ku3ba3 ra2ndi4kun2ni1ki3xa2a2,
ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ta1chi4ñu3ndi4,ba1xi3 2nda4tu'4un(4) 2ji'4in(4) un4ndi4so'3o3ka4chi2ta1i4ndu'3u4kan4ndi4ya1kan4
na4ku'1un1 na1efesa4ku3ni3 na2,ya1kan3,na1ta4u3ni2tan3na4sa4ku3ni3 na2na1ñu3u2ndi4na4nda3ka1ya1 na1tan3sa3kan4ndi4
ko3o3ya1kan3,ku'1un1 na1ku'1un1ndi1ki'1in3 na2ta1ni1ki3xa2a2ji'4in4nda'3a4chi4ñu3chi2".
U'1bi1ni1ku3u3sa3kan4ndi4nda13ka1ya1 na1ñu3u2,i3kan4ja143
i3kan4ja143ni1ka3ni3 na2ja'1an1 na1,i3kan4ja143ni1ja'3nda2ta1chi4ñu3chi3ñu3ndi4na4ku3u2toro,
na4ke1ta3xa'4a2sa3kan4ndi4ku3xi3 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1ko3o3bi3ko4ku4u4ka3a2o4ra2ki3xa2a(2) e2.
I3kan4ja143,i3kan4ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1nda13ka1ya1na1ñu3u2kwa'1an1 na1.
Ni1xa1a1 na1ña1a4nde4e4pondónda'3a4chi4ñu3,nda4yu'3bi2 lu3i3ni2na1ñu3u2ndi4"
"sa1a3i13xa(3) on4,ja13ta(4) on4nda'3a4chi4ñu3ba1xi3 a2,sa1a3ni1ko3nde3e4 ni42 un4ya'1bi3 a2ya1kan4ndi4ba3
"Ba1xi3ti'4bi3ndi'3i(3) a2ji'4in(4) un4.Ndu'1u1ka'4an2 ndu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4i3nda14ba(3) e2ndu13kwa4ñu(3) un4ji'4in4.Ya1kan4ba42kwa'1an(1) on4xa'1a4tan3
ya1yo'4o4ndi4su14u3i3nda14ba42yo'4o4ndi4tan42i4yo2ba3nda'3a4chi4ñu3na1ti4bi2ni1ki3xa2a2ka4chi2
"Tan3ndi4ba'1a3ndi4ja1yo'4o4ja1i4yo(2) a2tan3ya1kan3,bi3tin3ndi4ya1ta3ba4 ndo4bi3ko4ko3ndo(3) a2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4 na3.
"Ka14ni3ni2yo'4o1ndi4ja1yo'4o4ja'13nda2 yu1chi3ñu3ndi4,ya1kan3,torondi4ti4,ti4ka'3ni4 na2ku4u4ti4kan4,xa'4a2ndi4ya1ja1ke1ta3ku4u4xa'4a2
ya1kan4ndi4i3ta2an2ndi4ya1,ya1ka3na3bi3ko4ku4u4ka3a2nda'3a4chi4ñu3na1ti4bi2",ka4chi2ta1chi4ñu3so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143i13xa3a4 ra2,ja143ni1ki3xa2a2 na1,
ndi13kwi3so3ba3 na2nda'3a4chi4ñu3ki13xa3a4na1ti4bi2,niu3ñu3u42ju13chi3tu4na1ti4bi2ti13bi2 na1,
o4ra2ndi'13i3xi13xi3 na2ja143ki13xa3a4 na2xi'4i4 na3
ni1ka3ni3ta'4an4 na2na1su13ku4i3tun4ta'4an4ba3 na2na1ta'13bi4ji1ni4ta'4an4ba3,i3kan4
ja'1an1ta1ko4ndo3ta1ni1ja'1an1ta13ba4nda'3a4chi4ñu3i3kan4ja'1an1 ra1ni1xi'3i3 ra2ni1i4i3kan4ja143ndu13ya'4bi3 ra2i1nda43.
CarlosRómuloSantiago.U1ni1xi3ko3u1ni1.Yoloxóchitl.
I3nda14ta1a3ndi4,ya1kan3,ni1xi'1i1ña4si'4i2 ra1tan3
u1bi1ta'4an2ji1ni4se'1e3 ra2i4yo2tan3ni1xi'1i1ba3ña4si'4i2 ra1,i3nda14ña'3a4i3nda14ta1a3.
Tan3ja143ni1ku3na'3a4i4yo2 ra1tan3ja143ndi'4i13i3ni2 ra1ndi4ko14o3ña4si'4i2 ra1
I3kan4i4yo2i3nda14ña'3a4ko14o3i3i4ya3tin3.
Ja143ni1xi1ka3 ra2ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ku4ni2 ra1ndi4ku3ndu'4u4 ra2ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ka3chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
ku3ndu'4u4ba(3) en4ji'4in4se'1e3 ra2na4sa3kan4tan3ta3xi4 ra2se'1e3 ra2ku'1un1 na1tan3sa3kan4ndi4ki3xi3ndo1o3mi3tu4nda24 ra2ku3ndu'4u(4) an4ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ndi4na4nda3ka3ni3ni2 yu1sa3kan4ku3ni2 o4sa3kan4ndi4,ku4i3ni2 ni42 yu1ji4ni2 yu1se'1e3 2ndi4ko14nde3e4i3ni2 yu1ta3xi4 2 na1tan3ndi4
I3kan4ja143tu3ku3i3chi4ja'1an1 ra1ja143ka4chi2tu3ku3 ra2ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ku4ni2 ra1ndi4ku3ndu'4u4 ra2ji'4in(4) an4,ja143ni1ka3chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"Ku3ndu'4u4ba(3) 2ji'4in(4) un4tan42ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4ya1nu14u3sa3kan4ka'4an2ba3yu'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,ku3ndu'4u4ba(3) 2ji'4in(4) un4na4sa3kan4tan3ko3nde3e4i3ni2 un4ta3xi(4) un4se'1e(3) on4ku'1un1 na1".
"Tan3sa3kan4ndi4ndo1o3mi3tu4nda24 on4ku3ndu'4u(4) un4ji'4in(4) 2tan3,sa3kan4ndi4ku3ndu'4u(4) 2ji'4in(4) un4",ni1ka3chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2.
I3kan4ja143ni1nda3kwi3in3 ra2ka4chi2 ra1ndi4ko3nde3e4i3ni2ba3 ra2ta3xi4 ra2se'1e3 ra2ku'1un1 na1sa3kan4ndi4ndo1o3ña4ku3ndu'4u(4) an4ji'4in4 ra2.
I3kan4ja143ndi13ki'3in3 ra2,i3kan4ndi13ki'3in(3) an4kwa'1an(1) en4ni1xa1a(1) en4ku3ndu'4u(4) an4ji'4in4 ra3.
i3kan4ja143is1ta1an1tan3i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4se'1e3 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3:
"bi3tin3ndi4na4ku'1un(1) o4xa14ku'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,na1ku'1un1ku'1u1ku4u(4) e4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4se'1e3 ra3.
Tan3su14u3na1kwa'1an1nda3ndi3ko4ku4u4na1kan4ndi4na1kwa'1an1,kwa'1an1nda1ka3 ra2nda3ñu'4u4ku4u4na1kan4xa14ku'1u1ja4nda3ñu'4u4 ra2 na1sa3kan4ndi4
ndo1o3 ra2ku3ndu'4u4ña'3a4kan4ji'4in4 ra3.
Tan3i3nda14ña'3a4se'1e3 ra2ndi4ni14xi'1i1i3ni2 an4kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ni1ki'3in(3) an4i3in3ya3xin4ya1a4tan3chi13ka2 en4xe'1e(1) an4tan3kwa'1an(1) en4,i3kan4ni1ke3ta3 na2nu14u3ñu3u2tan3i3kan4ja143
ja14nda3ba3ba(3) en4ya1a4,ni1ku3kwa'1a4kwa'1an1 na1tu3ku3sa3kan4ni3,ja14nda3ba(3) en4ya1a4kwa'1an1 na1.
Sa3kan4ni1ku3xi4ka3kwa'1an1 na1,kwa'1an1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1 na1mi4i4ba42
I3kan4ka4chi2yu3ba4 na2ji'4in4 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,"Yo'4o4ndo1o3 ndo4ko3nde3e3 ndo4tan3sa3kan4ndi4
na4ku'1un1 yu1nda1ni1nu1kan4sa3kan4ndi4tan3nda3ndi3ko4 2sa3kan4ndi4ku1nu'1u(4) o4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 na3.
I3kan4ja143ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,su14u3ta1kwa'1an1nda3ndi3ko4ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4ta1ja'1an1nda1ka3ti4ba3 ra2ku4u4na1kan4ndo1o3 na2kan4.
I3kan4xa3ku4ti4ba3ja'1an1 ra1xa14ku'1u1kan4tan3nda13ndi3ko4ba3ta1kan4ba1xi3 ra2ndi4ji4ni2ba3 ra2sa1a3ka4a4mi4i4kwa'1an1 ra1ji'4in4 na2.
I3kan4ja143,ni1kwa3a4tan3ja143ka4chi2ba(3) en4ji'4in4ku'1ba(3) en4ndi4,ya1kan3:
"na4nda3ndi3ko(4) e4ku1nu'1u(4) e4ndi4yu3ba(4) e4ndi4
nda14ndi3ko4ta1kan4ndi3kwi3so3 ra2yo4o4ndi4ta1ja1kwa'1an1ba3ku4u4ta1kan4".
Ya1kan4ndi4señami4i4ba42ndo13ko3o(4) an4ya1ki1bi4kwa'1an1 na1
señakan4ndi4kun2 an4tan3nda13ndi3ko(4) an4,tan42ñu'1u3ja1kwa'1an1ke4ta13 e2tan3,i3kan4
ki13xa2a2ba3 na2tan3i3kan4ja143ka4chi2ña4kan4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"a4su3ka4chi2tu3yo'4o1ndi4na1ja'1an1nda1ka(3) on4ya14tin3ku4u4na1ka1a3tan3i3kan4ba1xi3 na2ki3ni3,ki3ni3i4in4 na2ba1xi3 na2".
Ka4chi2ba3ña'3a4ji'4in4,ta1ku3ndu'4u4ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ke3e3,"Bi3tin3ndi4ndo1o(3) on4ji'4in4se'1e(3) on4tan3ku'1un1 yu1ndi4ni14ku3ni2 un4sa4ndo3o(3) on4ya1tan42yu'1u1ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4".
"Ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ji4ni2mi4i4ku'1un1nda1ka3 2 na1i3ta2an2",ka4chi2
I3kan4ja143,ni1ki4tu3tu3ku3tan3ja143ka4chi2 ra1ndi4na4ku3ndu'4u4is1ta4tan3ku'1un1 na1.
Ja143ndi4ju13ndu'4u4is1ta4tan3i3kan4ndi13kwi3so3tu3ku3 ra2na1ba4li4kan4kwa'1an1 na1.
Tan3a1su3tan42i13xa(3) en4ya1nu14u3sa3kan4i13xa3tu3ku(3) en4ndi4,ya1kan3,ni14xi'1i1i3ni2 an4ndi4la4xa2ni1sa4ka3chi'3i3nda'3a(4) en4kwa'1an1ji'4in4 na3.
I3kan4ni1ke3ta3 na2nu14u3ñu3u2i3kan4ja143i1xa14a3ja14nda3ba(3) en4so1o4la4xa2kan4
ni1ku3kwa'1a4kwa'1an1 na1tu3ku3ni3sa3kan4ja14nda3ba3tu3ku(3) en4.
Sa3kan4ni1ku3xi4ka3kwa'1an1 na1ja143,tu3ku3ni3ja14nda3ba(3) en4 e3.
Sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4ni1ku3xi4ka3ka1kwa'1an1ja143
xa143ka4chi2tu3kwa3yu3ba(4) en4ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Yo'4o4ko3nde3e3 ndo4na4ku'1un1 yu1
ku'1un1ndu3ku4 2ña'1a3sa3kan4ndi4na4ni1ke3ba'1a3 2ji'4in4ki3ti4sa3kan4ndi4yo'4o4nda3ndi3ko4 2sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ku1nu'1u4yo4o4".
I3kan4su14u3ta1kwa'1an1nda3ndi3ko4ku4u4ta1kan4,ndi3kwi3so3 ra2 na1ndi4ta1ja'1an1nda1ka3ku4u4 ra2 na1ndi4na4ku4ni2 ra1ndi4na4nda3ñu'4u4ja'1a4 na3.
I3kan4ja143,a1su3tan42i13xa(3) en4ya1nu14u3sa3kan4i13xa3tu3ku(3) en4ndi4señakan4ndi4
ya1kan4ndi4kun2 na1ja143nda13ndi3ko4 na1ba1xi3tu3kwa3 na3.
Ni1kwa3a4ja143ni1ku3ya3tin3tu3kwa3 na2nu14u3ñu3u2.
Ja143ni1ki3xa2a2 na1ja143ka4chi2tu3kwa3ña4,ña4kan4ji'4in4ta1ku3ndu'4u4ji'4in(4) an4ndi4:
"a4su3ka4chi2tu3yo'4o1ndi4ta1nda1ya14tin3ja'1an1nda1ka(3) on4se'1e(3) on4tan3bi3tin3ndi4su14u(3) a2ndi3xa3bi4ba42ku4ni2 un4ku3ndu'4u(4) un4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4
ya1kan3,na1ba143ko4nde3e4i3ni2 un4xa'1a4ba3ku4u4se'1e(3) on4ndi4i4xa(3) on4sa3kan4"ka4chi2
"bi3tin3ndi4ndo1o(3) on4tan3ku'1un1 yu1",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2,i3kan4ja143:
"ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4i3ta2an2ndi4nda1ya14tin3ka1ku'1un1 yu1ku'1un1nda1ka3 2 na1",ka4chi2,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ki4tu3sa3kan4ndi13kwi3so3tu3ku3 ra2 na1i3kan4ba42ndi4nda13ndo4so24ba3ña4lu3u3kan4xa'1a4ña'1a3ndi4ko14o3ka(1) e1.
Ko14o3ka(1) e1ni4nda3ka'3an(4) en4ja'1a4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4
nda13ndo4so2(4) an4.I3kan4ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4.
Ni1xa1a1 na1ma'14ñu3ku'1u1xu13xa3,
i3kan4ja143ndo13ko3o4 ra2 na1,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"Yo'4o4ko3nde3e3 ndo4na4ku'1un1 yu1
ku'1un1ndu3ku4 2ya1ku1nu'1u4ji'4in(4) o4",i3kan4nde4e4 na2sa3kan4ni1kwa3a4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ke1ta3ba3ñu'1u3ja143ja143ka4chi2
ta1a3kan4ji'4in4ku'1ba3 ra2ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4nda3a(3) on4nda'3a4i3tun4nda1ni1nu3ku3ndu'4u(4) un4,
tan3sa3kan4ba42ndi4,ya1kan3,yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ku3ndu'4u4yo'4o4",ka4chi2
I3kan4ndi4i4yo2i3in3chi1ki'1in1i3tun4tan3i3kan4ndo1o3 ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra3.
Tan3ku'1ba3 ra2ndi4ni1nu3ndo13ko3o4 ra2ña4kan4i4ndu'3u(4) an4.
Ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"I3kan4,yo'4o4,ña1a4ku3ndu'4u4yo'4o1".
I3kan4ja143ndu13ko3nde3e3 na2nde4e4 na2ni1ku3ñu3u42tan3ja143
so'3o3ba1xi3ndi3ka'3a3ndi4ti4ku4ni2ka3xi4ña'3a4ku4u4ti4kan4,sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4nde4e4 na2,
ni1ku3ñu3u42ka1ja143ya14tin3tu4un1ñu'3u2.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ku'1ba3 ra2ndi4,"¿Na4ji14ni2 un4ndi4nda1kan4tu4un1ñu'3u2?",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ku'1ba3 ra3."Ji13ni2ba(3) 2ndi4
"Ki'3in3nu14u3ba'1a(3) on4nda14ku2mi4i4ba42tu4un1ñu'3u2kan4i3kan4ki14tu3ndi4i3kan4ku'1un(1) o4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143nde4e4 na2sa3kan4nde4e4 na2sa3kan4,ni1ki4tu3tan3i3kan4ja143,"Bi3tin3ndi4na4ku'1un(1) o4tan3
na1kwa'1an1ku4u(4) e4ndi4yo4o4kwa'1an1xa1a1ku4u(4) e4mi4i4ba42tu4un1ñu'3u2i3ku3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.Ja143ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1.
Kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1 na1,ja143,ya1kan3,
xa143ya1kan3,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ku'1ba3 ra2ndi4:
"nda143xa3ku4tan3xa1a(1) e4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ti3sa3ba3ba'1a3i3ni2 un4ndi4nda143xa3ku4ba3ku'1un(1) o4tan3xa1a(1) e4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1 na1,
i4ndu'3u4i3nda14be4la2,su14u3be4la2ba'1a3ban4ndi4be4la2ñu'1u3ban4.
I3kan4ja143kwa'1an1 na1tan3ni1xa1a1 na1ja1ta(4) en4ni1xa1a1 na1.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 na1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Xi4ka3nde'14e4 ndu2,xi4ka3nde'14e4 ndu2be'3e(3) on4na4na2kwe'4e1",ka4chi2 na1.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 na2,"Hijo¿nda4a2ba42xi4ka3 ni42ndo'4o1?A3ma3bi3tin3ba42kwa'1an1ndo'4o1nda1bi3tin3ni1ki3xa2a2 ndo4".
"Ba'1a3ndi4ni14ki3xi3 ndo4i3chi4ja1ta4 2ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1i3chi4nu14u(3) 2ndi4i3chi4ja1ta4 2ni1ki3xi3 ndo4,na4ni4ki3xi3 ndo4i3chi4nu14u(3) 2ndi4
ya1kan3,ka3xi4ba(3) 2ndo'4o1sa3kan4",ka4chi2 an4.
I3kan4ja143ya1kan3,ki13xa2a2 na1i3kan4ndi13kwi3so3ba(3) en4 na2.
I3kan4ndi13kwi3so(3) an4 na2ja143i4yo2 na1tan42se'1e3ba(3) en4i4xa3ma1ni4sa4ka2 en4 na3.
I3kan4ba14ja4i4so3ko2na1kan4ndi4,i4yo2ma1ni4 na2tan42se'1e3ba(3) en4i3kan4.
Sa3kan4ku4u4,sa3kan4ku4u4ja143,ya1kan3,ka4chi2,
i3kan4ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,"Bi3tin3ndi4
Ya1kan3,ja1ni1ku3na'3a4i4yo2 na1nu14u(3) an4tan3ja143,ka4chi2 na1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4
ja1ndi'13i3ba3i3in3kwi1ya1ba42i4yo2 na1be'3e3na4na2kwe'4e1kan4ja143,
ni1ta'1nda1chi3ñu3nu14u3 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,na4ku'1un1 na1ku3chi3 na2i1ta3ndi4
i3in3bi4xin4na1ma4ni1ni'1i4 na2,ta13xi(3) an4nda'3a4i3nda14i3nda14 na2kwa'1an1 na1,na4,na4ku'1un1 na1ku3chi3 na2ndi4
ya1kan3,nda1ndi'3i3ndo3o3na1ma4kan4ku3chi3i3nda14i3nda14 na2ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 na3.
I3kan4ja143,tan3be4la2kan4ndi4be4la2kwa4a24ban4be4la2tu14u3nu14u3ban4chi2.
I3kan4ja143ni1ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1 na1kwa'1an1ku1chi3 na2,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ku'1ba3 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3:
"an4nda3xa2a2 e4ni1kwa3a4ndi4,ya1kan3,ku1tu1ta14xi(3) un4nda'3a(4) on4,ya1kan3,
nda'3a4be4la2ndi4,ya1kan3,su'1ma4ti14in3ya1kan4ndu13ku4 ra2,ya1yo'4o4chi3ni(3) un4nda'3a4be4la2,ya1kan3,
na4ka'4an2 e4ji'4in(4) un4ndi4,"Ta3xi3 ndo4nda'3a4 ndo4ko3to(3) 2,ba3ja1ba'1a3 ni42ba3ndo'4o1ndi4ja1na'3a4 ni42tiem4pu2ba42
i4xa3ma1ni4 2ndo'4o1".ka4chi2,ka3chi2 an4ji'4in(4) un4tan3su'1ma4ti14in3ya1kan4chi3ka2 on4nda'3a(4) en4.
I3kan4ja143,ya1kan3,nda13xa2a2 na1ni1kwa3a4tan3ja143ka4chi2be4la2so'3o3ndi4,"Hijota3xi(3) un4nda'3a(4) on4na4ko3to(3) 2"ka4chi2
I3kan4,ta13xi3 ra2nda'3a4 ra2su3,su14u3nda'3a4 ra2ni4ta3xi3 ra2ndi4su'1ma4ti14in3ba3ta13xi3 ra2nda'3a4be4la2.
"híjole,ta'14an2ba'1a3i4chi3 ndo4hijo,ku4ma1ni4kwa'1a4 ni4(2) a2ji'4in4 ndo4ndi4,ya1kan3,la3ki3 ni42 ndo4",ka4chi2
Tu3ku3ni3ña'3a4ka4chi2,"Hijata3xi(3) un4nda'3a(4) on4na4ko3to(3) 2".
A1su3sa3kan4ni3ka4a4ndi4,ya1kan3,"Ta'14an2ku3ba'1a3i4chi3 ndo4la3ki3 ni42 ndo4",ka4chi2 an4.Sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4.
Ja143ya1kan3,ka'4an2be4la2ji'4in4 na2ndi4na4nda3ka'3mi3 na2ñu'3u2ka'3a4xi1yo4.
I3kan4ba143xi4in4 na2ndi4,ji'3na3mi3i(4) un4nda3ka'3mi(3) un4ñu'3u2ka'3a4xi1yo4sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
tan3sa3kan4ba42ndi4,ya1kan3,"Sa4na'1a(1) on4ndu'1u1sa3kan4ba42ndi4na4ja1ji4ni2 ndu1nda3ka'3mi3 ndu2ñu'3u2sa3kan4ndi4nda3ka'3mi3 ndu(2) a2",ka4chi2
Sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ja143,i3kan4ndo4so14ki1si3nda3yu4nu'3u2.Chio'4o14 ni42ki1si3,i3kan4ja143,
i3kan4ja143ni1ka3chi2be4la2ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"Nda3ka'3mi3 ndo4ñu'3u2ka'3a4ki1si3ndi4,ya1kan3,
ya1kan3,nu4mi24na4chio'1o4ña'1a3tan3ku3xi(3) o4ka4chi2 an4.
"Xi'3na3mi3i(4) un4nda3ka'3mi(3) un4ñu'3u2ka'3a4ki1si3sa3kan4ba42ndi4,ya1kan3,
ja1ji4ni2 ndu1chi3ñu3sa3kan4ba42ndi4nda3ka'3mi3mi3i4 ndu(2) a2".
Tan42ni1ju3ta3nde3e3be4la2nda3ka'3mi(3) an4ñu'3u2ka'3a4ki1si3nda3yu4tan3
ni1tu3u3 na2i3tun4ka'3a4ki1si3nda3yu4ni1nda3a3ba3
ya1kan3,ta1kwi42nda3yu4ja1ta4be4la2i3kan4ni1ja'3ni4ba3 na2be4la2.
I3kan4ja143ni1ndo1o3ba3,ni1ndo1o3ba3ta1kan4ji'4in4ku'1ba3 ra2ja143i13xa3a4 na2ndi4i4yo2mi3i4ba3 na2sa3kan4ku4u4,
sa3kan4ku4u4ni1ku3na'3a4i4yo2 na1,i3kan4ja143ki13xa3a4 ra2i4xa3chi4ñu3 ra2.
Ke4e4 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1i4xa3chi4ñu3 ra2tan3ja143,nda1ba1xi3kwa4a24ki4xa2a2 ra1.
Sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4,ni1ku3na'3a4i4yo2 na1ja143
ni1ke3ta3ba3ta1a3ndi4ña'3a4ku'1ba3ta1kan4ndi4ja1ña'3a4ja1xu13xa3ban4,
ni1ki3xa2a2ba3ta1a3,ja1ta4ta1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1tan3ni1ki3xa2a2ba3ta1a3ndi4ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ku4ni2 ra1ku3ndu'4u4 ra2ji'4in(4) an4.
Ya1kan3,ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,kwi14i3ndi4i4yo2ku'1ba(3) en4tan3ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ni'4i4cuentaji'4in(4) an4ko14nde3e4i3ni2 an4ja'1a4ku'1ba(3) en4.
Ndo1o3 ra2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ta3nda'3a(4) en4ndi4ku14ni2 an4ta3nda'3a(4) en4ndi4ku'1ba(3) en4ku4u4ta1i4xa3ma1ni4 ra2 ña4tan3sa3kan4tu(3) an4kan4ndi4i4xa3ma1ni(4) an4ku'1ba(3) en4ka4chi2 an4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ka3chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Na4tu2ko14nde3e4i3ni2 un4,ya1kan3,
ko14nde3e4i3ni2 un4,ya1kan3,ku3ndu'4u(4) un4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ba'1a3ka1ndi4ka'3ni4 2i3i(4) un4sa3kan4,ku'1ba(3) on4sa3kan4ndi4ku3ndu'4u(4) 2ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2
Ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4tan3ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2,ko14nde3e4i3ni2 yu1ka'3ni(4) un4ku'1ba3 2ndi4ku'1ba3 2ku4u4ta1sa14kwa'3nu3 ra2yu'1u1tan3sa3kan4tu3mi3i4 2ndi4sa14kwa'3nu(3) 2
Tan3i4yo2u1bi1ta'4an2i3na2ja1na1 na1,ti4kan4ndo4o13nda4a2ña4kan4na4ni1ndo1o(3) an4o4ra2kwa'1an1 ra1ja3chi4ñu3 ra3.
I3kan4ja143sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4ja143ni1ndi'1i3i3ni2 an4ndi4
ba14ja4sa4ña4 ra2 ña4ndi4nde3e4 ni42ja4nda3ka3 ra2 ña4ndi4ña4ku3ndu'4u4ji'4in4 ra2ban4.
Tan3ku'1ba(3) en4ko14o3 ra2i4yo2ndi4ta1xi4ka3ja4chi4ñu3ku4u4ta1kan4,i3kan4ja143
sa3kan4ku4u4ja143tu3ku3ki1bi4kan4ni1ki3xa2a2ba3 ra2ja143ta13xi3 ra2
i3xi4ji1ni4 ra2,ya1kan4,"Ya1yo'4o4chi3ka2 on4su1kun4 ri4".
I3kan4su14u3i3xi4ji1ni4 ra2ba42ndi4cadenaba42kan4,ni1chi3ka2 en4su1kun4i3na2kan4.
I3kan4ja143,ni1ndo1o3i3na2nde4ta3 ri4tan3i3kan4ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
Ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4ta1ko4ndo3ku'1ba(3) en4kan4ndi4ta1kwa'1an1 ra1ka'3ni4 ra2ku4u4ta1kan4.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4,ta1,ta1na'14a1ndi4,"Sa4kwa'1a(3) on4tiem4pu2na4
nda3ka'3an4 2tiem4pu2ni1xi1ka3 2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ka'3ni(4) un4yu'1u1",xa143
ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,ya1kan3,"Tiem4pu2tiem4pu2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,su14u3kan4ndi4
sa3kan4na3ni4i3na2kan4ndi4nda'4yu1 ra1ndi4,"Tiem4pu2tiem4pu2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"rompecadena,rompecadena",ka4chi2 ra1tan3
ja143ndu13ko3nde3e4ba3i3na2tan3ja'13nda2ba3 ri4cadenatan3ja143,i3kan4ja143
kwa'1an1ba3 ri4ja1ta4ta1,ni1xa1a1ba3 ri4mi4i4ba42ndi4ka2ta1
ku'1ba(3) en4kan4,ndi4ta1kwa'1an1ka'3ni4 ra2ku4u4ta1kan4,ni1xa1a1ba3i3na2kan4tan3
i13xa3a4ba3i3na2kan4ni1ti3in3ba3 ri4ta1na'14a1tan3i3kan4ja143
ni1ja'3ni4ba3 ri4ta1kan4,i3kan4ja143,ya1kan3,
i3kan4ja143,o4ra2ni1ndi'3i3ja'13ni4 ra2ta1kan4,i3na2ja1na1ta1kan4 ra2tan3i3kan4nda13ndi3ko4 ra2nda13xa2a2 ra1be'3e3.
I3kan4ja143ya1kan3,ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ku'1ba3 ra2ndi4,"¿Na4chu3i13xa(3) on4sa3kan4?"
"ni1ti'3bi(4) un4ta1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1ndi4ta1kwa'1an1ka'3ni4yu'1u1ku4u4 ra2,na4tu2ko14o3i3na2ja1na(1) e1ndi4
ta1ka'3ni4yu'1u1ku4u4 ra2tan3i3na2ku4u4ti4chi13nde3e4 ri4yu'1u1ya1kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ni14xi'1i1 yu1ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ku'1ba3 ra3.
"Ba'1a3ka1mi3i4 2na4ka'3ni4 2yo'4o1tan3sa3kan4ndi'1i1xa'1a(4) on4".
Ya1kan4ndi4ja'13ni4ba3 ra2ku'1ba3 ra2tan3,i3kan4ni1ndo1o3mi3i4ba3 ra2i1nda43.
Yaestodo.CarlosRómuloSantiago.U1ni1xi3ko3u1bi1.Yoloxóchitl.
I3nda14ta1a3ndi4,ya1kan3,i4yo2 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3,ko14o3ka1i3nga2i3in3trabajoja4chiu4un4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,
xa14ku'1u1xi4ka3 ra2i3ta2an2i3ta2an2,i3su2ja'4ni24 ra2i3ta2an2i3ta2an2.
Sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4xi4ka3 ra2ndi4kwa'14an1 ra1tan3ke14ba'1a3 ra2ndi4ta1ke4ba'1a3ku4u4ba3 ra3,kwa'1an1 ra1xa14ku'1u1.
I3kan4ja143,sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ja'1an1,ni1ki3xa2a2i3in3tiem4pu2ja'1an1 ra1ndi4ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1ndi4ko14o3i3su2ni4ki3xa2a2ji'4in4 ra3.
Ja143ka4chi2 an4si'4i2 ra1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,a4chu3ba42ni1ndo'3o(3) on4sa3kan4bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,ni1ja'1an(1) on4tan3ni1ki3xa2a(2) on4bi3tin3ndi4ko14o3i3su2ni4ke3ba'1a(3) on4ji'4in4.
ni1xi1ka3 ni42 yu1tan3ndi4ni14ke3ba'1a3 2ndi4ko14o3 ri4,i3su2ni4ke3ba'1a3 2ji'4in4",ka4chi2 ra1.
Tan3ta1kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ni1ja'1an1 ra1ndi4mi4i4ni1ke1nu3u3ñu'3u4i3kan4ni1ja'1an1 ra1ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1,
ndi4chi2 ra1tan3i3kan4ja143tu4tu24 a2nu14u3 ra2,
i3kan4ja143ni1ke3e3 ra2ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1ndi4su3ko1o4ba3ndi4ka2mi4i4ni1ke1nu3u3ñu'3u4kan4.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ri4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Na'3a2 on4a3sa(3) on4 a2ma1ni4ji'4in(4) 2
ta3kwa'4ni(3) un4yu'1u1tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1nda1ka(3) on4yu'1u1nda'3a4na1ko4ndo3yu3ba4si'3i4 2tan3ka14ni3ni2 un4,
ya1ku4u4ya1ma1ni4a3sa(3) on4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4mi3i4 2,yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ji4ni2nda4a(2) e2ba42ka3ni3ma1ni4 2yo'4o1",ni1ka3chi2ko1o4kan4ji'4in4 ra3.
Ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 ri4ndi4,"Ba'1a3na4nda14ndi3ko4i3ni2 un4ka3xi(4) un4yu'1u1an4ko14o3nda'3a4 2ka3xi(4) un4sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,a3sa(3) e2ma1ni4ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2 ra1.
Ja143ka4chi2 ri4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4,ya1kan3,ko14o(3) a2a3sa(3) 2ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2 ri4ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143ku4ni2ku14ni2 ra1ni1xa1a1 ra1tan3i3kan4ja143ni1ta3kwa'4ni3 ra2 ri4chi13ndu'4u4 ra2 ri4mi4i4ba'1a3.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2,"Bi3tin3ndi4ja1ni1ke3ta(3) on4mi4i4ndi4ka1tin3,bi3tin3ndi4yo'4o4ndo1o(3) on4tan3ku'1un1 yu1".
"Tan3a4su3ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ta3kwa'4ni(3) un4yu'1u1tan3kwi3so(3) on4yu'1u1tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1nda1ka(3) on4yu'1u1be'3e(3) 2ndi4i4yo2na1yu3ba4si'3i4ba3yu'1u1,i3kan4ku'1un1nda1ka(3) on4yu'1u1".
I3kan4tan3,"Ba'1a3na4ka14xi(4) un4yu'1u1ndi4ku14ni2 yu1ka3xi(4) un4yu'1u1".
"Ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4ko14o(3) a2a3sa(3) 2ji'4in(4) un4".
I3kan4ku4ni2ku14ni2 ra1ni1xa1a1 ra1tan3i3kan4ja143nda13ka3ndu'4u4 ri4ja1ta4 ra2,i3kan4ja143ni1ku3kwa'1a4kwa'1an1 na1tan3
i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ri4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Sa1a3a3sa(3) on4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4yu'1u1ndi4i4so3ko2 ni42 yu1,yu'1u1ndi4ku4ni2 yu1ndi4ka3xi4 2i3in3ta'4bi4nda'3a(4) on4
Ka4chi2ko1o4kan4ji'4in4 ra2,i3kan4nda13kwi3in3 ra2ka4chi2 ra1ndi4:
"A4su3ja1ni1ka3chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ku14ni2 yu1,ya1kan3,ka3xi(4) un4yu'1u1,ya1kan4ndi4
ni1ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4a3sa(3) 2ya1ma1ni4ji'4in(4) un4ndi4na4ka14xi(4) un4yu'1u1sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,kwi3i3chi3nde3e4 2yo'4o1",ni1ka3chi2 ra1ji'4in4
I3kan4ni1ku3kwa'1a4kwa'1an1 na1i3kan4nda13ku'1un3i3ni2 ra1ndi4nda13ko3to3 ra2ndi4ko14o3i3in3ta'4bi4nda'3a4 ra2chi1.
I3kan4ja143kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4tu3ku3nda13ku'1un3i3ni2 ra1ndi4i3kan4ja143tu3ku3i3nga2ta'4bi4ko14o3,ko14o3nda'3a4 ra2chi1.
I3kan4ja143ni1ku3kwa'1a4sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1i3kan4nda13ko3to3tu3ku3 ra2ndi4ja1ndu13ndi3kun2ba3i3nga2ta'4bi4nda'3a4 ra3.
Ja143kwa'1an1tu3ku3 na2,ni1ku3xi4ka3kwa'1an1 na1ja143tu3ku3ta'4bi4ndu13ndi3kun2.
Tan42ja1i13xa3a4kwa'1an1,xa'4a13mi3i4 ri4cuentandi4ja1ku4ya3tin3 na2be'3e3 na2,be'3e3yu3ba4si'3i4 ri4ja143ka4chi2 ri4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"Na4ni1xa1a(1) on4tan3ka3chi2 un4ji'4in4yu3ba4 2ndi4,se'1e3 ndo4ba1xi3nda3ka(3) 2,
ki'14bi1(3) un4ti1xin3be'3e3ndi4i3nda14ti4xa'1a(4) on4ka3ndi3chi2 un4ti1xin3be'3e3tan3i3nga(2) e2kan4ku3ndi3chi2ke'3e2,
tan3ka3chi2 un4ji'4in4 na2ndi4,se'1e3 ndo4ba1xi3nda3ka(3) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,kwa'1a4 ni42tiem4pu2ba42ni1ndo'3o(3) 2ji'4in4se'1e3 ndo4,
ni1xa'3nu3 ra2tan3bi3tin3ndi4ja1ni1ku3nde3e4 ra2ya1kan4ndi4ba1xi3nda3ka(3) 2 ra1nda'3a4 ndo4".
"I3kan4ja143tan3nda4a(2) e2,na4ka4chi2,nda13kwi3in3,ya1kan3,si'3i4 2ka4chi2 an4:¿nda4a(2) e2ba42ku4ni2 un4bi3tin3?"
"¿An4ya1bi4ka3ku4ni2 un4,nda4a(2) e2,an4ranchuku4ni2 un4an4tiendaku4ni2 un4?"
"Ko1to1nda14kwi3in(3) un4ki'3in(3) un4 a2kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1ku4u4ya1xa4bi2ndio4si2ya1kan4ka'1an(1) on4xa'1a4ji'4in4 na2ta3xi3 na2nda'3a(4) on4".
Ka4chi2,ni1ka3chi2ko1o4ji'4in4 ra2,"Tan3na4ni1ki'3in(3) un4 a2nda3kwa'1a3 na(2) e2kan4nda'3a(4) on4ndi4,ya1kan3,
mi4i4ñu'4u4ndu1u4ya1ja4si4ki2(4) un4i3kan4ku3mi3i(4) un4 a3".
"Tan3ko14o(3) a2i3in3ki1bi4ba42na'1a(1) on4 a2nu14u3ña4si'4i2 un4ndi4,ya1ji4ni2mi3i(4) un4ji'4in4ánima on4,ya1kan4ku3ni'3i(3) un4 a2,ya1kan4ba42chi3nde3e4 a2yo'4o1",ka4chi2,ka4chi2,ni1ka3chi2ko1o4kan4ji'4in4 ra3".
I3kan4ja143kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1 na1be'3e3ko1o4,mi4i4nde4e4ti4ko1o4xu13xa3kan4ndi4ndo3o3 lu3ko1o4xu13xa3nde4e4 ri4ja143,
ni1xa1a1 ra1tan3ja143,ni1ja'3ni3 ra2xa'1a4 ra2ti1xin3be'3e3tan3ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 ri4ndi4,"Se'1e3 ndo4ba1xi3nda3ka(3) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,
kwa'1a4 ni42tiem4pu2ba42ni1ndo'3o(3) 2ji'4in4se'1e3 ndo4xa'13nu3 ra2bi3tin3ndi4,ta1ja1xu13xa3ku4u4 ra2ya1kan4ndi4ba1xi3nda3ka(3) 2 ra1nda'3a4 ndo4".
I3kan4ndu13ndi3chi2ko1o4be4lu2tan3i3kan4ja'1an1ndi1ki'1in3 ri4se'1e3 ri4.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2ko1o4be4la2so'3o3ndi4,"¿Nda4a(2) e2ba42ku4ni2 un4bi3tin3?"
"¿An4tiendaku4ni2 un4an4ranchuku4ni2 un4,nda4a(2) e2ba42ku4ni2 un4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4?".
Ka4chi2ko1o4be4la2so'3o3ji'4in4,ta1nda'4bi2kan4.
Ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4,"Na4tu2ku4ni2 ndo4ja4ni3ma1ni4 ndo4yu'1u1ndi4ya1ndi4ya1xa4bi2ndio4si2ya1kan4,ku3ni3ma1ni4 ndo4yu'1u1ku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2".
I3kan4ndu13ta3nde3e3ba3nu14u3ko1o4che4e13xi4to3 ri4nu14u3ti4be4la2ndi4,ya1kan3,
ja143kwa'1an1i3ni2 ri4nde4e4 ri4,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2,ko1o4be4lu2ji'4in4ti4be4la2kan4ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4ko14o(3) a2ji4ni2 o4a3sa(3) e4ji'4in(4) a2ndi4
ta1ja1ni1ki3xa2a2ku4u4se'1e(3) o4tan3ta3xi3ba(3) e4ya1ku3ni2 ra1nda'3a4 ra3".
I3kan4ja143,ndu13ndi3chi2ba3ko1o4be4la2kan4ja'1an1ki'1in3 ri4 a2ndi4ya1kan4ndi4tio'1o3ya1bi4ka3ba42kan4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ki'3in3,ni1ki'3in3 ra(2) e2i3kan4ja143tan3ja1a1chi1ka1bi4ni1nda14yu3ba3ti4kan4 ra2ndi4
tan3nda'4bi2 ni42i4yo2 ra1ndi4ko14o3be'3e3 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,
xi4ka3xa14ku'1u1sa3kan4ku4u4ba3 ra2,ta1xi4ka3xa14ku'1u1sa3kan4ku4u4 ra2i3ta2an2,i3ta2an2ndi4ko14o(3) a2nda4a2i3in3chi3ñu3ja4chiu4un4bi4 ra2ndi4a1su3chi3ñu3kan4i4xa3.
I3kan4ja143ya1kan3,"Tan3o4ra2ku4ni2 un4kwa'3a3be'3e(3) on4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ña4si'4i2 un4ndi4na4nda13ka3ndu'4u(4) an4ku1sun(1) an4tan3sa3kan4ndi4ndu3ku(4) un4i3in3xi4ko'3o4ya1a4tan3
an4zaguánku4ni2 un4an4ranchuku4ni2 un4,nda1ndi'4i(4) a2ku4ni2 un4ndi4
ja1ña1a4i4yo2ba(3) e2,ka'1an1ti(4) un4nda4a(2) e2ku4ni2 un4,ki14tu3,i3in3ñu3u42tan3ki14tu3ndi4ya1ja1i4yo2ku4u4ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ni1ka3chi2 ri4ji'4in4 ra2ya1kan4ndi4
nda13xa2a2 ra1ni1kwa3a4tan3ko14o3ña'1a3ndi4so3,ndi4so3bi4 ra2ndi4,so'3o3ka4a4ba3 ra2ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1,a1su3tu3ku3ni3ka'4an2 en4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"¿na4chu3ba42ni14ke3ba'1a(3) on4tan3yo'4o1ndi4kwa'1an(1) on4ndi4a1su3ta1ke4ba'1a3ku4u4ba(3) on4ta1ki3xa2a2i3su2ji'4in4ku4u4ba(3) on4?",ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Ni1xi1ka3 ni42 yu1tan3ndi4ni14ke3ba'1a3 2",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4.
Ya1kan4ba42ndi4bi3tin3ndi4,"Sa4nu1mi(4) un4tan3ku3xi(3) o4sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,in3ka4ni24ndi4,ya1kan3,a1chi1ka3ndu'4u(4) un4ku1sun(1) un4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143ndi'13i3xi13xi3 na2tin3i3kan4ja143,ta1kan4ndi4xi4ka3 ra2kwa'1an1ba1xi3kwa'1an1ba1xi3 ra2xi4ka3 ra3.
Xi4to3 ra2mi4i4ba42ba'1a3ka3na3nu3be'3e3 ra2,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ña4si'4i2 ra1ndi4,"Ka3ndu'4u(4) un4ku1sun(1) un4ndi4
yu'1u1ndi4ni1xa14bi2 ni42 yu1tan3ba143kwi4i4ku1sun1 yu1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.I3kan4nda13ka3ndu'4u(4) an4kan4ni1ki1xin1ba(3) en4.
I3kan4ja'1an1ndu3ku4 ra2ya1a4tan3i3kan4ja143xi1ka3 ra2chi13na'3a2 ra1
ko3o3be'3e3 ra2i3kan4ta13xi3na'3a2 ra1cuartoni1ta3xi3na'3a2 ra1,chiquerumi4i4ku3chi3tu4ji1ndi1ki4ba3ta13xi3na'3a2 ra1zaguánba3,
chi13na'3a2 ra1mi4i4,ya1kan3,ko3o3ranchuya3tin3ye'14e4 ra2mi4i4ki3xa2a2ji1ndi1ki4ti4kwa'1a4ku3chi3tu4 ri4.
I3kan4ya1i3in3ñu3u42tan3ki14tu3ndi4,ya1kan3,
zaguányo'4o4ndi4chi4tu4nda1a1ya1yo'4o4ji'4in4ki3ti4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,
be'3e3yo'4o4ndi4chi4tu4nda1a1ya1yo'4o4ji'4in4tiendatan3ko3o3 na2,na1xi14ko3tiendaka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Tan3yu'1u1ndi4pisonda1ni1nu3i3kan4ku1sun1 yu1ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in(4) a2.
I3kan4ja143nda13ka3ndu'4u4 ra2ni1ki1xin1 ra1.
Nda13ku'1un3i3ni2 ra1ni1ki4tu3ndi4nda1pisoni1nu3ka4ndu'3u4 ra2ki4xin1 ra1.
Ndo13to3 ra2ndi4zaguánndi4chi4tu4nda1a1ña1a4ji'4in4
ki3ti4,ta1ja1bi4ka3ku4u4 ra2ndi4,bi4ka3 na2ndi4ko14o3ña1ku4ma1ni4 a2ndi4
i4yo2tiendai4yo2na1musui4xa3chiu4un4nu14u3 ra2
ni1ku3bi4ka3ya'4a13 ni42 ra1i3kan4ja143
nda4yu'3bi2 lu3i3ni2na1yu4bi24na1vecino ra1ndi4,sa1a3i13xa3ta1ka1a3ni1ku3bi4ka3 ni42 ra1tan3
ta1nda'4bi2i4chi3ku4u4 ra2tan3bi3tin3ndi4i3in3ñu3u42tan3ni1ki4tu3ndi4ya'4a13 ni42bi4ka3 ra2.
Sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4ja143,
ya1kan4ba42ndi4ba'1a3ni3ku3ndu'4u4 ra2ku3xi3 ra2ni3ba'1a3ni3ka3ndu'4u4 ra2ku1sun1 ra1tan3
ya1ña1a4ndi4a1su3ti1xin3i3in4ña1mi4i4ñu'4u4ndu1u4ja4si4ki24 ra2i3kan4ba3ndi4ka(2) e2.
I3kan4nda4ku3nda3a2 ra(1) e1,i3kan4ja143sa3kan4ku4u4,ni1ku3na'3a4tan3i3kan4ja143ni1ke3ta3i3in3musui4xa3chiu4un4nu14u3 na3,
ta1kan4ja143i1xa14a3ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4ña4patrona ra1ndi4ku4ni2 ra1ndi4ku3nda3ka3 ra2 ña4.
Sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4ndi4ni1xi1nu1i3ni2ba(3) en4,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,ya1kan3:
"¿nda4a(2) e2ba42i4yo2i4xa3 ndo4ndi4ni1ku3bi4ka3 ni42 ndo4ya'4a13 ni42bi4ka3 ndo4?".
"Ka4chi2 na1vecino ndo4ndi4ndo'4o1ndi4na1nda'4bi2i4chi3ku4u4 ndo4a1chi1tan3bi3tin3ndi4ya'4a13 ni42bi4ka3 ndo4",ka4chi2ta1ko4ndo3musu na1kan4ji'4in(4) an4.
"Ji14ni2 yu1nda4a(2) e2ba42i4yo2i4xa3 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,
ni3mi3i4 ra2ba143nda4tu'4un4 ra2ji'4in(4) 2ndi4mi3i4 ra2ku4u4ta1ji4ni2na4chu3ba42tan3ni1ku3bi4ka3 ndu2",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
"I4yo2ndu4xa24ndi4i4yo(2) a2ku4mi3i4 ra2ya1kan4ndi4ni1ku3bi4ka3 ndo4tin3".
"Na4o4ra2ja1ka3ndu'4u4 ra2ku1sun1 ra1tan3kwe4e2,kwe4e2ni3,ya1kan3,ta3kwa'4ni(3) un4ya1ña1a4su1kun4 ra2tan3
tan3sa3kan4ta3xi(3) un4 a2nda'3a4 2ku3ni2 yu1nda4a(2) e2ba42ndi4i4yo(2) a2ku4mi3i4 ra2",ka4chi2 an4,ka4chi2ta1mu4sa2 en4kan4so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
Sa3kan4ni3ku4u4sa3kan4ni3ku4u4,
ja143ndi'4i13i3ni2 an4ndi4ba14sa4kwi4i4,ya1kan3,ta3kwa'4ni(3) an4 e2kan4tan3nda3kwa'1a(3) en4 e2nda'3a4ta1mu4sa2 en4.
Sa3kan4ku4u4ni1ki3xa2a2,ni1kwa3a4ni1ki1xin1 ra1tan3i3kan4tan3ni1ku3ñu3u42ka4ndu'3u(4) an4ba143kwi4i4ku1sun(1) an4tan3
o4ra2ja1tu4u2 an4ndi4ja1ki4xin1 ni42 ra1ja1ni1nda3ñu'4u4i3ni2 ra1tan3
kwe4e2ni3kwe4e2ni3ja'1an(1) en4ta13kwa'4ni3ba(3) en4 e2kan4su1kun4 ra2tan3i3kan4ta13xi(3) an4nda'3a4ta1ko4ndo3mu4sa2 en4tan3i3kan4ja143
ji13to3 ra2nu14u(3) a2ndi4su14u3nda4a(2) e2ba42ndi4,oroye'4e1ta4xa2ba42ndi4ka2ti1xin3 a2kan4.
Ya1ba'1a3ba42i3kan4xa143ndi13ki'3in3 ra(2) e2tan3"bi3tin3ndi4na4ku'1un(1) o4
na1ku'1un1ko3ndo(3) e4tin3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4i3kan4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2 ña4tan3kwa'1an1ba3,kwa'1an1ba3 na2i1nda43.
Kwa'1an1ba3 na2ndi4su14u3,ya1kan3,ya3tin3ka1a3kwa'1an1 na1ndi4u1xa1la3ma42kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4ndi4ni1ya'1a3 na2tan3
ni1xa1a1 na1i3nga2xi3yo3yu14bi4i3kan4ni1kwa'3a3be'3e3 na2,
I3kan4ka4ndu'3u4 ra2ki4xin1 ra1ni1ki4tu3ndi4nda143nda'4bi2ka4a4ba3,nda143ta4xin24ka4a4,tu3ku3,tu3ku3
an4na1musuña1a4ndi4ko14o3 na2i4yo2ndi4na1ja1,ndi'4i4,ku4ta4xin24ba3,ki3ti4ku4u4 ri4ndi4ko14o3ka1ki3ti4ko14o3ka1ndi4
ja1ni1ki3xa3a4ku4nda'4bi2tu3ku3ba3 ra2,tian42ka4a4,ka4a4tu3ku3ba3,ni1ku3nda'4bi2 ra1ni1ndo1o3 ra2ndi4
sa3kan4ka4a4tu3ku3ba3chi2,i3kan4nda13ndu3ku4 ra2 ña4ndi4ko14o(3) an4i4yo2.
I3kan4ja143nda13ji1nu3u1bi1ki1bi4,ja143i4ndu'3u4 ra2xa4ku3 ra3.
I3kan4ni1ndi3ki'3in3 ra2i3nda14ji1ni4mis4tun2ja1na1 ra1ni1chi3ka2 ra1 ri4,ya1kan3,ka'3a4yu'3u4xi1ni4 ra2tan3nu13mi3nda3a2 ra1tan3kwa'1an1 ra1.
I3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1i3in3ñu3u2,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4na1kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
"¿An4ko14o3i3in3ña'3a4an4ko14o3i3in3ta1a3ni4ya'1a3 na2yo'4o4?",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3nda4ka1tu'4un4 ra3.
"U4ta1na1kan4ndi4bi14tin3 ni42ba42ni1ya'1a3i3nda14ta1a3nda4ka3 ra2ña'3a4kwa'1an1xi'3na(3) en4nu14u3 ra2tan3ndi4kun2 ra1".
I3kan4ni1ya'1a3 ra2i3in3ñu3u2kan4kwa'1an1 ra1,kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1tu3ku3 ra2,
be'3e3chi4ñu3ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 na2ndi4an4ko14o3i3in3 na2,ña'3a4ni4ya'1a3an4ko14o3ta1a3ni4ya'1a3.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2na1kan4ji'4in4 ra2,ndi4ko14o3 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,bi14tin3 ni42ba42ni1ya'1a3na1kan4kwa'1an1 na1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ta'14an2ku3na'3a2ya1ko4ndo3escuelayo'4o4bi4ni1ya'1a3na1kan4kwa'1an1 na1.
Tan3bi3tin3ndi4escuelayo'4o4ndi4ya1ja1ni1xi1nu3ba42ka4chi2 na1,ka4chi2na1kan4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ni1ya'1a3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4tan3ni1xa1a1 ra1i3nga2ñu3u2.
I3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1,i3nga2be'3e3chi4ñu3xa1a1tu3ku3 ra2ka'4an2 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3,
nda4ka1tu'4un4 ra2ndi4na4ko14o3ña'3a4tan3ko14o3i3in3ta1a3ni4ya'1a3 na2kwa'1an1 na1.
I3kan4ni1ja'3nda2ta1chi4ñu3chi3ñu3ndi4,ya1kan3,"¡Kwa'4an2ndi1ki'1in3 ndo4ta1ña1a4!".
"Ta1ko14o3chi3ñu3nu14u3ku4u4ta1ña1a4ndi4xi4ka3 ra2,i3kan4,be'3e3ka3a2kan4ku'1un1chi3ka2 ndo4 ra3".
Tan3be'3e3ka3a2ndi4be'3e3ka3a2,su14u3be'3e3ka3a2kan4ba42ndi4be'3e3ka3a2ti14in3ba42kan4.
Mi4i4ba42ja'1an1nda1ka3 na2 ra1,tan3ta1kan4ndi4kwa'1a4 ni42ya1ku4u4ya1ma1ni4i13xa3 ra2,
ki1bi4ja'4ni24 ra2i3su2tan3,ja'4ni24 ra2i3su2tan3ba14ja4ndi4ki'3in3 ra2 ri4ya1ba'1a3pi3lo4kan4ba3ba43.
Pi3lo4kan4ku4u4ti4i13xa3 ra(2) e2ma1ni4ji'4in4.
i3kan4ja143,ki1bi4
i3kan4ja143kwa'1an1 ra1be'3e3ka3a2tan3
tan3mis4tun2ja1na1 ra1ndi4ba143ni4ndo3ko3o4 ra2ti4kan4ndi4ti4kwa'1an1ku4u4 ri4ji'4in4 ra2be'3e3ka3a2.
Ja143ni1ku3ñu3u42tan3,i1xa14a3so'3o3ba3ba1xi3ti14in3ndi4nda143ka4nda1ba1xi3ti14in3ndi4ka2 ra1be'3e3ka3a2ja143
ni1ta3kwa'4ni3ba3 ra2mis4tun2ja1na1 ra1tan3ja143,sa13ña4 ra2 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4,i3in(3) a2ti14in3ba1xi3tan3ka4ta1bi1ba3 ri4 a2kan4,i3in(3) a2ti14in3ba1xi3tan3ka4ta1bi1ba3 ri4 a2,
sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1ndi'1i3ba3i3ni2ti14in3be4la2ndi4nda143i3nda14ji1ni4 a2ti14in3la4tun3ko'4li4nu14u3,
ya1kan4ni1ka1ku3,i3kan4ja143ni1ka3chi2ti14in3be4la2ji'4in4 ra2,"Amigundi4nda3ti3in(3) un4mis4tun2ja1na(1) on4sa3kan4ndi4
xa1a1 yu1nda3tu'4un(4) 2kwen4tu2ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2ti14in3be4la2so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143ni1ku3ya3tin3ya1ti14in3be4la2kan4.
I3kan4nda13ti3in3 ra2ti4kan4nda13chi3ka2ba'1a3 ra2i3kan4ja143ni1xa1a1ti14in3be4la2ka4chi2 ri4ndi4,"¿Nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o(4) on4ya1kan4ndi4
ya1kan3,ya1kan4ba42ndi4ndi4ka2 on4yo'4o4?,tan3be'3e3ka3a2yo'4o4ndi4
yo'4o4ndi4ko14o(3) a2in4ki14tu3na1yu4bi24ba1xi3 na2be'3e3ka3a2yo'4o4ndi4,ki14tu3ndi4nda143i3ki4ba3ndi4kwi3so3 na2".
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4 ri4,"Yu'1u1ndi4ya1yo'4o4ya1yo'4o4ndo'4o(4) 2ndi4ña4si'4i2 yu1
ni1ndi3ki'3in(3) an4ya1ku4u4ya1xa4bi2ndio4si2i4yo2i4xa(3) 2ya1kan4ndi13ki'3in(3) an4ba1xi3ji'4in(4) an4tan3
ta1i4xa3chiu4un4nu14u3 ndu2ku4u4ta1ndi13ki'3in(3) an4kan4ba1xi3ji'4in(4) an4tan3ji14ni2 yu1nda4a2ba42kwa'1an1 na1".
Ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ti14in3be4la2.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ri4,ka4chi2,ya1kan3,"Yu'1u1ndi4a3sa(3) e2ma1ni4ji'4in(4) un4na4sa3kan4tan3,kwi3i3ja4nda3ta3ku2 un4se'1e3 2,
tan3sa3kan4ba42ndi4yu'1u1ndi4chi3nde3e4 2yo'4o1",ka4chi2ti14in3be4la2kan4so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143ya1kan3,ka4chi2,
i3kan4ja143ni1ta3kwa'4ni3 ra2mis4tun2kan4tan3u1ni1ku1mi4ni1ya'1a3 ri4ja1ta4 e2kan4nda13ta3ku2ba(3) e2kan4ja143,
sa3kan4ku4u4ndi4ka2 ra1be'3e3ka3a2kan4ni1ki3xa2a2pi3lo4ka4chi2 ri4ji'4in4 ra2,"¿Nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o(4) on4amigu?".
"Nda13ka'3an4 2yo'4o1ba1xi3 2ndi4ya1ma1ni4i13xa(3) on4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,
ja1i4yo2 yu1ku3u2 yu1so3ko2tan3ni14xi'1i1 yu1so3ko2ndi4
yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ni1i3xa(3) on4ya1ma1ni4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ya1ma1ni4i13xa(3) on4ji'4in(4) 2ya1kan4ba42ndi4kun2 yu1ba1xi3 2ja1ta(4) on4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Tan3na4sa3kan4tan3i4yo2i3nga2na1kwi3i3chi3nde3e4 na2yo'4o1ndi4
yu'1u1ndi4ya1ku4u4ya1ma1ni4i13xa(3) 2ji'4in4,ndi4ya1kan4ndi4ya1ja4nda3ndi3ko4 2ba43".
"I13xa(3) on4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ya1nda3ndi3ko4ko3ndo(3) a2",ka4chi2,ta1kan3,ka4chi2ta1pi3lo4kan4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ka'1an1 ra1ji'4in4ti14in3be4la2ndi4na4ndi3xa3ku4u4 ri4ndi4kwi3i3chi3nde3e4 ri4 ra3.
Ndi4ja1ni1ke3ba'1a3 ra2ji'4in4ta1,ta1chi3nde3e4ña'3a4.
Ya1kan4ndi4ni1ka3na3ti14in3be4la2kan4ya1ti14in3la4tun3ko'4li4nu14u3.
"Bi3tin3ndi4ni1ke3ba'1a3 ndu2ji'4in4ta1yo'4o4ndi4ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2ti14in3be4la2ji'4in4ta1pi3lo4.
I3kan4ja143ndi4bi3tin3ndi4ni1kwa3a4nu'4u4tan3ja143,bi3tin3,bi3tin3ba42ke3e3 ndu2ku'1un1 ndu1ndi4ya14tin3,
ya14tin3ba42i4yo2,ya1kan3,
be'3e3ni1kwa'3a(3) e2ndi4,ya'1a(3) e4u1xa1la3ma42sa3kan4ndi4,i3kan4ni1kwa'3a3be'3e3ndi4a1chi1ndi4ko14o3tiendakan4tan3bi3tin3ndi4
ya1ja143ju13na'3a2ku4u4tiendandi4,ka'4nu3 ni42tiendakan4i4yo2",ka4chi2 ra1,ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
Ya1kan4ndi4ni1kwa3a4tan3ndu13ku3ndu'4u4ba3,ya1ti14in3ko'4li4nu14u3kan4ja1ta4ndi1xin4pi3lo4tan3
ni1nda3a3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4,ti1bi1tan3ti1bi1kwa'1an1 ri4ti1bi1tan3ti1bi1kwa'1an1 ri4,sa3kan4ku4u4ba143tu4u4ni1sa'1bi3ba(3) e2pi3lo4ña1a4kwa'1an(1) e1.
I3kan4tan42ja143ni1kwa3a4tan3,ni1ku3xa'1a1ba'1a3tan3ni1xa1a1ba3 ri4ventanandu13ku3ndu'4u4 ri4i4ndu'3u4 ri4.
Tan3ta1bi4ka3ndi4ta1i4ndu'3u4xi4xi3ku4u4ta1kan4i4ndu'3u4 ra2ja143,nu14u3mesa ra1tan3i3kan4,i3kan4nda4ku3nda3a2 ra(1) e1kan4chi2.
I3kan4ja143ya1kan3,ju13nda3tu3 na2nde4e4 na2,nde4e4 na2,nde4e4 na2sa3kan4,ya1pi3lo4ña1a4ndi4ventanaña1a4i4ndu'3u4 a3.
Ja143ka'4a4ni1ku3u3,nda13si2ye'14e4 na2,ta13xi3kwa'4a4 na2ña'1a3tan3ja143ndu13ku1sun1 na1.
An4ni1ta'1bi4sa3ba3na3a4ñu3u42tan3,ni1nu3u3ba(3) e2ya1ti14in3ko'4li4kan4ni1xi1ka3 e2ndi4xa'13nda(2) e2mantandi4
ja'13nda2 lu(3) a2mantani1xi1ka(3) e3,
tan3i3kan4ni1ke3e(3) a2ja'1an1ko1to(1) a1mi4i4ka4ndu'3u4ta1bi4ka3ña1a4ndi4ki4xin1 ni42 ra1ndi4,nda13ndi1ka1nda'3a4 ra2ka4ndu'3u4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143,kwe4e2,kwe4e2ja'1an1 ri4tan3ju13ndu'4u4 ri4,ya1kan3,te'1e4nu14u3 ra2tan3ni1chi3ka2 ri4su'1ma4 ri4is1tin4 ra2tan3
ni1ka1xan4 ra2tan3nda13ba3ba(3) e2kan4ñu'3u4,nda4ndu'2u4 ri4ndi13ki'3in3 ri4 a2
i3kan4ni1nda3a3 ri4,ki13xa2a2 ri4mi4i4ba42i4ndu'3u4pi3lo4tan3,i3kan4ni1nda3a3 ri4ja1ta4ndi1xin4pi3lo4ba1xi3 na3.
I3kan4ki13xa2a2 ri4nda13kwa'1a3 ri4 a2nda'3a4ta1nda'4bi2.
I3kan4nda13ndi3ko4 ra2ba1xi3 ra2tan3ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3,
i3kan4ja143tu3ku3ni3ki13xa3a4 ra2chi13na'3a2 ra1xa'1a4be'3e3kan4
i3in3ñu3u42tan3ni1ki4tu3ndi4a1su3tian42ka4a4,ka4a4tu3ku3ba3ndi4,ta1ja1bi4ka3sa4ka2ku4u4tu3ku3ba3 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,
ya1kan3,lu14u3na1i4xa3chiu4un4nu14u3 ra2ndi4i4yo2musui4yo2na1nda4chi4ñu3nda4a2ña'3a4i4yo2
ko14o(3) a2ku4ma1ni4ndi4i4yo2na1xi4kwe4nda2ña'3a4.Ni1ka'3nu3u1na1ki1bi4tan3
ni1ki3xa2a2ba3ña4,ko4ndo3,ña4ju13ndu'4u4,ña4si'4i2,ju13ndu'4u4ji'4in4 ra2ji'4in4mu4sa2 en4nda13tu1u3 na2ba1xi3 na3,
i3kan4ja'13nda2 ra1chi3ñu3tan3i3kan4ja143ja'1an1na1kan4,nda4chi4ñu3ja'13ni4ña'3a4 na2tan3
i3kan4ni1ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ran4.

U1ni1xi3ko3u1bi1.
Yoloxóchitl.
I3in3 ra2ndi4ta1,ta1xu4xan3ba3ta1ki'4bi3i4yo2i3ni2ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta1kwe'4e1ba3ku4u4 ra2tan3
sa3kan4ku4u4tan3i4yo2i3nda1(4) en4ta4u3ni2si'3i4 na2ku'4u2 an4tan3,i3kan4ja143,
ya1kan3,ja1ni1ndi'1i3ba3i3ni2ta1,ta1nde3e4kan4ndi4
be'3e3i3ta2an2,i3ta2an2i4yo2 na1ji'4in4si'3i4 na2tan3tiem4pu2ka3ja3chiu4un4 na2ku4u(4) a2tan3
tan3i3kan4ja143,kwa'1an1 ra1ndo4ko3o4 ra2ña4ta4u3ni2tan3kwa'1an1 ra1ka3ja3chiu4un4 ra2
i3kan4ni1ta1nda3a2tiem4pu2ni1chi'3i3 na2i3kan4ja143
ja143ke4e4ku'1u1i3tu2,i3kan4ja143
ka4chi2ta1nde3e4kan4ji'4in4ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4
ndo1o(3) on4ko3nda2a(2) on4si'3i(4) o4ndi4,ya1kan3,na4ku'1un1ta'3an2 yu1,ya1kan3,ku3tu(3) 2ja'1a4i3tu2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ja143ni1ndo1o3,i3kan4,i3kan4ja3ndi4,ya1kan3,tu3chi2
i3kan4ni1ke3e3,ji'3na3ba3ta1,ta1ka3ma2 ni42kan4ti'13bi4 ra2kwa'1an1.
I3kan4ja'1an1ta1kan4ndi4su14u3ta1ni4ja'1an1ku3tu3ja'1a4i3tu2ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4i3tu2,i3tu2ba3ja'1an1 ra1ja'13nda2 ra1,ni1kwa3a4nda13xa2a2 ra1ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4
ja14ndi'3i3ba3 ra2ja'1a4i3tu2ni1ke3e3ku'1u1i3tu2ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ja143ka4chi2ta1nde3e4kan4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"I3ta2an2ndi4,i3ta2an2sa3kan4ku'1un1ko1to1 yu1mi4i4ba42xa'1an(1) on4ja13chi4ñu(3) un4".
Ya1kan4ndi4tu3ku3ki1bi4kan4ja143ka4chi2ta1nde3e4kan4ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1,"I3ta2an2ndi4yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ndo1o3".
"Ka3sa3kwe4nda2 on4si'3i(4) o4ndi4,ya1kan3,ji4ni2ba(3) on4ndi4ña4ku'4u2ban4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
i3kan4ja143ni1ndo1o3ba3ta1kwe'4e1kan4ji'4in4si'3i4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4,nda14yu3 ra2ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,"O4ra2ku'1un1 ra1bi3tin3ndi4,
na4tu2ku4ni2ku3xi3si'3i(4) o4tan3ja4nda3sa1a(4) on4is1ta4sa3kan4ndi4ku3xi(3) an4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Na4ku4ni2ko'3o(3) an4ta1kwi42tan3ja4sa1a(4) on4ta1kwi42sa3kan4ndi4ko'3o3si'3i(4) o4,yu'1u1ndi4na4ku'1un1 yu1sa3kan4ndi4ki3xa2a2 yu1kwa3a4".
I3kan4ni1ke3e3ta1nde3e4kan4kwa'1an1 ra1kwa'1an1ko1to1 ra1xa'1a4i3tu2,ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4ndi4
su14u(3) a2ni4ke3e3ku'1u1ku4u4i3tu2ndi4ñu'3u4ba3nde4e4ndi'3i(3) a2ya1ja'13nda2ba3 ra2ba43.
i3kan4nda13xa2a2 ra1ni1kwa3a4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3,
"su14u3ta1ba'1a3ni4i3xa3ku4u4yo'4o1ndi4su14u3ta1ni4ja'1an1ku3tu3ja'1a4i3tu2ku4u(4) un4ndi4,i3tu2ba3ja'1an(1) on4ni1ja'3nda2 on4".
"yo'4o1ndi4su14u3ta1ba'1a3ku4u4yo'4o1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.I3kan4ja143,
i3kan4,i3kan4ja3tu3ndi4nda1i3chi4ka1ba1xi3 ra2tan3
i3kan4ya1ta4u3ni2kan4ndi4su14u(3) a2ku4ni2ku3xi3bi4ba42kan4ndi4xi1ka3 ra2ja14nda3sa1a4 ra2is1ta4tan3
ni1ta3an4 ra2yu'3u4 a2,i3kan4ni1tu3u3 ra2i3tun2yu'3u4 a2,ji'4in(4) a2nde3e4sa14ko'3o3 ra(2) e2ta1kwi42,
i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,nda1i3chi4ka1ba1xi3ya3ni2 ra1i3kan4ja'1an1ndi1kun1 ra1ta1kan4.
"ya3ni2ya3ni2ndi4ja1ba'1a3ku4ni2si'3i(4) o4ndi4,ya1kan3,ja1ni1xi3xi(3) an4i3nda14is1ta4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1.
"An4ka3ndi4xa3tu(3) e4,an4ka3ndi4xa3tu3yu'1u1ndi4si'3i(4) o4ndi4ña4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3i3ni2tu3ban4tan3
ña4ba143xi4xi3tu3ban4ndi13ki'3in(3) 2kwa'1an1tu(3) 2tan3ni1ki3xa2a2tu(3) 2ndi4ja1xi13xi3tu(3) an4".
I3kan4ja143chi13ndu'4u4tu3un3 ra(2) e2ta4u3ni2ndi4,ja1ba'1a3ku4ni2si'3i4 na2ndi4
ja1ndu13ku3ndu'4u4ta'3an2 en4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1,i3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,ya1kan3:
"su14u3ta1ba'1a3ku4u4yo'4o1ndi4ja'13ni4ba(3) on4si'3i(4) o4,
sa1a3ko3o3tan3ndu1xin1si'3i(4) o4bi3tin3yo'4o1ndi4su14u3ta1ba'1a3ku4u4yo'4o1ja'13ni4ji'4in4nda'3a(4) on4si'3i(4) o4".
"Ka14ni3ni2 un4ya3ni2na4ku'1un1ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in4su1tu1sa3kan4ndi4ki3xa2a2su1tu1sa3kan4ndi4ta3xi3 ra2misasi'3i(4) o4ndi4si'3i(4) o4ndi4ji'4in4misandu1xin(1) an4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3 ra2,ya1kan3,chi13ndu'4u4 ra2ña4ta4u3ni2sa14ta1bi1nda3a2 ra1ña4bi1tu4ye'14e4tan3i3kan4ja143ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
Ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4su1tu1ndi4,"Padrendi4ku4ni2 yu1ndi4a3sa(3) on4 a2ba'1a3ji'4in(4) 2,
ku'1un(1) un4ta3xi(3) un4misasi'3i4 2ndi4,ña4ku4ni2ku3u2ban4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143,"Ba'1a3ba3hijondi4ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4bi3tin3sa3kan4ku'1un(1) o4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ta13xi4xi'3na3ba3 ra2su1tu1ba1xi3,ni1ki3xa2a2ta1kan4,su1tu1ye'14e4tan3chi13nda'3a4ba3 ra2i3tun4,
ni1ka'3ma3kwa'1an(1) e1ta4u3ni2ñu'3u4.
"¡Ay!padrecitokwa1chi3 ni42 un4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ja'13ni4ba(3) on4si'3i4 2tin3,
si'3i4 2ndi4ña4ja1lu3u3ku4ni2ban4ndi4ko3o3misa en4tan3
sa3kan4ndi4ndu3ba'1a3i3ni2 an4tan3yo'4o1ndi4xi1ka(3) on4ja'13ni(4) un4si'3i4 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Ka14ni3ni2 un4hijondi4bi3tin3ndi4ji'4in4misandu1xin1si'3i(4) un4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,ka4chi2su1tu1ji'4in4ta1locokan4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ki3xa3a4su1tu1ta4xi3 ra2misa,xi1yo3misa en4ta4u3ni2ni1ndu1xin(1) an4tan3
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2ta1,ta1nde3e4kan4ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3,
"bi3tin3ndi4ndo1o(3) on4tan3ku'1un1 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,su14u3ta1ba'1a3ku4u4yo'4o1ndi4ja'13ni4ji'4in4nda'3a(4) on4si'3i(4) o4".
"Su14u3ña4ni4nda'3a2ku4u4si'3i(4) o4ndi4ña4ja'13ni4ji'4in4nda'3a(4) on4ban4".
"Ka14ni3ni2 un4ya3ni2,ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4na4tu2ta1ku'1un1ku4u(4) un4ndi4ku'1un1ta'3an2ba3yu'1u1ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Ya1ka'4an2 e4sa3kan4tan3ja143ndu13ndi3chi2ta1kwe'4e1ña1a4,
ni1tu'3un3 ra2bi1tu4ye'14e4ni1ku'3ni2 ra1 run4ndi4so3ja1ta4 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,
ja143ka4chi2,ni1xo14kwi1in1ta1,ta1nde3e4kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4:
"ndo3ko3o(4) on4tun4ña1a4ndi4,ya1kan3,na4chu3a3sa3tu(3) un4bi1tu4tu3kwa'1an1tu3 run4ji'4in(4) un4ja1ni1ka'1an(1) e1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ta1ndo1o3ku4u(4) un4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143ya3ni2,ya3ni2ndi4ku'1un1 run4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4i4yo2mi4i4ku3ma1ni4 run4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1,kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4,kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1 na1,
i3in3ma'14ñu3yo3so4ndi4chi2i3in3tun4tu1ñu'4u2ndi4ba'1a3ka4a4xa'1a4tun4tu1ñu'4u2ña1a4ndi4
na'4a1nda4ti'1bi4ndi3i4ndi4,ndi3i4 lu3ka4a4ndi4,ya1kan3,i3kan4ja143
ni1xa1a1ta1locoña1a4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1,ya3ni2,ya3ni2ndi4ku'14un1 o4ndi4yo'4o4ndo1o(3) e4ndi4
ña1yo'4o4ndi4i4yo(2) a2,nda4ka1ya1 na1yu4bi24nda4tu'4un4na3ni2 na1ya1kan4ndi4ndi3i4 ni42ka4a4yo'4o4ya1kan4ndi4
ya1kan3,in3ka4ni24ndi4na1ki3xa2a2ku4u4 na2nda3tu'4un4tu4ni1 na1sa3kan4ndi4ku3ni3so'1o(3) e4nda4a(2) e2ba42i4yo2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ka'4an2 e4sa3kan4ni1nda3a3ta1,ta1i4yo2ka4xi3i3ni2kan4kwa'1an1 ra1,
tan3ta1locokan4ndi4sa14ti1in3 ra2yo'3o4to3ko4bi1tu4tan3sa14nda3a3 ra2 run4ndi4nda143ka4xan4,ka4xan4ni1ku3u3kwa1nda3a3 run4ni1nu3.
I3kan4chi13ndu'4u4 ra2 run4ni1nu3i3kan4ja143ni1jo3nde3e3 na2nde4e4 na2,nde4e4 na2,nde4e4 na2.
Ja143ja143ni1ku3ñu3u42tan3i3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2ta1nda3ti'3bi4.
Nda13ti'3bi4ndi'3i3 ra2kan4i3kan4in3ka4ni24ni1ki3xa2a2,ya1kan3,mesa,ni1ki3xa2a2ta1ni1ki3xa2a2ji'4in4mesa.
In3ka4ni24ndi4kun2ta1ni1ki3xa2a2ji'4in4ta3yu2tu3ku3chi2.
In3ka4ni24ja143ni1ki3xa2a2 na1ndi4,ni1jwe3ta3vinuba3ni1jwe3ta3copaba3ni1jwe3ta(3) e2ku3xi3 na2ndi4na3ni2 lu3ka4a4
nu14u3mesakan4ja143ta4xi3na3ni2 na1,ja143ni1ku3ñu3u42tan3ja143
ni1ki3xa3a4 na2nda4tu'4un4na3ni2 na1ndi4,su14u3na1yu4bi24ka1a3ku4u4na1kan4ndi4na1na'14a1ba3ku4u4na1ni1ki3xa2a2,
ta4xi3juntaña1a4,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 na1nde4e4 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,
"ñu3u2kan4ndi4,ñu3u2i3kan4ndi4na4ndo'4o1ji4ni2 ndo4sa3kan4ndi4,
ka4ndu'3u4i3in3ta1a3ndi4ni1chi1chi3kwa4an2ndi'3i3 ra2tan3
na4na1familia ra1ji4ni2 na1sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ya1ku4u4ya1i4xa3kwe'1e1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4xa'1a4is1to3 ra2i3kan4ñu'4u4u1bi1ndi3ku'3un3,na4ti4kan4ke3e3 ri4ndi4
ta1ndu3ba'1a3i3ni2ndi1ku1nda42ku4u4ta1kan4ka4chi2ya1na'14a1nde4e(4) a2"so'3o3.I3kan4ja143,
tan3ta1locoña1a4ndi4tu4u4nda'3a4 ra2ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,"Ba143ko4nde3e4ka1i3ni2 yu1ndi4ta1ku4ni2ta3ta4 ni42ya3ni2
I3kan4ja143,"Ko3nde3e4i3ni2 un4hombre",ka4chi2,ka4chi2ta1i4yo2ka4xi3i3ni2kan4so'3o3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1.
i3kan4ja143,ni1jo3nde3e3 na2nde4e4 na2i3kan4ja143nda13kwi3in3tu3ku3i3nga(2) e2ya1na'14a1ku4nu24ndi4
na4ndo'4o1ji4ni2 ndo4sa3kan4ndi4i3in3ñu3u2ndi4ko14o3ta1kwi42ndi4,ya1kan3,na1ndo'4o4ndi3sa3a4ki1bi4ku4u4na1kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ko14o3ta1kwi42ñu3u2 na1ndi4,xi'4i1 ni42na1kwa4chi3,xi'4i1 ni42na1xu13xa3,xi'4i1 ni42ki3ti4ja1na1 na1,mbu4rru2ku4u4 ri4,ko14o3ta1kwi42ñu3u2 na1ndi4
kwa4yu2ku4u4 ri4xi'4i1 ni42 ri4ko14o3ta1kwi42,ya1kan3,ko'3o3 na3
na4na1kan4ji4ni2 na1sa3kan4ndi4ka'3a4yu14kun3 na2i3kan4i4ndu'3u4yu1u4tan3
ka3ta3 na2ka'3a4yu14kun3kan4tan3su4ku1nda'1a3 na2yu1u4kan4ndi4i3kan4ndi4i1ta3ka'4nu3ko3ndo(3) a2kan4
lu14u3na1yu4bi24na3ñu'4u4ki1bi4ke3e3ta1kwi42kan4na4na4na1kan4ji4ni2 na1sa3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
i3kan4ja143ya1kan3,sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ja143tu3ku3ba3nda'4yu1ta1kwe'4e1ña1a4ndi4
"ya3ni2ya3ni2ndi4yu'1u1ndi4ta1ta3ta4ku4u4ba3yu'1u1ndi4ba143ko4nde3e4ka1i3ni2 yu1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ya1ka'4an2 e4sa3kan4ju13ndi3chi2 ra1tan3ke4e4si'14bi3ke4e4tia14xa2ndi4nda143ka'4nda4,ka'4nda4ni3ku4u4,
sa13ña4 ra2bi1tu4ndi4nda143ka4xan4,ka4xan4ti4ku4u4ba1xi3 run4ni1xi1ta1i'3nu(3) a2na'14a1kwa'1an(1) e1ndi4
ya1yu14bi4nda4ñu'4u4ka4chi(2) a2so'3o3,ya1ni1ta'1nu1nda'3a4ba3ya1ni1ta'1nu1xa'1a4ba3ndi4
kwa'1an1 lu(3) a2,sa3kan4ni1nu3u3ta1kwe'4e1ña1a4ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,panchi3ko4la2ba3
ya1kan4ba3nda13ka3ya2ta1kwe'4e1ña1a4ndi4so3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ndi4,"Ndo1o(3) on4tin3ndi4su14u3ta1ba'1a3ku4u4yo'4o1ndi4ta1ku4ni2ka'3ni4xu4mi4ku4u4yo'4o1"ka4chi2ta1kwe'4e1,ta1,ta1i4yo2ka4xi3i3ni2kan4ji'4in4ta1kwe'4e1kan4.
"ya3ni2ndo14o13 2ndi4ta1ku'1un1ku4u(4) 2ji'4in(4) un4ndi4nda1mi4i4ku3u2 un4i3kan4ku3u2 yu1an4ko14o3ji'3na3yo'4o1ku3u2,
tan3na4ji'3na3yu'1u1ku3u2ndi4in3ka4chi1ku3u2 e4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1,kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4,
i3kan4ni1xa1a1 na1i3nda14ñu3u2.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"¿Na4ko14o3ta1kwi42ku3ni3ma1ni4 ndo4yu'1u1ko'3o(3) 2ndi4
ya1kan3,i4chi1 ni42 yu1ta1kwi42",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.Tan3ta1ya3ni2 ra1ndi4nu14u3ñu3u2ba3ndo13ko3o4 ra2ta1kan4.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"¿Nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o4señorka4ndu'3u4ka1a3ku'4u2 ra1?"
"Ya1kan3,ko14o3ya1ndo'4o4 ra2ndi4ji14ni2 ndu1ya1ndo'4o4 ra2ndi4ja1kwi1ya1ka4ndu'3u4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,
nde3e4 ni42ndo'4o4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ji14ni2 ndu1nda4a(2) e2ku4u4ña1,kwe'1e1ndo'4o4 ra2,
ba14ja4nda4ni'1i4 ndu2ta1tan4ku3ta4tan4 ra2tan3ndu3ba'1a3i3ni2 ra1".
"Kwa'1an1 ndu1ji'4in4 ra2nda'3a4dotortan3sa3kan4ka4a4ba3",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Ya3ni2 yu1ndu3ku3ni2ba3ta1kan4kwe'1e1ya1ndo'4o4ta1ka1a3na4ta1ki3xa2a2ku4u4 ra2sa3kan4".
"I3kan4,ya1kan3,ta1nda'3a2ndi1ku1nda42ku4u4ta1ka1a3na4ya3ni2ki3xa2a2 ra1ndi4ji4ni2ba3ta1kan4ta1tan4ja4nda'3a2 ra1ta1ka1a3".
"Tan3na4ndi3xa3ku4u(4) un4ja4nda'3a2ya3ni2 un4 ra2tan3
yo'4o4ke3e3u1bi1na1ku'1un1ji'4in4 ndo4sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1ndi1ki'1in3 ndo4ya3ni2 un4tan3ki3xa2a2 ra1".
I3kan4ja143ni1ke3e3u1bi1na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1ji'4in4ta1locokan4ni1xa1a1 ra1ja143ka'4an2 na1ji'4in4ta1i4yo2ka4xi3i3ni2ndi4,"Señorndi4
ka4chi2ya3ni2 un4ndi4,ya1kan3,ku3chun(3) un4sa4nda'3a2 on4ta1ka4ndu'3u4ku'4u2kan4ndi4
na4tu2yo'4o1xa1a(1) on4ndi4sa4nda'3a2 on4 ra2chi1",ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4ta1i4yo2ka4xi3i3ni2.
"tontoku4u4ta1ka1a3,ji14ni2 yu1nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o4ya1kan3,señorkan4ku'4u2 ra1,ta1locoku4u4ta1ka1a3a4chu3ka4ndi4xa3 ndo4kwen4tu2ka'4an2 ra1",
"su14u3kan4ndi4ta1kwe'4e1ku4u4 ra2".Ja143ka4chi2 ra1ndi4,"Ya3ni2,ya3ni2ka'14an1 on4sa3kan4,an4ji14ni2 un4sa1a3ka'4an2 na1ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1kan3,
sa1a3ni1ka'1an1 na1ji'4in(4) o4mi4i4ba1xi(3) o4kan4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
I3kan4ja143ku4ni2ku14ni2ta1nda'4bi2kan4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,"Na4ku'1un1ba(3) e4tan3ku3ni2 o4ndi4i3in3tu1ni4ni2ko3ndo3ba(3) e3".
"Su14u3yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ji4ni2 ni42ndi4nda'3a2bi4 ra2ndi4,tu1ni4ni2ko3ndo3ba(3) e3".
I3kan4ja143ni1xa1a1ta1ña1a4ja143ka4chi2 na1ndi4,i3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1mi4i4ka4ndu'3u4ta1ku'4u2ndi4
ka4chi2 ra1ndi4,"¿Nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o(4) on4?","Ko14o(3) a2ndo'4o4bi4 2ndi4,ya1kan3,
is1ta1an1ndi4i4yo2ba'1a3i3ni2 yu1o4ra2ka3na3ñu'1u3tan3ja143i1xa14a3ka3xin3ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ka3xin3ji'4in(4) 2tan3
kwa3a4ndi4ji14ni2 yu1sa1a3kwa'1an1ndu3bi4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143,an4ka3ndi4xa3 ndo4,"An4ka14ndi4xa3 ndo4ndi4ta1yo'4o4ndi4,ya1kan3,
xa'1a4is1to3 ra2i3kan4ñu'4u4u1bi1ndi3ku'3un3tan3ti4kan4ku4u4ti4xi'4i4ni1i4 ra2tan3na4i3kan4ka3ta3 ndo4tan3
ke3e3ti4kan4tan3ku3u2 ri4ndi4ta1ndu3ba'1a3i3ni2ndi1ku1nda42ku4u4 ra2",ka4chi2,ka4chi2ta'3an2ta1nde3e4kan4so'3o3.
Ja143ndi4ja'13nda2 ra1chi3ñu3ja143ndu13ku4 na2picuja143ja13ta3 na2,ja143ta13ba4 na2ti4ña1a4ndi4
ti4kan4ba3xi'4i4ni1i4 ra2ndi4,yo'4o4,yo'4o4ndo3o3ndi3ku'3un3ndi4nda143mi3i4ti4kwa'4a1ku1chi3ti4ku4u4 ri4.
Ta13ba4 na2ndi3ku'3un3kan4tan3ni1nda3ta4 na2 ri4ndi4nda1kwa'1an1ni1i4ñu'3u4nde4e4 ri4.
I3kan4,tu3ku3ki1bi4ndi4ta1ja1i4yo2ba'1a3i3ni2ku4u4ta1ña1a4,ndu13ba'1a3i3ni2 ra1ndi1ku1nda42ba3.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4ta1,ta1ta1i4yo2ka4xi3i3ni2kan4ndi4:
"ko14o3ji4ni2 o4sa1a3ko3o3,ko3ndo3ya'1bi(3) un4ya1ni1nda3sa3ba'1a(3) on4i3ni2ya3ni2 yu1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3,ka4chi2na1be'3e3ta1ku'4u2kan4so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2ta1loco,nda13kwi3in3tu3ku3ba3ta1locoka4chi2 ra1ndi4,"Ya3ni2,ya3ni2an4ba'14a4na4u1ni1mulaxu'14un4ki'3in(3) o4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143,"Tan3ndi4ko14o3ya1kan3,ko14o3ti4kwi3so3xu'14un4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) o4".
"Ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4mi3i4 ndu2ku4u4 na2ta3ba4ki3ti4ku'1un1kwi3so3xu'14un4".
"Tan3na4ku'1un1 ndu1nda3ndi3ko4 ndu2sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ku'1un(1) a1ji'4in4 ndu2".
I3kan4ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1tu3ku3 na2,kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4,kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4,ni1ku3xi4ka3kwa'1an1 na1.
Ja143ni1xa1a1 na1ya3tin3nu14u3ñu3u2ña1a4.
A1su3 a2i13xa3 ra2mi4i4ni1ki3xi3 na2kan4i13xa3tu3kwa3 ra2ndi4
"ya3ni2ndo1o(3) on4na4ku'1un1 yu1ku'1un1ndu3ku4 2ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) e4ndi4i4chi1 ni42 yu1ta1kwi42",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ja143ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1ni1xa1a1 ra1ya3tin3ma14ñu2ña1a4.
Ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ña4ta4u3ni2ndi4,"Señora,
an4ko14o3ta1kwi42ku3ni3ma1ni(4) un4yu'1u1ko'3o(3) 2ndi4i4chi1 ni42 yu1ta1kwi42".
"ya1kan3,xi4ka3 ni42ni1ki3xi(3) 2tan3ya1kan3,ko14o3ta1kwi42ko'3o(3) 2",ka4chi2 ra1.
i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4señorakan4ndi4,ña4ta4u3ni2kan4ndi4,"Hijoko14o3ta1kwi42ndi4ndu'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,
xi'4i1 ni42na1kwa4chi3xi'4i1 ni42ki3ti4ja1na1 ndu1ndi4ta1kwi42ko14o3ko'3o3 ndu3".
Ka4chi2ña4ta4u3ni2kan4so'3o3.
Ja143ka4chi2,nda13kwi3in3ta1locoka4chi2 ra1ndi4,"Ya3ni2 yu1ndi4ji4ni2ta1kan4mi4i4ba42ka3ta3 na2tan3ke3e3ta1kwi42,
ko'3o3 ndo4ndi4ji4ni2ta1kan4mi4i4ta3ba4 ra2ta1kwi42",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Nda4a(2) e2ba42ndi4,"Ña1a4ku3nda3tu(3) un4muchachona4ku'1un1 yu1sa3kan4ndi4ki3xa2a(2) e2in3ka4ni24sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
nda3tu'4un(4) un4ji'4in(4) 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.Ni4ni2tu(3) an4kan4ndi4be'3e3chi4ñu3ba3ja'1an(1) en4ña1a4ja'1an1nda13kwa'1a(3) en4cuentandi4i3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2ta1ji4ni2mi4i4ba42ke3e3ta1kwi42.
I3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2ba(3) en4ta4u3ni2kan4ndi4kun2ba3na1comisiónja1ta(4) en4ni1ki3xa2a2 na1.
"¿Nda4a2ba3i4yo2ta1ji4ni2ta3ba4ta1kwi42",I3kan4ja143,
ni1ti3in3ba3 na2ta1kwe'4e1tan3kwa'1an1 ra1ji'4in4 na2be'3e3chi4ñu3.Ja143ni1xa1a1 ra1ña1a4ja143nda4ka1tu'4un4ta1chi4ñu3 ra2ndi4:
"¿nda4a2ba42ji4ni2ya3ni2 un4ta3ba4 ra2ta1kwi42?"
"na4ndo'4o1ji4ni2 ndo4sa3kan4ndi4ka'3a4yu14kun3 ndo4ya1kan3,i4ndu'3u4i3nda14yu1u4tan3
i3kan4ka3ta3 na2tan3ke3e3ta1kwi42ndi4,i3in3ta'4bi4ñu3u2ja4nda3ñu'4u(4) a2o4ra2ja143ke3e3 ra4".
"Na4ni14ku3ni2 na1ka3ndi4xa3 na2ke3e3 na2ndi4i1ta3ka'4nu3nda3ndo3o(3) a2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
I3kan4ja143,ni1ke3e3 na2nda4chi4ñu3kan4nda4ka3 na2 ra1kwa'1an1 ra1,ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"¿Señoran4yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ji4ni2mi4i4ba42ke3e3ta1kwi42ndi4
ko14o3ta1kwi42ko'3o3 ndu2ya1kan4ndi4,tan3ka4chi2ya3ni2 un4ndi4yo'4o1ku4u4ta1ji4ni2,
mi4i4ba42ke3e3ta1kwi42
"ta1locoku4u4ta1ka1a3,a4chu3ka3ndi4xa3 ndo4 ra2su14u3ta1i4yo2ka4xi3i3ni2ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta1kwe'4e1ku4u4 ra2,
ka4ndi4xa3 ndo4tu'1un3ka'4an2 ra1,ji14ni2 yu1,ji14ni2 yu1nda4a2ta'4bi4ba42ke3e3ta1kwi42".
Ja143ka4chi2tu3kwa3 ra2ndi4,"¿Ya3ni2an4ji14ni2tu(3) un4sa1a3ka4chi2tu3 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,ka'3a4yu14kun3i3kan4i4ndu'3u4i3nda14yu1u4tan3
i3kan4ka3ta3 na2tan3i3kan4ke3e3ta1kwi42".
"I3kan4ndi4i1ta3ka'4nu3nda3ndo3o(3) a2kan4i3in3ta'4bi4ñu3u2nda3ñu'4u4ki1bi4ke3e3ta1kwi42kan4".
"¿An4ji14ni2tu(3) un4ndi4sa3kan4ka4chi2tu3 na2mi4i4ni1ki3xi(3) o4kan4?",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ndi4,"Na4ku'1un1ba(3) e4tan3ndi4i3in3tu1ni4ni2ko3ndo3ba(3) e2,su14u3yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ji4ni2na4
i3kan4ko3ndo(3) a2ka3na3ta1kwi42bi4ndi4i3in3tu1ni4ni2ko3ndo3ba(3) e3".
Ya1kan4ndi4su14ku3ni3ta1chi4ñu3na1ñu3u2ndi4na4ku'1un1 na1sa3kan4ndi4chi3nde3e4 na2ka3ta3 na2sa3kan4ndi4ka3na3ta1kwi42ko'3o3 na3.
Ba'1a3 lu3ku4ni2,ja143nda13ta3ka2na1ñu3u2kwa'1an1 na1ja143ja4ta3 na2,ja4ta3 na2sa3kan4ku4u4,
ja143ba4a24,ba4a24bi3xa4chi2,ja143ka4chi2ta'3an2ta1,ta1i4yo2ka4xi3i3ni2kan4ndi4:
"ti'3bi(4) un4na1mayóna4ku'1un1 na1su4ku3ni3 na2i3in3ta'4bi4ñu3u2ndi4
o4ra2ka'3ndi2nu14u3ta4ka1a3ke3e3 ra4ndi4,ya1kan3,i3in3ta'4bi4ñu3u2ja4nda3ñu'4u4 ra4tan3
ya1yo'4o4ndi4i1ta3nda3ndo3o(3) a2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.I3kan4ja143,
ni1ndi'3i3tan3i3kan4,ko14o3 na2ka3ndi4xa3ndi4nda4a2tu3ta1kwi42ke3e3tu3,ñu'3u4i4chi1ba42ka4chi2,ka4chi2ta'3an2 na1so'3o3.
I3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4ja13ta3 na2ja13ta3 na2,sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1tu1u3ba3nu14u3ta1kwi42ba1xi3 ra4ndi4
su14u3ta1kwi42lu3u3ku4u4ta4kan4ndi4ta1kwi42kwa'1a4ku4u4 ra4ba1xi3ndi4,o4ra2ni1ka3ndi3ko1o3 ra4ni1nu3ndi4i1ta3ka'4nu3nda13ndo3o(3) a2kan4ndi4
ni1ta3ni3be'3e3,ki3ti4,ta13ni3,lu14u3ki3ti4ni1xi'1i1ya1sa3kan4ni14ku3ni2 na1ka3ndi4xa3 na2ta3ba4 na2ki3ti4.
I1ta3ka'4nu3nda13ndo3o(3) a2kan4i3kan4ja143,ni1ndi'3i3tan3ja143ka4chi2,ya1kan3,ka4chi2ta1chi4ñu3so'3o3ji'4in4 na2ndi4:
"¿ko14o3ji4ni2 o4sa1a3ko3ndo3ya'1bi3 ndo4?".
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2tu3kwa3ta1locokan4,ka4chi2 ra1ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4u'1un1mulaxu'14un4",ku4ni2 ndu1.
I3kan4ba42ndi4ni1tu1u3ki3ti4tan3ndi13kwi3so3 ri4xa1tun4xu'14un4tan3ba1xi3ndi3xi3ba3 na2kwe'4e1ñu3u2 na1ndi4,ya'4a13 ni42ni1ku3bi4ka3 ra2i1nda43.
CarlosRómuloSantiago.U1ni1xi3ko3u1bi1.Yoloxóchitl.
I3nda14ña4ta4u3ni2tan3ni1xa1a1i3nda14ta1xa3ku4nu14u(3) an4sa14kwa'3nu(3) an4 ra2tan3
contiem4pu2ki1bi4ni1ko3nde3e4 ra2ja143ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4na4ndu3ku4 ra2ña'3a4ku3ndu'4u4ji'4in4 ra2.
Tan3tan42ku4u4ña4ta4u3ni2kan4ndi4su14u3ña4ta4u3ni2yu14bi4ka1a3ban4ndi4ña4ñu'1u3ban4.
I3kan4ja143ba1xi3kwa4a24tan3kwa'1an1 ra1kwa'1an1ku1chi3 ra2yu'3u4yu3bi2mi4i4nde4e4 na3.
Ba1xa1a1 ra1ndi4ku14ni2 ra1ku3chi3 ra2mi4i4chi4chi3kwa'1a4na1yu4bi24ndi4mi4i4ko14o3na1chi4chi3i3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1ndu4ku4 ra2ku3chi3 ra2.
I3kan4chi4chi3 ra2tan3tu3ku3ki1bi4xa1a1 ra1ndi4ja1na'4a1ni1chi3chi3tu3ku3 na2mi4i4ja'4an1 ra1chi4chi3 ra2kan4.
Ba143ju4ta'3an2i3ni2 ra1ndi4ku14ni2 ra1ku3chi3 ra2mi4i4chi4chi3na1yu4bi24.
ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1nda1i3nga2xia4an4tan3kwa'1an1 ra1kwa'1an1ku1chi3 ra3.
Sa3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4 ra2sa3kan4,sa3kan4ku4u4 ra2tan3ni1ki3xa2a2ba3u1ni1paloma.
I3kan4ja143i4ndu'3u4ka4xi3yo3 ra2tan3ju13na14ni3 ra2.
Ni1ki3xa2a2palomai3kan4tan3ni1ko1yo3 ri4jo13nde3e3 ri4nu14u3yu14ti3tan3
i3kan4ta13ba4ba3 ri4tio1to1 ri4tan3
i3kan4ni1ke3e3na1si'4i2kwa'1an1 na1ndi4,la3tun4 lu3na1si'4i2ndi4,ko14o3na1si'4i2la3tun4sa3kan4yu14bi4ta'4bi4ka1a3.
I3kan4ja143,sa3kan4,sa3kan4ku4u4tan3,bi3tin3sa3kan4ndi4,nda13xa2a2 ra1ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4ña4ta4u3ni2,si'3i4 ra2ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ña4kan4ban4sa14kwa'3nu3ña'3a4:
"si'3i4 2ndi4bi3tin3ndi4ndu3ku(4) un4i3in3xi3yo2tan3i3in3xi1kun1ku'1un1ji'4in(4) 2".
"¿A4chu3a3sa(3) on4ya1hijo?".
"Ji14ni2yo'4o1ndi4i4yo2chi3ñu3a3sa(3) e2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143ni1ndu3ku(4) an4ta4u3ni2i3in3xi3yo2tan3ndu13ku(4) an4i3in3xi1kun1.
I3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1i4ndu'3u4ka4xi3yo3 ra2tan3sa3kan4ni3ku4u4tan3ni1ki3xa2a2ba3na1kan4,su3u3u1ni1ku4u4ba3na1kan4ni1ki3xa2a2 na1.
Ni1ki3xa2a2 na1tan3ja143,
ni1ko1yo3 na2jo13nde3e3 na2nu14u3yu14ti3kan4su3ta13ba4 na2tio1to1 na1tan3ni1ta3nde3e3 na(2) e2kan4,
i3kan4ja143,sa3kan4ku4u4ja143chi4chi3 na3.
I3kan4ja143ya1kan3,
jo13nde3e3 na2chi13chi3 na2,ndi'13i3chi13chi3 na2tin3ja143
ja143ña4la4tun3kan4ni1ke3ta3 ra2tan3ta13se'4e2ba3 ra2tio1to(1) an4la4tun3i3kan4,
tan3na1u1bi1ta'4an2kan4ndu13ndi3xi3ba3na1kan4tio1to1 na1tan3nda13chi4 na2kwa'1an1 na1.
I3kan4ja143bi3tin3ndi4ku14ndi3xi3ka1 on4tio1to(1) on4ndi4
tio1to1yu'1u1ku3ndi3xi(3) un4,yo'4o4ba1xi3ya1ku3ndi3xi(3) un4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143ndu13ndi3xi3ba(3) en4tio1to(1) an4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2ña4ku1nu'1u(4) an4ji'4in4 ra2.
Nda13xa2a2 ra1be'3e3 ra2tan3ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4si'3i4 ra2ndi4,ta3xi3kwa'4a(4) on4tio1to1yo'4o4tan3sa3kan4ba42ndi4,ya1kan3,
i3kan4,na4contiempondi4,ya1kan3,
tio1to1ndi4ya1ku3ndi3xi(3) an4,ku14ndi3xi3ka1 en4tio1to(1) an4ndi4ya1ta3xi3kwa'4a(4) on4ko3ndo(3) a2yo'4o4,ko1to1sa14ñu'4u4ndio4si2ku3ni2 un4
ta3ba(4) on4tio1to1yo'4o4na4ko14o(3) 2i4yo2ndi4,ya1kan3,
ko1to1nda14kwa'1a(3) on4 a2nda'3a(4) en4na4ka'4an2 en4ji'4in(4) un4ta3xi(3) un4 a2nda'3a(4) en4".
Sa3kan4ku4u4ndi4ja1i3nda14ba3se'1e(3) an4i4yo2ji'4in4 ra2tan3i3kan4ja143ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1i3nga2ñu3u2ka3ja3chiu4un4 ra2tan3
i3kan4ka4chi2i3in3ña4ko4ndo3xa1nu(3) an4ta4u3ni2kan4,"Mamándi4bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,
ta3xi(3) un4tio1to1 yu1na4ko3to(3) 2sa1a3ka4a(4) e2,na4ku3ndi3xi(3) a2,su14u3ku'3ba2ka1bi4 2ba42ndi4
ja1na'3a4 ni42i4yo2 yu1ji'4in4 ndo4tan3su14u3ku'3ba2ka1bi4,ku'3ba2ka1bi4yu'1u1ba42ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 na3".
I3kan4ku4ni2ku14ni2 an4ta4u3ni2kan4ni1ta3ba(4) en4tio1to1kan4ta13xi3ba(3) en4nda'3a4ña4ko4ndo3xa1nu(3) an4tan3ndu13ndi3xi(3) an4 e2,
i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ndi4:
"sa4kwa'1a(3) on4nda14yu3na4nda3chi4 2ku3ndu'4u(4) 2nu14u3i3tun4ka1a3,
"na4ku3ni2 yu1na4kwi3i3ka1nda3chi4 2",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
"hijandi4kwi14i3ndi4,ya1kan3,o4ra2ki3xa2a2se'1e3 2ndi4ka3si3kwe'3e2 ni42 ra1ji'4in(4) 2",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
I3kan4ku4ni2ku3ni2,"Su14u3ña4ku'1un1na'3a4nu4chi'4i2ti4ba3ku'1un1 i1".
I3kan4ni1ke3ta(3) en4ja'1an(1) en4ju13ndu'4u(4) an4nu14u3i3tun4.
I4ndu'3u(4) an4i4ndu'3u(4) an4ji4to(3) an4yo'4o4ji4to(3) an4kan4tan3a1su3i3in3nde3e4tan3nda13chi4ba3palomatan3,palomatan3kwa'1an1ba3 ri4.

Ni4ni2tu3palomakwa'1an1ba3paloma.
I3kan4ni1kwa3a4ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"¿nda4a2ba42kwa'1an1,ña4si'4i2 yu1?".
"hijondi4ko14o(3) a2ba'1a3ni4ku3u3ndi4,ya1kan3,
ka4chi2 an4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,na4ta3ba4 2tio1to1sa3kan4ndi4,tan3ku3ndi3xi(3) an4 e2ndi4su14u3ku'3ba2ka1bi(4) an4ba42ndi4,ya1kan3,ja1na'3a4 ni42i4yo2 an4ji'4in(4) o4",chi2.
Ki1bi4ndu13ndi3xi(3) an4 e2kan4tan3ja143ka4chi2 an4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,
na4kwa'1a3 2nda14yu3nda3chi(4) an4ku3ndu'4u(4) an4nu14u3i3tun4ya3tin3ka1a3ti4,ja143ka4chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ku14ni2 yu1ku'1un(1) un4ndi4
ka3si3kwe'3e2 ni42se'1e3 2o4ra2ki3xa2a2 ra1ka4chi2 yu1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4
tan3ni14ka3ndi4xa(3) en4nda13chi(4) an4ni1ke3ta(3) en4ju13ndu'4u(4) an4ka1a3tan3
nda3ndi3ko(4) on4ndi4,ya1kan3,ka3si3kwe'3e2se'1e3 2o4ra2ki3xa2a2 ra1ka4chi2 yu1ni1ka3chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) an4tan3ni14ji3ni3so'1o(3) an4ndi4,ni1nda3chi(4) an4tan3kwa'1an1ba(3) en4.
Ya1kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Kwa1chi3 ni42 un4ji'4in(4) 2mamákwa1chi3 ni42 un4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4ña4kan4ndi4

yu3ku4ñu3u2 an4ndi4setevidriona3ni4yu3ku4ñu3u2 an4",ka4chi2 an4ji'4in(4) 2tan3bi3tin3ndi4
