kwa'1an1 yu1ndi4ta1kwa'1an1xa1a1ku4u(4) 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ña1a4.
I3kan4xa4ku(3) an4ta4u3ni2ni1ndo1o(3) an4i4ndu'3u(4) an4tan3ja143ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
Kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4ni1kwa3a4 ra2,
i3kan4ni1ki1xin1 ra1kan4ni1ki4tu3tan3ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
Kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1,ya1kan3,ndi4chi2i3nda1(4) en4ña4ta4u3ni2ndi4ko3 ni42 an4,
ni1xa1a1 ra1,ni14xa1a1 ra1ta'4bi4nu14u(3) an4ndi4i3chi4ja1ta(4) en4ni1xa1a1 ra1tan3ja143
ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Xi4ka3nde'14e(4) 2be'3e(3) on4ña4ta4u3ni2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143nda13kwi3in(3) an4ka4chi2 an4ndi4,"Hijo,¿nda4a2,nda4a2ba42xi4ka(3) on4?",ka4chi2 an4.
"Ba'1a3ndi4ni14ki3xi(3) un4i3chi4ta'4bi4nu14u(3) 2ndi4i3chi4ja1ta4 2ni1ki3xi(3) un4an4ko14o3ndi4ka3xi4 2yo'4o1",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2,ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"¿nda4a2ba42xi4ka3yo'4o1hijo?",ka4chi2 an4.
"Ya1kan3,ndi4yo'4o4ndi4ko14o3na1yu14bi4ta'4bi4kan4xi4ka3yo'4o4ndi4
nda1i3in3na1yu14bi4ta'4bi4kan4ko14o3 na2ki4xi3yo'4o4tan3yo'4o1ndi4nda4a2ba42ni1ki3xa2a(2) on4ba1xi(3) un4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
"Ya1kan3,señorandi4ko14o(3) a2ba'1a3ni4ndo'3o(3) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,ña4si'4i2 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,
ña4kan4kwa'1an(1) e1ja1ta4tan3,ndo13ko3o(4) an4yu'1u1tan3kwa'1an(1) en4bi3tin3ndi4ka4chi2 an4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,yu3ku4ya1ko4ndo3ñu3u2 an4ndi4
ya1kan3,nu14u3ñu3u2Españandi4sietevidriona3ni4 a2ka4chi2 an4ji'4in(4) 2tan3i3kan4
nda1kan4kwa'1an1 yu1xa1a1 yu1ndi4,ta1kwa'1an1ku4u(4) 2ndi4ta1xa1a1ku4u(4) 2mi4i4ba42yu3ku4nu14u3ñu3u2 an4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ña4ta4u3ni2
I3kan4ni1ki'3in(3) an4ta4u3ni2yu3bi4tan3ti13su4ku24 an4 ra2tan3ja13ndi3chi2 an4 ra2ja14xi1be'4e4.
In3ka4ni24tan3ja143ni1ki3xa2a2ba3ta1chi4ndi4ta1ku4nu24ta1nu14u3se'1e(3) an4ku4u4ta1kan4.
I3kan4ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1kan3,ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,ya1kan3:
"mamánda4a(2) e2ba42i4yo2ya1kan4ndi4xa'4an2yu14bi4 ni42ndi4ya3tin3 ni42i4ndu'3u4ya1yu14bi4ndi4ya1ba'1a3ka3xi(4) o4ba42",ka4chi2,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4si'3i4 ra2.
Ja143ka4chi2ña4ta4u3ni2so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Hijondi4ka'14an1 on4sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
kwi14i3ndi4,ya1kan3,na3ni2na4ko14o3yu'1u1sa3kan4ba42ndi4a3sa3 ndo4ya1ku4ni2 ndo4a3sa3 ndo4tan3na3ni2yu'1u1i4yo(2) e2ndi4kwi14i3",ka4chi2 an4.
"Ya1ku4u4ya1ndo'4o4ta1yo'4o4ndi4,ya1kan3,ña4si'4i2 ra1kwa'1an(1) en4tan3
ya1kan3,ku4ni2 ra1ndi4ya1ma1ni4a3sa3 na2ji'4in4 ra2,
tan3ya1kan4ndi4kwa'1an1 ra1ja1ta(4) en4tan3ko14o3na1ko4ndo3amigukwi4i4ni'1i4 ra2",ka4chi2 an4.
Ka4chi2ña4ta4u3ni2so'3o3nda4tu'4un(4) an4ji'4in4se'1e(3) an4,"¿an4ba143xa'4an1yo'4o1ta'4bi4kan4?",ka4chi2 an4.
"Yu'1u1ndi4ba143xa'4an(1) e1i3kan4ndi4ya3tin3ka1a3ba3xi4ka3yu'1u1",ka4chi2 ra1tan3,ta1kan4ndi4,
su14u3nda4a(2) e2ku4u4ndi4ta1chi4ba42kan4chi2.
I3kan4ja143sa3kan4ku4u4,i3kan4nu4mi24xi13xi3ta1kan4ndi13ki'3in3ta1kan4kwa'1an1ba3ta1kan4.
"Na4ki3xa2a2ta1ya3ni2 yu1ta1ma'14ñu3sa3kan4ku3ni2 o4ka4chi2nda4a2kwa4ñu3ndi4ja1ya3tin3kan4ja'4an1ndi3ko4ta1kan4".
I3kan4ja143,sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1ki3xa2a2tu3ku3ta1,ta1ma'14ñu3tu3ku3.
Ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Mamánda4a(2) e2ba42i4yo2ndi4xa'4an2yu14bi4 ni42ndi4,ya3tin3 ni42i4ndu'3u4 a2yu14bi4".
"hijondi4,ya1kan3,kwi14i3ka3xi4 ndo4ta1nda'4bi2ndi4
ta1i4yo2mi4i4kwa'1an1ku4u4 ra2ndi4ña4si'4i2 ra1ni1xi3nu(3) an4nu14u3 ra2tan3
ya14tin3ku4u4ñu3u2ña4si'4i2 ra1,tan3ta1kwa'1an1xa1a1ku4u4 ra2ndi4
ji14ni2 ra1na4tu2ndi4,ta1kwa'1an1xa1a1ku4u4 ra2,an4ji14ni2ndo'4o1nda4a2ta'4bi4ba42ndo4o13,ya1kan3,
nu14u3ñu3u2Españai3kan4ndi4chi2i3in3yu3ku4na3ni4 a2sietevidrio"ka4chi2 an4.
"mamándi4ji14ni2 yu1ndi4na4kwa4ñu3ndi4ya3ni2 yu1ta1la4tun3,nda4a2xa'4an1ta1kan4i3kan4",ka4chi2
"Na4ku3nda3tu3 ra2na4ki3xa2a2ya3ni2 yu1ta1la4tun3".
I3kan4ja143,sa3kan4ku4u4i4ndu'3u4 ra2sa3kan4,ni1xi3xi3ta1ma'14ñu3kan4tan3kwa'1an1ba3ta1kan4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
I3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4ni1ku3na'3a4sa3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2ta1ta1chi4la4tun3.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4si'3i4 ra2ndi4,"Mamá,¿nda4a(2) e2ba42i4yo2ndi4xa'4an2bi1xi1 ni42ndi4xa'4an2yu14bi4 ni42?".
"Ya3tin3 ni42i4ndu'3u4 a2yu14bi4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"hijondi4,ya1kan3,kwi14i3ndi4,a3sa3 ndo4ja13ni1ku3ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,
ta1i4yo2mi4i4kwa'1an1ku4u4 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ña4si'4i2 ra1ndo13ko3o(4) an4 ra2tan3
ya14tin3ku4u4ñu3u2 an4ndi4,ya1kan3,yu3ku4nu14u3ñu3u2Españai3kan4ku4u4ñu3u2 an4ndi4SieteVidriona3ni4 a2",ka4chi2 an4.
Ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2tan3ya1kan4ndi4,"I3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1xa1a1 ra1,¿an4ba143xa'4an1yo'4o1i3kan4?",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Mamándi4a1su3nda1kan4ja'4an1ndi3ko4ba3yu'1u1ndi4,ya1kan3,
i3ku3ñu2u2ja'1an1 yu1ndi4u1bi1ta'4an2ji1ni4ku4u4na1si'4i2,ya1kan3,xa'4an1 na1pozoja'4an1ki'1in3 na2ta1kwi42tan3
bi3tin3ndi4ja1nda13ndo3o3u1ni1ku4u4 na2,ya1kan3,ji13ni2 yu1u1ni1 na1yu'3u4pozokan4i3ku3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4si'3i4 ra2.
"Tan3an4kwi14i3a3sa(3) on4 a2ma1ni4ji'4in4ta1nda'4bi2ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1kan3,ta1kwa'1an1xa1a1ku4u4 ra2i3kan4".
Ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4si'3i4 ra2,"Kwa'4an2ka'1an(1) on4ji'4in4 ra2na4ki3xi3 ra2sa3kan4ndi4,na4tu2ko3nde3e4i3ni2 ra1ndi4ku'1un1 ra1ji'4in(4) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,
i3kan4kwa'1an1 yu1nda3ndi3ko4 2ku'1un1 yu1bi3tin3ba3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.Nu4mi24xi13xi3 ra2tan3i3kan4ja143ndi'13i3xi13xi3 ra3,
"Ko1to1ka14xi(4) un4 ra2na4ke3ta3 ra2ndi4,ya1kan3,ta1a3sa(3) on4ya1ma1ni4ji'4in4ku4u4 ra2",ka4chi2 an4.
"Kwa'4an2ndi1ki'1in(3) un4 ra2na4ke3ta3 ra2sa3kan4ndi4ki3xa2a2 ra1sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1 ra1ji'4in(4) 2".
I3kan4ja143ni1ke3ta3ta1nda'4bi2kan4ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1ka4chi2,ta1ta1chi4la4tun3ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"¿nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o(4) on4?",
"nda4a(2) e2ba42tu1ni4ni2ba42ndo'4o(4) on4xi4ka(3) on4,yo'4o4ndi4ko14o3na1yu14bi4ta'4bi4kan4xi4ka3yo'4o4ndi4,
ni3na3mi3i4ba3ndu'1u1ku4u4na1xi4ka3yo'4o4",ka4chi2
"Ko14o(3) a2ba'1a3ndo'4o(4) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,ña4si'4i2 yu1ndi4ña4ya3tin3Españaban4tan3yu3ku4nu14u3ñu3u2 an4ndi4,ya1kan3,
SeteVidriona3ni4 a2ka4chi2 an4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4i3kan4kwa'1an1 yu1,
ndi4ku4ni2 yu1ndi4a3sa(3) on4 a2ma1ni4ji'4in(4) 2ku'1un1nda1ka(3) on4yu'1u1na4tu2i3kan4,ta'4bi4kan4xi4ka(3) on4".
"Ka14ni3ni2 un4ya1ma1ni4a3sa(3) 2ji'4in(4) un4ndi4kwi3i3chi3nde3e4ba42yo'4o1",ka4chi2 ra1.
I3kan4ja143,"Bi3tin3ndi4,ku3ndu'4u(4) un4ja1ta4 2tan3ku'1un(1) o4",ka4chi2 ra1.
Ja143ndu13ku3ndu'4u4ba3 ra2ja1ta4ta1ta1chi4la4tun3kan4tan3kwa'1an1 na1.
Kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4,
ni1ku3ñu3u42 na1i3chi4,ni1ki4tu3,nda1ki1bi4u1bi1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1 na1i3kan4,
ndo13ko3o4 ra2ta1kan4yu'3u4pozo,"Yo'4o4ku3ndu'4u(4) un4ndi4yo'4o4ki3xa2a2ba3 na3".
"pozoyo'4o4ba42xi'4i4ba3 na2ta1kwi42",ka4chi2ta1ta1chi4kan4ji'4in4 ra2,ni1ndo1o3 ra2tan3kwa'1an1ba3ta1kan4.
Ni1ya'1a3ta1kan4kwa'1an1ba3ta1kan4,sa3kan4ku4u4,
ni1ki3xa2a2ba3na1,na1si'4i2kan4ndi4u1ni1ja3ku4u4ba3na1kan4ni1ki3xa2a2 na1tan3
i3kan4ja143ndu13ku3ni2ba3ña4ju13ndu'4u4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4su3u3ku4u4ba3 ra2i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4,
na1si'4i2ku'1bi(1) an4ndi4,"Ka1a3ni1ki3xa2a2ta1ju13ndu'4u4ji'4in(4) 2".
I3kan4ni1ki'3in3 na2ta1kwi42tan3nda13xa2a2ba3 na2ja143ka4chi2ba3 na2ji'4in4yu3ba4 na2ndi4:
"Papándi4ni1ki3xa2a2ba3ta1ju13ndu'4u4ji'4in4,ji'4in4ta'4an4 ndu2ndi4yu'3u4pozokan4i4ndu'3u4 ra2ka4chi2.
Tan3su14u3ta1ba'1a3ku4u4be4lu2yu3ba4 na2kan4ndi4ta1na'14a1ku4u4ta1kan4.
I3kan4ja143,ja143ka4chi2be4lu2ji'4in4si1si'4i2 ra1ndi4,"Kwa'4an2ndi1ki'1in(3) un4 ra2na4ki3xa2a2 ra1sa3kan4ndi4
ta1a3ku4ni2ba3yu'1u1ka3ja3chiu4un4nu14u(3) 2ndi4,ta1ku4ni2ja3chiu4un4ku4u4 ra2ya1kan4ndi4ba1xi3 ra2ja1ta(4) on4".
ka4chi2yu3ba(4) en4so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4,i3kan4ni1ke3e3 na2ja'1an1ndi1ki'1in3 na2ta1kan4ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1.
Ja143ka4chi2be4lu2ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
i3kan4ja143,"¿an4ta1ba1xi3ku4u(4) un4ja1ta4se'1e3 2?","Ta1ba1xi3ku4u(4) 2ndi4
ña4ku4si1i4i3ni2 yu1ku4u(4) an4tan3sa3kan4tu3mi3i4ba(3) en4ni1ka1an(3) en4yu'1u1ju13ndu'4u(4) an4ji'4in(4) 2tan3ba1xi3 2ja1ta(4) en4ndi4
ba'1a3tan3nda3ndi3ko4 2ba'1a3tan3nda14ndi3ko4 2ndo1o3 2yo'4o4ba3",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"A1su3ta1a3ta1ka3ja3chiu4un4nu14u3yu'1u1ku4ni2 yu1ndi4,ta1a3sa3kan4ku4ni2ba3yu'1u1",ka4chi2be4lu2yu3ba(4) en4.
I3kan4ni1xa'1a3 na2xi13xi3 ra2,"Ku3xi(3) un4ndi4i3ta2an2ndi4
i3ta2an2ba42i4yo2chi3ñu3ja3chi4ñu(3) un4ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2,ka4chi2be4lu2so'3o3.
I3kan4ndi'13i3xi13xi3 ra2tin3i3kan4ja143,i3kan4,ni1ku3ñu3u42tan3ja143
xa14a3,ka4chi2 an4o4ra2ni1ki1xin1 na1yu3ba(4) en4tan3kwe4e2,kwe4e2ni1ja'1an(1) en4ka'4an2 en4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"ko1to1kwa14yu'3bi2 un4na4ni1ta'1nda1chi3ñu3,ja'13nda2yu3ba4 2chi3ñu3ta13xi3 ra2,ya1kan3,barretanda'3a(4) on4tan3ku'1un(1) un4,
tan3mi4i4ta13xi3,ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in(4) un4ka3ta(3) on4pozoka3na3ta1kwi42ko'3o3 ndu2i3kan4ndi4,ko1to1
kwa14yu'3bi2 un4ndi4ña1a4xa1a1 yu1chi3nde3e4 2yo'4o1",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2chi1.
Ya1kan4ndi4,o4ra2ni1ki4tu3tan3
ni1ta'1nda1chi3ñu3kwa'1an1 ra1,ndi4su14u3mi4i4ka4a4ka3na3ta1kwi42ndi4
ja1ta4ka3ba4i3kan4ja'1an1 na1ja'1an1nda1ka3 na2 ra1,"Ndi4yo'4o4ka3ta(3) on4ndi4yo'4o4ba42ka3na3ta1kwi42",ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143,i3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1ndo13ko3o4 na2 ra1ndi4ta1ndo1o3ka3ta3ku4u4 ra2ndi4,i3kan4ni1ndo1o3 ra2ja143xa4ku3 ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra2,ji14ni2 ra1sa1a3a3sa3 ra2ka3ta3 ra2ka3na3ta1kwi42ndi4ka3ba4,
xa'1a1bi4ba42kan4,su14u3nda4a(2) e2kan4ka3ba4ba43.
Mi4i4ba143ka4a4ka3na3ta1kwi42ba42,ndo13ko3o4 na2 ra1tan3ja143i4ndu'3u4 ra3.
Sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1xa1a1ba(3) en4kan4,ni1ki'3in(3) an4candelatan3,tan3
chi13ndu'4u(4) an4ñu'3u2nu14u3 run4tan3ja13ndi3chi2 an4 run4ja1ta4ka3ba4tan3
"yo'4o4ku3ndu'4u(4) un4tan3bi3tin3ndi4na4ku3ni2 un4kwa3ku(3) un4tan3ko1to1sa14to1o(3) on4ta1kwi42nda4a2ka1ndi4
mi3i4mi4i4xa'1a4yu1ma4ña1yu'1ba1nu14u3candelaka1a3mi4i4xi4xi(1) a1ka1a3sa4to1o(3) on4ta1kwi42nu14u(3) un4,
tan3ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4kwa3a4ndi4ja1i4yo2ta1kwi42",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143ndi13ki'3in(3) an4kwa'1an(1) en4,ja143in3ka4ni24kwa'1an(1) en4tan3ja143ndu13ku3ndu'4u4 ra2xa4ku3 ra2,xa4ku3 ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra2,
i3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1to1o3ba3ta1kwi42nu14u3 ra2xa'1a4mi4i4ndi4chi2yu'1ba1tu4un(1) a1nu14u3candelakan4tan3
in3ka4ni24tan3ni1nda'1ba1ba3tun4kan4tan3i3kan4ja143ni1ki3xa3a4ba3ta1kwi42ka13na3 ra4ndi4i1ta3ka'4nu3nda13ndo3o(3) a2kan4.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1nda13xa2a2 ra1ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4be4lu2si1so3 ra2ndi4:
"ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ndi4ja1i4yo2ta1kwi42".
I3kan4ni1ke3e3,ti'13bi4 ra2na1si'4i2si1si'4i2 ra1,"Kwa'4an2ko1to1 ndo4na4ndi3xa3ndi4ni1ka3na3ta1kwi42,ja1i4yo2ba'1a3",ka4chi2 ra1.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3na1kan4ni1xa1a1 na1kan4ndi4i1ta3ka'4nu3nda13ndo3o(3) a2kan4ndi4lu14u3ta1kwi42.
I3kan4ja143nda13xa2a2 na1ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4yu3ba4 na2ndi4,ya1kan3:
"ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ndi4ni1ka3na3ba3ta1kwi42,bi3tin3ndi4ja1i1ta3nda13ndo3o(3) a2",ka4chi2 na1.
"Ba'1a3na4tu2sa3kan4,i3ta2an2ndi4i4yo2i3nga2trabajoa3sa3 ra2i3ta2an2",ka4chi2be4lu2so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143,"Bi3tin3ndi4,ya1kan3,
toroti4,ti4ndi4ka2,ya1kan3,ranchu,ti4kan4mi3i4toroku4nu24ti4kan4ku'1un1ki'1in3 ra2,
ki3xa2a2 ri4ku3u2 ri4sa3kan4ba42ndi4,ya1kan3,ku3u2 ri4sa3kan4ndi4ku3xi(3) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,i4so3ko2 ni42 yu1ndi4ko14o3nda3yu4ku3xi(3) 2",ka4chi2be4lu2so'3o3,be4lu2si1so3 ra2so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143,ni1ku3ñu3u42xa4ku3 ra2ka4ndu'3u4 ra2ji14ni2 ra1sa1a3a3sa3 ra2,
ku'1un1ti1in3 ra2torokan4,i3kan4ja143,ni1ku3ñu3u42tan3ni1xa1a1ba(3) en4,
nu14u3 ra2ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Kwa14ku(3) un4ndi4,ya1kan3,mulakan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
yu3ba4 2ko3ndo3mulatan3,tan3ya1kan3,ta3yu2ndi4mi3i4ta3yu2ndi4,ya1kan3,
si'3i4 2nda3ndo3o3,ko3ndo3ta3yu2ka4chi2,tan3frenuyu'3u4mulakan4ndi4na1si'4i2ku'1ba3 2,ta'4an(4) 2ko3ndo3na1kan4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
"Tan3estribundi4mi3i4 2ko3ndo(3) a2kan4ko3ndo3estribukan4ndi4,ka14ni3ni2 un4nda3ba(3) on4ndi4
ña4chi3nde3e4ko3ndo(3) 2yo'4o1ka4chi2 an4,o4ra2ti3in(3) un4mulakan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ko1to1kwa14yu'3bi2 un4ku3ni2 un4 ri4ndi4
xi1ni4tan3ji1ni4 ri4su3ku(4) un4i3tun4,sa3kan4ni3is1tin4ta3yu2na4ni1nda3a(3) on4ndi4is1tin4tan3is1tin4ta3yu2chi3ndu'4u(4) un4i3tun4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.ji'4in4 ra3
I3kan4ja143,ni1ki4tu3ni1ke3e3 ra2ja'1an1ti1in3 ra2mulakan4.
Ndi4nda4sa3na3 lu3mulandi4ku4ni2,ndu4ndi3chi2 ri4tan3ku4ni2ka3xi4 ri4sa3kan4ku4u4,
ni1ja4ta1nda3a2 ra1 ri4i3tun4tan3ja143ni1ku'3ni2 ra1mulatan3
ja143ni1xi1ka3 ra2ji'4in4i3tun4ndi4xi1ka3 ra2i3tun4ji'4in4 ri4ta'13bi4 ra2ji1ni4mulandi4nda143kwa'4a1ti4ka4a4nu14u3 ri4kwa1nu3u3ni1i4.
Ni1ku3ma4su2 ri4sa3kan4ndi4chi13ndu'4u4 ra2ta3yu2,ni1nda3a3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1ndi4
nda143e4ta3ya3a3nu'1u3mulaku4ni2ka3xi4 ri4tan3kwa'1an1i3tun4ji1ni4 ri4tan3kwa'1an1i3tun4is1tin4ta3yu2mulatan3
sa3kan4ku4u4ni1ku3ma4su2 ri4,kwa'1an1 ra1kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1ranchu,
i3kan4tan3ja1ni1nda14yu3ba(3) en4 ra2ndi4,"Na4ja1ni1xa1a(1) on4ranchutan3
ko1to1ku14ndi3chi2 un4ñu'3u4ndi4,ya1kan3,nda'3a4i3tun4nda3a(3) on4,ndi3sa3a4ku1mi4tu1tu'4un4ranchu
nda3a(3) on4tan3,ya1kan3,ti3bi2 un4ndi3ki4tan3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,ki3xa2a2mi3i4ba3ti4kan4.
Ya1kan4ndi4ni1xa1a1 ra1tan3ta13nde3e3 ra2i1in4ma'14ñu3ranchutan3ni1nda3a3 ra2
ja'1an1 ra1ndi3sa3a4ku1mi4tu1tu'4un4ranchuju13ndi3chi2 ra1ti13bi2 ra1ndi3ki4tan3
i3kan4in3ka4ni24tan3ni1si1so1ba1xi3ji1ndi1ki4ndi4,nda1ti4ni1xi'1i1ya3ta4tan3ni1ki3xa2a2ndi4,chi4tu4nda1a1ranchu.
I3kan4ma'14ñu3ranchukan4ndi4chi2torondi4che4e13torondi4ka'4nu3 lu3toro,i3kan4ja143,ya1kan3,
ti4kan4ku4u4ti4ka3ku'1un3ki3xi3ji'4in4 ra3,i3kan4sa14kwe1kun1 ra1torokan4tan3ja143,tu1ndo'4o4kwa'1a4sa3kan4ndi4
ni1ta1nda3a2 ri4i3tun4sa3kan4ndi4chi3ka2 ra1po3sa42yu'3u4 ri4tan3i3kan4ja143
ni1nda3a3 ra2tan3i3kan4ku'13ni2 ra1yo'3o4is1tin4ta3yu2machutan3ba1xi3 ri4ji'4in4 ra2.
Ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1i3kan4ja143ni1ku'3ni2 ra1 ri4kan4,ja143ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1,ya1kan3,ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4be4lu2ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ndi4ni1ki3xa2a2toro.
I3kan4ja143,sa4a24 lu3be4lu2ndi4,"Ta1yo'4o4ndi4su14u3ideaña'1a3mi3i4ta1yo'4o4ba42ndi4
ya1kan3,ndo'4o1ku4u4 na2xa'4a13idea ra1ya1kan4ndi4nda1ndi'4i4ya1ko4ndo3trabajoka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4 ra2ndi4sa4ndo3o3 ra(3) e2",ka4chi2
Ka4chi2be4lu2ji'4in4na1si'4i2si1si'4i2 ra1,sa4a24 lu3 ra3.
I3kan4ni1xi'1i1ba3torokan4xi13xi3 ra2nda3yu4tin3.
"I3ta2an2ndi4i4yo2i3nga2trabajoa3sa3 ra2",ka4chi2,ka4chi2be4lu2so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143ya1kan3,ni1ki4tu3,bi3tin3ndi4:
"ya1kan3,nu1ni4ko14o3ku3xi(3) o4tan3na4ku'1un1 ra1ka'3nda2 ra1nda1xin1tan3
ndi'3i3ka'3nda2 ra1nda1xin1tan3ka'3mi3 ra2tan3chi'3i3 ra2tan3,i3kan4
xa143ya1kan3,ki3xa2a2 ra1kwa3a4ndi4ja1ndi3xi4ndi4so3 ra2ki3xa2a2 ra1ka3xi4 2",ka4chi2be4lu2so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143ni1ku3ñu3u42xa4ku3 ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra2ja143,ka4chi2
ni1xa1a1tu3ku3ba3ña4si'4i2 ra1ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Kwa14ku(3) un4ndi4,ya1kan3,
kwa'4an2ba3yo'4o1ku3tu(3) un4tan3ña1a4xa1a(1) e1ja1ta(4) on4i3ta2an2,sa3kan4ndi4yu'1u1ban4ji4ni2sa1a3ko3o3tan3chi3nde3e4 2yo'4o1",ka4chi2 an4.
Ja143ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,ni1ki4tu3ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1ja143ni1xa'3nda2 ra1,
i3kan4ni1chi3ka2 ra1ñu'3u2ni1xi1xi(1) a1tan3i3kan4ni1xa1a1ña4ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"ya1yo'4o4chi'3i(3) un4",ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2.I3kan4ki13xa3a4 ra2ni1chi'3i3 ra3.
In3ka4ni24ja143ni1ta3ba4 ra2ku'1u1i3tu2,in3ka4ni24ndi4ja1ki13xa3a4yo3ko4i3tu2ke4e(4) a3.
I3kan4tan3kwa'1an1,ta1nda3a2ni1kwa3a4ndi4ja1ba'1a3 ni42ba3ndi3xi4.
Ja1ja'13nda2 ni42 ra1ndi3xi4i3kan4ni1si3so3kwa4yu2tan3ni1ki3xa2a2 ra1ni1kwa3a4i3kan4,
ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4be4lu2ndi4,ya1kan3:
"bi3tin3ndi4ja1ni1ki3xa2a2ya1ko4ndo3ndi3xi4tan3ja1i4yo2ba3".
Sa4a24 lu3be4lu2tan3ja13xi4 ra2ndi3xi4,xi13xi3 ra2su3bi4xi13xi3 ra3,i3kan4ja143
i3kan4,"Sa1a3bi4ta1a3 ni42ku4u4ta1yo'4o4ndi4nda1i3in3ya1ko4ndo3
trabajotan3ba143ke4ta3ba'1a3 ra2ji'4in(4) a2ndi4ta1,ku4chun3ku4u4 ra3".
"Ba14sa3ka1ndi4i3in3ndo'4o1ku4u4na1xa'4a13i3chi4nu14u3 ra2ndi4,tan3bi3tin3ba42ndi4ñu3u42bi3tin3ba42
ku3u2 ra1,nda1ba'1a3ka1na4mi3i4 ra2ka3xi4 2",ka4chi2be4lu2so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143ya1kan3,ja143ni1ku3ñu3u42tan3ja143,
ka4chi2ba3ña4si'4i2 ra1ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4ko14o3ta1tan4ka(1) e1ndi4ñu3u42bi3tin3ba42ka'3ni4 na2yo'4o1tan3,
tan3bi3tin3ndi4ku14sun1 un4ndi4,ya1kan3,ni1ta1nda3a2sa3ba3na3a4ñu3u42tan3ku'1un1ba3yo4o4,ka4chi2,ku'1un1yo4o4ndi4
ni3yu'1u1tan3ba14ja4ko4nde3e4ka1i3ni2 yu1ndi4ja1ya'4a13 ni42ba42i4xa3yu3ba4 2ji'4in(4) un4,sa4ndo'3o3 ni42 ra1yo'4o1ka4chi2 an4,ba'1a3ka1nda3ndi3ko(4) e4ku1nu'1u(4) e4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143,ni1ku3ñu3u42tan3ja143ja13ta3ba(3) en4pozoyu'3u4is1to3tan3,i3kan4ni1ta3an(4) en4ta1kwi42si4i2(4) an4tan3ja143
xa143ni1ku3ñu3u42tan3,ka4chi2be4lu2ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Hija¿an4ki4xin1 ni42 un4?",ka4chi2 an4,ka4chi2be4lu2so'3o3.
"Ndi4to3ba(3) 2papá",ka4chi2 an4,tan3su14u3mi3i4bi(4) an4kan4ndi4to3ndi4ta1kwi42si4i24ba(3) en4nda4kwi3in3.
Tan3mi3i(4) an4ndi4ña4ja1ba1xi3 ni42ban4ji'4in4 ra3,ndi13ki'3in3 ra2 ña4tan3ba1xi3 na2ba1xi3ndi3xi3 na2yu14bi4ta'4bi4ka1a3.
I3kan4ja143,i3kan4in3ka4ni24tan3tu3ku3ka'4an2be4lu2ji'4in4si1si'4i2 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3:
"hija,¿an4ki4xin1 un4'".
"Ndi4to3ba(3) 2papá",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
Sa3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4,sa3kan4,sa3kan4ku4u4ni1ndi'3i3ba3ta1kwi42si4i24ya1ta4ni1ta3an(4) en4yu'3u4pozokan4tan3
i3kan4ja143,ba143nda4kwi3in3ka1 en4i3kan4ja143ni1ke3e3be4lu2ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1,ko14o3
ko14o3ya1kan3,si1si'4i2 na1i4yo2ni3ta1jo13ndo3ka14sa3 na2ko14o3i4yo2ndi4ba1xi3ba3 na3.
I3kan4ni1ke3ta3be4lu2ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4,"Viejandi4kwa'1an1ba3se'1e(3) o4",ka4chi2
I3kan4ka4chi2 an4be4la2so'3o3ndi4,"Viejokwa'4an2 on4ja1ta4 na2ndi4kwa'4an2 on4nda1ni3nda1ku'3ba2ni'1i(4) un4 na2ndi4na1,
ya1kan3,na1ku'1un(1) un4ja4nda3ndi3ko(4) on4ku4u4 na2",ka4chi2be4la2so'3o3ji'4in4be4lu2.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3,i3kan4ni1ke3e3ba3be4lu2na'14a1ba1xi3 ra2ja1ta4ka14sa3 ra2ndi4,ta1ba1xi3ja4nda3ndi3ko4 ra2ku4u4na1kan4,nda3ndi3ko4 na2ku1nu'1u4 na3.
I3kan4,ba1xi3be4lu2ndi4ba1xi3sa4ka2 ra1,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4,
"bi3tin3ndi4ja1ni1ku3ya3tin3 ni42ba1xi3yu3ba4 2ja1ta(4) e4ndi4
nda143lu3u3 ni42nda3ni'1i4 ra2yo4o4",ka4chi2 an4.I3kan4ja143
i3kan4nda13ndo3o3"bi3tin3ndi4,
yo'4o1nda3ndo3o3lagunatan3yu'1u1nda3ndo3o3tia1ka4ka4chi2,ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2.
I3kan4ya3tin3yu'3u4i3chi4ña1a4ndi4ka'4nu3lagunandi4ka2ndi4,i3nda14ji1ni4tia1ka4ndi4ka2.
I3kan4ni1xa1a1be4lu2tan3ji4to3sa3ba3 ra2ndi4tia1ka4ndi4ka2laguna,la3tun4 lu3tia1ka4ndi4ka2.
I3kan4nda13ndi3ko4 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Viejandi4ko14o3se'1e(3) o4ni4ni'1i4 2ndi4,ya1kan3,
i3nda14ji1ni4lagunai4ndu'3u4yu'3u4i3chi4kan4ndi4ka'4nu3 lu3lagunatan3i3kan4ndi4ka2i3nda14ji1ni4tia1ka4".
"A1su3se'1e(3) o4ku4u4na1kan4ba3kwa'4an2 on4ja1ta4 na2na4ku'3ba2ja4nda3ndi3ko(4) on4 na2".
"Kwa1chi3 ni42 un4ji'4in4se'1e(3) o4ndi4kwa'1a4 ni42ña1sa14ndo'3o(3) on4 ra2",
"ndi4,si1si'4i2 o4ndi4ña4ku4ni2ban4kan4ku3ndu'4u(4) an4ji'4in4 ra2tan3,tan3yo'4o1ndi4i13xa3ja13ni1ku3 ni42 un4ji'4in4 na2",
"kwa'4an2 on4ndi4nda1ku'3ba2ja4nda3ndi3ko(4) on4 na2".
I3kan4ja143,kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4,ba1xi3tu3ku3be4lu2ja1ta4 na2ni1ta'1nda1chi3ñu3nu14u3 ra2ba1xi3 ra3.
Ba1xi3 ra2sa3kan4,ba1xi3 ra2sa3kan4,ba1xi3 ra2sa3kan4,i3kan4ja143,
ja1ka4chi2tu3ku(3) an4ji'4in4i3i(4) an4ndi4,"Ja1ni1ku3ya3tin3 ni42
ndi4kun2yu3ba4 2ja1ta4 2ba1xi3 ra2ndi4,ta1ni'1i4ku4u4 ra2yo4o4chi2".
"Yo'4o1bi3tin3ndi4yo'4o1nda3ndo3o3tun4manzanatan3yu'1u1nda3ndo3o3manzana",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143i3kan4ndi4chi2tun4manzanakan4nda1na3ma4 run4ni1nu3ndi4kun2i3nda14ji1ni4manzanandi4kun2.
I3kan4ja143ni1ki3xa2a2be4lu2ndi4chi2 ra1ji4to3 ra2,nda13ndi3ko4tu3ku3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4be4la2ndi4:
"viejandi4ko14o3se'1e(3) o4ni4ju3ta'3an2 yu1ndi4kwa'1an1 ni42 na1,i3nda14ji1ni4tun4manzanandi4chi2ya1kan3,ya1kan3,
tan3ni1nu3na3ma4 run4ndi4kun2i3nda14ji1ni4manzana".
"Viejoa1su3se'1e(3) o4ku4u4na1kan4ba3,kwa'4an2 on4nda3ndi3ko(4) on4ku'1un1ndi1ki'1in(3) un4 na2na4ki3xa2a2 na1,se'1e(3) o4ku4u4na1kan4ba3",ka4chi2be4la2so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143tu3ku3ni3nda13ndi3ko4be4lu2kwa'1an1 ra1,kwa'1an1 ni42 ra1ja1ta4 na2,i3kan4,sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4
i3kan4ja143ni1xa1a1,ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4ndi4ja143,ja1ku4ya3tin3tu3ku(3) an4be4lu2ndi4kun2 ra1ja1ta4 na2,kwa'1an1,
i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4i3i(4) an4ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4,
yo'4o1ya1kan3,nda3ndo3o3yo'4o1ndi4campaneronda3ndo3o3yo'4o1tan3yu'1u1ndi4campananda3ndo3o3yu'1u1tin3",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2.
I3kan4ja143ni1ki3xa2a2be4lu2kan4i4ndu'3u4i3nda14be4lu2ka4ni3 ra2campanandi4nde3e4 ni42ya4ni13campanai4xa3 ra2.
I3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2be4lu2ka4chi2 ra1,ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ta1ña1a4,"Campanero,¿an4ko14o3u1bi1ta'3an2na1yu4bi24ni4ya'1a3yo'4o4kwa'1an1mi3tiu'4un4?".
Ni1i3xa3so'4o4xu4mi4be4lu2kan4ndi4a1su3ka3a2kan4nde3e4 ni42ya4ni13ndi4ta14ku1so'1o3 ra3.
Ni1ndi'1i3i3ni2be4lu2kan4nda13ndi3ko4 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1i3kan4ja143nda13xa2a2 ra1ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4:
"viejandi4ko14o3se'1e(3) o4ni4ju3ta'3an2 yu1ndi4,ya1kan3,
i3nda14ji1ni4viejoni1nda3a3i4ndu'3u4ka4ni3campanandi4a1su3ka3a2ka4ni3ba3 ra3".
"Ni14ji3ni3so'1o3 ra2ya1ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in4 ra2",ka4chi2
Ja143nda13ndi3ko4 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,"A1su3se'1e(3) o4ku4u4na1kan4ba3nda3ndi3ko(4) on4kwa'4an2 on4ja1ta4 na2",i3kan4ja143
ni1ke3e3nda13ndi3ko4 na2kwa'1an1 na1,nda13ndi3ko4tu3ku3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
"Bi3tin3ndi4ko14o3ta1tan4ka(1) e1ndi4,ya1kan3,ja1ni1ku3ya3tin3 ni42
i3kan4,ndi4kun2yu3ba4 2ba1xi3 ra2ndi4ta1ku4ni2ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta1ni'1i4ku4u4 ra2yo4o4".
I3kan4ja143ni1ki'3in(3) an4bi1ka1ni4ni3ji1ni(4) an4tan3ni1sa3ka4na(3) en4kwe4nda2i3chi4ja1ta(4) en4tan3
ni1nda3si2ba3i3chi4ndi4ni1xi'1nu3tun4i3ñu4bi1ka1ndi4ni3ka4nda2a2ba42tan3ni3ni1nu1ba42tan3
nda13si2ba3 run4ndi4i3kan4nda13ndi3ko4ba3be4lu2i1nda43,i3kan4ni1ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ran4.
CarlosRómuloSantiago.Ya1kan3,U1ni1xi3ko3u1bi1.Yoloxóchitl.
I3nda14ta1ta4u3ni2ndi4,ya1kan3,i4yo2,xa'4an1 ra1la3ma42tan3
i3kan4tan3i4yo2u1bi1ta'4an2na1kwa4chi3ba4li4se'1e3 ra2tan3kwa'1an1 ra1la3ma42ndi4ta1nda'4bi2ku4u4 ra2ji14ni2 ra1nda4a(2) e2ba42
ku3ta3ku2se'1e3 ra2ndi4,ndi3sa3a4ki1bi4tan3a1su3la3ma42ja'4an1ba3 ra2,sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4
tan3ni1ke3ta3ba3tia1ka4ti4ku4nu24ka4chi2 ri4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"ja1ni1ku3kwa'1a4 ni42se'1e3 2ja4xi2(4) un4tan3bi3tin3ndi4
nda143i3nda14se'1e3 2ya1kan4ba42kwa'1a3 2ya1ma1ni4ku'1un1ji'4in(4) un4tan3sa3kan4ndi4
o4ra2ku3xi(3) un4se'1e3 2tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku1tu1ka14ta2 on4i3ki4se'1e3 2ndi4ya1ta3xi3kwa'4a(4) on4ko3ndo(3) a2tan3
i3in3cajata3an(4) on4 a2tan3ku'1un(1) un4chi3ka2 on4 a2ma'14ñu3yu1u4xa'1a1tan3o4ra2ja1ku3ma1ni4 a2ndi4
i3kan4ku'1un1,ku'1un(1) un4ta3ba(4) on4 a2sa3kan4ndi4ka3ja3chi4ñu(3) a2ji'4in4se'1e(3) on4ki1bi4ka3ja3chi4ñu(3) a2ji'4in4 na2ndi4ya1ku3ma1ni4ba42ji'4in4 na2,
tan3te'1e4ji1ni4se'1e3 2ndi4,ya1kan3,i4yo2i3nda14i3na2tie4tan24ja1na(1) on4tan3ti4kan4,ti4kan4ku4u4ti4sa4ka3xi(4) un4te'1e4ji1ni4se'1e3 2",ni1ka3chi2
tia1ka4libertuji'4in4ta1ja'4an1la3ma42kan4.
Ya1kan4ni1ndi3ki'3in3 ra2ba1xi3 ra2tan3i3kan4nda13xa2a2 ra1tan3
ni1ka3chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4si'4i2 ra1ndi4na4ka14ta2ja13ni1ku3 na2i3ki4ndi4mi3i4 ra2ku4u4ta1ndi3kwi3so(3) a2sa3kan4ndi4ji4ni2 ra1mi3i4ku'1un1 ra1ta3xi3kwa'4a4 ra(2) e3.
Ya1kan4ndi4ni1nda3xa2a2 ra1tan3i3kan4ja143xi13xi3 na2ti4kan4tan3
ni1ta3ba4 na2i3ki4tan3i3kan4nda13kwa'1a3ba3ña4ta4u3ni2ya1nda'3a4i3i(4) an4tan3i3kan4xa'1an1 ra1ta13xi3kwa'4a4 ra(3) e2tan3
ta13an4 ra(2) e2i3in3cajatan3i3kan4ja'1an1chi3ka2 ra(1) e1ma'14ñu3yu1u4xa'1a1.
Tan3i3na2ja1na1 na1ndi4te'1e4ji1ni4ndi4ya1kan4ba3sa14ka3xi4 na2i3na2ja1na1 na1.
I3kan4xa3ku4tiem4pu2tan3i3kan4ja143i3na2tie4tan24kan4nda13ku'1un3se'1e3ti4kan4chi2.
I3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1ka3ku3se'1e3 ri4ndi4u1bi1ta'4an2ji1ni4ku4u4se'1e3ti4kan4ni1ka3ku(3) a3.
U1bi1ta'4an2i3na2ni1ka3ku3,sa3kan4ku4u4ja143ni1ko3nde3e4 na2na1kwa4chi3se'1e3ta1ta4u3ni2ja143ka4chi2 na1
na1ji'4in4yu3ba4 na3,"Bi3tin3papándi4ndu'1u1ndi4ku'1un1 ndu1ndu3ku4 ndu2trabajosa3kan4ndi4
ya1kan3,ka3ja3chiu4un4 ndu2sa3kan4ndi4kwa'3a3be'3e(3) o4ndi4nda'4bi2 ni42i4yo2 e4ndi4ko14o3be'3e(3) o4",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
"hijonda4a2ba42ji4ni2 yu1ki'3in(3) 2ya1ku'1un1ji'4in4 ndo4ji4ni2 ndo4ndi4ta1nda'4bi2ku4u(4) 2tan3ko14o3ya1ji4ni2 yu1ta3xi(3) 2ku'1un1ji'4in4 ndo4".
I3kan4tan3,"A4su3ka4chi2 un4ji'4in4 ndu2ndi4,ya1kan3,i4yo2mi4i4ni1ja'1an(1) on4ta13xi3kwa'4a(4) on4ya1ku4u4ya1
ta13xi3kwa'4a(4) on4tan3bi3tin3ndi4bi3tin3ba42ku4ma1ni4 a2tin3".
Ya1kan4ni1ke3e3ta1ta4u3ni2ja'1an1 ra1i3kan4ja143ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4,ka13ni3ka13ni3 ra2nda'3a4 ra2i3kan4,
i3kan4nu1na4 e2,su14u3cajaku4u4tun4ña1a4ndi4be'3e3nda13ndo3o(3) a2ña1a4i3kan4
ni1ke3ta3kwa4yu2tan3kwa4yu2kwe4nda2ta1ja1nde1e4tan3i3kan4tan3ni1ke3ta3tu1xi42tan3i3kan4
ni1ke3ta3mi3i4ta1kan4nda1i3na2ja1na1 ra1chi1,i3kan4ja143
i3nga2 ra1kan4sa3kan4tu3ta1kan4ba3,ni1ke3ta3kwa4yu2tan3ni1ke3ta3tu1xi42tan3
"bi3tin3ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3papándi4,ya1kan3
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2si'3i4 na2ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"Ku3si4ti24 ndo4hijona4chi3ka(2) e2bendiciónndo'4o1sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un1 ndo4".
I3kan4ni1ju3si4ti24 na2nu14u3si'3i4 na2tan3i3kan4ni1sa4ñu'4u(4) an4ta4u3ni2 na1tan3i3kan4ni1nda3a3 na2kwa4yu2kwa'1an1 na1.
"Na4ku'1un1 ndu1sa3kan4ndi4na4ba'1a3tan3nda3ndi3ko4 ndu2
sa3kan4ndi4ki3xa2a2 ndu1ndi4ja1i4yo2xu'14un4a3sa3ma1ni4 ndu2ndo'4o1",ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4yu3ba4si'3i4 na2tan3ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1.
Kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1 na1mi4i4nda13ta'1bi4ndi4chi2i3nda14i3tun4ndi4u1bi1nda'3a4 run4.
I3kan4nda4ta'1bi4i3chi4u1bi1,i3kan4ja143ni1ka3chi2ta1,ta1nu14u3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4:
"na4tun4i3tun4yo'4o4ni1i1xa3 na2i3in3ta'4bi4nda'3a4kwa'4a4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ku4ni2ka3chi(2) a2ndi4ta1ja1ni1xi'1i1ku4u(4) 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
"Tan3na4yu'1u1tan3kwa'1an(1) e1tan3ni1ku3nu1mi4 2ki3xi3ko1to(1) e1ndi4,ya1kan3,ndi4i3nda14yo4o4ndi4yo4o4ki3xi3ko1to1ku4u(4) e4yo'4o4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1."Ba'1a3na4tu2sa3kan4".
i3kan4ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1,nda13ta'1bi4 na2kwa'1an1 na1,kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 na1sa3kan4.
I3kan4ni1ku3si4in4ba3ta1nu14u3kwa'1an1 ra1,kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1i3in3ñu3u2.
I3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4na1nde4e4ña1a4ndi4,"Señoraan4ko14o3ta1kwi42ku3ni3ma1ni4 ndo4yu'1u1ko'3o(3) 2ndi4i4chi1 ni42 yu1ta1kwi42",ka4chi2 ra1.
I3kan4ja143,"Señorndi4ko14o3ta1kwi42yo'4o4ndi4ndo'4o4 ni42 ndu1ja'1a4ta1kwi42yo'4o4ndi4,ya1kan3,
ya1yu14bi4ndo'4o4ba42yo'4o4".
"¿A4chu3ndo'4o4 ndo4ko14o3ta1kwi42?".
"Ko14o3ta1kwi42ndi4ko1o4na'14a1ti4kan4ku4u4ti4ja4si2 ri4ta1kwi42nu14u3na1ñu3u2ko14o3ta1kwi42ko'3o3 na3".
"I3nda14i3nda14na1yu4bi24ja4xi24ko1o4sa3kan4ndi4nu4na14ta1kwi42ko'3o3 ndu2bi3tin3ndi4
ña4ko4ndo3reinasi1si'4i2reyña4kan4ban4nu'4ni2ka4ndu'3u4ka3xi4 ri4tan3sa3kan4ba42ndi4
ya1kan3,nu1na4ta1kwi42ko'3o3 ndu2",ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ra2.
"¿Tan3nda4a2ba42ka4ndu'3u(4) an4?".
"I3kan4ka4ndu'3u(4) an4",i3kan4ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1ja143ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4:
"¿nda4a(2) e2ba42na4chu3ba42nu'4ni2 un4ka4ndu'3u(4) un4?".
I3kan4ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Ndu'1u1ndi4na1ndo'4o4ku4u4 ndu2ja'1a4ta1kwi42ndi4ko14o3ta1kwi42i4yo2ko'3o3 ndu2ndi4
i3nda14na1yu4bi24ja4xi24ko1o4sa3kan4ndi4nu4na14ta1kwi42ko'3o3 ndu3".
"Tan3bi3tin3ndi4yu3ba4 2ku4u4ta1ni1ndu3ta'3an2ta3xi3 ra2yu'1u1ya1kan4ndi4
ba1xi3 2nu'4ni2 yu1ka4ndu'3u4 2tan3sa3kan4ndi4yu'1u1ka3xi4 ri4ndi4nu1na4ta1kwi42ko'3o3 na2na1familia yu1",ni1ka3chi2ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4,i3kan4nda13xi4 ra2 ña4tan3ja143ndu13ku3ndu'4u4 ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra3.
"¿Tan3nda4a2o4ra2ba42ki3xa2a2 ri4?".
I3kan4kwa4yu2ja1na1 ra1ndi4i3kan4xa'1a4 ra2sa3kan4ndi4chi2 ri4,i3na2ja1na1 ra1ndi4xa'1a4kwa4yu2kan4ka4ndu'3u4 ri4.
I3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4,ni1ki'3in3yu1ma'4na1ta1kan4ka4ndu'3u4 ra2ki4xin1 ra1ja143
ja143ni'4i13ndi4,ba1xi3ko1o4ndi4ja1ni1ta1nda3a2o4ra2ki3xa2a2 ri4ka3xi4 ri4ña4reinasa3kan4ndi4nu1na4ta1kwi42ko'3o3 na3.
Sa3kan4ku4u4ja143ndi'4i13i3ni2 an4ndi4ta1kan4ndi4ki4xin1 ni42 ra1ndi4ba143kwi4i4ndo3to3 ra3.
Ja143ni1ki3xa3a(4) en4xa4ku3ba(3) en4tan3xa143
ni1to1o3ta1kwi42nu14u(3) an4nu14u3 ra2tan3i3kan4ni1ndo3to3 ra2ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4,"¿Nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o(4) on4?".
"Ndo3to(3) on4kwa'4a13,kwa'4an2 on4ndi4,ya1kan3,
na4ndo1o3 2ndi4,ya1kan3,yu'1u1ndi4ña4ja1ni1ta1nda3a2ka3xi4ko1o4ku4u(4) 2tan3yo'4o1ndi4
ko14o3kwa1chi(3) un4na4ku3u2 un4ji'4in(4) 2",ni1ka3chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra3.
"Ka14ni3ni2 un4ndi4,ya1kan3,ya1nda'4bi3ka3xi4ti4kan4ndi4ba'1a3ka1na4mi3i4 2ka3xi4 ri4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
Sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1ku3ya3tin3ba3ko1o4ba1xi3 ri4ndi4u1xa1ji1ni4ko1o4chi2.
I3kan4ja143ni1i1xa14a3ba3 ra2,i1xa14a3ba3 ra2ki4ni4 ra2tan3kwa4yu2ndi4
ti4xi4ka3tu3ku4u4ti4kan4ba3ndi4,nda'4yu1
ju4ndi3chi2 ri4tan3ti'4nu3 ri4 a2tan3ka4tu4nda'3a4 ri4 a2tan3sa3kan4ku4u4,sa3kan4tu3i3na2ja1na1ba3 ra2ndi4ti4xi4ka3tu3ku4u4ti4kan4ba3.
Sa3kan4ku4u4ni1ku3chun3ba3 ra2ja'13ni4 ra2ko1o4kan4,i3kan4ja143,ya1kan3,
i3kan4,xa'13ni4 ra2ko1o4kan4ndi'13i3xa'13ni4 ra2 ri4tan3ni1ki3tu'4un4 ra2
nu14u3ya4a24 ri4u1xa1nu14u3ya4a24 ri4ni1ki3tu'4un4 ra2tan3ti13su4ku24 ra(2) e2pañutan3i3kan4
i3kan4nda13kwa'1a3 ra(2) e2nda'3a4i3na2ja1na1 ra1ta13xi3kwa'4a4,"Ta3xi3kwa'4a(4) on4 a2yo'4o4ndi4yo'4o4,contiem4pu2ndi4ya1ku3ma1ni4 a2ba42",ni1ka3chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in4i3na2
Ndi13ki'3in3i3na(2) e2tan3,pañukan4tan3ni1ko3ko4 ri4 a2chi1.
Sa3kan4ku4u4,i3kan4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2,ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ko4ndo3reinakan4,"Bi3tin3ndi4kwa'4an2 on4ndi4ba'1a3ndi4sa14ka1ku3 2yo'4o1".
"Yu'1u1ndi4kwa'1an1,ta1kwa'1an1ndu3ku4trabajoku4u(4) 2ndi4nda1mi4i4ba42ke3ba'1a3 2ji'4in4chi3ñu3ka3ja3chi4ñu(3) 2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143ndi13ki'3in3ta1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1tan3i3kan4ni1xa1a(1) en4,
nda13xa2a2 en4nu14u3reyka4chi2 an4so'3o3"¿Na4chu3tu3na4chu3ba42ba1xi3yo'4o1tan3yo'4o1ndi4ña4kwa'1an1ndi'3i3xa'1a4ku4u(4) un4?",ni1ka3chi2,ka4chi2yu3ba(4) en4ji'4in(4) an4.
Tan3I3kan4ja143ni1ka3chi2reinaji'4in4yu3ba(4) en4,"Papándi4
yu'1u1ndi4ni1ka1ku3 2ndi4ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1sa14ka1ku3 ra2yu'1u1tan3
so'3o3ka4a4 ra2tan3,tan3so'3o3ka4a4kwa4yu2ja1na1 ra1tan3so'3o3ka4a4i3na2ja1na1 ra1ta1kan4ku4u4ta1sa14ka1ku3 ra2yu'1u1tan3,ya1kan4ndi4ja'13ni4ba3 ra2ko1o4".
Nda4a2xi4ka3bi4carbonerondi4ta1xi4ka3i4xi4ko3tu1un4ku4u4ta1kan4.
tontoña1a4ndi4ni1xi1ka3 ra2ni1ki3tu'4un4 ra2u1xa1sa3kan4ji1ni4 ri4tan3ndi4so3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
Ni1xa1a1 ra1,ya1kan3,be'3e3reyndi4ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ja'13ni4ko1o4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3chi2.
I3kan4ja143ta'1nda1chi3ñu3ndi13ki'3in3 na2carbonerokwa'1an1 na1ji'4in4 ra2su4ku3chi3 na2 ra1
ni1chi3chi3 ra2ja143nda13na3ma3 ra2ja'1an1 na1ji'4in4 ra2ni1ke3e3ji1ni4 ra2,
i3kan4ja143ni1ki3xa3a4bi3ko4ka4chi2noviandi4,"Su14u3ta1ka1a3ku4u4ta1kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
si4in4ka4a4ba3ta1kan4,i4yo2i3na2ja1na1ta1kan4tan3i4yo2kwa4yu2ja1na1 ra1tan3ni'4i4 ra2tu1xi42".
"Ta1ka1a3ndi4su14u3 ra2",ka4chi2reyndi4,"Ka'14nda2 on4chi3ñu3ndi4ta1ta3nda'3a(4) on4ji'4in4ku4u4ba3 ra2ndi4ta1sa14ka1ku3yo'4o1ku4u4 ra3".
Ja143ni1ki3xa3a4ba3bi3ko4i4yo2 ni42bi3ko4ja143
tan3ta1ja'13ni4 ri4ndi4nu14u3ñu3u2i4ndu'3u4ta1kan4,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4i3na2ja1na1 ra1ndi4:
"kwa'4an2ndi1ki'1in(3) un4ko'1o4ya1ndi4chi2nu14u3novioya1kan4ku3xi(3) un4",ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4i3na2ja1na1 ra1.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4ja143ni1xa1a1ba3 ri4ni1ki'3in3ba3 ri4ko'1o4ya1ndi4chi2nu14u3novio,kwa'1an1ji'4in4 ri4ku3xi3 ri4.
Ni1xa1a1 ri4nda1nu14u3ñu3u2i3kan4i4ndu'3u4 ri4xi13xi3 ri4 a3.
Ndi'13i3xi13xi3 ri4 a2kan4in3ka4ni24ndi13ki'3in3 ri4kwa'1an1tu3ku3 ri4ni1xa1a1 ri4
i3kan4ja143ndi13ki'3in3ba3 ri4ko'1o4ya1ndi4chi2nu14u3noviatan3
kwa'1an1tu3ku3 ri4ji'4in(4) a2nda13xa2a2 ri4mi4i4i4ndu'3u4is1to'3o2 ri4i3kan4xi13xi3 ri4 a2tan3
I3kan4ba3ndi4,ja'13nda2ba3 na2reychi3ñu3ndi4na4ku'1un1 na1ja1ta4i3na2kan4ka'3ni4 na2 ri4ndi4na4chu3ba42i4xa3 ri4i3in3si3ki2ji'4in4novio,ji'4in4novia.
I3kan4ja143ni1xa1a1na1nda4chi4ñu3kan4ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ndi4i3na2ndi4ti4ba1xi3 ndu2ka'3ni4 ndu2ku4u4 ri4chi2.
"Ba'1a3ka1mi3i4 2ka'3ni4 ndo4na4na4tu2ku4ni2 ndo4ka'3ni4 ndo4i3na2ja1na(1) e1ndi4mi3i4 2ka'3ni4 ndo4".
"Na4tu2xi13xi3 ri4 a2xi13xi3ba3 ri4 a2ndi4tu1ndo'4o4ba3ti4ña1a4ba43".
"Ya1nda'4bi3ku3xi3ba3 ri4ba42xi13xi3 ri4 a2",ka4chi2is1to'3o2 ri4so'3o3ji'4in4 na3.
I3kan4nda13xa2a2 na1ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4reyndi4:
"so'3o3ka'4an2is1to'3o2i3na2ndi4na4tu2xi13xi3 ri4 a2ndi4ya1nda'4bi3ku3xi3ba3 ri4ba42,tu1ndo'4o4ba3 ri4ba42ya1kan4ndi4xi13xi3 ri4 a2",ka4chi2
"Ka4chi2ta1ji'4in4ja1na1i3na2",ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4rey.
I3kan4ja'13nda2reychi3ñu3ndi4,"Kwa'4an2ndi1ki'1in3 ndo4 ra2sa3kan4ki3xi3 ra3".I3kan4ni1ke3e3 na2ja'1an1ndi1ki'1in3 na2 ra1
Ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Na4ku'1un(1) o4ndi4ka4na3reyndo'4o1,nda1mi3i(4) un4nda1i3na2ja1na(1) on4ku'1un1".
Ja143ka4chi2 ra1ndi4,"Na4chu3a3sa3yu'1u1ku'1un1 yu1kan4reyku4u4ta1kan4yu'1u1ndi4ko14o3i3in3ta1ku4u4yu'1u1ndi4ta1ki3ni3ka4a4ku4u4yu'1u1".
"reyndi4na1,na1ndi4xi3ba'1a3ku4u4na1kan4,ni3na3reyta'4an4mi3i4ba3na1kan4,na1kan4ku4u4na1nde4e4ji'4in4 na2tan3yu'1u1ndi4
ko14o3i3in3ta1ku4u4bi4yu'1u1","Ndi4ka'14nda2 on4chi3ñu3ndi4ta1ku'1un1ku4u4ba(3) on4ji'4in4 ndu2".
Ya1kan4ndi4ku4ni2ku14ni2 ra1sa3kan4ndi13ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1chi1,ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4,
ku4ya3tin3 ra2mi4i4i4ndu'3u4noviatan3ja143ni1ka3chi2ba(3) en4,"Papándi4,
su14u3ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ta1ni4ja'3ni4ko1o4ndi4ta1kan4ku4u4 ra3".
"Ta1ka1a3ku4u4 ra2ndi4i3na2ja1na1 ra1ndi4ti4ka1a3ku4u4i3na2ja1na1 ra1".
"Kwa4yu2ka1a3ku4u4,kwa4yu2ja1na1 ra1,tu1xi42ka1a3ndi4tun4ka1a3ni'4i4 ra2ja'1an1 ra1ni1sa4ka1ku3 ra2yu'1u1",ka4chi2reinaso'3o3.
I3kan4ni1ta'1nda1chi3ñu3ja'1an1ki'1in3 na2mulatan3ni1nda3ta4ba3 ri4carbonerotan3
i3kan4ndi13ki'3in3ba3 na2ta1ja'13ni4,i3kan4ja143tu3ndi4ni1ka3chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4:
"tan3na4ki3xi3ya1ko4ndo3señana4ndi3xa3ndi4,ya1kan3,yo'4o1ku4u4 ra2",i3kan4ni1ka3chi2 ra1ji'4in4i3na2ja1na1 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3:
"ta3ba(4) on4ta3kwa'4ni(3) un4ya1ka'4an(2) e2ji'4in(4) un4mi3tiu'4un4".
I3kan4ndu13xan3ba3i3na2ja1na1 ra1tan3i3kan4ta13kwa'4ni3 ri4u1xa1ya4a24ko1o4ndi4so3ti4kan4.
"Ta1yo'4o4ku4u4ba3 ra2",ka4chi2,ni1ka3chi2ba3reyso'3o3.
Ni1ta'1nda1chi3ñu3tan3ja'13ni4ba3 na2carbonerotan3
ja143ni1ki3xa3a4ba3bi3ko4ta4nda'3a4tu3kwa3ta1kan4ji'4in4ña4ko3ndo3reina.
I3kan4o4ra2ni1ndi'3i3bi3ko4tan3
nda13kwa'1a3 ra2,ya1kan3,ranchunda'3a4ta1kan4,nda13kwa'1a3 ra2be'3e3nda'3a4si1si'4i2 ra1ndi4i3kan4ko3o(3) an4ji'4in4i3i(4) an4
I3kan4ja143kwa1nu'1u4na1kan4be'3e3ba3 na2i3kan4ni1kwa3a4
ja143nda13sa3ba'1a(3) en4is1to3ko3nde3e3 na2ku1sun1 na1,
i3kan4ni1ke3ta3 ra2ndi4ka2 ra1yu3nu4xa'4nu13ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Ka3ndu'4u(4) un4ku1sun(1) un4ndi4ja1ndu13ba'1a3is1to3".
"Ku3nda3tu(3) un4na4ndi3ki3nde3e4 2lu3u3sa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,in3ka4ni24sa3kan4ku1sun(1) o4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143ndi4ka2 ra1yu3nu4xa'4nu13i3kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,ya1kan3:
"¿nda4a2bi4ba42xi4xi1 ni42ñu'3u2kan4ye'4e1 ni42xi4xi1ñu'3u2?",ja143ni1ka3chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4:
"i3kan4ndi4mi4i4kwa'1an1 na1tan3ba143ndi4ko4 na2ba42kan4",ni1ka3chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
I3kan4ja143ni1ke3e3,o4ra2nda13ka3ndu'4u(4) an4ku1sun(1) an4tu4u2 ra1ndi4ni1ki1xin(1) an4tan3
ndo13ko2o2 ra1tan3ni1nda3a3 ra2kwa4yu2tan3ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
Ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4ndi4mi4i4ba42xi4xi1ñu'3u2kan4ni1ke3e3 ra2xa1a1 ra1.
I3kan4ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4na4na2kwe'4e1ndi4,"Xi4ka3nde'14e(4) 2be'3e(3) on4na4na2kwe'4e1.
"Ya'1a(3) on4hijoya'1a(3) on4a3ma3bi3tin3ba42kwa'1an1yo'4o1bi14tin3ba42kwa'1an1yo'4o1tan3nda1bi3tin3ni1ki3xa2a(2) on4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
"Ya'1a(3) on4ko'3o(3) on4ta1kwi42",ka4chi2 an4,tan3locoña1a4ndi4
i3kan4ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,tan42ja1ju13ta3nde3e3 ra2ko'3o3 ra2ta1kwi42tan3ni1ka3tu(4) an4si1ki4 ra2tan3kwa'1an1ba3 ra2pozo.
Sa3kan4ku4u4xa3ku4tiem4pu2tan3ni1ke3e3ba3ta1,ta1la4tun3ni1ke3e3 ra2ja'1an1ko1to1 ra1ndi4,ya1kan3,mi4i4ba42ka4chi2 na1ku'1un1ko1to1 na1i3tun4,
ni1xa1a1 ra1kan4ndi4ja143kwa'1an1xi4i2ba3nda'3a4i3tun4yu1ku1 run4ndi4ja1i1xa14a3xi4i(2) a2.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1,ni1ya'1a3 ra2nu14u3ñu3u2mi4i4ba42mi4i4
ni1ta3nda'3a4ya3ni2 ra1kan4ni1ke3ta3ba3ña4reina,ka4tu4nda'3a(4) en4:
"yo'4o4ki3xi(3) un4,an4ji14ni2tu(3) un4nda4a2ku4u4be'3e(3) o4ndi4ña1a4tu3ya'4a13tu(3) un4kwa'1an1tu(3) un4".
"an4ji14ni2 un4ndi4yo'4o4tu3ndi4ka2 on4i3ku3tan3bi3tin3ndi4ja1ña1a4tu3ni1ku3si4in(4) un4kwa'1an(1) on4",ka4chi2 an4.
I3kan4nda13ka3ni3ni2 ra1ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ndi4,"Ña4ka1a3ba3ku4u4ña4si'4i2ya3ni2 o4na4tu2sa3kan4"
Tu1ndo'4o4kwa'1a4sa3kan4ndi4ni1ta1nda3a2 ra1be'3e3sa3kan4ndi4ni1xa1a1 ra1ja143,
ku4ba3ta4 lu(3) an4ji'4in4 ra2sa3kan4tan3ta1kan4ndi4ku14ni2 ra1ku3ba3ta(4) en4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4ji4ni2 ra1ndi4ña4si'4i2ya3ni2 ra1ban4.
I3kan4ja143,ta13xi3na3ni2 an4 e2ku3xi3 ra2,xi13xi3 ra2tin3ja143
ndu13ku3ndu'4u4 ra2i4ndu'3u4 ra2,i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"Na4ko3nde3e(3) o4ku1sun(1) o4",ka4chi2 an4.
"Ku14sun(1) i1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4yo'4o4ti4ba3ku1sun1 yu1",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
"A14sa(3) on4sa3kan4ji'4in(4) 2ndi4a4su3ni1ka3chi2yu3ba4 2ndi4yo'4o4ku1sun(1) o4ndi4yo'4o4ko3ndo3be'3e(3) o4".
"A1su3 a2ku14ni2 ra1ko3ndo'3o(3) e4ya1kan4ndi4nda13kwa'1a3 ra2be'3e3nda'3a(4) e4A,ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 ra3.
Tan3ta1ña1a4ndi4,ka3sa3ka'4nu3i3ni2 un4ndi4na4ku3ndi3ka2 yu1yo'4o4ndi4in3ka4ni24ku1sun(1) i1ji'4in(4) un4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
Ndu13ndi3ka2tu3ku3 ra2yu3nu4xa'4nu13.
Ndi4ka2 ra1sa3kan4tan3ni1ku3ñu3u42ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4,"¿Nda4a2ba42xi4xi1 ni42ñu'3u2kan4?,nda1kan4ye'4e1 ni42ñu'3u2",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143,ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 ra2ndi4,"A4su3tu3ja1i3ku3ka'4an2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4,ya1kan3,
mi4i4kwa'1an1 na1tan3ba143ndi4ko4 na2ba42kan4",ka4chi2 an4.
"Na4tu2sa3kan4ndi4i3kan4ba3kwa'1an1ya3ni2 o4na4tu2sa3kan4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
O4ra2ni1ki1xin(1) an4kan4tan3ni1nda3a3 ra2kwa4yu2ni1ki'3in3 ra2kwa'1an1 ra1.
Kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4kwa'1an1 ra1sa3kan4ja143ni1xa1a1 ra1,ja1ku4ya3tin3 ra2be'3e3be4la2tan3ja143ni1ta'1nda1ba3tun4si13su2ndi4
u1bi1tun4,u1bi1tucenatun4si13su2ja'13nda2 ra1kwa'1an1ji'4in4 ra3.
Ni1xa1a1 ra1ña1a4tan3ja143
xa143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in4na4na2kwe'4e1ndi4ta1kwi42ku4ni2ko'3o3 ra2.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4ndi4,"Ya'1a(3) on4hijoya'1a(3) on4,na4chu3ba42ku14ni2 un4ya'1a(3) on4bi14tin3ba42kwa'1an1yo'4o1,
nda1bi3tin3ni1ki3xa2a(2) on4,i3ku3nda4tu3yo'4o1,nda4tu3 ni42 yu1yo'4o1ki3xa2a(2) on4",ka4chi2be4la2so'3o3ji'4in4 ra2.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Su14u3ta1ki'1bi3ku4u(4) 2ko'3o(3) 2ta1kwi42ndi4ba'1a3ka1mi3i(4) un4ta3xi(3) un4 ra4nda'3a4 2ko'3o(3) 2".
Ja143ku4ni2ku14ni2be4la2ju13ndi3chi2 an4ja'1an1ki'1in(3) an4ta1kwi42tan3ta3xi(3) an4 ra4tan3ja'1an1ti13in3ba3 ra2su1kun4nda'3a4be4la2tan3ni1ki3xa3a4ba3 ra2ndi4
sa4ka3xa'4an2 ra1i3in4be4la2ndi4,ni1ndi'3i3ndu3ku2kan4sa14kwa3chi3 ra2i3in4 a2ta4u3ni2ja143ka'4an2nda'4bi(2) a2ja'1a(4) e4ndi4:
na4nda3kwa'1a3 e2ya3ni2 ra1sa3kan4ndi4sa3kan4ndi4sa1ña4 e2.
"hijondi4,ka14ni3 ni42ka1 on4yu'1u1ndi4bi3tin3sa3kan4nda3kwa'1a3 2ya3ni2 un4nda'3a(4) on4",ka4chi2 an4.
I3kan4ni1ke3e3be4la2ja'1an(1) en4ta13kwa'4ni(3) an4ta1kan4.
I3kan4ndi4lu14u3na1si'4i2la3tun4 lu3na1si'4i2ñu'4u4ni1ta3ba(4) en4ndi4na1bi14tin3ni1ko1yo3na1kan4tan3ja143
nda1ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ni1xa1a1tan3ta13ba4 ra2 na1ndi4
ña4ndi4kun2ndi'4i4ni1ke3ta3ña4kan4ban4ndi13ki'3in3ta1,ta1ko14o3ña4si'4i2chi1.
I3kan4ni1ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ran4.
CarlosRómuloSantiago.Sesentaydos.Yoloxóchitl.
Ña4reinandi4ki1bi4,se'1e3reyban4kan4tan3
i4yo2 an4palaciotan3i3kan4ja143ni1ka3chi2,i3kan4i4yo2 na1si'4i2i4xa3chiu4un4nu14u3yu3ba(4) en4tan3
ña4kan4ndi4ko14o3nda4a2ka1i3in3chi3ñu3i4xa(3) en4cocinandi4
i3in3nu14u3palacioti4ba3i4yo2 an4kan4tan3o4ra2ku3xi(3) an4ndi4na1i4xa3chiu4un4nu14u3yu3ba(4) en4na1kan4ku4u4 na2kwa'1an1nda1ka3is1ta4ku3xi(3) an4,is1ta1an1ba42,
ba1xi3kwa4a24ba42ndi4,a1su3na1kan4ku4u4 na2,an4tio1to(1) an4ba42ndi4a1su3na1kan4ku4u4 na2ta4ba4 e2tan3ndo3o(3) a2tan3i3kan4ja143
i3kan4ni1ki3xa2a2i3nda14ta1ko4ndo3musunu14u3 na2i13xa3ki'4bi3 ra2ña4ko4ndo3criadandi4
ni1ka3chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Sa4kwa'1a(3) on4ya1ma1ni4ji'4in(4) 2na4,ta3xi(3) un4tio1to(1) on4ku3ndi3xi(3) 2tan3ku'1un1 yu1sa3kan4ndi4xa1a1 yu1mi4i4i4ndu'3u4reinasa3kan4ndi4,ya1kan3,
yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ku'1un1nda1ka3 e2ku3xi(3) an4ña1a4",ya1kan4ndi4ni1ku3chun3 ra2i13xa3ki'4bi3 ra2ña4kan4tan3
i3kan4ja143ta13xi(3) an4tio1to(1) an4ju13ndi3xi3 ra2tan3i3kan4ni1ke3e3 ra2ja'1an1 ra1
ja'1an1nda1ka3 ra(2) e2xi13xi3ña4ko4ndo3reinasi1si'4i2reytan3,i3kan4ja143
ni1ka3chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ku4ni2 ra1ji4ni2 ra1 ña4,ni1ku3chun3ba3ta1kan4i13xa3ki'4bi3 ra2 ña4tan3i3kan4
ni1ku3kwa1chi3 ra2ji'4in(4) an4tan3sa3kan4ku4u4ndi4nda13ku'1un3se'1e(3) an4tan3ja143
ta1kan4ndi4ki1bi4ji13ni2 ra1ndi4chi3ñu3kan4i13xa3 ra2tan3xi13nu3ba3ta1kan4kwa'1an1 ra1tan3ni1ndo1o3ba3na1si'4i2i4xa3chiu4un4nu14u3ña4,
ña4ko4ndo3reinakan4tan3,ja143,sa3kan4ku4u4ndi4ja143i13xa3a4ba3ti1xin(3) an4ndi4i4xa3ka'4bi13 a2ji'4in(4) an4tan3ja143
ni1ka'1an(1) en4ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"Kwa'4an2 ndo4tan3ka'1an1 ndo4ji'4in4si'3i4 2na4ki3xi(3) an4ndi4,ji13ni2 yu1nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o(4) 2ndi4nde3e4 ni42ndo'4o(4) 2",ka4chi2 an4.
Ja143ni1ki'3in3ña4si'3i4reinani1ja'1an1ko1to(1) an4ndi4,ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4se'1e(3) an4ndi4,ya1kan3:
"ji14ni2 yu1nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o(4) 2ndi4,ya1kan3,ti1xin3 2ndi4ku'4u2 ni42ti1xin3 2",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4si'3i(4) an4.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2si'3i(4) an4ji'4in(4) an4,"¿Tan3nda4a(2) e2ba42ni1ku3u3ya1kan4ndi4ni1tu1u3kwe'1e1yo'4o4ji'4in(4) un4?".
"Ta1yo'4o4,ta1yo'4o4ku4u4 na2ni1ki3xi3nda3ka3is1ta4xi13xi(3) 2tan3su14u3ña'3a4ku4u4 ra2ndi4ta1a3ku4u4 ra2tan3
i13xa3 ra2ndi4ni1ku3kwa1chi3 ra2ji'4in(4) 2",ni1ka3chi2 an4ji'4in4si'3i(4) an4,i3kan4ja143,
yu'4bi2 lu(3) an4ña4si'3i4ña4reinaña1a4ku3ni3ta1reyndi4na4ku3ni3 ra2ndi4a14sa3ka4ña2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ka'3ni4 ra2si1si'4i2 ra1.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2si'3i(4) an4ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,"Hijandi4kwi14i3ku3ni3yu3ba(4) on4ndi4,na4ku3ni3 ra2ndi4ka'3ni4 ra2yo'4o1",ka4chi2,ni1ka3chi2ba3si'3i4reinaji'4in(4) an4.
Ya1kan4ndi4i3kan4ja143,ku4ni2tan3ku14ni2 an4ja143ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4ta1ko4ndo3reyndi4,"Sa1a3ko3o3ndi4,
se'1e(3) o4ndi4nde3e4 ni42ndo'4o(4) an4",i3kan4nda13kwi3in3reyni1ka3chi2 ra1ji'4in4ña4si'4i2 ra1ndi4,"Ña1a4ko3to(3) on4sa1a3a3sa(3) on4ji'4in4se'1e(3) o4ndi4su14u3,
yu'1u1ndi4su14u3ña'3a4ku4u4yu'1u1na4ku3ni2 yu1xa'1a4ya1ku4u4tu1ni4ni2ndo'4o(4) an4ña1a4ndi4,yo'4o1ban4ku3ni'3i3cuentaji'4in(4) an4ña1a4".
Ya1kan4ndi4ba'1a3ku4ni2ña4,ña4si'4i2reyki1bi4ndi4sa3kan4ni1ka3chi2 ra1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4,ya1kan3,
na4ko3to(3) an4sa1a3a3sa(3) en4sa3kan4ndi4ndu3ba'1a3i3ni2si1si'4i2 an4.
Ya1kan4ndi4sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni3na1nda13ka3si2ba3 na2palaciondi4ko14o3ka1na1kwa'1an1ki'1bi3ndi4i3nda14mi3i(4) an4ji'4in4i3nda14na1i4xa3chiu4un4nu14u3ti(4) an4kwa'1an1.
Sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1xa'1a3ba(3) en4nde3e4tan3ni1sa4ka3ku3ba(3) en4 e2kan4,ki1bi4ni1ka3ku(3) a2ndi4,ya1kan3,
na1cuateku4u4 na2chi1,cuateku4u4 na2ni1ka3ku3 na2ki1bi4ni1ka3ku3 na2ja143,ni1xa'3nda2ba3ña4
ña4si'3i4ña4reinachi3ñu3ndi4na4ku'1un1 na1ka3ta2 na1yu3bi2na4ta1kwi42na4ka3ndo3so4 na2ki1si3tan3chio'1o4ja(3) e2chi1.
Ya1kan4ndi4ni1ja3ndo3so4 na2ta1kwi42tan3ja143si4so1 ra4tan3ndi3sa4bi1sa3kan4ba4li4ni1ta3an4 na2i3kan4ja143
in3ka4ni24tan3ja143kwa4a4sa4ka2ba4li4ndi4,ya1kan3,ba14sa3kwi4i4ku3u(2) a2.
Xu3xan3 ni42yu'3u4 a2ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4ku'1un1 ndo4,ndi3kwi3so3 ndo4 na2tan3kwa'4an2ka3ta2 ndo4 na2yu3bi2".
Ni1ka3chi2ña4si'3i4reinaji'4in4 na2,nu14u3na1ja4chiu4un4nu14u(3) an4.
I3kan4ndi13kwi3so(3) an4 na2tan3kwa'1an1 na1ji'4in(4) an4kwa'1an1ka3ta2 na1na1kan4yu3bi2.
I3kan4ja143yu3bi2kan4ñu'4u4 na2tan3xi4ka3i3nda14be4la2ti4in(4) an4li4ma4tan3ja143,sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ja143,ya1kan3,
ni1ka3chi2,ka4chi2ya1kan3,kwe'4e1kan4so'3o3ndi4,ya1kan3
ba'1a3 lu3ku4ni2 an4ndi4ni1si4ki'1bi(3) an4xi1kun(1) an4tan3nda1u1bi1na1kwa4chi3ndi13kwi3so(3) an4chi2.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ndi4ña4ni1ka3ku3se'1e3ban4ka4chi2 an4ndi'4i13i3ni2 an4ja143
sa1a3ko3o3tan3ka3ndi4xa3 na2yo4o4ndi4ni1ka3ku3se'1e(3) o4ka4chi2,ka4chi2ka'4an4i3ni2ña4ta4u3ni2kan4.
I3kan4ja143ni1xa'1an(1) en4tan3ni1xu3ku4tu2(4) an4nu14u3i3ta2ya3yu3i4yo2yu'3u4yu3bi2kan4.
Ja'13nda(2) e2i3in(4) an4ndi4nda143kwa'4a1ti4ka4a4xa'1a(4) en4i3kan4ni1i4kan4ndu13ku3chi(3) a2tio1to(1) an4tan3ja143
nda13xa2a2 en4be'3e3ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ndi4ni1ka3ku3se'1e(3) an4ndi4cuateku4u4 na2,ku4si1i4 ni42i3ni2 an4ndi4ko14o3se'1e(3) an4tan3ni1ka3ku3se'1e(3) an4ka4chi2 an4.
I3kan4ja143ndi13kwi3so(3) an4na1ba4li4kan4i4xa3ma1ni(4) an4 na3.
I3kan4ja143,sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4nda13xi1nu3i3in3yo1o4 na2sa3kan4ku4u4ndi'13i3u1bi1yo1o4 na3.
Sa3kan4ku4u4ndi'13i3,ja1xi1nu3u1ni1yo1o4 na2i4xa3ma1ni(4) an4 na3,i3kan4ja143
i3kan4ke4e(4) an4kwa'1an(1) en4,kwa'1an(1) en4,ya1kan3,yu3bi2ti4in(4) an4li4ma4ku3xi3 na2ti4in(4) an4tio1o4ku3xi3 na3.
I3kan4ja143ndo4o13 na2be'3e3,sa3kan4ku4u4ndi13xi1nu3i3in3kwi1ya1ba3na1kwa4chi3kan4,
ja143i13xa3a4ja1ba'1a3xi4ka3nde3e3 na2ke4e4 na2jo4nde1e3 na3.
I3kan4ndo4ko3o(4) an4na1kwa4chi3tan3ja143,o4ra2kwa'1an(1) en4ta4u3ni2,ni1ku3na'3a4kwa'1an(1) en4tan3ja143
ja143ya1kan3,ndo4ko3yo3 na2tan3i4xi14ta3 na2ti1ndu'4u4yu'1ba1kan4sa4ka3ka3 na2ti1xin3be'3e3ndi4nda143tian42ka4a4xi4ka3ti1ndo4o24ba3,ti4ti1ndo4o24kan4sa3kan4ka4a4i4xa3 na2.
Ki3xa2a(2) en4ta4u3ni2ndi4,"Xe3nda'4bi2ndi4¿yo3o3ku4u4na1ni1ki3xi3ya1kan4ndi4sa14ti14bi3 ni42 na1be'3e(3) o4ndi4nda13ka3ni2ndi'3i3 na2yu'1ba1 yu1?",ka4chi2 an4ta4u3ni2so'3o3ji'4in4 na3.
I3kan4ja143ya1kan3,ji14ni2bi4na1kan4ndi4na1ki4xin1 ni42ba3ku4u4na1kan4ñu'4u4 na2nu4tio4o4.
I3kan4ja143ka3ka(3) en4ta4u3ni2nda3ka3ya2 en4 e2kan4tin3,tu3ku3ni3ki1bi4ndi4ki'3in(3) an4kwa'1an(1) en4tin3ja143,sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4ku4u4ja143
ji1nu3 na2u1xi1kwi1ya1ba3 na2i3kan4ja143ka4chi2 na1ji'4in(4) an4ndi4ya1kan3,"Bi3tin3ndi4
"ti3in(3) un4ku13xi2 ndu1sa3kan4ba42ndi4ku'1un1 ndu1xa14ku'1u1sa3kan4ndi4ndu3ku4 ndu2ña'1a3ku3xi(3) o4".
Ya1kan4ndi4xi1ka(3) en4ta4u3ni2ni1ti3in(3) an4ku13xi2 na1ja143kwa'1an1 na1,ja'4ni24 na2sa3a2ba3ja'4ni24 na2palomaba3ja'4ni24 na2,
nda4a(2) e2ka(1) e1ni1ke3ba'1a3 na2ji'4in4xi4xi3is1tan4 na2ji'4in4 na2,i3kan4ja143
ku4si1i4 ni42i3ni2 an4ta4u3ni2ndi4ja1ba'1a3ndu4ku4 na2ña'1a3ku3xi(3) an4,sa3kan4,sa3kan4ku4u4sa3kan4,sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ja143
sa3kan4ku4u4ja143,ya1kan3,ka4chi2 na1ndi4
I3kan4ni1ka3chi2ti1ka4ka3ji'4in4 na2ndi4,ya1kan3,"Su14u3yu3ba4bi4 ndo4ku4u4,ya1kan3,
xa'4an1ya1kan3,si'3i4 ndo4ja'4an1nda1ka(3) en4is1ta4ku3xi3ndi4,i3su2ba3ku4u4ti4kan4",ka4chi2,ni1ka3chi2ti1ka4ka3so'3o3ji'4in4 na2chi1.
I3kan4ja143,sa3kan4ku4u4ja143,
ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1,"Na4ku'1un(1) o4tan3sa3kan4ndi4i3kan4ndi'13i3xi13xi3 na2tan3ja143ndi13ki'3in3kwe'4e1
si'3i4 na2kwa'1an(1) en4kwa'1an1nda1ka(3) en4is1ta4ku3xi3yu3ba4 na3."Na4ku'1un(1) o4ja1ta4si'3i(4) o4sa3kan4ku3ni2 o4yo3o3ku4u4,yo3o3ku4u4yu3ba(4) e4ja'4an1nda1ka3 na2,ña4is1ta4ku3xi3",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3.
Ja143in3ka4ni24kwa'1an(1) en4ta4u3ni2ja143ndu13ndi3kun2 na1kwa'1an1 na1ni1xa1a1 na1kan4.
Su3u3ja143ni1xa1a(1) en4ta4u3ni2ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ndi4,ka4xa'1yu3na'3a2 on4ku3xi(3) un4ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4i3su2.
In3ka4ni24ki3xa2a2i3su2ja143,su3u3i3su2ba3ja'4an1nda1ka3na4na2kwe'4e1is1ta4ku3xi3.
I3kan4ndi'3i3ku3xi3i3su2kan4tan3ja143ti4in4 ri4be4la2ba1ba'1a3tan3ndi4ki'3in(3) an4ba1xi(3) an4.
Sa3kan4ku4u4tin3,ja143ka4chi2na1kwa4chi3so'3o3,ka4chi2ta1,ta1nu14u3so'3o3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,ya3ni2ndi4,"Bi3tin3ndi4
ya1ka1a3ndi4ti4ba'1a3ku3xi3ba(3) e4ku4u4ti4ka1a3,su14u3yu3ba(4) e4ku4u4ti4ka1a3ndi4i3su2ba3ku4u4ti4ka1a3ka4chi2ti1ka4ka3ji'4in(4) o4",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Ya1kan4ndi4xi1ka3 na2ndi4ja'13ni4ba3 na2i3su2chi1,xa'13ni4ba3 na2i3su2tan3ja143
ja143ya1kan3,ni1ndi3kwi3so3 na2ku3ñu2tin3,i3kan4nda13ka3ya2 na1,
ti1mi3i4ba3nda13ka3ya2 na1yo3ko2ba3ndi3sa3a4nu14u3ti4xa1tu1ta13an4 na2ti1xin3i3in4kan4tan3ja13ndi3chi2 na(1) e1ndi4chi(2) a2i3kan4ndi13ki'3in3 na2kwa'1an1 na1,nda13xa2a2 na1.
Ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4si'3i4 na2ndi4ke13ba'1a3 ni42 na1ji'4in(4) a2ku3xi3 na2ndi4
ja143ka4chi2be4la2ndi4,ya1kan3,"Ba'1a3na4su14u3yu3ba4 ndo4ni4xa'3ni4 ndo4na1kwa4chi3",ya1kan3,
"na4ni14sa3na3i3ni2 ndo4ka'3ni4 ndo4yu3ba4 ndo4"."Yu3ba4tu3 ndu2ko3ndo3tu3i3su2tu3ti4ba'1a3ku3xi3ba(3) e4ku4u4ti4kan4",ka4chi2,ka4chi2na1kwa4chi3ji'4in(4) an4ta4u3ni2.
Sa3kan4ku4u4,ya1kan3,ja143,ka13ndo3so(4) an4ta4u3ni2nda3yu4ni1xi3xi3 na2ba1ba'1a3tin3
i3kan4sa3kan4ku4u4ni1ya'1a3ba3ti1ka4ka3ka4chi2 ri4so'3o3ndi4,"Ki3ni3,ki3ni3ku4ni2xi4xi3nda3yu4i3i4",ka4chi2ti1ka4ka3ni1ya'1a3 ri4kwa'1an1 ri4.
I3kan4ja143tan3tu3ku3ni3ka'4an2 e4ta4u3ni2ndi4,"Ba'1a3na4su14u3yu3ba4 ndo4ni4xa'3ni4 ndo4na1kwa4chi3".
"Yu3ba4tu3 ndu2ko3ndo3i3su2tu3,su14u3kan4ndi4ti4ba'1a3ku3xi3ba(3) e4ku4u4ti4kan4",ka4chi2na1kwa4chi3so'3o3.
I3kan4ja143,sa3kan4ku4u4,sa3kan4ku4u4,i3kan4
ja143ni1ke3e3 na2,ña4ta4u3ni2ni1ki'3in(3) an4ki1si3nda3yu4kwa'1an1tu3ku(3) an4,ni1xa1a(1) en4kan4ja143
ka4chi2 an4ka4na(3) en4i3su2ndi4,"Na'3a2 on4ku3xi(3) un4ka4xa'1yu3",ka4chi2 an4.
Tan3ka4ti1in1ñu'3u4ka4ni3i3su2ja'1a4 ri4ndi4chi2 ri4,ta4xin24ndi4chi2 ri4.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2na4na2kwe'4e1so'3o3ndi4,"jueputa,¿nda4a(2) e2ba42ku4u4ndi4ku14ni2 un4ku3xi(3) un4?".
"¿Nda4a(2) e2ba42ni1ndo'3o(3) on4ndi4xi4kwe'1e(1) on4?",ka4chi2 an4ni1xa1a(1) en4tan3ni1ti3in(3) an4so'1o3i3su2tan3ni1ka3tu4tan3ni1ka3tu(4) an4nu14u3 ri4ja143nda13ko1yo3ba3yo3ko2ni1ka3ni3 ri4be4la2ndi4
tu4u24be4la2sa3kan4kwa'1an(1) en4ni1xa1a(1) en4nda1yu3bi2,i3kan4ja143
i3kan4ja143ya1kan3,nda13xa2a2ba3be4la2tan3ja143ka4chi2 an4ji'4in4 na2ndi4:
"bi3tin3ndi4ko3to3 ndo4mi4i4ba42ku'1un1 ndo4ndi4su14u3na1ba'1a3ku4u4 ndo4,yu3ba4 ndo4ndi4ja'13ni4 ndo4yu3ba4 ndo4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 na3.
I3kan4ja143ni1ta1xi4ba3na1kwa4chi3kwa'1an1 na1i1nda43,na1ja1nde1e4ku4u4 na2ndi4,na1ja1u1xi1i3in3u1xi1u1bi1kwi1ya1ka1a3ku4u4 na2ndi4ni1ta1xi4 na2kwa'1an1 na1,sa3kan4ku4u4ja143
"bi3tin3ndi4,ku'1un1ba(3) e4ya3ni2",xa1a1 na1xa'1a4i3tun4i3kan4xi13tu3 na3.
Ndu13ku3na4 na2xa'1a4i3tun4i3kan4ja143,tiem4pu2kan4ndi4ko14o3ñu'1u3nda4ndi24ndi4,yu14bi4i4chi1ba42ko14o3sa1bi4ko14o3ku3un3.
I3kan4ja143ndu13ku3na4 na2xa'1a4i3tun4kan4ja143ndu13ko3nde3e3 na2nde4e4 na2,"Bi3tin3ndi4na4ku'1un(1) o4,
ku'1un1ndu3ku(4) e4nu4mi24kwa'3a3be'3e(3) o4ndi4sa1bi4tan3ta4ku3un3ku4u4 ra4ka1a3o4ra2ja143ku3un3 ra4",ka4chi2ta1ñu'1u3so'3o3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1.
I3kan4ja143ta1kan4ku4u4ta1nu14u3chi2,tan3ta1ka4chi2 o4ko4ndo3ta1yo1o4ka1a3ndi4ta1,ta1i4xa3lu3u3ku4u4ta1ka1a3chi2.
I3kan4ja143ya1kan3,ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1ja143ni1ka3ya2 na1kwi1yo'1o4ba3ni1ka3ya2 na1i3tun4nda1ba32ba3ni1ka3ya2 na1tun4i3in4ba3ni1ka3ya2 na1,
yo'3o4yu3ku4ni1ka3ya2 na1ta13nde3e3po3ndo42 na(1) e1ja143ni1ka3chi2ta1nu14u3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,"Ya3ni2ndi4ko1to1ko14to(3) on4ja1ta(4) on4na4
na4o4ra2kwa'1an(1) e4ndi4ko1to1sa14na3i3ni2 un4ko3to(3) on4ja1ta(4) on4"ka4chi2,
i3kan4ta13nde3e3po3ndo42 na(1) e1kan4tan3ja143ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1ja143
ja143ka4xan4ba3tu4u24ba3i3tun4tu4u24ba3nda1i3ta2tu4u24ba3,ndi3sa4ku4u4nu14u3ña1nda13ka3ya2 na1ndi4ta13nde3e3po3ndo42 na1ndi4ya1kan4ndi4ya1xi4nu3mi3i4ba42kwa'1an(1) e1.
I3kan4ka4chi2ka'4an4ta1,ta1yo1o4so'3o3ndi4,a4chu3ka'4an2tu3ya3ni2 o4ndi4ko14to(3) e4ja1ta(4) e4ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Na4ko3to(3) e4ja1ta(4) e4ndi4ku3ni2 o4nda4a(2) e2ba42i4yo2,i3kan4ja'1an1nu14u3ta1,ta1yo1o4xi13to3 ra2ja1ta4,i3kan4nda13ko3nde3e3ba(3) e2kan4ndi4
ni14sa4ka1nda1ka(1) e1ki3xi(3) a2ndi4ni1ji3to3 ra2ja1ta4 ra2chi1.
I3kan4ja143ni1ka3chi2ta1ñu'1u3ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,"Bi3tin3tun4,bi3tin3ndi4ya1nda3kwi3ko4ja1ta(4) on4ba42ka1a3tin3.
"A4su3ja1ni1ka3chi2 yu1ji'4in(4) un4ndi4ko14to(3) on4ja1ta(4) on4tan3bi3tin3ndi4ji13to(3) on4ja1ta(4) on4",i3kan4ja143
ja143ya1kan3,ja143nda13kwi3ko4 na(2) e2kan4ni1kwa'3a3be'3e3ba3 na2ni1kwa'3a3,i3kan4ja143ni1xi1nu3be'3e3 na2tin3.
Tan3be4la2kan4ndi4be'3e3ba'1a3ku4u4be'3e(3) an4kan4ndi4
be'3e3sa'3ma4ya3a3be'3e3sa'3ma4mantaku4u4be'3e(3) an4ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 na2,na1kwa4chi3kan4ki1bi4ta13xi(4) an4 na2kwa'1an1 na1.
I3kan4ni1xi1nu3be'3e3ba3na1kan4i3kan4ni1ke3e3 na2kwa'1an1 na1xa14ku'1u1.
Ni1xa1a1 na1kan4ndi4che4e13 lu3ko1o4ka4ndu'3u4,
che4e13 lu3ko1o4,o4ra2ndu4ma1ni1 ri4ndi4na3a4i4chi3,o4ra2tan3,o4ra2ndu4to'3ni3 ri4ndi4nda4ye'3e2ya1yu14bi4chi2.
I3kan4ja143ka4chi2ta1ñu'1u3kan4ji'4in4ya3ni2 ra1ndi4,"Ya3ni2,¿sa1a3ko3o3tan3ka'3ni(4) o4ti4ka1a3ndi4
che4e13 ni42 ri4ndi4,¿sa1a3ko3o3ka'3ni(4) o4 ri4?",ka4chi2 ra1so'3o3.
Xa143nde4e4 na2ji14ni2 na1sa1a3ko3o3.
Sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ni1ya'1a3ba3ti1ka4ka3ka4chi2 ri4so'3o3ndi4,"Xi1tun1,xi1tun1",ka4chi2 ri4chi2.
"A1chi(1) un4ya3ni2xi1tun1chi1",ka4chi2 ri4tan3,ja143nda13ka'3mi3 na2ñu'3u2ni1ta3an4 na2yu1u4nu'3u2ni1ta3an4 na3.
I3kan4xi4xi(1) a1ndi4i4yo2 lu3ñu'14u4,nda143mi3i4ya1kwa'4a1ti4ku4u4yu1u4ñu'4u(4) a2ya1a4nu'3u2.
I3kan4ja143sa3kan4ni3ku4u4tan3ni1ya'1a3tu3ku3ba3ti1ka4ka3ka4chi2 ri4ndi4:
"xi1nda4xi1nda4",ka4chi2 ri4,a1chi(1) un4ya3ni2,xi1nda4chi2.
I3kan4ja'1an1ka'3nda2 na1i3tun4nda13ta4 na2yu'3u4 run4.
Ti'4nu3 na2yu1u4tan3kwa'1an1tan3kwa'1an(1) e1yu'3u4ko1o4,i3kan4ja143,sa3kan4ku4u4
ni1ku3ta4xin24,ba143ka4nda1ka1ko1o4i4ndu'3u4 ri4sa3kan4ku4u4ja143
ni1ya'1a3ndia3ma2""ya3ni2 o4ta1ri3ki4ñu3,
na'3a2 on4,ya1kan3,ki3xi3ko1to(1) on4ndi4,nda4a(2) e2ba42i4yo2ndi4,ya1kan3,
ki'1bi(3) un4yu'3u4tan3ke3ta(3) on4ka'3a4ka4chi2,ka4chi2ta1,ta1yo1o4so'3o3ji'4in4
ji'4in4ndia3ma2kan4,ndia3ma2ku4u4ti4kan4tan3ka4chi2,tu'1un3na1kiu'4un4ndi4ri3ki4ñu3ka4chi2 na1ji'4in4 ri4.I3kan4ja143
ya1kan3,ja143ni1ke3e3ndia3ma2ja'1an1 ri4ju13ndu'4u4 ri4yu'3u4ko1o4,ni1ke3e3 ri4ja'1an1ju13ndu'4u4 ri4ka'3a4 e3
ko14o(3) a2,"Ya3ni2ndi4ni'3ni4 ni42ndi4ba143kwi4i4ki'1bi3 2ndi4
ni'3ni4 ni42",ka4chi2,ka4chi2ndia3ma2so'3o3ji'4in4na1kan4.
"Ku3nda3tu3 ndo4in3ka4ni24sa3kan4ku'1un1 yu1ku'1un1ko1to(1) e1",i3kan4ja143,ya1kan3,
ja143ya1kan3,ni1ku3na'3a4ba3nde4e4 na2ja143,tu3ku3ni3ka'4an2 ra1ji'4in4,"Ku'1un1ko1to(1) on4ndi4nda4a(2) e2ka4a4ndi4an4ja1,ja1i4yo2ba'1a3".
I3kan4ni1ke3e3ndia3ma2ja'1an1 ri4ni1ki'1bi3 ri4ka3xa4ti24 a2tan3ni1ke1ta3 ri4yu'3u4ko1o4.
I3kan4nda13ndi3ko4tu3ku3 ri4ni1ke3ta3 ri4ka3xa4ti24 a2,"Bi3tin3ndi4ja1i4yo2ba'1a3ya3ni2ndi4ja1
ja1ni1xi'1i1ba3ko1o4ka4chi2 ra1,ka4chi2ndia3ma2so'3o3ji'4in4 na3.
Ja143ni1ka3chi2,ja143ka4chi2ta1yo1o4so'3o3ji'4in4
ji'4in4ta1ñu'1u3ndi4,"Ya3ni2ndi4ya1ye'4e1ka1a3ndi4yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ndi3ki'3in(3) a2",ka4chi2,
"ku14xi'3na3yo'4o1ya3ni2ndi4yu'1u1ku4u4ta1,ta1nu14u3ndi4yu'1u1ku4u4ta1ku3ni'3i3ya1ye'4e1ka1a3tan3yo'4o1ndi4
ya1kan3,ya1i3in3ta'4bi4,ta'4bi4i4tin3ka1a3ndi3ki'3in3yo'4o1",ni1ka3chi2,ni1ka3chi2ta1ñu'1u3so'3o3,o4ra2ja143
"ka3ja3chiu4un(4) e4ndi4,yu'1u1ndi4ba143i4yo2ndu3i4ta4yu'1u1ndi4ta1be4lu2sa3kan4ko3ndo3yu'1u1sa1a3ku4u4tiem4pu2ba3yu'1u1",ni1ka3chi2
"tan3yo'4o1ndi4ta1ndu3i4ta4ku4u4yo'4o1ku3xa(3) on4tan3ndu3i4ta(4) on4tan3
i3kan4ndi4tan42i4yo2na1si'4i2kwa4chi3ndi4kwe4nda2yo'4o1ko3ndo3 na2",ni1ka3chi2ñu'1u3kan4ji'4in4ta1yo1o4chi2.
Ya1kan4ni1ki3xi3ndo1o3i3ni2ta1yo1o4ndi4kwe4nda2 ra1ku4u4 na2si'4i2kwa4chi3.
Ku4nu24ta1kan4ku4u4ta1ku3ni2sa1a3ka4a4na1si'4i2tan3ta3nda'3a4 na2o4ra2ki1bi4ta3nda'3a4 na3.
Ni1ka3chi2ta1ñu'1u3ji'4in4ta1yo1o4sa3kan4ndi4ki13xi3ndo1o3i3ni2 ra1.
I3kan4ja143ki1bi4,i3kan4ja143ni1ti3in3 na2
i3kan4ja143ni1ki3xa3a4ba3ni1ja'3ni4 na2ko1o4kan4ndi13kwi3so3 na2ndu3chi4nu14u3 ri4tan3ja1ni1ki3xa2a2ba3sa1bi4ndi4sa1bi4tan3ta1chi4sa1bi4tan3ta1chi4ku4u(4) un4,
nda13chi4ba3be'3e3na4na2kwe'4e1is1tan4i1nda43.
Nda13chi4ba3be'3e3na4na2kwe'4e1is1tan4tan3ja143
ku4u(4) un4sa1bi4ndi4,sa1bi4tan3ta1chi4i3kan4ni1xa1a1
na4na2kwe'4e1ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ndi4,"Xe'3e4nda'4bi2,
kwa'1a3 ndo4nda14yu3na4,ya1kan3,ku3sa4bi4 2lu3u(3) 2be'3e3 ndo4",ka4chi2 an4.
"¿A4chu3ku3sa4bi4bi4tu3yo'4o1na4na2kwe'4e1?",
"yo'4o1ndi4be'3e3sa'3ma4be'3e3ba'1a3ku4u4be'3e3yo'4o1,be'3e3sa'3ma4,mantaku4u4be'3e3yo'4o1",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in(4) an4.
"Ndu'1u1ndi4be'3e3ti1mi3i4be'3e3ti1nda1ka1ba3ku4u4be'3e3ndu'1u1",ka4chi2,
"Ku14sun1 un4be'3e3 ndu2ndi4ko3to3ka'3ni4ki3ti4yo'4o1,i4yo2 ni42ti1su'3ma2i4yo2 ni42ti4xa1tu1be'3e3 ndu3".
"Be'3e3i3ta2ba3ku4u4be'3e3 ndu2",ka4chi2 na1so'3o3ji'4in4na4na2kwe'4e1.
Ja143ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ji'4in4 na2ndi4,"Ka'14an1 ndo4sa3kan4ji'4in(4) 2xe3nda'4bi2na4ku1sun(1) i1be'3e3 ndo4",ka4chi2.
I3kan4tan3ta1yo1o4ndi4ja13ndo3so4 ra2ki1si3ñu'4u4ta1kwi42ti1xin3 a2ndi4si4so1 lu3ta1kwi42.
Tan3i3kan4nda13ka3ndu'4u4be4la2ja143ka4chi2 an4so'3o3ndi4,"¿Nda4a(2) e2i4yo2be'3e3 ndo4ran4xe3nda'4bi2?,xa'4an2bi1xi1 ni42,xa'4an2ta4mi4 ni42be'3e3 ndo4",ka4chi2 an4so'3o3.
Ka4chi2na4na2kwe'4e1so'3o3,"Ko14o(3) a2i4yo2bi4ndi4ndo3ko4ki4xin1ba3i4yo2".
I3kan4ta13xi3 na2,ja143ka4chi2ta1ñu'1u3ji'4in4ta1yo1o4ndi4,"Ta3xi(3) un4,
ndo3ko4na4ka3xi4is1tan4tan3ku1sun(1) an4".
Ja143ta13xi3 na2ndo3ko4ki4xin1kan4xa13xi4be4la2,ndi'13i3xa13xi4 a2ndo3ko4kan4nda13ka3ndu'4u(4) a2ki4xin1sa4ka(2) e2.
Ki4xin1 lu(3) a2be4la2ja143sa3kan4ku4u4tan3ja143
ja143ni1ka3chi2ba3ta1,ta1ñu'1u3ji'4in4ta1yo1o4ndi4,"Na4yu'1u1ni1ta'1bi4sa3ba3kwa'1an1 yu1tan3sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un(1) un4".
"Na4ja1kwa'1an(1) e1in3ka4ni24kwa'1an(1) e1ni1ta'1bi4sa3ba3kwa'1an1 yu1sa3kan4ndi4ku'1un(1) un4ku3ndi3kun2 un4ku'1un(1) un4",ni1ka3chi2ta1ñu'1u3ji'4in4ta1yo1o4chi2.
I3kan4ja143ni1ndo1o3ba3ta1kan4tan3ki4xin1 lu(3) a2be4la2kan4ka4ndu'3u4 a2tan3i3kan4ja143
ka'4an2mi3i4ka'3a4 e2ka4ndu'3u4 a2ndi4,nda4a(2) e2ba42ndo'4o4tu3be4la2ka1a3ka'4an2 ni42tu3ka'3a4tu(3) an4.
Ki'13in3 ra2machitichi13ka2 ra1nu'3u2tan3i3kan4ni1xa'1nu1 ra1nu'1u3ka'3a4 e2ta4u3ni2tan3ni1ti3in3 ra(2) e2ba3ba'1a3.
Ja143ti4in4 ni42 ra(1) e1nda13ku'1un3i3ni(2) a2ka4chi(2) a2so'3o3ndi4,"¿Na4chu3i4xa(3) on4sa3kan4xe3nda'4bi2,an4ya1yo'4o4ku4u4ya1ma1ni4i13xa(3) 2ji'4in4 ndo4?".
"sa14kwa'3nu(3) 2ndo'4o1bi3tin3ndi4na1i4xa3ja13ni1ku3ba3ku4u4ndo'4o1ji'4in(4) 2".
I3kan4ji13ni2 ra1ndi4ta1ja1kwa'1an1ba3ku4u4,ni1ta'1bi4sa3ba3ta1ñu'1u3kwa'1an1 ra1ndi4ndu13ndi3kun2 ra1kwa'1an1 ra1.
I3kan4ndo13ko2o(2) a2ta4u3ni2ni1ki'3in(3) a2ti1ndu'4u4yu'1ba1ni1ki'3in(3) a2
xi1tu4ku4nu(3) a2i3sa2kan4ja13ta(2) e2ja1ta4 na3.
Xi1ka3nda3a(2) e2kwa'1an1ja1ta4 na2,ni14ku3chun(3) a2ndi4i3kan4ni1ndo1o3ba(3) e2i1nda43,i3kan4ni1ndi'3i3ba(3) e2ran4.
CarlosRómuloSantiagona3ni4 2.Sesentaydoskwi1ya1 yu1.Yoloxóchitlku4u4ñu3u2 yu1.

A1su3i3chi4mi4i4ku4xi1nu1
ya1i1ta3yo'4o4mi4i4chi4ndu'4u4i3chi4kwa'1an1yu3ku4xi1tun1ka1a3ñu'4u4 ndu2tan3ka1a3ju13ta'3an2 ndu1tun4
